Text: Paradox Interactive will link your <account_type> to allow you to stay logged in to your Paradox Account when playing our games and to grant you benefits based on games that you own. Text: A small Dome suitable for the early days of the Colony.
Translation: 適合殖民早期的小型穹頂。

Text: A rhombus shaped Dome design which has space for two Spires.
Translation: 採用菱形設計的穹頂，可以容納兩座尖塔。

Text: An alternative small Dome configuration providing more space but lacks a slot for a Spire.
Translation: 另一種構造的小型穹頂，可以提供更多居住空間，但無法容納尖塔。
一座中等尺寸的穹頂結構建築。

Text: The most advanced and spacious Dome design.
Translation: 最先進、最寬敞的穹頂結構建築。

Text: An alternative Mega Dome configuration. Cheaper, but provides less habitable space.
Translation: 另一種構造的超大型穹頂。造價更低，但能提供的居住空間也更小。

Text: The most economical Dome design providing extremely limited habitable space and no capacity to host a Spire.
Translation: 最省錢的穹頂結構，只能提供極為有限的居住空間，也無法容納尖塔。

Text: An elongated Dome design which has space for two Spires.
Translation: 經過延展的穹頂設計，可以容納兩座尖塔。

Text: An alternative medium Dome configuration. Cheaper, but provides less habitable space.
Translation: 另一種構造的中型穹頂。造價更低，但能提供的居住空間也更小。

Text: Connects nearby Domes, sharing Power and Life Support. Passages must start and end on a empty hex inside a Dome. Colonists can work and use services in Domes that are directly connected with passages to their residential Dome.
Translation: 可以連接附近的穹頂，共享電力與生命供給資源。通道的起止點必須都位於穹頂內的空格處。只要與殖民地居民居住的穹頂之間有通道連通，殖民地居民就可以在連通的穹頂內工作，或使用穹頂設施。

Text: Allows traversal of vehicles and drones over Passages.
Translation: 可以讓載具與無人機從通道上方穿越。

Text: Contains a small Dome suitable for the early days of the colony, together with Water and Oxygen producing facilities and storages.Construction layout, places the following buildings: Small Dome, MOXIE, 2 Moisture Vaporators, Water Tower, Oxygen Tank, Food Depot, Power Cables and PipesResearch Moisture Farming to build Moisture Vaporators, or get prefabs from Earth.
Translation: 包含一個在殖民地發展初期適用的小型穹頂，外加水資源和氧氣生產設施和儲存設施。建築佈局，放置以下建築：小型穹頂、氧氣生成裝置、2座水氣蒐集站、水塔、氧氣罐、食物倉庫、電纜和管線研究水氣搜集以建造水氣蒐集站，或從地球獲取預製件。

Text: Provides living space. Resting residents recover Comfort faster compared to other Residences.
Translation: 可以提供生活空間。與其它住宅相比，公寓可以讓居民們以更快的速度恢復舒適度。

Text: A gigantic structure made of Black Cubes.
Translation: 由黑色立方體建造而成的巨型紀念碑。

Text: A reflective sphere of unknown composition.
Translation: 一個由未知成分組成的反射球體。

Text: The landing site of a Pod. Landing Pods scatter dust to nearby buildings. Once landed, the Pod cannot be reused but may be salvaged.
Translation: 運輸艙降落的區域。運輸艙著陸時會向附近建築物揚起塵土。運輸艙著陸後無法再次使用，但可以回收。

Text: The landing site of a Rocket.

Delivers cargo or Colonists to Mars. Commands nearby Drones.Requires Fuel for the return trip to Earth.Raises dust when landing and taking off causing increased maintenance of buildings in the grey area.
Translation: 運送貨物或殖民地居民到火星。指揮附近的無人機。需要燃油以返回地球。無人機降落及起飛時會揚起灰塵，因此灰色區域的建築需加強維護。

Text: A laser-targeting defense structure. Protect nearby buildings from meteors. Can attack enemy vehicles at extreme range.
Translation: 搭在鐳射炮臺的防禦設施，可以保護附近的建築不受隕石襲擊，也可以從極遠距離外攻擊敵方載具。

Old Translation: <description><newline><newline>目前狀態：<DronesStatusText><newline>無人機<right><drone(DronesCount)>

Text: A dedicated landing site that protects nearby buildings and vehicles from dust during Rocket landings and takeoffs.
Translation: 精心設計過的著陸點，可以在火箭起飛或降落時，保護附近的載具與建築免受塵土汙染。

Text: Destroys any falling meteors in its range. Has a short cooldown between shots.
Translation: 可摧毀射程內的隕石，射擊之間的冷卻時間較短。

Text: Boosts scanning speed, especially for nearby sectors. Extends the advance warning for disasters.
Translation: 加速掃描速度，對鄰近地圖區塊效果尤為明顯。擴大災害預警範圍。

Text: Increases the local temperature in cold areas and protects nearby buildings from Cold Waves.
Translation: 提高寒冷地區的溫度，並保護附近的建築免受寒流侵襲。

Text: A Rocket to transport resources and people between Earth and Mars.
Translation: 在地球和火星之間運輸資源與人員的火箭。

Text: Emits pulses which reduce the Dust accumulated on buildings in its range.
Translation: 釋放脈衝，減少範圍內建築上的塵土。

Text: The tunnel entrance and exit can connect power and life support grids at different locations and different elevations. Rovers can travel along the tunnels to reach places they otherwise couldn't.
Translation: 隧道入口和出口可連接不同位置和不同高度的電力和生命支援網路，探測車可以沿著隧道前往曾經無法到達的地方。

Text: Marks two flat surfaces to be connected with passable ground by Drones. Consumes Waste Rock to raise terrain. Excess soil and rocks are turned into Waste Rock.Degrades local Soil Quality.
Translation: 標記兩處平面，並用可供無人機通行的路面連接。消耗礦渣抬高地形。多餘的土壤和石塊會變成礦渣。使該地土壤品質降低。

Text: Marks a flat surface to be extended into the neighboring terrain by Drones. Consumes Waste Rock to raise terrain. Excess soil and rocks are turned into Waste Rock.Degrades local Soil Quality.
Translation: 標記一處平面，供無人機將附近地形也變成平面。消耗礦渣抬高地形。多餘的土壤和石塊會變成礦渣。使該地土壤品質降低。

Text: A stylish composition made of native Martian rocks.
Translation: 由火星本地岩石製成的新潮造型。

Text: Small stylish composition made of native Martian rocks.
Translation: 由火星本地岩石製成的小型新潮造型。

Text: Marks a slope for Drones to change into the Mountains type.Degrades local Soil Quality.
Translation: 標記一處斜坡供無人機改造成高山地形。使該地土壤品質降低。

Text: Marks a surface for Drones to change into the Mixed Rocks type.Degrades local Soil Quality.
Translation: 標記一處地表供無人機改造成混合岩石地形。使該地土壤品質降低。
Old Text: Marks a surface for Drones to change into the Red Sands type.Degrades local Soil Quality.
Old Translation: 標記一處地表供無人機改造成紅沙地形。使該地土壤品質降低。

Text: Marks a surface for Drones to change into the Sands type.Degrades local Soil Quality.
Translation: 標記一處地表供無人機改造成沙地地形。使該地土壤品質降低。

Text: Marks a surface for Drones to change into the Mixed Sands type.Degrades local Soil Quality.
Translation: 標記一處地表供無人機改造成混合沙地地形。使該地土壤品質降低。

Text: Marks a surface for Drones to change into the Red Sands type.Degrades local Soil Quality.
Translation: 標記一處地表供無人機改造成紅沙地形。使該地土壤品質降低。

Text: Can be manually activated to cut off Water and Oxygen supply.
Translation: 可以手動開啟，切斷水與氧氣的供應。

Text:
MOXIE instruments, which employ MOXIE (short for Mars Oxygen In situ resource utilization Experiment) technology, produce Oxygen from the rich amounts of carbon dioxide in the Martian atmosphere.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

Developed in the 20th century but first tested on a rover mission to Mars in the early 20s of the 21st century, that once experimental technology now forms the backbone of life support in our first Colony on an alien world.

These instruments require nothing but power and regular maintenance and, of course, a connection to the lifeline of our Colony.
Translation:
氧氣生成裝置，透過運用火星大氣開採技術，可以從富含二氧化碳的火星大氣中產生氧氣。

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000><left>

這項技術早在二十世紀就被發現，但直到二十一世紀初期才首次在火星探測器上進行測試。當時的這項實驗技術，如今已成為我們在宇宙世界中首個殖民地的核心技術。

這些裝置只需要電力和定期維護即可運轉。不過，在維持殖民地的生命方面，它起著至關重要的作用。

Text:
Moisture Vaporators provide a limitless, albeit slower and energy consuming, supply of water once water deposits are no longer a viable option. 

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

Moisture Vaporators are based on WAVAR tech (Water-Vapor Adsorption Reactor), a process that extracts water directly from the Martian atmosphere by alternately blowing air over a zeolite adsorption bed and heating the bed to extract the absorbed water. While the water output is less than that of the Water Extractor, there is no end to the amount of water it can generate, and its mechanical simplicity means Moisture Vaporators can be deployed anywhere on the Martian surface.
Translation:
在沒有沉積水的情況下，水分蒸發器可以提供無限的水資源，但生產速度較慢，也要消耗更多能量。 

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

水氣蒐集站採用了水蒸氣吸附反應器技術，可以直接從火星的大氣層中開採水分。工作時，蒐集站會交替地將空氣吹向沸石吸附床與加熱床上，之後透過開採吸附床吸收的水蒸氣。儘管水氣蒐集站的產能比水資源挖掘站要低，但它可以源源不斷地從火星大氣中開採水分。另外，水氣蒐集站的機械構造非常簡單，可以在火星表面任何地塊上進行建造。

Text: Extracts Water from underground deposits.<newline><newline>All extractors raise dust resulting in more frequent maintenance for buildings in the grey area.
Translation: 開採地下水。<newline><newline>所有開採工作都會揚起灰塵，因此灰色區域的建築需更加頻繁地維護。

Translation: 開採地下金屬。<newline><newline>所有開採工作都會揚起灰塵，因此灰色區域的建築需更加頻繁地維護。

Text: +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% Production as long as the building is supplied with Fuel. If not supplied with Fuel, the building will continue to operate but will lose the bonus.
Translation: 在建築配備燃料的情況下，+<upgrade1_mul_value_1>%產量。若未配備燃料，雖然建築會繼續運轉，但不會獲得加成效果。

Text: Extracts Rare Metals from underground deposits.<newline><newline>All extractors raise dust resulting in more frequent maintenance for buildings in the grey area.
Translation: 開採地下稀有金屬。<newline><newline>所有開採工作都會揚起灰塵，因此灰色區域的建築需更加頻繁地維護。

Text: +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% Production as long as the building is supplied with Fuel. If not supplied with Fuel, the building will continue to operate but will lose the bonus.
Translation: 在建築配備燃料的情況下，+<upgrade1_mul_value_1>%產量。若未配備燃料，雖然建築會繼續運轉，但不會獲得加成效果。

Text: Extracts sulfurous rich regolith from Concrete deposits and produces Concrete.<newline><newline>All extractors raise dust resulting in more frequent maintenance for buildings in the grey area.
Translation: 自混凝土礦床中開採富含硫的風化層，然後生產混凝土。<newline><newline>所有開採工作都會揚起灰塵，因此灰色區域的建築需更加頻繁地維護。

Text: Remote-controlled exploration vehicle that can analyze Anomalies.
Translation: 遠端遙控的探索車，可以分析異象。

Old Text: RC Rover
Old Translation: 遙控探測車

Old Text: RC Commander
Old Translation: 遙控指揮車

Text: Remote-controlled vehicle that takes Tourists on a Safari. Configure a route with waypoints near interesting sights to increase the Satisfaction awarded to Tourists.
Translation: 用來帶遊客觀景的遠程遙控載具。在有趣景點附近設置航路點以規劃遊覽路線，增加遊客獲得的滿意度。

Old Text: Universal Storages
Old Translation: 通用自動倉庫

Text: Stores <resource(max_storage_per_resource)> units of each transportable resource. Some resources will be transported to other depots within Drone range.
Translation: 儲存可運輸資源，每種資源可儲存<resource(max_storage_per_resource)>單位。部分資源將會被運輸至無人機範圍內的其它倉庫中。
Old Text: Stores <resource(max_storage_per_resource)> units of each transportable resource. Excess resources will be delivered automatically to other depots within Drone range.
Old Translation: 儲存可運輸資源，每種資源可儲存<resource(max_storage_per_resource)>單位。無人機會自動將溢位的資源送到範圍內的其它倉庫。

Text: Stores <wasterock(max_amount_WasteRock)>. Waste Rock is produced as side product of different mining activities.
Translation: 可以儲存<wasterock(max_amount_WasteRock)>。礦渣是挖礦帶來的副產品。

Text: Stores <wasterock(max_amount_WasteRock)>. Waste Rock is produced as side product of different mining activities.
Translation: 可以儲存<wasterock(max_amount_WasteRock)>。礦渣是挖礦帶來的副產品。

Text: This marvel of Martian engineering produces colossal amounts of Power. It provides light for nearby solar panels during the night in addition to heating the surrounding area. Consumes vast amounts of Water on startup.
Translation: 這個火星工程的奇蹟造物可以生產極為龐大的電力。它可以在夜間為外圍太陽能板提供光源，並加熱周邊區域。它啟動時會消耗大量的水。

Text: A slice of Earth on Mars, this Dome increases the Comfort of all Residences within. It also increases the Sanity of its inhabitants every Sol.
Translation: 火星上的地球一隅。這種穹頂可以增加所有內部居民的舒適度，每個太陽日時也可以恢復居民的理智度。

Text: +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% Metals Production; +<upgrade1_mul_value_2>% Rare Metals Production; +<power(upgrade1_add_value_3)> Consumption.
Translation: +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% 金屬產量；+<upgrade1_mul_value_2>% 稀有金屬產量；+<power(upgrade1_add_value_3)> 消耗。
Old Text: +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% Metals Production; +<upgrade1_mul_value_2>% Rare Metals Production; +<power(upgrade1_add_value_3)>.
Old Translation: +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% 金屬產量；+<upgrade1_mul_value_2>% 稀有金屬產量；+<power(upgrade1_add_value_3)>。

Text: Mining deep into the crust of Mars, the Mohole Mine produces Metals, Rare Metals and Waste Rock, while heating the surrounding area.
Translation: 莫霍礦井深入火星地殼挖掘礦物，可出產金屬、稀有金屬與礦渣，同時加熱周圍區域。

Text: Peering beyond the veil of the unknown, this radio telescope gives access to new Breakthrough Technologies and reduces overall Research costs.
Translation: 這種射電望遠鏡可以穿過遠方未知的迷霧，為發現新的突破性技術開闢蹊徑並降低整體研究成本。
Old Text: Peering beyond the veil of the unknown, this radio telescope gives access to new Breakthrough Technologies and boosts overall Research.
Old Translation: 這種射電望遠鏡可以穿過遠方未知的迷霧，為發現新的突破性技術開闢蹊徑。它可以提高整體技術水準。

Text: With our improved understanding of the human brain we created Project Morpheus. The device uses a combination of psychosomatic triggers and suggestopedic methodology to stimulate the development of new Perks in adult Colonists.
Translation: 隨著對人腦的理解不斷加深，莫菲斯計劃應運而生。這個裝置結合了自身心理暗示與暗示教學法，可刺激成年殖民地居民學習新的特長。

Text: A faster way to reach space, the Elevator speeds up cargo shipments to orbit. Exports Rare Metals to Earth and offers resupply materials and prefabs at a discount.
Translation: 太空電梯可以讓居民更快到達太空。電梯可以將貨物運到軌道，將稀有金屬出口到地球，並以折扣價提供補給材料和預製件。

Old Text: +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% Concrete Production; +<power(upgrade1_add_value_2)>.
Old Translation: +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% 混凝土產量；+<power(upgrade1_add_value_2)>。

Text: Using advanced extraction technology, allows for production of Concrete directly from the Martian soil without the requirement for a deposit.
Translation: 採用先進的開採技術，可以在沒有沉積物的情況下，直接使用火星土壤生產混凝土。

Text: Remote-controlled vehicle that takes Tourists on a Safari. Configure a route with waypoints near interesting sights to increase the Satisfaction awarded to Tourists.
Translation: 用來帶遊客觀景的遠程遙控載具。在有趣景點附近設置航路點以規劃遊覽路線，增加遊客獲得的滿意度。

Text: Waste materials usually introduced as a byproduct of mining and landscaping activities.
Translation: 廢料一般是採礦和地形改造時的副產物。

Text: Reveals underground deposits in the scanned area.
Translation: 在掃描區域中發現地下資源點。
Old Translation: 可以顯示掃描區域內是否含有地底資源。

Text: Controls Drones and allocates them to different tasks.
Translation: 可以控制無人機，為它們分配不同的任務。

Text: Produces Water from the atmosphere. Production lowered when placed near other Vaporators. No production during Dust Storms.
Translation: 可以從大氣中搜集水分，如果位置過於靠近其它蒐集站，產量會降低。在沙塵暴期間沒有產能。

Text: Generates Power. While closed the generator is protected from dust, but produces less power.
Translation: 可以產生電力。收起時雖然可以防塵，但產生的電力也會降低。

Text: Produces Polymers from Water and Fuel.
Translation: 可使用水資源與燃料製造聚合物。

Text: Extracts Water from underground deposits. All extractors contaminate nearby buildings with dust.
Translation: 可以從地下資源點中挖掘水資源。所有的挖掘站都會對周圍建築造成塵土汙染。

Text: Extracts Metals from underground deposits. All extractors contaminate nearby buildings with dust.
Translation: 可以從地下資源點中挖掘金屬資源。所有的挖掘站都會對周圍建築造成塵土汙染。

Text: Extracts sulfurous rich regolith from Concrete deposits and produces Concrete. All extractors contaminate nearby buildings with dust.
Translation: 從混凝土資源點中挖掘富含硫磺的風化層，生產混凝土。所有的挖掘站都會對周圍建築造成塵土汙染。

Text: Extracts Rare Metals from underground deposits. All extractors contaminate nearby buildings with dust.
Translation: 可以從地下資源點中挖掘稀有金屬資源。所有的挖掘站都會對周圍建築造成塵土汙染。

Text: Provides living space for Colonists. Cramped quarters grant less Comfort during rest.
Translation: 可為殖民地居民們提供生活空間。由於房間擁擠，能提供的舒適度也較低。

Text: Provides living space. Resting residents recover Comfort faster compared to other Residences.
Translation: 可以提供生活空間。與其它住宅相比，公寓可以讓居民們以更快的速度恢復舒適度。

Text: Provides living space for numerous Colonists, granting high Comfort.
Translation: 可以為數量眾多居民提供生活空間，讓他們獲得較高的舒適度。

Text: A beautiful park complex. Increases the Comfort of all Residences in the Dome.
Translation: 美麗的複合式公園，可增加所有穹頂居民的舒適度。

Text: Recycles up to 70% of the Water used in the Dome.
Creates Clones over time. Cloned Colonists grow and age twice as fast.
Translation: 可不斷製造複製人，複製人的生長與衰老速度是正常人的兩倍。

Text: Increases the overall Research output of the Dome.
Translation: 增加穹頂的整體研究點數產出。

Text: Visitors will recover Health and Sanity as long as they are not starving, dehydrated, freezing or suffocating. Larger capacity and more effective than the Infirmary. A Dome with a Medical Building has lower minimum Comfort requirement for births.
Translation: 訪客在未處於飢餓、脫水、受凍或呼吸困難的情況下，會回覆生命值與理智度。空間更大的醫療中心，比醫務室效率更高。擁有醫療建築的穹頂，會降低居民生育時所需要的舒適度需求。

Text: Treats Colonists for flaws through advanced and (mostly) humane medical practices.
Translation: 用先進的（大部分很人道）醫療手段來治療殖民地居民的缺陷。
Old Text: Treats Colonists for flaws through advanced and (mostly humane) medical practices.
Old Translation: 用先進的（大部分很人道）醫療手段來治療殖民地居民的缺陷。

Text: Generates Power during daytime. Closes during Dust Storms. Protected from dust while turned off.
Translation: 可以在白天時產生電力。在沙塵暴期間關閉。關閉時可以防塵。
Old Text: Generates Power during daytime. Its effectiveness is decreased by dust accumulation and during Dust Storms. Protected from dust while turned off.
Old Translation: 可以在白天時產生電力。太陽能板的工作效率會由於塵土覆蓋或沙塵暴來襲而降低，關閉時可以防塵。

Text: Generates significant amounts of Power but requires Workers from a nearby Dome.
Translation: 生產大量能源，但需要來自附近穹頂的工人。

Text: Stores Power. High capacity and max output, but charges slowly.
Translation: 可以儲存電力。擁有高容量與最高產能，但充電速度慢。

Text: Stores Power. Amount of Power supplied is limited by the battery’s max output.
Translation: 可以儲存電力，供電量會受電池最大產能限制。

Text: Produces Oxygen. No production during Dust Storms.
Translation: 可以生產氧氣，在沙塵暴期間沒有產能。

Text: Stores Water. Doesn't work during Cold Waves.
Translation: 可以儲存水資源，寒流來襲時不起作用。

Text: Can store a large amount of Water. Doesn't work during Cold Waves.
Translation: 可以儲存大量水資源。寒流來襲時不起作用。

Text: Produces Drones Prefabs which can then be used to order new drones in Drone Hubs multiplying the obedient workforce of the Colony. Probably not a threat to humans.
Translation: 生產無人機預製件，之後可用於在無人機中心製作新的無人機，增加殖民地的勞動力。大概不會對人類造成威脅吧。

Text: Produces Food. Consumes Water depending on crop type.
Translation: 可以生產食物，消耗的水量視作物種類而定。

Text: Slowly turns waste rock into building materials. Produces Concrete.
Translation: 慢慢將礦渣變為建築材料。生產混凝土

Text: Provides living space for Tourists and Colonists. Luxurious hotel rooms that provide the best holiday experience. Tourists gain Satisfaction while staying here.
Translation: 可為遊客和殖民地居民們提供生活空間。豪華的旅館房間可讓賓客獲得最佳的度假體驗。遊客在旅館期間可獲得滿意度。
Old Text: Provides living space for Tourists and Colonists. Luxurious hotel rooms that provide the best holiday experience. Tourists gain Satisfaction while staying here.
Old Translation: 可為遊客和殖民地居民們提供生活空間。豪華的旅館房間可讓賓客獲得最佳的度假體驗。遊客在旅館期間可獲得滿意度。

Text: Trains Specialists using modern remote learning techniques. Graduation speed depends on the individual student performance.
Translation: 使用新式遠端培訓技術，訓練專業技術人員。畢業速度取決於每位學生的工作效率。
Old Text: Trains Specialists using modern remote learning techniques.
Old Translation: 使用新式遠端培訓技術，訓練專業技術人員。

Text: Cultivates Perks in Children through special nurturing programs.
Translation: 經過特殊的培育計劃建成的遊樂場，可以培養兒童的特長。

Text: Generates Research faster than a Research Lab.
Translation: 產出研究點數，比普通的研究實驗室速度更快。

Text: Provides a very comfortable living space for Colonists. Residents will recover additional Sanity when resting.
Translation: 可為殖民地居民提供非常舒適的生活空間，居民在休息時會恢復額外的理智度。

Text: A vocation building dedicated to creation of works of art. Workers receive Comfort and Morale boost and count towards the Workshop milestone. Consumes Polymers.
Translation: 致力於創造藝術的職業性建築。工人的舒適度和士氣會得到提高，工作結果會計入工坊里程碑中。需要消耗聚合物。

Old Translation: 藝術工坊

Text: A vocation building dedicated to the creation of Biorobots. Workers receive Comfort and Morale boost and count towards the Workshop milestone. Consumes Machine Parts.
Translation: 致力於建立生化人的職業性建築。工人的舒適度和士氣會得到提高，工作結果會計入工坊里程碑中。需要消耗機械零件。

Text: A place of luxurious entertainment and questionable morals, helping to bring out the best of humanity.
Translation: 充滿奢華娛樂與道德深思的地方，可以激發出人性的光輝。

Text: Serves the finest dishes on Mars. Now featuring non-plastic tableware.
Translation: 這裡提供火星上最好的餐點，目前主打非塑料餐具。

Text: Provides thrills and opportunities to socialize for all Colonists. Tourists gain Satisfaction from visits.
Translation: 為所有殖民地居民提供娛樂和社交的機會。遊客造訪遊樂園獲得滿意度。
Old Text: Provides thrills and opportunities to socialize for all Colonists. Tourists gain Satisfaction from visits.
Old Translation: 為所有殖民地居民提供娛樂和社交的機會。遊客造訪遊樂園獲得滿意度。

Text: Visitors recover a small amount of Health and may become Fit.
Translation: 訪客可以恢復少量生命值，並可能獲得健壯效果。

Text: Buy the latest and greatest gadgets Mars has to offer! Consumes Electronics on each visit.
Translation: 來這裡購買火星上最熱門、最好用的小工具吧！每次訪問時會消耗電子元件。

Old Text: Art Workshop
Old Translation: 藝術工坊

Text: A vocation building dedicated to the creation of virtual worlds. Workers receive Comfort and Morale boost and count towards the Workshop milestone. Consumes Electronics.
Translation: 致力於建立虛擬世界的職業性建築。工人的舒適度和士氣會得到提高，工作結果會計入工坊里程碑中。需要消耗電子元件。

Text: A large pond with refreshingly cool water.
Translation: 裝滿清涼池水的大池塘。
Old Text: A large lake with refreshingly cool water.
Old Translation: 裝滿清涼湖水的大湖。

Text: Make the Martian night a little brighter.
Translation: 可以讓火星的夜晚變得略微更加明亮。

Text: A beautiful park with alleys and benches.
Translation: 設有小徑與長椅的美麗公園。

Text: A place for relaxation and recreation.
Translation: 可以讓人放鬆和娛樂的地方。

Text: "In honor of the Founders of Mars."
A tastefully arranged stone garden, following strict Zen rules.
Translation: 高雅的亂石花園，花園佈置遵循著嚴格的禪規。
擁有4座住滿居民的複合式住宅
Old Text: Have 4 fully occupied Living Quarters
Old Translation: 擁有4個已完全住滿人的生活區

Translation: 擁有5名火星出生的殖民地居民

Text: Have a Dome with population 100 and no homeless citizens
Translation: 擁有一個容納100人口的穹頂，沒有無家可歸的居民

Text: Produce 5 Polymers, 5 Machine Parts and 5 Electronics on Mars
Translation: 在火星上生產5單位聚合物，5單位機器零件和5單位電子零件

Text: Research 25 technologies (repeatable technologies are counted once)
Translation: 研究25種科技（重複科技只算一次）

Text: Have a colony with at least 50 Colonists with average Comfort 80
Translation: 殖民地至少有50名殖民地居民，平均舒適度為80

Text: Have 4 Fusion Reactors fully staffed and on 3 shifts
Translation: 擁有4個核融合反應堆，人員齊整，三班制
獲得總計$35,000 M的財政利潤

Text: Have a VR Workshop, Art Workshop and Biorobotics Workshop
Translation: 擁有VR工作室、藝術工作室和生物機器人工作室

Text: Have 5 Domes, each with population of 200 Colonists or more
Translation: 擁有5個穹頂，每個穹頂不少於200名殖民地居民

Text: Have a fully upgraded Mohole Mine
Translation: 擁有全面升級的莫霍礦井

Text: Research 100 Technologies (repeatable technologies are counted once)
Translation: 研究100種科技（重複科技只算一次）

Text: Checks if there is a <Grid> grid fragment which can be broken
Translation: 檢查是否有可破壞的<Grid>供應網碎片
過去<Sols>太陽日裡死亡人數<NegText><ReasonsText><= <Count>

Text: Colonist does not have a workplace
Rocket is not a Supply Pod
Pick a rocket which is not <Status>

Translation: 使相關探險隊火箭推遲<Time>
以<DeathReasonText>為理由擊殺殖民地居民

Text: Malfunction rocket and require <Amount> <Resource> to be able to launch
Translation: 火箭故障，需要<Amount><Resource>才能發射
使殖民地居民擁有或失去<Status>

Old Text: Blue Sun
Old Translation: 蒼日

Text: - 2,000 M additional starting funding - Buildings require upkeep less often - Bonus Tech: Mars Nouveau (building costs in Metals & Concrete are reduced by 20%)
Translation: - 2,000M額外起始資金 - 建築需要較少的維護 - 加成技術：新火星（金屬與混凝土建造成本降低20%）

Text: - Drones are gradually optimized to work and construct faster until Sol 100 - Bonus Tech: Autonomous Hubs (Drone Hubs no longer require Power or maintenance)
Translation: - 在第100個太陽日之前，無人機的工作能力與建築速度都會不斷提高 - 加成技術：自動化控制中心 （無人機中心不再需要電力與維護）

Text: - Fuel production increased by 25% - Bonus Tech: Arcology (unlocks a residential spire)
Translation: - 燃料生產速度提高25% - 加成技術：生態建築學 （解鎖用於居住的尖塔）

Text: - Start with a Water deposit revealed - Domes consume 25% less Water - Bonus Tech: Water Reclamation (unlocks a spire which reduces Water consumption)
Translation: - 遊戲開始時，就有一處已發現的水資源點 - 穹頂耗水量降低25% - 加成技術：水資源回收（解鎖尖塔，可降低水資源消耗量）

Text: - Minimum Comfort required for birth lowered by 15 - Bonus Tech: Stem Reconstruction (colonist lifespan is increased)
Translation: - 生育時的舒適度需求降低 15 點 - 加成技術：人體軀幹重建（殖民地居民壽命變得更長）

Text: - Colonists recover 5 additional Sanity while resting in their homes - Bonus Tech: Behavioral Shaping (unlocks a Sanatorium spire which treats colonists' flaws)
Translation: - 殖民地居民在家休息時，額外恢復 5 點理智 - 加成技術：行為塑造 （解鎖療養院尖塔，可治療殖民地居民的缺陷）

Text: - All Funding gains are increased by - Bonus Tech: Martian Patents (repeatable tech that grants Funding)
Translation: - 所有資金收益增加 - 加成技術：火星專利 （此技術可以增加資金，可以多次研發）

Text: - Breakthrough techs are researched faster - Bonus Tech: Autonomous Sensors (Sensor Towers no longer require Power or maintenance)
Translation: - 突破性技術研發速度增加 - 加成技術：自主探測器 （感應塔不再需要電力與維護）

Text: - Service Comfort of decorations increased by 10 - Bonus Tech: Hanging Gardens (unlocks a spire which improves residences in the Dome)
Translation: - 設施裝飾提供的舒適度增加 10 點 - 加成技術：空中花園 （解鎖尖塔，可改善穹頂住宅的舒適程度）

Text: - Start with a Rare Metal deposit revealed - Extractor production increased by 10% - Bonus Tech: Deep Scanning (allows the scanning of sectors for deep deposits)
Translation: - 遊戲開始時，就有一處已發現的稀有金屬資源點 - 挖掘站產量提高10% - 加成技術：深層掃描 （感測器可以掃描深層地下資源點）

Text: - Start with an extra Rocket - Bonus Tech: CO2 Jet Propulsion (unlocks Shuttle Hub and long-range transportation)
Translation: - 遊戲開始時，擁有一個額外的火箭 - 加成技術：二氧化碳噴射推進系統 （解鎖穿梭機服務站與遠距離運輸）

Text: Rice engineered on Ganymede. Grows very fast and has high yield.
Translation: 在木衛三上進行過改良的水稻品種。生長非常快，產量也非常高。

Text: Great yield but grows slowly and requires more Water
Translation: 產量非常高，但成長緩慢，且需要較多水資源

Text: Low yield and slow growth, but require less Water
Translation: 產量較低且成長緩慢，但需要的水資源較少

Text: Good yield and grows slowly but requires less Water
Translation: 產量高，成長緩慢，但需要的水資源較少

Text: Low yield but grows very fast
Very low yield but produces Oxygen
Translation: 產量非常低，但會產生氧氣

Text: Average yield but grows very fast and produces Oxygen
Translation: 產量平均，但是成長非常快，還能產生氧氣

Text: Average yield but grows fast and requires less Water
Translation: 產量平均，但生長很快，且需要的水較少

Text: Low yield but grows fast and requires less Water
Translation: 產量低，但成長很快，且需要的水資源較少

Text: Great yield but grows slowly and depletes the soil, reducing the yield of the next crop
Translation: 產量非常高，但生長緩慢，而且會劣化土質，降低下個作物的產量

Text: Extract the cure for the Wildfire Infection from these potatoes.
Translation: 這種馬鈴薯含有可治療野火感染的成分，可以用來開採藥劑。

Text: Good yield and grows very slowly but improves the soil, increasing the yield of the next crop
Translation: 產量非常高，生長緩慢，但可以改良土壤，增加下個作物的產量

Text: Good yield but grows slowly and depletes the soil, causing reduced yield of the next crop
Translation: 產量非常高，但成長緩慢，而且會劣化土質，降低下個作物的產量

Text: Very low yield but increases soil quality significantly, improving the yield of the next crop
Translation: 產量非常低，但會顯著改善土壤品質，提高下個作物的產量

Text: Low yield and grows slowly but improves the soil, increasing the yield of the next crop
Translation: 產量低，且成長緩慢，但會改良土壤，增加下一個作物的產量

Text: The Martian Colony is made up of a variety of buildings which provide power, life-support, comfort, protection from the weather, information, resources and a lot more - all things without which humans cannot exist on the red planet. Buildings are built by using Martian resources while some can be brought from Earth as prefab buildings. All buildings, however, require a resource upkeep for maintenance. A construction site must be within the Service Area of Drones (relative to their control hubs) in order to receive the resources needed and then erected. Some buildings require Power to operate, other are staffed by Colonists living nearby. The Performance of any building indicates how effectively the building is performing its primary function. It depends on many factors such as researched technologies, upgrades and the current individual performance of the specific colonists working in the building. Qualified specialists and workers with high Morale will increase the performance of a building, while empty work slots, Renegades and workers with low Morale or other issues will be detrimental. Buildings can be set to operate in three Work Shifts - first, second and night. Turning off some Work Shifts will conserve power and workforce.
Translation: 火星殖民地由各式各樣的建築物組成，它們可以提供電力、維生、舒適、保護、資訊、資源等一系列保障。若少了這些保障，人類就無法在火星上生存。 建築物可以透過火星上的資源進行建造，部分建築也可以以預製建築的形式，從地球直接購買。不過，所有建築物都需要資源進行維護。 建築工地必須位於無人機的服務區域內（與其控制中心相關），以便進行資源運輸與建造的工作。 部分建築物僅需要電力即可運作，而其它建築則需要居住於附近的居民進行操作。 所有建築物都有工作效率屬性，代表它目前的工效高低。工作效率的高低取決於多個因素，包括：已研究的技術，已進行的升級，以及目前建築物內工人的個體能力。出色的專家與士氣高昂的工人可以提高建築物的工作效率，而空崗位、叛徒、士氣低落或有缺陷的工人會降低工作效率。 建築物可設定三個工作班次進行運作，即：早班、中班與夜班。取消部分工作班次可以節省電力與勞動力消耗。

Text:
Mars is a harsh environment and human life is only made possible due to incredibly durable structures - designed specifically to resist it.

Every now and then, however, extremes will appear that will test the resilience of the colony on a much higher level.
Translation:
火星的環境非常惡劣，殖民地的居民們必須居住在設別設計過的耐用建築內，才能順利存活。

然而，火星上還是會不時出現極端氣候，進一步考驗殖民地的抗災能力。

Text:
Dust Devils form when hot gases near the ground rise quickly through a small pocket of cooler, low-pressure gases above it. They become a vortex of the dust and particles caught by these gases and form a visible pillar that moves and twists.

Martian Dust Devils can be up to fifty times as wide and ten times as high as dust devils on Earth, and they pose a threat to any technology within their vicinity as they tend to cover everything around them with dust.
Translation:
地面的熱氣流上升，遇到溫度氣壓較低的冷氣流時，則會形成塵捲風。氣流會攜帶大氣中的塵埃顆粒形成渦流，最終以肉眼可見的塵捲風的形式出現，四處移動。

火星上塵捲風的範圍和高度最高能達地球上的五十倍。所到之處會讓周圍的一切都蒙上一層塵土，對科技裝置而言是個威脅。

Text:
Mars is infamous for its large and sometimes quite lengthy Dust Storms which raise so much dust that they can be seen with telescopes from Earth. While the wind speeds reached during these storms are not quite dangerous, taking into consideration that Mars’s atmosphere is but 1% of Earth’s, the sheer amount of dust raised can knock field machinery out of order until fixed.

Another issue is that Mars’s fine dust particles are extremely dry and slightly electrostatic, which can cause damage to our electrical grid if a dust storm with more electrostatic properties appears.

MOXIEs and Moisture Vaporators do not function during dust storms and Solar Panels outside Domes are closed automatically.

Dust Storms suspend air traffic - all shuttles will finish their final courses and then return to their hubs until the storm passes.

Electrostatic Dust Storms are a rare occurrence. Lightning strikes during such storms can shutdown buildings for a time or drain the batteries of our drones.

The greater the risk the Dust Storm is flagged to pose in an area, the higher the chance is for an Electrostatic Dust Storm to appear. Dust storms can also be a seasonal event, happening routinely in the most high risk areas.
Translation:
火星上時常會發生規模宏大、曠日持久的沙塵暴。沙塵暴揚起的巨大沙牆，甚至在地球上都能用望遠鏡看得到。雖然火星的大氣密度只有地球的1%，即使是出現沙塵暴，風速也並不會帶來危險。但沙塵暴會揚起大量塵土，這可能會導致機械裝置停止運轉，只能等待修理。

另外，火星的細小塵埃顆粒十分乾燥且帶有輕微靜電。因此，當攜帶大量靜電粒子的沙塵暴出現時，我們的電網可能也會受到損害。

在沙塵暴期間，氧氣生成裝置和水氣蒐集站無法運作，穹頂外的太陽能板也會自動關閉。

沙塵暴也會影響空中交通，所有穿梭機都將會回到控制中心，等待塵暴平息。

偶爾還會發生電磁沙塵暴。電磁沙塵暴會產生大量閃電，雷擊會導致建築物停止運轉，還會耗盡無人機的電池。

區域內沙塵暴風險越大，出現電磁沙塵暴的機率也會越高。在高風險區域內，沙塵暴屬於季節性災害，會定期發生。

Text:
Meteors are extremely common in the solar system. Every day, small to medium sized meteors hit the Earth but most burn out quickly in the atmosphere without ever reaching the surface. Mars, on the other hand, has a very thin atmosphere and most meteors reach the surface. This is, sadly, a constant threat, and must be taken into consideration when designing our colonies. Domes can mostly withstand direct hits with manageable damage, but all buildings outside the protection of Domes are vulnerable. 

Redundancy in vital lifelines such as Water and Oxygen support is one way of risk management.
Translation:
整個太陽系中存在著大量隕石。每天都有許多顆中小型隕石擊中地球，但絕大多數隕石都在通過大氣層的時候就被燒盡了，根本不會降落在地表。但火星卻並非如此，由於大氣層非常稀薄，絕大多數隕石都會直接降落在火星地表。對火星的居民而言，隕石是時時刻刻的威脅，因此在設計殖民地時必須考慮到這一點。穹頂可以承受一定程度的破壞，隕石直接撞擊並不會對它造成太大損害，但穹頂之外所有未受保護的建築都非常脆弱。

因此，保障水與氧氣不只有一條供應線，這正是風險管理的一部分。

Text: Martian surface temperatures are freezing at best while being extremely cold most of the time. Although humans can’t withstand the Martian cold outside Domes (not without protective gear), most of our machinery is designed to function effortlessly in the cold. This, however, is subject to change when a weather event known as a Cold Wave appears. The low-density Martian atmosphere allows for rapid and dramatic temperature drops – drops so low, that all field buildings have to spend increased amounts of electrical Power to keep from succumbing to the cold. Cold Waves appear with a short warning period and also may be a seasonal event in areas of Mars flagged as being especially cold. During a Cold Wave all Water Tanks freeze solid - rendering the colony somewhat vulnerable to water shortages if more unfortunate events overlap. Out-dome buildings left without power also run the risk of freezing until the cold wave subsides or the area is heated via a Subsurface Heater. Buildings that have an inactive shift are very likely to freeze during that shift.
Translation: 火星地表溫度極低，常年寒冷刺骨。雖然人類無法承受穹頂之外的寒冷火星環境（除非佩戴了保護性裝置），不過，我們的機械能夠在低溫中不懈運轉。 但當寒流來襲的時候，就是另一回事了。火星的大氣密度很低，這會導致氣溫出現驟降。在這種極度的低溫環境下，即使建築物也必須提高電力消耗，防止被寒流凍住。 寒流會在短暫的警告之後出現。對火星上那些被標記為極度寒冷的地區來說，它很可能會是季節性現象。 寒流期間，所有水箱都會凍結。一旦殖民地同時發生了其它事故，殖民地的缺水情況將會變得非常嚴峻。 穹頂外的建築若缺少電力，也有被凍結的危險，只有當寒流減弱或透過地下加熱器供熱才能解決問題。在寒流期間，處於閒置狀態的建築極有可能被凍結。

Text: Resources are either gathered directly from Mars, or later manufactured in resource production buildings – most commonly from other resources. They keep the Colony operational by being used for life-support, construction and building upkeep. There are two types of resources; grid and non-grid. Grid resources use Pipes and Cables for distribution, while non-grid resources have to be moved around with Drones or RC Transport.
Translation: 資源可以直接從火星搜集，也可以透過採集其它資源，在資源建築內生產而得。 資源能保障殖民地的正常運作，包括生命維持、建築建造與維護等等。 所有資源分為兩種：供應網資源與非供應網資源。 供應網資源可以透過管道與電纜進行分配，而非供應網資源只能藉助無人機或遙控指揮車進行運輸。

Text:
Concrete is made by building Concrete Extractors on regolith deposits found all over the Martian surface. It is a basic building material and is used in a wide range of building types.
On Mars, water is a rare and difficult to obtain commodity. As such, turning the Martian regolith into traditional, water based concrete was deemed unpractical very early on during the planning stages. Luckily, Mars is rich in another element with which a different type of concrete can be made – sulfur. Sulfur-based, waterless concrete is literally the foundation for every aspiring Martian city. Concrete Extractors placed on spots rich in sulfur in the Martian soil, dig up the sulfur-rich regolith and store it as ready to use mix. It is later transported and heated by our Drones on construction sites, turning it into strong and enduring concrete.
Translation:
混凝土可以透過建造混凝土挖掘站，採集火星地表的岩屑沉積層進行生產。許多建築類型都會用到這種基礎土建材料。
由於水資源在火星上十分稀缺，在殖民地發展前期，想要透過傳統的工藝，將火星風化層轉變為水基混凝土是完全不切實際的做法。但幸運的是，火星上富含的另一種元素也能用來製作混凝土，那就是硫磺。 這種以硫磺為基礎製作的無水混凝土，正是火星城市的奠基石。將混凝土挖掘站建造在富含硫磺的火星土壤上，即可挖掘風化層，進行儲存、攪拌。隨後施工地的無人機會負責對其進行運輸和加熱，將其轉變為牢固的混凝土。

Text:
Power is generated from several power generation facilities and is then delivered throughout the colony via power cables or between adjacent buildings. Excessive power can be stored in batteries for emergency situations.
Electrical power on Mars comes mostly from renewable and cheap sources such as wind power (Wind Turbine) and sunlight (Solar Panel), but also from fission (Stirling Generator) and fusion based sources (Fusion Reactor) as the technology available advances. It is then distributed via an extensive and durable cable network. Power Switches can be used to dynamically manage the flow of power in case of damaged cables or low power situations.
Translation:
電力可透過多種發電裝置產生，之後會透過電纜傳輸到整個殖民地中，或在相鄰的建築物之間傳輸。過剩的電力會儲存在電池中，以備不時之需。
火星上的電力通常來自可再生的廉價資源，比如風力（風力發電機）和太陽能（太陽能板）。不過隨著科技的進步，包括核分裂（斯特靈發電機）和核融合（核融合反應爐）在內的新能源也將不斷誕生。之後，產生的電力會透過耐用的電網系統，傳輸至殖民地中。 電力開關可用來對電力運輸進行管理，以防出現電纜受損或電能不足的情況。

Text:
Electronics are manufactured in Electronics Factories from Rare Metals and are mainly used for vehicle operating buildings, like Drone Hubs and Shuttle Hubs.
Technology and electronics go hand in hand on Mars the same way as they have, and will continue to for centuries to come, on Earth.
Translation:
電子零件是在電子零件工廠中以稀有金屬為原料製造而成。主要用在載具相關建築方面，包括無人機中心與穿梭機中心等。
火星上的生活總是與科技和電子元件息息相關。這一點與地球上幾乎沒有任何區別，在接下來的幾百年內也不會有什麼變化。

Text:
Food is grown on Farms and Hydroponic Farms, which are placed inside Domes, and also Fungal Farms which are placed outside of Domes. Farms and Hydroponic Farms can grow different crops with different cycle patterns. Furthermore some crops, like Algae, also generate oxygen for the Dome they are grown in.
Making the Martian soil fit for farming, even within the protection of Domes, takes heavy alterations. First, toxin removers are applied to rid the Martian regolith of toxic substances like perchlorates. Then, the use of chemical decompressors to break down common Martian compounds and make nutrients out of them is employed. And finally, specifically designed bacteria to further modify all nutrients made into a more plant-use friendly form, is introduced. Growing food on Mars greatly decreases costs and dependency on Earth.
Translation:
食物是在穹頂內的農場與水耕農場中種植而成。另外，穹頂外的真菌農場也能生產食物。 農場和水耕農場會種植不同的作物。此外，包括藻類在內的部分作物還能為穹頂提供氧氣。
即使在穹頂的保護下，將火星土壤改造成適合農耕的環境，也仍然是個大刀闊斧的工程。首先，得用祛毒機消除火星風化層中的有毒物質，如高氯酸鹽等。其次，使用化學減壓器將火星上常見的化合物進行分解，從而製造出植物生長需要的養分。最後，使用量身定製的細菌對所有養分進行進一步的改造，使土壤變得更加適合植物生長。 在火星上種植食物，可以大幅降低食物成本，減輕對地球的依賴性。

Text:
Fuel is synthesized in Fuel Refineries and is used to for refueling Rockets bound for Earth, for keeping Shuttle Hubs operational and for polymer production.
Using the CO2 from the Martian atmosphere and hydrogen (from water) we can produce fuel to fly our rockets back to Earth. The process uses a series of relatively simple chemical reactions to produce methane and oxygen which are used as propellant for both our rockets and shuttles.
Translation:
燃料由燃料精煉廠生產。燃料用途廣泛，例如，可以為飛往地球的火箭補充燃料，維持穿梭機管理中心的正常運轉，還可以用來製造聚合物。
透過利用火星大氣中的二氧化碳和氫（由水電解而成）可以生產燃料，可以製造火箭飛回地球所需要的燃料。在這個過程中，經過一系列較為簡單的化學反應後，即可產出甲烷和氧氣，可用作火箭和穿梭機的推進劑。

Text:
Machine Parts are manufactured in Machine Parts Factories from Metal and are mainly used in both the construction and maintaining of the sophisticated resource Extractors on Mars.
Back on Earth, we humans are dependent on machines to sustain our advanced way of life; to power our industries and make possible our vast transportation systems. Here on Mars machines are also tasked with making life possible to begin with, on top of potentially maintaining all of their previous obligations. Smart design processes and accepted standards have made possible the stockpiling of Machine Parts that could be used in an array of instruments upon demand. Machine Parts could be delivered from Earth to meet the needs of any fledgling colony. But a hefty and reliable supply, one obtained only by having them manufactured on site, will be the foundation to bringing our Earthly way of life to the Martian dream city.
Translation:
機械零件是在機械零件工廠中以金屬為原料製造而成，對土建工作和各種資源挖掘站的維護而言不可或缺。
在地球上，我們人類憑藉各式各樣的機械來支撐高度發達的生活。無論是各種輕工業重工業，還是龐大的交通運輸系統，都離不開機械。而在火星，除了上述內容之外，這些機器還承擔著維護生命環境的重擔。 透過精妙的機械設計與標準化的製造流程，人們可以大量囤積通用性強、具有高互換性的機械零件，可以把它們用在各式各樣的機械裝置上。對新生殖民地而言，不斷地從地球運送機械零件也能滿足需求。但若想獲得可靠有保障的物資來源，就只能在火星上直接生產這些零件。只有這樣，人類在火星上的夢想之城才得以重現地球上的生活。

Text:
Metal is readily found on the Martian surface, deposited from ancient tectonic activity and meteor blasts. Further deposits can be found beneath the surface (by either Orbital Probes or Sensor Towers) which can be then mined with Metal Extractors. Metal is a basic building material and is used in a wide range of buildings. It is also used for manufacturing Machine Parts.
Since very early in human history, metals play a vital role in the art of creation. From simple copper tools and nails, to iron decorations to entire structures made out of steel. It would seem their role is not exhausted only on Earth, but will continue to serve as an accessible and vital resource for all our needs on Mars as well.
Translation:
由於遠古地質活動與隕石不斷撞擊，金屬暴露在火星地表上，隨處可見。可以透過軌道探測器或感應塔找到埋藏在地表下的金屬，之後便可以使用金屬挖掘站進行開採。 許多類型的建築都會用到金屬這種基礎土建材料。另外，它也是生產機械零件必不可少的原料。
從人類文明初期開始，金屬就在藝術創作中擔當著重要的角色。從最古老的粗製銅具和簡單的銅釘，到鐵製的手工藝品，再到全部由鋼鐵構成的鋼結構。看起來，它們不僅在地球上作用非凡，即便是到了火星之後，這種重要的資源也滲透到了日常生活的方方面面。

Text:
Oxygen is essential for humans to linger and call Mars their home. It can be produced using the sophisticated MOXIE buildings, and later on naturally generated from crops.
Oxygen is the most short term life support resource. If colonists are left without oxygen they will die extremely fast. And while Mars’s atmosphere has little to no Oxygen, what it does provide is an abundance of Carbon Dioxide, which our brilliant MOXIE technology can convert to the much needed Oxygen. Like water, it is supplied and distributed via pipes networks, in fact, sharing the same pipes used for water distribution.
Translation:
氧氣 是人類在火星生存發展必不可少的資源。在遊戲前期，氧氣可透過氧氣生成裝置進行採集，遊戲後期可以透過作物自然產生。
氧氣是最重要的短期生存資源。在缺乏氧氣的情況下，殖民地居民會迅速死亡。儘管火星的大氣中幾乎沒有氧氣，但卻富含二氧化碳。精巧的氧氣生成裝置可以將二氧化碳轉化為人類生存需要的氧氣。 與水資源相同，氧氣也是透過管道網路進行供給運輸。確切地說，它與水資源共用一條供給管道。

Text:
Polymers can be naturally obtained from obsidian scattered on the Martian surface and, once colonists have settled, can also be synthesized in Polymer Factories. It is mainly used for the construction of power accumulators, Domes and Spires.
Some of the most important and widely used materials on Earth are made from polymers. While the dependency on such materials on Mars is artificially circumvented as much as possible due to the scarcity of the molecule (unlike Earth, Mars has no fossil fuel reserves to act as a polymer source), their importance cannot be avoided all together. Plastics, rubbers and more advanced insulation have a fundamental role to play in creating and maintaining pressure differentials between habitats and external areas.
Translation:
聚合物可透過蒐集火星地表散落的黑曜石獲取，也可以在殖民地進展順利之後，透過聚合物工廠合成生產。聚合物主要用於蓄電池、穹頂與尖塔的建造。
在地球上，部分極為重要且用途廣泛的材料也都是由聚合物製成的。由於原材料稀缺（與地球不同，火星上並沒有礦物燃料充當聚合物來源），火星建築上會盡量避免依賴這種材料，但這種材料依然會起到非常重要的作用。例如塑料、橡膠以及更加高階的絕緣物，在維持居住地與外部環境的氣壓差方面，起著至關重要的作用。

Text:
Rare metals are found only in underground deposit sites and need Rare Metal Extractors to mine them. They are mostly used for manufacturing electronics and for exporting back to Earth.
After millennia of acting as a status symbol, in modern times rare metals are widely used in electronics and for medical procedures. Still, although one of the vital elements of the Information, and subsequently the Space Ages, precious metals still retain their monetary role.
Translation:
稀有金屬只能在地下資源點中找到，需要稀有金屬挖掘站進行開採。稀有金屬主要用來製造電子元件，也可以出口到地球上。
幾千年來，稀有金屬一直都是身份的象徵。而到了近代，它被越來越廣泛地應用在電子元件和醫療裝置上。儘管到了資訊時代與太空時代，稀有金屬具有非常重要的應用價值，然而作為貴重金屬，它依然保留著它的貨幣價值。

Text:
Water on Mars can processed with Moisture Vaporators or harvested from subsurface permafrost deposits via Water Extractors. It is distributed via a pipe network, which it shares with the distribution of Oxygen. Apart from being essential for supporting life inside Domes and field buildings that have human operators, water is used for the synthesizing process of polymers and rocket fuel.
The most important ingredient for life as we know it to exist is by no means scarce on Mars. However, it is mostly frozen and underground, making it difficult for acquiring. As bringing the water needed to sustain a city on Mars back from Earth will be a huge burden on every craft and far from efficient, constructing a steady water supply solely by harnessing water ice found on Mars is absolutely essential for the survival of any colony.
Translation:
水資源可以透過水氣蒐集站進行蒐集，或透過水資源挖掘站對地下的凍土資源採集而得。水資源與氧氣共用同樣的管道網路進行配給。 無論是對居住用的穹頂而言，還是對需要人類進行操作的功能建築而言，水資源都必不可少。另外，在聚合物的合成工序與火箭燃料中，水資源也是重要的組成部分。
這種資源對生命至關重要。事實上，火星上並不匱乏水資源，但大多數水資源都以固態形式埋藏在地下，獲取十分困難。如果靠使用火箭將水資源從地球運往火星，這種做法會對火箭造成巨大負擔，且效率低下。因此，殖民地需要藉助火星上發現的固態水，建立穩定的水資源供給體系。這對每個殖民地來說都至關重要。

Text: Conditions on Mars are utterly hostile for humans to roam and work freely outside of Domes. This is why heavy-duty vehicles have been designed to tackle the tasks that humans can't. Vehicles are either remote-controlled Rovers or semi-autonomous Drones and Shuttles.
Translation: 對於人類的生活與工作而言，穹頂之外的火星環境非常惡劣。因此人類需要重型車輛，負責解決人類無法不能自行完成的任務。 載具包括遠端遙控的探測車，以及半自動化的無人機與穿梭機。

Text:
Rockets are used to deliver supplies all the way from Earth, or bring colonists which have applied for a life on Mars.

They are re-usable, and once having refueled on Mars, can bring Rare Metals back to Earth for monetary gains.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

Space rockets have far a greater role to play in the mission of establishing a permanent colony on Mars, than merely bringing the first colonists there. Until the colony can truly sustain itself, it will always be dependent on Earth for vital resources and the flow of colonists.

Although quite expensive, re-usable rocket technology has already been mastered to a degree that can have a rocket back in space within the same day of landing on either world.
Translation:
您還可以使用火箭，將補給物資或申請移民火星的居民從地球上運往火星。

火箭可以重複使用。只要在火星上加滿油之後，就可以把稀有金屬帶回地球，讓您獲得財政收益。

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000><left>

太空火箭不僅能把第一批居民帶到您的火星殖民地，在火星殖民地發展建設方面，也扮演著重要的角色。在殖民地可以真正實現自給自足之前，您還是要依靠來自地球的資源和流動居民。

儘管可重複利用的火箭耗資高昂，但它的技術非常成熟，可以在一天之內就往返於兩個星球之間。

Text:
Drones are the backbone of the Martian colony’s work force. They are tasked with distributing resources, gathering resources from surface deposits, building and maintaining structures as well as repairing damaged structures and vehicles. Although mostly autonomous, drones operate within the service range of whatever control hub they are assigned to, such as Drone Hubs, Rockets or RC Commanders. Drones run on batteries and need to charge up frequently. They may do so only at RC Commander and Charging Stations which in turn can be built individually or are found attached to Drone Hubs.
All the heavy lifting and most of the field tasks are left to Drones. Drones are powerful, semi-autonomous utility vehicles which are equipped with state of the art instruments – fit for a wide range of manual labor. Built to be resilient against most of what the Martian environment can throw at them, the arch-enemy of all man-made technology on Mars, dust, will eventually incapacitate drones if not cleaned regularly.
Translation:
無人機是火星殖民地中的主力勞動力。它們負責分配資源，從地表礦藏搜集資源。它們不僅能建造建築、維護建築，還能用來修復受損的建築和車輛。 雖然大部分無人機都是自動運作，不過您也可以對無人機進行操作，只要無人機處於可以在控制中心的服務範圍內即可，例如無人機中心、火箭與遙控指揮車。 無人機依靠電池執行，而且需要頻繁充電。它們只能在遙控指揮車與充電站處進行充電。充電站既可以單獨建造，也可以連接至無人機中心處。
所有繁重的任務與野外探索工作都會由無人機完成。這種半自動化的多功能載具配備最先進的儀器，功能非常強大，足以應對火星上的絕大多數情況。 儘管無人機足以應對絕大多數情況，但如果不定期對其進行清洗的話，它將會受到所有機械裝置的天敵 - 塵土的侵蝕，最終導致無法工作。

Text:
RC Commanders are remote-controlled vehicles which can transport and deploy Drones to remote areas if needed. They can also repair any damage that the Drones have sustained.
The apex of human transport technology, Rovers are incredibly durable, making them resistant to most of the Martian calamities such as cold or dust. They may traverse the Colony site and reach distant spots, limited only by the topography, to tackle whatever they have been tasked with.
Translation:
遙控指揮車是遠端控制型載具，可以在必要時將無人機運送並部署到偏遠地區。它們還可以修復無人機受到的損害。
作為人類尖端運輸技術的產物，探測車構造非常結實，從而使它們能夠抵抗火星上的大部分自然災害，包括塵土與寒冷等等。它們可以穿過殖民地去到遙遠的地方，執行各式各樣的任務，只會受到地形方面的限制。

Text:
RC Transports are remote controlled vehicles which are tasked with the transportation of cargo, mostly from or to places outside of drone operating ranges. Furthermore, RC Transports may set up permanent transport routes, maintaining the flow of resources from one place to another. Transport rovers can also extract resource from surface deposit (Metals and Polymers) allowing extraction and transportation of far away deposit sites.
The apex of human transport technology, Rovers are incredibly durable, making them resistant to most of the Martian calamities such as cold or dust. They may traverse the colony site and reach distant spots, limited only by the topography, to tackle whatever they have been tasked with.
Translation:
遙控運輸車是遠端控制型載具，主要負責在無人機操作範圍以外的地方運輸貨物。此外，遙控運輸車可以設定永久運輸路線，維持資源從一個位置流向另一個位置。 運輸探測車也可以從允許由較遠資源點開採和運輸的地表資源點開採資源（金屬和聚合物）。
作為人類尖端運輸技術的產物，探測車構造非常結實，從而使它們能夠抵抗火星上的大部分自然災害，包括塵土與寒冷等等。它們可以穿過殖民地去到遙遠的地方，執行各式各樣的任務，只會受到地形方面的限制。

Text:
RC Explorers carry with them advanced examination and research apparatus, making them the perfect vehicle to analyze any anomalous reading from anywhere in the region. As all Rovers, they are remotely controlled and can reach far-out locations if the terrain permits it.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

The apex of human transport technology, Rovers are incredibly durable, making them resistant to most of the Martian calamities such as cold or dust. They may traverse the Colony site and reach distant spots, limited only by the topography, to tackle whatever they have been tasked with.
Translation:
遙控探索者上搭載著先進的檢查研究裝置，非常適合用來分析目標地區的異象情況。和所有的探測車一樣，遙控探索者也是遠端遙控。只要地形允許，它們就可以到達很遠的地方。

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

作為人類尖端運輸技術的產物，探測車構造非常結實，從而使它們能夠抵抗火星上的大部分自然災害，包括塵土與寒冷等等。它們可以穿過殖民地去到遙遠的地方，執行各式各樣的任務，只會受到地形方面的限制。

Text:
Shuttles are a safe and rapid transportation method for Colonists between distant Domes and can also deliver resources reliably wherever needed – distance being irrelevant. When not in use, they are stationed at Shuttle Hubs, where they are maintained and refueled.
Shuttles are optimized to traverse the low-density and low-pressure atmosphere of Mars. Their groundbreaking drives can take off vertically from anywhere, without the need of a runway or a landing platform of any sort.
Translation:
對殖民地居民而言，想要在穹頂之間往返，穿梭機無疑是既安全、又快捷的交通方式。而且無論距離長短，穿梭機都可以可靠地運輸資源。閒置時，穿梭機會停駐在穿梭機中心進行維護與加油。
穿梭機的結構進行過優化，非常適合在低密度、低氣壓的火星大氣中飛行。這種飛機採用了獨創的驅動設計，可以在不需要跑道或平臺的情況下，從任何位置垂直起飛。

Text:
The RC Safari is a remote-controlled vehicle that is used to take colonists with the Tourist trait on trips across the surface of Mars. Tourists gain Satisfaction from traveling past various sights. Sights are split into categories which generate a certain amount of Satisfaction each. Sceneries: Rock Formations & Vistas Hotspots: Geyser, Permanent Cold Wave Zone, Spirals, Unresearched Anomalies Domes: All domes, Spire Buildings increase the amount of satisfaction domes generate Wonders: All wonders Spectacular Buildings: Drone Assembler, Moxie, MDS Laser, Outside Ranch Seeing multiple sights of the same category decreases the Satisfaction they generate, so plan the safari routes carefully.
The Safari Rovers were created to give tourists an unforgettable experience to share with those back on Earth. The publicity generated by the droves of satisfied tourists has helped keep the Mars project relevant. Safari Rovers are fully automated, providing a wide range of amenities and thrills to anyone willing to pay the steep fare.
Translation:
遙控觀景車是一種遙控載具，它可以帶著有遊客特性的殖民地居民在火星地表旅行。遊客通過不同的景點即可獲得滿意度。景點分為幾類，每一類都會產生一定程度的滿意度。 風景：岩層和景觀 熱點：間歇泉、永久寒流區、尖塔和未探索的異象 穹頂：所有穹頂和尖塔建築增加穹頂產生的滿意度量 奇觀：所有奇觀 壯觀的建築：無人機組裝廠、氧氣生成裝置、反隕石鐳射炮和外部牧場遊客 看到多個同種類的景點會降低他們的滿意度，所以要仔細規劃遊覽路線。
觀景探測車是為了給遊客難忘的體驗，以便他們回到地球後與他人分享。滿意的遊客群產生的宣傳效應有助於維持火星項目的價值。全自動往返的觀景探測車會為那些支付高價的遊客提供各式各樣的便利和娛樂。
Old Text:
The RC Safari is a remote-controlled vehicle that is used to take colonists with the Tourist trait on trips across the surface of Mars. Tourists gain Satisfaction from traveling past various sights. Sights are split into categories which generate a certain amount of Satisfaction each. Sceneries: Rock Formations & Vistas Hotspots: Geyser, Permanent Cold Wave Zone, Spirals, Unresearched Anomalies Domes: All domes, Spire Buildings increase the amount of satisfaction domes generate Wonders: All wonders Spectacular Buildings: Drone Assembler, Moxie, MS Laser, Outside Ranch Seeing multiple sights of the same category decreases the Satisfaction they generate, so plan the safari routes carefully.
The Safari Rovers were created to give tourists an unforgettable experience to share with those back on Earth. The publicity generated by the droves of satisfied tourists has helped keep the Mars project relevant. Safari Rovers are fully automated, providing a wide range of amenities and thrills to anyone willing to pay the steep fare.
Old Translation:
遙控觀景車是一種遙控載具，它可以帶著有遊客特性的殖民地居民在火星地表旅行。遊客通過不同的景點即可獲得滿意度。景點分為幾類，每一類產生一定程度的滿意度。 風景：岩層和景觀 熱點：間歇泉、永久寒流區、尖塔和未探索的異象 穹頂：所有穹頂和尖塔建築增加穹頂產生的滿意度量 奇觀：所有奇觀 壯觀的建築：無人機組裝廠、氧氣生成裝置、反隕石鐳射炮和外部牧場 遊客看到多個同種類的景點會降低他們的滿意度，所以要仔細規劃遊覽路線。
觀景探測車是為了給遊客難忘的體驗，以便他們回到地球後與他人分享。滿意的遊客群產生的宣傳效應有助於維持火星項目的價值。全自動往返的觀景探測車會為那些支付高價的遊客提供各式各樣的便利和娛樂。

Text: Hints explain the basic mechanics of the game and will appear contextually as you play. All hints are also available in this Encyclopedia section. Hints can be turned on or off from the Gameplay menu in Options
Translation: 隨著遊戲不斷進行，遊戲的基本操作與規則會以提示的形式出現。所有提示內容都可以在“百科”部分中找到。 您可以在選項中的遊戲設定部分，選擇開啟或關閉提示內容。

Text: The core mechanics of Surviving Mars explained.
Translation: 解釋火星求生的核心機制。
Context: EncyclopediaArticle GameMechanics CATEGORY: Game Mechanics text
EncyclopediaArticle GameMechanics CATEGORY: Game Mechanics title_text
EncyclopediaArticle GameMechanics CATEGORY: Game Mechanics title_text_upper

Text: All buildings deteriorate over time. When a building's maintenance bar is filled a drone is dispatched to bring the required maintenance resource and service the building. If the resource is not supplied within a Sol the building will stop operating until the maintenance resource is delivered and the building serviced. Martian dust and disasters contribute to the deterioration of buildings outside of Domes. Extractors, Martian dust geysers, rocket landings and launches spread dust in the area around them causing increased maintenance to nearby buildings. Drones are also susceptible to dust which may result in a breakdown. Recharge Stations clean drones during the charging process.
Translation: 所有建築的狀況都會隨時間推移而老化。當某棟建築的維修條填滿時，無人機就會攜帶所需要的資源自動前往該建築，進行必要的維護工作。如果在同一太陽日，無人機沒有及時進行維護工作，則該建築將停止運作，直到必要的維護資源與維護工作結束為止。 在穹頂之外，火星上的塵土和自然災害還會使建築的狀況進一步惡化。 挖掘站運作、火星塵土間歇泉爆發、以及火箭起飛降落時，都會導致附近的建築被塵土汙染。 無人機也同樣會受到塵土影響，最終導致無法執行。充電站可以在充電過程中對無人機進行清洗。
Context: EncyclopediaArticle GameMechanics Dust and Maintenance text
EncyclopediaArticle GameMechanics Dust and Maintenance title_text

Text: Construction of Buildings is the main use of resources on Mars. If a new construction site is placed within the Service Range of a Drone control point (Drone Hub, RC Commander, or Rocket), the Drones assigned to that hub will begin stockpiling the resources needed for construction. IMPORTANT: Said resources also need to be within the Drone’s Service Range, either in Storages or in raw, surface deposit form. Resources are either gathered from deposits or are produced in Extractors, Factories or Farms. Deposits may be surface (Metal and Polymers), underground (Metal , Rare Metals, and Water) or terrain (Concrete). Surface deposits are mined directly by Drones, while underground and terrain deposits require Extractors to be built above them. Resources are stockpiled in Extractors until Drones come to take the extracted resources away where they’re needed or move them to a Depot. Extractors also generate Waste Rock and have limited space to store it. If said facilities are full, the Extractor will stop working until Drones move the Waste Rock to a Waste Rock Dump. Late game deep scanning can reveal deep underground Metals, Rare Metals and Water deposits which require specific techs before they can be extracted.
Translation: 火星資源的主要用途是用來建造建築。如果新的建造工地在無人機控制點（無人機中心、遙控指揮車或火箭）的服務範圍內，控制中心的無人機就會自動開始儲備建造所需的資源。 重要內容：無論是儲存在倉庫內的資源，還是處於地表的未加工資源，這些資源都必須放在無人機的服務範圍內。 資源既可以從礦藏中開採，也可以從挖掘站、工廠和農場中生產。 資源點既可能位於表層（如金屬和聚合物），也可能位於地下（如金屬、稀有金屬和水），或是在岩層中（如混凝土）。 位於地表的資源可以由無人機直接開採，而地下和岩層中的礦藏則需要建造挖掘站才能進行開採。所有開採的資源都會被儲存在挖掘站中。之後，無人機會將它們運走使用，或將它們儲存在倉庫裡。 另外，挖掘站還會產生礦渣，但只有有限的空間來存放礦渣。一旦挖掘站積滿礦渣，將會停止運作，直到無人機將礦渣丟棄到廢坑內為止。 到了遊戲後期，深層掃描可以發現地下深層的金屬、稀有金屬和水資源。玩家需要研究特殊技術才能對其進行開採。
Context: EncyclopediaArticle GameMechanics Resources and Construction text
EncyclopediaArticle GameMechanics Resources and Construction title_text

Text:
Anomalies appear all over the map in scanned sectors. Sending an RC Explorer to analyze them will trigger their effects. An anomaly can be one of the following sorts:

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

Event Anomaly <image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Event.tga> – These anomalies trigger events, which can be associated with Mysteries or not. 

Research Anomaly<image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Research.tga>  – These anomalies instantly generate Research Points, which then contribute to any ongoing research.

Breakthrough Anomaly <image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Breakthrough.tga>  – These anomalies reveal a tech on the Breakthrough field in the Research Screen.

Tech Anomaly <image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Tech.tga>  – These anomalies enable specific techs to be researched, no matter their place on the tech fields.
Translation:
異象會在已掃描過的區域的分區地圖上出現。您可以指派一輛遙控探索者對異象進行分析，從而啟用異象的效果。異象包括以下幾種類別：

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

事件異象 <image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Event.tga> – 這種異象會觸發事件。被觸發的事件可能會與謎團有關，但也可能無關。 

研究異象<image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Research.tga> – 這種異象會使玩家獲得研究點數，玩家可以用研究點數推進正在研究的技術。

突破異象<image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Breakthrough.tga> – 這種異象可以在研究介面中，解鎖突破性技術領域中的某項突破性技術。

技術異象<image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Tech.tga> – 這種異象可以直接解鎖技術領域中的某項技術，讓玩家進行研究，無論其前置技術是否解鎖過。

Text: Power is distributed among all buildings in the power network, which consists of Power Producers (or Power Accumulators) and all Power Consumer buildings connected via Power Cables or being adjacent to each other. Power Switches can be constructed along cables, allowing us to connect or disconnect entire sectors of the grid at will. Power cables can sustain Cable Faults (either from Meteors and Dust Devils or during Dust Storms) and will need to be repaired every now and then by Drones – provided there are Drones within reach. Cable Faults drain power from the grid. Repairing them requires Metals and may take some time. IMPORTANT: Denser power grids develop more Cable Faults.
Translation: 電力被分配給電網內的所有建築，電網由發電建築（或蓄電池）以及透過電纜相連或彼此相鄰的所有用電建築構成。 玩家可以沿著電纜建造電源開關，從而可以輕易地將電網的一部分從整個電網中斷開或恢復連線。 電纜可能會出現電纜故障（可能由隕石造成，也可能在塵捲風和沙塵暴期間發生），因此玩家需要定期對其進行修理。當破損電纜處於無人機的工作範圍內時，無人機會對其進行維修。 電纜故障會導致電網漏電，修復破損的電纜需要耗費金屬和一些時間。 重要內容：密集的電網更容易出現電纜故障。

Text: Colonists need Life Support resources in order to survive in the short term. These are Water, Oxygen and Food. Without access to any of these, a Dome will die out, with a shortage of Oxygen being the deadliest. Both Oxygen and Water are supplied to Domes via a Pipe Network which must be connected to Oxygen and Water production buildings to ensure the possibility of using Water and Oxygen Tanks to manage temporary shortages. Pipes are built by Drones and deteriorate during Dust Storms or could take damage from Meteors and Dust Devils, resulting in Pipe Leaks which drain Water and Oxygen from the system. Drones repair Pipe Leaks at the cost of Metals. If a Dome is left without power it won't provide heating to Colonists and they may die due to exposure to the intense cold of the Red Planet. Food, which can initially be brought from Earth via Rockets, can be grown later on using Farms, Hydroponic Farms, and Fungal Farms. In contrast to Water and Oxygen, Food is not a grid resource and needs to be transported with Drones.
Translation: 殖民地居民需要必要的生命資源，才能在殖民地中繼續生存。其中包括：水、氧氣和食物。一旦失去這些資源，穹頂中的居民就會漸漸死亡。其中，缺氧尤為致命。 水和氧氣都可以透過管道系統供應到穹頂，這些管道必須連接至產生水和氧氣的生產裝置建築中。此外，管道也同樣需要連接至水與氧氣的儲存容器中，以防出現臨時短缺的情況。 管道可以透過無人機建造，並且效能會在沙塵暴期間發生退化，並且會因為隕石和塵旋風而受損，導致管道洩漏，進而造成供應系統中的水和氧氣不斷洩漏。無人機需要耗費金屬才能修復管道洩漏。 如果穹頂失去電力，則將無法再為居民提供供暖，而居民們也有可能被凍死在火星寒冷的空氣中。 在遊戲前期，食物可以透過火箭從地球上進口。到遊戲中期時，可以透過農場、水耕農場和真菌農場進行生產。與水和氧氣不動，食物屬於非供應網資源，需要使用無人機進行運輸。

Text:
New technologies will unlock new buildings, upgrades, colonist perks and other benefits for the colony. Standard technologies are divided in five fields with different themes. Researching any technology will make a new technology within its field available for research. Some technologies have fixed positions in their fields, others have randomized positions. Individual technologies are researched by generating research points equal to their costs. The mission sponsor may provide a fixed amount of research point per Sol, but research buildings will be needed to discover the later, more advanced, technologies in a timely manner. Outsourcing research is another option granting a fixed amount of research for a certain period in exchange for Funding. Analyzing anomalies with an Explorer vehicle may grant research points or make new technologies available for research.
Breakthroughs are extraordinary technologies with powerful effects that are discovered only by special means. One way to unlock a breakthrough technology is to discover it in an anomaly on the surface of Mars. Different breakthrough technologies may appear in each playthrough.
Translation:
新技術會可以解鎖新的建築、升級選項、殖民地居民與特長，並為殖民地帶來額外的加成效果。所有標準技術都可以劃為五個不同的領域。當玩家完成某項技術的研究工作後，會解鎖同一領域的新技術，讓玩家可以進一步研究。部分技術在各自領域中的位置是固定的，而還有一部分技術的位置是隨機的。 透過花費相應的研究點數，玩家即可對技術進行研究。每個太陽日開始時，任務贊助者都會提供一部分研究點數。不過，玩家需要及時建造研究所需的建築，才能及時研究更加先進、更加尖端的技術。外包研究也是另一種可以選擇的辦法。玩家可以透過耗費一定量的資金，在一段時間內獲得固定的額外研究點數。 玩家可以使用探索者載具對異象進行分析，從而獲得額外的研究點數獎勵，或解鎖新技術的研究條件。
突破性技術屬於效果極為強大的技術，只能透過特殊手段進行解鎖。 玩家只能透過分析火星地表的異象，從而解鎖突破性技術。在每場遊戲中，可能都會出現不同的突破性技術。

Text: The Founders are the first human pioneers of the red frontier and the first residents of the fledgling Colony. Their initial task is to prove the potential of the Colony and the viability of a permanent settlement on Mars. After the Founders arrive on the planet, the Colony will be under evaluation for a certain number of Sols. No new Colonists will be available until the Colony is evaluated positively. A positive evaluation will be awarded if any Founders survive a certain number of Sols, or if the first child is born on the Red Planet. Since the Founders number is limited to the capacity of the rocket, you may wish to handpick them using the Review command on the passenger rocket screen. Take care to micromanage their priorities during their first days on the Red Planet, using building priority and work slot management to guarantee that the crucial buildings are staffed.
Translation: 創始者是第一批突破火星紅色大氣的人類先鋒，也是新殖民地的第一批居民。創始者最初任務是證明火星具有建造殖民地的條件，證明人類有可能實現在火星上的永久定居。 創始者到達該星球後，會在幾個太陽日內對殖民地進行評價。直到殖民地獲得正面評價之前，都不會出現新的殖民地居民。只要創始者能在火星上成功生存幾個太陽日，或火星上有第一位嬰兒出生時，殖民地都將會獲得正面評價。 由於火箭容量有限，創始者的數量也非常有限。您可能會想要透過火箭乘客螢幕上的審核功能，來手動選擇您需要的創始者。在火星殖民地最初的幾天中，要注意管理他們的優先事項。記得管理建築優先順序與工作崗位，確保所有關鍵的建築物都配備了工作人員。

Text: Every Colonist is a unique individual defined by his or her name, age category, workplace specialization, traits, and stats. Colonists will automatically staff Residences within their Dome. Take care to provide enough living space for all of them. Children and senior Colonists cannot work, but still require sustenance and residential space. The rest of the Colonists will seek jobs in and around their Domes, according to the building priority and their individual work specialization. Buildings with higher priority will be staffed first. Specialized colonists will prefer to work in buildings corresponding to their individual specializations and will have better performance at such workplaces. Traits define details about the individual Colonists. Traits that provide beneficial effects are called Perks, traits with negative effects are called Flaws. Quirks are neither positive nor negative. Rare traits define truly exceptional individuals. Every Colonist has four stats defining his or her current condition. Health represents physical fitness. Sanity represents mental wellbeing. Comfort represents the quality of the Colonist’s life on Mars. Morale represents happiness, optimism and loyalty. For details about individual stats and a more comprehensive description of their effects, refer to the Colonist’s Infopanel. Be careful - if all Colonists die, the Mars colonization mission will be terminated.
Translation: 每位殖民地居民都是一個獨特的個體，擁有各自的名字、年齡組別、崗位專長、特性與屬性。 殖民地居民們會自動在穹頂內安置住宅，請務必為他們提供足夠的生活空間。 兒童與年邁的居民無法工作，但仍然會消耗食物和居住空間。其餘居民將會根據建築物的優先順序與個人工作專長，在各自的穹頂中或周邊地區自動尋找工作。優先順序較高的建築會優先配備工作人員。 擁有專業技能的殖民地居民會更樂於在符合自己專長的建築中工作。當他們在與專長相匹配的崗位上工作時，他們的工作效率也會更加出色。 特性會決定殖民地居民特有屬性。提供加成效果的特性被稱為特長，而產生消極效果的特性被稱為 缺陷。怪癖並不會產生加成或消極效果。稀有特性為真正傑出的殖民地居民的專屬特性。 每位殖民地居民都有四項屬性，代表該居民目前的狀況。生命值代表身體狀態。理智度代表心理健康狀態。舒適度代表殖民地居民在火星上的生活品質。士氣代表居民的幸福度、樂觀程度和忠誠度。如果想要了解居民更加詳細的屬性，瞭解關於屬性更加全面的描述，請查看居民的資訊面板。 要注意，如果所有的殖民地居民都死了，火星殖民任務也會中止。

Text: Colonists may migrate to new Domes within walking distance of their current position, or farther away when Shuttle transport becomes available. Homeless Colonists will travel to another accessible Dome with available residential space. Each Dome can be set up to filter Colonists by age, specialization and other traits. Colonists with ANY of the must include traits, or ANY of the desired traits and NONE of the undesired ones will remain in the Dome. Others will seek another Dome with available living space and filter that matches their traits.
Translation: 殖民地居民可能會遷移到步行範圍可及的其它穹頂內。當穿梭機可用之後，他們可能還會移動到更遠的穹頂處。 無家可歸的居民將會自動前往有位置的穹頂。 您可以在任意穹頂處根據年齡、專長或其他特徵來篩選殖民地居民。擁有穹頂必要特性的殖民地居民，或是擁有穹頂需要的特性且沒有不需要特性的居民，會一直留在穹頂之中。而其餘的居民會不斷尋找新的穹頂，來與各自的特性相匹配。
Old Text: Colonists may migrate to new Domes within walking distance of their current position, or farther away when Shuttle transport becomes available. Homeless Colonists will travel to another accessible Dome with available residential space. Each Dome can be set up to filter Colonists by age, specialization and other traits. Colonists with ANY of the desired traits and NONE of the undesired ones will remain in the Dome, while others will seek another Dome with available living space and filter that matches their traits.
Old Translation: 殖民地居民可能會遷移到步行範圍可及的其它穹頂內。當穿梭機可用之後，他們可能還會移動到更遠的穹頂處。 無家可歸的居民將會自動前往有位置的穹頂。 您可以再任意穹頂處根據年齡、專長或其他特徵來篩選殖民地居民。部分殖民地居民擁有穹頂需要的特性，並且沒有任何不需要的特性，這樣的居民會一直留在穹頂之中。而其餘的居民會不斷尋找新的穹頂，來與各自的特性相匹配。
Context: EncyclopediaArticle GameMechanics Colonists - Moving Between Domes text

Translation: 殖民地居民 - 在穹頂之間移動
Context: EncyclopediaArticle GameMechanics Colonists - Moving Between Domes title_text

Text:
Colonists with no specialization may be educated to receive a specialization in the Martian University. The University can provide needed specializations automatically or focus on a single desired specialization.

Some, but not all, undesirable Flaws may be cured in the Sanatorium spire. Up to three different flaws can be treated in a single Sanatorium.

The School building cultivates desired Perks in children living in the Colony. They have a chance to receive any of the three selected Perks when they grow up. Not all Perks can be trained in School. The Playground building cultivates random Perks in children who visited it.

The University, Sanatorium and School buildings are treated as workplaces - colonists being educated or treated there cannot work a job at the same time. The individual performance of the colonists determines how fast they receive a specialization, cure a flaw or their chance to cultivate a Perk from School. The Playground service building grants its effect to any children who visit it at least once during their childhood.
Translation:
沒有專長的殖民地居民可以在火星大學接受專長教育。大學可以自動為居民培養所需要的專長，也可以固定培養某種需要的專長。

部分缺陷可以在療養院尖塔上治癒，但並非所有缺陷都可以被治癒。一處療養院最多可以治療三種不同的缺陷。

在學校，殖民地的孩子們可以學習殖民地需要的特長。當孩子們長大成人後，會有一定機率學會三個所選特長中的一個或幾個。並不是所有的特長都可以在學校中進行培訓。當兒童進入遊樂場時，他們會隨機學會某些特長。

大學、療養院和學校的性質與崗位相同。因此，正在接受教育或治療的殖民地居民，沒辦法同時接受其它培訓或治療。根據殖民地居民的工作效率不同，他們獲得專長、治療缺陷，或是從學校學習特長的速度也有所不同。只要是在童年時期去過遊樂場的兒童，就會獲得遊樂場帶來的效果。
Context: EncyclopediaArticle GameMechanics Colonists - Managing Specializations and Traits text

Translation: 殖民地居民 - 管理專長與特性
Context: EncyclopediaArticle GameMechanics Colonists - Managing Specializations and Traits title_text

Text: Tourists are Colonists who visit Mars for recreation, and are brought in from Earth through the resupply screen. They stay on Mars for 5 sols, looking to go home afterwards. Upon returning to earth, each Tourist gives their holiday a rating based on their Satisfaction stat. They generate funds and new applicants based on their rating. Tourists with the Saint, Celebrity and Genius Traits give extra rewards. Every Tourist has the Satisfaction stat, which tracks how much they've enjoyed their holiday. Satisfaction is increased by raising stats and through certain buildings or vehicles (Hotels, Low-G Amusement Parks, and RC Safaris ).
Translation: 遊客是那些透過重新補給介面從地球邀請來的殖民地居民，他們來火星是為了消遣。他們在火星逗留5個太陽日，隨後就打算回家。 當他們回到地球時，每名遊客都會根據他們的滿意度屬性來給他們的假期評價。根據評價，他們提供資金並招來新的應徵者。有佈道者、名人和天才特性的遊客會給予額外的獎勵。 每名遊客都有滿意度屬性，這顯示他們假期過得有多愉快。滿意度是透過提高屬性及透過特定的建築或載具（旅館、 低重力遊樂園和遙控觀景車）提高的。

Text: All Rovers are manually controlled via the commands available in their Infopanels. They can either be given orders to go to a map location or to interact with a contextually specific map object – such as Anomalies or Surface Deposits. Drones are semi-autonomous and will queue up tasks that are flagged only if these tasks are within the Service Area set for each drone. However, the player can take direct control of a Drone if needed. Change your preferred controls and mappings using the Options menu.
Translation: 所有的探測車都可以透過資訊面板中命令進行手動控制。您可以將探測車指派到地圖上的特定位置，或命令探測車與特定的地圖目標進行互動，例如異象與表層資源點。 無人機是半自動工作單位，只有當任務目標處於無人機服務區域內時，它才會將標記的任務進行排隊。不過，如果需要的話，玩家也可以直接控制無人機。 您可以透過選項選單，更改您的按鍵設定與介面配置。
Context: EncyclopediaArticle GameMechanics Rover and Drone Control text
EncyclopediaArticle GameMechanics Rover and Drone Control title_text

Text: The map is divided in Sectors which need to be scanned to reveal what resources and Anomalies they hold – if any. Sectors can be queued for scanning from the Map Overview. Sensor towers drastically increase the scanning speed of sectors near them and provide a smaller overall bonus to sector scanning. A fast and expensive way to explore the map is to buy Orbital Probes from Earth which instantly scans a chosen sector. Building in unexplored Sectors carries the risk of building directly on top of undiscovered resource deposits.
Translation: 整個地圖被劃分為多個區域。如果區域內含有資源和異象，您需要先進性掃描才能發現。 您可以在地圖總覽介面中新增區域掃描佇列。感應塔可以大大提高附近區域的掃描速度，還可以為區域掃描提供了更高的加成效果。 另外，還有另一種快速而耗資高昂的掃描方式。那就是從地球上購買軌道探測器，它可以立即掃描選定的區域。 若是在未掃描過的區域直接建造建築，可能會導致您的建築物造在未發現的資源點上。

Text: Wonders are exceptionally advanced and expensive structures that provide major benefits for the entire Colony. They are unlocked at the far ends of the Research Fields. Each wonder is unique and can be constructed only once.
Translation: 世界奇觀是極為先進的建築物，造價也極為昂貴，可以提供整個殖民地非常強大的加成效果。奇觀在研究領域最尾處解鎖。 每座奇觀都是獨一無二的建築，只能建造一次。

Text:
Landscaping allows you to flatten and shape the Martian surface for practical or aesthetic reasons. You may also create Ramps to connect different levels of the terrain.

The process is facilitated by Drones, which extract Waste Rock to lower the ground or dump additional Waste Rock to raise it.
Translation:
地形改造功能可讓你出於實用或美觀目的而壓平塑造火星地表。你還能造出坡道以連接不同高度的地形。

改造過程由無人機進行，它們能挖出廢渣以降低地面高度或推擠廢渣以提升高度。

Old Text: Landscaping
Old Translation: 地形改造

Translation: 停用所有隨機事件（異象除外）

Text:
<grey>"Boredom always precedes a period of great creativity."
<right>Robert M. Pirsig</grey><left>
Translation:
<grey>“創造力噴湧而出之前總要經歷一段無聊的時光。”
<right>羅伯特·梅納德·波西格</grey><left>

Old Text: Tech fields are fully randomized.
Old Translation: 技術領域完全隨機化。

Text: <grey>"In fact, the mere act of opening the box will determine the state of the cat, although in this case there were three determinate states the cat could be in: these being Alive, Dead, and Bloody Furious."<newline><right>Terry Pratchett</grey><left>
Translation: <grey>“事實上，僅僅是開啟盒子這個動作就會決定貓的狀態。然而，盒子在沒開啟的時候，盒子中的貓同時存在三種狀態：或活著，或死亡，或氣得要發瘋。”<newline><right>泰瑞·普萊契</grey><left>

Text: Begin with free prefabs for all buildings necessary for a small colony
Translation: 遊戲開始時擁有各種建築的預製件，足以建造一座小型殖民地
Old Text: Begin with free prefabs for all buildings necessary for a small colony.
