Text: Our scientists have devised a complex plan to discover the cure for the Wildfire infection. It would be a monumental effort but we must prioritize the research to be able to find a solution to the growing crisis.
Translation: 我們的科學家為研製出野火感染的治療劑而制定了複雜的計劃。過程將充滿艱辛，但我們必須將此研究放在首位，以解決日益加劇的危機。

Text: Constructing new Medical buildings which gather data about the infection could speed up the progress towards discovering the Wildfire Cure.
Translation: 建造可以搜集感染資料的醫療建築能加快發現野火治療劑的進展。

Text: The Cure for Wildfire has been discovered! Conveniently spliced in modified mold cells, the cure can be grown on plant biomass. We have to produce it en masse!
Translation: 我們已發現了野火的治療劑！將治療物質植入改造後的黴菌細胞後，治療物質就能在植物生物質中生長。我們必須大規模生產治療劑！

Text: Tremendous news! The cure for the Wildfire disease has been discovered!
Translation: 天大的好消息！我們已發現了野火疾病的治療劑！

Text:
A genetically modified strain of the Martian Wildfire interfaces with the RNA of the virus and effectively stops it from coagulating the blood plasma of the host. The intake of only a small amount of the cure is enough to halt the development of the disease, even though it wouldn't repair the tissue damage suffered so far.

The scientists experimented with multiple growth mediums and discovered that the most effective way to proliferate the medicine is by introducing it in mold cells growing on potatoes. This is great news because we can provide enough biomass for the modified mold to grow and if we do it quickly, we can still stand a chance to end the suffering on Earth.

<effect>The Curetato Crop has become available. Harvesting it will produce Cure for the Wildfire infection, which in turn has to be exported to Earth to end the crisis.

<effect> Colonists with the Infected trait will be cured permanently after their first visit in a Medical Building.
Translation:
基因改造後的火星野火疾病菌株能與病毒的核糖核酸發生作用，並有效阻止其凝固寄主的血漿。只要攝入少量治療劑就足以令病情停止惡化，只不過它無法修復到目前為止受損的組織。

科學家用多種生長媒介做了實驗，並發現繁殖治療物質最有效的方法是將其引入生長在馬鈴薯上的黴菌細胞中。這是個令人振奮的消息，因為我們能提供改造過後的黴菌生長所需的生物量，如果我們儘快行動，就還有機會結束地球上的痛苦。

<effect>藥物馬鈴薯作物已開放。收穫此作物能生產野火感染的治療劑，必須將治療劑出口到地球才能化解這次危機。

<effect>有感染者特性的殖民地居民在首次訪問醫療建築後即可永久痊癒。

Text: Start the process immediately. Time is of the essence!
The faint distress signal led us to the burial site of a small satellite. It had fallen deep under the red sands and could have been there for an eternity.
Translation: 我們沿著微弱的遇險訊號來到了一顆小型衛星的埋葬點。它或許已在紅沙之下度過了無數年。

Text: It’s strange that we couldn't find any information for the flight in the international records. No black box nor signatures can be seen except for a discolored logo, ‘Scoop XI’. Upon opening the hull we found all of the internal systems corroded away by time, with only a small capsule remaining. The biohazard sign on it only served to stir our curiosity, but a closer examination discovered that it has been breached. We assume that the biological material inside has been destroyed. We have ordered the Rover to store the salvage for further analysis.
Translation: 奇怪的是，我們在國際記錄中找不到這顆衛星的飛行記錄。我們也未發現黑盒子或簽名，只發現了一個褪色的標誌：‘剷鬥11號’我們開啟外殼後，發現其內部系統已經在漫長的歲月中腐蝕殆盡，只剩下一個小太空艙。上面的生物危害標示令我們的好奇心更加強烈，但仔細檢查後發現該太空艙已被破壞。我們認為其中的生物物質已被摧毀。我們已命令探測車將殘骸回收物儲存，以供進一步分析。

Text: A curious find. Let’s hope the future will bring more answers than questions on that matter.
Translation: 真是一次有意思的發現。希望未來我們能查明這件事的真相。

Text: We've just lost one of our scientific facilities in a disturbing set of events. We’re still investigating the cause of the disaster but there are clues which lead to unsettling conclusions.
Translation: 發生了一系列令人擔憂的事件，導致我們損失了一處科學設施。我們仍在調查災難的原因，但有線索指向令人不安的結論。

Text:
The security log shows that everything started with a malfunction in the storage unit where the analysis samples were stored. After that the internal systems of the laboratory began to rapidly fail one after another. Suspiciously, the damaged systems were all made of plastic and organic polymers, all corroded away within mere seconds.

Our operatives are puzzled with the cause of the chain reaction but the Chief Engineer has pointed out a fact which eluded our attention until now – the remains of the Scoop XI satellite were held in the storage unit of this facility. We didn't take any chances and ordered an emergency decontamination of the building. Let’s hope that whatever was in there has been destroyed.

<effect>A Laboratory has mysteriously malfunctioned.
Translation:
安全日誌指出事故的起因是存放分析樣本的儲存單元發生故障。隨後，實驗室的內部系統開始迅速地接連失效。可疑的是，受損系統都由塑料或有機聚合物製成，而這些系統竟在短短幾秒內就被腐蝕殆盡。

我們的工作人員對這一連鎖反應的原因困惑不解，但首席工程師指出了一個我們一直以來都忽略的事實：此設施的儲存單元中之前存放著剷鬥11號的殘骸。我們沒有抱任何僥倖心理，並下令對建築物進行緊急消毒。希望不管裡面裝著什麼，我們都已經把它消滅了。

<effect>實驗室因不明原因而發生故障。

Text: Monitor the colony and report any related cases.
Translation: 監視殖民地並上報一切相關事例。

Text: We have to face it – we cannot stop the infection. No matter what we do it keeps spreading across the colony like a wildfire. Hence the name we've given it.
Translation: 我們不得不面對我們無法阻止感染這一現實。無論我們採取何種手段，疾病還是像野火一樣在殖民地中蔓延。因此我們稱其為“野火”。

Text: All attempts to isolate the sources have failed. We can assume that the virus is traveling all across our life support and maintenance circuits. The only way to stop it is to turn off all systems, but this would be a death sentence for the colonists. We've ran out of options.
Translation: 我們為隔離病源所做的一切嘗試都失敗了。我們可以認定這種病毒已經感染了我們所有維生和維護線路。遏止蔓延的唯一方法是關閉所有系統，但這對給殖民地居民而言與死亡判決無異。我們已經束手無策了。

Text: Don't despair, we will find a solution!
Translation: 天無絕人之路，我們一定能想出辦法挺過難關！

Text: The infection is spreading at alarming rate through the colony. The scientists have named it Wildfire after its virulence and infection pattern.
Translation: 感染正以驚人的速度在殖民地蔓延。因這種疾病致病力強且蔓延速度快，科學家將其命名為“野火”。

Text: The worst has happened – Wildfire has infected Earth. It was on board a rocket which returned to Earth and somehow it breached through all decontamination measures.
Translation: 我們最擔心的事還是發生了：野火感染了地球。它感染了一枚飛回地球的火箭，不知為何，一切消毒措施都沒能將其殺滅。

Text:
The infected personnel at the landing site deteriorated within hours of contracting the infection and the medics couldn't help them. This doesn't match our medical records as Wildfire takes much more time to develop here, on Mars. We suspect a form of rapid mutation due to the changes in the environment.

The rocket landing site has been placed under quarantine and the authorities have been informed. We can only pray that they manage to prevent the infection from spreading any further.

<effect>Infection Level on Earth has been set to the Contained level. If it reaches the Extinction level, the human population on Earth will be obliterated. Discover the Wildfire Cure and supply it to Earth to prevent this!
Translation:
著陸地點的工作人員在受感染後短短幾小時內，健康狀況就急劇惡化，而醫護人員對此無能為力。這與我們的病歷不符，因為在火星上，野火病情惡化的速度慢得多。我們估計環境發生變化導致病毒進行了某種形式的迅速變異。

火箭著陸區已被隔離，當局也知道了此事。我們只能祈禱他們能設法防止感染進一步蔓延。

<effect>地球的感染等級為“遏制”。等級達到“滅絕”即代表地球上人類的滅絕。研製出野火治療劑並將其運往地球可防止人類滅絕！

Text: One of our rockets has spread the Wildfire infection on Earth. It's spreading rapidly - we have to discover the Cure before the human population on Earth is obliterated!
Translation: 我們四枚火箭中的一枚將野火感染散播到了地球上。病毒正在迅速蔓延。我們必須研製出治療劑，不然地球上的人類就要滅絕了！

Text: The worst has happened – Wildfire has infected Earth. We suspect this was caused by a recent meteor impact on Mars which lifted debris and showered them on the Blue Planet.
Translation: 我們最擔心的事還是發生了：野火感染了地球。我們猜測感染原因是近期撞擊火星的隕石激起了碎片，這些碎片落到了地球上。

Text:
Several small settlements in different regions have been infected. The authorities report that the victims have deteriorated within mere hours, something which doesn't match our medical records. On Mars it takes Sols for the Wildfire to kill its host. We suspect some form of rapid mutation due to the changes in the environment.

The infected areas have been placed under quarantine and we can only pray that the authorities manage to prevent the disease from spreading any further.

<effect>Infection Level on Earth has been set to the Contained level. If it reaches the Extinction level, the human population on Earth will be obliterated. Discover the Wildfire Cure and supply it to Earth to prevent this!
Translation:
世界各地的若干處小型定居點已受感染。當局報告稱患者在幾小時內健康狀況急劇惡化，這與我們的病歷不符。在火星上，野火需要若干個太陽日才會殺死宿主。我們估計環境發生變化導致病毒進行了某種形式的迅速變異。

受感染地區已被隔離，我們只能祈禱當局設法阻止疾病進一步蔓延。

<effect>地球上的感染等級為“遏制”。等級達到“滅絕”即代表地球上人類的滅絕。研製出野火治療劑並將其運往地球可防止人類滅絕！

Text: Martian meteors have spread the Wildfire infection on Earth! We must discover the Cure before the entire human population on Earth is obliterated!
Translation: 火星隕石將野火感染散播到了地球上。我們必須研製出治療劑，不然地球上的人類就要滅絕了！
野火：感染等級 - 地方病

Text: The Wildfire virus is spreading on Earth at an alarming rate, threatening entire populations all over the globe. The grim prediction is that soon the entire population of the planet will be affected.
Translation: 野火病毒正已驚人的速度在地球上蔓延，威脅到了全球的人口。據悲觀預測，很快地球上的所有人都會被感染。

Text:
Scientists on Earth are desperately trying to discover a solution, but so far in vain. The virulence of the local strain is so high that sampling and transporting infected material is a death sentence. The nanoscopic size of the agent makes containment equally hard - biological filters fail to stop it effectively, threatening the safety of any laboratory which attempts to study it. The only solution is to analyze the original strain - the one we have on Mars - in order to find the cure. Time is running short!

Meanwhile, Third World countries are in a state of panic as the Wildfire strikes the poorest communities. Waves of refugees flee the affected regions and many resource operations are simply abandoned by the scared personnel. The market feels the hunger for raw resources and multiple demands have been filed for imports from Mars.

<effect>Infection Level has reached the Endemic state. Export prices have increased for the next <text_param1> Sols as the First World economies feel the hunger for resources.
Translation:
地球上的科學家正孤注一擲地尋找著解決方案，但目前還一無所獲。這種本地疾病的致病力太強，取樣並運輸受感染物質無異於死亡判決。僅有奈米大小的致病物質也導致隔離工作難上加難。生物過濾器無法有效阻止這種病毒，使得想要研究這種病毒的實驗室自身的安全得不到保障。研製治療劑唯一的辦法是分析位於火星的原始菌株。時間緊迫！

與此同時，第三世界國家已陷入恐慌，因為其最貧困的地區已遭到野火的襲擊。潮水般的難民逃離受感染地區，很多負責資源開採的工作人員因為恐懼逃離了工作崗位。市場急需原材料，並已向火星多次提出進口的要求。

<effect>感染等級已達“地方病”。由於第一世界經濟體急需資源，在接下來的<text_param1>個太陽日內，出口價格上漲。

Text: Grave news... We have to hurry!
Translation: 大事不好……我們得趕快行動！

Text: The Wildfire infection is spreading uncontrollably on Earth. The Third World countries are hit harder due to their lack of resources to fight the disease effectively.
Translation: 地球上的野火感染已經失控。第三世界國家蒙受的損失超乎預期，因為他們缺乏有效抵禦疾病所需的資源。
野火：感染等級 - 流行病

Text: Panic and desperation has spread across the population as waves of refugees flee the endemic zones.
Translation: 隨著大批難民逃離疾病蔓延地區，所有人都感到恐慌和絕望。

Text:
Wildfire has hit the Third World hard. The crisis can be felt across the developing countries and the First World as well. The chaos in the poorest countries resonates across the globe as the raw materials markets are plummeting. Entire resource operations in the Third World countries are abandoned as the workers flee the areas hit by the virus. People in the rich countries vocally support actions to relieve the struggling regions of the Earth and many companies divert resources for charity. Probably there’s still hope for humanity when so many of us refuse to ignore the tragedy of complete strangers.

<effect>Infection Level has reached the Epidemic state. Applicant pool is depleted for the next <text_param1> Sols due to quarantine measures.
Translation:
野火重創了第三世界。不僅發展中國家，連第一世界也感受到了這次危機。最貧困國家的混亂導致原始資源緊缺，進而影響到了全世界。第三世界資源開採作業都已陷入停滯，因為工人們都逃離了感染病毒的地區。富裕國家對救濟地球上處於苦難中地區的行為表示聲援，很多公司撥出資源做慈善。我們中還有很多人拒絕對陌生人的苦難視而不見，或許人類還有希望。

<effect>感染等級已達“流行病”。由於採取了隔離措施，接下來的<text_param1>個太陽日內沒有應徵者。

Text: The Wildfire has infected the developed countries as well. Panic and desperation are spreading through the population!
Translation: 野火也感染了發達國家。全人類陷入了恐慌與絕望之中！
野火：感染等級 - 瘟疫

Text: A wave of despair sweeps across the globe as people witness the futility of all measures against Wildfire. Everyone feels that our time on Earth is running short.
Translation: 當人們目睹了針對野火的一切措施都於事無補時，一股絕望的浪潮席捲了全球。人人都感覺我們在地球上的時日無多。

Text:
The tragedy in the Third World has struck some of the richer countries as well, as the Wildfire infection has spread across their populations. People stay inside, fearing for their lives. Refugee camps are filling to the brim as entire areas of the world have been depopulated. Despair has brought the worse in some of us and looters raid the stores in the cities while the police and the army are trying to quell the violent riots. The economies of the First World are failing due to the growing crisis and our Sponsor wasn't spared as well. I'm afraid we’re running out of time...

<effect>Infection Level has reached the Pandemic state. Next level - Extinction! All resupply costs are increased for the next <text_param1> Sols due to supply shortages.
Translation:
第三世界的悲劇也令部分較為富裕的國家蒙受損失，他們國家的人民也感染上了野火。人們擔驚受怕，終日閉門不出。難民營人滿為患，世界上已經出現了不少無人區。一些人因為絕望而自甘墮落，他們搶劫商店和城市，軍隊和警察正在盡力平息暴動。第一世界經濟體即將崩潰，因為危機越來越嚴重，我們的贊助者也沒能倖免。恐怕我們快沒時間了……

<effect>傳染等級已達瘟疫。下一等級 - 滅絕！由於物資短缺，在接下來的<text_param1>個太陽日裡，所有重新補給價格上漲。

Text: The Wildfire has nearly destroyed the human civilization. Scattered pockets of survivors are still dwindling in remote areas of the world.
Translation: 野火幾乎徹底摧毀了人類文明。散落在世界各地偏僻地區的小批倖存者人數也在不斷下降。

Text: Earth's population has been obliterated by the Wildfire infection. No traces of any human activity can be detected. We could be the only humans left out there...
Translation: 野火感染已滅絕了地球上的人類。偵測不到人類活動的跡象。宇宙中或許只剩下我們這些人類了……

Text: Our sensors detect no signs of human activity on the surface of Earth. We must admit that the battle with the Wildfire infection is lost. Night falls over humankind.
Translation: 我們的探測器偵測不到地表存在人類活動的任何跡象。我們必須承認野火感染擊敗了我們。人類的夜幕降臨了。

Text:
Earth has become an uninhabited mausoleum of our past greatness - the barren, lifeless husks of the once overcrowded megalopolises, the abandoned derelicts of our once great industrial might, the meadows where no children would ever play. The shroud of silence has covered the surface of the Earth and only the wind chimes through the ruins of our past, whispering stories no one is there to listen.

Is this the end? Is the Wildfire infection over, dead in its rampant destruction alongside its human hosts? Or would it mutate further, consuming all life on Earth? Only the children of our children will be able to answer these questions, watching from afar.

<effect>Earth population is devastated by the Wildfire infection! Export, Resupply, Research Outsourcing and Applicants have been disabled indefinitely.
Translation:
榮光不再的地球現在變成了一個荒無人煙的墳場，一度車水馬龍的大都市現在只剩荒涼而毫無生機的空殼。一度發達的工業現已被徹底荒廢。草坪上也看不到兒童嬉戲的身影。死寂籠罩著地表，只剩下吹拂廢墟的風聲低語著無人傾聽的故事。

一切都結束了嗎？野火感染無情地毀滅人類宿主後，自己也滅亡了嗎？還是說它還會進一步變異，並吞噬地球上的一切生命呢？只有我們遠觀地球的子孫後代能回答這些問題。

<effect>野火感染毀滅了地球上的人類。出口、重新補給、研究外包和應徵者都已不再可用。

Text: A dark day, but do not lose hope - while we stand, humanity is alive!
Translation: 今天，人類遭受了滅頂之災，但不要放棄希望。只要我們還在，人類就沒有滅亡！

Text: We've received a radio transmission! From Earth! We thought we were the last humans and now this! Amazing news!
Translation: 我們接收到了無線電通訊！是地球發來的！我們還以為自己是宇宙中僅存的人類，但看來我們錯了！這真是天大的好消息！

Text:
The survivors of the Wildfire gathered in remote places of the planet and inside protected facilities and began to re-emerge into the world when the signs of the infection began to vanish. They are unsure what happened with the disease, and so are we, but they claim that it appears gone. Earth is welcoming to humans once more!

The survivors have just began restarting abandoned factory complexes and power plants to fuel the industry needed to rebuild the civilization from the ruins. People move into the cities and repopulate the farming areas. The economy is starting to build up momentum – and they want us to become part of the exchange once more!

The survivors have their spirits high, but still the fear of the Wildfire lies in all of them – what if it comes back? This is the reason why they’ve requested us to send them as much of the Wildfire Cure as we can.

<effect>Communications with Earth have been re-established. Resupply, Research Outsourcing and Applicants are available once more. Export prices are reduced for the next <text_param1> Sols while the economy is recovering.

<effect>Cargo Rockets will be sent from Earth to be loaded with Wildfire Cure. When they reach Earth you will be granted <funding(reg_param2)> Funding.
Translation:
野火感染的倖存者聚集在地球上的偏遠地區，並安全地躲在防護設施內。當感染的跡象開始消失時，他們開始在世界上再度出現。他們不清楚野火現在情況如何，我們也是，但他們表示這場疾病似乎已經消失了。地球再一次適宜人類居住了！

倖存者們剛剛開始重啟廢棄的工廠設施以及發電站以給工業提供燃料，並從廢墟中重建文明。人們搬入城市，農耕地區也再次有人居住。經濟開始發展，他們想要我們繼續與他們進行貿易！

倖存者們意氣風發，但依然擔心野火會再次爆發。要是它再次出現怎麼辦？因此他們請求我們為他們提供儘可能多的野火治療劑。

<effect>已與地球重新取得聯絡。重新補給、研究外包和應徵者已再次可用。地球上經濟正在復甦，在接下來的<text_param1>個太陽日裡，出口價格降低。

<effect>地球會向火星發射貨運火箭，以供我們裝載野火治療劑。它們到達地球時你將獲得<funding(reg_param2)>資金。

Text: A cargo rocket is on its way to gather the Wildfire cure. People on Earth depend on our efforts to create a steady supply chain for the cure.
Translation: 等待裝載野火治療劑的貨運火箭已經在路上了。我們要努力形成一條穩定的治療劑供應鏈，地球人民就指望我們了。

Text:
The amount of Wildfire Cure we have to return to Earth depends on the severity of the situation there. If the situation demands it, we should expect potential future requests for the cure.

<effect>Load Cargo Rockets with the Cure and Fuel and send them back to Earth until the Wildfire infection is completely eradicated.
Translation:
我們發回地球的野火治療劑的數量由情況的嚴重程度而定。如果發生非常情況，我們未來或許還會收到傳送治療劑的請求。

<effect>往貨運火箭中裝載治療劑，並將其運回地球，直到徹底清除野火感染。

Text: The authorities on Earth have sent a Cargo Rocket to gather Wildfire Cure and return it to the struggling population on our homeworld.
Translation: 地球上的當局已經派出了一枚貨運火箭來搜集野火治療劑，並將其運回給我們母星上艱難求存的人們。

Text: Refuel and load with Wildfire Cure to relief Earth from the Infection.
Translation: 給火箭注入燃料並裝載野火治療劑，以緩解地球上的疫情。

Text: Authorities all over the Earth report that no cases of the Wildfire infection have been detected. Earth is freed from the yoke of the worst pandemic in history.
Translation: 世界各地的當局報告稱未再發現液或感染的病例。地球終於掙脫了有史以來最可怕流行病的枷鎖。

Text: People all around the world celebrate, but the consequences of the Wildfire crisis remain. We have decades – maybe even centuries before us – to cope with the damages caused, with the fear and desperation which reverberate inside all of us. But we remain optimistic that, given time, people will return to their everyday lives. The Wildfire crisis has shown us how fragile we are, how the ivory towers we’ve built could crumble in mere days. Maybe it’s the perfect moment to step back and reconsider the way we lived our lives. To rebuild our civilization, but build it better than before. The Wildfire Cure remains our hot lead towards the way the disease worked. By studying it we will be able to delve in the mystery of its structure and origin, preparing for worse days ahead. The infection on Earth has been eradicated! All Infection Level effects have been removed. Cargo Rockets will be sent from Earth to load Wildfire Cure. Upon return, each rocket will grant you Funding. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: 全世界人民歡呼雀躍，但野火危機的後果仍非常嚴重。我們要花數十甚至上百年的時間才能挽回損失並克服所有人內心揮之不去的恐懼與絕望。但我們依然對情況保持樂觀，因為假以時日，人們的生活又會恢復如常。 野火危機向我們展示了人類是多麼脆弱，我們建造的象牙塔短短幾天就會崩塌。或許現在是回顧反思我們生活方式的大好時機。我們會重建文明，但會把它建設得更加美好。 野火治療劑仍是我們理解疾病運作原理的最佳線索。透過研究疾病，我們能探究其神祕的結構和起源，為未來更艱難的日子做好準備。 地球上的感染已被清除！一切感染等級效果已消失。 地球會向火星發射貨運火箭以裝載野火治療劑。返回時，每枚火箭會給你提供資金。 獲得新技術，

Text: The Wildfire infection has been eradicated on Earth! People all over the globe rejoice and praise your adequate actions!
Translation: 地球上的野火感染已被清除！全球人民歡呼雀躍，對及時採取有效措施的我們讚不絕口。

Text: Refuel and load with Wildfire Cure to sell to Earth and gain Funding.
Translation: 給火箭補充燃料並裝載野火治療劑並在地球上出售，以獲得資金。

Text: Our brave colonists waited for their brethren on Earth to be cured before they have received relief from the burden of the disease. The colonists would surely be happy to hear that the threat is eliminated – it will raise their spirits high!
Translation: 我們勇敢的殖民地居民焦急地等待著地球上患病的同胞得到治癒的消息。殖民地居民聽到威脅已被解除的消息後肯定會喜笑顏開、歡欣鼓舞！

Text: Today marks the moment when our colony is free from the threat of the Wildfire infection!
Translation: 我們的殖民地在今天終於擺脫了野火感染的威脅！

Text:
Our efficient medical program has managed to cure all cases of the Wildfire infection. Mars has become a much safer place. We informed Earth and after a careful selection and medical checks they are ready to launch an emergency flight with healthy survivors aboard.

These are ordinary people who survived the Wildfire crisis somehow and managed to get to safety. None of them has passed the initial training required for arriving on Mars so we expect them to have a hard time acclimating to the life in the colony. But at least they would be safe from harm with us.

<effect>A rocket with <text_param1> Refugees aboard is inbound to Mars.
Translation:
我們高效的意料專案設法治癒了野火感染的所有患者。火星現在安全多了。我們將此消息告知了地球，地球進行仔細篩選和醫療檢查後，已準備好派健康的倖存者緊急飛往火星。

這些都是在野火危機中倖存下來並設法藏身在安全之所的普通人。他們中沒人通過登上火星所需的初始訓練，因此我們估計他們不太容易適應火星的生活。但至少他們與我們在一起不會受到任何傷害。

<effect>一枚搭載著<text_param1>位難民的火箭正向火星飛來。

Text: We’ll make sure these poor souls get the best reception.
Translation: 我們會確保這些可憐的人得到最好的接待。

Text: Now that Mars has become a safe haven from the Wildfire infection the authorities on Earth have sent a rocket with non-infected refugees to be sheltered in your colony.
Translation: 現在火星已經成為了不受野火感染威脅的安全港灣，地球上的當局已經向你的殖民地發射了一枚搭載著未受感染難民的火箭，以讓他們在你的殖民地中避難。

Text: Refugees on board are fleeing the infected Earth.
Translation: 難民正乘坐火箭逃離受感染的地球。

Text: Beyond Earth: Vision of the Future
“No, aliens did not build the pyramids – human beings built the pyramids with ingenuity and hard work.
Translation: “不，建造金字塔的並不是外星人，而是人類，因為我們擁有聰明才智又刻苦耐勞。
Old Text: “No, aliens did not build the pyramids – human beings built the pyramids because we are clever and hard workers.
Old Translation: “不，建造金字塔的並不是外星人，而是人類，因為我們聰明又刻苦耐勞。

Text:
And in this day and age, when we value the strength of a civilization not by its ability to wage war - but by its ability to prevent it, our hard work and cleverness have only one place left to take us – up.

Up towards the stars - above our superficial segregations and competing with ourselves. Up towards a united humanity spread out on many worlds… possibly even stars.  

I am more than certain that the last several thousand years of our history are but the bumpy road towards a version of humanity where there is no hunger, no war, no needless suffering and where the future holds nothing but opportunity and wonder.  And I also believe we are quite close to the end of this turbulent road. I make it my mission to help take us through this last stretch and today I announce my plan in investing the vast majority of my considerable fortune to this endeavor. “

Rede Goddenberry, one of the wealthiest and most powerful people on Earth, addresses the UN General Assembly
Translation:
在當今這個時代，當我們重視一個文明的力量不是因為它發動戰爭的能力，而是因為它預防戰爭的能力時。只有我們的聰明才智和刻苦耐勞才能帶領我們更上一層樓。

超脫於膚淺的隔離與內鬥，朝著星海邁進。朝著人類團結一致踏上其他星球，甚至到達其他恆星系的目標邁進。

我十分清楚我們過去幾千年的歷史是一條崎嶇之路，這條路通向沒有飢餓、戰爭和不必要的痛苦，且充滿機遇的神奇未來。我也相信正在這條路上前進的我們很快就能到達目的地。引領我們走過這最後一段路是我的使命。今天，我宣佈打算將自己雄厚資產中的絕大部分用於資助這一使命。”

以上是地球上財富與權力數一數二的里德·戈登貝利在聯合國大會上的發言。

Text: Rede Goddenberry gives out a speech at the UN.
Translation: 里德·戈登貝利在聯合國發表了演講。

Text: Beyond Earth: A Deluded Old Billionaire
Translation: 超越地球：受蠱惑的老億萬富翁

Text: Greetings from Earth! I’ve wanted an audience with the founders of the first human settlement away from our dear blue planet for ages now.
Translation: 地球向我們問好！第一個人類定居點的創始者了已離開地區，我早就想見見他了。

Text:
You see, in you I find kindred souls, souls who do not view my speech at the UN as the ramblings of a deluded old billionaire. I’m certain my vision resonates with all of you up there; after all - you are a part of it.

My Beyond Earth initiative is pushing several separate projects simultaneously - all aimed at bringing prosperity and peace to a human race spread across the Solar System.

One of the projects in question is currently in a ditch - the planning of a Moon base to mine Hydrogen 3, called Aldrin Base. I’m certain I don’t need to tell you what an abundance of the material would mean energy-wise. I’d kindly implore you, if your situation permits it of course, to contribute some research capacity and quite frankly know-how to the Beyond Earth initiative.

<effect>Beyond Earth Initiative tech unlocked. Research the tech to help the Aldrin Base project.
Translation:
我發現你們與我志同道合，你們不認為我在聯合國發表的演講只不過是受蠱惑的老億萬富翁的胡言亂語。我的願景肯定能引起你們的共鳴，畢竟，你們也是其中的一部分。

我的超越地球倡議正在同時推動著若干個獨立的工程，這些工程的目標都是為在太陽系中擴張的人類帶來繁榮與和平。

其中一個工程現已陷入停滯，具體內容是計劃建造一座用於開採氚的月面基地，基地名為“阿爾德林”。大量這種物質在能源方面的意義想必不用我對你多做解釋了吧。我想友好地請求你，在情況允許的條件下，為超越地球倡議提供一些研究協助，直白的說就是實際經驗。

<effect>超越地球倡議技術現已解鎖。研究此技術可為阿爾德林基地工程提供幫助。

Text: Rede Goddenberry contacts the Mars colony with direct request for research contribution towards his Beyond Earth initiative.
Translation: 里德·戈登貝利與火星殖民地取得聯絡，並親自請求我們為他的超越地球倡議提供研究協助。

Text: The Beyond Earth initiative needs your help! And not with know-how this time around.
Translation: 超越地球倡議需要你的幫助！這次要的不是實際經驗。

Text:
Currently we are falling behind schedule at our Rubicon Station front - a deep-space shipyard tasked with expanding our space-faring capabilities - and would kindly request you to contribute Metals towards bringing the construction back on track.

We ran the numbers and have come to the conclusion that using Mars for firing raw materials towards our separate projects could prove far more effective than doing this from Earth and will speed up the whole process of bringing the project to fruition. 

A rocket to pick up the resources has been sent towards Mars. Every now and then more such rockets will arrive. If you have the materials to spare, please do!

<effect>A rocket requesting supplies for the Rubicon Station megaproject is headed towards Mars.
Translation:
目前我們盧比肯空間站的進度沒有達到預期，此空間站是用來強化我們太空探索能力的深空造船廠。我們友好地請求你捐獻金屬，以使建設工作順利進行下去。

我們做了估算，最後結論是從火星向各個單獨工程運送原材料比從地球運送有效得多，能整體加快工程實現的速度。

已向火星發射一枚用來裝載資源的火箭。這種火箭每隔一段時間就會到達。如果你有多餘資源，請分給我們一點！

<effect>為盧比肯空間站大型工程請求物資的火箭正朝火星飛來。

Text: See what resources we can spare.
Translation: 想辦法分一些資源給他們。

Text: Rede Goddenberry requests the export of materials for the construction of a farm hub on Ganymede.
Translation: 里德·戈登貝利請求向木衛三出口用於建造農場中心的資源。
Old Text: Rede Goddenberry requests the export of materials for the construction a farm hub on Ganymede.
Old Translation: 里德·戈登貝利請求向木衛三出口用於建造農場中心的資源。

Translation: 阿爾德林基地（獎勵：<MoonResearchReward>名科學家應徵者）

Text: Port Vesta (bonus: Reduced cost of Robotics Techs by <AsteriodReserachReward>%)
Translation: 灶神星港（獎勵：機器人技術花費降低<AsteriodReserachReward>%）
斯普林城（獎勵：<GanymedeResearchReward>名植物學家和<GanymedeResearchReward>名地質學家應徵者）
超越地球：選擇研究重點

Text: Our contributions towards the Beyond Earth project have been received and we have Rede Goddenberry’s everlasting thanks – on behalf of humanity’s future.
Translation: 我們對超越地球專案的貢獻已得到了回報，里德·戈登貝利代表人類的未來，對我們感激不盡。

Text:
We are given a choice to contribute research to a project of our liking next, partially advancing progress on any of the following:

Aldrin Base - a settlement on the Moon to mine the Lunar soil for Hydrogen 3.

Port Vesta - a mining hub situated in the Asteroid Belt.

Rubicon Station - a shipyard in deep space.

And finally, Spring City - a farming hub on water-rich Ganymede.
Translation:
接下來，我們得到了一次從以下四項工程中根據自己喜好選擇一項進行研究的機會，從而推動其進度：

阿爾德林基地 - 開採月球土壤中氚的定居點。

灶神星港 - 建於小行星帶中的採礦中心。

盧比肯空間站 - 深空造船廠。

最後，斯普林城 - 建於富含水資源的木衛三上的農場中心。

Text: Rockets to supply resources to Beyond Earth projects begin arriving. Each will partially advance a specific project.
Translation: 為超越地球工程提供資源的火箭開始抵達。每枚火箭能部分推進一項工程的進度。
阿爾德林基地（需求：高階資源）
灶神星港（需求：電子元件）
盧比肯空間站（需求：金屬）
超越地球：選擇交易火箭

Text: The Beyond Earth initiative needs more materials for the completion of its various projects.
Translation: 需要更多資源才能完成超越地球倡議中的各項工程。

Text:
We are being asked to pick a project we are willing to contribute resources to next. Each time we choose and send supplies towards a project it will advance a certain amount towards completion. The Beyond Earth projects are:

Aldrin Base - a Hydrogen 3 mining facility on the Moon tasked with powering up all of humanity’s activity in the entire Solar System.

Port Vesta - a mining operation in the Asteroid Belt guaranteeing humanity never wages war over resources again.

Rubicon Station - a shipyard situated in deep space tasked with considerably expanding humanity's space fleet construction capabilities.

Spring City - a farming settlement on Ganymede with the potential to feed humanity spread across an entire star system with capacity to spare.
Translation:
對方要求我們接下來按照自己的意願選擇一項工程並為其貢獻資源。我們每次選擇一項工程並為其送去物資時，都能使該工程的完工進度向前推進一定百分比。超越地球工程具體如下：

阿爾德林基地 - 建於月球的氚開採設施，任務是為人類在整個太陽系中的活動提供能源。

灶神星港 - 建於小行星帶的採礦設施，目的是確保人類永遠不會再為了資源而發動戰爭。

盧比肯空間站 - 處於深空之中的造船廠，任務是大幅提升人類建造太空艦隊的能力。

斯普林城 - 建於木衛三的農業定居點，目的是為整個太陽系的人類提供足夠的食物。

Text: This rocket is tasked with brining construction materials for the Hydrogen 3 mining base being built on the Moon - Aldrin Base.
Translation: 這枚火箭的任務是為在月球上開採氚的阿爾德林基地提供建築材料。
阿爾德林基地交易火箭
阿爾德林基地工程已有進展

Text: This rocket is headed out for the Asteroid Belt to bring resources for the Port Vesta mining facility.
Translation: 這枚火箭將飛往小行星帶為灶神星港採礦設施送去資源。
灶神星港工程已有進展

Text: This rocket is tasked with bringing construction materials for the completion of the Rubicon Station - a deep space shipyard.
Translation: 這枚火箭的任務是為深空造船廠盧比肯空間站送去建築材料。
盧比肯空間站交易火箭
盧比肯空間站工程已有進展

Text: This rocket is headed out for Jupiter's largest moon - Ganymede - where a project to create the breadbasket of humanity is under way.
Translation: 這枚火箭將飛往木星最大的衛星：木衛三。在那裡，一項為人類提供食物的工程正在建設中。
斯普林城工程已有進展
超越地球：阿爾德林基地完工

Text: Aldrin Base has been completed! The Hydrogen 3 mining facility is fully functional and has begun exporting energy to Earth.
Translation: 阿爾德林基地現已完工！氚開採設施已在順利運轉，並已開始向地球出口能源。

Text:
Earth celebrates a full independence of fossil fuel based energy sources and has a now virtually endless power supply coming from the Moon available for everyone. 

The technologies needed to transit power to far off posts like our colony is still a ways off, but we are given schematics to improve on our Fusion Reactors, based on the perfected design used at the Aldrin Base.

We have helped bring humanity closer to Rede Goddenberry’s utopic vision.

<effect>+<reg_param1>% Fusion Reactors Power production.
Translation:
地球終於完全脫離了對化石能源的依賴，現在人人都用上了從月球運來的幾乎取之不盡用之不竭的能源。可喜可賀。

將能量傳輸至遙遠前哨基地（比如我們的殖民地）所需的技術離實現還早，但我們得到了改良核融合反應爐的原理圖，改圖紙是參考阿爾德林基地已完善的反應爐設計繪製而成的。

在我們的幫助下，人類離里德·戈登貝利設想中的烏托邦又近了一步。

<effect>+<reg_param1>%核融合反應爐電力產量。
地球和以前已經完全不同了。

Text: The Moon Hydrogen 3 mining base - Aldrin Base - has been completed and Earth now enjoys limitless clean energy.
Translation: 在月球開採氚的阿爾德林基地現已完工，地球已經用上了無限的清潔能源。
超越地球：灶神星港完工

Text: An extraordinary feat has been completed – an unparalleled  milestone in humanity’s history!
Translation: 一項非凡的壯舉已經完成，這是人類歷史上無與倫比的里程碑！

Text:
Port Vesta has begun operations.

At the heart of the Asteroid Belt, the mining base is predicted to end poverty on Earth and bring an abundance of materials for all needs far and wide across the Solar System. 

The first shipments are already Earthbound, and while free and endless materials may await us in the future, for now we have been given the know-how to upgrade all of our extractors and make them more productive.

The megaproject envisioned by Rede Goddenberry has been completed.

<effect>+<reg_param1>% Extractor production.
Translation:
灶神星港已開始運轉。

人們預計這座位於小行星帶中央的採礦基地能消滅地球上的貧困，並為整個太陽系提供足夠的材料。

第一批貨物已在運往地球的途中。我們終有一天能用上無限的資源，但那是未來的事，現在我們得到了升級挖掘站並提高其產量的方案。

里德·戈登貝利設想中的大型工程現已完工。

<effect>+<reg_param1>%挖掘站產量。

Text: Humanity is conquering the Solar System.
Port Vesta, a mining base situated in the Asteroid Belt has been completed, virtually ensuring an abundance of resources for all of humanity.
Translation: 位於小行星帶的灶神星港現已完工，並確保全人類都能用上充足的資源。
超越地球：盧比肯空間站完工

Text: What was until recently pure science fiction has now become a reality. Rubicon Station has been built and is already receiving its first permanent residents.
Translation: 科幻成真了。盧比肯空間站現已完工，並已在接收第一批永久居民。

Text:
A shipyard built in deep space, the Station is expected to grow humanity’s space faring capacity a thousandfold.

The unique location of the base is also perfect for fringe research purposes, boosting humanity’s understanding of the universe.

This project may have never been completed without our help and guidance.

Rede Goddenberry’s vision has become more real than ever.

<effect>Reduced cost of Physics and Engineering Techs by <reg_param1>%.
Translation:
這座空間站是建於深空中的造船廠，人們預計它能令人類的太空探索能力提升上千倍。

這座基地所處的獨特位置也非常適合用來進行邊緣研究，並促進人類對宇宙的理解。

若沒有你的幫助與指導，此工程或許永遠無法完工。

里德·戈登貝利的願景已變得前所未有得真實。

<effect>物理學和工程學技術花費降低<reg_param1>%。

Text: The Solar System just became a smaller place.
Translation: 太陽系變得越來越小了。

Text: Rubicon Station has been built. Space vessel construction will never be the same.
Translation: 盧比肯空間站現已建成。太空船建造業將迎來騰飛。
超越地球：斯普林城完工

Text: From the idealistic vision of one eccentric old billionaire, to a farm world meant to feed all of humanity’s current and possible future needs – Spring City has now begun food production.
Translation: 為全人類提供目前和未來所需食物的農業星球原先只是一個古怪的老億萬富翁的理想，現在終於成真。斯普林城已經開始生產食物。

Text:
Many heated regions on Earth where hunger and strife are rampant will now be saved.

Our role in the realization of this project is far from overlooked and we have been sent new crops which are a extremely tough, healthy and nutritious to use on our own farms.

The Beyond Earth initiative brings humanity closer to a place where hunger and poverty will become nothing more than the woes of yesterday.

<effect>New Ganymede Rice hydroponic crop available.
Translation:
地球上很多饑荒橫行、衝突不斷的區域現在得救了。

人們並沒有忽視我們在實現此工程中扮演的角色，並給我們提供了生命力和抗病能力極強、營養極其豐富的新作物，供我們在自己的農場中種植。

超越地球倡議引領人類穩步走向不再有飢餓與貧窮的美好未來。

<effect>新的木衛三水稻水耕作物已開放。

Text: Can't wait to see what this does for the salad quality down here!
Translation: 好期待嚐嚐用新作物做出來的沙拉啊！

Text: Spring City - the breadbasket project of humanity - has been completed.
Translation: 人類產量工程 - 斯普林城現已完工。

Text: Beyond Earth: The Dream Lives On

A time of change is befalling the human race – a time of unity and hope for a brighter future that most couldn’t have imagined just a short few years ago. A massive push - by thousands of people and the best that two worlds had to offer - has become a reality. Our role will never be forgotten and the everlasting gratitude of a space faring humanity will always be a factor. And spearheading the whole affair - the vision of an eccentric old billionaire who did not live to see how this vision uplifted the entire human race to conquer the Solar System with no reasons for strife and competition. May he rest in peace and forever be remembered a visionary of Mankind. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: 人類即將迎來變革的時代。在這個時代裡，人類將團結一致、充滿希望地迎接更美好的未來。這是大多數人在短短幾年之前都無法想像的。 在兩顆星球上的精英以及成千上萬人的努力推動下，這個時代已成為現實。人類在探索太空時永遠不會忘記我們的貢獻，並永遠對我們心懷感激。 但首先我們不能忘記的是：那個古怪的老億萬富翁沒能在有生之年看到自己的願景成真。就是在他的引領之下，人類才能在征服太陽系的過程中齊心協力而非互相競爭。 願他安息，人類將永遠銘記他的遠見卓識。 獲得新技術，。

Text: Rede Goddenberry will never be forgotten.
Translation: 人類將永遠銘記里德·戈登貝利。

Text: Although Rede Goddenberry did not live to see his vision become a reality, his legacy will forever live on for all of humanity to prosper from.
Translation: 雖然里德·戈登貝利有生之年沒能看到自己的願景成真，但全人類都會繼承他的遺志並走向繁榮。

Text: Beyond Earth: In Time to Witness
The Beyond Earth initiative has been deemed a success. Already the efforts of this massive endeavor are bearing fruit.
Translation: 超越地球倡議圓滿成功。這一巨大的工程現已結出果實。

Text: A time of change is befalling the human race - a time of unity and hope for a brighter future that most couldn’t have imagined just a short few years ago. A massive push - by thousands of people and the best that two worlds had to offer - has become a reality. Our role will never be forgotten and the everlasting gratitude of a space faring humanity will always be a factor. And spearheading the whole affair, the vision of an eccentric old billionaire who wished to see the bright future of his kind before his passing. History will remember Rede Goddenbarry a visionary of Mankind. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: 人類即將迎來變革的時代。在這個時代裡，人類將團結一致、充滿希望地迎接更美好的未來。這是大多數人在短短幾年之前都無法想像的。 在兩顆星球上的精英以及成千上萬人的努力推動下，這個時代已成為現實。人類在探索太空時永遠不會忘記我們的貢獻，並永遠對我們心懷感激。 但首先我們不能忘記的是：那個想為人類開創美好未來的古怪的老億萬富翁在有生之年看到了自己的願景成真。 人類歷史將永遠銘記里德·戈登貝利這一偉大的遠見卓識者。 獲得新技術，。

Text: A new era for humanity has dawned!
Rede Goddenberry's dream becomes reality with him still alive to witness it unfolding.
Translation: 里德·戈登貝利在有生之年看到了自己的夢想成真。
超越地球：里德奄奄一息。

Text: We have received grave news from Earth. It seems Rede Goddenberry has fallen ill and doesn’t have much time left.
Translation: 地球傳來噩耗。據稱，里德·戈登貝利身患重病，已時日無多。

Text:
The billionaire has sent a special request out to us:

“It seems I can no longer hide the fact that I am and have been dying in these recent months. Although this may explain my push for haste in the completion of the Beyond Earth initiative to some, the reality is that it's badly needed with or without my condition in mind.

People are suffering and dying on Earth - in war, from diseases, from malnutrition. All of this is not necessary and my vision will remedy all of it, once complete.

So I convey this message to you, whom I have come to see as my closest partners in this endeavor: Please redouble your efforts, for it would please a dying old man greatly to see the plan bearing fruit before his death. But if not to warm my old heart, do it because you believe in what the initiative represents as I know you do.“
Translation:
這位億萬富翁向我們提出了特別請求：

“看來我已經無法隱瞞我這幾個月離死亡越來越近的事實。雖然有些人會將其視為我催促儘快完成超越地球倡議的理由，但事實是不管我身體狀況如何，人類都急需這一倡議。

地球上，無數人正因戰爭、疾病和營養不良而受苦甚至喪命。這些苦難都是可以避免的，而只要我的願景成真，這些苦難就會消失。

因此我向你發來這則消息，因為我視你為這項工程中最親密的合作伙伴：請再加把勁，我這個奄奄一息的老頭如果能活著看到工程開花結果，那我死也瞑目了。就算不為了了卻我一樁心事，也為了造福全人類。我看得出來，你內心深處對這個工程代表的理念深信不疑。”

Text: I am at loss for words.
Rede Goddenberry reveals he is ill and dying.
Translation: 里德·戈登貝利透露他已身患重病且奄奄一息。

Text: Beyond Earth: Rede Goddenberry has passed away
Translation: 超越地球：里德·戈登貝利去世

Text: Today we received news of Rede Goddenberry’s passing. We are all deeply saddened by this loss.
Translation: 今天我們得到了里德·戈登貝利去世的消息。他的去世令我們悲痛萬分。

Text:
But we are still inspired by his vision - a vision where humanity travels free amidst the worlds of a unified Solar System. 

Although Goddenberry’s death will dissuade many of his current partners to see the completion of the Beyond Earth initiative, we just may bring the plan to full or at least partial realization before other parties quit their involvement.
Translation:
但他的願景仍鼓舞著我們。太陽系的人類終將像他展望的那樣團結在一起，自由地進行星際旅行。

儘管戈登貝利的去世會導致他現有的不少合作伙伴喪失完成超越地球倡議的信心，但我們在其他各方退出之前，或許能完全或至少部分實現這一計劃。

Text: Beyond Earth: The Dream is Dead
Translation: 超越地球：夢想終成一場空

Text: Following Rede Goddenberry’s death, all of his former partners from Beyond Earth have since abandoned the initiative.
Translation: 里德·戈登貝利去世後，他超越地球倡議的所有原合作伙伴都拋棄了這一倡議。

Text:
We have failed to persuade them without the uniting effect of his utopic vision spearheaded by himself alone. 

The different gains in space exploration and asteroid mining will not simply disappear but are being bought off and pushed towards partial completion by various Earth-based corporations that will exploit them for personal profit and show no signs of desire to contribute to what was Rede Goddenberry’s vision of a united humanity.

In the end, history will remember him as an old eccentric billionaire who tried to swim upstream for humanity’s sake but ended up solidifying the rule of massive corporations that are more interested in profits than in an idealistic future.
Translation:
我們沒能說服他們，因為我們無法像他一樣靠美好未來的願景產生強大凝聚力。

太空探索和小行星採礦獲得的各種收益不會憑空消失，而是會被地球上的各種公司買下並推動部分完成，以便從中謀取私利，而這些公司全然沒有為里德·戈登貝利的人類大一統的願景做貢獻的意願。

最後，歷史會對他做以下陳述：這名性情古怪的億萬富翁晚年為了全人類的福祉逆流而上，但最後只是鞏固了大集團的統治。比起創造理想中的未來，這些大集團對盈利更感興趣。

Text: Rede Goddenberry's plan falls apart as previous partners leave the initiative after his passing.
Translation: 里德·戈登貝利去世後，原合作伙伴紛紛撤走，他的計劃成為了泡影。

Text: There was a terrible accident at the Port Vesta project site.
Translation: 灶神星港工程地點發生了可怕的事故。

Text:
A strong solar flare erupted without a sufficient head warning. There are 23 confirmed casualties.

The solar flare erupted during a short window of vulnerability, when Port Vesta had no operational means of shielding against such an event. If it had happened just a bit later, the defenses would've been operational.

Sadly the damage is massive in scale. The project suffered a major setback.
Translation:
太陽閃焰大爆發，但沒人給該地點發出足以引起重視的警報。已確認有23人傷亡。

這次太陽閃焰爆發時，灶神星港剛好處於無法抵禦這種事件的短暫脆弱期。如果爆發得稍晚一些，防禦系統就能恢復正常了。

很遺憾，損失非常慘重。工程遭受了重大挫折。

Text: A tragedy indeed, but we will overcome this setback.
Translation: 這的確是一場悲劇，但我們會重振旗鼓。

Text: News of sabotage at the Aldrin Base mining facility on the Moon has just been made public. Luckily, there are no fatalities.
Translation: 公眾剛剛得知了有人蓄意破壞阿爾德林基地採礦設施的消息。幸運的是無人身亡。

Text:
The project has suffered a major setback. Below is Mr Goddenberry’s statement:

“What the Beyond Earth initiative is striving to ultimately achieve is change - change that will make inter-human rivalry a thing of the past. 

As with all change, there will be resistance. There are those who prosper from wars, from suffering. And they see a united humanity as a threat, for they will be left behind.

To them I have to say: the world is moving on. Try as you might, you have only slowed down an irreversible process.”
Translation:
工程遭受了重大挫折。以下是戈登貝利先生的宣告：

“超越地球倡議努力實現的最終目標是變革，令人類內鬥成為過去的變革。

一切變革都會遇到阻力。戰爭與痛苦能讓有些人獲利。他們將人類統一視為威脅，因為那會導致他們被拋棄。

對這些人，我想說的是：世界在不斷進步。你們興風作浪只不過是苟延殘喘，進步的大潮終將席捲一切。”

Text: A setback. We will overcome it!
Translation: 這是一次挫折。我們一定能克服它！

Old Text: Analyse <param1> map Anomalies
Old Translation: 分析<param1>處地圖異象

Translation: 擁有一名火星出生的殖民地居民
在火星上擁有<param1>位殖民地居民

Text: Have <param1> Colonists with all needs above <param2>
Translation: 擁有<param1>位所有需求高於<param2>的殖民地居民
擁有<param1>位有<param2>特性的殖民地居民

Text: Construct a Dome by the end of Sol <param1>
Translation: 在太陽日<param1>之前建造一座穹頂

Text: Convert <param1> Waste Rock to useful materials
Translation: 將<param1>單位礦渣轉化為有用材料
在太陽日<param1>之前耗盡<param2>處地下資源點

Text: Have a Dome with more than <param1> Colonists
Translation: 擁有一座殖民地居民人數高於<param1>的穹頂
擁有<param1>座建有尖塔的穹頂

Text: Export <param1> Rare Metals by the end of Sol <param2>
Translation: 在太陽日<param1>前出口<param2>稀有金屬
擁有<param1>座工作效率為<param2>的挖掘站
擁有<param1>名舒適度為<param2>的創始者

Text: Have a Dome connected to <param1> other Domes
Translation: 擁有一座與<param1>座其他穹頂相連的穹頂

Text: Land a Colonist on Mars by Sol <param1>
Translation: 在太陽日<param1>之前令一位殖民地居民登陸火星
擁有<param1>位火星出生的殖民地居民
擁有<param1>位火星出生的專家

Text: Have <param1> Martianborn Colonists by the end of Sol <param2>
Translation: 在<param2>太陽日之前，擁有<param1>位火星出生的殖民地居民

Text: Build a Machine Parts Factory, a Polymer Factory and an Electronics Factory
Translation: 建造一座機械零件工廠、一座聚合物工廠和一座電子元件工廠
從一處地下資源點採集<param1><param2>

Text: Refuel a rocket the same Sol it lands
Translation: 在一枚火箭著陸當天為其補充好燃料
擁有<param1>座正常運轉的穹頂

Text: This in a golden opportunity for us to attract more applicants to join our cause.
Translation: 這是我們吸引更多應徵者加入我們事業的絕佳機會。

Text: Our efforts and triumphs on Mars have not gone unnoticed back on Earth. A hit movie based on real events from the early days of the Martian colony just broke the all time box office record.
Translation: 我們在火星上的努力與勝利也受到了地球的關注。一部根據火星殖民地初期真實事件改編的大片剛剛成為了有史以來票房最高的電影。

Text: Attract as many new applicants as possible.
Translation: 吸引儘可能多的應徵者
新增<specialists_applicants>位擁有各種專長的應徵者

Text: adds a Genius, a Celebrity and a Guru applicant
Translation: 新增一位天才、一位名人和一位導師應徵者

Text: We don't need more applicants, we will rely on our own Martianborn!
Translation: 我們不需要更多應徵者，我們將依賴自己的火星之子！
所有火星之子士氣提升

Text:
All Drone Hubs have ceased functioning! All Shuttle Hubs have malfunctioned! <funding(amount_1)> vanish from the colony's accounts in a blink of an eye and a Rocket is about to lift off without permission.

Amidst the chaos, a video message from a Genius Renegade force plays itself around the colony:

"So long, suckers! I suggest you get busy and bring your systems back online instead of devising ways to stop me. Trust me, you won't think of anything I haven't before you. Damn, I hate this place!"
Translation:
所有無人機中心失靈！所有穿梭機中心發生故障！眨眼之間，<funding(amount_1)>就從我們賬上消失了，同時一枚火箭在未經許可的情況下即將升空。

在混亂之中，殖民地各處強制播放著一段影像。

“拜拜咯，傻鳥們！我建議你趕緊著手修復系統，而不是想方設法阻止我。你們能想到的我早就想到了。我恨死這個地方了！”

Text: Alerts light up across the entire board. Systems fail across the colony.
Translation: 到處都亮起了警報燈。殖民地系統全線癱瘓。

Text: Force lock the controls of the Rocket remotely.
Try to reason with them and promise change.
Translation: 設法與其溝通並承諾做出改變。

Text: Threaten to write an op-ed that shapes <DisplayName> as a lowly villain.
Translation: 威脅說要釋出評論，將<DisplayName>描述成一個無恥惡徒。

Text: Invent a competent lie about a Meteor Storm that will hamper the Rocket take-off.
Translation: 編造有說服力的謊言稱能阻礙火箭升空的隕石風暴即將來襲。

Text: Contact Earth authorities and delegate the issue to them.
Translation: 聯絡地球當局，委託他們解決此問題。

Text: Try to cause a Rocket malfunction remotely.
Translation: 設法遠端製造火箭故障。

Text: Warn about possible dire consequences to Earth Ecology if the Rocket gets there.
Translation: 警告對方說火箭如果抵達地球，就可能對地球生態產生非常嚴重的後果。

Text: Tell <DisplayName> you have seen their medical records and they are unfit for a space trip at this time.
Translation: 告訴<DisplayName>說你看過他們的醫療報告，目前他們不適合進行太空旅行。

Text: Threaten some friends of <DisplayName> on Mars and Earth.
Translation: 威脅<DisplayName>在火星和地球上的一些朋友。

Text: Let them go and don't risk further damage.
Translation: 放他們走以避免進一步損失。

Text:
"You think I haven't taken all the necessary precautions? You think I've left things to chance? Boy, this hurts!

I intended to leave you some cash to spare but I think this insult deserves a response."

<effect>Further <funding(further_penalty)> was taken out of our accounts.
Translation:
“你以為我沒有採取一切必要的預防措施嗎？你以為我抱過僥倖心理嗎？老天，這太傷我自尊了！

我本想給你留幾個錢，但你如此羞辱我，我咽不下這口氣。”

<effect>又有<funding(further_penalty)>從我們的賬上轉走了。

Text: The Genius Renegade just laughs and adds:
Translation: 天才叛徒笑著繼續說道：

Text:
Damn... I... I did not think of this. Actually, I did, I just thought that... I give up. I'll behave."

<effect>Stolen funding was refunded.
Translation:
見鬼……我……沒想到你會用這招。其實我想到了，我只是以為……我投降。我會乖乖聽話的。”

<effect>效果：被盜的資金已被歸還。

Old Text: "Er...say what now?"
Old Translation: “呃……你說啥？”

Text:
MOXIEs shut down during Dust Storms to prevent their dust filter from jamming up and damaging the unit. However, the filter on this one is completely clogged.

Oxygen production is vital for the colony but the filter repair will take <duration> hours. What should we do?
Translation:
沙塵暴期間，我們關閉氧氣生成裝置以防止其濾塵器被阻塞，從而導致裝置受損。不過這臺裝置的濾塵器被完全阻塞了。

氧氣生產對殖民地至關重要，但修復濾塵器需要<duration>小時。怎麼辦？

Text: You tap the red light on the terminal with your finger. It should have turned green when the Dust Storm dissipated. Looks like a MOXIE unit is out of order.
Translation: 你用手指輕按終端機上的紅燈。它本該在沙塵暴結束時變綠。看來一臺氧氣生成裝置出問題了。

Text: the MOXIE will start working immediately but will request maintenance more often
Translation: 氧氣生成裝置將立刻開始運轉，但需要更頻繁的維護
Old Text: the MOXIE will start to work immediately but will request maintenance more often
Old Translation: 氧氣生成裝置將立刻開始運轉，但需要更頻繁的維護

Text: We can wait for the repairs.
Translation: 我們可以等到修理完畢。

Text: MOXIE will not work for <duration> hours
Translation: 氧氣生成裝置將停止工作<duration>小時

Text: We can make a new filter.
Translation: 我們可以製造新濾塵器。
氧氣生成裝置將需要<polymers(maintenance)>緊急維護

Text:
MOXIEs use a form of electrolysis to produce Oxygen from carbon dioxide. However, the process requires relatively high (for Mars) temperatures.

It looks like a failure in one of our MOXIE units has highlighted a design flaw in the technology. We have to find a solution that works for all MOXIEs.
Translation:
氧氣生成裝置用一種電解作用從二氧化碳中生產出氧氣。不過，此過程需要（對火星而言）相當高的溫度。

似乎我們一臺氧氣生成裝置的故障揭示出了此技術設計上的缺陷。我們得想出適用於所有氧氣生成裝置的解決方案。

Text: As the frost outside settles, an urgent maintenance report flashes on your terminal. There’s a problem with a MOXIE unit.
Translation: 外面開始結霜，有一條緊急維護報告從你的終端機上閃過。一臺氧氣生成裝置出了問題。
Old Text: As the frost outside settles an urgent maintenance report flashes on your terminal. There’s a problem with a MOXIE unit.
Old Translation: 外面開始結霜，有一條緊急維護報告從你的終端機上閃過。一臺氧氣生成裝置出了問題。

Translation: 氧氣生成裝置電力消耗提升<power(increased_consumption)>

Text: Improve the insulation of the MOXIEs.
Translation: 改良氧氣生成裝置的隔熱。

Text: <polymers(insulation)> extra construction cost for MOXIEs; existing MOXIEs will request <polymers(insulation)> maintenance
Translation: 氧氣生成裝置造價提高<polymers(insulation)>；現有氧氣生成裝置將需要<polymers(insulation)>維護
Old Text: <polymers(insulation)> extra construction cost for MOXIEs; Existing MOXIEs will request <polymers(insulation)> maintenance
Old Translation: 氧氣生成裝置造價提高<polymers(insulation)>；現有氧氣生成裝置將需要<polymers(insulation)>維護

Text: Leave the MOXIEs as they are.
Translation: 不對氧氣生成裝置採取任何措施。

Text: MOXIEs will require maintenance more often
Translation: 氧氣生成裝置將需要更頻繁的維護

Text: Once again, a MOXIE unit has shut down and stopped producing Oxygen. Drones report that many of the internal parts of the MOXIE have suffered structural damage much earlier than expected.
Translation: 一臺氧氣生成裝置又失靈且不再產生氧氣了。無人機報告指出該氧氣生成裝置很多內部零件的結構受損，而這種情況我們原本預計要到很久之後才會出現。

Text: A yellow light starts flashing on your terminal. Sure enough it is one of those damned MOXIE units again.
Translation: 你終端機上的黃燈開始閃爍。肯定又有氧氣生成裝置受損了。

Text: MOXIE cost increased by <metals(cost_increase)>, existing MOXIEs will need emergency maintenance
Translation: 氧氣生成裝置造價提高<metals(cost_increase)>，現有氧氣生成裝置將需要緊急維護

Text: Reduce the pressure in the system.
Keep repairing the MOXIEs as problems occur.
Translation: 出問題時不停修復氧氣生成裝置。
氧氣生成裝置維護永久提升<metals(increased_maintenance)>

Text:
The new MOXIE 2.0 design is finally ready and we have updated all current MOXIEs to the new specs. MOXIE 2.0 also has increased air production.

<effect>All negative effects on MOXIEs have been removed.
Translation:
全新的氧氣生成裝置2.0終於設計完成，我們根據新規格升級了所有現有的氧氣生成裝置。氧氣生成裝置2.0還提高了空氣產量。

<effect>已移除氧氣生成裝置的一切負面效果。

Text:
The core principle of extracting Oxygen from Martian CO2 is sound. The current implementation of the technology leaves a lot to be desired. Our Scientists believe that with all the information we have learned so far we can design a better MOXIE.

<effect>”MOXIE 2.0” technology is now available for research.
Translation:
從火星的二氧化碳中開採出氧氣這一核心原則是可行的。目前正在使用的技術還有諸多不足之處。我們的科學家們相信我們能用目前瞭解到的資訊設計出更好的氧氣生成裝置。

<effect>“氧氣生成裝置2.0”技術現已可供研究。

Text: The expert report on the failing MOXIEs is almost 300 pages long, finding multiple issues with their design.
Translation: 專家提交的氧氣生成裝置失靈報告有將近300頁，報告中指出了裝置設計上存在的多處問題。

Text: We seem to be missing some parts for our <DisplayName> prefab. Also there seem to be parts that don’t fit anywhere and the instructions are no help at all.
Translation: 我們的<DisplayName>預製件似乎缺少了一些零件。例外，還存在一些哪裡都裝不上的零件，而說明書一點忙也幫不上。

Text: The drone attempts to put the square part into the round hole for the third consecutive time, determined to find a solution.
Translation: 這臺無人機已經是第三次試圖將方形零件插入圓形插孔了，它似乎不達目的不罷休。

Text: Let’s try to jury rig something…
chance to fix the building or lose the drone
Translation: 有機率修好建築或失去無人機

Text:
Taking manual control over the drone, we were able to put together the building but there were some places we had to improvise.

<effect>The <DisplayName> has been constructed but it will require additional maintenance every time the building malfunctions.
Translation:
我們手動操控無人機組裝好了建築，但有些部分我們不得不臨時拼湊。

<effect><DisplayName>已建造完成，但每次建築物發生故障，都需要額外維護。

Text: Well we had to use some of the parts from the drone itself but we were able to assemble the <DisplayName> prefab.
Translation: 我們不得不用上了無人機的一些零件，但我們組裝好了<DisplayName>預製件。

Text:
Taking manual control over the drone, we were able to assemble the <DisplayName> prefab but we are left with a lot of spare parts. Come to think of it I believe we can make another <DisplayName> with them.

<effect>The <DisplayName> has been constructed and we’ve gained another <DisplayName> prefab.
Translation:
我們手動操縱無人機組裝好了<DisplayName>預製件，但還剩下不少零件。思考片刻後，我認為可以用這些零件再造一個<DisplayName>。

<effect><DisplayName>已建造完成，我們還獲得了一個<DisplayName>預製件。

Text:
Ah, I see what the problem is. This is not a prefab for <DisplayName> - it’s a prefab for an Electronics Factory.

<effect>Construction of <DisplayName> has been canceled. A prefab for an Electronics Factory has been added.
Translation:
啊，我知道問題出在哪裡了。這不是<DisplayName>的預製件，而是電子元件工廠的預製件。

<effect>已取消建造<DisplayName>。已獲得一個電子元件工廠的預製件。

Text:
Our <DisplayName> Rocket seems to have suffered a malfunction in her fuel tank. There are worries that the Rocket won’t survive the landing sequence.

If the Rocket lands successfully we can fix the malfunction with some polymers.
Translation:
我們<DisplayName>火箭的燃料箱似乎發生了故障。有人擔心火箭無法安全著陸。

如果火箭成功著陸，我們就能用聚合物修好故障。

Text: The satellite camera shows the rocket you are trying to land in standard Mars orbit. A small jet of liquid is gushing out from the side.
Translation: 衛星相機顯示你想要著陸的火箭正在火星標準軌道上。一小股液體正從一側噴出。
Old Text: The satellite camera shows the rocket in standard Mars orbit. A small stream of liquid is gushing out from the side.
Old Translation: 衛星相機顯示火箭正在火星標準軌道上。一小股液體正從一側湧出。

Text: Attempt the landing with full payload.
Translation: 嘗試在滿載貨物的狀態下著陸。
Old Text: Attempt a landing with full cargo
Old Translation: 嘗試讓其滿載貨物著陸

Text: chance that the rocket will explode
Unfortunately the malfunction affected our rocket’s landing trajectory and threw her off course resulting in a crash landing. We have lost both the rocket and her cargo.
Translation: 很不幸，故障影響了火箭的著陸軌跡並使其偏離路線，最終墜毀。我們失去了火箭以及上面的貨物。

Old Text: Jettison cargo then attempt a landing
Old Translation: 丟棄貨物並嘗試著陸

Text: safe landing but cargo is lost
Translation: 可安全著陸，但會失去貨物

Text: Activate manual control, I can land this one safely.
Translation: 啟動手動控制，我們能讓它安全著陸。
Old Text: I believe we can land this one safely
Old Translation: 我相信我們可以令火箭安全著陸

Text: rocket will land safely with cargo
Translation: 火箭將載著貨物安全著陸

Text: Following the hype the game has generated, we have been approached by a major video game publisher with an offer to buy out the rights for the game and sell it commercially.
Translation: 這款遊戲天花亂墜的宣傳之後，一家大型遊戲發行商找上了我們，表示願意買下游戲的版權並將其進行商業銷售。

Text: A Battle Royale VR game, created solely for recreational purposes by our VR Workshop team, has been leaked to Earth and is quickly becoming a smashing hit.
Translation: 我們的虛擬現實工坊團隊純粹為了娛樂目的而開發出的虛擬現實大逃殺遊戲在地球上偷跑了，很快就大獲成功。

Text: Sounds like a no-brainer - sell them the rights and get royalties every <sols(royalty_period)> Sols for the next <sols(royalty_duration)> Sols.
Translation: 這還用考慮嗎？把版權賣給他們，在接下來的<sols(royalty_duration)>個太陽日裡，每<sols(royalty_period)>太陽日獲得版稅。

Text: The game was not made with profit in mind. We should formally release it for free.
Translation: 我們開發這款遊戲並不是為了賺錢。我們應該將其以免費遊戲的形式正式發售。

Text: gain <applicants> Gamer applicants, Gamer colonists get large Morale boost
Translation: 獲得<applicants>名遊戲玩家應徵者，殖民地居民中的遊戲玩家士氣大幅提升
我們的遊戲我們自己發行！

Text: lump sum in profits now and larger royalties every <sols(royalty_period)> Sols for the next <sols(royalty_duration)> Sols
Translation: 一次性獲得利潤，並在接下來的<sols(royalty_duration)>個太陽日裡，每<sols(royalty_period)>太陽日獲得更多版稅

Text:
Perhaps it all started on a slow news days, perhaps journalists on Earth are just bitter, but various prominent news networks all over the globe have been openly criticizing our mission and questioning every aspect of it – from its economic feasibility to its necessity for the future of the human race.

Our sponsor is deflecting blows left and right and has formally requested that we break our silence and hold a press conference.
Translation:
或許那天實在沒什麼新聞可以報導，或許地球上的記者天生刻薄，全球各大新聞網路公開批評我們的任務，並質疑任務的每個方面：從經濟上的可行性到它對人類的未來是否必不可少。

我們的贊助者幫我們儘可能地擋子彈，並正式要求我們打破沉默，召開記者會。

Text: Our colony has come under media fire by a global news conglomerate.
Translation: 一家國際新聞企業把我們的殖民地變成了媒體狂轟濫炸的目標。

Text: Yes, there are challenges to overcome, but humanity is ready for the ultimate test.
Translation: 的確有挑戰需要克服，但人類已經準備好接收最終的考驗。

Text: Your faith can move mountains and your doubt can create them.
Translation: 你們的信念能創造奇蹟，而你們的懷疑只會扼殺奇蹟。

Text: As a great man once said, humans need to be a multiplanetary species.
Translation: 一位偉人曾說過，人類需要成為跨星球物種。

Text: We would not grace them with a reply.

People whisper with fear about an applicant who has been subjected to the Space Rehabilitation treatment and suffered a terrible fate, losing all memories and personality traits! Now the Applicants have started resigning from the program, which threatens our public face on Earth.

It is all a fabrication, but how can we convince the applicants?
Translation:
人們驚恐地悄悄談論著一名參與太空康復計劃但下場很慘的應徵者的事，據說此人喪失了所有記憶和特性！現在應徵者開始退出計劃，這威脅到了我們在地球上的形象。

這種事完全子虛烏有，但我們如何令應徵者們相信呢？

Text: A dark rumor is spreading among the applicants who want to join our Colony on Mars.
Translation: 有人正在想要加入我們火星殖民地的應徵者隊伍裡散佈可怕的謠言。

Text: no Applicants leave the Applicants Pool, all Colonists lose <morale_lost> Morale for <sols(morale_down_sols)> Sols
Translation: 無應徵者離開應徵者池，所有殖民地居民士氣下降<morale_lost>，持續<sols(morale_down_sols)>個太陽日

Text: <applicants_lost> will leave but <paid_applicants> Applicants with Perks join the Applicants Pool
Translation: <applicants_lost>將離開，但<paid_applicants>名擁有特長的應徵者將加入應徵者池。

Text: <applicants_lost> will leave but <idiots_gained> Applicants with Flaws will join the Applicants Pool
Translation: <applicants_lost>將離開，但<idiots_gained>名擁有缺陷的應徵者將加入應徵者池。

Text: <effect><DisplayName> has lost all traits and has gained the Perks Composed, Fit and Sexy.
Translation: <effect><DisplayName>失去了所有特性並獲得了冷靜沉著、健壯和性感尤物特長。

Text: A Colonist has somehow been completely changed overnight! Not just their personality, but also their looks and overall health!
Translation: 一位殖民地居民不知為何一夜之間彷彿變了一個人！此人不僅性格大變，連外貌和整體健康狀況都完全不同了！

Text: Get the research team working on this!
Translation: 把研究團隊找來查明情況！

Text: Acting quickly, you order the research team to examine the still confused Colonist.
Translation: 你立刻命令研究團隊為這名依然不知所措的殖民地居民做檢查。

Text: <effect>Research the new tech “Anomalous Genome Resequencing” to discover the truth behind the rapid change of <DisplayName>.
Translation: <effect>研究新技術“異常基因重排”以查明<DisplayName>突然變化的真正原因。

Text: I will research the case myself.
Acting quickly, you perform some unconventional tests on the still-confused Colonist.
Translation: 你迅速對這位依然不知所措的殖民地居民進行了一些非傳統的測試。

Text: <effect>Research the new tech “Anomalous Genome Resequencing” to discover the truth behind the rapid change of <DisplayName>. The new tech has gained 50% progress.
Translation: <effect>研究新技術“異常基因重排”以查明<DisplayName>突然變化的真正原因。新技術進度推進了50%。

Text:
They have mutated and have changed their behavior, slowly melding our Colonists into a species of homogenous individuals.

Our research team has discovered the kill-switch mechanism to stop this. What are your orders?
Translation:
此人肯定發生了變異，導致其行為發生了變化，並將我們的殖民地居民逐漸融合為一個同源個體的種族。

我們的研究團隊發現了能立刻阻止此過程的開關機制。你的命令是？

Text: We have discovered the reason behind the changes that affected our Colonist. Our Construction Nanites!
Translation: 我們發現了殖民地居民發生變化的原因。是我們的建築奈米機器人搞的鬼！

Text: Probably this is for the better...
<changed_amount> Colonists will be re-written before stopping the effects
Translation: 在效果停止之前，<changed_amount>位殖民地居民的一切都將被改寫。

Text: We still have the key to stopping this before the Colonists begin to suspect a sinister plan on our side.
Translation: 我們仍能停下這一切，不然殖民地居民們恐怕很快就會開始懷疑是不是我們在搞陰謀。

Text: The effects of the mutated nanites have become too widespread and people begin to worry.
Translation: 變異奈米機器人已經影響了太多人，人們開始擔憂起來。

Text: the effect continue, all colonists lose <morale_down> for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
Translation: 效果繼續，所有殖民地居民失去<morale_down>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日

Text: I will give a motivational speech about the future of humankind.
Translation: 我會就人類的未來發表鼓舞人心的演說。

Text:
Again, they have lost all of their personality and have become more or less the same perfect individual.

<effect><changed_colonists> Colonists have lost their traits and have gained the Perks Composed, Fit and Sexy.
Translation:
他們又一次失去了所有個性，或多或少地變成了同一個完美的個體。

<effect><changed_colonists>殖民地居民失去了特性，並獲得了冷靜沉著、健壯和性感尤物特長。

Text: More Colonists have been completely re-written!
Translation: 更多殖民地居民被完全改寫了！

Text:
With the downpour of new scientific data from Mars, our team made an unheard breakthrough in the field.

<effect>A new advanced technology has been revealed in the chosen field. The new technology costs less to research.
Translation:
由於火星提供了海量的全新科研資料，我們的團隊在相關領域獲得了前所未有的突破性進展。

<effect>選定領域的某項尖端技術將會解鎖。研究該尖端技術所需的研究點數降低。

Text: Our scientific team on Earth has just made a daunting discovery!
Translation: 我們在地球上的科研團隊剛剛有了劃時代的發現！

Text:
The ink has almost completely vanished, but with extra effort and creativity you manage to press through.

In the distant 1973 an isolated country made a secret landing on Mars in preparation for further colonization of the entire Solar system!

Led personally by the Great Leader Himself, their tireless engineers created many wonders of architecture and creativity. This deed was made possible only by the eternal wisdom and guidance of the Great Leader!
Translation:
雖然墨水的字跡幾乎完全消失了，但在你的努力之下，你還是成功地破解了檔案內容。

早在1973年，某個孤立的國家就早已祕密地登陸火星，為整個太陽系的殖民工作進行準備。

在偉大領袖的親自帶領之下，他們不知疲倦的工程師們積極發揮創造力，建造了很多建築學上的奇蹟。只有在偉大領袖永恆智慧的指導之下，他們才能實現這樣的壯舉！

Text: The Other Side of the Sun
While sifting through the red dust, our Drones discovered the remains of an old concrete bunker. The treasure inside is a folder of old documents.
Translation: 我們的無人機在火星上探索時，發現了一座古老混凝土地堡的殘骸。地堡裡儲存著重要的寶藏 - 一個裝滿舊檔案的資料夾。

Text: gain <rechargestations> Recharge Station prefabs, reveals techs in the Robotics tree
Translation: 獲得<rechargestations>個充電站預製件，解鎖機器人相關技術
Old Text: gain <rechargestations> Recharge Station prefabs, reveals techs in the Robotics tree)
Old Translation: 獲得<rechargestations>個充電站預製件，解鎖機器人相關技術

Text: gain <tanks> Water Tower and <tanks> Oxygen Tank prefabs, reveals tech in the Engineering tree
Translation: 獲得<tanks>個水塔與<tanks>個氧氣罐預製件，解鎖工程相關技術

Text: gain <statuesandgardens> Statue prefabs, reveals tech in the Social tree
Translation: 獲得<statuesandgardens>個雕像預製件，解鎖社交相關技術

Text:
The ink has almost completely vanished, but with extra effort and creativity you manage to press through.

In the distant 1973 an isolated country made a secret landing on Mars in preparation for further colonization of the entire Solar system!

Under the watchful supervision of the Great Leader Himself, their genius scientists have discovered many marvels of the universe. They helped the Glorious Leader hold the atom in His hands and watched in awe as He conversed with the Universe itself about its nature, purpose and origin.
Translation:
雖然墨水的字跡幾乎完全消失了，但在你的努力之下，你還是成功地破解了檔案內容。

早在1973年，某個孤立的國家就早已祕密地登陸火星，為整個太陽系的殖民工作進行準備。

在偉大領袖的親自監督之下，不知疲倦的天才科學家們積極發揮創造力，發現了許多宇宙中的奇蹟。在他們的幫助下，偉大領袖把原子握在手中。在他們敬畏的眼神之中，偉大領袖與宇宙本身進行會談，討論宇宙的性質、目的與起源。

Text: The Dark Side of the Sun
While sifting through the red dust, your Drones discover the remains of an old concrete bunker. The treasure inside is a folder of old documents.
Translation: 我們的無人機在火星上探索時，發現了一座古老混凝土地堡的殘骸。地堡裡儲存著重要的寶藏 - 一個裝滿舊檔案的資料夾。
Old Text: While sifting through the red dust, your Drones discover the remains of an old concrete bunker.
Old Translation: 我們的無人機在火星上探索時，發現了一座古老混凝土地堡的殘骸。

Text: reveals technologies in the Biotech tree; gain <research(smallrp)> Sponsor research
Translation: 解鎖生物技術相關技術，獲得<research(smallrp)>贊助者研究點數

Text: reveals technologies in the Physics tree; gain <research(smallrp)> Sponsor research
Translation: 解鎖物理學相關技術，獲得<research(smallrp)>贊助者研究點數

Text: It will carry an RC Transport rover on board, ready to be used immediately on arrival. Just give the call, Commander!
Translation: 補給艙內會裝有一輛遙控運輸車，只要到了火星就可以立刻使用。就等你一聲令下了，指揮官！

Text: The Mission HQ on Earth has decided to boost the expansion capabilities of the colony by providing a priority Supply Pod.
Translation: 地球總部決定向我們提供一座補給艙，幫助我們的殖民地進行快速擴張。

Text: Sure, we can use a new Transport!
Translation: 太好了，我們需要新的運輸工具！
我更希望得到財務方面的援助。

Text: Why not improve the Transport technology instead?
the tech Transport Optimization is researched

The Extractor Amplification project has received a massive funding increase and a lot of scientific focus has been shifted towards it. The top brass wants you to begin installing the new upgrades as soon as possible.

<effect>The tech Extractor Amplification has been revealed and it costs <extractor_discount>% less.
Translation:
挖掘站增幅專案得到了一大筆援助資金，許多科學家也被調來加快這個專案的進度。高層希望你能儘快安裝新的升級系統。

<effect>挖掘站增幅技術已解鎖，研究耗費降低<extractor_discount>%。

Text: The Mission HQ on Earth has declared the effectiveness of our resource extraction as main priority.
Translation: 地球總部宣佈，要我們把資源開採作為最優先的任務。

Text: gain a Supply Pod with <drones> Drones and <polymers> Polymers
Translation: 獲得補給艙，裝有<drones>臺無人機與<polymers>聚合物

Text: reveals the rest of the Amplification techs and they cost <others_discount>% less
Translation: 解鎖增幅技術其餘專案，這些專案的花費降低<others_discount>%

Text:
No matter how much you bang your head against the wall, the budget charts don’t start to make sense. We are severely overstretched. What are they thinking! Do they think colonizing Mars is a walk in the… then the call comes in.

The mission’s board has decided to bail us out after catching wind of your financial woes, and not a moment too soon.

You give out a sigh of relief.
Translation:
就算再怎麼用腦袋撞牆也沒有用，預算表是不會給你好臉色看的。我們的壓力實在是太大了。他們都在想什麼啊！難道他們以為，火星的殖民計劃不過是易如反掌的事情嗎……就在這時，你的電話響了。

火星計劃董事會得知你在財務方面遇到了困難，決定立刻為你提供援助，片刻都不會耽誤。

你鬆了一大口氣。

Text: Slash it... Spread it... Prioritize... Then start all over again.
Translation: 削減預算……節省開支……安排優先順序……然後從頭再來一次。

Text: It is the lack of knowledge that burdens us more.
Translation: 正是由於缺乏知識，才讓我們的處境變得更加嚴酷。

Text: Threaten to submit report of gross failure unless further funding is secured.
Translation: 威脅他們，說如果得不到資金保障，就準備提交一份徹底失敗的報告。

Text:
Hard to believe that the bailout managed to steer things around so successfully. And judging by the message we received from the board, they may even be more surprised than we are.

Our sponsor clearly expresses happiness with how well their investment is paying off, clearly referencing our Rare Metals exports, and will now offer us a better export price as a show of trust.

<effect>Export price of Rare Metals increased by <price_increase>%
Translation:
真讓人難以置信，緊急資助居然這麼順利地扭轉了局面。從董事會發來的報告來看，他們似乎比我們更加驚訝。

贊助者們看到他們的投資得到了回報，直截了當地表達了他們的滿意之情，還提到了關於稀有金屬出口的事宜。作為對我們的信任，他們願意以更高的價格進口稀有金屬。

<effect>稀有金屬出口價格提高<price_increase>%。

Text: You run through the numbers again, then maybe one last time. Yes, things are finally looking up!
Translation: 你又看了一遍報告中的數字，終於放心下來了。太棒了，一切終於開始好轉起來了！

Text: Best of Best, as the program is being called, wants your input on what specialization field they should concentrate their recruitment efforts.
Translation: 地球推出了“尖端人才”計劃，需要你確定某個特定領域，他們會盡最大努力招聘該領域的傑出人才。

Text: With the early phase of our mission showing relative stability and gaining in popularity back on Earth, our sponsor feels we are in a good position to push forward a training program aimed at attracting the best applicants Earth has to offer.
Translation: 由於火星計劃的早期成果比較穩定，在地球上的人氣也越來越高，我們的贊助者認為，現在正是推進培訓計劃的最佳時機，從而吸引地球上最出色的應徵者們。

Text: We will always need more Scientists.
Translation: 科學家再怎麼多都不嫌多。

Text: Qualified Geologists will be vital for resource extraction early on.
Translation: 出色的地質學家，對早期資源開採工作至關重要。

Text: We need Botanists to secure the food production of the colony.
Translation: 我們需要植物學家，來保障殖民地的食物產量。

Text: A productive mindset is more important then the exact specialization.
Translation: 卓有成效的頭腦，位元定的專長更加重要。

Text: It looks like somebody has been keeping the best for last. The final three applications are very impressive. Too bad you have to narrow the list down to one.
Translation: 看起來，有些人把最出色的人員留到了最後。三位最終的應徵者都非常出色。但遺憾的是，你只能選擇其中之一。

Text: A new email pops up on your screen holding the final three applications from the training program.
Translation: 你收到了一封郵件，其中包括培訓專案三位最終候選人的資訊。

Text: We need the best and brightest!
Translation: 我們需要最出色、最聰明的人！

Text: We could use a spiritual leader.
Translation: 我們需要一位精神領袖。

Text: We need someone who can grab the attention of influencers back on Earth.
Translation: 我們需要引人注目的人，讓地球上有影響力的人都能注意到他。

Text: Why choose, let's get all three of them on board!
Translation: 還選什麼呢？讓他們三個一起來不就好了！
1位天才、1位佈道者、1位名人應徵者

Text:
Quick troubleshooting reveals that a short-circuit has completely fried the board computer, leaving the Rocket in a damaged state.

You quickly notify the Sponsor of the potentially disastrous consequences of the failed rocket launch. Luckily, they lose no time in green lighting <freesupplypods> free Supply Pods and <funding(extrafunding)> in funding to help the mission through this situation.
Translation:
透過快速故障排除，你發現由於電路短路，火箭上的電腦被完全燒壞了，火箭處於受損狀態。

你很快通知了贊助者，告知他們火箭發射失敗可能帶來的災難性後果。幸運的是，他們第一時間採取了措施，提供<freesupplypods>個免費補給艙與<funding(extrafunding)>資金，確保任務得以順利進行。

Text: The whole board flares up in red warning signs. Emergency rocket launch abort initiated!
Translation: 整個顯示幕上都亮起了紅色的警告標誌。火箭啟動計劃緊急停止！

Text:
In fact, we learned a lot about our Rockets during the repairs and a full review of the design has found several possible improvements to future designs that can reduce our production costs.

<effect>Rocket cost decreased by <rebate>%.
Translation:
事實上，在維修的過程中，我們學到了很多關於火箭結構的知識。我們重新審視了火箭的整體設計，發現了許多可以改善的地方，可以降低火箭的生產成本。

<effect>火箭的成本降低了<rebate>%。

Text: Rocket <DisplayName> has safely landed on Earth. The replacement of all onboard electronics has resolved the issue.
Translation: 火箭<DisplayName>安全地降落在地球上。透過更換所有的電子元件，我們解決了這個問題。

Text:
The company behind the telescope, Lambda Industries, has partnered with our sponsor to share the financial burden of the deep space launch.

Our sponsor, not one to waste an opportunity to help their most ambitious project, says the splitting of the launch bill will basically pay for a single Supply Pod they can fill with cargo of our choosing.

What do we pick?
Translation:
負責製造望遠鏡的公司 - 拉姆達工業集團 - 與我們的贊助者達成合作關係，共同承擔發射火箭的費用。

我們的贊助人打算藉著這個好機會，對火星殖民這個宏大計劃進行援助。他們說，由於分擔費用，他們有了額外的資金可以發射補給艙，裡面裝滿我們需要的東西。

我們想要什麼呢？

Text: A new deep-space telescope will be launched to scan the cosmos from a point even further out than Mars.
Translation: 地球準備發射全新的外太空望遠鏡，可以從比火星更遠的地方對宇宙進行掃描。

Text: We could use some help with sector scanning.
Translation: 我們需要區域掃描方面的援助。

Text: Some extra resources would be welcome.
Translation: 如果有額外的資源，那就太好了。

Text: We can always find a use for an extra Transport.
Translation: 我們需要額外的運輸工具。

Text: Lambda Industries is immensely satisfied with our helping hand in the data analysis and wish to repay us with a reward of our choosing.
Translation: 拉姆達工業集團對我們在資料分析方面的幫助非常滿意，答應透過我們選擇的方式來回報我們。

Text: We could use a helpful hand with our own research projects.
Translation: 我們希望你們能協助我們的科研計劃。

Text: How about a discount on outsourcing projects.
Translation: 不如外包專案打個折扣吧。

Text:
What isn’t performing as well is the data analysis. The amount of information the telescope is sending towards Earth is mind boggling and they have issues processing all of it.

Lambda Industries is officially extending a request for help with some of the data analysis.

<goal>Research the Analyze Space Telescope Data tech to continue.
Translation:
但資料分析工作卻進行得不太順利。外太空望遠鏡向地球發出了海量的資料，而地球科研中心沒辦法處理所有資料。

拉姆達工業集團向我們發出了正式請求，要求我們協助資料分析工作。

<goal>研究"分析太空望遠鏡資料"技術即可繼續。

Text: Lambda Industries’ deep space telescope is performing as planned.
Translation: 拉姆達工業集團的外太空望遠鏡正在按計劃運轉。

Text:
The rapid increase of cable faults ever since we turned on our first Stirling Generator connected to the grid, hints at some gross miscalculation stewing from the fringiness of it all.

Our scientists have laid down the research needed to be done to fill in the potholes in the original Stirling Generator designs.

Research the Stirling Generator Cable Faults tech to fix the issue. Until then, keep in mind that cable faults won't appear when Stirling Generators are turned off.
Translation:
自從我們把第一臺斯特靈發電機接入電網之後，電纜故障情況迅速增加，這意味著某些方面出現了嚴重的設計錯誤。

我們的科學家已經提出了新的研究專案，用來修復原有的斯特靈發電機的設計缺陷。

研究“斯特靈發電機電纜故障”技術，即可修復這些問題。在這之前，只要把斯特靈發電機關掉，就不會發生電纜故障了。

Text: Testing fringe technology in a fringe environment is always unpredictable.
Translation: 在邊緣環境中測試邊緣技術，這樣的結果總是不可預知的。

Text:
After doing extended research on the subject, we not only removed said problems but we actually increased the power efficiency of our Stirling Generators.

<effect>Stirling Generators produce <power_boost>% more power.
Translation:
經過對發電機的深入研究，我們不僅解決了電纜故障，還成功地提高了斯特靈發電機的供電效率。

<effect>斯特靈發電機提供的電力提高<power_boost>%。

Text: Ultimately the issues caused by the Stirling Generator turned out to be connectivity problems.
Translation: 最後，我們發現斯特靈發電機的故障是由於電纜連線問題造成的。

Text:
The pod cannot be identified, as its hull is too burnt and its black box is missing. We discovered several blueprints of unknown purpose inside.

Your team stares at the strange designs and is trying to make sense of them, you decide to join in. Hmm, clearly the part designated as 01-K64 goes into the power couplings here and – eureka! You know what this is!
Translation:
補給艙的外殼被燒得焦黑，黑盒子也不見了，已經無法識別了。我們在裡面發現了幾張藍圖，這些藍圖的用途不明。

你的團隊盯著這些奇怪的設計方案，打算弄清楚它們是做什麼用的，你也決定加入他們的工作中。嗯，這很顯然是某種特定的零件。只要把01-K64元件接入動力聯結器，然後 - 就成功啦！你知道這是什麼意思！

Text: While digging in the dirt, a Drone has stumbled upon a crashed supply pod, almost entirely buried below the red sand.
Translation: 在挖掘的過程中，一架無人機意外發現了一個墜毀的補給艙，幾乎整個補給艙都埋在了火星的紅土之下。

Text:
As a means to propel their ambitions into the new field, they have made a Drone prototype, similar to the ones we use here on Mars. 

And what better location to showcase the feasibility of their Drones than the surface of another planet? If we accept their offer they will provide us with a free batch of <number_of_drones> drones delivered via a Supply Pod.
Translation:
為了展示公司雄厚的科研實力，他們製造了一種無人機原型，與我們目前在火星上使用的無人機很相似。

如果想要展示無人機強大的功能性，還有什麼地方能比火星更合適呢？如果我們答應接受他們的條件，他們願意發射補給艙，向我們無償提供<number_of_drones>臺無人機。

Text: Alpenglow Robotix, a cutting edge tech company specializing in military and medical automation, are pushing to expand their resume with robotics as well.
Translation: 朝霞機器人公司，一家專門從事軍事行業與醫療自動化的尖端科技公司，目前打算把業務拓展至機器人領域。

Text: Accept -  we could always use more Drones!
Translation: 接受 - 無人機自然是越多越好！

Text: <number_of_drones> new drones will arrive in a Supply Pod
Translation: 補給艙將會送來<number_of_drones>臺新的無人機。

Text: Reject - there are risks associated with introducing foreign tech in the colony.
Translation: 拒絕 - 如果在殖民地引進其它技術，可能會產生風險。

Text: Twice the drones, double the gain!
Two Supply Pods with <number_of_drones> drones each
Translation: 獲得兩個補給艙，每個補給艙內裝有<number_of_drones>臺無人機

Text: Division by 0 error! A Drone has critically malfunctioned.
Translation: 無法除以0，發生錯誤！一臺無人機發生了嚴重故障。

Text: Let’s hope they got it right this time. They have offered <number_of_drones> more Drones as compensation for our troubles.
Translation: 希望這次他們能把它修好。作為補償，他們為我們額外提供了<number_of_drones>臺無人機。

Text: A patch is ready to be downloaded from Alpenglow Robotix’s servers, carrying with it the promise of fixing the mess they brought upon us with the previous version of their Drones’ software.
Translation: 朝霞機器人公司在他們的伺服器上釋出了最新的補丁，他們說之前的軟體存在漏洞，導致無人機出現故障。他們承諾最新補丁會修復這些漏洞。

Text: Goodbye and thanks for all the drones!
Translation: 再會，感謝你們的無人機！
裝有<number_of_drones>臺無人機的補給艙

Text: We prefer to get an RC Commander instead.
Translation: 我們更希望能得到一輛遙控指揮車。

Text: Supply pod with an RC Commander
Translation: 裝有一輛遙控指揮車的補給艙

Text: They should provide some financial compensation as well.
Translation: 他們應該再提供一些財務方面的補償。

Text:
We suspect that bad software from Alpenglow Robotix’s Drones has  propagated to all our Drone Controllers.

Alpenglow Robotix had dropped their usual smug attitude and are apologizing profusely. They assure us that they are fast at work to remedy this.
Translation:
我們懷疑，朝霞機器人公司出問題的無人機控制軟體已經傳播到了所有無人機的控制器上。

朝霞機器人公司放下了他們一直以來目中無人的態度，開始鄭重道歉。他們保證會儘快解決這個問題。

Text: Our Drones have begun malfunctioning all around at a pace far from normal.
Translation: 我們的無人機開始出現故障，這種故障率實在是太不正常了。

Text: Urge them to resolve the issues ASAP!
Translation: 催促他們趕緊解決這個問題！

Text: Why wait, I know how to fix this.
Translation: 等他們幹什麼？我知道該怎麼解決這個問題。

Text: As all major software problems this one seems to have been caused by a typo.
Translation: 原來，這一切重大的軟體問題，似乎都是因為某個錯別字造成的。

Text:
Sometimes small mistakes lead to big problems. You fix the typo and the division by 0 errors cease. How did this pass through QA at all?

<effect>Drones will no longer critically malfunction.
Translation:
有的時候，小小的錯誤就會導致嚴重的問題。你改掉了錯別字，這個“除以0”的問題也消失了。這個軟體到底是怎麼通過品質管控的？

<effect>無人機的嚴重問題已經解決了。

Text:
The data seems correct, but our equipment wasn't calibrated to detect the sites. You congratulate your colleague for the discovery and decide on a further course of action.

<effect>You have discovered several new deposits near the colony.
Translation:
資料似乎是正確的，但我們之前的裝置參數不太正確，沒有檢測到這些位置。對同事的新發現，你表達了祝賀之情，同時在思考接下來該怎麼做。

<effect>你在殖民地附近發現了幾處新的資源點。

Text: One of our Scientists has just re-analyzed the scan data and found traces of resource deposits that you didn’t know existed.
Translation: 我們的一位科學家剛剛重新分析了掃描資料，發現了你之前沒檢測到的資源點。

Text: gain discount on the Deep Scanning tech
Translation: “深層掃描技術”研發費用降低

Text: reveals Deep Water Extraction and Deep Metal Extraction tech
Translation: 解鎖“深層金屬挖掘”與“深層水資源挖掘”技術。

Text: additional resources in all of the new deposits
Translation: 所有的新資源點獲得額外資源

Text:
It informs you that your old friend and teacher, Professor Richtmann, has just passed away. You often accompanied him on his trips and expeditions and discussed many aspects of science and philosophy together.

The strongbox contains his legacy, protected by a three-letter password and a short message in his handwriting: “You’ll know.”
Translation:
信上說，你的老友，你的老師裡奇曼教授剛剛去世了。你曾經常與他一起旅行，一同冒險，你們曾經一起討論過科學與哲學的方方面面。

包裹裡裝著他的遺產，上面掛著一個三個字母的密碼鎖，還有一條手寫的字條：“你知道密碼是什麼。”

Text: You have received a strange package with a letter attached. As you read the letter, your eyes fill with tears.
Translation: 你收到了一個奇怪的包裹，上面還付著一封信。你讀著信，淚水充滿了眼眶。
解鎖突破性技術：超級真菌

Text:
“Transgenetics of Yeasts” was the last thing that kept the Professor awake late at night. He was working on the project in a complete secrecy and you doubt that anyone else than you and some others knew about it. And there it is, the complete theory ready to be applied in practice, in front of you, alongside his precious mascot – a cute little teddy bear.

<effect>The Breakthrough tech Superfungus has been revealed.
Translation:
“酵母的基因改造”，是教授生前徹夜研究的最後一個專案。他在完全保密的情況下進行著這個專案，你懷疑除了你和寥寥幾個人之外，根本沒人聽說過這個專案。如今，他的理論已經完成，這個技術已經可以投入應用了。在你面前，還擺著他最喜歡的吉祥物 - 一隻可愛的小泰迪熊。

<effect>突破性技術“超級真菌”已解鎖。

Text: reveals Superior Cables and Superior Pipes breakthrough techs
Translation: 解鎖突破性技術：優質電纜與優質管線

Text:
“Prototype Autonomous Convectors” was the last thing that kept the Professor awake late at night. He was working on the project in a complete secrecy and you doubt that anyone else than you and some others knew about it. And there it is, the complete theory ready to be applied in practice, in front of you, alongside his precious mascot – an old crystal ashtray.

<effect>The Breakthrough techs Superior Pipes and Superior Cables have been revealed.
Translation:
“原型自動換流器”，是教授生前徹夜研究的最後一個專案。他在完全保密的情況下進行著這個專案，你懷疑除了你和寥寥幾個人之外，根本沒人聽說過這個專案。如今，他的理論已經完成，這個技術已經可以投入應用了。在你面前，還擺著他最喜歡的吉祥物 - 一個古老的水晶菸灰缸。

<effect>突破性技術“優質電纜”與“優質管線”已解鎖。
解鎖突破性技術：等離子火箭

Text:
“Perpetual Acceleration eXperiments” was the last thing that kept the Professor awake late at night. He was working on the project in a complete secrecy and you doubt that anyone else than you and some others knew about it. And there it is, the complete theory ready to be applied in practice, in front of you, alongside his precious mascot – an exotic figurine of a lion-headed humanoid.

<effect>The Breakthrough tech Plasma Rocket has been revealed.
Translation:
“永久性加速實驗”，是教授生前徹夜研究的最後一個專案。他在完全保密的情況下進行著這個專案，你懷疑除了你和寥寥幾個人之外，根本沒人聽說過這個專案。如今，他的理論已經完成，這個技術已經可以投入應用了。在你面前，還擺著他最喜歡的吉祥物 - 一個充滿異國風情的獅頭人身雕像。

<effect>突破性技術“等離子火箭”已解鎖。
解鎖突破性技術：奈米提煉

Text: The gears unlock with a mechanical click. You know what you would find inside, and yet you are grateful for this last gesture of love and goodwill.
Translation: 密碼鎖“咔噠”一聲打開了。你知道包裹裡裝的東西是什麼。對教授最後的愛與善意，你的心中充滿了感激。

Text:
“Junk-Filtration Derivatives” was the last thing that kept the Professor awake late at night. He was working on the project in a complete secrecy and you doubt that anyone else than you and some others knew about it.
