And there it is, the complete theory ready to be applied in practice, in front of you, alongside his precious mascot – a laughing-face ball.

<effect>The Breakthrough tech Nano Refinement has been revealed.
Translation:
“垃圾過濾衍生物”，是教授生前徹夜研究的最後一個專案。他在完全保密的情況下進行著這個專案，你懷疑除了你和寥寥幾個人之外，根本沒人聽說過這個專案。如今，他的理論已經完成，這個技術已經可以投入應用了。在你面前，還擺著他最喜歡的吉祥物 - 一個畫著笑臉的圓球。

<effect>突破性技術“奈米提煉”已解鎖。

Text:
Two anomalous readings have been detected at the same time – one near your landing spot and one far away, in a different part of the Red Planet. One of your Scientists is looking at the data and asks you:

"What do you think we’re seeing here, Commander?"

You look at the analysis and immediately know the answer.
Translation:
你同時檢測到了兩個異常讀數，一個讀數就在你的著陸點附近，另一個讀數位置較遠，在火星上另一個區域。一位科學家看著資料，問道：

“你覺得這是什麼，指揮官？”

你看著資料，立刻就想到了答案。

Text: A new and intriguing report has been filed in from an orbital scan above your colony.
Translation: 軌道掃描器掃描了你的殖民地，給你發來了一份全新的有趣報告。

Text: A beautiful Vista, how could we have missed it before?
Translation: 多麼美妙的景觀啊，我們之前怎麼會沒注意到呢？

Text:
“Indeed, Commander. But the nature of the other anomaly is yet unknown – there’s too little data to even make an educated guess.”

That’s right, the other coordinates require a thorough on-site investigation.

<effect>You’ve discovered a new Planetary Anomaly – “Remote Martian Laboratory”.
Translation:
"確實如此，指揮官。但我們對另外那個異象的性狀依然一無所知，我們的資料太少了，沒辦法進行可靠的推斷。"

確實如此，你需要對另一處座標的位置進行徹底的現場調查。

<effect>你發現了新的行星異象 - "遙遠的火星實驗室"。

Text: A promising opportunity for a Research Site.
Translation: 這很可能是個研究地點。

Text:
“Indeed, Commander. But the nature of the other anomaly is yet unknown – there’s too little data to even make an educated guess.”

That’s right, the other coordinates require a thorough on-site investigation.

<effect>You’ve discovered a new Planetary Anomaly – “Remote Martian Laboratory”.
Translation:
"確實如此，指揮官。但我們對另外那個異象的性狀依然一無所知，我們的資料太少了，沒辦法進行可靠的推斷。"

確實如此，你需要對另一處座標的位置進行徹底的現場調查。

<effect>你發現了新的行星異象 - "遙遠的火星實驗室"。

Text: The scientist looks at the data and nods in agreement.
Translation: 科學家看著資料，點著頭，表示贊同。

Text:
“Indeed, Commander. But the nature of the other anomaly is yet unknown – there’s too little data to even make an educated guess.”

That’s right, the other coordinates require a thorough on-site investigation.

<effect>You’ve discovered a new Planetary Anomaly – “Remote Martian Laboratory”.
Translation:
"確實如此，指揮官。但我們對另外那個異象的性狀依然一無所知，我們的資料太少了，沒辦法進行可靠的推斷。"

確實如此，你需要對另一處座標的位置進行徹底的現場調查。

<effect>你發現了新的行星異象 - "遙遠的火星實驗室"。

Text:
The folder implies that one of our mission imperatives is to setup the infrastructure and industry required to construct, operate and confirm the usefulness of an experimental device of epic proportions and wondrous effects. Constructing such a project on Earth is undesired, either because it poses too much danger, or because it cannot be hidden from prying eyes.

You read the title of the project again. Interesting...
Translation:
根據檔案裡的內容，我們其中的一項任務目標，是建造所有相關基礎設施與工業建築，用來操作某種實驗性的巨大裝置，並親自確認這種裝置奇蹟般的效果。像這樣的工程是沒辦法在地球上完成的，要麼它的風險實在是太大了，要麼它總會被別有用心的人注意到。

你再次看了一眼這個專案的標題。真是有趣……

Text: After the touchdown and the initial busy hours, you allow yourself a couple of hours to read the top-secret Big Red Folder which has been lying in your safe for a long time.
Translation: 忙完著陸後的各種事情之後，你終於有幾個小時的時間來閱讀絕密檔案了。這些檔案裝在紅色的大資料夾裡，已經在你的保險箱裡放了很久了。

Text: reveals the tech enabling the Wonder Mohole Mine
Translation: 解鎖奇觀"莫霍礦井"所需的技術

Text: reveals the tech enabling the Wonder Project Morpheus
Translation: 解鎖奇觀"莫菲斯計劃"所需的技術

Text: reveals the tech enabling the Wonder Artificial Sun
Translation: 解鎖奇觀"人造太陽"所需的技術

Text:
“Commander, we have an offer for you. Recently our organization has run into severe problems with one of our more delicate projects. We want you to take care of it.”

All in all, the mysterious man wants you to shelter a number of Clone applicants in your project, no questions asked, no answers given.
Translation:
“指揮官，我們有件事希望你能幫忙。最近，我們的組織在進行某個更加精細的計劃時遇到了嚴重的問題。我們希望你能幫忙解決。”

總而言之，這個神祕人希望能讓一些複製人應徵者加入你的專案，由你負責保護。他什麼也沒有問，也什麼都沒有多說。

Text: The message screen is dark and only a vague silhouette of a bald man can be seen. The man speaks with a modulated voice.
Translation: 螢幕很暗，螢幕上只有某個禿頭男人模糊的影像。男人的聲音也已經調製過了。

Text: Accept and have a look at the medical data.
Translation: 接受請求，查看他們的醫療資料。

Text: gain <funding(money_reward)> and <clone_applicants> Security Clone applicants; reveals the Breakthrough tech Cloning
Translation: 獲得<funding(money_reward)>與<clone_applicants>警官複製人應徵者，解鎖突破性技術“複製技術”

Text:
If it was a bomb it would have exploded by now, so you decide to risk it. You open the package and find a couple of notes. The first one is a check for quite the sum. The other one is a letter.

"Commander, we're grateful for your aid in the past. But we cannot live peacefully. We were designed to fight, to conquer. And we will. Some day we could be enemies, but for now, while we're friends, accept our final gift. And from now on we're even."

<effect>All Officer Clones become Renegades. You have received <funding(final_gift)> Funding.
Translation:
如果裡面裝的是炸彈，那它應該早就炸了，於是你冒險打開了包裹。你打開了包裹，發現了幾張字條。其中一張字條是一筆鉅額支票，另外還付上了一封信。

“指揮官，我們很感激你之前為我們提供的援助，但我們無法適應和平的生活。我們被設計出來的目的，就是為了去戰鬥、去征服。我們會履行這個目的。有朝一日，我們可能會成為敵人。但目前，我們依然是朋友，請接收我們的臨別贈禮吧。從現在開始，我們扯平了。”

<effect>所有的警官複製人變為叛徒。你獲得了<funding(final_gift)>資金。

Text: The imposing Clone intercepts you in the dark alley. He throws you a package and vanishes.
Translation: 一位儀表堂堂的複製人在暗巷中攔住了你。他向你扔過來一個包裹，隨後便消失了。

Text: They want to outsource the R&D of their newest project “Prefab Compression” - a technology that could potentially allow us to transport prefabs of monumental buildings from Earth. They have a list of specific requirements which makes us the best candidate for this – our colony is remote, far from prying eyes, almost depopulated in case of nanite contamination and you would hardly break an agreement of confidentiality.
Translation: 他們打算將他們最新的研究專案“預製件壓縮技術”外包給我們來做，這項技術可以讓我們直接在地球上製作巨型建築的預製件，並把它們運輸到火星上。根據專案的具體要求，我們是最適合研究這個專案的承包人。我們的殖民地很偏遠，可以遠離所有人的視線。這裡幾乎沒有受到任何奈米機器人的汙染，而且你幾乎沒辦法違反保密協議。

Text: One of the leading companies in the field of nanotechnology and miniaturization has made you an interesting offer.
Translation: 某家奈米技術與微型化領域行業的領軍公司向你提出了一個有趣的提議。

Text: gain <funding(advance)>, reveals the Breakthrough Prefab Compression
Translation: 獲得<funding(advance)>，解鎖突破性技術“預製件壓縮”

Text: gain <research(logistics)> Sponsor Research, reveals the Breakthrough Prefab Compression
Translation: 獲得<research(logistics)>贊助者研究點數，解鎖突破性技術“預製件壓縮”

Text: This technology will allow us to transport prefabs of monumental Spire buildings from Earth. We will have to pay quite a lot to license it for use on Mars.
Translation: 這項技術可以讓我們在地球上製造尖塔預製件，並把它們運輸到火星上。不過我們必須支付一大筆授權費，才能在火星上使用。

Text: In a recent news article it became apparent that the Prefab Compression technology has become a commercial reality on Earth.
Translation: 透過最近的某篇報導，你瞭解到預製件壓縮技術已經在地球上得到了廣泛應用。

Text: research the Prefab Compression Breakthrough tech
Translation: 研究突破性技術“預製件壓縮”
先進行激烈的談判，之後再支付授權費。

Text: research the Prefab Compression Breakthrough tech
Translation: 研究突破性技術“預製件壓縮”

Text: They want to close the deal as soon as possible and obtain the intellectual property on the research, and offer you several final payment options.
Translation: 他們希望能儘快完成交易，以獲得相關智慧財產權。同時，他們提供了多種支付方式供你選擇。

Text: The Prefab Compression project has demonstrated immense potential for commercial expansion and your partners are quite happy about it.
Translation: 預製件壓縮專案展現出了難以估量的商業潛力，你的合作人對此表示非常滿意。
以使用費的方式進行支付。

Text: the Martian Patents tech costs <boost>% less
Translation: 火星專利技術耗費降低<boost>%

Text: gain <arcologies> Arcology Prefabs and <stirlings> Stirling Generator Prefabs
Translation: 獲得<arcologies>個生態建築預製件與<stirlings>個斯特靈發電機預製件

Text:
The endless stream of scientific data flowing in from the Red Planet is too much to be handled even by the largest scientific organization alone. The top brass of our sponsor have just made the decision to sell the scientific data to third parties by setting up remote transmission facilities on Mars.

<effect>You have discovered the new Special Project: “Contract Exploration Access”. It can be completed multiple times to gain Funding.
Translation:
來自火星的科研資料實在是太多了，哪怕是全世界規模最大的科研機構也無法獨立處理所有的資料。贊助者的高層人員剛剛做了決定，準備在火星上建造遠端傳輸設施，將科研資料出售給第三方。

<effect>你發現了新的特殊專案：“科研勘探合約”。你可以多次研究此專案，獲得資金。

Text: Earth HQ has just approved a new project to expand our Martian operations.
Translation: 地球總部剛剛通過了一項新的專案，進一步拓展我們的火星開發計劃。

Text: While looking for the glitch, your data technicians discovered the possibility to boost the performance of the program by running secondary analytical trials, just this once.
Translation: 你的資料技術員在分析故障的時候，發現了新的思路，可以透過二次資料分析實驗的方法來提高資料分析的效率。這種好事可不會再發生第二次了。

Text: Our scientific analysis servers just crashed! We tried turning them off and on again, but the problem persisted after reboot.
Translation: 我們的科研分析伺服器當機了！我們試過關機之後再開機，但重啟之後問題依然存在。
把注意力集中在單個目標上。

Text: a random tech will be researched
Translation: 完成某項隨機技術的研究

Text: reveals several techs in a random field
Translation: 解鎖某個隨機領域的多項技術

Text: One of our buildings has stopped working - a <DisplayName>. It looks like the fine dust from the storm has filled away a key component of the power supply. The repair task is too complex for a drone.
Translation: 我們的一座<DisplayName>已停止運轉。看來風暴刮來的粉塵堵塞了供電裝置的一個關鍵零件。維修工作對於無人機來說太過複雜。

Text: I don’t like dust. It’s coarse and rough and irritating… and it gets everywhere.
Translation: 塵土太討厭了。既粗糙又有刺激作用……而且有縫就鑽。
派一位殖民地居民前往。

Text: A colonist braved the storm and managed to fix the broken component. Our <DisplayName> is now operational.
Translation: 殖民地居民頂著風暴，設法修好了受損的零件。我們的<DisplayName>恢復了運轉。

Text: A colonist braved the storm and managed to fix the broken component. Our <DisplayName> is now operational. Regrettably, during the repairs the colonist's space suit was compromised and they didn't make it back.
Translation: 殖民地居民頂著風暴，設法修好了受損的零件。我們的<DisplayName>恢復了運轉。很遺憾，維修過程中殖民地居民的太空服受損，此人沒能生還。

Text: We’ll fix it after the storm.
Have the Drones replace the entire component.
Translation: 派無人機更換整個零件。
Old Text: Have the Drones replace the entire component
Old Translation: 派無人機更換整個零件

Text: Step aside, I know regular expressions!
Translation: 靠邊站，正則表示式我也懂！

Text: use your expertise to fix <DisplayName> remotely
Translation: 用你的專業知識遠端維修<DisplayName>

Old Text: A repair crew has fixed <display_name>
Old Translation: 一名維修人員修復了<display_name>

Text: The car is very well preserved, it seems it survived the crash of the cargo pod quite well. It was supposed to be in Earth’s orbit, and we don’t know how it got here, but it’s a valuable historical discovery nonetheless.
Translation: 這輛車儲存得很好，儘管貨艙毀傷著陸，但它似乎未受什麼損傷。它本該在地球的軌道上允許，我們不知道它怎麼出現在了這裡，但這依然是寶貴的歷史發現。

Text: The expedition team found... a car. It’s an amazing – and amusing – discovery!
Translation: 探險隊發現了……一輛車。真是一次令人稱奇的有趣發現！
應該把它放在博物館裡！

Text: We've received orders to not open the trunk.
Translation: 我們接到命令不得開啟後備箱。

Old Text: Place it on an auction
Old Translation: 將其拍賣

Text: It’s no surprise that our Martian children behave differently, given the fact that they are raised and educated so differently than the children on Earth.
Translation: 火星孩子行為與眾不同很正常，因為他們的成長環境和所受教育與地球上孩子有天壤之別。

Text: Our children have become quite strange lately. Organizing in small, eccentric groups, they shun outsiders and immerse in their own distinctive sub-cultures of gestures, expressions and language.
Translation: 我們的孩子最近變得怪怪的。他們組成古怪的小團體，拒絕外人靠近並沉浸在自己獨特的手勢、表情和語言亞文化中。

Text: Quite alarming. We must put an end to this, whether they like it or not!
Translation: 十分令人不安。不管他們喜不喜歡，我們都不能放任其發展。
阻止這種不受歡迎的亞文化繼續發展

Text: The children aren’t exactly happy that their fun little games has been ended by the stern adults.
Translation: 頑固的成年人終止了孩子們的遊戲，孩子們對此十分不滿。

Text:
Without a center point, their eccentricity spins off intro various directions. Many Colonists see this as a bad move, and protest against it, while others approve of your actions.

<effect><conservatives> Colonists gain <morale_change> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols, while <liberals> Colonists lose <morale_change> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
失去了中心點後，他們的古怪行為朝著不同的方向發展。很多殖民地居民認為我們這麼做弄巧成拙並進行了抗議，一部分人則支援你的行為。

<effect><conservatives>殖民地居民士氣上升<morale_change>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日，同時<liberals>位殖民地居民士氣下降<morale_change>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日。

Text: Intriguing! Let’s just sit back and watch the development.
Translation: 有意思！我們靜觀其變，看看會發展成什麼樣。

Text: let the children do as they please
A great subject for research! But let the children do as they will.
Translation: 這是很棒的研究課題！但別去干預孩子們。

Text: unlock new tech, let the children do as they please
Translation: 解鎖新技術，放任孩子們發展

Text: Encourage the diversification of the different groups.
Translation: 鼓勵不同團體的多樣化發展。

Text:
The newly-fledged youths show remarkable new qualities, inspiring even the older Martianborn to follow into their steps and reshaping the Martian culture. The children found comfort in their unique micro-societies, helping each other and tending to the emotional and intellectual needs and challenges of their peers. We could all learn from their behavior.

<effect>Martianborn will periodically gain <comfort_gain> Comfort.
Translation:
羽翼漸豐的年輕人們展現出了非凡的新優秀品質，同時激勵著較年長的火星之子加入他們的行列並重塑火星文化。孩子們在自己獨特的微社會中過得很自在，他們互幫互助，滿足彼此在情感和知識上的需求，並應對同輩的挑戰。我們所有人都能從他們的行為學到有用的東西。

<effect>火星之子舒適度定期上升<comfort_gain>

Text: The Martianborn children we observed have already stepped through into the difficult and exciting period of young adulthood, making their first uneasy steps among the Martian society.
Translation: 處於我們觀察之下的火星出生的孩子們已經步入了艱苦而激動人心的青年期，初入火星社會的他們正在磕磕碰碰中前進。

Text:
The newly-fledged youths show remarkable new qualities, inspiring even the older Martianborn to follow into their steps and reshaping the Martian culture. You encouraged the children to pursue their imagination, the resulting new culture on Mars producing daring, artistic and creative people.

<effect>Martianborn will periodically gain <morale_up> Morale for <sols(morale_up_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
羽翼漸豐的年輕人們展現出了非凡的新優秀品質，同時激勵著較年長的火星之子加入他們的行列並重塑火星文化。你鼓勵孩子們放飛想像，隨之形成的新火星文化薰陶出了一批勇敢、有藝術才能又有創意的人。

<effect>火星之子士氣定期上升<morale_up>，持續<sols(morale_up_sols)>個太陽日。

Text: The Martianborn children we observed have already stepped through into the difficult and exciting period of young adulthood, making their first uneasy steps among the Martian society.
Translation: 處於我們觀察之下的火星出生的孩子們已經步入了艱苦而激動人心的青年期，初入火星社會的他們正在磕磕碰碰中前進。

Text:
The signal has been traced to come from hundreds of light years away and while the civilization that transmitted it may no longer exist, there is little question to the validity of the signal itself.

We may send a signal of our own in their direction. It will travel for hundreds of years more but it will eventually reach whoever, if anyone, is still around there to listen to it. Using universal mathematical laws as means to communicate, we can only hope that who receives it will understand.

Writing the right opening sentence is said to be an art by itself. How will our message begin?
Translation:
我們追蹤訊號發現其來自數百光年外。雖然傳送它的文明或許已不存在，但訊號是貨真價實的。

我們可以朝訊號發來的方向發出自己的訊號。也許它會行進數百年之久，但如果目的地仍然有人，它最終就會被接收到。我們用通用數學定律作為通訊手段，希望接受者能理解我們的意思。

寫對第一句話據說是一項技術活。消息開頭該怎麼寫呢？

Text: A Long Time Ago, in a Galaxy Far Far Away...
Translation: 很久很久以前，在一個遙遠的星系裡……

Text: What news, Commander! Definitive evidence of intelligent beings is found within a signal caught by our Omega Telescope.
No response is needed. We don’t know the nature of the listener on the other side and may doom the future of the human race.
Translation: 不需要回應。我們不清楚對方的本質，這麼做可能會斷送人類的未來。

Text: morale boost for significant number of Colonists
Translation: 大量殖民地居民士氣提升

Text: inspire the colony to discover a new Breakthrough
Translation: 激勵殖民地發現新突破性技術

Text: "One day, we will meet in peace."
Translation: “有朝一日，我們定能和平地見面。”

Text: "It is our hope to prosper in cooperation."

Although there is little reason to believe there will be any dramatic benefit for the colony, the cure for cancer is a holy grail for the human civilization as a whole.

There is not a person on any world that is neutral to the cause.
Translation:
雖然幾乎沒有理由相信殖民地會明顯受益，治好癌症的方法是整個人類文明追求的崇高目標。

無論一個人身處哪顆星球，都不能置身事外。

Text: In pursuit of the technologies that allow us to exist on Mars, our advanced science practices have earned us an invitation to take part in a currently ongoing prestigious and noble science project dedicated to finding the cure for cancer.
Translation: 為了讓我們能在火星上生存，我們研發出了很多先進的技術。一項知名科學工程向我們發出了邀請，該工程的崇高目標是治癒癌症。

Text: If we have a shot at bringing this dragon down, then, by all means!
Translation: 如果我們能有機會征服這條惡龍，那何樂而不為呢？
出現可供研究的新技術

Text: I have already mapped the best way to approach the problem.
Translation: 我已經想出了該問題的最佳解決方法。
Old Text: I'm familiar with the project and have already mapped the best way to delve into it.
Old Translation: 我對這項工程十分熟悉，並早已想出最佳的研究方法。

Text: enables a new tech, increased success chance
Translation: 出現可供研究的新技術，提升成功機率

Text: We just can’t spare the research time.
Old Text: Starvation, dehydration or freezing to death are much bigger threats here. We just can’t spare the research time that will be lost.
Old Translation: 在這裡，飢餓、脫水和凍死是更大的威脅。我們擠不出研究時間。

Text:
A battle in the war against cancer has been won! Humanity hasn't discovered the cure for the horrific disease yet, but we managed to make progress. Our colonists are proud that we were a part of this initiative.  

<effect>+<morale_boost> Morale for the next <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols
Translation:
我們在與癌症的戰爭中取得了階段性勝利！人類尚未想出治癒這種疾病的方法，但我們設法取得了進展。我們的殖民地居民因我們參與了該專案而自豪。

<effect>在接下來的<sols(morale_boost_duration)>個太陽日內+<morale_boost>士氣

Text: Everyone on Mars is standing tall today, filled with great pride.
Translation: 今天，火星上所有人都昂首挺胸、豪情滿懷。

Text:
A promising breakthrough has been made in the fight against cancer – in large part based on research done here, in our own Martian labs. While not entirely ridding us of cancer, the new drug will dramatically reduce the lethality of the horrific disease.

<DisplayName> has been nominated for a Nobel Prize in medical research, followed by a flood of donations and new applicants wanting to become part of our colony.

<effect>+<morale_boost> Morale for the next <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols; <applicants> Applicants; <funding(funding_reward)> Funding.
Translation:
我們在與癌症的鬥爭中取得了突破性進展。而我們火星實驗室裡做的研究厥功至偉。這種新藥雖然無法徹底消滅癌症，但能大幅降低這種可怕疾病的致命性。

<DisplayName>已得到諾貝爾醫學研究獎提名，緊接著，捐款和想要加入我們殖民地的應徵者像潮水一般湧來。

<effect>在接下來的<sols(morale_boost_duration)>個太陽日裡+<morale_boost>士氣，<applicants>名應徵者，<funding(funding_reward)>資金。

Text: Everyone on Mars is standing tall today, filled with pride beyond expression.
Translation: 火星上所有人都昂首挺胸，心中有一種說不出的自豪。

Text:
<DisplayName> was ordered to repair a freight elevator. This Colonist's original approach to the problem included standing at the bottom of the elevator shaft and dislodging its steel cable without securing the counterweight on the other side.

The Martian gravity may be 38% of that of Earth, but 4 tons are still quite a lot.

<effect>A Metals Extractor has malfunctioned. An Idiot Colonist has died.
Translation:
<DisplayName>接到了修理貨運電梯的命令。這位殖民地居民原本打算站在電梯井底部，並在不固定另一側配重物的情況下取出鋼纜以解決問題。

火星重力或許只有地球的38%，但4噸的重物依然不是鬧著玩的。

<effect>一座金屬挖掘站發生故障。一名愚蠢的殖民地居民已經死亡。

Text: There was a bizarre accident in one of our Metals Extractors.
Translation: 我們的一座金屬挖掘站裡發生了一場離奇的事故。

Text: This is a tragic event. We should mourn this loss.
Translation: 這是一場悲劇。我們應該悼念死者。
部分殖民地居民理智度下降

Text: If you can't be a good example, you'll just serve as a horrible warning.
Translation: 如果你當不了光輝榜樣，那就目前車之鑑吧。

Text: some Colonists lose Morale for 3 Sols
Translation: 部分殖民地居民士氣下降，持續3個太陽日

Text: We need to invest in building an idiot-proof environment.
Translation: 防火防盜還不夠，我們得砸錢打造一個防蠢的環境。

Text: Idiot Colonists gain very high Morale
Translation: 愚蠢的殖民地居民獲得極高士氣

Text: Start a donations campaign in order to improve job safety.
Translation: 發起捐款活動，以改善工作安全。

Text:
A major flaw in our Wind Turbine design is now apparent. Their working is hampered by the gradual accumulation of fine Martian dust that is an inevitability on Mars. As a result all Wind Turbines are producing less power than we expected.

Mission control has suspended the further construction of Wind Turbines until we manage to come up with a lighter design and a better mechanism.

<goal>Research the “Wind Turbine Redesign” tech to solve the problem.
Translation:
我們發現風力發電機的設計上存在重大缺陷。火星微塵會逐步堆積，並妨礙其運轉。這種情況在火星上是無法避免的。因此，所有風力發電機的發電量低於預期。

任務指揮中心暫停了新風力發電機的建造，直到我們想出重量更輕的設計和更好的方法為止。

<goal>研究“重新設計風力發電機”技術以解決該問題。

Text: The wind turbine’s propeller barely rotates under the Martian wind. We have a problem.
Translation: 風力發電機的螺旋槳在火星的風中幾乎轉不動。我們遇到問題了。

Text: Try to fix all existing Wind Turbines.
Translation: 設法修復所有現有的風力發電機。

Text: <machineparts(repair_cost)> emergency maintenance for turbines but they will return to full power production
Translation: 對風力發電機進行<machineparts(repair_cost)>緊急維護，但它們的發電量將恢復正常。

Text: Convince Mission control to provide an alternative power source.
Translation: 說服任務指揮中心提供其他電力來源。
獲得1個斯特靈發電機預製件

Text: Some design problems are to be expected when dealing with a new planet.
Translation: 在和新星球打交道時，遇到設計問題時很正常的。

Text:
The schematics for our Wind Turbines have been updated. The new design is so good that we expect to boost their production by <power_production_boost>%.

<effect>Construction ban of Wind Turbines has been lifted.
Translation:
我們風力發電機的設計圖已得到更新。新設計非常巧妙，能使它們的發電量提升<power_production_boost>%。

<effect>風力發電機的建造禁令已取消。

Text: A brief, tired cheer emanates from the science team indicating they have finally found a solution.
Translation: 科學團隊發出了簡短而疲憊的歡呼聲，看來他們終於想出瞭解決方案。

Text:
A power surge has caused a massive failure in the heating system of dome <DisplayName>. Using backup heaters we can keep everybody warm enough but the dome’s power consumption has been increased by <power_increase_prc>%.

The Cold Wave will persist for several sols. If the power supply fails many colonists may freeze to death.
Translation:
電壓突波導致穹頂供熱系統大規模癱瘓<DisplayName>。我們已啟用備用加熱器繼續為大家供暖，但穹頂的電力消耗上升了<power_increase_prc>%。

寒流將持續若干個太陽日。如果發生供電故障，很多殖民地居民就會凍死。

Text: A blanket-clad colonist hands you a report, shivering from the cold. It is as you feared - all of the dome heaters have failed.
Translation: 一個裹著毯子的殖民地居民一邊發抖一邊交給你一份報告。你擔心的事終於發生了。所有穹頂加熱器都失靈了。

Text: Costs <machineparts(repair_cost)> but the Dome won’t consume extra power
Translation: 花費<machineparts(repair_cost)>但穹頂不會消耗額外電力

Text: We have trained for such situations. We will persevere!
Translation: 我們為了應對這種情況受過專門訓練。我們會挺過去的！
從無人機身上回收一些加熱器。

Text:
You finish the report on Dome <DisplayName> and the issue with the heaters assuring our sponsor that the problem has been fully resolved. It seems that the accident has energized the colonists.

<effect>Morale +<morale_bonus> for <sols(morale_bonus_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
你寫完了穹頂<DisplayName>以及加熱器問題的報告，並向贊助者保證說問題已經解決了。似乎這次事故令殖民地居民們充滿熱情。

<effect>士氣+<morale_bonus>，持續<sols(morale_bonus_sols)>個太陽日。

Text: As the frost outside melts, you can see that colonists are returning to their normal routines. The atmosphere is even a bit cheerful.
Translation: 隨著外面的冰雪慢慢融化，你看到殖民地居民的生活恢復了正常。氣氛甚至變得有些歡快。
Old Text: As the frost outside melts you can see that colonists are returning to their normal routines. The atmosphere is even a bit cheerful.
Old Translation: 隨著外面的冰雪慢慢融化，你看到殖民地居民的生活恢復了正常。氣氛甚至變得有些歡快。

Text: Tell colonists to take it easy for the next few days and to drink a lot of fluids.
Translation: 叫殖民地居民們在接下來的幾天裡放輕鬆，多喝液體。

Text:
The issue with the heaters of Dome <DisplayName> has taken its toll on our colony. Those who survived must aim to do better when future challenges arise.

<effect>Several colonists have gained the Survivor trait.
Translation:
穹頂的加熱器問題<DisplayName>給我們的殖民地造成了損失。倖存下來的人必須想辦法更從容地面對未來的挑戰。

<effect>若干位殖民地居民獲得了倖存者特性。

Text: As the frost outside melts, you hastily assemble your report listing the colonists that perished from the cold.
Translation: 隨著外面的冰雪慢慢融化，你開始匆忙地將死於嚴寒的人員名單寫進報告中。
Old Text: As the frost outside melts you hastily assemble your report listing the colonists that perished from the cold.
Old Translation: 隨著外面的冰雪慢慢融化，你開始匆忙地將死於嚴寒的人員名單寫進報告中。

Text: It’s always tough to lose friends and colleagues.
Translation: 失去朋友與同事永遠是一件令人悲痛的事。

Text: We all knew the risks when we decided to come to Mars. It is a harsh environment, but we will tame it.
Translation: 我們決定來火星時，就知道此舉的風險。火星環境殘酷無情，但我們最終會征服這裡。

Text:
The dust storm has caused a giant crack in the glass of dome <DisplayName>. New leaks spring up constantly and our drones will struggle to fix all of them.

To fix the initial crack we’ll have to send colonists outside. However, this may be dangerous and it may be wise to first wait out the storm.
Translation:
沙塵暴在<DisplayName>穹頂的玻璃上製造了巨大的裂痕。新裂縫不斷出現，我們的無人機很難將其全部修補好。

為了修補好最初的裂痕，我們需要派殖民地居民前往穹頂外部。但此舉可能有危險，先等風暴結束或許是明智之舉。

Text: Nervous colonists watch as a crack in the Dome slowly leaks out precious air into the Dust Storm outside.
Translation: 殖民地居民們緊張地看著寶貴的空氣從穹頂的一處裂痕洩漏到了外面的沙塵暴中。

Text: I need volunteers to go outside!
Translation: 我需要志願者去穹頂外！

Text: Colonists may perish but the leaks will be contained
Translation: 殖民地居民有可能死亡，但洩漏將得到控制。

Text: Several brave souls risked their lives and went out into the dust storm. Using a special sealant they managed to stop the crack from spreading.
Translation: 幾位勇敢者冒著生命危險，走入了外面的沙塵暴中。他們設法用特殊的密封膠成功防止了裂痕進一步擴大。

Text:
We are sad to report that we lost <killed_colonists> Colonists during the repairs. Let their sacrifice be an inspiration for us all.

<effect>New fractures will cease to occur in Dome “<DisplayName>”. Existing fractures will be fixed automatically by drones.
Translation:
我們懷著沉痛的心情宣佈，修理過程中我們失去了<killed_colonists>位殖民地居民。願他們的犧牲激勵我們所有人。

<effect>穹頂上不會出現新的裂縫。“<DisplayName>”無人機會自動修復現有裂縫。

Text: We have to weather the storm for now.
Translation: 我們得咬咬牙挺過風暴。

Text: Try to reduce the pressure differential.
delay repairs, leaks will happen less often
Translation: 暫不修理，洩漏發生頻率降低

Text: Fellow Colonists, we have all trained for this. We will weather this storm.
Translation: 殖民地居民們，我們刻苦訓練為的就是這種時候。我們將咬牙挺過風暴。
暫不修理，殖民地居民獲得理智度

Text:
It is now safe to send a repair team to seal the crack in the dome and stop any further leaks. Do you have any special instructions?

<effect>New fractures will cease to occur due to the major crack in the dome. Existing fractures will be fixed by drones automatically.
Translation:
現在已經可以安全地派出維修人員封住穹頂上的裂痕並防止進一步洩漏了。你們有什麼特別的指示嗎？

<effect>由於穹頂上存在巨大裂痕，將不會出現新的裂縫。無人機會自動修復現有裂縫。

Text: The Dust Storm has settled but the damage to the Dome remains a constant threat to the Colonists.
Translation: 沙塵暴已經平息，但受損的穹頂依然時刻威脅著殖民地居民。

Text: Double check everything and make sure all safety protocols are followed.
Translation: 進行徹底檢查，確保一切都符合安全規範。

Text: We need to fix the issue asap. Tell them to hurry up!
Translation: 我們需要儘快解決這個問題。叫他們快點！

Text: repairs will take <reapair_time_fast> hours, additional damage may be caused
Translation: 維修將花費<reapair_time_fast>小時，可能會產生額外損傷

Text: You observe as the repair team works on top of the Dome above your head. Suddenly a Colonist slips and tumbles down… Fortunately the safety rope stops his fall.
Translation: 你抬頭看著正在工作的維修隊。突然，一位殖民地居民腳底一滑跌了下來……好在保險繩救了他一命。

Text:
Rushing to get the job done and seal the crack in the dome has resulted in several accidents and missteps.

<effect>The dome will need <electronics(penalty)> emergency maintenance
Translation:
為了儘快封閉穹頂上的裂痕而趕工導致發生了若干起事故和意外。

<effect>穹頂將需要<electronics(penalty)>緊急維護

Text:
The fault for the crack was in the design of our airlocks but the issue has been dealt with and repair teams are implementing the solution to all other domes.

One of our crafty colonists has found how to significantly improve the way we repair Dome leaks.

<effect>Repair cost of Dome leaks reduced by <cost_reduction>% permanently
Translation:
出現裂痕是因為氣閘的設計上有缺陷，但這個問題已經得到解決，維修隊正在將解決方案實施到其他所有穹頂上。

一位聰明的殖民地居民想辦法對穹頂洩漏的維修方式做了大幅改進。

<effect>修理穹頂洩漏的花費永久降低<cost_reduction>%

Text: You smile as you read the latest report about the Dome damaged by the Dust Storm. Finally, something positive from this whole ordeal.
Translation: 你面帶微笑地讀著因沙塵暴而受損的穹頂的最新報告。終於在黑暗中看到了曙光。

Text:
Project Morpheus is shaping to be too successful in what it does and many Colonists are losing interest in their non-virtual lives. 

This directly correlates with the decreasing levels of productivity among heavy users of Project Morpheus.  

<effect>Several colonists have received the Lazy trait
Translation:
莫菲斯計劃成功得有點過頭，很多殖民地居民正逐漸對現實生活失去興趣。

這直接導致莫菲斯計劃的重度使用者的生產能力下降。

<effect>若干殖民地居民獲得了懶惰特性。

Text: Medical reports are beginning to reveal a worrisome trend among our Colonists.
Translation: 醫療報告顯示殖民地居民中開始出現一種令人擔憂的趨勢。

Text: This is disturbing, we have to stop Project Morpheus and reevaluate.
Translation: 這令人很傷腦筋。我們必須叫停莫菲斯計劃並重新評估。

Text: Project Morpheus is turned off for <sols(duration)> Sols, no more colonists will become Lazy
Translation: 關閉莫菲斯計劃，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日。不會再有殖民地居民變得懶惰
Old Text: Project Morpheus is turned off for <duration> Sols, no more colonists will become Lazy
Old Translation: 關閉莫菲斯計劃，持續<duration>個太陽日。不會再有殖民地居民變得懶惰

Text: The positive effects overshadow the negative ones, keep it running!
more Colonists will become Lazy during the next <sols(duration)> Sols
Translation: 在接下來的<sols(duration)>個太陽日內，更多殖民地居民會變得懶惰
Old Text: more Colonists will become Lazy during the next <duration> days
Old Translation: 在接下來的<duration>天內，更多殖民地居民會變得懶惰

Text: I can see the underlying reasons for this phenomenon.
Translation: 我瞭解此現象的根本原因。

Text: resolve the issue now, some Colonists receive a Morale boost
Translation: 立刻解決此問題，部分殖民地居民士氣提升

Text:
The fine Martian dust can be a serious health hazard. We thought that our airlock filters could handle it well enough but this particular Dust Storm got the better of them.

Some colonists have developed the Dust Sickness trait. They will take Health damage during Dust Storms even when inside the dome. 

Our medical staff strongly recommends that we discharge those affected with the Dust Sickness from work so they can better manage the ailment.
Translation:
火星的微塵會嚴重影響人們的健康。我們本以為氣閘的過濾器能有效應對微塵，但這場沙塵暴超過了過濾器的極限。

部分殖民地居民產生了沙塵病特性。即使身處穹頂內部，沙塵暴期間他們也會受到生命值傷害。

我們的醫務人員強烈建議我們讓沙塵病患者停止工作，以便他們更好地控制此疾病。

Text: The Colonist on the bed keeps coughing uncontrollably. It’s the third such case since the Dust Storm started.
Translation: 臥床的殖民地居民止不住地咳嗽。自從沙塵暴開始以來這已經是第三例了。

Text: Colonists suffering from the Dust Sickness shouldn’t work.
Translation: 換上沙塵病的殖民地居民不應該工作。

Text: We need everyone to pull their weight. They should continue to work.
Translation: 我們需要所有人儘自己的本分。他們應該繼續工作。

Text: We can alleviate the symptoms with allergy medication.
Translation: 我們能用抗過敏藥緩解症狀

Text: the Dust Sickness trait will not appear in the colony
Translation: 殖民地不會出現沙塵病特性

Text:
One of our Scientists has come up with a paper that proposes two possible solutions to the Dust Sickness. The research may take a long time to complete but there are possible shortcuts.

<goal>Research the “Dust Sickness Cure” tech to cure all Colonists from the affliction
Translation:
我們的一名科學家寫了一篇論文，其中提出沙塵病的兩種可能的解決方案。研究或許需要花很長時間才能完成，但這可能是解決問題的捷徑。

<goal>研究“沙塵病療法”技術以治好所有殖民地居民的病。

Text: The Scientist coughs mid-sentence – a sign of the Dust Sickness – but his ideas make sense. Perhaps there is a way to cure this illness.
Translation: 科學家啊說到一半也開始咳嗽，這是沙塵病的跡象。不過他的理念很有道理。也許這種病是有辦法治好的。

Text: Subject dust sick Colonists to invasive tests.
Translation: 對患沙塵病的殖民地居民進行激進的測試。

Text: sick Colonists suffer <comfort_penalty> Comfort; tech cost reduced by <tech_reduction_tests>%
Translation: 患病殖民地居民的舒適度降低<comfort_penalty>，技術花費降低<tech_reduction_tests>%

Old Text: <funding(cure_cost)> funding; tech cost reduced by <tech_reduction_pay>%
Old Translation: <funding(cure_cost)>資金，技術花費降低<tech_reduction_pay>%

Text: Our sponsor can connect us to some of the best medical minds in the world.
Translation: 我們的贊助者能替我們找來世界上最傑出的醫療人才。

Text:
Our sponsor is very happy with the result, noting that this is further proof of the colony’s viability.

<effect><sponsor_name> has provided us with <funding(sponsor_bonus)>
Translation:
我們的贊助者看到結果稱有證據表明殖民地依然適宜居住時十分高興。

<effect><sponsor_name>向我們提供了<funding(sponsor_bonus)>

Text: The medical report on your desk is very positive and concludes that the Dust Sickness issue has been resolved permanently.
Translation: 你桌上的醫療報告結果喜人，結論稱沙塵病問題已被徹底解決了。

Text:
Complications from the Dust Sickness have resulted in several deaths. Unfortunately the only thing we can do for now is make sure we have enough medical facilities.

<effect><morale_penalty> Morale for <sols(morale_penalty_duration)> Sols
Translation:
沙塵病引起了若干位患者死亡。不幸的是，我們現在唯一能做的就是確保我們擁有足夠的醫療設施。

<effect><morale_penalty>士氣，持續<sols(morale_penalty_duration)>個太陽日

Text: The mood at the wake is somber and you can’t escape the accusatory looks from some colonists. The Dust Sickness has claimed another life.
Translation: 事件過後，人們心情低落，一些殖民地居民向你投來了職責的目光。又有一名沙塵病患者去世了。

Text: We are all grieving for our lost comrades.
Translation: 我們都在為過世的同伴哀悼。

Text: A sad day but we have to look to the future.
Translation: 這是悲傷的一天，但我們必須向前看。

Text: I will make sure that no colonists will ever suffer the same fate!
Translation: 我保證不會再有人遭受同樣的命運！

Text: The sounds of the Dust Storm keep colonists awake at night. Combined with the gloomy sunless daytime sky the conditions have made all colonists weary and irritable.
Translation: 沙塵暴的聲音讓殖民地居民們夜不能寐。再加上白天天昏地暗不見陽光，所有殖民地居民都疲憊不堪且暴躁易怒。

Text: The dome resonates with a quiet but never ending howl. You toss and turn in bed but sleep escapes you.
Translation: 在穹頂內迴盪的呼嘯聲雖然不大，但永不停止。你在床上輾轉反側，怎麼也睡不著。

Text: We can take it easy for a couple of days.
<performance_penalty> worker Performance until the Dust Storm is over
The colonists raise yet another toast with full glasses in hand. Even in the most desolate of worlds humans can rely on alcohol to escape their current worries.
Translation: 殖民地居民舉起盛滿的酒杯又祝了一次酒。即使在最荒涼的星球上，人類也能借酒消愁。

Text:
There was a serious discussion whether alcohol should be allowed in the first Martian colony or not. On the one hand culturally alcohol is widely accepted and considered a normal part of life. On the other alcohol has adverse effects on health and can lead to accidents. 

Ultimately it was allowed as it was believed that it can be helpful for colonists to feel more at home.

<effect> Several colonists have gained the Alcoholic trait.
Translation:
曾經進行過一場嚴肅的討論，主題是第一座火星殖民地中是否應該禁酒。一方面，從文化上說，酒已經得到了人們的普遍認可，並被視為日常生活的一部分。另一方面，酒對健康會產生負面效果，且可能導致意外。

最後還是同意了殖民地居民飲酒，因為人們相信這有助於讓殖民地居民感覺更加自在。

<effect>若干殖民者獲得了酒鬼特性。

Text: Invest in improving communications with Earth.
Translation: 投資改良與地球的通訊。

Old Text: costs $1,000B Funding, increases comfort of residences permanently
Old Translation: 花費$1000M資金，永久提升住宅舒適度

Text: You casually slump down in your favorite armchair and turn on the monitor to watch the latest episode of the trendiest TV show back on Earth.
Translation: 你隨意地坐在自己最喜歡的扶手椅上，轉到顯示幕的方向看地球上最火電視劇最新的一集。

Text:
A delay of between 4 to 24 minutes for information traveling between Earth and Mars rules real-time communication right out. However, our new communication satellites guarantee that every colonist has free access to information from Earth at their leisure.

<effect>Service Comfort of residences increased permanently.
Translation:
地球與火星之間的通訊有4到24分鐘的延遲，因此實時通訊是不可能的了。不過，我們的新通訊衛星確保每個殖民地居民能免費隨意訪問地球的資訊。

<effect>住宅服務舒適度永久提升。

Text:
Even with the years of training back on Earth, nothing can quite prepare you for the feeling of isolation of living on a barren planet with only a small piece of glass between you and the raging elements outside.

<effect>Colonist work Performance has been restored.
Translation:
就算在地球上接受了多年訓練，在一顆荒蕪星球上生活的孤獨感還是讓你無法適應，你與外界惡劣的環境之間僅隔著一小塊玻璃。

<effect>殖民地居民工作效率已恢復。

Text: As the Dust Storm clears, life in the Dome seems to be getting back on the right track.
Translation: 隨著沙塵暴的散去，穹頂裡的生活似乎又回到了正軌。

Text: The efficiency report from your <DisplayName> shows that production is way below the expected amount! Obviously, the workers trusted the application of Factory Automation too much to even bother doing their part.
Translation: 你<DisplayName>的效能報告指出產量遠低於預期！顯然，工人們過於信賴工廠自動化，連自己的本職工作都懶得幹了。
Old Text: The efficiency report from your <DisplayName> shows that production is way below the expected amount! Obviously, the workers trusted the application of Factory Automation too much to even bother do their part.
Old Translation: 你<DisplayName>的效能報告指出產量遠低於預期！顯然，工人們過於信賴工廠自動化，連自己的本職工作都懶得幹了。

Text: Something doesn’t add up with the production data from one of your factories. When you ask the shift manager, your words are met with guilty silence.
Translation: 一座工廠的產量資料不太對勁。你詢問值班經理時，對方愧疚地說不出話來。

Text: Not acceptable! The Colony depends on everyone doing their part.
Translation: 太不像話了！殖民地的發展靠的就是人人都做好本職工作。

Text: workers lose <comfort> Comfort and gain <morale> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
Translation: 工人舒適度下降<comfort>，士氣上升<morale>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日

Text: No harm done, we can overlook the accident.
Translation: 沒關係，這次的事我們就當沒發生過。

Text: risk the workers to become Lazy

A list of absurd and highly unpractical, not to mention impossible, demands has been forwarded to you.

If you fail to comply, they shall declare the <DisplayName> Dome independent from the rest of our colony. How that will happen, as they will be very much so dependent on us for Oxygen, Water and Power - to say the least - is beyond you.
Translation:
你收到一張清單，上面寫著不可能滿足的離譜條件。

如果你不答應這些條件，<DisplayName>穹頂就會宣佈從殖民地獨立出去。這幫人在氧氣、水資源和電力方面很大程度上得依賴我們，所以你實在想不明白怎麼會發生這種事。

Text: Our Renegade issues have escalated within one of our Domes.
Translation: 我們一個穹頂內的叛徒問題已經升級。

Text: They saw through your bluff so easily, as if refusing their demands was part of the plan.
Translation: 他們一眼就識破了你的虛張聲勢，彷彿我們拒絕這些條件也是他們計劃的一部分一樣。

Text:
They declare the Dome independent.

<effect>The Dome <DisplayName> has gone rogue!
Translation:
他們宣佈穹頂獨立。

<effect>穹頂<DisplayName>已不受控制！

Text: Give them time, they'll come around.
Translation: 給他們點時間，他們會明白過來的。

Text: They declare the Dome to be an independent colony on Mars.
Translation: 他們宣佈該穹頂是火星上的一座獨立殖民地。

Text:
We have been stripped off all access to it.

<effect>The Dome <DisplayName> has gone rogue!
Translation:
我們已經喪失了該穹頂的控制權。

<effect>穹頂<DisplayName>已叛變！

Text: Threaten to stop the power of their Dome.
Translation: 威脅他們說不給他們的穹頂供電。

Text: "If you have fallen so low, then we are willing to risk it. This is the reason we are declaring independence to begin with."
Translation: “如果你真的已經卑劣到了這種地步，那我們願意冒這個險。這正是我們宣佈獨立的原因。”

Text:
We have been stripped off all access to the Dome.

<effect>The Dome <DisplayName> has gone rogue!
Translation:
我們已經喪失了該穹頂的控制權。

<effect>穹頂<DisplayName>已叛變！

Text: Starving, cold and lost, the Colonists from the rogue Dome wish to return to the colony.
Translation: 叛變穹頂的居民飢寒交迫且不知所措，想要返回殖民地的懷抱。

Text: No, I think you haven't tried hard enough. We will not accept you back in the colony.
Translation: 你們一點誠意都沒有。我們殖民地容不下你們。
Old Text: No, I think you have tried hard enough. We will not accept you back in the colony.
Old Translation: 不，我認為你們是真心要跟我作對。我們殖民地容不下你們。

Text:
They promise never to do this again as they now realize the many difficulties that you face on a daily basis.

<effect>All colonists in the <Display_Name> Dome lose the renegade trait.
Translation:
他們保證再也不幹這種事，因為他們認識到了你每天都要面對的各種難題。

<effect><Display_Name>穹頂內的所有殖民地居民失去叛徒特性。

Text: The rogue Dome is begging us to rejoin the colony.
Translation: 叛變穹頂正在哀求我們重新接納他們。

Text:
Based on personal notes and research done by the scientist in question, strong arguments have been laid down why a practice of testing certain experimental techs on volunteers could present a serious boost to our science program. 

While the thesis is solid, the danger of lethal consequences for any volunteer is non-negligible. Traditionally, such experiments are never conducted on human subjects. Still - as the work puts it – maybe a new planet calls for a new mentality.
Translation:
根據科學家的個人記錄和進行的研究，在志願者身上進行某些實驗性技術的測試能大幅推進我們科學專案的進展這一觀點變得非常有說服力。

雖然論文沒有破綻，但不容忽視的是志願者可能有生命危險。按照慣例，這類實驗不能將人類當成實驗物件。不過，用論文的原話說，或許新的行星需要我們擁有新的心態。

Text: A peculiar thesis has been submitted by one of our scientists - anonymously.
Translation: 我們的一名科學家匿名發表了一批論文。

Text: Keeping our science one step ahead is our primary goal. Test the thesis.
Translation: 保證我們在科學上的領先是我們的主要目標。測試論文。

Text: Research will be boosted for the next 20 Sols
Translation: 在接下來的20個太陽日內研究加速

Text: Never approach me with such unethical suggestion again!
Translation: 這種不道德的提議不許再向我提起！

Text:
However, they know full well they don't have any jurisdiction over us, making all this little more than wishful thinking on their part. 

How do we answer?
Translation:
不過，他們很清楚管不了我們，因此這對他們來說只不過是一廂情願。

我們如何答覆？

Text: Amnesty International has learned of our practice to test dangerous research on volunteer colonists and has submitted a Cease and Desist order.
Translation: 國際特赦組織得知了我們對殖民地居民志願者進行危險測試的事，並下令我們停止這種行為。

Text: We have forgotten ourselves. We went too far. This stops today!
Translation: 我們已經忘乎所以。我們太過分了。必須立刻停止這種行為！

Text: A meaningless jab coming from a place where no one understands the problems we face on Mars. Carry on!
Translation: 他們的這種攻擊毫無意義，因為他們對我們在火星上面臨的問題一無所知。繼續實驗！

Text: <number_of_killed> colonists have died in research experiments

<if(is_commander("rocketscientist"))>[<commander_profile>] Testing out the new engine will be a high-stake endeavor. Perhaps it would be wise to keep the payloads minimal until design kinks have been ironed out.
Translation: <if(is_commander("rocketscientist"))>[<commander_profile>]測試新引擎是一項高風險工作。在設計上細枝末節的問題都被解決之前，只進行小負載量的測試或許是明智之舉。

Text: A new rocket engine has been developed by our sponsor on Earth.  We have been offered the dubious honor of testing the first prototype.
Translation: 我們地球上的贊助者開發了一種新火箭引擎。他們想要我們接受測試第一臺原型機的“殊榮”。

Text: Let me have a look at the blueprints
rocket travel time permanently decreased by <traveltime_decrease>%
Translation: 火箭飛行時間永久縮短<traveltime_decrease>%

Text: Luckily, the engine flaw was removed and the design has been updated to the new specs before any tragic accident took place.
Translation: 幸運的是，引擎的瑕疵已被移除，設計也已更新到最新規格，這樣一來就不會發生悲慘的事故了。

Text:
Luckily, the engine flaw was removed and the design has been updated to the new specs before any tragic accident took place.

Your own technical expertise contributed to the discovery of the flaw. You shudder to think about what could've happened if another commander was in charge of the mission.
Translation:
幸運的是，引擎的瑕疵已被移除，設計也已更新到最新規格，這樣一來就不會發生悲慘的事故了。

你自身掌握的技術專門知識在發現瑕疵方面發揮了作用。假如負責此次任務的指揮官不是你，會發生什麼事呢？想到這裡你就不寒而慄。

Text: A critical design flaw has been discovered in the prototype rocket. How could they miss that?
Translation: 我們發現原型火箭的設計上存在重大缺陷。他們怎麼會出這種紕漏？

Text: Luckily, our rockets are safe now
Translation: 幸運的是，我們的火箭現在安全了。

Text:
Sadly, the prototype engine had a crucial flaw. Precautions have been taken so this won't happen again. Still, the Rocket and its entire payload have been destroyed.

<effect>Lose 1 Rocket, the payload has been destroyed.
Translation:
十分不幸，原型引擎存在致命缺陷。我們已經採取預防措施，這種事不會發生第二次了。不過，火箭和上面運載的貨物已經毀壞。

<effect>損失1枚火箭以及上面裝載的貨物。
實驗性火箭 - 發射失敗

Text: The rocket launch was a catastrophic failure! A seal in the booster ruptured allowing a jet of pressurized gas into the fuel chamber, ultimately causing a massive explosion!
Translation: 火箭發射是一場災難性的失敗！推進器的封閉處出現裂痕，導致高壓氣體湧入燃燒室，最終引發了一場巨大的爆炸！
Old Text: The rocket launch was catastrophic failure! A seal in the booster ruptured allowing a jet of pressurized gas into the fuel chamber, ultimately causing a massive explosion!

Text: A tragic loss! The passengers will be commemorated as heroes.
Translation: 這次的損失太慘重了！我們會把乘客們當成英雄紀念。

Text: At least no human lives have been lost...
Old Text: At least no human lives has been lost...
Old Translation: 至少沒出人命……

Text: There are several other such items on various online auctions. And there are more than 100, 000 results for people who want to buy Martian rocks.
Translation: 在各種網上拍賣會上還有若干其他此類物品。搜尋想購買火星岩石者可以找到超過十萬條結果。

Text: "Pristine Martian Rock, verified taken during a vacation on Mars, price $1 million." Amusing and surprisingly – already sold!
Translation: “去火星度假帶回的真品純天然火星岩石。售價100萬美元。”既好笑又令人驚訝的是，居然已經售出了！
Old Text: ‘Pristine Martian Rock, verified taken during a vacation on Mars, price $1 million’. Amusing and surprisingly – already sold!
Old Translation: “去火星度假帶回的真品純天然火星岩石。售價100萬美元。”既好笑又令人驚訝的是，居然已經售出了！

Text: Mars belongs to all humans! Free rocks for everyone!
Translation: 火星屬於全人類！給所有人提供免費岩石！

Text: export Waste Rock for free, some Colonists become Enthusiasts
Translation: 免費出口礦渣，部分殖民地居民獲得熱心特性

Text: Exports Waste Rock for free as souvenirs for people on Earth.
Translation: 把礦渣當做免費紀念品出口到地球。
Old Text: "Exports Waste Rock for free as souvenirs for people on Earth."
Old Translation: “把礦渣當做免費紀念品出口到地球。”

Text: We should totally export Martian rocks!
Translation: 出口火星岩石？必須的啊！

Text: Exports Waste Rock to sell as souvenirs to Earthlings.
Translation: 把礦渣當做紀念品出口到地球出售。
Old Text: "Exports Waste Rock to sell as souvenirs to Earthlings."
Old Translation: “把礦渣當做紀念品出口到地球出售。”

Text: Why ordinary rocks? Colonists can sign them and we can sell them as souvenirs!
Translation: 為什麼賣普通石頭？我們可以叫殖民地居民在上面簽名，然後把它們當成紀念品出售！

Text: export Waste Rock for more Funding
Translation: 出口礦渣可獲得更多資金

Old Text: "Souvenir Export Rocket"
Old Translation: “紀念品出口火箭”

Text: Exports Waste Rock to sell as expensive souvenirs to Earthlings.
Translation: 把礦渣當做紀念品出口到地球高價出售。
Old Text: "Exports Waste Rock to sell as expensive souvenirs to Earthlings."
Old Translation: “把礦渣當做紀念品出口到地球高價出售。”

Text: Since the Sanity breakdown, the words of <DisplayName> no longer spread the good message. They have become something evil, sinister, making people believe in an ultimate darkness, an endless void and an abyss inside of their souls. The colony has never before experienced such a crisis of faith!
Translation: 自理智崩潰以來，<DisplayName>的話語不再傳播好消息。他們變成了邪惡的存在，令人們相信終極的黑暗、無盡的虛空，以及一個深淵就存在與他們的靈魂深處。殖民地之前從未經歷過這種信仰危機！

Text: Something sinister happened in the mind and soul of one of our holiest of colonists who lost all faith.
Translation: 我們一位最虔誠的殖民地居民喪失了信仰，且思想和靈魂發生了邪惡的質變。

Text: A Saint leaves the Colony, Morale penalty for all Colonists
Translation: 一位佈道者離開殖民地，所有殖民地居民士氣下降
殖民地居民中的信仰者獲得膽小特性

Text:
Thinking it a mere joke, you read through it and find out that a colonist by the name of <DisplayName>, who is born on Mars and has never been to Space, is propagating the notion that Mars is indeed flat, along with other conspiracy theories which naturally accompany such an idea.

<DisplayName> has broken no laws thus far but perhaps something should be done.
Translation:
你抱著看笑話的心態閱讀了全文，發現原來是一個名叫<DisplayName>的殖民地居民在搞事情。這個出生在火星且從未上過太空的傢伙正在宣揚“火星其實是扁平的”這一觀念，以及由此伴生出其他陰謀理論。

<DisplayName>到目前為止尚未觸犯法律，但我們或許應該採取一些行動。

Text: A message is forwarded to your inbox with the most curious title – Flat Mars Society.
Translation: 一封郵件被轉發到了你的收件箱中，標題很奇葩，叫《扁平火星社》

Text: I’m sure our colonists are reasonable enough not to board that wacky train.
Translation: 我們的殖民地居民肯定都是明白人，不會上這種假司機的車。

Text: Their plan involves some home-built craft that will take as many as <number_of_idiots> people high enough into the stratosphere to disprove that Mars is round once and for all. Needless to say, the craft looks incredibly dangerous and a far cry from having even the slimmest chance of success.
Translation: 他們計劃用某種自制的飛行器載著<number_of_idiots>人飛到平流層的高度，以一勞永逸的證明火星並不是圓的。不用說，他們的飛行器毫無安全性可言，成功機率也是不存在的。

Text: The head of the, now quite grown in numbers, Flat Mars Society has come up with a plan that will, quote - “bring down the veil of lies that the Martian government is feeding its colonists and will enlighten anyone who is willing to see past it!”
Translation: 現在已經人多勢眾的扁平火星社的社長想出了一個計劃，這個計劃將（引用原話）“揭穿火星政府為殖民地居民編造的謊言並啟迪一切願意識破謊言的人！”

Text: This has gone on long enough. Ban the Flat Mars Society!
Translation: 他們還有完沒完了。取締扁平火星社！
所有火星出生的殖民地居民士氣下降。

Text: You know what, let them do it!
Translation: 呵呵，既然他們想搞事情，那就讓他們搞！

Text: <DisplayName> has done enough harm, they may board the craft alone.
Translation: <DisplayName>已經產生了足夠的危害，他們可能會獨自坐上飛行器。

Text: There are no survivors amidst the wreckage.
The improvised aircraft lifts off with all the Flat Mars Society members onboard, rapidly loses speed and then quite expectedly comes down crashing.
Translation: 滿載著扁平火星社成員的自制飛行器升空了，但很快就失速，並不出所料地墜落了。

Text: Proclaim a day of mourning. Their misguided quest for the truth met a tragic end.
Translation: 宣佈今天為遇難者哀悼。誤入歧途的他們為了尋求真相最終迎來了悲慘的結局。

Text: I guess whoever designed the vehicle got their physics wrong.
Translation: 設計這個載具的傢伙大概物理沒學好吧。

Text: Were we wrong not to stop them? It is what they wished for.
Translation: 沒有阻止他們是不是我們的過錯呢？這是他們自己作死啊。

Old Text: <name> did not survive.
Old Translation: <name>沒能生還。

Text: The improvised aircraft lifts off with the Flat Mars Society leader onboard, rapidly loses speed and then quite expectedly comes down crashing.
Translation: 載著扁平火星社社長的自制飛行器升空了，但很快就失速，並不出所料地墜落了。

Text: Think what you will, but in the end, you can’t really cherry-pick your physics.
Translation: 隨你怎麼說，但到頭來你並不能按照自己的喜好來挑選物理學。

Text: The flawed idea killed them as much as the flawed vehicle.
Translation: 錯誤的理念加上有缺陷的載具導致他們喪了命。

Text:
Would you like a diet soda with your triple burger? For free! Your only obligation is to make the colonists eat (and supposedly enjoy) the branded meals.

<if(is_commander("oligarch"))>[<commander_profile>] Reading the fine print, the proposed contract excludes any demands for the quality of the served food.</if>
Translation:
來一份三層漢堡外加無糖汽水如何？免費的喲！你唯一的職責就是讓殖民地居民吃下（照道理應該是享用）品牌飯菜。

<if(is_commander("oligarch"))>[<commander_profile>]你在閱讀小字印刷的附加條款後，發現合約並未對飯菜的品質做出任何要求。</if>

Text: Two of the largest fast food chains have filed simultaneous requests to serve the colonists.
Translation: 最大的兩家快餐連鎖店同時申請向殖民地居民提供食物。

Text: Mars food will always be Bio and Organic!
Translation: 火星上只吃有機生態食品！

Text: Food service buildings grant more Comfort
Translation: 餐飲類服務建築提供更多舒適度
食物進口價格大幅降低
Old Text: free Food imports
Old Translation: 免費進口食物

Text: Give the permission to Burglar King.
free construction of Food service buildings
Translation: 免費建造餐飲類服務建築

Text: Let them compete, take bids from both!
Translation: 讓他們互撕去，我們兩家都允許！

Text:
No need to read the complaints. You’re looking at the cause right now. There’s a pile of Triple XL Mega-Veggie Burgers on your kitchen table. Untouched. From over a week. And they haven’t rotten. They also neither taste nor smell. You crave the days when you imbibed your tasteless half-liquid protein paste and were naive and happy.

But the contract is solid. What could be done, you wonder?
Translation:
沒必要看投訴了。原因就在你眼前。你餐桌上有一大堆三層XL號超大蔬菜漢堡。動都沒動過。已經放了一個星期了。而且它們還沒有變餿。它們也沒有氣味和味道。你渴望回到從前吃著沒有味道的半流體蛋白醬就心滿意的純真時代。

但合約已經簽下。你心想該怎麼辦呢？

Text: The colonists are extremely unhappy with the quality of food. You have received tons of complaints. Who would have thought that inviting a fast food super-giant would cause super-trouble?
Translation: 殖民地居民對食物品質極其不滿。你收到的投訴已經堆積成山。誰能想到投資快餐超級巨頭居然會產生超級大的麻煩？
若干位殖民地居民離開殖民地
Old Text: Several Colonists become Earthsick
Old Translation: 若干殖民地居民得思鄉病

Text: Pull some strings to set things right.

Old Text: Restore Food service quality
Old Translation: 恢復餐飲服務品質

Text: Sign a new contract with better terms.
Translation: 以對自己更有利的條件簽署新合約。

Old Text: Pay Funding, Restore Food service quality
Old Translation: 支付資金，恢復餐飲服務品質

Text: Gather activist support with an online campaign.
Translation: 組織線上活動，贏得活躍分子的支援

Old Text: Restore Food service quality
Old Translation: 恢復餐飲服務品質

Text: Vegans lose Sanity and Health, restore Food service quality
Translation: 素食主義者失去理智度和生命值，恢復餐飲服務品質
Old Text: Vegans lose Sanity and Health, Restore Food service quality
Old Translation: 素食主義者失去理智度和生命值，恢復餐飲服務品質

Text: Our satellites have caught an unbelievable sight at this place: a human boy playing on the cold dead surface of Mars.
Translation: 在這裡，我們的衛星探測到了讓人難以置信的景象：一個人類男孩在火星冰冷的地表上玩耍著。

Text:
On some of them a naked boy can be seen, carelessly jumping around and playing on the very surface of Mars. There is no oxygen mask in view, nor any protection from the impossible Martian cold.

Physicists are baffled and wildly speculate about optical illusions, atmospheric anomalies and all kind of quantum physics mumbo-jumbo. The truth is, we can never know what this is until we send an expedition.

<effect>A Planetary Anomaly has appeared on the map.
Translation:
在其中幾張圖片上，你可以看到一個沒穿衣服的男孩，開開心心地在火星表面跳來跳去。照片中的男孩並沒有戴氧氣面具，也沒有穿戴任何保護服，抵擋火星寒冷的氣候。

科學家們對此毫無頭緒。一時間，關於光學錯覺、大氣異常以及各種量子物理學的瘋狂猜想絡繹不絕。說實話，如果不派遣探險隊進行考察，我們永遠都無法得知真相。

<effect>地圖上出現了行星異象。

Text: One of our Sponsor's satellites have made some unbelievable photos on the surface of Mars.
Translation: 某位贊助者的衛星在火星表面拍到了幾張讓人難以置信的照片。

Text:
The medical team returned with a perfectly healthy boy, about 11 years old. DNA research confirmed he is 100% human and even revealed his origin: it is very probable he was conceived on the board of an early exploration rocket which was considered destroyed, and the crew was missing.

It is still a mystery how this boy survived on Mars without any protection. He doesn't speak any human language and only smiles and looks around with wide gleaming eyes. He doesn't seem to have ever met other humans before, so we'll need to teach him everything about our culture before we can ask any questions. 

<effect>The new Colonist Mike Martian has appeared.
Translation:
醫療團隊帶回了一位年約11歲，身體完全健康的男孩。透過基因研究，科學家發現這個男孩的身體構造100%屬於人類，甚至還推測出了他的身世：多年前，人們認為某艘火箭在火星上墜毀了，火箭上所有的乘客都失蹤了。

但是，這個孩子是怎麼在全無保護的情況下在火星上生存下來，這依然是個謎。他完全不會說人類的語言，只會笑著，睜著大眼睛環顧四周。他似乎也從來沒見過其他的人類，所以我們必須先教會他適應我們的文明，之後才能問他問題。

<effect>新的殖民地居民：“火星麥克”出現了。

Text: Let him have a normal childhood. Treat him as any other Martianborn kid.
Translation: 讓他享受正常的童年吧。像對待火星出生的其他孩子一樣對待他。

Text: wait for the child to grow

Little Mike is an exceptional child. He has trouble understanding basic concepts of money, parenting or death. He perceives the encyclopedia as a work of fiction and nothing can persuade him the knowledge it provides is based on scientific facts. 

There is much to be expected from such kid when he grows up.
Translation:
小麥克是個與眾不同的孩子。他很難理解某些基本的概念，如金錢、父母或死亡。他認為百科全書是一部虛構的作品，不相信上面的一切都是基於科學事實，沒有任何事情能讓他接受這一點。

像這樣的孩子長大之後，一定會給我們帶來不少驚喜。

Text: Become his tutor and help him unfold his potential.
Translation: 成為他的導師，幫助他發掘他的潛能。

Text: wait for the child to grow, while trying to learn something from him
Translation: 等待孩子長大，同時試圖從他身上學到些什麼

Text:
Little Mike is an exceptional child. He has trouble understanding basic concepts of money, parenting or death. He perceives the encyclopedia as a work of fiction and nothing can persuade him the knowledge it provides is based on scientific facts.

However, you learn a lot from his weird perspective and gain ideas which change the very life on Mars.

<effect>A Breakthrough has been revealed.
Translation:
小麥克是個與眾不同的孩子。他很難理解某些基本的概念，如金錢、父母或死亡。他認為百科全書是一部虛構的作品，不相信上面的一切都是基於科學事實，沒有任何事情能讓他接受這一點。

不過，從他古怪的思想中，你得到了某些靈感。這些靈感可以改變火星上的生活方式。

<effect>已解鎖某項突破性技術。

Text:
Little Mike is an exceptional child. He has trouble understanding basic concepts of money, parenting or death. He perceives the encyclopedia as a work of fiction and nothing can persuade him the knowledge it provides is based on scientific facts.

However, you learn a lot from his weird perspective and gain ideas which change the very life on Mars.

<effect>New Techs have been revealed.
Translation:
小麥克是個與眾不同的孩子。他很難理解某些基本的概念，如金錢、父母或死亡。他認為百科全書是一部虛構的作品，不相信上面的一切都是基於科學事實，沒有任何事情能讓他接受這一點。

不過，從他古怪的思想中，你得到了某些靈感。這些靈感可以改變火星上的生活方式。

<effect>已解鎖新的技術。

Text:
Little Mike is an exceptional child. He has trouble understanding basic concepts of money, parenting or death. He perceives the encyclopedia as a work of fiction and nothing can persuade him the knowledge it provides is based on scientific facts.

However, you learn a lot from his weird perspective and gain ideas which change the very life on Mars.

<effect>Gain <research(research_gain)>.
Translation:
小麥克是個與眾不同的孩子。他很難理解某些基本的概念，如金錢、父母或死亡。他認為百科全書是一部虛構的作品，不相信上面的一切都是基於科學事實，沒有任何事情能讓他接受這一點。

不過，從他古怪的思想中，你得到了某些靈感。這些靈感可以改變火星上的生活方式。

<effect>獲得<research(research_gain)>。

Text: Gain information using hypnosis and other scientific methods.
Translation: 使用催眠與其它科學手段獲取資訊。

Text: unlock new techs, the child may be traumatized
Translation: 解鎖新的技術，但可能會對孩子造成創傷

Text:
A scientist leads Mike in the lab. Mike trustfully holds her by the hand, smiling wide and looking around with curiosity. She puts him on a bed and places electrodes on his head, strain gauges on his chest and an oximeter on his finger. Then she puts him under hypnosis and starts one of many sessions in which the boy throws himself from one side to another, and sometimes just stops and looks in the camera with wide empty eyes.

Then one day Mike just disappears. No one knows where he has gone, or how he vanished in thin air.
<effect>New Techs have been revealed.
Translation:
一位科學家把麥克帶進了實驗室。邁克充滿信任地握著她的手，笑得很開心，好奇地看看這裡看看那裡。她讓他躺在床上，把電極放在他的頭上，給他的胸部裝上了計量器，手指上安上了血氧計。之後，她讓他進入了催眠狀態，開始了一個接一個的實驗。在這個過程中，男孩不停地輾轉反側，有時又睜著空洞的雙眼，呆呆地看著攝影機。

某一天，麥克突然消失了。沒人知道他去了哪裡，也沒人知道他是怎麼憑空消失的。
<effect>解鎖了新的技術。

Text:
A scientist leads Mike in the lab. Mike trustfully holds her by the hand, smiling wide and looking around with curiosity. She puts him on a bed and places electrodes on his head, strain gauges on his chest and an oximeter on his finger. Then she puts him under hypnosis and starts one of many sessions in which the boy only smiles at her with maddening patience.

<effect>A new Tech has been revealed.
Translation:
一位科學家把麥克帶進了實驗室。邁克充滿信任地握著她的手，笑得很開心，好奇地看看這裡看看那裡。她讓他躺在床上，把電極放在他的頭上，給他的胸部裝上了計量器，手指上安上了血氧計。之後，她讓他進入了催眠狀態，開始了一個接一個的實驗。在這個過程中，男孩只是帶著令人心疼的耐心，微笑著看著她。

<effect>解鎖了新的技術。

Text: Send him to Earth. Let our Sponsor handle this.
Translation: 把他送回地球，交給贊助者來處理吧。

Text:
Your Sponsor team is intrigued with your discovery. When he grows up, Mike creates a turmoil back on Earth, introducing whole new concepts and thinking patterns. He even starts a new religion in an attempt to change the very basis of human nature. 

He never finds the time to visit his home planet Mars, but our sponsor occasionally sends us the news about him, along with reports about the science advancements they deem useful to us.
Translation:
你的贊助者們為你的發現嘖嘖稱奇。麥克長大之後，他在地球上掀起了新的浪潮，為地球人帶來了全新的概念與思維方式。他甚至創立了新的宗教，試圖改變人類的本性。

他始終沒抽出時間返回他的故鄉，但我們的贊助者偶爾會給我們發來關於他的報導，以及關於各種由他發現的，對我們有用的科學進步。

Text:
Mike, the person who has been found as a child roaming the Mars surface without any protective equipment, has grown into a young man. He has learned several languages, but he still claims he lacks the words needed to explain how he survived and what is his connection with some "old ones" he mentions every once and again. Some say he has been raised by aliens, but he disagrees. All the questions, he says, can be answered only in the tongue of the Old Ones, as the language shapes the thought and the thought can change space and time.

Eventually, Mike decided that the humankind is hopelessly confused and unhappy, and he tried to establish a new religion which would change the very human nature by teaching the language of the Old Ones. His cult which promotes social libertarianism and some non-mainstream family structures, quickly gathered followers in our colony.

Needless to say, these ideas put pressure on our community.
<effect>Some of our Colonists became Religious.
Translation:
麥克，那個沒穿任何防護裝置漫遊火星的小男孩，如今已經變成了一個年輕的小夥子。他學會了好幾門語言，但他說，這些語言都不足以說明他是怎麼在火星上存活下來的。他時常聲稱，這些語言缺乏與某些“古老者”的聯絡。有人說他是被外星人養大的，但他否認了這種說法。他說，這所有的問題，都只能用“古老者”的語言進行回答，因為這種語言可以塑造思想，而思想可以改變時空。

到了最後，麥克認為，人類的本性就是困惑與不快樂，已經無可救藥。於是他創立了一種新的宗教，試圖透過傳授“古老者”的語言，來改變人類的本性。他的宗教提倡社會自由主義與非主流的家庭結構，並很快在殖民地中吸引了許多信徒。

自不必說，這些想法為我們的社群帶來了壓力。
<effect>一部分殖民地居民成為了信仰者。

Text: Mike means only good. Let him do whatever he deems necessary.
Translation: 麥克的本意是好的。他想做什麼，就讓他去做吧。

Text: many Religious Colonists lose Morale, a few become Saints
Translation: 大量信仰者士氣下降，少量信仰者成為佈道者

Text:
With your permission, Mike establishes the Church of Two Worlds as an official religion. This introduces immense social tension within our colony. Some insist that he and his people should be burned as witches, and others fiercely support him. However, the Old Ones' language really provides some unexplored psycho-kinetic abilities and even though modern science can't explain them, Mike and his people use their powers to help our community.

<effect><colonists_pissed_2>% of Religious Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(pissed_time)> Sols.
<new_saints> more Colonists have become Saints.
Translation:
在你的許可之下，麥克的“雙世教堂“成為了官方許可的信仰。這在殖民地中掀起了巨大的社會爭端。一部分人堅信他和他的信徒應該像女巫一樣被燒死，還有的人則強烈地支援他。然而，古老者的語言確實給人們帶來了某種我們尚未發現的精神力量，即便是現代科學也無法解釋這種力量。麥克與他的信徒們使用這種力量來幫助我們的社群。

<effect><colonists_pissed_2>%的信仰者居民士氣降低<morale_loss>，持續<sols(pissed_time)>個太陽日。
<new_saints>更多的居民成為了佈道者。

Text:
With your permission, Mike establishes the Church of Two Worlds as an official religion. The Old Ones' language really provides some unexplored psycho-kinetic abilities and even though modern science can't explain them, Mike and his people use their powers to help our community.

However, this introduces immense social tension within our colony. Some insist that he and his people should be burned as witches, and others fiercely support him. One day, a mob of angry and confused people attacks him at his house and Mike dies as a martyr. Strangely, the shock of what's done makes everybody sober down and the peace is finally restored.

<effect>Mike is dead.
<colonists_pissed_1>% of Religious Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(pissed_time)> Sols.
<new_saints> more Colonists have become Saints.
Translation:
在你的許可之下，麥克的“雙世教堂“成為了官方許可的信仰。古老者的語言確實給人們帶來了某種我們尚未發現的精神力量，即便是現代科學也無法解釋這種力量。麥克與他的信徒們使用這種力量來幫助我們的社群。

然而，這在殖民地中掀起了巨大的社會爭端。一部分人堅信他和他的信徒應該像女巫一樣被燒死，還有的人則強烈地支援他。某一天，一群憤怒而又糊塗的暴民襲擊了他的住所，麥克作為殉道者犧牲了自己。奇怪的是，麥克的死讓所有人都立刻恢復了冷靜，殖民地終於恢復了和平。

<effect>麥克死了。
<colonists_pissed_1>%的信仰者居民士氣降低<morale_loss>，持續<sols(pissed_time)>個太陽日。
<new_saints>更多居民成為了佈道者。

Text: Forbid his new religion, but secretly support him.
Translation: 禁止他的新宗教，但在暗地裡支援他。

Text: some Religious Colonists lose Morale, a few become Saints
Translation: 部分信仰者士氣下降，少量信仰者成為佈道者

Text:
Mike establishes the Church of Two Worlds as a secret cult and this creates some social tension between his followers and the other members of society. However, the Old Ones' language really provides some unexplored psycho-kinetic abilities and even though modern science can't explain them, Mike and his people use their powers to help our community.

<effect><colonists_pissed_1>% of Religious Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(pissed_time)> Sols.
<new_saints> more Colonists have become Saints.
Translation:
麥克的“雙世教堂“成為了祕密宗教結社，他的信徒與其它宗教的信徒之間產生了某些爭端。然而，古老者的語言確實給人們帶來了某種我們尚未發現的精神力量，即便是現代科學也無法解釋這種力量。麥克與他的信徒們使用這種力量來幫助我們的社群。

<effect><colonists_pissed_1>%的信仰者居民士氣降低<morale_loss>，持續<sols(pissed_time)>個太陽日。
<new_saints>更多的居民成為了佈道者。

Text: The road to hell is paved with good intentions. Banish Mike to keep the peace.
Translation: 良好的願望往往會招致惡果。放逐麥克，恢復和平。

Text: Mike is sent to Earth, some Security Officers gain Morale
Translation: 麥克被送到地球，部分警官士氣上升

Text:
Mike creates a turmoil back on Earth and saves us the trouble. He introduces whole new concepts and thinking patterns, eventually provoking a social revolution.

He never finds the time to visit again his home planet Mars.

<effect>Mike leaves Mars.
<security_happy>% of Security Officers gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(happy_time)> Sols.
Translation:
麥克在地球上掀起了一股浪潮，而我們則免遭影響。他帶來了各種新的概念與思維方式，最終引起了一場社會革命。

他再也沒抽出時間返回故鄉。

<effect>麥克離開了火星。
<security_happy>%的警官士氣升高<morale_gain>，持續<sols(happy_time)>個太陽日。

Text: Luckily for the victim, <DisplayName> botched the assault attempt and failed to cause any harm, but this doesn't mean that the incident should be ignored.
Translation: 幸運的是，笨手笨腳的<DisplayName>襲擊失敗，並未對被襲擊者造成傷害，但這並不意味著這件事我們可以不管。

Text: An Arcology resident has committed an armed assault against another Colonist! This is a rather strange case as nothing in the perpetrator’s file suggests a criminal intent.
Translation: 一位生態建築居民對另一位居民進行了武裝襲擊！此事十分離奇，因為從襲擊者的檔案中完全看不出犯罪意圖。

Text: Our security specialists questioned all people related to both the victim and the perpetrator, but all the evidence is inconclusive.
Translation: 我們的安全專家詢問了與受害者以及襲擊者有關的所有人，但並未找到決定性證據。

Text:
Indeed, the personal records of both Colonists suggest no relation between them. But some of the close friends and acquaintances of <DisplayName> who also happen to live in the same Arcology display an unusual animosity against the victim, justifying the actions of the perpetrator.

All in all, the Officers suggest that we release the perpetrator and place them under surveillance.
Translation:
兩位殖民地居民的個人記錄表明兩人之間確實不存在任何關聯。但<DisplayName>的幾位好友和同事碰巧也住在同一座生態建築裡，並對受害者展現出了不同尋常的敵意，這對襲擊者的行為做出瞭解釋。

總而言之，警官建議我們放了襲擊者並對其進行監視。

Text: After a long and tiresome session with the perpetrator, you’ve managed to raise even more questions.
Translation: 與襲擊者進行完冗長而累人的談話後，你的疑問反而變多了。

Text:
<DisplayName> has finally opened up and revealed a confused psyche. Prone to suggestions and self-doubt, the perpetrator seems too naive to perform such a crime alone. Furthermore, <DisplayName> hadn’t spoken to anyone at all about the affair – instead, all of a sudden, obsessive thoughts of harming the victim appeared.

Immersed in heavy thoughts, you release the perpetrator. You place them under surveillance, hoping to find out more.
Translation:
<DisplayName>終於坦白，並展現出一種迷惑的心態。襲擊者對自己缺乏信心且易受擺佈，這種天真的人似乎不太可能獨自犯下這種罪行。另外，<DisplayName>之前並未對任何人提起此事，而是突然之間產生了傷害被襲擊者的強烈意願。

陷入沉思的你放走了襲擊者。你對其進行了監視，希望能有所發現。

Text: Go through their personal file again, there’s got to be something there!
Translation: 再次仔細檢查他們的個人檔案，肯定能找到蛛絲馬跡！

Text: After hours of tedious rifling through the perpetrator’s personal file you fail to discover anything of value.
Translation: 對襲擊者的個人檔案進行數小時乏味的檢查後，你未能發現任何有價值的內容。

Text:
You have the deep feeling that <DisplayName> isn’t guilty, but you have no other choice but to condemn the unfortunate soul.

<effect><DisplayName> has become a Renegade.
Translation:
你內心深處認為<DisplayName>是無罪的，但你除了給這個不幸者判刑外別無選擇。

<effect><DisplayName>變成了叛徒。

Text:
The security personnel quickly caught the would-be perpetrators before they could strike. The life in the colony continues to go by but something sinister is unfolding.

<effect>A new tech - "Violent Urges" – has become available. Research it to gain insight on the situation.
Translation:
保安在罪犯行凶之前就將其抓獲。殖民地的生活仍在繼續，但某種不祥之兆正在展現。

<effect>新技術“暴力衝動”已開放。研究該技術以深入瞭解這種情況。

Text: Only our preemptive measures have prevented another crime spree as several Arcology residents attempted assaults against unsuspecting Colonists.
Translation: 若干位生態建築居民企圖對毫無防備的殖民地居民發起襲擊，好在我們及時採取行動制止了犯罪。

Text:
<DisplayName> isn’t among the perpetrators, but the pattern remains the same – complete lack of any personal or professional relation between the victims and the attackers. The situation might be getting out of hand.

<effect><injured_colonists> Colonists had lost <injure_damage> Health.
Translation:
襲擊者中並沒有<DisplayName>，但情況和之前一樣：襲擊者和被襲擊者之間在個人生活和工作上沒有半點關聯。這種情況或許會變得無法控制。

<effect><injured_colonists>殖民地居民失去<injure_damage>生命值。

Text: Another worrying assault has happened and this time it involves several Arcology residents jumping with their bare fists at unsuspecting Colonists.
Translation: 又發生了一起令人擔憂的襲擊事件，這一次是若干位赤手空拳的生態建築居民突然襲擊了毫無防備的殖民地居民。

Text: We’re in the dark. We need further research on the subject.
Translation: 我們毫無頭緒。我們需要對此事進行深入研究。

Text: Suspicions and dark rumors spread through the Colony as your team is trying to uncover the truth. People feel threatened – and probably for a reason?
Translation: 你的團隊在設法查明真相期間，殖民地裡疑雲密佈，令人不安的謠言四起。居民們人人自危。至於原因，大概是有的吧？

Text: <effect>All Colonists lose <rumor_morale> Morale for <sols(rumor_sols)> Sols. Research the "Violent Urges" tech to reveal the secret behind the inexplicable crimes.
Translation: <effect>所有殖民地居民士氣下降<rumor_morale>，持續<sols(rumor_sols)>個太陽日。研究“暴力衝動”技術以揭示不可思議的犯罪行為背後的祕密。

Text: I think I might have some ideas!
Suspicions and dark rumors spread through the Colony as your team is trying to uncover the truth. People feel threatened – and probably for a reason?
Translation: 你的團隊在設法查明真相期間，殖民地裡疑雲密佈，令人不安的謠言四起。居民們人人自危。至於原因，大概是有的吧？

Text:
You have some wild theories, and even if they sound crazy, they are still a starting point. Only time would tell if your experience with sci-fi crime fic would come in handy.

<effect>All Colonists lose <rumor_morale> Morale for <sols(rumor_sols)> Sols. Research the "Violent Urges" tech to reveal the secret behind the inexplicable crimes. The tech receives 50% discount.
Translation:
你有一些不太靠譜的理論，即使聽起來很荒唐，但依然能當成切入點。你看了那麼多科幻犯罪小說到底能不能派上用場，只有時間能證明了。

<effect>所有殖民地居民士氣下降<rumor_morale>，持續<sols(rumor_sols)>個太陽日。研究“暴力衝動”技術以揭示不可思議的犯罪行為背後的祕密。此技術獲得50%折扣。

Text:
When a criminal mastermind, a true psychopath, like our Colonist <DisplayName> enters the close-knit society of the hive mind, the sheer will of the said individual could overpower the ones who are weak-willed and prone to suggestion. Constantly projecting thoughts of crime and murder into the mental network steadily erodes the sanity of the victims who become unwilling pawns of the criminal.

<effect><DisplayName> has been exiled and has left the Colony.
Translation:
當一個像我們殖民地居民<DisplayName>這樣的犯罪策劃者兼真正的瘋子進入了緊密結合在一起的蜂巢思維社會後，此人能靠強大的意志力強行支配意志力薄弱者，使他們服從自己的命令。向精神網路不斷地傳送犯罪與謀殺的念頭持續侵蝕著被迫變為罪犯傀儡者的理智。

<effect><DisplayName>已被放逐並離開了殖民地。
自由意志：暴力衝動已化解

Text: The mysterious crime spree by Arcology residents has been solved. As with most complicated cases, the truth is hard to believe, but yet evident.
Translation: 生態建築居民不可思議的連續犯罪事件的真相已經查明。與大多數複雜的案件一樣，真相令人難以置信，卻又顯而易見。

Text: Upgrade Hive Mind hardware in all Arcologies.
Translation: 升級所有生態建築中的蜂巢思維硬體。

Text: all Arcologies enter maintenance for <electronics(shield_cost)> and gain <comfort_bonus> residence Comfort forever
Translation: 花費<electronics(shield_cost)>對所有生態建築進行維護，且住宅舒適度永久上升<comfort_bonus>

Text: Concentrate on boosting personal motivation in Arcologies.
Translation: 集中精力調動生態建築居民的個人積極性。

Text: All Arcology residents gain <morale_up> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
Translation: 所有生態建築居民士氣上升<morale_up>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日

Text: The temperatures have dropped to a new all-time low, well outside the operational range of our Power Accumulators. Existing batteries will shut down and stop working for the duration of the Cold Wave unless we do something quickly.
Translation: 溫度降到了歷史新低，遠遠低於蓄電池的工作溫度。若我們不儘快想想辦法，現有的電池就將在寒流期間停止運轉。
Old Text: The temperatures have dropped to a new all-time low, well outside the operational range of our Power Accumulators. Batteries outside of heated zones will begin to freeze and stop working for the duration of the Cold Wave.
Old Translation: 溫度降到了歷史新低，遠遠低於蓄電池的工作溫度。寒流期間，加熱區外的電池將凍結並停止運轉。

Text: The morning is particularly chilly. Sipping your cup of tea, you survey the frozen landscape just in time to see the warning lights of several accumulators flash red.
Translation: 今天早上特別冷。你啜了一口茶，四處查看著冰封的景象，剛好看到若干處蓄電池的警示燈閃起紅光。

Text: Increase the voltage to heat the grid.
each Accumulator will need <electronics(maintenance)> emergency maintenance
Translation: 每個蓄電池將需要<electronics(maintenance)>緊急維護

Text: We can manage without our Power reserves for now.
Translation: 沒有電力儲備我們也能應付一陣子。

Text: all Accumulators will stop working until the end of the Cold Wave
Translation: 所有蓄電池將停止運轉，直到寒流結束。
Old Text: all Accumulators will freeze
Old Translation: 所有蓄電池都將凍結

Text:
We will definitely bring Mr. <DisplayName> to your attention, if only we could catch him sober enough...

Yet his still apparatus is an example for an amazingly simple and effective design. It’s a shame he didn’t focus these skills on his work.
Translation:
我們一定會將<DisplayName>先生帶到你面前，只不過我們很難在他清醒的時候找到他……

不過他的蒸餾裝置出奇得簡單高效，堪稱典範。真可惜他沒能專心把這樣的才能用在工作上。

Text: A Colonist has discovered a new way to use fungal waste by-products in order to create alcohol.
Translation: 一位殖民地居民想出了用真菌廢渣副產品制酒的辦法。

Text: Destroy the still and forbid such experiments.
Translation: 摧毀蒸餾器，禁止進行此類實驗。

Text: Does it have a good kick? People may enjoy some distraction.
Translation: 這酒勁頭大不大啊？居民們可以適當飲酒放鬆一下。

Text: Sounds cool. We should advertise this as a unique local beverage!
Translation: 聽起來不錯。我們應該給這種獨特的當地飲品打廣告！

Text: This design can be improved. Mars deserves the first hangover-free alcohol!
Translation: 還能對設計進行改良。我們理應在火星上率先開發出不會引起宿醉的酒！
<DisplayName>變成導師，星際酒吧+<spacebar_comfort>服務舒適度

Text:
The Colonist smiled shyly, hiccupped, and said: “Well, BUUURP, you need it r-right now?” Seems that your Colonists enjoy quite a bit the new Fungahol you allowed for production.

<effect>Alcoholic Colonists gain +50 Sanity and +10 Morale for 5 Sols.
Translation:
殖民地居民露出靦腆的笑容，打了個嗝說道：“呃，*嗝*，你 - 現在就要嗎？”你允許生產新的真菌酒後，看來你的殖民地居民們飲酒有些過度。

<effect>殖民地居民中的酒鬼理智度+50且士氣+10，持續5個太陽日。

Text: Today you met a Colonist on the street and asked about their name.
Translation: 今天你在街上遇到一個不知道自己叫什麼名字的殖民地居民。

Text:
A short investigation into the matter has revealed that a Renegade Engineer has actively been sabotaging repair parts used in the maintenance of these factories.

Citing the bad conditions and contempt they feel for the leadership of the colony as reasons for their behavior, they thought that sabotaging the mission would somehow advance their cause.
Translation:
對此事進行簡短調查後，你發現一名叛徒工程師正在主動破壞這些工廠裡使用的維修零件。

此人對糟糕的條件十分不滿，且蔑視殖民地的領導者，於是幹出了這種事。此人認為暗中破壞任務就是在為自己的事業做貢獻。

Text: Our factories have began eating up a lot of electricity.
Translation: 我們的工廠正在消耗大量電力。

Text: All Factories closed for repairs after sabotage.
Translation: 所有工廠因遭到破壞而停工檢修。

Text:
The flourishing gardens mixed with the unavoidable exposure to particles of dust and radiation despite our best shielding efforts has helped certain bacteria that followed us on Mars to evolve in a completely new direction.

The new organism is harmless but standard decontamination protocols suggest that it should be removed.
Translation:
草木茂盛的花園加上暴露在沙粒與輻射之下（我們已經盡最大努力做了防護工作）導致一種跟著我們來到火星的細菌朝著全新的方向發生了進化。

這種新有機體對人體無害，但標準消毒規範建議我們除掉它們。

Text: The unique mixture of habitat conditions within the Geoscape Dome has resulted in a new kind of bacterial life form evolving.
Translation: 地質穹頂內獨特的混合型棲息環境令一種新細菌生命形式進化了出來。
Old Text: The unique mixture of habitat conditions within the GeoDome has resulted in a new kind of bacterial life form evolving.
Old Translation: 地質穹頂內獨特的混合型棲息環境令一種新細菌生命形式進化了出來。

Text: Follow the protocol and sterilize the Geoscape Dome, perhaps there is an unseen danger there.
Translation: 遵守規範並為地質穹頂進行殺菌，或許存在潛在風險。
Old Text: Follow the protocol and sterilize the Geodome, perhaps there is an unseen danger there.
Old Translation: 遵守規範並為地質穹頂進行殺菌，或許存在潛在風險。

Text: Colonists in the Geoscape Dome lose <comfort_loss> Comfort
Translation: 地質穹頂的殖民地居民舒適度下降<comfort_loss>
Old Text: Colonists in the Geo Dome lose <comfort_loss> Comfort
Old Translation: 地質穹頂的殖民地居民舒適度下降<comfort_loss>

Text: Observe the life cycle of the organism in the Geoscape Dome ecosystem - this is a unique opportunity to learn!
Translation: 在地質穹頂的生態系統中觀察這種有機體的生命週期。這是獨特的學習機會！
Old Text: Observe the life cycle of the organism in the Geodome ecosystem - this is a unique opportunity to learn!
Old Translation: 在地質穹頂的生態系統中觀察這種有機體的生命週期。這是獨特的學習機會！

Text:
We are forced to evacuate all Colonists until the Dome has been sterilized.

<effect>Geoscape Dome will be closed off for <sols(disable_duration)> Sols.
Translation:
我們被迫疏散穹頂內的所有殖民地居民，直到殺菌完成。

<effect>地質穹頂將關閉<sols(disable_duration)>個太陽日。

Text: Crucial life-support modules of the Dome are infected with the new bacteria discovered earlier, and their functionality hindered.
Translation: 之前發現的新細菌感染了穹頂的關鍵維生模組，導致其發生故障。

Text:
Our understanding of what is known as "accelerated evolution" has greatly increased and has shed light on many former mysteries within the field.

<effect>Gain <research(rp)>
Translation:
我們對“加速進化”有了更為深入的理解，並弄明白了很多以前的不解之謎。

<effect>獲得<research(rp)>

Text: Observing the new life within the Geoscape Dome has proven to be of great scientific value to us.
Translation: 事實證明，在地質穹頂內觀察新生命形式擁有巨大的科學價值。
Old Text: Observing the new life within the GeoDome has proven to be of great scientific value to us.
Old Translation: 事實證明，在地質穹頂內觀察新生命形式擁有巨大的科學價值。

Text:
The formation hints of active lava flows during a time when they were considered to have been geologically dead for millions of years. 

Calls from geologists - both from Earth and Mars - to cease work of the Extractor until the formation is properly studied, are mounting.
Translation:
從構成可以推測出這裡有熔岩流動，但我們原以為這裡已經幾百萬年沒有地質活動了。

地球和火星的地質學家們發來的消息已堆積如山，他們請求我們在正確地研究這種構成之前先停止挖掘工作。

Text: The Excavator has unearthed a rare geological formation which challenges our understanding of Mars.
Translation: 挖掘機挖到了一種挑戰我們對火星認知的罕見地質構成。
把挖掘機關閉<sols(disable_duration)>個太陽日。

Text: Continue excavating - we need the resources.
Translation: 繼續挖掘，我們需要資源。

Text: Perhaps there is something more to be discovered there. Disable the Excavator for <sols(disable_duration)> Sols.
Translation: 也許還能發現更多東西。把挖掘機關閉<sols(disable_duration)>個太陽日。

Text: Gained <research(reward_rp)>. The Excavator is back in operation.

A bomb has exploded in a Spacebar. There are casualties. 

In light of our recent Renegade problem, this brazen act of violence was the final drop as far as our otherwise peaceful Colonists are concerned.

Everyone is voicing their disdain with the Renegades and demands that we take action. Ruthless action.
Translation:
星際酒吧裡發生了炸彈爆炸事件。造成了人員傷亡。

最近叛徒麻煩不斷，而這一明目張膽的暴力行為令一向愛好和平的殖民地居民們忍無可忍。

大家都在表達著對叛徒的鄙視，並要求我們採取行動。以牙還牙。

Text: Renegades: The Grip of the Lawless
A war between two rival gangs of Renegades has taken a dark turn.
Translation: 兩個對立的叛徒團伙之間的戰爭朝著令人擔憂的方向發展。

Text: So it has come to this - our first executions on another world. Humanity will never change.
Translation: 事到如今已沒有別的辦法。人類將首次在外星球上執行死刑。人類本性難移。

Text: Never! Mars shall not be sullied by capital punishment.
Translation: 不行！絕不能讓死刑玷汙火星。

Text: Renegades will be shipped off the colony

<DisplayName> couldn’t bear any responsibility anymore and lost the motivation to go on. Their co-workers fear that their colleague could make some irreparable mistakes.

<effect>Colonist <DisplayName> is unable to work.
Translation:
<DisplayName>在責任的重壓之下崩潰，失去了前進的動力。此人的同事們擔心此人會犯下無法挽回的錯誤。

<effect>殖民地居民<DisplayName>無法工作。

Text: Sanity Breakdown - Hello Darkness, My Old Friend
Translation: 理智崩潰 - 黑夜啊，我的老朋友。

Text: A colonist has snapped, and after regaining consciousness, has plunged into the deepest depression.
Translation: 一位殖民地居民崩潰了。醒來後，陷入了極度的抑鬱之中。
我有什麼資格說三道四呢？

Text: I would suggest seeking professional help.
Translation: 我建議尋求專業人士的幫助。

Text: Together we could find the answer why the previous self was unwanted.
Translation: 我們可以一起查明為何不需要之前的自己。

Text: This is a sensitive subject that could stir some controversy in the colony.
Translation: 這是敏感話題，可能會在殖民地裡引起爭議。

Text: With the further expansion of the colony, there is a petition among our growing religious community to proclaim Mars a holy land.
Translation: 隨著殖民地的進一步擴張，日益壯大的宗教團體內有人情願稱火星是聖地。

Old Text: Such a grean idea! Halleluiah!
Old Translation: 妙啊！哈雷路亞！

Text: all Religious get Morale boost, all other Colonists get Morale penalty
Translation: 所有信仰者士氣上升，其他所有殖民地居民士氣下降。

Text: Mars is for all humans regardless of their beliefs.
Translation: 火星屬於全人類，不受宗教信仰的制約。

Text: all Religious get Morale penalty, all other Colonists get Morale boost
Translation: 所有信仰者士氣下降，其他所有殖民地居民士氣上升。

Text: We value all members of the human race equally.
Translation: 我們對所有人類同胞都一視同仁。

Text: This is absurd! Religion has no place on Mars.
Translation: 荒唐！火星上沒有宗教的容身之處。

Text: Comfort of all Religious Colonists is set to 0, non-Religious Colonists get Morale boost
Translation: 所有信仰者殖民地居民舒適度設為0。非信仰者殖民地居民士氣上升。

Text:
With a homemade explosive in their possession and extremely stressed out, <DisplayName> has the following demands:

<funding(money)> to be transferred to an unknown account in crypto currency and a Rover with which to escape to some unknown destination.
Translation:
<DisplayName>自制了炸藥，在極端的壓力之下，提出以下條件：

將<funding(money)>以密碼貨幣的形式轉入一個不明帳戶，並提供一輛探測車，以便其逃往未知的目的地。
