Text: A crisis has arisen in one of our Casinos. A Renegade has taken hostages inside the building.
Translation: 我們一座賭場裡出現了危機。一名叛徒在建築物裡挾持了人質。

Text: An explosive will endanger the entire Dome. Give them what they want.
Translation: 爆炸會危及到整座穹頂。答應這些條件。

Text: We will not negotiate with terrorists. Denied!
Translation: 我們不和恐怖分子談條件。拒絕！

Text: Send the money but apprehend the suspect as they head towards the Rover.
Translation: 把錢打過去，但當目標走向探測車時將其逮捕。
Old Text: Send the money but apprehend the suspect as he heads towards the Rover.
Old Translation: 把錢打過去，但當目標走向探測車時將其逮捕。

Text: The moment <DisplayName> realized you were not about to give them what they wanted, they detonated the bomb, taking many innocent lives with them.
Translation: <DisplayName>意識到你不會答應自己條件的瞬間就引爆了炸彈，很多無辜者成了此人的陪葬。

Text: A blast echoes throughout the colony As the smoke clears it becomes apparent - nothing is left of the Casino and its immediate surroundings.
Translation: 爆炸聲在整座殖民地裡迴盪，煙霧散去後，穹頂上的裂痕清晰可見。賭場已被夷為平地。
Old Text: A blast echoes throughout the colony, cracks appear on the Dome and as the smoke clears it becomes apparent - nothing is left of the Casino.
Old Translation: 爆炸時在整座殖民地裡迴盪，煙霧散去後，穹頂上的裂痕清晰可見。賭場已被夷為平地。

Text:
When <DisplayName> received a message confirming the payment, they took an improvised gun out of their pocket and committed suicide.

Why they did this and to whom the money was transferred may never be known.
Translation:
<DisplayName>收到確認收款的消息後，從口袋中掏出一把臨時製作的手槍自殺了。

此人這麼做的理由以及收款人的身份或許永遠無從得知了。

Text: You wired the money, prepared the Rover and then something strange happened.
Translation: 你把錢轉了過去，並準備好了探測車，然後怪事發生了。

Text:
It turns out that even Mars is not beyond the reach of stock market hiccups on our mother planet.

<effect>The import price of <name> will be increased by <price_increase>% in <sols(delay)> Sols.
Translation:
事實證明連火星也會受母星上股市的影響。

<effect><name>的進口價格上漲<price_increase>%，持續<sols(delay)>個太陽日。

Text: Our sponsor informs us that due to changes in the economic conditions the import price of a key resource will soon be increased.
Translation: 我們的贊助者通知我們說由於經濟狀況發生變化，一種關鍵資源的進口價格很快就會上漲。

Text: Yet Earth may be within our reach as well...
Translation: 然而地球或許也會受到我們的影響……

Text: the price will be increased only by <price_increase_oligarch>%
I will personally negotiate special terms.
Translation: 我會親自去協商特別條款。

Text: the price increase will happen in <sols(delay_politician)> Sols instead
Translation: 價格上漲將變為在<sols(delay_politician)>個太陽日後發生

Text: The import price of <name> has been increased by <price_increase_oligarch>%
The import price of <name> has been increased by <price_increase>%
Old Text: The import price of <name> has been increased by <price_increase>
Old Translation: <name>的進口價格上漲了<price_increase>

Text:
Word is that they are about to unveil a new virtual reality tech called DreamWeb. If this new tech fad catches on, it could become bigger than anything that Microsoft or Apple had ever done!

One sympathizer of our colony shared this information with us fairly early on, giving us the opportunity to invest and make a lot of money. But make no mistake, at the end of the day this is all highly speculative. If DreamWeb tanks, we will almost certainly lose most of the invested funds.
Translation:
有消息稱他們即將揭幕一項名為夢網的全新虛擬現實技術。如果這個新技術潮流能火起來，那就能超越微軟和蘋果的成就！

一位我們殖民地的支持者在早些時候與我們分享了這個消息，並給了我們投資賺大錢的機會。但別搞錯了，這說到底只是未經證實的猜測。如果夢網計劃破產，那我們投進去的錢中大部分肯定就打水漂了。

Old Text: Investment opportunity
Old Translation: 投資機遇

Text: On Earth, a new company is making waves on the stock market.
Translation: 地球上一家新公司在股票市場興風作浪。
聽起來有戲，我們應該投資。

Text: We are not in the gambling business. Pass.
Translation: 我們不幹賭博這種事。直接無視。

Text: Send this sympathizer a bottle of something nice and get Blue Sun's tech team on the comm. We'll ride the hype train with a product of our own.
Translation: 送這名支持者一瓶好酒，另外我要和蒼日公司的技術團隊通話。我們要趁著他們帶的這波節奏釋出我們自己的產品。

Text: While it is uncertain if DreamWeb will survive us piggybacking on their momentum, we are projected to make a solid <return>% return on our investment.
Translation: 雖然還不清楚夢網在我們施加的壓力之下能否活下來，但我們的投資預計將獲得<return>%的穩定收益。

Text: Our product, The Dreamfarer, went public on the exact same day as DreamWeb and is riding hard on the hype that DreamWeb had generated.
Translation: 我們的產品名為夢之旅人，與夢網同一天上市，在夢網掀起的這場風潮中表現不佳。

Text: Preliminary damage assessment suggests that we will lose <return>% of our investment.
Translation: 初步損失評估顯示我們將損失投資的<return>%。

Text: The Stock Market has closed. Results are in. DreamWeb has flopped dramatically.
Translation: 股票市場已經休市。結果出來了。夢網戲劇性地失敗了。

Text: Still, we have doubled our investment! The Colony's financial future looks bright!
Translation: 不過我們將投資翻了倍！殖民地的財政前途光明！

Text: DreamWeb is holding pretty well on the Stock Market – yet not even close to the levels of success it was speculated to reach.
Translation: 夢網在股市表現還不錯，但與之前預期的成功還有相當大的差距。

Text:
We stand to gain <return>% return on our initial investment. The colony's financial future looks brighter than it ever was!

DreamWeb's success enabled us with the opportunity to build a grand project based on the new technology here, on Mars.

<effect>You have received the Dream Reality tech.
Translation:
我們將獲得初始投資<return>%的回報。殖民地未來的財政形勢前所未有得好！

夢網的成功給了我們用新技術在火星上修建一項宏偉工程的機會。

<effect>你獲得了夢想現實技術。

Text: The first few hours after DreamWeb went public were astonishing! The new tech fad has exceeded everyone's expectations and is a smashing hit.
Translation: 夢網上市後，短短幾小時內就引起了轟動！這一新技術潮流超出了所有人的預期，獲得了巨大成功。
Old Text: First few hours after DreamWeb went public look were astonishing! The new tech fad has exceeded everyone's expectations and is a smashing hit.
Old Translation: 夢網上市後，短短幾小時內就引起了轟動！這一新技術潮流超出了所有人的預期，獲得了巨大成功。

Text:
Even better, <DisplayName> turned out to be one of the more prominent vloggers out there. 

Judging by the 24 karat smile they sported when leaving the Casino, it's safe to say that our budding Martian tourism hit the jackpot as well.

<effect><tourists> Tourists have been added in the Applicant pool.
Translation:
更妙的是，<DisplayName>居然是個知名影像部落客。

從他們離開賭場時臉上掛著的“24K純金”笑容判斷，可以大膽地說我們發展剛剛起步的火星旅遊業也中大獎了。

<effect><tourists>遊客加入了等待前往火星的應徵者隊伍。

Text: A tourist from Earth has won the jackpot in one of our Casinos!
Translation: 一名地球來的遊客在我們的一家賭場裡贏得了頭獎！

Text:
<DisplayName> feels their time will come soon and wishes to die with their boots on – on one final adventure.

They will keep transmitting data of anything they stumble upon until the very end.
Translation:
<DisplayName>感覺自己的大限將至，並希望死在最後一次冒險的途中。

他們會不斷將途中見聞的資料傳送回來，直到生命的盡頭。

Text: The last living Founder asks you for a shuttle with enabled manual controls and enough fuel to make it over the horizon.
Translation: 最後一名在世的創始者請求你提供一艘人工操控且裝有足夠燃料的穿梭機以飛越地平線。

Text: How can I deny our great Founder? Permission granted!
Translation: 我怎能拒絕我們偉大的創始者呢？沒問題！

Text: lose a Shuttle and a Founder
Translation: 失去一架穿梭機和一位創始者

Text: "I am eternally grateful, Commander!", says the Founder.
Translation: “感激不盡，指揮官！”創始者說道。

Text: "I feel there is one last adventure left for me. It has been more than a privilege!"
Translation: “我感覺我還能進行最後一次探險。能與你共事是我無上的榮幸！”

Text: We have no shuttles to spare, I'm sure you will understand. You may go on foot, however.
Translation: 我們現在沒有多餘的穿梭機，你一定明白我們的難處吧。不過你可以徒步旅行。

Text: Without the slightest change in expression the Founder nods.
Translation: 創始者面無表情地點點頭。

Text: "It was a selfish request by my part. I shall head out now..."
Translation: “這個請求確實很自私。我這就出發……”

Text: You've been through a lot. Enjoy the rest you've earned here with us. Permission denied.
Translation: 你經歷了太多坎坷。在這裡和我們一起享受你應得的一切吧。請恕我無法同意。

Text:
"This is my final transmission.

I want to say that it has been a wild ride and I can't think of a better life worth living. I am sending what data I gathered along the journey while I am still within communication range. I think you may find some of it very interesting.

It has been an honor, Commander.

<DisplayName> over and out!"

<effect>Gained Core Rare Metals Breakthrough tech
Translation:
“這是我的最後一次通訊。

我想說的是這次旅行處處是驚喜，我此生已無憾。趁我還沒離開通訊範圍，我會把旅途中搜集到的資料傳送給你。有些資料或許會引起你的興趣。

很榮幸能與你共事，指揮官。

<DisplayName>通話完畢！”

<effect>獲得星核稀有金屬突破性技術

Text: A transmission from the last Founder arrives:
Translation: 最後的創始者發來了通訊：

Text:
"This is my final transmission.

I want to say that it has been a wild ride and I can't think of a better life worth living. I am sending what data I gathered along the journey while I am still within communication range. I think you may find some of it very interesting.

It has been an honor, Commander.

<DisplayName> over and out!"

<effect>Gained <research(research_reward)>
Translation:
“這是我的最後一次通訊。

我想說的是這次旅行處處是驚喜，我此生已無憾。趁我還沒離開通訊範圍，我會把旅途中搜集到的資料傳送給你。有些資料或許會引起你的興趣。

很榮幸能與你共事，指揮官。

<DisplayName>通話完畢！”

<effect>獲得<research(research_reward)>

Text: A transmission from the last Founder arrives:
Translation: 最後的創始者發來了通訊：

Text: See you on the other side, my friend.
Translation: 朋友，我們到時候再見吧。

Text: Thinking about the Colony until the very end. You are an inspiration to us all!
Translation: 直到最後一刻依然牽掛著殖民地。你激勵著我們所有人！

Text: Only through sheer luck the Rocket managed to make an emergency landing on a safe spot, but even now there are no signs that the engine could start working again.
Translation: 火箭靠著難以置信的運氣緊急降落在了一處安全地點，但到現在仍看不出發動機能再次點火的跡象。

Text: During flight to the Anomaly site, the engine stalled and the Rocket began losing altitude.
Translation: 在飛往異象地點的途中，發動機失靈，導致火箭開始下落。

Text: Send three rescue supply pods with replacement parts.
Translation: 送去三個裝有替換用零件的補給艙。

Text: pay Funding, the expedition will be saved
Translation: 支付資金，將挽救探險隊

Text: Send me the schematics, and put the expedition team on comm.
Translation: 把設計圖發給我，我要和探險隊通話。

Text: Streaming the games to Mars is technically possible but will take bandwidth that we normally use for research data from Earth.
Translation: 向火星居民直播遊戲在技術上是可行的，但要佔用平時用來從地球接收研究資料的頻寬。

Text: The Olympics are about to begin on Earth and the excitement among the colonists is tangible.
Translation: 地球上的奧運會即將開幕，殖民地居民們也興奮不已。

Text: Not watching the Olympics was never on the table. Do it!
Translation: 要是看不了奧運會，那沒人會買賬。就這麼辦！

Text: all Colonists get Morale boost, research from Earth suspended for <sols(big_timeframe)> Sols
Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣上升，地球停止提供研究點數，持續<sols(big_timeframe)>個太陽日

Text: Our survival depends on getting research done as quickly as possible. Even the most eager sport fans will understand.
Translation: 我們的生存全靠儘快完成研究。最狂熱的體育迷也一定明白這個道理吧。
所有殖民地居民士氣下降

Text: Some kind of compromise should be possible – broadcast the games for a few Sols.
Translation: 應該有折中的辦法。為他們播放比賽，但只播幾個太陽日。

Text: all Colonists get Morale boost, research from Earth suspended for <sols(small_timeframe)> Sols
Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣上升，地球停止提供研究點數，持續<sols(small_timeframe)>個太陽日

Text: We’ll watch the games, alright – but with holograms!
Translation: 比賽是一定要看的，但要看全息的！

Text: Colonists get large Morale boost, research from Earth suspended for <sols(big_timeframe)> Sols
Translation: 殖民地居民士氣大幅上升，地球停止提供研究點數，持續<sols(big_timeframe)>個太陽日

Text: It looks like our weather predictions were a little off. The Cold Wave will probably last a Sol more than we previously thought.
Translation: 看來我們的天氣預報不太準啊。寒流很可能比我們預期的多持續一個太陽日。

Text: As you sip your hot Earl Gray tea, a weather update comes up on your monitor.
Translation: 你抿著伯爵茶，看到螢幕上顯示了最新天氣情況。

Text: Our first priority is to make sure our power generation is in working order.
Translation: 我們的第一要務是確保能正常發電。
Old Text: Our first priority is make sure our power generation is in working order.
Old Translation: 我們的第一要務是確保能正常發電。

Text: all power producers receive a free maintenance check
Translation: 所有發電建築獲得一次免費維護檢查。

Text: This sounds like a good opportunity to run some survival drills.
Translation: 聽起來這是個進行生存演練的好機會
Old Text: This sounds like a good opportunity to runs some survival drills.
Old Translation: 聽起來這是個進行生存演練的好機會

Text: several Colonists gain the Survivor trait
Translation: 若干位殖民地居民獲得倖存者特性

Text: The storage tanks are frozen, but I know a way to increase our Water production.
Translation: 儲存罐都凍結了，但我有辦法提高水資源產量。

Text: <water_boost>% Water production for the duration of the Cold Wave
Fellow Martians, we’ve gotten through worse before. Just do your duty and don’t panic!
Translation: 火星同胞們，比今天更難熬的日子我們都挺過去了。不要驚慌，做好自己的本職工作就好。

Text:
New weather data has come and the situation is dire – the Cold Wave prediction has been extended by another 4 Sols.

Our Scientists have come up with a technology that will allow us to build Subsurface Heaters to heat our buildings and prevent them from freezing.
Translation:
你接收到了新的氣象資料，情況不容樂觀。寒流持續時間又延長了4個太陽日。

我們的科學家們想出了建造地下加熱器的技術，靠它能給我們的建築供熱，防止其被凍結。

Text: A team of Scientists argues over the satellite data as you quietly ponder the situation. It’s going to be a long winter.
Translation: 一隊科學家正在因衛星資料的事而爭論不休，與此同時你靜靜地思考著形勢。我們將迎來漫漫寒冬。

Old Text: Gain <funding(sponsor_help)>; <free_pods> free Supply Pods
Old Translation: 獲得<funding(sponsor_help)>；<free_pods>個免費補給艙

Text: Gather our best minds. We should assemble some Heaters immediately.
Translation: 召集最傑出的人才。我們應該立刻組裝加熱器。

Text: Ration Power and Water until this is over.
Translation: 定額供給電力和水資源，直到寒流結束。

Text: <consumption_reduction>% Dome water and power consumption for the duration of the Cold Wave
Translation: 寒流持續期間，<consumption_reduction>%穹頂水資源和電力消耗

Text:
New weather data has come and the situation is dire – the Cold Wave prediction has been extended by another 4 Sols.

Will our Power and Water grids sustain us for that long?
Translation:
你接收到了新的氣象資料，情況不容樂觀。預計寒流又要延長4個太陽日。

我們的電力與水資源網能支援那麼久嗎？

Text: A team of Scientists argues over the satellite data as you quietly ponder the situation. It’s going to be a long winter.
Translation: 一隊科學家正在因衛星資料的事而爭論不休，與此同時你靜靜地思考著形勢。我們將迎來漫漫寒冬。

Old Text: Gain <funding(sponsor_help
Old Translation: 獲得 <funding(sponsor_help

Text: Gather our best minds. We should assemble some Heaters immediately.
Translation: 召集最傑出的人才。我們應該立刻組裝加熱器。

Text: Ration Power and Water until this is over.
Translation: 定額供給電力和水資源，直到寒流結束。

Text: <consumption_reduction>% Dome water and power consumption for the duration of the Cold Wave
Translation: 寒流持續期間，<consumption_reduction>%穹頂水資源和電力消耗

Text:
We have survived the Cold Wave. People are celebrating in the streets. 

It was quite an ordeal but we've learned a lot about surviving in the cold. Some of our Engineers have come up with a way to improve our Subsurface Heaters.

<effect><morale_bonus> Morale for <sols(morale_bonus_duration)> Sols. Subsurface Heaters power consumption halved.
Translation:
我們挺過了寒流。人們紛紛上街慶祝。

不容易啊，不過我們也學到了不少在嚴寒中的生存技巧。一些工程師想出了改良地下加熱器的辦法。

<effect><morale_bonus>士氣，持續<sols(morale_bonus_duration)>個太陽日。地下加熱器電力消耗減半。

Text: You never thought that you’d be so happy to see the red dust of Mars again. The long winter is over.
Translation: 沒想到你再次看到火星的紅沙會如此高興。漫漫寒冬結束了。

Text:
This damned long Cold Wave has everybody on edge. We have to do something about the Sanity of our colonists.

Note: All effects will last until the end of the Cold Wave.
Translation:
這場該死的寒流把大家都搞得提心吊膽。殖民地居民的理智度方面我們得想想辦法。

注意：一切效果持續到寒流結束為止。

Text: Two Colonists bump into each other accidentally. A heated argument follows. It’s not the first one.
Translation: 兩名殖民地居民不小心撞到了一起。緊接著就開始了激烈的爭吵。這又不是第一次了。

Text: I know! Let’s organize a winter festival!
Translation: 我知道！我們組織一場冬季慶典吧！
所有殖民地居民將獲得<sanity_restored>理智度

Text: Warm food and a warm bed are the answer.
Translation: 靠熱乎乎的飯菜和溫暖的床就能解決。

Text: Colonists will consume <food_increase>% more food and take less sanity damage from the disaster
Translation: 殖民地居民消耗的食物將增加<food_increase>%，災難對其造成的理智度傷害降低。

Text: double Sanity restored from medical buildings
Translation: 醫療建築恢復雙倍理智度

Text: Spacebars and Casinos will restore <extra_sanity> Sanity on visit
Translation: 星際酒吧和賭場可為來訪者恢復<extra_sanity>理智度

Text:
After several hours, you receive a video message from the confused Genius <DisplayName>:

"I just need some more special bits. The nabblygarbling generator would soon be ready and I can finally gather all the scubblydubs! Here’s the list! Now, go, go, and bring them to me, quickly!"

A list of complex electronic components and machine parts follows.
Translation:
幾小時後，困惑的天才<DisplayName>給你傳來了影像訊息：

“我還需要一些特殊碎片。玄學產生器很快就能準備就緒，到時候我就終於能集齊所有救非物質了！這是清單！快去把東西給我弄來！”

接著他發來一張複雜的電子元件和機械零件的清單。
理智崩潰 - 發瘋的天才

Text: One of the colony’s most prominent thinkers has gone insane, locking themselves up at their home. The neighbors report sounds of metal clinging, machinery sounds and insane laughter.
Translation: 殖民地裡一名最傑出的思想家發了瘋，把自己關在家裡。鄰居報告稱聽到金屬摩擦聲、機械運轉聲和狂笑聲。
Old Text: One of the colony’s most prominent thinkers has gone insane, locking themselves up at their home. The neighbors reports sounds of metal clinging, machinery sounds and insane laughter.
Old Translation: 殖民地裡一名最傑出的思想家發了瘋，把自己關在家裡。鄰居報告稱聽到金屬摩擦聲、機械運轉聲和狂笑聲。

Old Text: Give away the components
Old Translation: 贈送零件

Text: After some time the genius strides out with a proud smile. "Behold my creation!" Behind rolls a clunky jury-rigged Drone with an immense booster on its back.
Translation: 不久後，天才面帶自豪的笑容大步走了出來。“見識一下我的傑作吧！”一部背上裝有巨大推進器的臨時拼湊成的笨重無人機從天才身後開出。
Old Text: A bit time later, the genius strides out with a proud smile. "Behold my creation!" Behind rolls a clunky jury-rigged Drone with an immense booster on its back.
Old Translation: 不久後，天才面帶自豪的笑容走了出來。“見識一下我的傑作吧！”一部背上裝有巨大推進器的臨時拼湊成的笨重無人機從天才身後開出。

Text:
The moment its creator activates it, the Drone is carried into the air by its rocket booster, swirling uncontrollably. The invention smashes with force against the dome and cracks it.

"Minor setbacks make me hungry", <DisplayName> says, and walks away.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered and gained the Enthusiast trait. A Dome has suffered a fracture.
Translation:
天才剛啟動無人機，它就發動火箭推進器飛上天空，並開始不受控制地旋轉飛舞著。這件發明猛撞上了穹頂並將其撞裂。

“這一微不足道的挫折令我胃口大開，”<DisplayName>說完便走開了。

<effect>天才<DisplayName>已恢復正常並獲得了熱心特性。穹頂被撞裂。

Text: After some time the genius strides out, followed by a strange procession of clunky, jury-rigged drones.
Translation: 一段時間後天才走了出來，身後跟著跟著一列臨時拼湊出的怪異無人機。

Text:
As the strange machines try to follow their creator, many of them fall apart on the streets. Many colonists giggle and smile as they witness the procession.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered. Gained <drone_perfabs> Drone prefabs.
Translation:
不少跟隨著自己創造者的怪異無人機在街上開著開著就散了架。不少圍觀群眾笑而不語。

<effect>天才<DisplayName>已經恢復正常。獲得<drone_perfabs>個無人機預製件。

Text: After some time, the genius is carried out of the residence atop a chair carried by a new, shiny-looking drone.
Translation: 一段時間後，一臺鋥亮的嶄新無人機將坐在椅子上的天才從其住處中扛了出來。

Text:
"Behold my creation! Don’t worry, it’s normal to be awed by my intellect!" And indeed, the new Drone has many augmentations that make its predecessors look clumsy and old.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered. Gained <drone_prefabs_low> Drone prefabs. All Drones move <speed_bonus>% faster.
Translation:
“見識一下我的傑作吧！不用害羞，被我的智慧震驚到是很正常的！”確實，這臺新無人機得到過多種強化，之前的機種在它面前顯得既笨拙又過時。

<effect>天才<DisplayName>已經恢復正常。獲得<drone_prefabs_low>個無人機預製件。所有無人機移動速度提升<speed_bonus>%。
聽起來很危險！逮捕病人！

Text: The rescue team broke into the residence of the mad genius and were met with kicking and screaming. After the accident the genius has sworn a bloody vengeance upon you.
Translation: 營救小隊闖入了發瘋天才的住處，天才拼命抵抗。這次事件後，天才發毒誓要向你復仇。

Text: <effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has become a Renegade. <colonists_injured> Colonists have lost <health_damage> Health
Translation: <effect>天才<DisplayName>變成了叛徒。<colonists_injured>殖民地居民失去<health_damage>生命值

Text: The mad genius didn’t resist and was taken away. Several hours later, under the intense care of your team, the dark episode was forgotten.
Translation: 發瘋的天才沒有抵抗，並被帶走了。幾小時後，在你團隊的悉心照料下，這一令人不安的事件被人們遺忘了。

Text: Leave them alone and hope for the best.
Translation: 讓他靜一靜，希望一切都好。

Text: After a couple of hours, the insane genius came to reality – too proud to be ashamed, but nevertheless shaken by the experience.
Translation: 幾小時後，發瘋的天才恢復了正常。自尊心很強的他並沒有表現出羞愧，只是感到非常震驚。

Text: A bit later a rocket booster cracks the silence in the dome and something flies out of the window where the mad genius was hiding.
Translation: 一會兒之後，火箭推進器的聲響打破了穹頂內的平靜，有什麼東西飛出了發瘋天才藏身處的窗戶。

Text:
The flying debris swirls in the air and smashes against the dome wall.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered. A Dome has suffered a fracture.
Translation:
飛行的碎片在空中打著旋，並撞上了穹頂的牆壁。

<effect>天才<DisplayName>已恢復正常。穹頂被撞裂。

Text: A bit later, the genius strides out with a proud smile, burnt hair and covered in grease head to toe.
Translation: 一會兒之後，天才面帶自豪的笑容走了出來，此人滿身油汙，頭髮也被燒焦了。

Text:
Behind rolls a clunky, jury-rigged drone, hailing its master with cheerful beeping.

<effect>The Genius <DisplayName> has recovered. Gained <drone_prefabs> Drone prefabs
Translation:
身後是一臺臨時拼湊成的笨重無人機，正發出歡快的嗶嗶聲向它的主人打招呼。

<effect>天才<DisplayName>已恢復正常。獲得<drone_prefabs>個無人機預製件

Text: If you agree to this proposal, it will most likely stir some passions among the participants.
Translation: 如果你同意這一提議，很可能激起參與者的熱情。

Text: Our Colonists have been watching various talent shows from Earth and are eager to organize a contest of our own.
Translation: 我們的殖民地居民看了不少地球上的選秀節目，並渴望舉辦我們自己的才藝大賽。

Text: I see no benefits of such a contest. It would be just a needless distraction.
Translation: 我感覺這種比賽並沒有什麼卵用。只是無意義的消遣罷了。

Text: Everyone is saddened by your decision.
Translation: 你的決定令大家垂頭喪氣。

Text: What a splendid idea! Let's call it "A Game of Domes"!
Translation: 這個主意妙哇！就給它取名為《穹頂的遊戲》好了！

Text: Residents of one Dome will get a Morale boost, the residents of the Dome that places last suffer a morale loss
Translation: 一座穹頂的居民士氣上升，獲得最後一名穹頂的居民士氣下降
Old Text: residents of one Dome will get a Morale boost, the rest will lose Morale
Old Translation: 一座穹頂的居民士氣上升，其餘居民士氣下降。

Text: With the tournament's end the winner Dome celebrates while all others feel down.
Translation: 大賽已經結束，獲勝的穹頂歡呼雀躍，而其他穹頂情緒低落。

Text: <effect>Residents of the winner Dome receive a Morale boost while the last placed Dome suffers a morale penalty for its residents.
Translation: <effect>獲勝穹頂的居民士氣上升，而獲得最後一名穹頂的居民士氣下降。
Old Text: <effect>Residents of the winner Dome receive a Morale boost while all others suffer a slight Morale loss.
Old Translation: 獲勝穹頂內<effect>位居民士氣提升，其他所有居民士氣略微下降。

Text: Our Colonists have survived everything Mars could throw at them. I would say they have already proven their talents!
Translation: 我們的殖民地居民克服了火星上的一切艱難險阻。我想說他們已經證明了自己是名副其實的達人！

Text: Stream the competition to Earth and use the event to fund the colony.
Translation: 把大賽賽況直播給地球上的觀眾，並藉此為殖民地籌集資金。

Text: Get Funding, residents of one Dome will get a large Morale boost, the last placed Dome's residents suffer a greater morale loss
Translation: 獲得資金，一座穹頂的居民士氣大幅上升，獲得最後一名穹頂的居民士氣大幅下降
Old Text: get Funding, residents of one Dome will get a large Morale boost, the rest will lose Morale
Old Translation: 獲得資金，一座穹頂的居民士氣大幅上升，其餘居民士氣下降。

Text: The publicity around the event stirred strong passions all around the colony.
Translation: 比賽的宣傳引激起了全體殖民地居民的熱情。

Text: <effect>Winner Dome's residents gain a significant Morale boost while the last placed Dome suffers a morale penalty for its residents.
Translation: <effect>獲勝穹頂的居民士氣大幅上升，而獲得最後一名穹頂的居民士氣下降。
Old Text: <effect>Winner Dome's residents gain a significant Morale boost while the runners-up suffer an amplified penalty.
Old Translation: <effect>獲勝穹頂的居民士氣大幅提升，第二名承受嚴重減益。

Text:
Minutes later a report comes in, detailing the considerable damage done to several buildings by a Marsquake.

The epicenter of the unlikely event was pinpointed to be beneath the Mohole Mine.

The fact that the most serious damage was done to buildings within the Mine’s vicinity also suggests that the Mohole Mine has caused the quake.
Translation:
幾分鐘後就收到了若干棟建築物因地震而嚴重受損的詳細報告。

居然會發生地震令人難以相信，而震中就在莫霍礦井的下方。

受損最嚴重的建築物都在礦井附近這一事實證明地震是由莫霍礦井引發的。

Text: Suddenly the ground starts to rumble and office supplies begin to fall all over your cabinet.
Translation: 地面突然開始震動，辦公用品被震得東倒西歪。

Text: Shut down the Mohole Mine and use Concrete to stabilize the foundations.
Translation: 關閉莫霍礦井，並用混凝土穩固地基。

Text: causing more Marsquakes during the next <sols(duration)> Sols
Translation: 在接下來的<sols(duration)>個太陽日內引發更多地震

Text: Lend your expertise to improve the Mohole design and prevent further accidents.
Translation: 運用你掌握的專業知識改良莫霍礦井的設計以防止再次發生事故。

Text: resolve the issue without further consequences
Translation: 解決問題且不會產生後果

Text:
As you go out, two Cargo Shuttles buzz near the Dome - one actually crashes and leaves a nasty crack.

Later you learn that Renegade colonists organized a race with people actually piloting the Shuttles. One of them died in the crash.

The other pilot somehow got away after leaving the shuttle. Rumor is a race tournament is about to begin and that will last around 10 sols.
Translation:
你出來時，看到兩架貨運穿梭機向穹頂飛來，其中一架墜毀了，留下一道難看的裂痕。

後來你得知叛徒殖民地居民與駕駛穿梭機的居民組織了一場比賽。其中一人機墜人亡。

另一名飛行員離開穿梭機後設法逃走了。聽說一場競速錦標賽即將開始，持續10個太陽日。

Text: Busy at your office one day, you decide to take a walk and breath in some of the, well, less stale Dome air outside.
Translation: 一天，在辦公室忙碌的你決定去外面散散步，呼吸一下……稍微新鮮一些的穹頂空氣。

Text: Close all Shuttle Hubs for <sols(time_off)> Sols to improve security.
Translation: 將所有穿梭機中心關閉<sols(time_off)>個太陽日，以提高安全性。

Text: We need our Shuttles operating and can't afford to stop them now.
Translation: 我們需要穿梭機運轉，關閉它們的代價太高了。
又一次穿梭機比賽，又一次墜機。
又有人在開穿梭機比賽了

Text:
The piece impressed their peers so much that they talked the shy creator <DisplayName> into sharing more of their works. What they saw left little doubt in our minds that we have a prodigy on our hands.

Already making waves on the Earth art scene, offers for the originals are reaching mind-boggling sums.

Effect: <DisplayName> has become a Genius
Translation:
這幅作品令同行們佩服得五體投地，他們還說服了害羞的作者<DisplayName>分享自己的其他作品。擺在眼前的事實證明，我們之中出了一個天才。

地球藝術界對這些作品趨之若鶩，不少人願意出高的離譜的價格購買原作。

效果：<DisplayName>變成了天才

Text: A rather quiet employee at our Art Workshop blew everyone’s mind when they shared an original work.
Translation: 我們藝術工坊中一名低調員工分享了一幅自己的原創作品，把大家都嚇呆了。

Text: Share their work with the world. Let it be seen in galleries on Earth as well!
Translation: 把此人的作品與全世界分享。把它也放到地球上的畫廊中展出吧！

Text: Sell the originals for the benefit of the colony.
Translation: 為了殖民地的利益出售原作。
獲得資金，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日

Text: Encourage <DisplayName> to experiment in other areas. Imagine the possibilities!
Translation: 鼓勵<DisplayName>在其他領域進行嘗試。想像一下那無窮的可能性吧！

Text:
The change of perspective their alternative world view brought to the labs has inspired advances in research areas previously thought as dead ends. 

<effect>Gain <research(granted_research)>
Translation:
他們審視世界的獨到眼光令實驗室裡的科學家們茅塞頓開，他們在之前一度認為行不通的領域取得了進展。

<effect>獲得<research(granted_research)>

Text: Our prodigy's talents proved to reach far beyond art masterpieces.
Translation: 事實證明，我們這位天才的才華絕不僅限於藝術創作方面。

Text: We have lost contact with one of our Rovers - <DisplayName>. We believe the problem was caused by the Dust Storm and hopefully we will be able to locate it easily once the storm is over.
Translation: 我們與探險車<DisplayName>失去了聯絡。我們相信問題是沙塵暴造成的，等風暴結束後，我們應該能輕易找到它。

Text: The monitor shows only static as the Rover’s GPS tracker shows an error message.
Translation: 螢幕上顯示的只有靜電干擾以及探測車的全球定位追蹤器的出錯資訊。

Text: We can't wait. Send out drones to search for the Rover.
Translation: 我們不能幹等。派無人機去搜尋探測車。

Text: Send out shuttles to search for the Rover despite the Dust Storm.
Translation: 派穿梭機頂著沙塵暴去搜尋探測車。
Old Text: Send out shuttles to search for the Rover.
Old Translation: 派穿梭機去搜尋探測車。

Text: We can use our Sensor Towers to triangulate the signal.
Translation: 用感應塔三角定位訊號。

Text: No reason to worry. We can wait.
Translation: 沒必要擔心。我們等等也無妨。

Text:
From what we can tell from the cameras, the Rover has suffered a critical malfunction. We have no idea how it ended up on its current location.

<effect>You will need to send Drones to repair the malfunctioned Rover.
Translation:
從攝影機拍到的畫面判斷，探測車發生了嚴重故障。我們也不清楚它為何會出現在這種地方。

<effect>你需要派無人機去修理出故障的探測車。

Text: The lights of a Drone illuminate the dust-covered missing Rover. Unfortunately other Drones have been damaged beyond repair during the search mission.
Translation: 無人機的燈光照亮了埋在塵土中的失聯探測車。不幸的是，搜尋任務期間，其他無人機已經受損到了無法修復的地步。

Text:
From what we can tell from the cameras, the Rover has suffered a critical malfunction. We have no idea how it ended up on its current location.

<effect>You will need to send Drones to repair the malfunctioned Rover.
Translation:
從攝影機拍到的畫面判斷，探測車發生了嚴重故障。我們也不清楚它為何會出現在這種地方。

<effect>你需要派無人機去修理出故障的探測車。

Text: The spotlight locks on to the missing Rover as a shuttle orbits the location. The search mission was successful but several Shuttles were lost in the Dust Storm.
Translation: 在該位置上空盤旋的穿梭機將聚光燈鎖定在了失聯的探測車上。搜尋任務取得了成功，但沙塵暴令我們損失了若干架穿梭機。

Text:
From what we can tell from the cameras, the Rover has suffered a critical malfunction. We have no idea how it ended up on its current location.

<effect>You will need to send Drones to repair the malfunctioned Rover.
Translation:
從攝影機拍到的畫面判斷，探測車發生了嚴重故障。我們也不清楚它為何會出現在這種地方。

<effect>你需要派無人機去修理出故障的探測車。

Text: The sensor log scrolls up the screen as our Sensor Towers try to lock on the missing Rover’s emergency beacon. Finally a hit!
Translation: 感應塔試圖鎖定失聯探測車緊急信標，與此同時日誌開始在螢幕上滾動。終於找到了！

Text:
From what we can tell from the cameras, the Rover has suffered a critical malfunction. We have no idea how it ended up on its current location.

<effect>You will need to send Drones to repair the malfunctioned Rover.
Translation:
從攝影機拍到的畫面判斷，探測車發生了嚴重故障。我們也不清楚它為何會出現在這種地方。

<effect>你需要派無人機去修理出故障的探測車。

Text: The satellite image shows our missing Rover, completely shut down and covered in a pile of red Martian dust.
Translation: 衛星影像顯示失聯探測車完全失靈，且埋在了一堆火星的紅沙中。

Text:
The Rover is up and running once more. Its sensors have captured a ton of data on the Dust Storms and the most extreme conditions of the Martian environment.

<effect>The Rover’s telemetry has granted us <research(research_points)>
Translation:
探測車再次恢復了運轉。它的感測器捕捉到了大量沙塵暴以及火星上最極端條件的相關資料。

<effect>探測車的遙測給了我們<research(research_points)>

Text: As the repairs are completed, our Rover’s lights and telemetry spring to life.
Translation: 隨著修復的完成，探測車的車燈以及遙測恢復了正常。

Text:
"I want you to have something nice. Here’s the menu. No need to worry about the cost, okay?"

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>] This is a classic case of personality disorder. He needs my help.</if>
Translation:
“希望你吃頓好的。這是菜單。錢什麼的不用你操心，明白了嗎？”

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>]這是人格障礙的典型案例。他需要我的幫助。</if>

Text: "I am the Devil, and I have a proposal you might find intriguing." This bizarre statement comes from a rather unremarkable Colonist with a mischievous smile on his face.
Translation: “我是魔鬼，我有一項你或許感興趣的提議。”這句離奇的話語出自一個其貌不揚且面帶狡黠笑容的殖民地居民之口。
Old Text: 'I am the Devil, and I have a proposal you might find intriguing.' This bizarre statement comes from a rather unremarkable Colonist with a mischievous smile on his face.
Old Translation: “我是魔鬼，我有一項你或許感興趣的提議。”這句離奇的話語出自一個其貌不揚且面帶狡黠笑容的殖民地居民之口。

Text: I don’t have time for this!
"A once in a lifetime opportunity, and you’re so quick to throw it away", he nods in disapproval, then leaves your office.
Translation: “這種機會一輩子僅此一次，而你卻如此草率地放棄。”他失望地點點頭，然後離開了你的辦公室。
Old Text: ‘A once in a lifetime opportunity, and you’re so quick to throw it away’, he nods in disapproval, then leaves your office.
Old Translation: “這種一輩子僅此一次的機會，你如此草率地放棄。”他失望地點點頭，然後離開了你的辦公室。

Text: Strangely, the cameras outside pick no trace of him, and the later check throughout the colony finds no trace of him.
Translation: 詭異的是，外面的攝影機並沒有拍到他的身影，後來你把殖民地搜了個遍也沒有找到他。

Text: I will play your game, let’s see what you have to offer.
Translation: 我就陪你玩玩。你能給我什麼呢？

Text: The strange man cries in anguish and rushes out of your office.
Translation: 陌生人痛苦地哭喊著衝出了你的辦公室。

Text: When you run a check on him, you find nothing in the colony records, and he is nowhere to be seen on the security cameras. Rather disturbing.
Translation: 你查他資料時，發現殖民地記錄裡沒有他，且監視攝影機也沒有拍到他。這著實令人不安。

Text: Color me intrigued, but let’s negotiate the terms.
Translation: 我有興趣，不過我們還是來談談條件吧。

Text: Very intriguing, let me call for my associates...
Translation: 有點意思，我得把我的同事們叫來……

Text: The security Officers apprehend the strange man.
Translation: 保安逮捕了這個陌生人。

Text: He walks out without struggle, but later you find out that his cell is empty. He is nowhere to be found across the colony.
Translation: 他平靜地走出了辦公室，但後來你發現他的牢房是空的。整個殖民地都不見他的身影。

Text: He grins. "You know, I can’t grant you ‘world peace’ or ‘end hunger’, but the list is quite impressive, right?"
Translation: 他咧嘴而笑。“我給不了你‘世界和平’或是‘消滅飢餓’，但這張清單也很厲害了，不是嗎？”

Text:
He waves with a smile and leaves your office, without a trace.

<effect>Gain <funding(wealthfunding)>
Translation:
他微笑著揮揮手並離開了你的辦公室，消失得無影無蹤。

<effect>獲得<funding(wealthfunding)>

Text:
He turns with a smile and leaves your office without a trace.

<effect>Several new underground deposits have been revealed
Translation:
他微笑著轉身並離開了你的辦公室，消失得無影無蹤。

<effect>發現了若干新地下資源點

Text:
"Your people experience quite the difficulties every day, but they are tough and would rather not talk about it. Here’s how to improve their lifestyle."

The list he gives you is impressive, and so easy to implement. As he handles it to you, he turns away and disappears without a trance.

<effect>Comfort in all residences improved by <happinesscomfort>
Translation:
“你的人每天都要吃很多苦，但他們很堅強，寧願把苦藏在心裡。可以這樣改善他們的生活方式。”

他給了你一張清單，上面的方案既高明又容易實現。交給你之後，他一轉身便消失得無影無蹤。

<effect>所有住宅舒適度提升<happinesscomfort>

Old Text: <resource(200,”knowledgeresearch”)> per Sol
Old Translation: 每個太陽日<resource(200,”knowledgeresearch”)>

Text:
"Yes, it’s unorthodox, but so is the mystery of science, is it not?" Then he leaves without a trace.

The Scientists are puzzled with his suggestions, but when they test run the new method, it provides astonishing results.
Translation:
“這的確有違傳統，但科學的奧祕不也是如此嗎？”然後他便消失無蹤了。

他的建議令科學家們費解，但當他們測試這種新方法時，產生的結果令人稱奇。

Text: He pulls out a long list, scrambled on a piece of paper. "I could take you to a mountain and show you all the kingdoms of the world and their glory, but that's a bit outdated, isn't it? Why don't you just take two."
Translation: 他拿出一張很長的清單，紙上寫著潦草的字跡。“我可以帶你登上高山，一覽世界上所有王國和壯麗山河，但這麼做顯得有些老套，不是嗎？要不你兩個都要吧。”
Old Text: He pulls out a long list, scrambled on a piece of paper. "You know, I can’t grant you ‘world peace’ or ‘end hunger’, but the list is quite impressive, right?"
Old Translation: 他拿出一張很長的清單，紙上寫著潦草的字跡。“我給不了你‘世界和平’或是‘消滅飢餓’，但這張清單也很厲害了，不是嗎？”

Text: "The choice of kings! Here’s how you could apply for additional funding. It’s a bureaucratic nightmare and it’s no wonder you missed it, but with my suggestions you will surely get what you need."
Translation: “國王們都這麼選！只要這麼做，你就能申請到額外資金。這對官僚來說簡直是噩夢，你想不出來也很正常，但只要遵循我的建議，你就能得到需要的東西。”
Old Text: ‘The choice of kings! Here’s how you could apply for additional funding. It’s a bureaucratic nightmare and it’s no wonder you missed it, but with my suggestions you will surely get what you need.’
Old Translation: “國王們都這麼選！只要這麼做，你就能申請到額外資金。這對官僚來說簡直是噩夢，你想不出來也很正常，但只要遵循我的建議，你就能得到需要的東西。”

Text: "Give me a lever, eh? If you have ran a secondary diagnostics on your scanners, you would have found this data yourself. Here, you can see obvious chemical traces. I’d check them if I were you."
Translation: “給我一個支點麼？如果你用掃描器進行輔助診斷的話，就能自己發現這份資料了。看，這裡明顯有微量化學物質。如果我是你，我肯定會去看看。”
Old Text: ‘Give me a lever, eh? If you have ran a secondary diagnostics on your scanners, you would have found this data yourself. Here, you can see obvious chemical traces. I’d check them if I were you.’
Old Translation: “給我一個支點麼？醫療中心 升級（全息掃描器）- 提高穹頂的出生率。如果你用掃描器進行輔助診斷的話，就能自己發現這份資料了。看，這裡明顯有微量化學物質。如果我是你，我肯定會去看看。”

Text: <effect>Several new underground deposits have been revealed
Translation: <effect>已發現若干新的地下資源點。

Text: "A true leader! I wasn’t wrong about you, Commander!"
Translation: “你是一名真正的領袖！指揮官，我果然沒有看錯你！”
Old Text: ‘A true leader! I wasn’t wrong about you, Commander!‘
Old Translation: “你是一名真正的領袖！指揮官，我果然沒有看錯你！”

Text:
"Your people experience quite the difficulties every day, but they are tough and would rather not talk about it. I heard this and that, so here’s how to improve their lifestyle."

The list he gives you is impressive, and so easy to implement.

<effect>Comfort in all residences improved by <happinesscomfort>
Translation:
“你的人每天都要吃很多苦，但他們很堅強，寧願把苦藏在心裡。我見多識廣，可以這樣改善他們的生活方式。”

他給了你一張清單，上面的方案既高明又容易實現。

<effect>所有住宅舒適度提升<happinesscomfort>

Old Text: <resource(200,”knowledgeresearch”)> per Sol
Old Translation: 每個太陽日<resource(200,”knowledgeresearch”)>

Text: "Great choice! Here’s how to improve your analytical methods."
Translation: “選得好！可以這樣改進你的分析方法。”
Old Text: ‘Great choice! Here’s how to improve your analytical methods.’
Old Translation: “選得好！可以這樣改進你的分析方法。”

Text:
"Yes, it’s unorthodox, but so is the mystery of science, is it not?"

The Scientists are puzzled with his suggestions, but when they test run the new method, it provides astonishing results.
Translation:
“這的確有違傳統，但科學的奧祕不也是如此嗎？”

他的建議令科學家們費解，但當他們測試這種新方法時，產生的結果令人稱奇。

Text: On a second thought, I’d rather not.
"You seemed a person who knows better." He walks out of your office. When the door closes, he is nowhere to be found.
Translation: “我還以為你是個明白人呢。”他走出了你的辦公室。門關上時，他便消失得無影無蹤。
Old Text: ‘You seemed a person who knows better.’ He walks out of your office. When the door closes, he is nowhere to be found.
Old Translation: “我還以為你是個明白人呢。”他走出了你的辦公室。門關上時，他便消失得無影無蹤。

Text:
The Devil is sitting in your chair, with his feet on your desk and the naughtiest smile on his face. He looks you straight into the eye and you feel a cold creep up your spine.

"I'm a nice devil and I will want but a small price in return for my favors. Just the souls of some of your people. Come on, so many leaders over the years had done this choice with ease, what's so hard about it?"
Translation:
魔鬼坐在你的座位上，把腳架在桌子上，臉上調皮的笑容帶著邪氣。他直視你的雙眼，你感到脊背發涼。

“我是個通情達理的魔鬼。我幫了你的忙，因此要你付一點小小的代價作為報酬。我只要一些居民的靈魂就行了。得了吧，從古至今無數領袖做這種決定時眼睛都不眨一下，這有什麼難的呢？”

Text: "We made a deal, do you remember? Of course you do, you're a smart one! Now, time to pay the price!"
Translation: “我們當初可是說好了的，你忘了嗎？你當然不會忘啦，畢竟你是個聰明人！現在是時候付出代價了！”
Old Text: 'We made a deal, do you remember? Of course you do, you're a smart one! Now, time to pay the price!'
Old Translation: “我們當初可是說好了的，你忘了嗎？你當然不會忘啦，畢竟你是個聰明人！現在是時候付出代價了！”

Text:
The Devil is sitting in your chair, with his feet on your desk and the naughtiest smile on his face. He looks you straight into the eye and you feel a cold creep up your spine.

"I'm a nice devil and I will want but a small price in return for my favors. Just the souls of some of your people. Come on, so many leaders over the years had done this choice with ease, what's so hard about it?"
Translation:
魔鬼坐在你的座位上，把腳架在桌子上，臉上調皮的笑容帶著邪氣。他直視你的雙眼，你感到脊背發涼。

“我是個通情達理的魔鬼。我幫了你的忙，因此要你付一點小小的代價作為報酬。我只要一些居民的靈魂就行了。得了吧，從古至今無數領袖做這種決定時眼睛都不眨一下，這有什麼難的呢？”

Text: "We made a deal, do you remember? Of course you do, you're a smart one! Now, time to pay your check!"
Translation: “我們當初可是說好了的，你忘了嗎？你當然不會忘啦，畢竟你是個聰明人！現在是時候付出代價了！”
Old Text: 'We made a deal, do you remember? Of course you do, you're a smart one! Now, time to pay your check!'
Old Translation: “我們當初可是說好了的，你忘了嗎？你當然不會忘啦，畢竟你是個聰明人！現在是時候付出代價了！”

Text: "Oh, a sudden change of heart? No worries, I would claim these souls myself!"
Translation: “哦，突然改變主意了嗎？別擔心，我自己去收割這些靈魂！”
Old Text: 'Oh, a sudden change of heart? No worries, I would claim these souls myself!'
Old Translation: “哦，突然改變主意了嗎？別擔心，我自己去收割這些靈魂！”

Text:
His laughter hasn't even faded away and the sky is cracked by a large meteor that hits near the colony. Then they begin to fall, one after another. So, that's his way of saying "goodbye"...

<effect>A Meteor Storm has started atop your colony!
Translation:
他的笑聲還未消失，一顆巨大的隕石就從天而降，墜落在了殖民地附近。隨後，其他隕石接踵而至，一顆接一顆地落下。這就是他“道別”的方式吧……

<effect>隕石風暴向你的殖民地襲來！

Text: "Good, good! Let the others suffer, who cares?" He laughs maniacally and clicks his fingers.
Translation: “很好，很好！讓別人倒黴去，誰在乎他們啊？”他一邊狂笑一邊擰手指。
Old Translation: 'Good, good! Let the others suffer, who cares?' He laughs maniacally and clicks his fingers.

Text:
The comm channels in your office start ringing - multiple death reports from the colony. People have dropped as they walked and talked to others. Everyone is in shock. That's a lot of falsified reports you have to file in now, but people can't know how or why they died...

<effect><death_toll_colonists> Colonists have died.
Translation:
你辦公室的通訊頻道開始響鈴，殖民地內發生多起死亡事件。走在路上以及和他人談話的人們突然倒地身亡。大家都嚇呆了。偽造報告夠你忙活一陣了。不能讓人們知道這些人因何而死……

<effect><death_toll_colonists>多位殖民地居民已經死亡。

Text:
As the commander of the Colony, you have been awarded with a lifetime award for your achievements.

Speech, speech!
Translation:
作為殖民地的指揮官，你獲得了終身成就獎。

演講！演講！

Text: Thanks to your ongoing efforts, humanity's foothold on Mars has been cemented.
Translation: 在大家的共同努力下，人類已經牢牢立足於火星之上。

Text: This honor is not my own. All our brave colonists routinely risk their lives to make our dream a reality.
Translation: 這份殊榮並不屬於我一人。我們勇敢的全體殖民地居民為了實現我們的夢想，每天都冒著生命危險。

Text: Our success on Mars is a stepping stone on humanity's path towards the Cosmos!
Translation: 人類將藉著火星上的成功進軍茫茫宇宙！
Old Text: Our success on Mars is a stepping stone on the humanity's path towards the Cosmos!
Old Translation: 人類將藉著火星上的成功進軍茫茫宇宙！

Text: I hope we have the wisdom to avoid the mistakes of the past as we move forward.
Translation: 在前進的途中，我希望我們能擁有避免過去所犯錯誤的智慧。

Text: Human ingenuity knows no bounds. Colonizing Mars is our collective success as a species.
Translation: 人類的聰明才智永無止境。在火星上殖民是全人類共同取得的成功。

Text: Built in the human psyche is that no veil will be left unlifted, no secret will remain unknown.
Translation: 探索未知的奧祕是深深紮根於人類靈魂中的渴望。

Text:
The offer goes like this:

<funding(offered_funding)> in exchange for <base_price_reduction>% of all revenue earned from any Rare Metal exports we make in the future.
Translation:
提議如下：

<funding(offered_funding)>換取我們未來出口稀有金屬所獲收入的<base_price_reduction>%。

Text: A multi-billionaire and entrepreneur from Earth has caught wind of our financial troubles and is willing to lend a helping hand. For a price, of course.
Translation: 地球的一位身價數十億的企業家聽說我們在財政上遇到困難，於是願意向我們伸出援手。當然，不是免費的。

Text: We are not in the position to bargain. Agree to their terms.
Translation: 我們沒有討價還價的餘地。同意這些條件。
Old Text: We are not in the position to bargain. Agree to their terms
Old Translation: 我們沒有討價還價的餘地。同意這些條件。

Text: Heh, I know them. We offer <oligarch_price_reduction>% commission and their secrets will remain such.
Translation: 呵呵，我太瞭解這幫人了。我們出佣金的<oligarch_price_reduction>%，並替他們保密。

Text: These vultures want to take advantage of us. Decline!
Translation: 這些禿鷲想佔我們便宜。拒絕！

Text:
The increased exposure of cosmic radiation is the possible culprit responsible for these mutations. 

Sadly, the new fungi strain is not edible as it is highly toxic in its current state.
Translation:
長時間暴露在宇宙輻射之中是這些變異的可能原因。

不幸的是，這種新品種真菌目前有劇毒，不可食用。

Text: A new species of fungi has been observed to grow amidst the regulated one we cultivate for food in our Fungal Farms.
Translation: 我們在真菌農場裡觀察到，一種新品種真菌摻雜在普通食用真菌之中生長了出來。

Text: Clear it out and check that no contamination has spread.
Translation: 把它們清除掉，並確保汙染沒有蔓延。

Text: Fungal Farms will require emergency maintenance
Translation: 真菌農場將需要緊急維護

Text: Attempt to isolate the toxins and cultivate an edible sort.
Translation: 設法隔離有毒真菌，並培養更能適應這裡惡劣環境的可食用真菌。

Text: disables all Fungal Farms for <sols(duration)> Sols
Translation: 關閉所有真菌農場，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日
Old Text: disables all Fungal Farms until the procedure is completed
Old Translation: 關閉所有真菌農場，直到此步驟完成

Text: They claim that their attempts to create new genetically-imprinted talents were all for the better of humankind. The case is controversial, as you could have guessed.
Translation: 他們稱自己試圖將才華烙印在基因裡是為了全人類好。可想而知，這種行為會引起爭議。

Text: We have caught a group of Biorobotics Workshop enthusiasts who experimented on themselves without permission!
Translation: 我們逮到了一群未經許可就對自己進行實驗的生化機器人工坊熱心者。
我們看看他們能否成功吧。

Text: One of the biotech enthusiasts who recently experimented with their genes has acquired a new Trait, but at a cost.
Translation: 一名最近對自己的基因進行實驗的生物技術熱心者獲得了一項新特性，但付出了代價。

Text:
<DisplayName> has uncovered a new Trait hidden in the human genome, but the other enthusiasts had suffered severe genetic malformations and their health is quickly deteriorating.

<effect>The Colonist <DisplayName> has become Guru Workaholic. <suffering_colonists> Colonists have gained the Chronic Condition Flaw.
Translation:
<DisplayName>發現了隱藏在人類基因組裡的新特性，但其他熱心者的基因嚴重畸形，他們的身體狀況正在迅速惡化。

<effect>殖民地居民<DisplayName>變成了導師工作狂。<suffering_colonists>位殖民地居民獲得了慢性病缺陷。

Text: One of the biotech enthusiasts who recently experimented with their genes has acquired a new Trait, but at a cost.
Translation: 一名最近對自己的基因進行實驗的生物技術熱心者獲得了一項新特性，但付出了代價。

Text:
<DisplayName> has uncovered a new Trait hidden in the human genome, but the other enthusiasts had suffered severe genetic malformations and their health is quickly deteriorating.

<effect>The Colonist <DisplayName> has become Guru Enthusiast. <suffering_colonists> Colonists have gained the Chronic Condition Flaw.
Translation:
<DisplayName>發現了隱藏在人類基因組裡的新特性，但其他熱心者的基因嚴重畸形，他們的身體狀況正在迅速惡化。

<effect>殖民地居民<DisplayName>變成了熱心導師。<suffering_colonists>位殖民地居民獲得了慢性病缺陷。

Text: The biotech enthusiasts who wanted to perform genetic experiments on themselves suffered genetic malformations.
Translation: 想對自己進行基因實驗的生物技術熱心者的基因發生了畸形。

Text:
Their health is quickly deteriorating and we fear the worst scenario.

<effect><suffering_colonists> Colonists have gained the Chronic Condition Flaw.
Translation:
他們的健康狀況正在迅速惡化，恐怕凶多吉少了。

<effect><suffering_colonists>殖民地居民獲得了慢性病缺陷。

Text: We will research their idea further!
Translation: 我們將繼續研究他們的理念！

Text: <DisplayName> keeps repeating these frustrating words. Over and over. Unrelenting, the biorobot roams the dome and pursues people, screaming after them. Some even fear a violent development.
Translation: <DisplayName>一直重複著這些令人沮喪的話語。一遍又一遍。生化人不知疲倦地在穹頂裡遊蕩，一邊尖叫一邊追逐著路人。有些人擔心會發生暴力事件。
理智崩潰 - 瘋狂生化人

Text: "We are the Blorg. Your biological and technological distinctiveness will be befriended by our own. Resistance is futile." Clearly, the poor biorobot has gone nuts.
Translation: “我們是不搞事不舒服勢力。你們在生物與技術方面的特殊性必須與我們的特殊性成為朋友。不要做無謂的抵抗了。”這個可憐的生化人顯然已經瘋了。

Text: We all have bad moments, be it biorobot or human.
Translation: 不管是人類還是生化人，我們都會經歷不愉快。

Text: The biorobot is left unattended. Many colonists file in complaints, but all goes well when their annoying fellow comes back to reality.
Translation: 這個生化人無人照料。很多殖民地居民紛紛抱怨，但當他們凡人的同胞恢復正常時，一切也迎刃而解。

Text:
While they admit that <DisplayName> was extremely annoying, the other biorobots in the colony feel grateful that one of their kind was treated like a person, and not a defect object, and was given a chance to find inner strength to get better.

<effect><DisplayName> has recovered. All Colonists lost <ranting_comfort_down> Comfort. All Biorobots gain <robot_morale_up> Morale for <sols(robot_morale_up_time)> Sols.
Translation:
儘管其他生化人承認<DisplayName>十分煩人，但他們也心懷感激，因為我們用對待人類而非一件殘次品的態度對待了他們的一名同胞，並給了此人一個從內心尋找力量恢復正常的機會。

<effect><DisplayName>已恢復正常。所有殖民地居民舒適度下降<ranting_comfort_down>。所有生化人獲得<robot_morale_up>士氣，持續<sols(robot_morale_up_time)>個太陽日。

Text: Biorobots were created to complement our weaknesses. Reprogram it!
Translation: 創造生化人是為了彌補我們的缺陷。給它從新程式設計！

Text: The biorobot is apprehended and ran through the system, its memory checked and reset.
Translation: 我們逮捕了生化人並檢查了它的系統，然後重置了它的記憶。

Text:
Biorobots around the colony admit this was the best decision, but still don’t feel comfortable as one of their kind has just been treated like an object, a tool so to say.

<effect><DisplayName> has lost all Traits. Biorobots lose <robot_morale_down> Morale for <sols(robot_morale_down_time)> Sols.
Translation:
殖民地裡的生化人們都承認這是最好的決定，但仍因自己的同胞被當成物件或工具對待而感到不安。

<effect><DisplayName>失去了所有特性。生化人士氣降低<robot_morale_down>，持續<sols(robot_morale_down_time)>個太陽日。

Text: We rubbed our eyes, but no, we weren’t seeing mirages. By some weird quirk of physics the tiny pond was there – right before our eyes! After the initial excitement has passed, we need to make an important decision.
Translation: 我們揉揉眼睛，確定了看到的並不是海市蜃樓。我們眼前真有一片池塘，大自然的鬼斧神工令人讚歎！最初的興奮過後，我們需要做重要的決定。

Text: No spectrographic traces of water could prepare us for the breath-taking sight. Amidst the red dunes a tiny pond of liquid water was shimmering under the bleak sun.
Translation: 就算攝譜儀發現了水的跡象，眼前的景象依然令我們歎為觀止。在紅色沙丘中，一片小池塘正在暗淡的陽光下閃著微光。

Text: Extract the water and conduct research.
Translation: 抽取池塘裡的水並進行研究。

Text: This confirms an old hypothesis of mine!
Translation: 這證明了我很久之前提出的一項假設！

Text: Water Reclamation Spires will cost <water_spire_discount>% less
Translation: 水資源回收尖塔消耗降低<water_spire_discount>%

Text: Find a way to conduct research without harming the site!
Translation: 設法在不破壞此地的情況下進行研究！

Text:
A young renegade, <DisplayName>, has been killed by our security forces in a tragic sequence of events. 

The colony is shocked and many Colonists are coming forward with accusations of Security Officers using excessive force when confronting mere acts of vandalism.

The community, both Renegade and non-Renegade citizens, demand justice in the form of retaliatory actions against the Officers involved.
Translation:
一個名叫<DisplayName>的年輕叛徒在一系列悲劇事件中命喪我們保安部隊之手。

此事在殖民地裡掀起了軒然大波，很多殖民地居民紛紛譴責警官在對付故意毀壞公共財產者時下手太狠。

叛徒和非叛徒社群的居民都要求嚴肅處理涉事警官，以為死者討回公道。

Text: A tragedy has mired the colony today.
Translation: 今天，殖民地陷入了悲劇的泥潭。

Text: This kind of behavior doesn't suit their station. Punish the Officers.
Translation: 這種行為是警官的失職。懲罰警官。

Text: all workers in Security Stations lose Morale
Translation: 保安中心的所有工人士氣下降
Old Text: all workers in Security Stations lose morale
Old Translation: 保安中心的所有工人士氣下降

Text: The Officers were doing their jobs. No punishment is necessary.
Translation: 警官只是在執行公務。不需要懲罰。
部分殖民地居民將變成叛徒

Text: Your answer was met with fury from the colonists.
Translation: 你的回答激起了殖民地居民們的眾怒。

Text:
Violent protests and unflattering slurs could be heard for several more hours.

While we do not have precise numbers, its safe to say that our renegade population has increased.
Translation:
暴力的抗議和令人不敢恭維的誹謗又持續了數小時。

雖然沒有準確數字，但叛徒數量肯定增多了。

Text: Close all Security Stations for <sols(sols)> Sols for retraining. This must never happen again.
Translation: 將所有保安中心關閉<sols(sols)>個太陽日以進行整頓。這種事以後絕不能再次發生。

Text: The brilliant <name> admits feeling depressed and burned out lately. They are requesting some time off work, to meditate and seek inspiration in the red wastes outside the Dome.
Translation: 才華橫溢的<name>坦言最近感覺很壓抑且精疲力盡。此人正在申請一段時間的假期，以進行冥想並去穹頂外的紅色荒野尋找靈感。
來自一位殖民地居民的消息

Text: One of our Genius Colonists has come up with an unusual request.
Translation: 我們的一名天才殖民地居民提出了不同尋常的請求。

Text: A Genius is entitled to some eccentricity. Permission granted!
Translation: 天才有怪癖也是可以理解的。沒問題！

Text: They signed for this job. Permission denied!
Translation: 這份工作是他們自己選擇的。這項請求我無法批准！

Text: A Genius is one of our most valuable assets. They have my special dispensation to never work again.
Translation: 天才是我們最寶貴的資源之一。我允許他們從此以後不用再工作，這是我對他們的特別優待。

Old Text: <DisplayName>, I want tell me about your problems...
Old Translation: <DisplayName>，和我說說你有什麼困擾吧……

Old Text: No consequences
Old Translation: 沒有後果

Text:
Short on breath and visibly excited, <DisplayName> explains their radical idea about an entirely new way to generate the power required by the Colony's growing need. The preliminary math checks out, but there is much research to be done before the concept is put in practice.

You remember that the Genius <DisplayName> had your special dispensation to stay out of the colony's work force. Perhaps this was exactly what they needed to come up with this brilliant idea.

<effect>Micro Fusion tech has been unlocked and its cost has been reduced by 50%.
Translation:
呼吸急促且面露興奮之色的<DisplayName>向你闡述著一種全新而激進的發電途徑，以滿足殖民地日益增長的需求。初步計算結果顯示此想法可行，但將理念投入實踐還需要進行大量研究。

你想起了之前得到你特別優待不用工作的天才<DisplayName>。也許他們正需要這個才能想出這種絕妙的主意。

<effect>微聚變已解鎖，且花費降低50%。

Text: A colonist bursts into your office. "Eureka! I've got it!"
Translation: 一位殖民地居民突然闖進了你的辦公室。“我想到了！我想到了！”
Old Text: A colonist bursts into your office. ‘Eureka! I've got it!’
Old Translation: 一位殖民地居民突然闖進了你的辦公室。“我想到了！我想到了！”

Text: Small groups of people talk and laugh, while others dance to the groovy music. Someone sees you and the music stops abruptly. Everyone is looking slightly guilty.
Translation: 有些人成群結隊聊天歡笑，其他人伴著美妙的音樂翩翩起舞。有人看到了你，音樂戛然而止。大家都面有愧色。

Text: The door of the command room opens and you’re hit by the loud noise. A party!
Translation: 指揮室的門開啟，你突然聽到一陣嘈雜的噪音。有人在舉行聚會！

Text: I expect the maintenance and efficiency reports on my desk by 11:00 local time.
Translation: 當地時間11點前把維護和效率報告送到我的臺上。
Old Text: I expect the maintenance and efficiency reports on my desk by 1100 local time.

Text: Recreation is important, but duties, especially the duties of Mission Control, must never be forgotten.
Translation: 娛樂是很重要，但工作職責，尤其是任務指揮中心的工作職責，絕不能被遺忘。

Text:
Under your harsh gaze, the team cleans up the control room and attend their action stations. You take your seat – there’s work to do.

<effect>+<morale_bonus> Morale for <sols(morale_duration)> Sols for all Colonists
Translation:
在你嚴厲目光的注視下，團隊成員們把控制室打掃乾淨並回到了各自的崗位上。你在自己的座位上坐下，還有工作要完成呢。

<effect>所有殖民地居民+<morale_bonus>士氣，持續<sols(morale_duration)>個太陽日

Text: What is this, a party? Who gave you permission?
Translation: 這算什麼，在辦聚會嗎？誰批准你們的？

Text: Your harsh words hit them like a scourge. But they were necessary.
Translation: 你嚴厲的斥責像鞭子一樣抽打著他們。但這是必要的。

Text:
Mars is like a death-trap, ready to snap shut when you least expect it. Your people need to learn that you will never compromise the safety and success of the colony.

<effect>+<morale_bonus> Morale for <sols(morale_duration)> Sols for all Colonists
Translation:
火星就像個死亡陷阱，會在你最意想不到的時候給你致命一擊。你的手下需要明白你絕不允許在殖民地的安全和成功上有半點懈怠。

<effect>所有殖民地居民+<morale_bonus>士氣，持續<sols(morale_duration)>個太陽日

Text: Smile and wave, then leave them have it their way.
Translation: 面帶微笑，朝他們揮手致意，然後隨他們去。

Text: The Mission Control team had a pretty rough time so far. They earned the right to vent off some steam.
Translation: 任務指揮中心的團隊到目前為止一直很辛苦。他們有權釋放壓力。

Text:
But you know that Mars is still out there, stalking for a good moment to strike at your colony and take its toll. You leave your people have fun, and you return to your personal control station. Someone has to be on vigil.

<effect>+<comfort_bonus> Comfort for all Colonists
Translation:
但你知道火星並不會休息，它仍在時刻等待著給你的殖民地造成損失的良機。你讓手下們盡情放鬆，自己回到了個人控制檯旁。總得有人值班。

<effect>所有殖民地居民+<comfort_bonus>舒適度

Text: The secret booze stash is in this locker.
Translation: 酒就藏在這個寄存櫃裡。
Old Text: 'The secret booze stash is in this locker.'
Old Translation: “酒就藏在這個寄存櫃裡。”

Text: You have to admit, your team needed to vent off some steam.
Translation: 不得不承認，你的隊員們需要釋放壓力。

Text:
You join the argument of the Engineers about some nuts and bolts, then discuss the hilariously-crafted fake hypothesis of the Scientists and even taste some of the allegedly "hangover-free" moonshine of the Botanists. Who knows, there might be a grain of truth there - next morning you wake up with a smile and a light heart.

<effect>+<comfort_bonus> Comfort for all Colonists
Translation:
你和工程師們一起議論了一些細節問題，然後與科學家們討論了荒唐可笑的假設，最後甚至嚐了嚐植物學家們私釀的號稱“不會引起宿醉”的酒。誰知道呢，或許他們並沒有吹牛，因為第二天早上，你面帶微笑地醒來，感覺神清氣爽。

<effect>所有殖民地居民+<comfort_bonus>舒適度

Text: How unprofessional! You call this dancing? Let me show you!
Translation: 太不像話了！這也叫跳舞？讓我這個老司機來給你們示範一下！
Old Text: 'How unprofessional! You call this dancing? Let me show you!'
Old Translation: “太不像話了！這也叫跳舞？讓我這個老司機來給你們示範一下！”

Text: You couldn’t remember the last time you had so much fun!
Translation: 上一次玩得這麼盡興是什麼時候呢？你已經記不清了。

Text:
And to be honest, when you wake up in the morning, you couldn’t remember what you did at the party last night. You take the headache as a positive sign while you’re trying to reach your action station. People that see you in the corridors give you warm smiles.

<effect>+<comfort_bonus> Comfort for all Colonists
Translation:
老實說，當你早上醒來時，也已經記不清自己昨晚在聚會上幹過什麼事了。你起身前往工作崗位，感到一陣頭痛，你把這視為一件好事。走廊裡遇到你的人都向你露出親切的笑容。

<effect>所有殖民地居民+<comfort_bonus>舒適度

Text:
You arrive at the scene just to see a chair flying out of the window, smashing right in front of the crowd of concerned citizens. You hear the hysterical cries from inside: "Leave me alone! I don’t need to see any of you!"

As you come closer, the crowd turns towards you.
Translation:
你趕到現場時正好看到一把椅子飛出了窗戶，落在了憂心忡忡的人群跟前。你聽到裡面傳來歇斯底里的叫喊：“別來煩我！你們這些人我一個都不想見！”

你走上前，人們紛紛轉身看向你。

Text: A Colonist has snapped. They demand more personal space and are barricaded inside their house until their demands are met.
Translation: 一位殖民地居民崩潰了。此人要求得到更多私人空間，不滿足他的要求就堅守在家中不出來。

Text: He's right. We all need more personal space.
Translation: 他說得沒錯。人人都需要更多私人空間。

Text: all residences will grant more Comfort, but provide less living space
Translation: 所有住宅將提供更多舒適度，但可居住的人數變少

Text: Personal space is a luxury we cannot afford.
Translation: 私人空間我們負擔不起的奢望。
所有殖民地居民舒適度下降。

Text: No problems! We will just build more residences!
Translation: 沒問題！我們只要建造更多住宅就行了！

Text: We must harmonize the living environment!
Translation: 我們必須令生活環境變得和諧！

Text: Home Collective tech research cost is reduced
Translation: 集合式住宅技術研究消耗降低

Text: Stress on one of our power networks is causing a massive power surge. There’s a serious threat of overloading the entire network if we don’t do something quickly.
Translation: 我們一處電網的壓力引發了巨大的電壓突波。如果我們不趕快採取行動，整個電網都有超載的危險。

Text: A number of red lights go off as sparks start flying from the terminal that monitors our power networks.
Translation: 監控電網的終端機冒出火花，若干紅燈熄滅。

Text: Shut down <number_of_buildings> power producers for <sols(shutdown_duration)> Sols!
We have successfully rerouted power to Batteries. Although they were overloaded for a while, no accidents have occurred this time.
Translation: 我們已經成功讓電力流向電池。雖然它們暫時超載，但這次沒有發生事故。

Text: We rerouted the excess power to our Batteries. Unfortunately, several of them exploded, damaging the nearby buildings.
Translation: 我們讓超量的電力流向了電池。十分不幸，有幾處電池爆炸了，附近的建築物也受到了損傷。

Text: I know how to contain the surge!
It worked! The power surge has been contained without any damage to our power network.
Translation: 成功了！電壓突波已得到控制，且電網完好無損。

Text:
It worked… well mostly. We sort of blew up some cables but the Drones will take care of that.

<effect><number_of_faults> cable faults have appeared.
Translation:
成功了……基本上吧。幾處電纜貌似爆炸了，但讓無人機去搞定就行了。

<effect>出現了<number_of_faults>處電纜故障。

Text:
Oops, your calculations were a little off. I guess you should’ve used metric.
 
<effect>Several power producers and consumers have broken down.
Translation:
哎呀，你好像計算失誤了。你本應該使用度量的。

<effect>若干發電建築和用電建築發生故障。
若干建築物將發生故障

Text: They have closed off several Infirmaries by threatening the personnel inside. All this to make their point, we can guess.
Translation: 他們已經用威脅的方式迫使若干間醫務室停了業。而目的大概只是為了證明自己的觀點。

Text: Renegade colonists are protesting against the allegedly bad health conditions in the colony.
Translation: 叛徒殖民地居民正在就殖民地中糟糕的健康狀況抗議。

Text: Another day in life... on Mars.
Translation: 火星上的人們迎來了新的一天。
Old Text: Another day in life...on Mars.
Old Translation: 火星上的人們迎來了新的一天。

Translation: 關閉所有醫務室，持續<sols(disabled_infirmaries)>個太陽日

Text: Send in officers to disperse the crowd.
All Colonists lose Morale for <sols(penalty_duration)> Sols
Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣下降，持續<sols(penalty_duration)>個太陽日。

Text:
Our recent discovery of the “Low-G Engineering” technology has inspired our research team and they want to prototype a Medium Dome.

There are some concerns that our other scientific endeavors will suffer due to the distraction and a positive result is not guaranteed.
Translation:
最近發現的“低重力工程學”技術給我們的研究團隊提供了靈感，他們想要開發中型穹頂的原型。

有人擔心這會干擾到我們其他的科學工作，且無法保證能成功。

Text: Excited and nervous, the group of Scientists in your office can do little to hide their excitement. They want to build a prototype of a new kind of structure.
Translation: 你辦公室的科學家們雖然緊張，但難掩興奮之情。他們想要建造一種新式建築的原型。

Text: <rp_reduction>% generated research for <sols(duration)> Sols, chance to get a Medium Dome prefab
Translation: 產生的研究點數<rp_reduction>%，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日，有機率獲得一箇中型穹頂預製件

Text: <rp_reduction>% research generated for <sols(duration)> Sols, guaranteed Medium Dome prefab
Translation: 產生的研究點數<rp_reduction>%，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日，必定獲得一箇中型穹頂預製件
Old Text: <rp_reduction>% research generated for <sols(duration)> Sols,guaranteed Medium Dome prefab
Old Translation: 產生的研究點數<rp_reduction>%，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日，必定獲得一箇中型穹頂預製件

Text: <morale_penalty> Morale of all Scientists for <sols(morale_penalty_duration)> Sols
Translation: 所有科學家士氣<morale_penalty>，持續<sols(morale_penalty_duration)>個太陽日

Text:
The endeavor was not entirely without merit. The team is very grateful for the opportunity and all are eager to tackle their next task.

<effect>Scientists have their Morale increased by <morale_boost> for the next <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols.
Translation:
這項工作也是有可取之處的。團隊很感激你給了他們這次機會，他們摩拳擦掌，想要在下一次任務中大顯身手。

<effect>在接下來的<sols(morale_boost_duration)>個太陽日裡，科學家士氣提升<morale_boost>。

Text: Our Scientists have failed to construct a working Medium Dome prototype.
Translation: 我們的科學家未能建造出可以使用的原型中型穹頂。

Text: <effect>Medium Dome prefab has been added. Insights gained from the project have resulted in a <tech_boost>% progress towards the "Low-G Engineering" technology.
Translation: <effect>已獲得中型穹頂預製件。我們從專案中獲得的見解使“低重力工程學”技術的進度推進了<tech_boost>%。

Text: Our Scientists have succeeded in building the prototype Medium Dome.
Translation: 我們的科學家們成功建造出了原型中型穹頂。

Text:
Our recent discovery of the “Nuclear Fusion” technology has inspired our research team and they want to try to build a prototype Fusion Reactor.

There are some concerns that our other scientific endeavors will suffer due to the distraction and a positive result is not guaranteed.
Translation:
最近發現的“核融合”技術給我們的研究團隊提供了靈感，他們想要開發核融合反應爐的原型。

有人擔心這會干擾到我們其他的科學工作，且無法保證能成功。

Text: Excited and nervous, the group of Scientists in your office can do little to hide their excitement. They want to build a prototype of a new kind of structure.
Translation: 你辦公室的科學家們雖然緊張，但難掩興奮之情。他們想要建造一種新式建築的原型。

Text: <rp_reduction>% generated research for <sols(duration)> Sols, chance to get a Fusion Reactor prefab
Translation: 產生的研究點數<rp_reduction>%，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日，有機率獲得一個核融合反應爐預製件

Text: <rp_reduction>% research generated for <sols(duration)> Sols, guaranteed Fusion Reactor prefab
Translation: 產生的研究點數<rp_reduction>%，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日，必定獲得一個核融合反應爐預製件
Old Text: <rp_reduction>% research generated for <sols(duration)> Sols,guaranteed Fusion Reactor prefab
Old Translation: 產生的研究點數<rp_reduction>%，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日，必定獲得一個核融合反應爐預製件

Text: <morale_penalty> Morale of all Scientists for <sols(morale_penalty_duration)> Sols
Translation: 所有科學家士氣<morale_penalty>，持續<sols(morale_penalty_duration)>個太陽日

Text:
The endeavor was not entirely without merit. The team is very grateful for the opportunity and all are eager to tackle their next task.

<effect>Scientists have their Morale increased by <morale_boost> for the next <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols.
Translation:
這項工作也是有可取之處的。團隊很感激你給了他們這次機會，他們摩拳擦掌，想要在下一次任務中大顯身手。

<effect>在接下來的<sols(morale_boost_duration)>個太陽日裡，科學家士氣提升<morale_boost>。

Text: Our Scientists have failed to construct a working Fusion Reactor prototype.
Translation: 我們的科學家未能建造出可以使用的原型核融合反應爐。

Text: <effect>Fusion Reactor prefab has been added. Insights gained from the project have resulted in a <tech_boost>% progress towards the "Nuclear Fusion" technology.
Translation: <effect>已獲得核融合反應爐預製件。我們從專案中獲得的見解使“核融合”技術的進度推進了<tech_boost>%。

Text: Our Scientists have succeeded in building the prototype Fusion Reactor.
Translation: 我們的科學家們成功建造出了原型核融合反應爐。

Text:
Our recent discovery of the “Triboelectric Scrubbing” technology has inspired our research team and they want to try to build a prototype Triboelectric Scrubber.

There are some concerns that our other scientific endeavors will suffer due to the distraction and a positive result is not guaranteed.
Translation:
最近發現的“摩擦電清洗”技術給我們的研究團隊提供了靈感，他們想要開發摩擦電清洗器的原型。

有人擔心這會干擾到我們其他的科學工作，且無法保證能成功。

Text: Excited and nervous, the group of Scientists in your office can do little to hide their excitement. They want to build a prototype of a new kind of structure.
Translation: 你辦公室的科學家們雖然緊張，但難掩興奮之情。他們想要建造一種新式建築的原型。

Text: <rp_reduction>% generated research for <sols(duration)> Sols, chance to get a Triboelectric Scrubber prefab
Translation: 產生的研究點數<rp_reduction>%，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日，有機率獲得一個摩擦電清洗器預製件

Text: <rp_reduction>% research generated for <sols(duration)> Sols,guaranteed Triboelectric Scrubber prefab
Translation: 產生的研究點數<rp_reduction>%，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日，必定獲得一個摩擦電清洗器預製件

Text: <morale_penalty> Morale of all Scientists for <sols(morale_penalty_duration)> Sols
Translation: 所有科學家士氣<morale_penalty>，持續<sols(morale_penalty_duration)>個太陽日

Text:
The endeavor was not entirely without merit. The team is very grateful for the opportunity and all are eager to tackle their next task.

<effect>Scientists have their Morale increased by <morale_boost> for the next <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols.
Translation:
這項工作也是有可取之處的。團隊很感激你給了他們這次機會，他們摩拳擦掌，想要在下一次任務中大顯身手。

<effect>在接下來的<sols(morale_boost_duration)>個太陽日裡，科學家士氣提升<morale_boost>。

Text: Our Scientists have failed to construct a working Triboelectric Scrubber prototype.
Translation: 我們的科學家未能建造出可以使用的原型摩擦電清洗器。

Text: <effect>Triboelectric Scrubber prefab has been added. Insights gained from the project have resulted in a <tech_boost>% progress towards the Triboelectric Scrubbing technology.
Translation: <effect>已獲得摩擦電清洗器預製件。我們從專案中獲得的見解使“摩擦電清洗”技術的進度推進了<tech_boost>%。

Text: Our Scientists have succeeded in building the prototype Triboelectric Scrubber.
Translation: 我們的科學家們成功建造出了原型摩擦電清洗器。

Text:
After climbing the slope of a huge crater we have faced an astonishing sight – down below we saw the remains of a facility. Clearly a man-made one. The dust didn’t manage to hide the rocket landing pads, the spherical concrete buildings and – what’s most disturbing – the large port-holes on the ground which resemble rocket silos too much to be sure.

<if(is_commander("politician"))>[<commander_profile>] You've heard rumors about Cold War military projects on Mars. It's intriguing, but it can also be quite dangerous.</if>
Translation:
我們爬上巨型環形山的山坡後，看到了驚人的景象：下方有一座設施的殘骸。顯然是人造設施。塵土沒能掩埋火箭著陸點、球形混凝土建築以及地上一個個像極了火箭發射井的巨大射擊孔，令人不寒而慄。

<if(is_commander("politician"))>[<commander_profile>]你聽說過冷戰期間在火星上的軍事工程。有意思，但也可能非常危險。</if>

Text: The expedition was sent to investigate a spectrographic trace of rich metals deposit, but found something much more interesting – and troubling!
Translation: 探險隊奉命前往調查金屬儲量豐富資源點的攝譜蹤跡，但找到了更有意思也更令人不安的東西。
離開並就當什麼都沒看到。

Text: Leave the site, but upload its coordinates in the international database.
Translation: 離開該地點，但將其座標上傳到國際資料庫。

Text: We approached the mysterious facility with apprehension, but nothing bad happened. It appears that the location has been abandoned decades ago.
Translation: 我們提心吊膽地靠近了神祕設施，但什麼事也沒發生。看來這個地方已經廢棄好幾十年了。
Old Text: We approached the mysterious facility with apprehension, but nothing bad happened. It appears that the location had been abandoned decades ago.
Old Translation: 我們提心吊膽地靠近了神祕設施，但什麼事也沒發生。看來這個地方已經廢棄好幾十年了。

Text:
The facility has been picked almost clean, but there are still traces of evidence what happened here. People lived here, and research was conducted. The silos are empty, but there are signs that at least two of the five hosted nuclear devices. The labs are the most amazing part of the facility – most of the equipment and the computer systems were too heavy and unwieldy to be moved out of the planet.

<effect>A new Breakthrough tech has become available. The expedition will return shortly.
Translation:
設施裡的東西幾乎已被搜刮一空，但依然能從蛛絲馬跡中推斷出這裡曾經發生過的事。這裡以前有人住過，且進行過某種研究。發射井空無一物，但有跡象表明五座發射井中至少有兩座曾存放過核裝置。實驗室是整座設施最驚人的部分。大多數的設備和電腦系統由於太重而無法用星球上運走。

<effect>一項新突破性技術已開放。探險隊即將返回。

Text:
On the screen there is only a black silhouette. The person talks to you through a voice modulator.

"Commander, you've made  quite a mess by revealing the location of our facility. Now, we have to send a clean-up team, and it would cost us a lot of money and precious time. Of course, you can help us help you and do the dirty work yourself – remove all evidence that the facility you discovered ever existed. Your call."
Translation:
螢幕上只有一個黑色的人影。此人用變聲器開口了。

“指揮官，你暴露了我們設施的位置，引起了很大的騷動。現在，我們不得不派出清理隊，而這會花費我們大量的金錢和寶貴的時間。當然，你也可以幫我們銷燬該設施存在過的一切證據，這也是為了你自己好。你自己決定吧。”

Text: The expedition team returns and you diligently and dutifully file in the report about the discovery. It’s not too long before you get the call.
Translation: 探險隊回來了，你認真盡責地提交了有關這次發現的報告。沒過多久，就有人聯絡上了你。

Text: I will organize the clean-up immediately!
Translation: 我會立刻組織清理工作！

Text: You have the strong feeling that the mysterious figure isn’t joking. Probably it would be best to organize a new flight to the facility coordinates immediately.
Translation: 你能感覺到這個神祕人並非在開玩笑。或許立刻安排飛往設施所在座標是最佳做法。

Text: <goal>Return to the coordinates of the secret facility. Upon completion, you will receive <funding(reward_funding)> Funding.
Translation: <goal>返回祕密設施所在座標。完成時，你將獲得<funding(reward_funding)>資金。
Old Text: <task>Return to the coordinates of the secret facility. Upon completion, you will receive <funding(reward_funding)> Funding.
Old Translation: <task>返回祕密設施所在座標。完成時，你將獲得<funding(reward_funding)>資金。

Old Text: "Secret Nuke Facility"
Old Translation: “祕密核設施”

Text: Top-secret facility from the Cold War period. You have promised to wipe all evidence of its existence.
Translation: 冷戰時期的最高機密設施。你承諾銷燬一切其存在過的證據。
Old Text: "Top-secret facility from the Cold War period. You have promised to wipe all evidence of its existence."
Old Translation: “冷戰時期的最高機密設施。”你承諾銷燬一切其存在過的證據。

Text:
The ground is shaking and the people look in terror and uncertainty towards the horizon as the black columns of smoke quickly rise towards the bleak skies. You don’t need to look there to know what’s going on – the damage and casualty report says everything.

You can't shake the feeling that this is somehow related to the recent activities of your expedition team.

<effect>The punitive sabotage strike has destroyed <buildings_lost> buildings. <colonists_lost> colonists have died and <colonists_injured> have been injured.
Translation:
大地開始震動，不明真相的人們一臉驚恐地看著滾滾濃煙從地平線迅速竄向暗淡的天空。你不用看就知道發生了什麼事。損壞和傷亡報告說明了一切。

你總感覺這與你探險隊最近的活動脫不了關係。

<effect>懲罰性的破壞襲擊摧毀了<buildings_lost>座建築物。<colonists_lost>位殖民地居民死亡，<colonists_injured>人受傷。

Text: Alarms follow the series of explosions throughout the colony.
Translation: 警報聲在殖民地各處發生一系列爆炸後響起。

Text:
The mysterious stranger appears once more on the screen. You hear only two words this time: "Good job!"

<effect>You have received <funding(reward_funding)> Funding. The clean-up team will return shortly.
Translation:
神祕人再次出現在螢幕上。這次你只聽到他說了三個字：“幹得好！”

<effect>你獲得了<funding(reward_funding)>資金。清理隊很快就會回來。

Text: The clean-up team has been instructed well about the operation goals and parameters. They act like professionals, and finish up quite quickly.
Translation: 清理隊在行動目標和規範方面已經得到了明確的指示。他們的行動很專業，很快就把事情辦完了。

Text:
Accepting some refugees in the colony will generate both Funding and good press for us. Social transitions are never entirely smooth, though.

<hint>Refugees are untrained for life on Mars and will initially have reduced work performance at all jobs. Some of them may have trouble adjusting to the Martian lifestyle and may become Renegades.
Translation:
將難民收容進殖民地能為我們產生資金和輿論的好評。不過社會轉型向來都不會一帆風順。

<hint>難民沒有受過火星生活的適應訓練，一開始無論從事什麼工作，工作效率都會降低。他們中或許有人很難適應火星的生活方式，並可能變成叛徒。

Text: Recent political turmoil on Earth has driven many refugees to seek shelter as far from the mother planet as possible.
Translation: 地球上最近發生的政治動盪迫使很多難民前往儘可能遠離地球母親的地方避難。

Text: We will grant asylum to some of the refugees.
Refugees from Earth want to join our colony.
Translation: 地球來的難民將加入我們的殖民地。

Text: We will grant asylum to as many as we can.
Translation: 我們將收容儘可能多的難民。

Text: Refugees from Earth want to join our colony.
Translation: 地球來的難民將加入我們的殖民地。

Text: <small_morale_penalty> Colonist Morale for the next <sols(morale_penalty_sols)> Sols
Translation: 接下來的<sols(morale_penalty_sols)>個太陽日裡<small_morale_penalty>殖民地居民士氣
Old Text: <morale_penalty> Colonist Morale for the next <sols(morale_penalty_sols)> Sols
Old Translation: 接下來的<sols(morale_penalty_sols)>個太陽日裡<morale_penalty>殖民地居民士氣

Text: Mars is not a place for untrained civilians.
Translation: 火星不是未受過訓練的平民該來的地方。

Text: <morale_penalty> Colonist Morale for the next <sols(morale_penalty_sols)> Sols
Translation: 接下來的<sols(morale_penalty_sols)>個太陽日裡<morale_penalty>殖民地居民士氣

Text: Let me make a tweet to distract the journalists!
Translation: 我去發一篇推文，轉移記者的注意力！

Old Text: (no consequences)
Old Translation: （沒有後果）

Text:
You waited too long to land the rocket and all of the refugees have died in orbit.

<effect>All Colonists lose <morale_penalty> Morale for <sols(morale_penalty_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
火箭著陸的等待時間太長，所有難民死在了軌道上。

<effect>所有殖民地居民失去<morale_penalty>士氣，持續<sols(morale_penalty_sols)>個太陽日。

Text: The rocket carrying the refugees still floats in orbit around Mars but all the souls on board have been lost.
Translation: 載著難民的火箭依然在火星軌道上飛行著，但上面的人已經全部喪生。
Old Text: The rocket carrying the refugees still floats in orbit of Mars but all the souls on board have been lost.
Old Translation: 載著難民的火箭依然在火星軌道上飛行著，但上面的人已經全部喪生。

Text: The Rocket has exploded just moments after igniting its engines. Sensor data report all systems were functioning within expected parameters. The evidence points to Renegade sabotage.
Translation: 火箭發動機點火後僅過了片刻就爆炸了。感測器資料顯示所有系統運轉正常。證據表明是叛徒蓄意破壞。

Text: Dozens of red lights and alarms go off. Monitors stay frozen on the massive fireball that was our Rocket a second ago.
Translation: 幾十盞紅燈亮起，警報聲不絕於耳。我們的火箭突然發生爆炸，顯示器的畫面定格在了巨大的火球上。

Text: The Renegades went too far this time...

Several Renegades have been pushed to their deaths during the night, in what seems like nothing short of an execution.

Just as you are about to begin coordinating a plan with the ranking Officers, a Colonist admits to being the culprit.

<DisplayName> says the murdered group of renegades had been tormenting youngsters left and right around the Domes - some of which had been pushed to suicide. 

When they saw that the authorities were not going to solve this problem, <DisplayName> decided to take matters into their own hands. They punished the predatory group of renegades and are now ready to accept their fate.
Translation:
晚上，若干名叛徒被逼死，場面與處決無異。

你剛打算和高階軍官商討對策，一位殖民地居民承認了自己是肇事者。

<DisplayName>稱喪命的那夥兒叛徒最近一直在穹頂裡折磨年輕人，其中一部分人因實在受不了而自殺了。

由於當局的不作為，<DisplayName>決定自己解決問題。此人懲罰了作惡的叛徒團伙，並做好了承擔一切後果的覺悟。

Text: News of the gruesome crime have reached your ears with the sunrise.
Translation: 天剛亮你就聽到了可怕的罪行。
Old Text: News of the gruesome crime reach had reached your ears with the sunrise.
Old Translation: 天剛亮你就聽到了可怕的罪行。

Text: This is wrong and immoral. Prepare to ship <DisplayName> back to Earth.
Translation: 這種做法既不正確又不道德。準備將<DisplayName>送回地球。

Text: Maybe <DisplayName> is the antidote for our crime problem. Set them loose.
Translation: 或許<DisplayName>就是我們犯罪問題的解決方案。放人。

Old Text: The vigilante takes another victim
Old Translation: 義務警員又奪走一條人命。

Text: They will tour all the different colonies on Mars and have got their own transportation covered. All RockScape's management needs from us is permission to play and to prepare a Dome for the event.
Translation: 他們將前往火星上所有的殖民地進行巡迴演出，且有自己的交通工具。石景樂隊的管理層只需要我們給他們演出的許可，並在穹頂內做好相應準備。

Text: A famous rock band called RockScape wishes to bring their music to Mars for a live performance.
Translation: 名為石景的知名搖滾樂隊想要把他們的音樂帶上火星，並進行現場演出。

Text: all Colonists gain <morale_boost> Morale for <sols(moraleboost_period)> Sols
Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣上升<morale_boost>，持續<sols(moraleboost_period)>個太陽日。

Text: We have enough troubles. Don't rock the boat I say.
Translation: 我們的麻煩事已經夠多了。還是安穩一點吧，別搖滾了。

Text: We will need to prepare a Dome to withstand the noise levels an event like this suggests.
Translation: 我們需要準備一座能承受這種活動產生的噪音的穹頂。

Text: all Colonists gain <morale_boost> Morale for <sols(moraleboost_period)> Sols
Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣上升<morale_boost>，持續<sols(moraleboost_period)>個太陽日。

Text:
It seems we hadn't properly estimated the noise levels and that even our Domes were not made to withstand the power of Rock and Roll.

<effect>The concert caused several fractures in the superstructure of the hosting Dome.
Translation:
似乎我們尚未正確估計噪音級，就連我們的穹頂也無法承受搖滾的力量。

<effect>音樂會導致其所在的穹頂產生了若干處裂縫。

Text: The concert was awesome - everyone had a blast but...
Translation: 音樂會棒極了，人人都過足了癮，可是……

Text: I guess we didn't think this through.
Translation: 看來我們沒有考慮周全。

Text: We had to suspend the rocket launch due to suspicious atmospheric patterns. There is nothing wrong with the Rocket and it is now ready for launch again. However people are concerned - after all rockets are our only way back home.
Translation: 由於大氣活動可疑，我們得推遲火箭發射。火箭沒有問題，現在已準備好再次發射了。不過人們憂心忡忡。畢竟我們只能靠火箭才能回家。

Text: Several colonists have gathered to watch the launch. Their anticipation is quickly replaced by concern as the engines remain silent and the Rocket remains firmly on the ground.
Translation: 若干位殖民地居民集合在一起觀看發射。他們的期待之情很快變成了擔憂，因為發動機沒有動靜，火箭也依然穩穩地立在地上。

Text: You have my full assurance that everything is going to be alright.
Translation: 我向你們打包票，一切正常。

Text: Postponing rocket launches is a routine procedure, there's nothing to fear.
Translation: 推遲火箭發射只是例行程式，沒什麼可擔心的。

Text: We will do an additional maintenance check, just to alleviate the concerns.
Translation: 為了讓民眾安心，我們將額外進行一次維護檢查。

Text: If the experts are satisfied, this is good enough for me.
Translation: 如果專家說沒問題，那我也沒問題。

Text: <DisplayName> has failed to launch. We believe the problem lies within the ratio of liquid oxygen to liquid methane. We’ve compensated the issue but it is highly recommended to perform a full maintenance on the Rocket which will cost <machineparts(cost)>.
Translation: <DisplayName>未能發射。我們相信問題出在液態氧氣和液態甲烷的比例上。我們已經解決了問題，但強烈建議花費<machineparts(cost)>對火箭進行一次全面維護。
Old Text: <DisplayName> has failed to launch. We believe the problem lies within the ratio of liquid oxygen to liquid methane. We’ve compensated the issue but it is highly recommended to perform a full maintenance on the rocket which will cost <machineparts(cost)>.
Old Translation: <DisplayName>未能發射。我們相信問題出在液態氧氣和液態甲烷的比例上。我們已經解決了問題，但強烈建議花費<machineparts(cost)>對火箭進行一次全面維護。

Text: Several Colonists have gathered to watch the launch. Their anticipation is quickly replaced by concern as the engines spit dust and smoke but the Rocket refuses to get off the ground.
Translation: 若干位殖民地居民集合在一起觀看發射。他們的期待之情很快變成了擔憂，因為發動機吐出塵土和黑焰，且火箭就是不升空。

Text: I think the issue is software-related.
Translation: 我認為問題出在軟體上。
Old Text: I think the issue is software related
Old Translation: 我認為問題出在軟體上。

Translation: 在沒有爆炸風險的情況下發射。
Old Text: Launch without risk of explosion
Old Translation: 在沒有爆炸風險的情況下發射。

Text: Launch the Rocket and repair it back on Earth.
Translation: 發射火箭並在地球上維修。
Old Text: Launch the rocket and repair it back on Earth.
Old Translation: 發射火箭並在地球上維修。

Translation: 我們可能會失去該火箭

Text: The Rocket slowly begins to move towards the sky but something is not right. Just seconds later it is engulfed in flames and a bright fireball lights the sky.
Translation: 火箭開始慢慢升空，但有點不對勁。短短幾秒之後，火箭就被火焰吞沒，明亮的火球照亮了天空。

Text:
We’ve lost rocket <DisplayName>. Fortunately there was no collateral damage but the entire payload was destroyed.

<effect><morale> Morale for the next <sols(morale_duration)> Sols.
Translation:
我們失去了火箭<DisplayName>。幸好沒有造成人員傷亡，但火箭上的貨物都被毀了。

<effect><morale>接下來的<sols(morale_duration)>個太陽日裡士氣。

Text: Troubling is, it seems Matthew's new “friend” knows about quantum physics a lot more than his age suggests.
Translation: 令人困惑的是，馬修的新“朋友”雖然年紀不大，但似乎對量子物理學有相當深入的瞭解。

Text: A twelve-year-old boy living in the colony has an imaginary friend he calls Shocky.
Translation: 殖民地裡一名十二歲的小男孩有個想像出來的朋友，名叫小電電。

Text: Is that so? Summon three of our leading scientists and let them interview this boy.
Translation: 是嘛？把三位第一流的科學家給我叫來，讓他們跟這個男孩聊聊。

Text: Intriguing. Take this boy from his parents and study him in a Research Lab.
Translation: 有意思。把這個男孩從他父母手中接過來，並在研究實驗室裡對他進行研究。

Text: all Colonists lose Morale, gain Research
