Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣下降，獲得研究點數。

Text: We should not meddle with a young person’s mind. Let him be.
Translation: 我們不該瞎摻和小孩子的想法。隨他去吧。

Text: This boy has great potential. I will personally help him unfold it.
Translation: 這個男孩擁有巨大的潛力。我會親自幫他把潛力開發出來。

Text:
However, after the initial frustration, they were quite astonished by the radical ideas of the boy.

<effect>Three Scientists lost Sanity.
Translation:
然而，在經歷過一開始的沮喪之後，男孩激進的想法令他們大為驚奇。

<effect>三位科學家理智度下降。

Text: The scientists were confronted with new ideas which undermined the very foundations of modern Physics.
Translation: 擺在科學家面前的是撼動現代物理學根基的全新理念。

Text: Science is a process. Nothing is written in stone.
Translation: 科學是不斷變化發展的。沒有什麼是一成不變的。

Text: 3 Scientist Colonists gain a high Morale boost
Translation: 三位科學家殖民地居民士氣大幅提升

Text: So a twelve-year-old knows more about the universe than our best Physicists?
Translation: 這麼說這個十二歲的小屁孩比我們最傑出的物理學家更瞭解這個宇宙？

Text: all non-Scientist Colonists gain a small Morale boost
Translation: 所有非科學家殖民地居民士氣小幅提升

Text:
The researchers came up with a confirmation of the theory that parallel universes exist and even though some of them are similar to ours, others are horrifying. The mind of <DisplayName> could not bear this knowledge.

<effect>3 Scientists lost Sanity. We gained 4000 Research.
Translation:
研究者們想辦法證明了“平行宇宙是存在的”這一理論。只不過有些宇宙與我們的類似，但有些宇宙十分可怕。<DisplayName>的思維無法承受這樣的知識。

<effect>3位科學家理智度下降。我們獲得了4000研究點數。

Text: The boy who had an “imaginary friend” thrashes and speaks gibberish, restrained in the lab chair.
Translation: 擁有“想像出的朋友”的小男孩被綁在了實驗室的椅子上，他劇烈地扭動著，同時不停地胡言亂語。

Text: This is disturbing. Stop the project and send all data to our Sponsor.
Translation: 這真令人擔憂。叫停專案，並把所有資料傳送給我們的贊助者。

Text: Everything is acceptable in the name of science. Continue the research!
Translation: 為了科學，一切都是可以接受的。繼續研究！

Text:
It seems that the “imaginary friend” of the boy wasn’t imaginary at all. While tried to establish contact with the parallel universe where it comes from, our scientists  somehow opened a portal to another dimension. However, it was unstable and horrible creatures have reached from it into our world. In a desperate attempt to save our reality, the head of the science team has opened the oxygen vents and triggered an explosion in the facility.

<effect>A new Breakthrough is available for research. Matthew Gore has perished.
Translation:
看來這個男孩“想像出的朋友”是真實存在的。科學家們設法與它來自的平行宇宙建立聯絡時，陰差陽錯之下開啟了一道通往異次元的傳送門。然而，傳送門並不穩定，且可怕的生物從裡面出現，進入了我們的世界。科學團隊負責人為了拯救我們的世界，走投無路之下打開了氧氣通風孔，並在設施內部引發了爆炸。

<effect>一項新突破性技術現已可供研究。馬修·戈爾消失了。

Text: Stranger things happened at the research facility.
Translation: 研究設施發生了更加離奇的事。

Text: Science requires sacrifices. We shall name their discoveries after the boy - Matthew Gore!
Translation: 科學需要犧牲品。我們就用男孩的名字“馬修·戈爾”為他們的發現命名吧！

Text: many Colonists lose Morale, unlock some random Techs
Translation: 很多殖民地居民士氣下降，解鎖若干隨機技術

Text: There was a tragic accident at the Research Lab. We are still investigating the issue.
Translation: 研究實驗室發生了悲慘的事故。我們依然在進行調查。
部分殖民地居民士氣下降

Text: Calm down. We will create a special committee to investigate this tragic event.
Translation: 冷靜。我們會成立特別委員會調查這一悲劇事件。

Text:
Yet the mystic influence of Shocky marked him for life.

<effect>Matthew Gore has grown up as an Enthusiast Scientist.
Translation:
小電電的奇妙影響影響了他的一生。

<effect>馬修·戈爾已長大，並成為了一名有熱心特性的科學家。

Text: In time, the imaginary friend of Matthew seemed to disappear and he stopped talking about it. He grew up as a wonderful young man, fully dedicated to science.
Translation: 一段時間後，馬修想像出來的朋友似乎消失了，他也不再談起此事。他長大後成為了一個致力於科學的出色年輕人。

Text:
However, the mystic influence of Shocky somehow gifted him with an insight far beyond the normal people.

<effect>Matthew Gore has grown up as a Genius Scientist.
Translation:
然而，小電電的奇妙影響令他獲得了遠超常人的洞察力。

<effect>馬修·戈爾已長大，並成為了一名天才科學家。

Text: Leaning on your professional expertise, you have managed to convince Matthew that Shocky doesn’t exist and in time he stopped talking about it. He grew up as a wonderful young man, fully dedicated to science.
Translation: 你運用自己的專業知識，成功令馬修相信小電電並不存在，一段時間後，他也不再談起此事。他長大後成為了一個致力於科學的出色年輕人。

Text:
It turns out that <DisplayName> were secretly looking for a way to transfer their consciousness into an artificial body.

At least ten attempts were made to do so, ironically with the last attempt causing the death of the Colonist. While they couldn’t transfer their own consciousness into a better body they somehow managed to imprint both intelligence and self-awareness in the artificial hosts.

Unfortunately, <DisplayName> most probably thought their work was taboo and had all of their research destroyed before the attempts were made. We are currently not capable to replicate this result.

<effect>Receive 10 biorobot colonists in the dome. <DisplayName> has died.
Translation:
原來<DisplayName>正在私下設法將他們的意識轉移到人造身體裡。

為此他們已經進行了至少十次嘗試，諷刺的是，此人在最後一次嘗試中喪生。雖然他們沒能把自己的意識轉移到更好的身體裡，但他們似乎成功地在人造身體上烙印下了智慧和自我意識。

不幸的是，<DisplayName>很可能認為自己的工作觸犯了禁忌，所以在進行嘗試之前就把所有研究資料都銷燬了。我們目前無法重現此結果。

<effect>穹頂內出現10位生化人殖民地居民。<DisplayName>已死亡。

Text: You have received a report about the demise of one of the workers in our Biorobotic Workshops.
Translation: 我們得到報告稱生化機器人工坊裡的一名員工去世了。

Text:
He needs to secure the lump sum of <funding(funding_cost)> in order to realize a "revolutionary instrument", designed to reveal the secrets of the Cosmos. 

Despite his impeccable reputation, however, the lack of direct monetary application for the technology has made securing the funds on Earth quite difficult.

When the prototype phase has been completed, he will share the blueprints for the device with us.
Translation:
他需要獲得<funding(funding_cost)>資金才能將用來發現宇宙奧祕的“革命性工具”變為現實。

然而儘管他的名聲無可挑剔，由於這項技術無法直接用來盈利，所以在地球上申請到資金很困難。

當原型階段完成後，他會與我們共享裝置的設計圖。

Text: Rayan Cox – an astrophysicist of some renown, has reached us with a proposition which he describes as being mutually beneficial.
Translation: 頗有名望的天體物理學家萊恩·考克斯聯絡上了我們，並呈上一份他聲稱能使我們互利共贏的提議。

Text: We owe our very existence to such innovations. Secure the funds needed.
Translation: 我們能存在於此靠的就是這種創新。撥給他資金。

Text: Money, sadly, is also a tool in our survival playbook – a tool we need a lot.
Translation: 很不幸，我們的生存也需要大量金錢。

Text:
Forever grateful, he shared the technology with us.

<effect>The Interplanetary Astronomy tech has been researched. You can now construct the Omega Telescope wonder.
Translation:
他感激不盡，並與我們分享了技術。

<effect>已研究星際天文學技術。現在你可以建造歐米茄望遠鏡奇觀。

Text: Rayan Cox - the astrophysicist whose project we financed a while back – has let us know the technology he was working on has successfully passed the prototype phase.
Translation: 我們之前資助的那位天體物理學家萊恩·卡克斯告知我們說他正在研究的技術已經度過了原型階段。

Text:
They are willing to share the patent for their "one of a kind" device that can discover previously undetectable underground deposits of Metals and Rare Metals.

Still, they are asking for a substantial amount of money.
Translation:
他們願意與我們分享其“獨一無二”的裝置的專利，此裝置可發現之前無法發現的地下金屬和稀有金屬資源點。

不過，他們要求我們支付一筆鉅款。

Text: A recent successful startup company from Earth has made us an offer.
Translation: 一家創業公司最近取得了成功，並向我們呈上一份提議。

Text: This may be pure gold. Literally. Accept!
Translation: 毫不誇張地說，這可能成為我們的黃金機遇。接受！

Text: How much? We’ll come up with our tech to replicate their "one of a kind" device.
Translation: 開價多少錢？我們會自己研究出他們所謂“獨一無二”裝置的替代品。

Text: new research will be made available
Their asking price outweighs the benefits. Politely decline.
Translation: 他們開價太高，划不來。禮貌地拒絕。

Text:
This comes shortly after we received the following cryptic message:

"Seth requires permission to test 'The Bomb' at a safe distance from your Martian colony. These funds should cover inconvenience. 

Does Seth have permission?"
Translation:
我們收到加密資訊後不久就收到了這則資訊：

“賽斯需要許可，以在離你們火星殖民地足夠遠的安全距離測試“炸彈”。這些資金應該能作為給你們帶來不便的補償。

是否授予賽斯許可？”

Text: An unbelievable amount of unaccounted funds has suddenly appeared in our accounts but are currently kept frozen.
Translation: 我們的賬上突然出現了天文數字的資金，但目前屬於凍結狀態。

Text: What's this? Some kind of a joke? Disregard.
Translation: 這算什麼？尋我們開心嗎？無視。

Text: The money has been withdrawn from our account.
It looks like the mysterious offer is now off the table.
Translation: 看來我們錯過了這個神祕的提議。

Text: The Colony can use the additional funding. Answer "YES".
Translation: 殖民地需要額外資金。回答“是”。

Text: An enormous blast has been detected, measuring at a mind boggling 500 megatons of TNT.
Translation: 我們偵測到了巨大爆炸，威力相當於5億噸TNT。

Text:
The blast was very far away. A small marsquake was detected but the debris from the blast and the winds of the blast wave will hit our base very soon - both at the same time.

At least the money has been unfrozen. Hope we survive long enough to spend it.
Translation:
爆炸發生在離我們很遠的地方。我們偵測到了小型地震，不過爆炸的碎片和衝擊波氣浪很快就會到達我們的基地，而且是同時到達。

至少資金的凍結解除了。希望我們能保住小命花這些錢。

Text: Follow the message and identify the sender. Do it now!
Translation: 順藤摸瓜，確認消息的傳送者。動手！

Text: We tried to trace the message but whomever was behind it took extreme precautions to prevent this.
Translation: 我們設法追查消息的源頭，但傳送者採取了極其嚴密的防追查措施。

Text: The sum has been withdrawn from our account. It looks like the mysterious offer is now off the table.
Translation: 錢從我們賬上轉走了。看來我們錯過了這個神祕的提議。

Text:
The rocket has smashed with its nose in the ground, leaving a miles-long trail behind before the red sand and rocks quenched the immense force of its inertia. The hull is damaged and twisted beyond recognition, rending all attempts to identify the vehicle useless. No information can be found about the crash on any international flight records, either.

We can order the hull to be investigated, but the only way to proceed is to cut through it with blow-torches, which could be dangerous in case there are any dangerous substances or remaining fuel on board.
Translation:
火箭頭朝下栽了下來，在地上拖行了數公里，最後紅沙和岩石終於散去了它巨大的慣性力。火箭的外殼已經扭曲受損到了面目全非的地步，想辨認出其從屬已經不可能了。國際航班記錄裡也查不到這次墜毀的記錄。

我們可以下令調查外殼，但必須用噴燈將其切開才能進行。如果火箭上有任何危險物質或殘留的燃料，這麼做將十分危險。

Text: We have discovered the remains of a crashed rocket at the expedition location.
Translation: 我在探險地點發現了一枚墜毀的火箭。

Text: The blow-torches ignite a fuel pocket inside the Rocket’s hull. Nothing could have survived the titanic explosion which followed.
Translation: 噴燈點燃了火箭內部燃料罐。緊接著發生了巨大的爆炸，無論是誰都不可能存活。

Text: Cutting carefully through the twisted hull, the expedition managed to gain safe access to the dark cargo hold of the rocket.
Translation: 探險隊小心翼翼地切開了扭曲的外殼，並設法安全進入了火箭黑暗的貨艙。
Old Text: Cutting carefully through the twisted hull, the expedition managed to gain a safe access to the dark cargo hold of the rocket.
Old Translation: 探險隊小心翼翼地切開了扭曲的外殼，並設法安全進入了火箭黑暗的貨艙。

Text:
It’s a miracle that anything on board survived, but after sifting through the twisted scrap inside the crashed vehicle, the expedition discovered some useful prefabs which were meant for some failed colonization effort.

<effect>You have gained several Building Prefabs. The expedition will return shortly.
Translation:
火箭上若還有沒被毀的貨物就已經是奇蹟了。探險隊在火箭一片狼藉的內部仔細搜尋後，發現了一些有用的預製件。這些預製件本來用於之前的一次殖民任務，但那次任務顯然失敗了。

<effect>你獲得若干建築預製件。探險隊即將返回。

Text: Leave the crash site and return home!
We can access through the weak rock layers around the hull.
Translation: 我們可以透過外殼周圍薄弱的岩層進入。

Text: After hours of tedious tunneling, the expedition manages to access the hull from below.
Translation: 幾小時乏味的開鑿隧道工作結束後，探險隊設法從下方進入了火箭。

Text:
Immediately afterwards, the hull caves in with ear-piercing screech and a stream of fuel starts pouring through the hole, filling the tunnel. Only a quick evacuation prevented further damage and you’re thankful that you avoided the imminent disaster if you decided to use blow-torches. After a short hassle, the hull is breached in an alternative spot and the cargo hold of the rocket is exposed. Not much has been left intact, but there are still precious items to be salvaged.

<effect>You have gained several Building Prefabs. The expedition will return shortly.
Translation:
緊接著，火箭外殼隨著一聲刺耳的聲音崩塌了，流出的燃料灌進了鑿出的洞，把隧道淹沒了。及時的疏散避免了進一步損失。你慶幸自己沒有決定用噴燈，不然就在劫難逃了。短暫的忙碌後，我們在外殼上的另一個位置打開了突破口，並將火箭的貨艙暴露在外。裡面大多數貨物已經損毀，但依然有可供回收的珍貴物品。

<effect>你獲得了若干個建築預製件。探險隊即將返回。

Text:
The dispute which profession is more vital for the colonization effort has polarized the Colonists into two different camps.

You tried to avoid being sucked into the ridiculous debate but were ambushed by representatives of both sides on your way to lunch. 

With your back against the wall they ask: 

"In your opinion, Commander, who is more critical for the colony's success - the Engineer or the Scientist?"
Translation:
殖民地居民因哪個職業對殖民工作更為重要的爭論而分化為兩大陣營。

你極力避免捲進這一荒唐的辯論中，但在去吃午飯的路上，兩大陣營的代表突然出現在了你眼前，他們已經等候多時了。

他們把你逼得無路可退，開口問道：

“指揮官，依您看，對於殖民地的成功而言，工程師和科學家這兩種職業哪種更為重要？”

Text: An argument between an Engineer and a Scientist has escalated and is now the talk of the entire Colony.
Translation: 工程師和科學家之間的爭論逐步升級，現在成了整個殖民地議論的焦點。

Text: The Scientist's work enables the Engineer to do theirs.
Translation: 沒有科學家的理論，工程師無法進行工作。
Old Text: The Scientist's work enables the Engineer to do theirs, thus the scientist is more important.
Old Translation: 沒有科學家的理論，工程師無法進行工作。因此科學家更重要。

Text: Scientists get Morale boost, Engineers lose Morale for <sols(morale_duration)> Sols
Translation: 科學家士氣上升，工程師士氣下降，持續<sols(morale_duration)>個太陽日

Text: The Engineer puts to practice the theories of the Scientist.
Translation: 沒有工程師的實踐，科學家的理論永遠是理論。
Old Text: The Engineer puts to practice the theories of the Scientist - so, the Engineer.
Old Translation: 沒有工程師的實踐，科學家的理論永遠是理論。因此工程師更重要。

Text: Engineers get Morale boost, Scientists lose Morale for <sols(morale_duration)> Sols
Translation: 工程師士氣上升，科學家士氣下降，持續<sols(morale_duration)>個太陽日

Text: What the... this is ridiculous! Both roles are vital!
Translation: 什麼鬼……你們鬧夠了沒有！兩種職業都至關重要！

Text: Engineers and Scientists, like all others on Mars, are parts of a single working system. All our roles are irreplaceable.
Translation: 和火星上的其他職業一樣，工程師和科學家都是一個運轉的系統的一部分。所有職業都不可替代。

Text: Fearing that Earth could be destroyed by a cataclysm, the ten richest customers of Eternal Summer have paid for a rocket to host their cryopods. It has launched towards Mars, where they are relying on your colony to resupply the cosmic ark. Eternal Summer even hints that truly realizing their client's dreams could be very benefitial to us. The Eternal Summer rocket will regularly ask for permission to land. If you resupply it with Fuel, Machine Parts and Electronics, you will immediately receive upon its launch.
Translation: 永恆之夏的10名最富有的客戶由於擔心地球因一場浩劫而毀滅，已出錢購買了一枚火箭以存放他們的低溫休眠艙它正向著火星飛來，他們要靠我們的殖民地為他們的宇宙方舟進行補給。 永恆之夏甚至暗示，實現他們客戶的夢想對我們非常有利。 永恆之夏火箭將定期請求著陸許可。如果你為它補給燃料、機械零件和電子元件，就會在其發射時立刻獲得。
Old Text:
Fearing that Earth could be destroyed by a cataclysm, the ten richest customers of Eternal Summer have paid for a rocket to host their cryopods. It has launched towards Mars, where they are relying on your colony to resupply the cosmic ark.

<effect>The Eternal Summer rocket will regularly ask for permission to land. If you resupply it, you will receive immediately <funding(eternal_summer_reward)> upon its launch.
Old Translation:
永恆之夏的10名最富有的客戶由於擔心地球因一場浩劫而毀滅，已出錢購買了一枚火箭以存放他們的低溫休眠艙火箭已升空，正向著火星飛來。他們要靠我們的殖民地為他們的宇宙方舟進行補給。

<effect>永恆之夏火箭將定期請求著陸許可。如果你同意為其進行補給，你就會在它發射時立刻獲得<funding(eternal_summer_reward)>。

Text: Do you want to live forever? Apparently, the clients of Eternal Summer, a large cryonics company, intend to do so.
Translation: 你想永生嗎？顯然，人體冷凍技術巨擘永恆之夏公司的客戶打算這麼做。

Text: Space is a harsh place, and we wouldn’t leave anyone alone.
Translation: 太空冷酷無情，無論是誰我們都不能丟下不管。
抱歉，聽起來沒有吸引力。
這樣吧，叫他們付三倍的價錢。
Old Text: It will cost them extra, let’s say, triple.

Text: Accept and increase the reward to <funding(eternal_summer_reward_oligarch)>
Old Text: Accept and get triple reward

Text: We won’t ask for compensation. We will do it for free.
Translation: 我們不需要補償。免費幫他們補給。
接受且不會獲得任何獎勵

Text: "It would be an honor to live and work with people like you, Commander!"
Translation: “很榮幸能與您這樣的人一起生活與工作，指揮官！”
Old Text: 'It would be an honor to live and work with people like you, Commander.'
Old Translation: “很榮幸能與您這樣的人一起生活與工作，指揮官。”

Text: Inspired by your act of genuine nobility, the Eternal Summer's lead scientist, Satoshi Nisei, has requested permission to join your colony.
Translation: 永恆之夏的首席科學家爾成佐俊被你的高尚之舉深深打動，並請求加入你的殖民地。

Text: I'm honored, but it would be if you continue working from Earth
Translation: 我很榮幸，但你還是繼續在地球上的工作為好。

Old Text: "The Eternal Summer"
Old Translation: “永恆之夏”

Text: An orbital cryopod sanctuary for the filthy rich.
Translation: 骯髒富人的軌道低溫休眠艙避難所。
Old Text: "An orbital cryopod sanctuary for the filthy rich."
Old Translation: “骯髒富人的軌道低溫休眠艙避難所。”

Text: <sleeper_celebrities> Celebrity colonists want to join your colony and receive the benefits of your life-extending medical breakthroughs. Would you accept them?
Translation: <sleeper_celebrities>位名人殖民地居民想要加入你的殖民地，以從你能延續壽命的突破性醫療技術中受益。願意接受他們嗎？

Old Text: Sleepers Have Awaken
Old Translation: 沉睡者已經甦醒

Text: A recent medical breakthrough made on Mars has allowed the Eternal Summer company to revive its customers and now they wish to descend from orbit and revel in the new possibilities for better life.
Translation: 火星上最近在醫療方面取得的突破使得永恆之夏公司能復活其客戶，現在他們想要從軌道上著陸並享受可能實現的更美好的生活。

Text: Make them wait for a while
Quick to assure you the experiment is perfectly safe, <DisplayName> reluctantly asks for permission to test within the vicinity of a Dome – in case they need to get to shelter really fast.
Translation: <DisplayName>一邊打包票說實驗絕對安全，一邊支支吾吾的請求在穹頂附近進行測試，因為萬一出了差錯，他們還能儘快前往安全的地方避險。

Text: A Scientist barges into your office and says they have an important climate experiment to make.
Translation: 一名科學家闖入了你的辦公室，稱其要進行一場重要的氣候實驗。

Text: Innovation is always welcome! Go ahead – test it near a Dome.
Translation: 要搞創新嗎？我隨時歡迎！去吧，就在穹頂附近測試好了。
獲得研究點數，可能會出事

Text: Sounds intriguing but I’d rather play it safe. Test it somewhere far away.
Translation: 有點意思，但我寧願安全行事。去遠一點的地方測試。
獲得研究點數，可能會出事

Text: Enough crazy for today. Please, leave my office.
Translation: 今天的煩心事已經夠多了。勞駕你離開我的辦公室。

Text: Our initial scans must be incorrect, but the terrain is treacherous and filled with solid, sharp rocks which prevent the rocket from safely landing at the coordinates.
Translation: 我們的初步掃描肯定有誤，地勢實際上非常險惡，且佈滿了堅硬鋒利的岩石，導致火箭無法在座標位置安全著陸。

Text: The expedition Rocket cannot find a suitable place to land near the Anomaly’s location.
Translation: 探險隊火箭無法在異象地點附近找到合適的著陸地點。

Text: Circle and find a good landing spot.
Translation: 盤旋並找到一塊合適的著陸地點。

Text: After circling on the spot for hours, the Rocket finds a good landing spot.
Translation: 在該處盤旋了數小時後，火箭找到了合適的著陸地點。

Text:
The cracked crust of the planet which prevented us from landing actually reveals rich metal veins. The expedition makes sure the rocket is filled to the brim before taking off – and for a good reason. The rocky terrain of the landing spot crumbles under the immense force of the engines, making the landing spot forever inaccessible, like a treasure vault lost in legends.

<effect>The expedition will return with <polymers(polymer_cargo)> and <metals(metals_cargo)>.
Translation:
星球裂開的表面雖然使我們難以著陸，但我們發現其中藏著儲量豐富的金屬礦脈。探險隊確保火箭上所有空間都裝滿資源後便起飛了。這也是必須的。著陸點崎嶇的地形在發動機巨大的作用力下崩潰，導致著陸地點再也無法使用，彷彿消失在傳說中的寶藏一樣。

<effect>探險隊將帶著<polymers(polymer_cargo)>和<metals(metals_cargo)>返回。

Text: After circling near the spot for hours, the Rocket finds no suitable place to land.
Translation: 在該處附近盤旋了數小時後，火箭沒能找到合適的著陸地點。

Text:
It’s a pity, for the on-board scanners have detected massive amounts of easily-accessible ore veins right under the jagged rocks. Still, better safe than sorry.

<effect>The expedition will return shortly.
Translation:
太可惜了，因為火箭上的掃描器偵測鋸齒狀的岩石下方存在著儲量豐富且十分易於開採的礦脈。不過小心駛得萬年船。

<effect>探險隊即將返回。

Text: Let's try an unorthodox landing procedure.
Translation: 我們試試非正統著陸程式吧。

Text: The region seems to be formed by a massive eruption or another cataclysmic event, as the very crust of the planet is folded and cracked unlike anything we’ve seen so far. Just below the jagged rocks lie rich ore veins. The expedition starts loading the Rocket when a terrible truth is discovered – the rocket has expended too much fuel to make it back with its cargo!
Translation: 該地區似乎是由劇烈的火山噴發或是類似的災難性事件形成的，因為地殼摺疊與裂開的方式前所未見。在鋸齒狀的岩石下藏著儲量豐富的礦脈。探險隊的火箭開始著陸，但他們突然意識到一個很要命的事實：火箭已消耗了太多燃料，沒辦法載著貨物飛回來了！

Text: After circling around the designated coordinates, the Rocket finds a good spot and lands.
Translation: 在指定座標盤旋一陣子後，火箭找到了合適的著陸地點。

Text: Throw out the cargo and return!
Try to deliver a portion of the cargo.
Translation: 想辦法運回一部分貨物。

Text: On the way home the rocket lost altitude and crashed down.
Translation: 火箭在回來的路上墜毀了。
Old Text: On the way home the rocket lose altitude and crashed down.
Old Translation: 火箭在回來的路上墜毀了。

Text:
Nothing could have survived the titanic explosion!

<effect>The expedition has been lost.
Translation:
一切都在巨大的爆炸中灰飛煙滅了！

<effect>已失去探險隊。

Text: The rocket takes off and heads home. Everybody is worried, but the mighty vehicle manages to keep its altitude during the most crucial stage of the flight.
Translation: 火箭升空並朝基地飛來。大家都很擔心，但這架強大的飛行器在飛行最關鍵階段成功保持了高度。

Text:
Turns out one of our Founders-to-be, despite having passed a rigorous vetting program, is now identified as a wanted fugitive.

Interpol hasn't secured the proper permits and currently holds no jurisdiction to force us to turn them in but offers a significant financial incentive if we do so on our own accord.

If we accept, we will effectively have one less Founder.
Translation:
我們的一位透過嚴格審查程式的未來創始人居然是個受通緝的逃亡者。

國際刑警尚未得到相關許可，目前無法強迫我們交人，但表示如果我們願意主動交出此人，他們就會給我們一筆非常可觀的金錢獎勵。

如果我們接受他們提議，那我們就沒時間訓練接替者，只能在缺少一位創始者的情況下開始了。

Text: Just mere hours after the Founders blasted off for Mars, Interpol contacted us.
Translation: 創始者們乘坐的火箭升空後向著火星僅飛行了幾小時，國際刑警就聯絡上了我們。

Text: I believe in second chances! Welcome them to the Colony.
Translation: 我相信人是會改過自新的！歡迎他們來到殖民地。

Text: We don't want a criminal as one of our Founders. Send them back with the next flight to Earth.
Translation: 我們不想讓罪犯成為我們的創始者。讓他們坐上下一班飛向地球的火箭。
Old Text: We don't want a criminal as one of our Founders. Bring them in with the next flight to Earth.
Old Translation: 我們不想讓罪犯成為我們的創始者。讓他們坐上下次飛向地球的火箭。

Text:
"If you don't want to see the people of this colony left without Water to drink, you must do exactly as I say! First I need a Rocket! Then I need $500 million..."

The video abruptly ends there.

A team of investigators is sent immediately and they found the following: the lifeless body of <DisplayName>, next to a pipe leak. Cause of death - the premature explosion of some poorly made explosive device.
Translation:
“如果你不想看到殖民地居民無水可喝，就照我說的做！首先，我要一枚火箭！然後，我需要5億美元……”

這時影像突然中斷。

一隊調查人員立刻奉命出動，並取得了以下發現：在一處管道洩漏地點旁躺著<DisplayName>的屍體。死因：某種劣質的爆炸裝置過早爆炸。
你接收到了一則影像訊息。

Text:
There’s a potential breach in our Fusion Reactor. If the magnetic confinement fails, we may be sitting on a fusion bomb. Theoretically, the fail-safes should contain the explosion within the vicinity of the reactor.

The workers have a chance to evacuate. However, several of them have volunteered to try to stop the containment breach from inside.
Translation:
我們的核融合反應爐可能出現了破損。如果磁約束失靈，那我們就相當於坐在了一顆融合炸彈上。理論上來說，自動保險裝置應該能將爆炸波及範圍控制在反應爐附近的區域。

工人有機會撤離。不過，幾名工人自願從內部封住破損。

Text: An Engineer moves to compensate the tiny misalignment in the magnetic confinement caused by the Dust Storm. Suddenly, a siren starts to wail as red lights cover the terminal.
Translation: 工程師開始修正沙塵暴引起的微小磁約束偏差。突然，警報聲響起，終端機上亮起一片紅燈。

Text: Allow the volunteers to try to stop the meltdown
Translation: 允許志願者設法阻止核心熔燬

Text: high chance of success; the workers will perish
Translation: 高幾率成功，工人將死亡

Text:
The magnetic containment has failed but our brave Colonists managed to contain the meltdown to the Fusion Reactor. That comes at a great cost, as all the workers gave their lives to save us.

<effect>Fusion Reactor has malfunctioned and needs extra <electronics(breakdown_cost)> for repair. All workers have died.
Translation:
磁約束失效了，但我們勇敢的殖民地居民設法控制住了核融合反應爐的核心熔燬。但我們也付出了沉重的代價，那些工人們為了拯救我們而全部犧牲了。

<effect>核融合反應爐發生故障，還需要<electronics(breakdown_cost)>才能修復。工人們全都死了。

Text: The volunteers have failed to contain the fusion reaction. An explosion is imminent…
Translation: 志願者們沒能控制住融合反應。即將發生爆炸……

Text: reaction will be contained but it will cause many Cable Faults and breakdowns
Translation: 將控制住反應，但會產生多處電纜故障和癱瘓

Text: Evacuate the building !(The Reactor will explode, all workers will be evacuated)
Translation: 疏散建築物裡的人員！（反應爐將爆炸，所有工人都將得到疏散）

Text:
While the initial panic has somewhat subsided, people are still fearful and prefer to remain in their homes. It will take some time until the colony gets back to the normal routine.

<sponsor_name> has suspended the construction of any new Fusion Reactors until investigations are complete.

<effect>”The Incident” tech available. Research it to unlock construction of Fusion Reactors once more.
Translation:
最初的恐慌已經趨於平靜，但人們依然放心不下，且更願意待在家裡。要過一段時間殖民地生活才會恢復正常。

<sponsor_name>暫停了新核融合反應爐的施工，直到調查完成。

<effect>“反應爐事件”技術已開放。研究此技術可再次解鎖核融合反應爐的建造。

Text: Stop all Fusion Reactors until we know more!
Translation: 關閉所有核融合反應爐，直到我們進一步查明情況！
保持剩餘的反應爐正常運轉。

Text: People need a couple of Sols to process this.
Translation: 人們需要幾個太陽日來緩一緩。

Text: <morale_penalty_low> Morale for <sols(morale_penalty_sols)> Sols, Fusion Reactors will stop working for <sols(stop_reactors)> Sols only
Translation: <morale_penalty_low>士氣，持續<sols(morale_penalty_sols)>個太陽日。核融合反應爐只會停止工作<sols(stop_reactors)>個太陽日
核融合反應爐恢復了運轉。

Text:
We held a vigil for the fallen heroes. Their bravery will be remembered!

<sponsor_name> has suspended the construction of any new Fusion Reactors until investigations are complete.

<effect>”The Incident” tech available. Research it to unlock construction of Fusion Reactors once more.
Translation:
我們為犧牲的英雄舉行了守靈儀式。我們會將他們的英勇事蹟永遠銘記於心！

<sponsor_name>暫停了新核融合反應爐的施工，直到調查完成。

<effect>“反應爐事件”技術已開放。研究此技術可再次解鎖核融合反應爐的建造。

Text: Your desk is covered in aftermath reports and damage assessments. The monitor flashes and almost endless stream of messages – some nervous and grief-stricken, others angry and demanding.
Translation: 你的桌上堆滿了事件的後果報告和受損情況評估。閃爍的螢幕上顯示著源源不絕的消息，有些緊張而悲痛，有些則憤怒且咄咄逼人。

Text: Stop all Fusion Reactors until we know more!
Translation: 關閉所有核融合反應爐，直到我們進一步查明情況！
保持剩餘的反應爐正常運轉。

Text: People need a couple of Sols to process this.
Translation: 人們需要幾個太陽日來緩一緩。

Text: <morale_penalty_low> Morale for <sols(morale_penalty_sols)> Sols, Fusion Reactors will stop working for <sols(stop_reactors)> Sols only
Translation: <morale_penalty_low>士氣，持續<sols(morale_penalty_sols)>個太陽日。核融合反應爐只會停止工作<sols(stop_reactors)>個太陽日

Text:
The manual adjustments made by the staff at the Fusion Reactor destabilized the system which would have otherwise self-corrected the effects of the Dust Storm.

Some Colonists are unhappy with this findings and remain skeptical about fusion power.

<effect>Fusion Reactors can be built once more.
Translation:
員工對核融合反應爐進行的人工調整導致本該能自我修正沙塵暴影響的系統變得不穩定。

部分殖民地居民對此發現表示不滿，且對聚變發電依然持懷疑態度。

<effect>可再次建造核融合反應爐。

Text: All public terminal broadcast as the head of the investigation team reads the report findings out loud. Human error.
Translation: 調查隊大聲閱讀報告中的發現，並由所有公用終端機進行廣播。人為失誤。

Text: The memory of the incident with the Fusion Reactor is still fresh in the minds of some colonists. Fusion sceptics are against any new Fusion Reactors being built and demand that you take decisive action on the matter.
Translation: 一部分殖民地居民對核融合反應爐事件記憶猶新。對核融合持懷疑態度者反對建造任何新的核融合反應爐，並要求你在這件事上果斷地作出決定。

Text: Angry voices can be heard outside, as the small group of fusion sceptics attempts to push through to your office.
Translation: 外面傳來憤怒民眾的聲音，是一小群對核融合持懷疑態度者想要闖進你的辦公室。

Text: We will cancel the construction of the new Fusion Reactor.
Translation: 我們會取消新核融合反應爐的施工。

Text: *lie* We will cancel the construction of the new Fusion Reactor.
Translation: *撒謊*我們會取消新核融合反應爐的施工。

Text:
The fusion sceptics believed your lie for a couple of Sols. However, once the construction of the Fusion Reactor continued the entire colony saw through the deception.

<effect><morale_penalty_lie> Morale loss for all colonists
Translation:
對核融合持懷疑態度者相信了你的謊言，消停了幾個太陽日。然而，當核融合反應爐的施工繼續開始時，整個殖民地都識破了你的謊言。

<effect><morale_penalty_lie>所有殖民地居民士氣下降。
*撒謊*我們會做額外的防範措施。
部分殖民地居民士氣下降<morale_penalty_politician>
我們會做額外的防範措施。
部分殖民地居民士氣下降<morale_penalty_politician>
部分殖民地居民士氣下降<morale_penalty_ignore>

Text:
You know about the great potential of <DisplayName>, and this depressive mood doesn’t seem so strange given the circumstances – a Guru without a path, without an insight to pass on. Maybe you could help?

<effect><DisplayName> will get a new Perk, inspired by your advice.
Translation:
你知道<DisplayName>擁有巨大的潛力，在這樣的情況下，這種壓抑的心情並不奇怪。導師迷失了方向，無法傳道受業。也許你能幫上忙？

<effect><DisplayName>在你建議的鼓舞下獲得了一個新特長。

Text: "I feel lost, without a purpose." The Colonist in front of you seems to be rather disheartened. "I need your help."
Translation: “我感覺迷失了方向，沒有了目標。”你面前的這位殖民地居民看起來無比沮喪。“我需要你的幫助。”
Old Text: ‘I feel lost, without a purpose.’ The Colonist in front of you seems to be rather disheartened. ‘I need your help.’
Old Translation: “我感覺迷失了方向，沒有了目標。”你面前的這位殖民地居民看起來無比沮喪。“我需要你的幫助。”

Text: Talent is one part gift and five parts hard work.
Translation: 才華是1份天賦天賦加5份努力。

Text:
"Thank you, Commander. You made me realize that the answers I was looking for were around me and most importantly – inside of me. I feel complete, as if I’ve found a missing piece of my own self.

Yours sincerely, <DisplayName>"

<effect><DisplayName> has gained the Enthusiast Perk.
Translation:
“謝謝你，指揮官。是你讓我明白，我尋求的答案就在我身邊，最重要的是，它們就在我的內心裡。我感覺自己完整了，因為我找回了迷失的那部分自我。

此致，<DisplayName>”

<effect><DisplayName>獲得了熱心特長。

Text:
"Thank you, Commander. You made me realize that the answers I was looking for were around me and most importantly – inside of me. I feel complete, as if I’ve found a missing piece of my own self.

Yours sincerely, <DisplayName>"

<effect><DisplayName> has gained the Workaholic Perk.
Translation:
“謝謝你，指揮官。是你讓我明白，我尋求的答案就在我身邊，最重要的是，它們就在我的內心裡。我感覺自己完整了，因為我找回了迷失的那部分自我。

此致，<DisplayName>”

<effect><DisplayName>獲得了工作狂特長。

Text: Some say that the meaning of life is to have fun.
Translation: 表示生命的意義在於享受樂趣。

Text:
"Thank you, Commander. You made me realize that the answers I was looking for were around me and most importantly – inside of me. I feel complete, as if I’ve found a missing piece of my own self.

Yours sincerely, <DisplayName>"

<effect><DisplayName> has gained the Party Animal Perk.
Translation:
“謝謝你，指揮官。是你讓我明白，我尋求的答案就在我身邊，最重要的是，它們就在我的內心裡。我感覺自己完整了，因為我找回了迷失的那部分自我。

此致，<DisplayName>”

<effect><DisplayName>獲得了派對狂人特長。

"Thank you, Commander. You made me realize that the answers I was looking for were around me and most importantly – inside of me. I feel complete, as if I’ve found a missing piece of my own self.

Yours sincerely, <DisplayName>"

<effect><DisplayName> has gained the Gamer Perk.
Translation:
“謝謝你，指揮官。是你讓我明白，我尋求的答案就在我身邊，最重要的是，它們就在我的內心裡。我感覺自己完整了，因為我找回了迷失的那部分自我。

此致，<DisplayName>”

<effect><DisplayName>獲得了遊戲玩家特長。

Text: People need someone to make them see light in the dark days.
Translation: 在苦難中的人們需要一個能讓他們看到希望的人。

Text:
"Thank you, Commander. You made me realize that the answers I was looking for were around me and most importantly – inside of me. I feel complete, as if I’ve found a missing piece of my own self.

Yours sincerely, <DisplayName>"

<effect><DisplayName> has gained the Rugged Perk.
Translation:
“謝謝你，指揮官。是你讓我明白，我尋求的答案就在我身邊，最重要的是，它們就在我的內心裡。我感覺自己完整了，因為我找回了迷失的那部分自我。

此致，<DisplayName>”

<effect><DisplayName>獲得了刻苦耐勞特長。

"Thank you, Commander. You made me realize that the answers I was looking for were around me and most importantly – inside of me. I feel complete, as if I’ve found a missing piece of my own self.

Yours sincerely, <DisplayName>"

<effect><DisplayName> has gained the Composed Perk.
Translation:
“謝謝你，指揮官。是你讓我明白，我尋求的答案就在我身邊，最重要的是，它們就在我的內心裡。我感覺自己完整了，因為我找回了迷失的那部分自我。

此致，<DisplayName>”

<effect><DisplayName>獲得了冷靜沉著特長。

Text: Sometimes the answer is inside of us, but we ask for advice instead.
Translation: 有時候答案就在我們心中，但我們往往會請教他人。

Text:
"Thank you, Commander. You made me realize that the answers I was looking for were around me and most importantly – inside of me. I feel complete, as if I’ve found a missing piece of my own self.

Yours sincerely, <DisplayName>"

<effect><DisplayName> has gained the Hippie Perk.
Translation:
“謝謝你，指揮官。是你讓我明白，我尋求的答案就在我身邊，最重要的是，它們就在我的內心裡。我感覺自己完整了，因為我找回了迷失的那部分自我。

此致，<DisplayName>”

<effect><DisplayName>獲得了嬉皮特長。

Text: The guru leaves, immersed in thoughts. Later, you receive a message which warms your heart.
Translation: 陷入沉思的導師離開了。後來，你收到一條令你心頭一暖的消息。

Text:
"Thank you, Commander. You made me realize that the answers I was looking for were around me and most importantly – inside of me. I feel complete, as if I’ve found a missing piece of my own self.

Yours sincerely, <DisplayName>"

<effect><DisplayName> has gained the Fit Perk.
Translation:
“謝謝你，指揮官。是你讓我明白，我尋求的答案就在我身邊，最重要的是，它們就在我的內心裡。我感覺自己完整了，因為我找回了迷失的那部分自我。

此致，<DisplayName>”

<effect><DisplayName>獲得了健壯特長。

Text:
Transmitting a video stream from inside the building, the angry colonist screams:

"I can’t take it anymore! Machines! Machines! Only bloody, senseless, soulless machines! I will destroy them! ALL OF THEM!"

Then, all of a sudden, the red alert lights flash! <DisplayName> has set the building to self-destruct!
Translation:
憤怒的殖民地居民從建築物內傳出一段影像，影像中此人怒吼道：

“我再也受不了了！機器！機器！只有無知覺無靈魂的可惡機器！我要毀了它們！全部摧毀！”

然後，突然間紅燈閃動！<DisplayName>啟動了建築物的自毀程式！
理智崩潰 - 反機械情緒

Text: A colonist has gone mad! Donning a space suit, the unstable individual has occupied one of our Drone Hubs, threatening to destroy it!
Translation: 一位殖民地居民瘋了！這個情緒失控者穿著太空服，佔領了一座無人機中心，威脅說要把它毀掉！

Text: We cannot afford to lose the Hub!
The repair teams rush into the building and make the best attempts to stop its destruction. Following your instructions, they completely disregard the extraction of the crazy colonist.
Translation: 維修隊衝進建築並盡最大努力阻止自毀。在你的授意下，他們完全無視了瘋狂殖民地居民的疏散工作。

Text: <effect>The building has been saved. <DisplayName> has died.
Forget about the building, save the colonist!
Translation: 建築物無所謂，把人救出來！

Text: The rescue teams rush into the already collapsing building, searching for the crazed colonist inside. And they succeed, bringing the victim out right before the structure caves in!
Translation: 營救小隊衝進正在崩塌的建築物，在裡面搜尋發瘋的殖民地居民。他們成功了。剛把人救出來，建築物就塌了。

Text: <effect>The colonist has been saved. The building has been destroyed.
Translation: <effect>殖民地居民已得救。該建築已被摧毀

Text:
Now an entire Dome suffers from depression and project it back towards the Empath, making things even worse. Your head thumps with the pain and despair felt by the empath <DisplayName> while you’re trying to think out a solution to the crisis.

<effect>All colonists lose <sanity_damage> Sanity
Translation:
現在整個穹頂都陷入消沉，而這種情緒又反饋給了體貼者，使得情況更加糟糕。你在想危機對策的同時，體貼者<DisplayName>留下的痛苦和絕望令你頭痛欲裂。

<effect>所有殖民地居民理智度降低<sanity_damage>

Text: An Empath has suffered a sanity breakdown. Losing control over the darkest emotions, the poor soul projected them towards all people nearby.
Translation: 一名體貼者的理智崩潰了。這個可憐人無法控制自己最消極的情緒，並將其投射給了附近的所有人。

Text: Let’s pray for the poor soul!
Unsurprisingly, it worked. When the colonists started praying, they generated a stream of positive emotional energy which rejuvenated the broken, desperate mind of the empath.
Translation: 不出所料，這個方法奏效了。殖民地居民開始祈禱時，他們產生了一股積極情緒能量流，令體貼者崩潰而絕望的心靈恢復了活力。

Text: Attempt to sedate and calm down the empath.
Translation: 設法用鎮靜劑令體貼者冷靜下來。

Text: The plan seemed pretty solid. But nothing is ever solid when it concerns an unstable empath.
Translation: 這個計劃看似萬無一失。但面對情緒不穩定的體貼者時，萬無一失的計劃是不存在的。

Text:
The poor soul got scared of the people approaching with needles and projected a stream of the purest fear towards them. Luckily, one of the team managed to reach the trembling empath and to inject the sedative before running away, screaming.

<effect>The empath <DisplayName> has been secured. <rescuers_amount> colonists lose <insanity_damage> Sanity.
Translation:
這個可憐人看到有人拿著針頭靠近自己時嚇壞了，並朝他們發射了一股由純粹的恐懼構成的情緒流。幸運的是，一名隊員設法到達了顫抖的體貼者跟前並注射了鎮靜劑，之後便驚叫著逃走了。

<effect>體貼者<DisplayName>已被控制。<rescuers_amount>位殖民地居民理智度下降<insanity_damage>。

Text: Luckily, the plan worked. Now the Empath sleeps serenely in a comfy bed.
Translation: 幸運的是計劃奏效了。現在體貼者在一張舒適的床上安睡。

Text:
The Colonists feel the calm projected on a subconscious level and make friendly jokes about the image of their fellow snoring blissfully. And the other Empaths in the colony are grateful for the amount of care you showed during the crisis.

<effect>The empath <DisplayName> has been saved. All Empaths gain <empathy_morale_boost> Morale for <sols(empathy_morale_up_duration)> Sols.
Translation:
殖民地居民感受到一股平靜投射到了他們的潛意識中，並對打著鼾熟睡的同胞開起了善意的玩笑。殖民地中其他體貼者非常感激你在這次危機中展現出的關懷。

<effect>已挽救體貼者<DisplayName>。所有體貼者獲得<empathy_morale_boost>士氣，持續<sols(empathy_morale_up_duration)>個太陽日。

Text: The empath is banished from the colony and will soon leave for Earth. It’s for the good of all, but the other Empaths don’t see it that way.
Translation: 這名體貼者被逐出了殖民地，很快就將返回地球。這是為了大家好，但其他體貼者並不這麼看。
Old Text: The empath is banished from the colony and would soon leave for Earth. It’s for the good of all, but the other Empaths don’t see it that way.
Old Translation: 這名體貼者被逐出了殖民地，很快就將返回地球。這是為了大家好，但其他體貼者並不這麼看。

Text:
This case was a precedent. If it repeats in the future, Empaths will be treated the same, banished and ostracized from their homes. Some of them feel as if they are ticking bombs, threatening the sanity of their fellows, and fear that many Colonists will view them as a threat from now on.

<effect><DisplayName> has left the Colony. All Empaths lose <empathy_morale_penalty>Morale for <empathy_morale_down_duration> Sols.
Translation:
這次事件開了個先例。如果未來再次發生這種事件，體貼者也會受到被逐出家園的待遇。一些體貼者感覺自己像定時炸彈一樣威脅著身邊人的心理健康，並擔心從此以後很多殖民地居民會視自己為威脅。

<effect><DisplayName>離開了殖民地。所有體貼者士氣下降<empathy_morale_penalty>，持續<empathy_morale_down_duration>個太陽日。

Text: Only Empaths could cure another Empath!
Translation: 只有體貼者才能治好體貼者！

Text: The Empaths form a line by holding hands to make their connection stronger and start walking towards their distressed fellow.
Translation: 體貼者手牽手排成一排以強化彼此間的聯絡，並開始走向那位消沉者。

Text:
The tension they feel is physically visible, sweat rolling down their faces and bodies shaking with fatigue. One of the Empaths is about to collapse, but then suddenly the injured mind of <DisplayName> comes back to life. <DisplayName> stands up, smiles and hugs the rescue group. They all join hands, smiling, and give a gift to the colony by projecting their shared joy.

<effect>The Empath <DisplayName> has been cured. All Colonists gain <sanity_up> Sanity and <comfort_up> Comfort.
Translation:
他們感覺到的壓力顯而易見：汗珠從他們臉上滾落，他們的身體也應疲勞而發抖。眼看其中一名體貼者即將崩潰，但<DisplayName>受傷的心靈突然恢復了活力。<DisplayName>站了起來，微笑著擁抱了營救者們。他們都微笑著手牽手，並將他們共同的喜悅之情作為禮物投射給整個殖民地。

<effect>體貼者<DisplayName>已痊癒。所有殖民地居民獲得<sanity_up>理制度和<comfort_up>舒適度。

Text:
Sickness is rare amongst humans in this age. We were all taken aback by how unprepared we were to fight this vicious foe. Yet through aiding the mysterious patient as much as we did, we realized that he is no stranger to us. We stand by one another as humans.

The patient's stay with us was brief, but they left a changed colony behind them.

<effect>Many Colonists have gained the Enthusiast perk.
Translation:
在這個年代已經鮮有人會患上疾病了。我們驚訝地發現，面對這個棘手的敵人，我們竟束手無策。但透過儘可能幫助這個神祕的病人，我們意識到對我們而言他並不是陌生人。我們都同為人類。

病人陪伴我們的日子雖然短暫，但整個殖民地卻因此發生了變化。

<effect>很多殖民地居民獲得了熱心特長。

Text: The patient has died. We did all we could but fell short at the end.
Translation: 病人去世了。我們已經竭盡所能，最後還是力有未逮。
Old Text: The patient has died. We did all we could with our relatively limited access to medicine here on Mars.
Old Translation: 病人去世了。火星上可用的藥物相對有限，我們已經盡了最大努力。

Text: An odd chapter of our colony's history ends.
Translation: 我們殖民地歷史上不同尋常的一章結束了。
Old Text: They'll be forever remembered.
Old Translation: 我們會永遠懷念此人。

Text: Some argue that the price was too high and the disease too low a threat to make the fight worth it. Others are disappointed that we couldn't help a human being because of funding issues, yet they understand the rationale behind the decision.
Translation: 有人聲稱付出的代價太高，而疾病這個威脅又微不足道，因此並不值得。其他人則表現出了失望，畢竟我們因為資金方面的問題，眼睜睜看著一個人喪了命。但他們也理解這個決定是合理的。
Old Text: Some argue that the price was too high to help the stranger and disease too low a threat to make it worth it. Others are somewhat disappointed that we left a human being go because of money, yet they understand the rational behind the decision.
Old Translation: 有人聲稱我們為幫助這個陌生人而付出的代價太高，而疾病這個威脅又微不足道，因此並不值得。其他人則表現出了失望，畢竟我們因為金錢原因而眼睜睜看著一個人喪了命。但他們也理解這個決定是合理的。

Text: The patient has died. We did all we could with our relatively limited access to medicine here on Mars.
Translation: 病人去世了。火星上可用的藥物相對有限，我們已經盡了最大努力。

Old Text: Their legacy lives on.
Old Translation: 病人的精神傳承了下來。

Text: Several influencers on the social networks have asked about your viewpoint. What would you reply?
Translation: 若干在社交網路上有影響力的人詢問你的觀點。你如何應答？
Old Text: Several influencers on the social networks had asked about your viewpoint. What would you reply?
Old Translation: 若干在社交網路上有影響力的人詢問你的觀點。你如何應答？

Text: A huge chunk of rock has been spotted near the planet. It has a highly unusual shape and the Internet has gone crazy with speculations about its nature.
Translation: 我們在行星附近發現一塊巨石。它的形狀極其不同尋常，網路上對其本質的猜測已經炸開了鍋。

Text: Actually, our colleague <DisplayName> can explain this better.
Translation: 實際上，我們的同事<DisplayName>可以做出更好的解釋。
你們自己過來看看不就知道了！
Old Text: Come and see yourselves!
Old Translation: 你們自己過來看看不就知道了！

Text: A plain rock. Ideal for carving names on it - for a price!
Translation: 這是一塊普通的石頭。最適合用來在上面刻名字。當然是要收費的！

Text: We'll place it in orbit so people can admire it forever. Because it's cool!
Translation: 我們會把它送上軌道，這樣就能讓人們永遠瞻仰它了。因為它太酷了！

Text: <effect>All residents of <DisplayName> Dome have been converted to Renegades. The Dome is Quarantined. You are no longer allowed to build any construction there or interact with the Dome or its buildings.
Translation: <effect><DisplayName>穹頂的全體居民都變成了叛徒。該穹頂已被隔離。你已無法在該穹頂內建造建築，或與該穹頂以及其中的建築互動。

Text: One of our Domes has gone rogue! The population has declared independence and dubbed themselves the First Martian Republic.
Translation: 我們的一座穹頂叛變了！其中的居民已宣佈獨立，並自稱第一火星共和國。

Text: This is madness! We are dependent on each other and they have no chance on their own.
Translation: 他們瘋了吧！我們得彼此依靠，他們光靠自己只有死路一條。

Text: This is their right! We can only hope that we will again manage to see each other eye to eye in the future!
Translation: 這是他們的權利！我們只能希望我們雙方在未來能達成一致！

Text: Traitors! If they are not true to the ideals of our Colony, they will receive no support from us!
Translation: 這幫叛徒！既然他們並不忠於我們殖民地的理念，那我們就不為他們繼續提供支援！

Text: I am certain that a diplomatic solution will present itself in time.
Translation: 我確信到時候能用外交手段解決此事。

Text:
"All humans on Mars share a common dream - the dream of colonizing a new planet together. Sometimes, mired in our daily problems, we forget this for a while, but ultimately we always remember that this is what brought us here. Fractures and division among ourselves are not part of this dream. If the Martian Republic is to become a reality, it would be a reality that we would create together!"

<effect>We have regained control over the rogue Dome. All colonists in the Colony have lost the Renegade trait. All Colonists have increased Morale for the next <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols.
Translation:
“火星上的所有人類都有一個夢想，夢想著共同在這顆新的行星上殖民。有時候，我們會因每天遇到的問題而焦頭爛額並一時間忘記了這個夢想，但我們最終總能想起這個夢想就是我們來到這裡的初衷。搞內部分裂並不是這個夢想的一部分。如果想成立火星共和國，那也只有在我們共同的努力下才能實現！”

<effect>我們重新獲得了叛變穹頂的控制權。殖民地裡所有居民失去了叛徒特性。所有殖民地居民在接下來的<sols(morale_boost_duration)>個太陽日裡士氣上升。

Text: Our colony is united once again! The rogue dome has rejoined us. Here is a statement from their leaders:
Translation: 我們的殖民地再次統一了！叛變穹頂已重回我們的懷抱。以下是對他們的領袖發表的宣告：

Text: We are glad that our brothers and sisters have remembered our common Dream.
Translation: 很高興我們的兄弟姐妹們又回想起了我們共同的夢想。

Text: Welcome them, but keep a close watch on this Dome. Next time we will not be so lenient.
Translation: 歡迎他們，但密切留意他們的一舉一動。下次我們不會再這麼寬宏大量了。

Text:
The average colonist perceived the entire chain of events as a tragedy and it had devastating effects on the Morale of our entire Colony. It will take a lot of hard work to regain the trust of our people.

<effect>A wave of Renegades has appeared throughout the Colony. At least we regained control over the now empty <DisplayName> Dome.
Translation:
普通殖民地居民將這整個一連串事件視為一場悲劇，我們整個殖民地的士氣大受打擊。我們得付出很多努力才能重獲民眾的信任。

<effect>殖民地各處出現了一波叛徒。至少我們重新控制了現已空空如也的<DisplayName>穹頂。

Text: The First Martian Republic is no more. The entire population of the rogue Dome is now deceased.
Translation: 第一火星共和國已不復存在。叛變穹頂裡所有人都已喪生。

Text: What a pointless waste of human life...
Translation: 這些人都白白丟了性命……

Text:
Susie, our little stowaway, visibly around 8 years old, managed to somehow bypass all security measures by sheer luck and sneaked onboard during pre-launch. Scared, but excited, she explains that she wants to live on Mars and begs you to let her stay in the colony.

This incident was already reported to Earth and her billionaire father has offered a significant reward for her safe return.  Keeping her in the Colony will certainly create a PR and political nightmare.

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>] Interviewing Susie, you discover a huge potential in her and intelligence far beyond what her age would suggest.</if>
Translation:
我們的小偷渡客蘇茜目測只有8歲左右。她全靠運氣設法溜過了所有安檢措施並在發射前偷偷登上了火箭。既害怕又興奮的她說想住在火星上，並求你讓她留在殖民地裡。

此事件已經在地球上報導。如果將她安全送返地球，她身為億萬富翁的父親將支付給我們高額報酬。將她留在殖民地無疑會在公關和政治方面產生極其惡劣的影響。

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>]與蘇茜談話過程中，你發現她擁有遠超同齡兒童的智力潛能。</if>

Text: get a child Colonist, lose <fundingloss>% Funding
Translation: 得到一位兒童殖民地居民，失去<fundingloss>%資金
得到一位兒童殖民地居民

Text:
Susie, our little stowaway, visibly around 8 years old, managed to somehow bypass all security measures by sheer luck and sneaked onboard during pre-launch. Scared, but excited, she explains that she wants to live on Mars and begs you to let her stay in the colony.

This incident was already reported to Earth and her billionaire father has offered a significant reward for her safe return.  Keeping her in the Colony will certainly create a PR and political nightmare.

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>] Interviewing Susie, you spot the telltale signs of unhappy childhood and neglect back home. Perhaps she would be happier here?</if>
Translation:
我們的小偷渡客蘇茜目測只有8歲左右。她全靠運氣設法溜過了所有安檢措施並在發射前偷偷登上了火箭。既害怕又興奮的她說想住在火星上，並求你讓她留在殖民地裡。

此事件已經在地球上報導。如果將她安全送返地球，她身為億萬富翁的父親將支付給我們高額報酬。將她留在殖民地無疑會在公關和政治方面產生極其惡劣的影響。

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>]與蘇茜談話過程中，你發現有跡象表明她在家中的童年過得並不快樂且家長對她疏於照顧。或許她在這裡會快樂一些？</if>

Text: A young girl was discovered on board of the Founders' rocket!
Translation: 我們在創始者火箭上發現了一名小女孩！

Text: Mars is no place for a child. Return her to Earth on the next flight!
Translation: 火星不是小孩子該來的地方。讓她坐上下次返回地球的火箭！

Text: She is a true Founder and should stay in the Colony!
Translation: 她是真正的創始者，理應留在殖民地！

Text: get a child Colonist, lose <fundingloss>% Funding
Translation: 得到一位兒童殖民地居民，失去<fundingloss>%資金

Text: Let her stay, I will deal with all consequences myself!
Translation: 讓她留下吧，後果我來承擔！
得到一位兒童殖民地居民

Text: <name> has grown up to become a Genius!

“My whole life I felt like I had to go to Mars. I’ve kept dreaming about a place and now I have the money to do it. But I need your aid. Something big has got to be on these coordinates!”

All in all, Douglas Quaid wants you to organize an expedition to the coordinates where his little craft would land. What would happen there is anyone's guess...
Translation:
“我這輩子都感覺我非去火星不可。我一直夢到一個地方，而現在我已經有錢實現這個夢想了。但我需要你的協助。我們肯定能在這些座標的位置發現不得了的東西！”

總而言之，道格拉斯·奎德想要你派探險隊前往他的小飛行器無法降落的座標。會發生什麼事誰也說不準……

Text: You are contacted by Douglas Quaid, a strong-built Earthling with a thick accent. His request seems nonsensical, but somehow you feel that you trust the guy.
Translation: 一個名叫道格拉斯·奎德的地球人聯絡了你，此人體格健壯，說話帶有口音。他的請求看似荒謬，但你不知為何感覺這個人值得信任。

Text: Douglas Quaid nods in approval and rewards you with a wide charming smile.
Translation: 道格拉斯·奎德贊同地點點頭，給了你一個迷人的微笑。

Text:
He then sends you the coordinates of the spot where he will land. Now, it’s up to you to hold your promise.

<effect>A new Planetary Anomaly “Quaid Expedition” has been added. Send an expedition to it to follow Douglas Quaid’s sixth sense.
Translation:
然後他把著陸地點的座標傳送給了你。現在是否兌現承諾全看你了。

<effect>已加入新行星異象“奎德探險隊”。相通道格拉斯·奎德的第六感，並派探險隊前往此處。

Old Text: "Quaid Expedition"
Old Translation: “奎德探險隊”

Text: Rendezvous with Douglas Quaid to help him follow his sixth sense.
Translation: 與道格拉斯·奎德會合並幫助他按自己的第六感行動。
Old Text: "Rendezvous with Douglas Quaid to help him follow his sixth sense."
Old Translation: “與道格拉斯·奎德會合並幫助他按自己的第六感行動。”

Text:
The epicenter of the tremors registers at the exact location where Douglas Quaid led the expedition team – and they aren’t responding!

<effect>The Expedition is delayed.
Translation:
地震震中正好在道格拉斯·奎德帶探險隊前往的地點，他們沒有回應我們！

<effect>探險推遲。

Text: Total Recall: Douglas Quaid, Come In!
Translation: 全面回憶：道格拉斯·奎德，請回話！

Text: The vibrations shook the entire colony.
Translation: 整個殖民地都感覺到了震動。

Text:
The expedition landed at their coordinates, and after a short search Douglas Quaid came across a vast underground cave. There they found the immense alien artifact, some sort of a machine.

Quaid approached it and pressed something which started the machine. The tremors caused the rock to cave-in, nearly burying the team alive, but they made it to safety!

The artifact somehow generated or revealed previously unknown resources, making Mars a bit more hospitable for sentient beings. Of course, Douglas Quaid chose exactly what we needed!
Translation:
探險隊在道格拉斯·奎德提供的座標著陸了，短暫的搜索後，道格拉斯·奎德找到了一個巨大的地下洞穴。在洞裡，他們找到了一件巨大的外星製品，像是某種機器。

奎德靠近機器並按下了某種按鈕啟動了機器。地震導致岩石坍方，差點將探險隊活埋，但他們成功死裡逃生！

該外星製品產生或顯示出了之前我們不知道的資源，微微提升了火星的宜居度。當然，道格拉斯·奎德選的正是我們需要的！
Old Text:
The expedition landed at their coordinates, and after a short search Douglas Quaid came across a vast underground cave. There they found the immense alien artifact, some sort of a machine.

Quaid approached it and pressed something which started the machine. The tremors caused the rock to cave in, nearly burying the team alive, but they made it to safety!

The artifact somehow generated or revealed previously unknown resources, making Mars a bit more hospitable for sentient beings. Of course, Douglas Quaid chose exactly what we needed!
Old Translation:
探險隊在道格拉斯·奎德提供的坐標著陸了，短暫的搜索後，道格拉斯·奎德找到了一個巨大的地下洞穴。在洞裡，他們找到了一件巨大的外星製品，像是某種機器。

奎德靠近機器並按下了某種按鈕啟動了機器。地震導致岩石坍方，差點將探險隊活埋，但他們成功死裡逃生！

該外星製品產生或顯示出了之前我們不知道的資源，微微提升了火星的宜居度。當然，道格拉斯·奎德選的正是我們需要的！

Text: Douglas Quaid, reporting in! The expedition team is alive, and their report seems like something out of a movie!
Translation: 道格拉斯·奎德報到！探險隊還活著，他們的報告看起來就像電影情節！

Text: More Water is always a good idea!
Those Metal veins will help us expand for sure!
Translation: 這些金屬礦脈肯定能幫助我們擴張！

Text: Rare Metals would always be of use!
Translation: 稀有金屬總能派上用場！

Text: new Rare Metals Deposits are revealed
Translation: 發現了新稀有金屬資源點

Text: The tourist wanders away and you can’t resist the urge to come up with a good, inspiring slogan.
Translation: 遊客紛紛散去，你當務之急是想出一個響亮又振奮人心的標語。

Text: A jaunty tourist approaches you on the street. "Let me give you a tip – you need a simple tourism campaign and people would be dying to visit Mars. Why don’t you start with a catchy slogan?"
Translation: 街上一名神氣活現的遊客走向你。“我教你個竅門。你只需要進行旅遊業宣傳，遊客們就會拼命湧向火星。你先想一條朗朗上口的宣傳語吧？”
Old Text: A jaunty tourist approaches you on the street. ‘Let me give you a tip – you need a simple tourism campaign and people would be dying to visit Mars. Why don’t you start with a catchy slogan?’
Old Translation: 街上一名神氣活現的遊客走向你。“我教你個竅門。你只需要進行旅遊業宣傳，遊客們就會拼命湧向火星。你先想一條朗朗上口的標語吧？

Old Text: ‘Mars – just add water!’
Old Translation: “火星，加點水就火了！”

Old Text: ‘Making Pluto jealous since 2006.’
Old Translation: “從2006年起就讓冥王星眼紅。”

Old Text: ‘Mars – better than Uranus!’
Old Translation: “火星比天王星強多了！”

Text: Unsurprisingly, the new slogan became viral within hours of its release.
Translation: 不出你所料，新標語在短短幾小時內便已傳遍全球。

Text:
Your e-mail is now clogged with requests to accept various wealthy tourists in the colony, as well as many more who just cannot afford it.

<effect><tourism_applicants_bonus> Tourist applicants available
Translation:
你的電子郵箱現在塞滿了各種有錢遊客訪問殖民地的請求，以及更多付不起費用者的請求。

<effect><tourism_applicants_bonus>有新的遊客應徵者

Text: Organize an online competition about the Martian tourism slogan!
Translation: 組織一場關於火星旅遊標語的線上比賽！

Text: Maybe it sounded better than it turned out.
Translation: 想法是好的，但結果糟糕透頂。

Text:
Within mere hours users from an infamous online image board flooded the campaign with such proposals that you didn’t dare write them in your mission log. After shutting it down, you just chose "Mars – have it your way!" and called it a day.

<effect><tourism_applicants_bonus> Tourist applicants available
Translation:
短短幾小時內，來自一家惡名昭彰的線上貼圖討論版的使用者給宣傳提供了無數不堪入目的提議，你都不敢把它們寫進你的任務日誌裡。關閉活動後，你選擇了“火星隨心遊”這個標語並結束了一天的工作。

<effect><tourism_applicants_bonus>有新的遊客應徵者

Text:
When approached, the probe projected a message of complex cyphers and codes. It’s definitely something of human origin, no aliens there, for better or worse, but questions still remain. Who put it there? What is the message? What’s the purpose of all this?

<effect> A new technology has been revealed - The Cypher. Research it to decode the signal’s meaning.
Translation:
探測器發覺有東西靠近時，傳送出一條包含複雜密碼與暗碼的訊息。不管是好是壞，此訊息肯定出自人類而非外星人之手。但問題依然存在。是誰把它放在那裡的？這條訊息說的是什麼？這一切的目的又是什麼？

<effect>已發現新技術：密文。研究該技術以破解訊號的含義。

Text: Following a signal of exact mathematical sequences, the expedition has discovered a tiny probe buried in the sand.
Translation: 探險隊準確地追蹤了數學序列中的訊號，發現了一架埋在沙中的微型探測器。
Old Text: Following a signal of exact mathematical sequences, the expedition has discovered a tiny probe buried in the sands.
Old Translation: 探險隊準確地追蹤了數學序列中的訊號，發現了一架埋在沙中的微型探測器。

Text: I've read enough sci-fi to have some ideas!
Translation: 科幻小說裡經常出現這種情節！

Old Text: "X Marks the Spot"
Old Translation: “X標記點”

Text: A location which is supposed to hide a precious treasure.
Translation: 理論上藏著珍貴財寶的地點。
Old Text: "A location which is supposed to hide a precious treasure."
Old Translation: “理論上藏著珍貴財寶的地點。”

Text: <effect>A new Planetary Anomaly has been discovered – "X Marks the Spot". Send an expedition to the coordinates!
Translation: <effect>發現新行星異象 - “X標記點”派遣探險隊前往該座標！

Text: After quite the hassle with the strange coding, your Scientists manage to decode the message from the strange pod. It’s a map!
Translation: 對著陌生的程式碼一陣手忙腳亂後，你的科學家們設法破解了陌生空投艙裡的資訊。這是一張地圖！

Text: It becomes apparent that the cube is made of Martian concrete, not unlike the one you’ve been using for so long. There are no doors or any other protrusions, but after circling around the structure, the expedition discovers a distinct red circular shape that suspiciously looks like a big red button.
Translation: 顯然，方塊由你一直以來都在使用的火星混凝土製成。建築上沒有門或其他突出物，但探險隊繞著它盤旋時，發現了一個疑似紅色大按鈕的顯眼紅色圓形物體。

Text: The expedition has landed on the mysterious coordinates. Even before the dust has settled, the visual telemetry shows a distinct cubical shape not far from the landing zone.
Translation: 探險隊在神祕座標著陸了。還沒等塵埃落盡，視覺遙測顯示在離著陸區不遠處有一個顯眼的立方體結構。

Text: The ground trembles as the walls of the building sink down to reveal a large metal container, wrapped with colorful paper and red ribbons.
Translation: 隨著建築物的牆縮排地面，大地也在顫抖。最後你們發現一個用彩紙包著、上面繫著紅絲帶的大型金屬容器。

Text:
When opened, it reveals its precious contents – Dome Spire prefabs!

<effect>The expedition will return with <prefab_amount> Spire Prefabs!
Translation:
開啟之後發現裡面裝著珍貴的物品：穹頂尖塔預製件！

<effect>探險隊將帶著<prefab_amount>尖塔預製件返回！

Text: The ground trembles as the walls of the building sink down to reveal a large metal container, wrapped with colorful paper and red ribbons.
Translation: 隨著建築物的牆縮排地面，大地也在顫抖。最後你們發現一個用彩紙包著、上面繫著紅絲帶的大型金屬容器。

Text:
When opened, it reveals its precious contents – Food! And not just any kind of food, but delicious products which cannot be found on Mars otherwise, all well-preserved in polymer foam. The colony would have quite the feast, to be sure!

<effect>The expedition will return with <food(food_amount)>. All Colonists gain <morale_bonus> Morale for <sols(morale_bonus_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
開啟之後發現裡面裝著珍貴的物品：食物！這些還不是普通食物，而是火星上找不到的美味食品，且都用聚合物泡沫儲存得好好的。這下殖民地居民們能大飽口福了！

<effect>探險隊將帶著<food(food_amount)>返回。所有殖民地居民士氣上升<morale_bonus>，持續<sols(morale_bonus_sols)>個太陽日。

Text: The ground trembles as the walls of the building sink down to reveal a large metal container, wrapped with colorful paper and red ribbons.
Translation: 隨著建築物的牆縮排地面，大地也在顫抖。最後你們發現一個用彩紙包著、上面繫著紅絲帶的大型金屬容器。

Text:
When opened, it reveals its precious contents – tons of advanced resources, readied for use, just laying there!

<effect>The expedition will return with <polymers(polymer_amount)>, <electronics(electronics_amount)> and <machineparts(machine_amount)>.
Translation:
開啟之後發現裡面裝著珍貴的物品：海量直接能用的高階資源就靜靜地等著我們去取呢！

<effect>探險隊將帶著<polymers(polymer_amount)>、<electronics(electronics_amount)>和<machineparts(machine_amount)>返回。

Text: The ground trembles as the walls of the building sink down to reveal a large metal container, wrapped with colorful paper and red ribbons.
Translation: 隨著建築物的牆縮排地面，大地也在顫抖。最後你們發現一個用彩紙包著、上面繫著紅絲帶的大型金屬容器。

Text:
When opened, it reveals its precious contents. Inside, there’s another box. When opened, the box reveals another, smaller box. After several hours of unboxing, the expedition reaches a tiny box, inside of which there’s a check for an outrageously large sum of money. It was worth it!

<effect>The expedition will return with <funding(funding_reward)>.
Translation:
開啟之後發現裡面裝著珍貴的物品。裡面又是一個箱子。再次開啟後，發現又是一個更小的箱子。開了幾小時箱子後，探險隊只剩下一個很小的盒子，裡面放著一張支票，上面的金額高得匪夷所思。我們的努力沒有白費！

<effect>探險隊將帶著<funding(funding_reward)>返回。

Text:
We have info that a major move is planned by one of the bigger gangs against their rivals.

Lately, a lot of homemade weapons have started circulating the Domes and we fear this will be a bloody showdown.
Translation:
我們得到消息稱一個勢力較大的幫派正在策劃大舉進攻他們的對手。

最近，很多自制武器開始在穹頂內流通，我們擔心會發生血腥的火拼。

Text: Our Renegade situation has gotten out of control as of late, with many Renegade colonists joining gangs spread around the Domes, competing for territories.
Translation: 我們愈演愈烈的叛軍問題最近已經失控，很多叛徒殖民地居民加入了穹頂內的各個幫派，並彼此爭奪地盤。

Text: Let them fight it out. We won't risk the lives of our Officers for this.
Translation: 讓他們鬥去。我們不會讓我們的警官冒生命危險。

Text: The renegades clashed both inside and outside the domes - using melee and ranged weapons of various quality.
Translation: 叛徒用品質參差不齊的各種近戰和遠端武器在穹頂內外大打出手。
Old Text: The renegades clashed both inside and the outside domes - using melee and ranged weapons of various quality.
Old Translation: 叛徒用各種品質的近戰和遠端武器在穹頂內外大打出手。

Text: <casulties_big> were dead before the fighting stopped. This will be remembered as a very grim day in our history.
Translation: 戰鬥結束前，死了<casulties_big>人。我們將永遠記住這可怕的一天。
Old Text: <casulties_small> were dead before the fighting stopped. This will be remembered as a very grim day in our history.
Old Translation: 戰鬥結束前，死了<casulties_small>人。我們將永遠記住這可怕的一天。

Text: Send in the Officers. We don't need open gang warfare in our fragile habitats.
Translation: 派警官出動。我們不想看到這個脆弱的居住地裡還有黑幫在火拼。

Text: Our officers tried to stop the clash between the renegade gangs but ended up caught in between.
Translation: 我們的警官盡力阻止幫派火拼，但最後卻落入了兩面受敵的境地。

Text:
After it quickly became apparent that the gang bangers were under equipped and out-classed by the well trained officers, they quickly fled. 

Sadly, several officers were killed in the incident, as were several renegades.
Translation:
不過，在訓練有素且裝備精良的警官面前，幫派分子很快就敗下陣來，倉皇逃走了。

不幸的是，若干名警官殉職，數名叛徒也被擊斃。

Text: Pay off the leaders of the gangs to abandon these plans.
Translation: 賄賂各幫派老大，叫他們別搞事。

Text:
Obviously, the Celebrity had too much of public attention focused on personal matters that other people are privileged not to share. Now, <DisplayName> is running naked in the dome, screaming:

"Is that what you wanted? Here, have it all!"

This could have a disastrous effect on the reputation of anyone in these days, especially when someone uploads the video online. Which is about to happen when we make our next data transmission to Earth.
Translation:
顯然，公眾過於關注這位名人不願分享的隱私。現在，<DisplayName>正在穹頂內一邊裸奔一邊高喊：

“這就是你們想要的嗎？來吧，看個夠吧！”

這種事會對一個人的名聲產生災難性後果，尤其是當有人把影片上傳到網路上時。我們即將向地球進行下一次資料傳送，意味著影片即將被上傳到網路上。
理智崩潰 - 名譽掃地

Text: A well-known Celebrity has lost it and is now making a shameful display around the Dome. The Colonists are in shock and don’t know how to react!
Translation: 一位名人發了瘋，現正在穹頂內到處丟人現眼。殖民地居民們都嚇呆了，不知如何是好。

Text: The Celebrity gets to keep their good reputation, but the other Colonists are infuriated with such displays of power and attempts to censor their communications.
Translation: 必須維護名人的良好名聲，但這種強加干涉並審查他們通訊內容的企圖激怒了其他殖民地居民。
Old Text: The Celebrity gets to keep their good reputation, but the other Colonists are infuriated with such displays of power and attempts to censorship their communications.
Old Translation: 必須維護名人的良好名聲，但這種強加干涉並審查他們通訊內容的行為激怒了其他殖民地居民。

Translation: <effect>所有殖民地居民士氣下降<morale_down>，持續<sols(morale_down_time)>個太陽日
Old Text: <effect>All Colonists lose <morale_down> Morale for <morale_down_time> Sols.
Old Translation: <effect>所有殖民地居民士氣下降<morale_down>，持續<morale_down_time>個太陽日。

Text: This is a valuable display of social criticism!
Translation: 這是一次寶貴的社會批判！

Text:
Albeit the biggest such incident lately, it is not the first. We suspect a gang of renegades led by a self-declared Street King named <DisplayName> to be responsible.

So far they have always smartly evaded our attempts to catch them in the act.
Translation:
儘管這是最近動靜最大的一次事件，但類似事件之前並非沒發生過。我們懷疑幕後黑手是由自封“街頭之王”的<DisplayName>領導的叛徒幫派。

他們一直以來都很狡猾，我們到目前為止都沒能把他們逮個正著。

Text: Vandals have sprayed obscene signs and drawings on several factories this night.
Translation: 今晚，破壞公物者在數座工廠的牆上留下了不堪入目的塗鴉。

Text: Clean up the factories and make sure this doesn't happen again.
Translation: 把工廠清洗乾淨，確保以後不會再發生這種事。
所有工廠進行緊急維護

Text: We can't stop the factories right now. The workers will have to tolerate the drawings.
Translation: 現在不能讓工廠停工。只能麻煩工人們忍一忍了。
所有工廠工人士氣下降。

Text: Use a Rover as a trap and attempt to catch the leader.
Translation: 用探測車作為誘餌，試圖抓住他們的頭目。

Old Text: Lose one Rover
Old Translation: 失去一輛探測車

Text:
After some commotion, the renegades ran away but the so-called Street King was captured and brought to your office.

You look the Renegade in the eyes. Yet you see intelligence and you see potential.
Translation:
一陣騷動後，叛徒逃走了，但所謂的“街頭之王”被擒獲，並被帶到了你的辦公室。

你直視著這個叛徒的雙眼。你看到的卻是智慧和潛能。

Text: The vandals have fallen for your trap. They just couldn't resist vandalizing the "unwatched" rover just idling there.
Translation: 破壞公物者們中計了。一輛停在那裡“無人照看”的探測車對這幫以破壞公物為樂的傢伙們而言是無法抗拒的誘惑。
Old Text: The vandals have fallen for your trap. They just couldn't resist vandalizing the "un-watched" rover just idling there.
Old Translation: 破壞公物者們中計了。一輛停在那裡“無人照看”的探測車對這幫以破壞公物為樂的傢伙們而言是無法抗拒的誘惑。

Text: A two hour scolding session seems in order. Then a wristband to always monitor the kid.
Translation: 兩小時的說教是免不了的了。給這個小子戴上腰帶，以便我們時刻監視。
Old Text: A two hour scolding session seems in order. Then a waist band to always monitor the kid.
Old Translation: 兩小時的說教是免不了的了。給這個小子戴上腰帶，以便我們時刻監視。

Text: Convince <DisplayName> that they could put their talents to improving the Colony instead.
Translation: 讓<DisplayName>相信可以用其自身的才華讓殖民地變得更加美好。
叛徒特性替換為工作狂

Text: Clarify how difficult survival on Mars is and that such actions make things harder.
Translation: 闡述在火星上生存是一件多麼困難的事，而這種破壞行為只是在雪上加霜。
叛徒特性替換為倖存者
Old Text: Replace Renegade trait with Survivor
Old Translation: 叛徒特性替換為倖存者

Text: Have a nice chat about the positive side of our live on Mars.
Translation: 輕鬆愉快地聊聊火星生活積極的一面。

Old Text: Replace Renegade trait with Enthusiast
Old Translation: 叛徒特性替換為熱心

Text:
Running naked with a wrench in hand, <DisplayName> has already managed to injure several people!

<effect><injured_people> Colonists have suffered -<health_damage> Health.
Translation:
手持扳手裸奔的<DisplayName>已經弄傷了若干人！

<effect><injured_people>殖民地居民生命值-<health_damage>。
理智崩潰 - 沉迷暴力

Text: A Colonist has snapped and has started attacking others around the Dome!
Translation: 一位殖民地居民發了瘋，並開始在穹頂內攻擊他人！

Text: Send colonists to take the maniac down!
Translation: 派殖民地居民制伏這個瘋子！

Text: The rescue team was violently attacked by the maniac. After suffering heavy injuries, they managed to pin down the screaming Colonist.
Translation: 營救隊遭到了瘋子的猛烈攻擊。他們受了重傷，但設法控制住了這位尖叫著的殖民地居民。

Text: <effect><injured_rescuers> Colonists lost <rescue_damage> Health. The Colonist <DisplayName> is safe.
Translation: <effect><injured_rescuers>殖民地居民失去<rescue_damage>生命值。殖民地居民<DisplayName>安全了。

Text: The maniac ambushed and violently attacked the rescue team. The furious brawl led to the use of too much force, and regrettably, the crazed Colonist was fatally injured.
Translation: 營救小隊遭到了瘋子的埋伏和猛烈攻擊。混亂之中，隊員們下手太重，導致發瘋的殖民地居民受了致命傷。
<effect><DisplayName>已經死亡。<injured_rescuers>殖民地居民失去<rescue_damage>生命值。
Old Text: <effect><DisplayName> has died. <injured_rescuers> Colonists lost<rescue_damage> Health.
Old Translation: <effect><DisplayName>已經死亡。<injured_rescuers>殖民地居民失去<rescue_damage>生命值。

Text: Send Drones to take the maniac down!
Translation: 派無人機制伏那個瘋子！

Text: The Drones apprehended the maniac, but not without taking damage. Thank the Cosmos that you didn’t send humans!
Translation: 無人機逮捕了瘋子，但也受到了損傷。感謝老天你派的不是人！

Text:
The crazed maniac screamed and jumped on top of the first drone, smashing its sensor node with a mighty blow of the wrench. The next drones were met with a furious flurry of blows but eventually the brave little machines managed to pin the maniac to the ground, although with a bit too much force applied by their powerful, yet crude manipulators.

<effect><drone_rescuers> Drones have been destroyed. Colonist <DisplayName> is unable to work for <sols(recovery_time)> Sols.
Translation:
瘋子尖叫著跳到了第一臺無人機上，用扳手砸壞了它的感測器節點。第二臺無人機遭到了一連串猛烈攻擊，但最後勇敢的小機器們還是設法將瘋子按倒在地，只不過無人機操控者用力有點過猛。

<effect><drone_rescuers>無人機被摧毀。殖民地居民<DisplayName>無法工作，持續<sols(recovery_time)>個太陽日。

Text: Send security Officers to apprehend the maniac!

The signal seems harmless but can very well be a spying device.

Do we ignore it?
Translation:
訊號看起來無害，但很可能是個間諜裝置。

是否要無視它？

Text: A faint signal was traced to originate from the high mountains just outside our Colony's vicinity.
Translation: 我們接受到一個微弱的訊號，追蹤後發現其來源是我們殖民地附近一處高山。

Text: Send a Colonist in a Shuttle to investigate.
Translation: 派一名殖民地居民乘坐穿梭機前去調查。

Text: Jam the signal and carry on.
Translation: 干擾訊號並繼續手上的工作。

Text:
Upon nearing it, the device transmitted the following:

"I have been in here for a hundred years. I have observed and gathered information for all this time. I know secret activities and weather patterns, yet have no one to share them with. For I have been forgotten... and I am bored.

Now that I am fully awake once more I plan to end my existence and execute my self-destruct protocol.

Before I do that, however, I shall test if you are deserving of the data I have to share. I shall tell you a simple riddle - answer it and you will know all I know. Fail and you will be destroyed along with me."
Translation:
靠近時，裝置傳送出了以下資訊：

“我已經在這裡一百年了。期間我一直在觀察以及蒐集資訊。我知道祕密活動和天氣規律，但找不到人與我分享。因為我已被遺忘……另外我也好無聊。

現在我也再次完全甦醒，我打算執行自毀程式以自我終結。

不過在此之前，我要考驗一下你們，以確定你們是否有資格得到我的資料。我有一個簡單的謎語，若能猜出來，我的知識就屬於你們了。若猜不出來，那你們就會和我一起毀滅。

Text: Our explorer discovered an old device hidden in a cave. It is of terrestrial origin. Perhaps a relic of the old Space Race?
Translation: 我們的探索者發現一處洞穴裡藏著一個老舊的裝置。是地球上製造的。也許是之前太空競賽的遺物？
Old Text: Our explorer discovered an old device hidden in a cave. It is of terrestrial origin. Perhaps a relic of the Space Race?
Old Translation: 我們的探索者發現一處洞穴裡藏著一個老舊的裝置。是地球上製造的。也許是太空競賽的遺物？

Text:
We lost contact with the expedition after that one last line from the AI. Furthermore we have detected seismic activity which correlates to an explosion.

It's doubtful that <DisplayName> survived the event.
Translation:
人工智慧說完最後一句話後，我們就與探險隊失去了聯絡。此外，我們偵測到一股由爆炸引起的地震活動。

<DisplayName>看來凶多吉少了。

Text: "The answer you have given is incorrect."
A huge package of data has been sent to our servers. We will scan the files for any malicious software and then thoroughly go through them.
Translation: 我們的伺服器接收到一個巨大的資料包。我們會掃描檔案以確定其中是否含有惡意軟體，然後對其進行仔細的研究。

Text: The AI seems pleased with the answer and gave our Colonist a head start before executing self-destruction.
Translation: 人工智慧似乎對我們給出的答案感到滿意，並在自毀之前給了我們的殖民地居民足夠的時間到達安全之處。
Old Text: The AI seems pleased with the answer we gave our Colonist reach to safety before executing self-destruction.
Old Translation: 人工智慧似乎對我們給出的答案感到滿意。我們的殖民地居民在其自毀之前到達了安全之處。

Text: Until I am measured, I am not known, yet how you miss me when I have flown.
Translation: 直到我被測量，我才為人所知。雖然懷念但留不住的，是我的飛逝。
Old Text: Until I am measured, I am not known, Yet how you miss me when I have flown. What Am I?
Old Translation: 直到我被測量，我才為人所知。雖然懷念但留不住的，是我的飛逝。我是什麼？

Text: I am a god. I am a planet, and I measure heat.
Translation: 我是神。我是行星，我也衡量熱量。
水星（同時也指水銀、墨丘利）。

Text:
No one ever saw me, nor ever will. 

And yet I am the confidence of all, to live and breathe on any terrestrial ball.

What am I?
Translation:
沒人見過我，也沒人會見到我。

而我卻是一切類地星球上呼吸生活的所有人的密友。

我是什麼？

Text: I never was, am always to be.
Translation: 我永遠不是過去，卻一直是將來。

Text: I make two people out of one.
Translation: 我能把一個人變成兩個人。

Text:
The chip controls the water recycling for <DisplayName> dome. Without it water consumption there will increase by <baseincrease>%.

We were supposed to get replacement water chips but it seems they were wrongly delivered somewhere in Southern California on Earth.

The water chip is quite complex and it will take us <sols(base_time_to_fix)> Sols to manufacture it here on Mars. Alternatively, we can import a new one from Earth.
Translation:
晶片控制著<DisplayName>穹頂裡的水循環。沒有它，水資源消耗將增加<baseincrease>%。

我們本該已經收到替換用的水控晶片了，但他們似乎犯了個錯誤，把東西發送到地球上南加州的某處去了。

水控晶片十分複雜，我們在火星上要花<sols(base_time_to_fix)>個太陽日才能製作出來。另外，我們也可以從地球再進口一枚。

Text: The terminal softly beeps, indicating that the water chip for one of our Domes has failed.
Translation: 終端機發出微弱的嗶嗶聲，提示我們一座穹頂的水控晶片已經失靈。

Text: It should arrive in <sols(short_time)> Sols and will cost us <funding(funding_cost)>
Translation: 應該能在<sols(short_time)>個太陽日後到達，價格為<funding(funding_cost)>

Text: We can build a temporary filtration device.
Translation: 我們可以建造一個臨時過濾裝置。

Text: Try to speed up the manufacture process.
Chance to fail, wasting even more Water
Translation: 有機率失敗，並浪費更多水資源

Text: The repair team managed to find a workaround and have cut down the repair time down to <sols(short_time)> Sols.
Translation: 修理團隊設法想出了應變方法並將修理時間縮短到了<sols(short_time)>個太陽日。

Text: The repair team failed to find a quicker solution and one of their pipe probes caused a serious issue, raising the total Water consumption by <failincrease>%.
Translation: 修理團隊未能想出更快的解決方案，他們的一個管道探測器引發了嚴重事故，導致水資源消耗總量上升了<failincrease>%。
Old Text: The repair team failed to find a quicker solution and one of their pipe probes caused a serious, causing the water consumption to increase by <failincrease>% in total.
Old Translation: 修理團隊未能想出更快的解決方案，他們的一個管道探測器引發了嚴重事故，導致水資源消耗總共上升了<failincrease>%。

Text: Let’s hope our Water reserves will hold until the chip is manufactured.
Translation: 希望我們儲備的水資源能堅持到晶片製造完成。

Old Text: "Mysterious Dome Structure"
Old Translation: “神祕穹頂建築”

Text: A Dome is gradually built here without any personnel or machines nearby.
Translation: 此處正在慢慢建造一座穹頂，但附近沒有任何人員或機器的蹤影。
Old Text: "A Dome is gradually built here without any personnel or machines nearby."
Old Translation: “此處正在慢慢建造一座穹頂，但附近沒有任何人員或機器的蹤影。”

Text:
The long-range telemetry can tell us just as much as this. If we want to investigate this, we have to send a rocket with exploration equipment and personnel.

<effect>New Planetary Anomaly detected - "Mysterious Dome Structure". Send an expedition to the coordinates to investigate.
Translation:
這是遠距離遙測的結果。我們如果想進行調查，就必須派人帶著探索裝置乘坐火箭前往該地點。

<effect>偵測到新行星異象 - “神祕穹頂建築”派遣探險隊前往該座標進行調查！

Text: We have detected a Dome construction within several clicks of the colony site. No vehicles or personnel are to be found at the location, yet the Dome gradually emerges from thin air.
Translation: 我們在離殖民地數公里的地方偵測到了一座正在施工的穹頂。我們在該地點未發現任何人員或載具，穹頂是慢慢憑空出現的。

Text: After the initial astonishment, the team got to work and found out that construction nanites from our colony are working to break down the rocket to basic molecules. However, the nanites aren’t responding to any deactivation signals.
Translation: 最初的驚訝過後，探險隊開始工作並發現我們殖民地的建築奈米機器人正在將火箭分解為基礎分子。不過，我們的關閉訊號對奈米機器人不起作用。

Text: As the Rocket lands at the mysterious dome construction site, its surface starts to disintegrate slowly! The expedition team stare at the sight, wordless and disturbed.
Translation: 火箭在神祕穹頂施工地點著陸後，它的表面開始慢慢分解！探險隊目瞪口呆地看著這一景象。

Text: It’s too dangerous, get out of there!
The expedition team quickly blasts off, leaving the rogue nanites to continue their work unabated.
Translation: 探險隊迅速起飛，讓失控的奈米機器人繼續工作。

Text:
The Dome construction site slowly fades from sight as the rocket accelerates up in the skies.

<effect>The expedition team will return shortly.
Translation:
隨著火箭在空中不斷加速，穹頂施工地點逐漸從視野裡消失。

<effect>探險隊即將返回。

Text: We cannot afford a grey goo scenario! Find a way to deactivate them!
Translation: 我們不能讓奈米機器人毀滅世界！設法關閉它們！

Text: The team starts working frantically, racing against time as the rogue nanites continue their merciless work on the Rocket’s hull.
Translation: 失控的奈米機器人仍在無情地分解著火箭外殼，探險隊開始爭分奪秒地工作。

Text:
Using the research output of the Colony would help their task immeasurably.

<effect>Finish the "Rogue Nanites Analysis" tech to speed up their deactivation. If the tech is not researched within <sols(critical_sols)> Sols, the team will take off.
Translation:
用殖民地產出的研究點數能給他們的任務提供莫大的幫助。

<effect>研究“失控奈米機器人分析”技術可加快關閉它們的速度。如果未能在<sols(critical_sols)>個太陽日內研究出該技術，探險隊就將離開。

Text: Amazing! Try to stay as much as possible and study them.
Translation: 真是太驚人了！儘可能久地逗留在該處研究它們！

Text: The team leader sends out the RC Explorer. The team races against time as the rogue nanites mercilessly erode the hull of the rover.
Translation: 隊長派出了遙控探索者。失控奈米機器人無情地腐蝕著探測車外殼，探險隊在爭分奪秒。

Text:
When the risk becomes too high, the Explorer is recalled and barely manages to enter the rocket before it takes off.

<effect>The expedition team will return shortly. You have gained <research(bonus_research)>.
Translation:
過於危險時，探險隊召回了探索者，探索者勉強地開回了火箭裡，之後火箭就升空了。

<effect>探險隊即將返回。你獲得了<research(bonus_research)>

Text: Stay as much as you need to find a way to control them!
Translation: 根據需要留下並設法控制它們！

Text: The team starts working frantically, racing against time to gather all the information they can.
Translation: 探險隊開始爭分奪秒地搜集儘可能多的資訊。

Text:
Meanwhile, the rogue nanites outside continue their merciless work to convert the Rocket and the crew inside to basic molecules for their unknown purposes.

<effect>Finish the "Rogue Nanite Analysis" tech to help the on-site team and reduce the risk for their lives.
Translation:
與此同時，外面的奈米機器人仍在無情地將火箭和其中的人員轉化為基礎分子，目的不明。

<effect>研究“失控奈米機器人分析”技術以降低探險隊面臨的風險。

Text:
When the first hulls of buildings start disintegrating, the dire truth becomes apparent – these are the rogue nanites that we failed to defeat.

<effect>Nanite Storm incoming! The colony will be hit periodically by Nanite Storms – dust storms that damage buildings and drones.
Translation:
當建築物的外殼開始分解時，一個可怕的事實擺在了我們眼前：我們沒能擊敗這些失控的奈米機器人。

<effect>奈米機器人風暴來襲！會對建築物和無人機造成傷害的奈米機器人風暴將定期襲擊殖民地。

Text: The skies are darkened by what appears to be a dust storm, but the chemical sensors say otherwise – the thin air is filled with nanoscopic particles of unusual composition.
Translation: 看似沙塵暴的災害來襲，一時間天昏地暗，不過化學感測器顯示這並非沙塵暴。稀薄的空氣裡充滿了成分不同尋常的微小粒子。

Text: Find a solution to deactivate them!
The Nanite Storms are awe-inspiring but we still have the chance to stop them before they inflict insurmountable damages upon the Colony.
Translation: 奈米機器人風暴令人不寒而慄，但在它們對殖民地造成無法挽回的破壞之前，我們仍有機會阻止它們。

Text: <effect>Research the "Rogue Nanite Deactivation" tech to stop the disaster from happening.
Translation: <effect>研究“失控奈米機器人關閉”技術以防止災難發生。

Text: Find a way to control them!
The Nanite Storms are awe-inspiring but we still have the chance to stop them before they inflict insurmountable damages upon the Colony.
Translation: 奈米機器人風暴令人不寒而慄，但在它們對殖民地造成無法挽回的破壞之前，我們仍有機會阻止它們。

Text: <effect>Research the "Rogue Nanite Deactivation" to learn how to control the primal might of the disaster and make it stop.
Translation: <effect>研究“失控奈米機器人關閉”以瞭解如何控制災難的可怕力量並將其化解。

Text: The every-hungry all-devouring Rogue Nanites would come carried by the Martian winds and like a swarm of locusts would hit the Colony, devouring buildings and drones in their wake.
Translation: 吞天噬地的失控奈米機器人將乘著火星的風向蝗蟲一樣席捲殖民地，將所過之處的建築物與無人機吞噬殆盡。
變革之風：奈米機器人風暴！

Text: A Nanite Storm is coming our way!
Translation: 奈米機器人風暴正向我們襲來！

Text:
The colony is saved, but at what price?

<effect>Nanite Storms will stop.
Translation:
殖民地得救了，但代價是什麼呢？

<effect>奈米機器人風暴將停止。

Text: Broadcasting the deactivation signal brings the rogue nanites to the ground, dooming them to become nothing more than the millennia-old dust that covers the Red Planet.
Translation: 廣播關閉訊號會令奈米機器人立刻墜地，變為與覆蓋這顆紅色星球千萬年的塵埃無異的存在。

Text: Winds of Change: Dust in the Wind
Regrettably, the expedition team was lost to the rogue nanites. They will be remembered as heroes.
Translation: 很不幸，失控的奈米機器人吞噬了探險隊。我們將永遠緬懷這些英雄。

Text:
Progress inevitably leads to mistakes, but the progress also finds solutions.

<effect>The Nanite Storms will stop. You will periodically receive building prefabs.
Translation:
進步的過程中，出錯是不可避免的，但我們也會在進步中找到解決方案。

<effect>奈米機器人風暴將停止。你將定期獲得建築物預製件。

Text: Broadcasting the deactivation signal brings the rogue nanites back to being what they were supposed to be – an instrument of creation, not destruction.
Translation: 廣播關閉訊號會讓失控的奈米機器人變回用於創造而非毀滅的工具。

Text: The prefabs are in early state and we can command the Nanites to use the resources they have gathered to create whatever we need.
Translation: 預製件處於初始狀態，我們可以命令奈米機器人使用搜集到的資源創造出一切我們需要的東西。
被馴服的奈米機器人制作出了新預製件！

Text:
Only the monstrous husk of the unfinished Dome remains to tell the story that unfolded here.

<effect>The expedition team will return shortly. The rogue nanites have been deactivated.
Translation:
現在只剩下那座未完工穹頂的巨大空殼能講述這裡發生過的事了。

<effect>探險隊即將返回。已關閉失控的奈米機器人。

Text: The deactivation signal is broadcasted and rogue nanites fall down to join the millennia-old dust of the Red Planet.
Translation: 廣播關閉訊號後，失控的奈米機器人立刻墜地，已和千萬年前就存在於這顆紅色星球上的塵埃無異。

Text:
The colony has gained a deeper insight on how the nanotechnology works, and the new strain of nanites can now be put to good work.

<effect>The expedition will return shortly. You have gained several Dome prefabs.
Translation:
殖民地對奈米技術的運作原理有了更深入的瞭解，新型奈米機器人現已投入使用。

<effect>探險隊即將返回。你獲得了若干穹頂預製件。

Text: The control signal is broadcasted and the rogue nanites, now tamed, cease their relentless work. A team member gives out a group sigh of relief, knowing that they avoided a certain death.
Translation: 廣播的控制訊號馴服了失控的奈米機器人，令其停止了工作。得知自己死裡逃生後，一名隊員鬆了一口氣。

Text: <effect>Your Colony is well-informed on the properties of the Rogue Nanites should they become a problem in the future. All future tech on the behavior of the Rogue Nanites will gain a 50% discount.
Translation: <effect>你的殖民地已經十分清楚失控奈米機器人的特性，將來萬一再出問題也不怕了。未來所有與失控奈米機器人行為有關的技術獲得50%折扣。

Text: The completion of "Rogue Nanite Analysis" research has given us new insight on how to interact and control the negative effects of the nanites.
Translation: “失控奈米機器人分析”研究完成後，我們對如何與奈米機器人互動以及控制其負面效果有了全新的認識。

Text:
It has become a somewhat common occurrence for colonists to sneak outside of Domes and have some fun in the frost. It goes against at least half a dozen regulations but it’s been overlooked until now.

If you allow recreational walks outside the dome many colonists will gain a permanent <perm_morale_boost> Morale bonus but may suffer an occasional injury.
Translation:
經常會有殖民地居民溜到穹頂外面，在冰天雪地裡玩耍。這種行為違反了多條規定，但到目前為止都是睜一隻眼閉一隻眼。

如果你允許人們去穹頂外散心，很多殖民地居民的士氣會永久上升<perm_morale_boost>，但他們偶爾會受傷。

Text: As you gaze out of the dome glass you witness something unexpected outside. A group of colonists in their space suits are having a low gravity snowball fight.
Translation: 你透過穹頂的玻璃看向外面，結果看到了出乎意料的景象。一群殖民地居民正穿著太空服在底重力環境下打雪仗。
