Text: This is not safe for children.
Translation: 這對孩子們來說不安全。

Text: allow only adults to exit the Domes for recreation
Translation: 只允許成年人去穹頂外散心

Text: Sorry to be a killjoy, but this is too dangerous!
Translation: 不好意思掃你們興了，但這實在太危險了！

Text:
It seems that little <DisplayName> went missing while playing in the frost outside. Apparently the kid decided to adventure further out and fell down a ravine.

The kid's air reserves are running low, but the approach to the ravine is dangerous.
Translation:
在外面的冰天雪地裡玩耍期間，小<DisplayName>似乎失蹤了。這名兒童顯然決定去更遠的地方探險，並掉進了溝壑裡。

兒童的空氣儲量越來越少，但靠近溝壑十分危險。

Text: The worried mother is staring at the monitor as the Drones search for the missing kid.
Translation: 擔憂的母親目不轉睛地盯著螢幕上的無人機搜尋她失蹤的孩子。

Text: Attempt to rescue the kid with Drones.
Translation: 設法用無人機營救兒童。

Text: Attempt a rescue with a Shuttle.
Send a Colonist on the rescue mission.
Translation: 派一位殖民地居民執行營救任務。

Text:
Colonists have taken Martian snowball fights to the extreme, trying evermore dangerous stunts and maneuvers. 

If you keep the recreational walks colonists will have a small chance for more serious injuries.
Translation:
殖民地居民們往打雪仗裡加入了極限運動的元素，開始嘗試一些非常危險的特技動作。

如果你繼續允許去穹頂外散心，則殖民地居民有較低機率受重傷。

Text: Two Colonists with broken limbs and guilty faces sit across your desk as you scold them about proper safety procedure.
Translation: 兩位摔斷了胳膊腿的殖民地居民一臉愧疚地坐在你桌對面挨你訓。必須讓他們明白安全規程。

Text:
We managed to get the kid to safety before the Oxygen supply ran out. However, the volunteer rescuer - <DisplayName> was seriously injured when climbing down the ravine and did not survive.

The kid's parents held an impromptu wake for the fallen hero.
Translation:
我們設法在氧氣耗盡之前把兒童救回了安全地點。不過我們自告奮勇的營救者<DisplayName>在爬下溝壑期間受了重傷，不幸身亡。

獲救兒童的父母為這名英雄舉行了即興的守靈儀式。

Text: Join the mourners at the wake.
Translation: 與他們一同在守靈儀式上哀悼。

Text: Rename a dome in honor of <DisplayName>.
Translation: 用<DisplayName>的名字重新命名一座穹頂，以示紀念。

Text: The exposure to the cold and the oxygen deprivation have left <DisplayName> with permanent injuries. The kid won't be able to go to school or work after growing up.
Translation: 嚴寒和缺氧的環境給<DisplayName>造成了永久的傷害。該兒童無法上學，長大後也無法工作。

Text: It took us four attempts to find the correct approach and we lost several Drones in the process. We managed to rescue the kid in the nick of time.
Translation: 我們為了找出合適的靠近路線進行了四次嘗試，過程中損失了若干架無人機。我們在千鈞一髮之際救回了孩子。

Text:
Colonist <DisplayName> managed to get to the kid just in time and escape the ravine intact. The entire colony sings high praises of the heroic rescuer.

<effect><DisplayName> has gained the Celebrity trait.
Translation:
殖民地居民<DisplayName>設法及時救出了孩子，並安然無恙地逃出了溝壑。這位英勇的營救者在我們殖民地裡有口皆碑。

<effect><DisplayName>獲得了名人特性。

Text:
The first attempt was a failure and we lost the Shuttle. Luckily the second one was successful and little <DisplayName> is back safe and sound with just a couple of cuts and bruises.

<effect><morale_boost> Morale for <sols(morale_boost_duration)> Sols
Translation:
第一次嘗試失敗了，我們失去了穿梭機。好在第二次嘗試成功了，安全歸來的小<DisplayName>只受了點皮外傷。

<effect><morale_boost>士氣，持續<sols(morale_boost_duration)>個太陽日

Text: Clearly, <DisplayName> wants you to name a target.
Translation: 顯然，<DisplayName>想要你指定一個目標。
理智崩潰 - 為我見證！

Text: After suffering a Sanity breakdown, the victim ran to the hatch of the dome, quickly put on a space suit and hijacked a Rover. "Show me the enemy, Important Joe, and I’ll bring it fury!"
Translation: 一名受害的殖民地居民理智崩潰後，跑去了穹頂的艙口，迅速穿上太空服並劫持了一輛探測車。“老喬，告訴我敵人在哪裡，我會對他們傾瀉怒火！”

Text: That building, you see it? Charge!
Translation: 看到那棟建築物了嗎？衝啊！

Text: "Witness meeeeee!" With a scream, the poor soul smashes the hijacked Rover into the building.
Translation: “為我見證！”這個可憐的傢伙一邊高喊一邊開著劫持的探測車猛撞上了建築物。

Text:
The cockpit cameras show that the colonist lies on the floor, unconscious. Fortunately, no lives were lost, but the building has been severely damaged. Hours later, the Colonist regains consciousness and is now feeling better, although ashamed.

<effect>A building has been destroyed.
Translation:
駕駛艙攝影機顯示該殖民地居民躺在地上不省人事。幸運的是，沒有出人命，不過那棟建築受損嚴重。數小時後，該居民恢復了意識並感覺好多了，不過十分羞愧。

<effect>一座建築物被毀。

Text: That Dome, that’s where they hide!
Translation: 他們就藏在那個穹頂裡！

Text: "I live, I die, I live again!" With an ear-piercing war cry, the poor soul smashes the hijacked rover into the dome.
Translation: “我向死而生！”隨著一聲震耳欲聾的戰吼，這個可憐的傢伙劫持的探測車猛撞上了穹頂。

Text:
The surface bends in and surrenders under the force of the impact, the air inside leaving with a sinister hissing. Luckily, the colonist inside the rover suffered only a concussion, and is now feeling better, but ashamed.

<effect>A Dome has received <crack_amount> fractures.
Translation:
表面在衝擊力的作用下變形破裂，穹頂中的空氣伴隨著不祥的嘶嘶聲往外洩漏著。幸運的是，駕駛探測車的殖民地居民只受了腦震盪，現在好多了，不過十分羞愧。

<effect>一座穹頂產生了<crack_amount>處裂縫。

Text: Listen to my voice, calm down, no need for violence!
Translation: 聽我說，你冷靜一下，沒必要使用暴力！

Text: "NO! I am awaited in Valhalla!" Laughing maniacally, the Colonist forces the rover into the red desert.
Translation: “不行！英靈殿在等我！”殖民地居民一陣狂笑，強行將探測車開進了紅色沙漠。
Old Text: 'NO! I am awaited in Valhalla!’ Laughing maniacally, the Colonist forces the rover into the red desert.
Old Translation: 否

Text:
Hours later, you track the Colonist’s whereabouts by the signal beacon of the space suit. There you find <DisplayName> sitting atop the rover’s frozen debris, ashamed of the maniacal behavior, but still fine.

<effect>A Rover has been destroyed.
Translation:
幾小時後，你透過此人太空服上的訊號信標追蹤到了其下落。到了之後，你發現<DisplayName>坐在探測車凍結的殘骸上，因自己瘋狂的行為而羞愧萬分，但人沒事。

<effect>一輛探測車已被摧毀。

Text: "Why won’t you look at me, Important Joe? Why do you deny me?" The poor soul sits, quietly sobbing.
Translation: “老喬，看著我。你為何拒絕我？”這個可憐的傢伙坐在那裡靜靜地抽泣著。

Text:
<DisplayName> makes no attempts to resist when you open the Rover’s hatch. Hours later, the Colonist is feeling much better, yet ashamed.

<effect><DisplayName> has been saved.
Translation:
你開啟探測車艙口時，<DisplayName>沒有試圖抵抗。幾小時後，這位殖民地居民感覺好多了，但十分羞愧。

<effect>已拯救<DisplayName>。

Text: "What? Am I denied? No! Noooo!" The colonist makes no attempts to resist when you reach the Rover and open the hatch.
Translation: “什麼？我被拒絕了嗎？不！不！！”你到達探測車處並開啟艙口時，這位殖民地居民沒有試圖抵抗。
Old Text: ‘What? Am I denied? No! Noooo!’ The colonist makes no attempts to resist when you reach the Rover and open the hatch.
Old Translation: 否

Text:
Hours later, under your attentive care, the Colonist comes back to reality and is feeling better, although ashamed.

<effect><DisplayName> has been saved.
Translation:
在你的細心照料下，幾小時後，殖民地居民恢復了正常，並感覺好多了，不過羞愧萬分。

<effect>已拯救<DisplayName>。

Text: The Biotech field deals with Food production, life support and medicine.
Translation: 生物技術與食物 生產、生命支援和醫藥方面息息相關。

Text: The Engineering field deals with Buildings, Domes and improves Rocket technology.
Translation: 工程學與建築與穹頂息息相關，還能改善火箭技術。

Text: The Robotics field deals with Drones, Rovers and Shuttles, as well as building automation.
Translation: 機器人技術 與無人機、探測車和穿梭機，以及建築自動化息息相關。

Text: The Physics field deals with Power production, exploration and disaster safety.
Translation: 物理學與電力生產、火星探索及災害防治息息相關。

Text: The Social field deals with Colonists, traits, Martian society and Funding.
Translation: 社交與殖民地居民、特性、火星社會與資金息息相關。

Text: Buildings construct themselves slowly without Drones. Nanites will seek out resources from nearby resource depots. With a payload of several molecules and an electronic instrument used for both navigating and knowing its purpose, Construction Nanites form slightly saturated winds which to the casual observer would seem to erect buildings as if by magic.
Translation: 即使在沒有無人機的情況下，建築也會緩慢建造。奈米機器人會從附近的資源倉庫尋找材料。 靠著分子級別的構造，和用來導航與接收命令的電子元件，建築奈米機器人就像無孔不入的微風一樣進行建造任務。在普通人的眼裡，建築彷彿就像施了魔法一樣建好了。

Text: Buildings require maintenance less often. "Don't confound static electricity with ecstatic eccentricity. One will leave your hair up, the other will live up in the air!" Ana Claudia Antunes
Translation: 降低建築需要維護的頻率。 “不要把靜電和高壓電弧弄混。前者會讓你毛髮豎立，而後者會讓你直入雲霄！” 安娜·克勞迪婭·安圖內斯

Text: When a colonist dies there's a % chance he or she is reconstructed as youth with the same traits. Like the legend of the Phoenix, all ends with beginnings. Consciousness being an electrical charge within a specific neuron pattern, replicating it eventually comes down to data fidelity.
Translation: 殖民地居民死亡時，有%的機率重構為擁有同樣特性的年輕人。 正如傳說中的鳳凰一樣，生命輪迴不止。意識歸根結底，不過是具有特定神經元模式的電荷。只要能將其完全複製，就能儲存生前的全部記憶。

Text: Bodies of dead Colonists are converted to Food. "Soylent Green is made out of people. They are making food out of people and we know that. We are actually OK with that."
Translation: 死亡居民的屍體會轉化為食物。 “綠色食物是用人的屍體製成的。他們把屍體做成食物，我們早就知道了，我們覺得沒什麼不妥。”

Text: Unlocks Rare Trait - Empath. Empaths raise the Morale of all Colonists in the Dome. The effect stacks with other Empaths. "`The human brain has 100 billion neurons, each neuron connected to 10 thousand other neurons. Sitting on your shoulders is the most complicated object in the known universe." Michio Kaku
Translation: 解鎖稀有特性 - 體貼。體貼特性可以提高穹頂中所有殖民地居民的士氣。體貼效果可以疊加。 “人類的大腦有著一千億個神經元，而每個神經元又與其它幾萬個神經元相連接。你兩肩之間的東西，是整個宇宙裡最複雜的造物。” 谷川道雄

Text: Colonists need to sleep for only 1 hour and regain extra Sanity when sleeping. "Sleep, those little slices of death — how I loathe them." Edgar Allan Poe
Translation: 殖民地居民只需要1個小時的睡眠時間，睡眠時會額外恢復理智度。 “睡眠，這些死亡的小小片斷 - 是多麼惹人生厭。” 埃德加·愛倫·坡

Text: Allows the construction of Biorobots in the Drone Assembler. Biorobots eat and can gain traits but can't reproduce and never die from old age. The human body is basically a complex bio machine that could be easily replicated with the exception of one major component – the brain. Now that we have finally unlocked that secret we can manufacture human-like Biorobots the same way we manufacture cars.
Translation: 可以在無人機組裝廠中製造生化人。生物機器人會進食，也能擁有特性。但不具備繁殖能力，也不會年邁去世。 人類的身體就像一臺複雜的生化機器一樣，每個零件都可以輕易複製，但大腦卻是個例外。如今，我們終於發現了人腦的奧祕。我們可以像生產車輛一樣，生產這種與人類別無兩樣的生化人。

Text:
When a colonist suffers a Sanity breakdown, they fall asleep and wake up after <param1> hours with <param2> Sanity. Colonists can't commit suicide or gain flaws due to sanity breakdown.

<grey>Failsafe systems have been in place and used to prevent catastrophes in various fields for centuries. Until now we had no viable way of remotely detecting when the brain was headed towards a meltdown. A means to remotely render people unconscious, however, was already available.</grey>
Translation:
當殖民地居民發生理智崩潰時，崩潰的居民會陷入沉睡。<param1>小時後甦醒，理智度恢復至<param2>。殖民地居民在理智崩潰期間不會自殺，也不會產生缺陷。

<grey>數百年來，許多領域都採用了故障保護系統，防止災難發生。在此之前，當我們的大腦發生崩潰時，我們並沒有什麼辦法能阻止它。但如今，我們已經可以透過遠端操作，讓人陷入無意識狀態。</grey>

Text: Residents in the Arcology get a bonus to work performance based on the number of unique perks and specializations of colonists living in the Arcology. "The tools that a society uses to create and maintain itself are as central to human life as a hive is to bee life. Though the hive is not part of any individual bee, it is part of the colony, both shaped by and shaping the lives of its inhabitants." Clay Shirky
Translation: 根據生態建築中擁有獨特專長專業的居民數量，建築中的居民在工作時會獲得工作效率加成。 “人類構築社會、維護社會的過程，就如同蜜蜂建造蜂巢一樣。雖然蜂巢不屬於任何蜜蜂個體，但卻屬於整個種群。它不僅由居民塑造，也塑造著居民的生活。 克萊·舍基

Text: Colonists have a % chance to lose a flaw on their journey to Mars. It is never too late to improve on oneself, and the months spent traversing the void between Mars and Earth gives ample opportunity to do so.
Translation: 殖民地居民在前往火星時，有%的機率治癒一項缺陷。 改善自身永遠不遲。地球與火星之間的幾個月的飛行時間，恰好為人們提供了這樣的機會。

Text: Recharge Stations service Drones in a hex-range instantly. Tesla once predicted that wireless power would be obtainable anywhere on Earth, illuminating and powering vehicles in the most remote of places. Ultimately his prediction came true – he only got the planet wrong.
Translation: 充電站可以瞬間為格內的無人機充滿電。 特斯拉曾經預言過，無線供電將遍佈地球的各個角落。即使最偏遠的地區，也不用擔心照明和載具供電。他的預言最終實現了，不過並不是在地球上實現的。

Text: Allows Drones Prefabs to be constructed in the Drone Assembler using Metals instead of Electronics. Made entirely out of 2-dimensional nanomaterials, printed electronics combine effective electronic properties with low-cost production.
Translation: 無人機組裝廠可以不用電子元件，而用金屬製作無人機預製件。 這種列印出來的電子元件完全由二維奈米材料製成，既保障了電子元件的高效性，又保證了低廉的生產成本。

Text: Uncovers extremely rich underground Metal deposits. Increased detail in reading traces of tectonic activities from eons ago has enabled us to accurately predict where to find high-grade metals deep in the crust, only relatively recently pushed up from the Martian mantle.
Translation: 可以發現儲量極為豐富的地下金屬資源點。 透過深入研究遠古時期的地質活動，我們可以精準地預測地底深處優質金屬的位置。不過，僅限近期從火星地幔中不斷上升的部分金屬。

Text: Uncovers extremely rich underground Water deposits. Primordial underground lakes in the nethermost regions of Mars’s crust have been accurately hypothesized and successfully pinpointed due to advances in our understanding of the Martian geological past.
Translation: 可以發現儲量極為豐富的地下水資源資源點。 隨著對火星地質歷史的深入瞭解，我們已精準預測並成功找到火星地底深處的遠古地下湖泊。

Text: Uncovers extremely rich underground Rare Metal deposits. Applying new principles to chemical analysis of ancient crystallized magma has made it possible to locate several exceptionally potent Rare Metal veins deep underground.
Translation: 可以發現儲量極為豐富的地下稀有金屬資源點。 透過採用新的科學技術對遠古岩漿結晶進行化學分析，我們找到了地底深處的數條含量豐富的稀有金屬礦脈。

Text: Instant and free power cable construction. Power cables do not suffer from power faults. A hydrogel of high conductivity and electrical self-healing properties, without any external stimuli and of great strength and flexibility, has been developed based on Nanostructured Conductive Polymers.
Translation: 電纜建造瞬間完成且不消耗資源，電纜不再會發生電力故障。 這種電纜的材料為奈米結構傳導聚合物製成的水凝膠。它具備高傳導性與自我修復性，無需外界刺激，強度和柔韌性極佳。

Text: Instant and free pipe construction. Pipes don't suffer from leaks. A pressure-induced, self-healing coating with remarkable insulation properties has been developed and field-tested to be used en masse on our pipe system.
Translation: 管道建造瞬間完成且不消耗資源，管道不再會出現洩漏。 這種管道採用了壓感自我修復塗層，擁有出色的絕緣效能，目前已投入所有管道系統中進行實地測試。

Text: Uncovers new Anomalies – Alien Artifacts – which provide a tech cost reduction to all fields when scanned. Hard as it is to believe, our observations suggest that intelligent life has visited Mars long ago and that remnants of these visits could still be here. These artifacts could help us improve and expand our understanding of the universe.
Translation: 可以發現的異象外星文物，掃描後可以讓所有技術領域的成本降低。 難以置信，我們的觀察結果顯示，很久之前就有智慧生命造訪過火星。造訪時留下的東西可以依然遺留在火星上。這些文物可以幫助我們增進對宇宙的理解。

Text: All colonists gain + performance during night shifts The greater distance from the Sun makes it so that all colonists have to cope with the psychological strain of receiving reduced sunlight. This fact, combined with newly discovered techniques allow us to considerably boost the productivity of those who work outright nightshifts.
Translation: 在夜班工作的殖民地居民工作效率+。 由於與太陽距離過遠，所有殖民地居民都早已做好了難見天日的心理準備。這些心裡準備，加之我們新發現的技術，可以大大提高那些夜班工人的工作效率。

Text: Doubles the chance that a Colonist will have or gain a rare trait. Advanced and impeccably precise gene splicing instruments will now give us better control on the traits Colonists are born with on Mars.
Translation: 殖民地居民擁有稀有特性的機率加倍。 透過先進的精密基因剪接儀器，我們可以更好地控制火星出生居民的特性。

Text: All Colonists consume % less Food. Radically changing eating habits that have been in place for centuries is made quite easier after changing the planet they were evolved on in the first place.
Translation: 所有殖民地居民消耗的食物減少%。 從世世代代居住的星球離開之後，再去改變持續了幾個世紀的飲食習慣要容易得多。

Text: Fusion Reactors Upgrade (Eternal Fusion) - Fusion Reactors no longer require workers and operate at performance. Our understanding of the once holy grail of energetics - Fusion Energy has reached the level where once a fusion reaction has been triggered, it can be left to regulate and sustain itself on its own… within a confined and safe medium of course.
Translation: 核融合反應爐升級（無限核融合）- 核融合反應爐不再需要人員操作，且工作效率始終保持為。 我們對這種能量學的聖盃是這麼理解的 - 聚變過程一但到達引發聚變反應的臨界點之後，後續的反應就可以自行調節和維持……當然，是在密閉安全的容器中。

Text: Converts unused Power into Research Points. The ultra-cold environment that is Mars, combined with several recent breakthroughs in super conductors, has made the concept of superconductor computing, while still quite costly in terms of power, now manageable, thus opening the doors to the extremely fast superconductor computers.
Translation: 可以將未使用的電力轉化為研究點數。 火星上極端寒冷的環境，再加上超導體方面的突破性研究，使得超導體計算技術順利問世。儘管這種技術耗電量依然極高，但已經到達了可以應用的程度。由此，運算速度極快的超導電腦也應運而生。

Text: All Extractors continue to extract small amounts when their deposit is depleted. Leaving scattered molecules of the precious resource a mining facility was tasked with extracting has always bothered scientists as being just too cynically wasteful. Luckily, with new Nano Refinement precision tools, this wasteful tendency has been remedied.
Translation: 即使當資源點耗盡之後，挖掘站也可以繼續採取少量資源。 採礦設施上會留下珍貴的資源顆粒。在科學家們的眼中，這些顆粒都屬於對資源的浪費。不過，隨著新的奈米提煉精密工具出現，這些浪費都得到了修正。

Text: Drones carry two resources at once. Nature has long provided inspiration for technological advances. Muscles made from carbon fiber are the latest example of cutting-edge biotech and, mixed with Mars’s low gravity, our Drones have basically doubled their carrying capacity.
Translation: 無人機可以一次攜帶兩個資源。 大自然為技術進步提供了無窮無盡的靈感。而前沿生物技術 - 碳纖維肌肉正是其中之一。再加上火星重力較低，我們的無人機的承載能力基本上可以變為原來的兩倍。

Text: Colonists in Domes with a Spire have increased Morale. Even on the seemingly most ordinary of days, Colonists on Mars must never forget how extraordinary their lives actually are. Every time they pause from their newfound routines on this alien world and gaze upon the man-made spires that rise proudly towards the Martian sky, they will be reminded of the incredible feat their lives are part of.
Translation: 尖塔可以提高穹頂內居民的士氣。 即便過著看似日常的生活，火星上的居民們也從來不會忘記，他們的生活有多麼不可思議。當他們在火星世界的日常工作中感到煩悶時，只要他們看到火星上空高聳入雲的人造穹頂，他們就會意識到，他們的生活是多麼令人難以置信的奇蹟。

Text: Unlocks giant crops which have an increased Food output. Gene editing the plant strains brought from Earth to Mars so they can better cope with some of the Martian environment’s peculiarities has allowed us to grow super-sized versions of their Earthling cousins.
Translation: 解鎖巨型作物，巨型作物食物產量更高。 透過基因改造，這些源自地球的植物產生了特殊的變化，可以更好地適應一些火星上的獨特環境。有了這種技術，我們就能種植巨化版的地球作物了。

Text: Dome Concrete costs reduced by %. Mixing recently discovered materials made from Martian polymers with the Martian regolith have unlocked the wonder material that is Neo-Concrete. It is vastly stronger, yet lighter than its predecessor.
Translation: 建造穹頂的混凝土消耗降低%。 最新研製而成的材料，由火星聚合物和風化層混合而成。這種神奇的新型材料就是新型混凝土。與以往的混凝土相比，這種新型混凝土更堅固、更輕便。

Text: Drones move % faster. Our engineers have unveiled the first motor design to replace the old engines of our drones that were created in Earth laboratories so long ago. This time we’ve combined all that is now known from having hands-on experience in dissecting a drone that has been doing field work on Mars for quite some time.
Translation: 無人機移動速度增加%。 工程師們成功設計出了全新的引擎，取代了很久以前在地球實驗室中製造的舊式無人機引擎。這種新式引擎，是工程師們充分吸收火星野外工作積累的經驗之後，精心設計而成的。

Text: Water requirements of crops is reduced by %. By mixing lab-made chemicals with the Martian regolith we have created what passes for Martian soil, providing improved subsurface water retention and reducing the need for watering.
Translation: 作物消耗的水資源降低%。 透過將實驗室製造的化學物質與火星的風化層混合，我們已經成功地複製了火星表層的土壤。這種改造過的土壤具有更好的蓄水性，可以降低對水資源的消耗。

Text: Lowers Metals costs for building construction by %. The unique composition of Martian ore has finally been thoroughly understood and new smelting techniques have been developed accordingly.
Translation: 建造建築物需消耗的金屬減少%。 科研人員透過不懈研究，終於瞭解了火星金屬的全部特性，並根據特性開發了新的鍛造技術。

Text: Moisture Vaporator Upgrade (Vector Pump) - Water production increased by 100%. A new atmosphere pump design that doubles the volume of air processed by our Vaporators in a single Sol.
Translation: 水氣蒐集站升級（向量泵）- 水資源產量提高100%。 採用了全新設計的氣泵，可以讓水氣蒐集站在每個太陽日內處理的空氣體積增加一倍。

Text: Fungal Farm Upgrade (Superfungus) - Increases production while increasing Oxygen consumption. Historically, lab mistakes involving fungi have rarely been a cause for celebration. A recent mishap in the lab seems to be an exception, as we have created a new breed of fungi which hold much promise.
Translation: 真菌農場升級（超級真菌）- 提高食物產量，但氧氣消耗量也會提高。 有史以來，凡是與真菌有關的實驗室意外事件，通常都不是什麼可喜的事情。不過，最近的實驗室意外事件卻是個例外。這場意外為我們帶來了一種充滿潛力的全新菌種。

Text: Solar Arrays, Solar Panels and Large Solar Panels Power production increased by %. An abundance of field experience has culminated in our engineers creating the perfect solar cells made specifically for the Martian atmosphere dust consistency.
Translation: 太陽能板陣列、太陽能板與大型太陽能板的電力產量提高%。 透過積累豐富的現場經驗，我們的工程師創造了新型太陽能電池，特別適合用在火星充滿塵土的環境之中。

Text: Wind Turbines Power production increased by %. Through clever application of graphene and carbon based frictionless materials, we have managed to maximize the push of the Martian wind while minimizing the friction which slows down the rotor’s rotation cycle, thus delivering far more bang for every buck of wind.
Translation: 風力發電機的電力產量提高%。 透過應用基於碳與石墨烯的無阻力複合材料，我們成功地優化了對火星風能的應用效率。同時，由於摩擦降低，風力發電機轉子的旋轉週期也變得更長，這讓每一陣風都能帶來更加強大的推力。

Text: Low-G Lab, Research Lab & Hawking Institute Upgrade (Zero-Space Computing) - Research points production increased. Thinking outside the box, Martian mathematicians have begun developing a new mathematical apparatus which will open the doors to new scientific models and theories.
Translation: 研究點數與霍金研究所升級（零維空間計算）- 研究點數產量提高。 火星數學家擺脫了常規思想的束縛，發展出了一項全新的數學工具，為新的科學模型與新的科學理論打開了大門。

Text: New Dome: Oval Dome () - An elongated Dome which has space for two Spires. A new, domestic approach to construction provides the same structural safety of our Domes while providing additional space for Spires.
Translation: 新穹頂：橢圓穹頂（）- 細長形狀的穹頂，可以容納兩座尖塔。 透過新式的建築技術，我們可以建造出與圓形穹頂同樣安全的穹頂結構，同時為尖塔提供了額外的空間。

Text: Extractor Upgrade (Magnetic Extraction) - Production increased by %. We have progressed upon fringe mining technologies, developing safe ways to bring Magnetic Extraction to our mines on Mars.
Translation: 挖掘站升級（磁性萃取）- 產量提高%。 我們在採礦技術方面獲得了新的進展。透過應用磁性萃取技術，我們可以更加安全地採集火星上的礦脈。

Text: Doubles the performance bonus when Colonists are working on a heavy workload. When every citizen knows that their efficiency more or less impacts the survival chances of the entire Colony, it becomes a matter of pride to work hard.
Translation: 當殖民地居民處於高負荷狀態時，會獲得雙倍的工作效率加成。 當每一位殖民地居民都明白，整個殖民地的生死存亡都取決於他們的工作效率時，努力工作就成了一件值得驕傲的事情。

Text: Seniors can work and have children. The golden years have officially been postponed indefinitely as a recent breakthrough has finally unlocked the fountain of youth. Every man and woman on Mars has now the ability to remain within their most productive and fertile age forever.
Translation: 老年人也可以工作，擁有生育能力。 最新的突破性技術終於打開了人類的青春之泉，人類的黃金年齡被無限期地推遲。火星上的每位男女能永遠停留在最年富力強、最適於生育的年齡。

Text: Martianborn gain performance. Growing up in a unique environment, combined with some creative gene therapy, makes people better problem solvers. Martianborn are brought up in a society which thrives on the idea that every extra effort counts and the smarter the effort, the better.
Translation: 火星之子獲得工作效率。 火星上獨特的環境，加之獨創性的基因改良技術，使得火星出生的居民更擅長解決問題。在火星，任何額外的努力都不會白費。而且越聰明的選擇，就會帶來越好的成果。火星之子就是在這樣的社會氛圍中長大的。

Text: Passenger Rockets carry more Colonists. Putting our Colonists in a state of suspended animation for the duration of the flight to Mars greatly reduces the space needed for a single Colonist on the rocket. Cryo-tubes will allow us to transport more Colonists on a single rocket.
Translation: 客運火箭可以額外攜帶位殖民地居民。 有了這項技術之後，殖民地居民在前往火星的飛行期間會處於休眠狀態。這可以極大減少每位居民所需要的空間，使客運火箭運輸更多居民。

Text: New Spire Building: Cloning Vats () - creates Clones over time. Cloned colonists grow and age twice as fast. "Clones can think creatively. You will find that they are immensely superior to drones." Unnamed Martian Scientist
Translation: 新尖塔建築：複製人中心（）- 可以不斷製造複製人。複製人的生長與衰老速度是正常人的兩倍。 “複製人同樣擁有創造性思維。你會發現，他們比無人機要厲害得多。” 某位匿名的火星科學家

Text: Domes restore Sanity to their inhabitants every Sol. Who knew that emitting a low level vibration could affect the human psyche in such a way?
Translation: 穹頂可以在每個理智度中為居民恢復理智度。 低頻率振動可以對人類的心智狀況產生這樣的影響，這之前又有誰能想得到呢？

Text: Domes cost % less basic resources. Mastering of certain techniques, singled out to be crucial to the entire construction process, will result in the drop of Dome construction costs.
Translation: 穹頂基礎資源耗費降低%。 尖端技術對整個施工過程而言都至關重要的，因為它可以降低穹頂的建築成本。

Text: All Spires can be ordered as prefabs from Earth. The ever-increasing miniaturization of technology along with different modules has made it possible to transport the structural behemoths known as Spires all the way from Earth.
Translation: 所有的尖塔的預製件都可以從地球定製。 由於微縮技術與運輸模組技術不斷發展，人類已經可以將龐大的尖塔從地球直接運輸到火星。

Text: Metals Extractors and Rare Metals Extractors can work without crews at performance. Extracting algorithms have been successfully implemented by our new Extractor AI, allowing for a certain degree of autonomy in mining operations.
Translation: 金屬挖掘站與稀有金屬挖掘站不再需要人員操作，且工作效率始終保持為。 我們已經將挖掘演算法成功地注入到了全新的人工智慧中，這在一定程度上實現了自動採礦作業。

Text: Non-medical Service Buildings Upgrade (Service Bots) - service buildings no longer require workers and operate at performance. Freeing our colonists of dealing with the most mundane of chores.
Translation: 非醫療類服務性建築升級（服務型機器人）- 服務性建築物不再需要人員操作，且工作效率始終保持為。 我們的居民不用再操心日常的瑣事了。

Text: Amplify upgrades grant a bigger boost to production. "Power! Unlimited Power!" Sheev
Translation: 增產升級可以提供更高的產量加成。 “能量！無窮無盡的能量！” 希夫

Text: Stirling Generator Upgrade (Plutonium Core) - Increased Power production while opened. "Nor are we the culmination of evolution, except in the sense that there has never been another species so bizarrely ingenious that it could create both iambic pentameter and plutonium." David Quammen
Translation: 斯特靈發電機升級（鈽核心）- 在開啟的情況下，可以提高電力產量。 “我們並不是進化的頂點，只是在某種意義上，沒有任何其它物種擁有如此古怪的天賦。既能寫出抑揚格五音步詩，又能精煉出鈽金屬。” 戴維·誇曼

Text: Schools can train the Workaholic and Hippie traits. Taking student exchange programs to a whole other level.
Translation: 學校可以訓練工作狂與嬉皮特性。 將學生交換專案提高到一個全新的層次。

Text: Colonists gain bonus work performance when all their stats are in the green. "Frankly, though, I think most people can learn a lot more than they think they can." Elon Musk
Translation: 當殖民地居民所有屬性都為綠色時，會額外獲得工作效率。 “不過老實說，我覺得絕大部分人能學會的東西，都比他們自己想像的要多得多。” 埃隆·馬斯克

Text: Rocket travel time to and from Earth reduced by %. Plasma engines have numerous advantages over chemical rockets. All that is left to do is make sure they don't explode on launch.
Translation: 火箭往返地球的飛行時間縮短%。 與傳統的化學染料火箭相比，等離子火箭在各個方面都更有優勢。只要保證在發射的時候不要爆炸就行了。

Text: Drone Hubs no longer require Power or maintenance. Self-sustainable Drone Hubs are of paramount importance in expanding our presence on Mars.
Translation: 無人機中心不再需要電力與維護。 可以自給自足的無人機中心，是人類在火星殖民任務的重中之重。

Text: Factory Upgrade (Automation) - Lowers the amount of Workers needed in factories. Robots are poised to take our jobs here on Mars as well.
Translation: 工廠升級（自動化）- 減少工廠內需要的工人數量。 就算到了火星，機器人也在搶我們的飯碗。

Text: New Dome: Diamond Dome () - A diamond shaped Dome which has space for two Spires. "Diamonds are nothing more than chunks of coal that stuck to their jobs." Malcolm Forbes
Translation: 新穹頂：鑽石穹頂（）- 鑽石型結構的穹頂，可以容納兩座尖塔。 “鑽石，不過是一群堅守崗位的碳原子而已。” 馬爾科姆·福布斯

Text: Discover the reason behind the unexpected overnight gene re-writing of your colonists.
Translation: 查明殖民地居民的基因在一夜之間被突然改寫的原因。

Text: Dedicate your research towards the initiative for discovering a Cure for cancer.
Translation: 致力於探索研究治癒癌症的方法。

Text: The Dust Sickness is affecting more and more colonists we need to find a cure as soon as possible. Once the cure is found afflicted colonists will lose the Dust Sickness trait.
Translation: 患上沙塵病的殖民地居民越來越多了，我們得儘快研發出療法。研發出療法後，患病的殖民地居民會失去沙塵病特性。

Text: Increases the chance that a Colonist will have or gain a rare trait.
Translation: 殖民地居民擁有或獲得稀有特性的機率上升。

Text: Redesign the MOXIE unit from the ground up to remove all design flaws and patchworks and increase air production by <param1>.
Translation: 重新設計氧氣生成裝置，除去所有設計缺陷和臨時拼湊的部分，並使氧氣產量提升<param1>。

Text: Help Lambda Industries analyze the data from their space telescope deployed near Mars.
Translation: 幫助拉姆達工業集團分析他們部署在火星附近的太空望遠鏡發來的資料。
Old Text: Help Lambda Industries analyze the data from their space telesope deployed near Mars.
Old Translation: 幫助拉姆達工業集團分析他們部署在火星附近的太空望遠鏡發來的資料。

Text: Deactivate the Rogue Nanites to stop their destructive effect on your Colony.
Translation: 關閉失控的奈米機器人以防止其對你的殖民地造成破壞。

Text: Analyze the abnormal behavior of the Rogue Nanites and the reasons for the glitch.
Translation: 分析失控奈米機器人的異常行為以及故障原因。

Text: Discover what is causing the cable faults related to Stirling Generators and fix the issue.
Translation: 查明與斯特靈發電機相關的電纜故障的原因並排除此故障。
斯特靈發電機電纜故障

Text: Complete this research to immediately discover several new metal and rare metal deposits.
Translation: 完成此研究課立刻發現若干新金屬和稀有金屬資源點。

Text: Decipher the secret contents of a strange message discovered in a strange probe on the surface of Mars.
Translation: 破解在火星表面怪異探測器裡發現的奇怪訊息的祕密內容。

Text: Investigate the reason behind the critical malfunction of one of our Fusion Reactors. You won't be able to construct new Fusion Reactors until this tech has been researched.
Translation: 調查我們一處核融合反應爐發生嚴重故障的原因。此技術研究完成後才能建造新的核融合反應爐。

Text: Investigates the inexplicable crimes committed by Arcology residents.
Translation: 調查生態建築居民令人費解的犯罪行為。

Text: Our initial design for Wind Turbines is underperforming. We need a better one taking into account the real Martian conditions.
Translation: 我們之前設計的風力發電機表現不佳。我們需要根據火星的真實條件製造出更好的型號。

Text: Moisture Vaporator Upgrade (Hygroscopic Coating) - Water production increased by %. With its mechanical simplicity and applicability to any point on Mars's surface, the Water-Vapor Adsorption Reactor technology can extract water directly from the Martian atmosphere.
Translation: 水氣蒐集站升級（吸水塗料）- 水資源產量提高%。 這種水蒸氣吸附反應器結構簡單，適用性強，可以直接從火星大氣中獲取水資源。

Text: New Building: Farm () - Produces Food. Large in-Dome building which is more work-efficient and requires no Power. "They say once you grow crops somewhere you’ve officially colonized it." Andy Weir – The Martian
Translation: 新建築：農場 （）- 可以生產食物。穹頂中的大型建築，工作效率更高，且不需要電力。 “他們說，只要你在一個地方種了莊稼，那裡就算是你的殖民地了。” 安迪·威爾 - 《火星救援》

Text: New Building: Fungal Farm () - An out-Dome building that produces Food. "All fungi are edible. Some fungi are only edible once." Terry Pratchett
Translation: 新建築：真菌農場（）- 建造在穹頂外的建築，可以生產食物。 “所有的菌類都能吃，不過其中一部分只能吃一次。” 特里·普拉切特

Text: MOXIE Upgrade (Magnetic Filtering) - Oxygen production increased by %. Magnetic filters block ferromagnetic metal contaminants as well as weakly magnetic particles from the Martian atmosphere when inhaled by our MOXIEs, greatly increasing their efficiencies.
Translation: 氧氣生成裝置升級（磁性過濾）- 氧氣產量增加%。 當我們的氧氣生成裝置吸入火星大氣時，磁性過濾網會阻擋大氣中的磁性金屬汙染和弱磁粒子，大大提高裝置效率。

Text: New Spire Building: Water Reclamation System () - drastically reduces the Water consumption of the Dome. Water on Mars is abundant, yet it is mostly underground and in a frozen state – making it, while within reach, still difficult and expensive to mine. This makes recycling necessary to ensure a steady water supply.
Translation: 新尖塔建築：水資源回收系統（）- 大幅減少穹頂的水資源消耗。 雖然火星的水資源富足，但大多數為地下水或處於冰凍狀態。這類水資源雖然近在咫尺，但開採工作成本高、難度大。水資源回收系統可以保障穩定的水資源供給。

Text: Unlock new crops in Farms and Hydroponic Farms that provide Oxygen and improve soil quality. From the salad you eat to the air you breathe, plants have a fundamental role to play for humanity well beyond Earth.
Translation: 解鎖農場和水耕農場的新作物，不僅能供氧，還能提高土壤品質。 無論是用來飽腹的沙拉，還是呼吸所用的空氣，植物對離開地球的人類存活起著至關重要的作用。

Text: Martianborn Colonists graduate faster in Universities and Sanatoriums and have higher chance to gain Perks from Schools. New Building: Large Nursery () - A larger nursery for housing more children. Certain restrictions that still persist on Earth derived from religion and general conservatism are absent here on Mars. As a result, we have the freedom to genetically enhance our newborns and hone their already-sharp minds to a sharp point.
Translation: 火星之子殖民者從大學和療養院畢業更快，而且有機率從學校獲得特長。 新建築：大型幼兒園 () - 更寬敞的幼兒園，可以照顧更多兒童。 宗教信仰與保守主義思想限制了地球的發展，而這些東西在火星上蕩然無存。因此，我們能放開手腳對新生兒進行基因強化，讓他們已經出色的思想更上一層樓。

Text: Farms increase the Comfort of all residences in the Dome. Seeing something green against the endless reddish barrens of Mars can be quite therapeutic.
Translation: 農場可提高穹頂內所有住宅的舒適度。 為赤紅的火星偶爾新增一抹綠意，這有益於身心健康。

Text: Residences in Basic Domes, Micro Domes and Barrel Domes have improved Comfort. “One touch of nature makes the whole world kin.” William Shakespeare
Translation: 基礎穹頂、微型穹頂與筒型穹頂內的居民可以獲得更高舒適度。 “接觸大自然能讓全世界其樂融融。” 威廉·莎士比亞

Text: New Spire Building: Medical Center () - has larger capacity and is more effective than the Infirmary. “The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.” William Osler
Translation: 新尖塔建築：醫療中心（）空間更大的醫療中心，比醫務室效率更高。 “好的醫生治病，更好的醫生調理患者。” 威廉·奧斯勒

Text: Unlock new crops in Farms and Hydroponic Farms that provide better Food yields. The overall reputation of GMO grown foods has increased dramatically when the only other alternative for food is red dirt.
Translation: 農場和水耕農場解鎖新作物，食物產量更高。 除了基因改造食品，能吃的東西就只剩下紅土了。當人類面臨這種窘境時，基改食品的名聲發生了天翻地覆的變化。

Text: New Building: Biorobotics Workshop () - a vocation building that allows colonists to experiment with biorobots (counts towards the workshop milestone). Consumes Machine Parts. "We are fascinated with robots because they are reflections of ourselves." Ken Goldberg
Translation: 新建築：生化人工坊（）- 職業性建築，殖民地居民可以在這裡進行生化人相關實驗 （工作結果會計入工坊里程碑中）。需要消耗機械零件。 “我們之所以熱衷於機器人，是因為它們就是我們自身的展現。” 肯·戈德堡

Text: Water consumption of Domes reduced by %. "No water, no life. No blue, no green." Sylvia Earle
Translation: 穹頂的水資源消耗減少%。 “沒有水，就沒有生命。沒有海洋，沒有森林。” 西爾維婭·厄爾

Text: Farm, Hydroponic Farm & Fungal Farm Upgrade: Automation - Decreases number of workers. Now that we have adapted crops to the Martian environment we can mechanize some procedures.
Translation: 農場，水耕農場與真菌農場升級：自動化 - 減少工人的數量。 既然已經讓作物適應了火星的環境，那麼部分程式就可以交給機器處理了。

Text: New Spire Building: Hanging Gardens () - a beautiful park complex that greatly improves the Comfort of all Residences in the Dome. One of humanity’s most enduring and fanciful legends from the ancient past is made a reality on Mars.
Translation: 新尖塔建築：空中花園（）- 美麗的複合式公園，大幅提高穹頂內所有住宅的舒適度。 人類歷史上最長久、最別出心裁的傳說，如今在火星上變為了現實。

Text: Medical Center Upgrade (Holographic Scanner) - Increases birth rate in the Dome. Holographic technologies can significantly improve medical diagnostics and monitoring procedures.
Translation: 醫療中心升級（全息掃描器）- 提高穹頂的出生率。 全息成像技術能顯著改良醫療診斷與監測程式。

Text: New Building: Moisture Vaporator () - Produces Water from the atmosphere. Doesn't produce during Dust Storms. "What I really need is a drone that understands the binary language of moisture vaporators." Unknown Martian Colonist
Translation: 新建築：水氣蒐集站（）- 可以從大氣中搜集水分，在沙塵暴期間無法運轉。 “我真正需要的，是一架能理解水氣蒐集站二進位制語言的無人機。” 佚名火星殖民地居民

Text: Infirmary & Medical Center Upgrade (Rejuvenation Treatment) - Improves Service Comfort and provides Relaxation, allowing Colonists to visit and gain Comfort. You haven’t truly colonized a planet until you build the first Spa center on it.
Translation: 醫務室與醫療中心升級（回春治療）- 提高服務舒適度並提供放鬆治療，造訪此地的服務舒適度可以獲得舒適度。 連水療中心都沒有的殖民地，根本算不上真正的殖民地。

Text: Retirement age and death from old age happen later in the Colonists' lifespan. "Live long and prosper" Vulcan Salute
Translation: 殖民地居民的退休年齡更晚，壽命也會變得更長。 “生生不息，繁榮昌盛。” 瓦肯人的祝福手勢

Text: New Wonder: Geoscape Dome () - A slice of Earth on Mars, this Dome has high Comfort and increases the Sanity of its inhabitants on every Sol. "It's a fixer-upper of a planet but we could make it work." Elon Musk
Translation: 新奇觀：地景穹頂（）- 火星上的地球一隅。這種穹頂可以增加所有內部居民的舒適度，而且每個太陽日都能提高居民的理智度。 “這就像是給一整顆行星搞裝修一樣，不過我們還是做到了。” 埃隆·馬斯克

Text: Rocket Cargo Space increased by kg. The fuel section is by far the largest and, when full, the heaviest part of any rocket. This makes developing more compressed fuels especially important when striving to bring more to Mars with fewer rockets.
Translation: 火箭貨艙容量提高公斤。 到目前為止，滿載火箭中的燃料模組不僅體積巨大，也是整個火箭最沉重的部分。因此，開發壓縮燃料尤其重要，這樣才能以攜帶更多貨物前往火星。

Text: Allows the clearing of salvaged and destroyed buildings. We have reached the point where we must do away with old buildings on Mars to make way for new ones.
Translation: 可以清除廢舊和被摧毀的建築。 考慮到當下的處境，我們必須拆除火星上的舊建築，為新建築騰出空間。

Text: New Building: Polymer Factory () - Produces Polymers from Water and Fuel. New Building: Fuel Refinery () - Produces Fuel from Water. Resolving the obvious problems with water pressure in Low-G environments will allow for more complex hydro-synthetic procedures to be done on-site on Mars.
Translation: 新建築：聚合物工廠（）- 可使用水資源與燃料製造聚合物。 新建築：燃料精煉廠（）- 可以使用水資源製造燃料。 這一技術可以解決低重力環境下的水壓問題，使人們能夠在火星上開展更為複雜的聚合工序。

Text: Rockets and Shuttles require less Fuel. The scarcity of Martian-made rocket fuel options has made for our first true contribution towards rocket engine efficiency.
Translation: 降低火箭與穿梭機需要的燃料。 由於火星火箭能選擇的燃料範圍有限，我們必須首先解決火箭引擎效率的問題。

Text: New Building: Apartments () - A Residential Building that houses many Colonists. "I suggest that going to Mars means permanence on the planet - a mission by which we are building up a confidence level to become a two-planet species." Buzz Aldrin
Translation: 新建築：公寓（）- 可以安置許多殖民地居民的住宅樓。 “我認為，前往火星就意味著在火星上永久居住。這個任務會給我們帶來更多信心，讓我們成為跨星球的物種。” 巴茲·奧爾德林

Text: Passenger Rockets carry more Colonists. Better design patterns and lighter, tougher materials have all contributed to a more advanced and compact rocket passenger module.
Translation: 客運火箭可以額外運載位殖民地居民。 使用更加輕便、更加堅固的材料，採用更加出色的設計之後，客運火箭的客運艙也會變得更加尖端、更加緊湊。

Text: Water, Oxygen and Power storage capacity expanded by %. Life support reserves are essential for the survival of the Colony. Fortunately, a new method of compressing fluids in low-gravity environments can help us increase our reserve capacity greatly.
Translation: 水資源、氧氣與電力儲存容量提高%。 維生儲備對殖民地的生死存亡至關重要。幸好，有了低重力環境的新式液體壓縮技術後，我們可以大幅度提高儲備容量。

Text: New Dome: Medium () - A medium-sized Dome. New Dome: Trigon () - A triangle base Dome. New Building: Low-G Amusement Park () - A service building which provides Satisfaction for Tourists. Gaining experience in actually building constructions on Mars rather than just hypothesizing has vastly advanced our off-Earth architectural capabilities.
Translation: 新穹頂：中型穹頂（）- 中等尺寸的穹頂。 新穹頂：三角穹頂（）- 三角型的穹頂。 新建築：低重力遊樂園（）- 一種為遊客提供滿意度的服務建築。 積累在火星實地房屋建造的經驗大幅提高了我們在外星球造建築的能力。
Old Text: New Dome: Medium () - A medium-sized Dome. New Dome: Trigon () - A triangle base Dome. New Building: Low-G Amusement Park () - A service building which provides Satisfaction for Tourists Gaining experience in actually building constructions on Mars rather than just hypothesizing has vastly advanced our off-Earth architectural capabilities.
Old Translation: 新穹頂：中型穹頂（）- 中等尺寸的穹頂。 新穹頂：三角穹頂（）- 三角型的穹頂。 新建築：低重力遊樂園（）- 一種為遊客提供滿意度的服務建築。 積累在火星實地房屋建造的經驗大幅提高了我們在外星球造建築的能力。

Text: In-Dome buildings require maintenance less often. Shifting focus away from "fixing it" to "avoiding it" is the natural step forward for any Martian habitat.
Translation: 降低穹頂內建築的維護頻率。 將重心從“解決問題”轉變為“避免問題”，是所有火星殖民地自然發展的必然結果。

Text: New Buildings: Smart Homes (), Smart Complex () , Smart Apartments () - Provides a very comfortable living space for Colonists. Residents will recover Sanity when resting. New Building: Hotel () - Provides luxurious hotel rooms for Tourists and Colonists. Tourists gain satisfaction when resting. New Building: Retirement Home () - Provides very comfortable living space for Seniors. Perfecting the Martian household - for a better life beyond Earth.
Translation: 新建築：智慧住宅（）和智慧複合式住宅（），智慧公寓() - 可為殖民地居民提供非常舒適的生活空間，居民在休息時會恢復額外的理智度。 新建築：旅館（），為遊客和殖民地居民提供奢華的旅館房間。遊客在休息時獲得滿足。 新建築：養老院 () - 為老年人提供舒適的生活空間。 火星的建築不斷精益求精 - 給人帶來比在地球上更優質的生活。

Text: New Building: Electronics Factory () - Produces Electronics from Rare Metals. "In the end, I hope there's a little note somewhere that says I designed a good computer." Steve Wozniak
Translation: 新建築：電子元件工廠（）- 可以使用稀有金屬製造電子元件。 “到最後，我希望能在哪裡找到一張紙條，上面寫著，我確實設計了一臺出色的電腦。” 史蒂夫·沃茲尼亞克

Text: New Building: Large Water Tank () - stores very large amounts of water. New Building: Large Oxygen Tank () - stores very large amounts of oxygen. "If there's magic on this planet, it is contained in water." Loren Eiseley
Translation: 新建築：大型水箱（） — 可儲存巨量水資源。 新建造：大型氧氣罐（）- 可以儲存巨量氧氣。 “如果這顆星球上有什麼魔法，那它一定藏在水中。” 洛倫·艾斯利

Text: New Spire Building: Arcology () - provides comfortable living space for many colonists. Martian settlements are becoming less just mere shelters and more of fully fledged cities –cities with unique vibes and even architecture.
Translation: 新尖塔建築：生態建築（）- 可以為大量殖民地居民提供舒適的生活空間。 火星殖民地將逐漸脫離庇護所的單純概念。它將依靠具備獨具一格的環境與建築，衍生為羽翼漸豐的城市。

Text: Building construction costs in Metals & Concrete reduced by % (excluding Domes). A mix of off-world pride, a unique and ambitious style, and inspired creativity has resulted in more efficient structural design.
Translation: 建造建築時，金屬與混凝土的消耗量減少%（穹頂除外）。 這種新結構是設計師的自信、野心與創造性結合而成的產物，它採用了更加高效的結構設計。

Text: Out-Dome buildings require maintenance less often. There is a difference between knowing that conditions on Mars will take a heavy toll on man-made buildings and actually experiencing and fixing the damage done. The latter paints a better picture for improvement.
Translation: 穹頂外建築所需的維護頻率降低。 只是從書本上知道火星環境會對建築產生影響，與實際參與過建築維護修理工作絕不相同。人類在火星上的實際維護經驗，為建築改良打下了堅實的基礎。

Text: Allows the construction of Rockets on Mars. Passenger Rockets carry more Colonists. Cutting edge methods in space optimization and Comfort-centric designs make for a more practical Passenger Module.
Translation: 允許在火星上建造火箭。客運火箭可以額外運載位殖民地居民。 透過空間優化尖端技術與著眼於舒適感的設計，客運火箭的客運模組變得更加實際有效。

Text: New Dome: Mega () - The most advanced and spacious Dome design. New Dome: Mega Trigon () - A bigger triangle Dome. We have reached a proficiency in engineering that surpasses the most ambitious architectural achievements on Earth.
Translation: 新穹頂：超大型穹頂（）：最先進、最寬敞的穹頂結構建築。 新穹頂：超大型三角穹頂（）- 更加宏偉的三角穹頂。 我們對工程學的精通程度，已經超出了整個地球最令人稱奇的建築成就。

Text: Rare Metals Extractor production increased by %. Introducing state of the art plasma torches to our Rare Metals Extractors show a great promise for boosts in production.
Translation: 稀有金屬挖掘站產量增加%。 採用了頂尖的等離子槍之後，稀有金屬挖掘站在產量方面有了極大的提高。

Text: New Building: Waste Rock Processor () - slowly converts Waste Rock into Concrete. The utilization of lots of waste rock by reprocessing it into becoming concrete-grade regolith as part of our "Nothing Is Wasted" efficiency policy.
Translation: 新建築：礦渣處理站（）- 將礦渣慢慢轉化為混凝土。 無人機可以使用垃圾場中的礦渣開採混凝土。這項技術可以將礦渣重加工為混凝土等級的風化層，這也符合了“一切資源都不能浪費”的指導方針。

Text: Wonder: Space Elevator () - Exports Rare Metals to Earth and offers resupply materials and prefabs at preferential prices. "The space elevator will be built about 50 years after everyone stops laughing." Arthur C. Clarke
Translation: 奇觀：太空電梯（）- 可以更高的價格將稀有金屬出口至地球，同時以更低的成本補充資源、購買預製件。 “只要人類不再嘲笑這個設想，50年後太空電梯就會面世。” 阿瑟· C ·克拉克

Text: A "surface scratcher" step towards understanding the elusive chemical properties of the mystery Cubes, what dangers the Cubes might pose and how to manage them.
Translation: 設法研究謎之立方體獨特的化學特性、潛在的危險及應對方法，這只是研究謎之立方體的一小步而已。

Text: The Spontaneous High-Energy Particle Interception and Deflection technology allows our Sensor Towers to detect and guide the materialization of a Black Cube to a safe location.
Translation: 透過自發性高能量粒子攔截與偏轉技術，我們的感應塔能夠檢測到黑色立方體，並將實體化的黑色立方體引導至安全地點。
自發性高能量粒子技術

Text: Aims to find a way to capture and dismantle an alien Dredger by studying its structure and physical properties.
Translation: 透過研究外星挖掘機的結構和物理性質，完成挖掘機的捕獲和拆卸工作。

Text: An attempt to decode the transmissions sent out by Dredgers in order to predict their behavior and landing sites.
Translation: 嘗試解碼挖掘機發出的傳輸訊息，來預測其行為和著陸點。

Text:
Water Extractor, Concrete Extractor, Metals Extractor and Rare Metals Extractor gain +<param1>% bonus production.

<grey>Studying the behavior and structure of the Dredgers, our scientists are able to develop revolutionary advancements in mining equipment and archaeological survey</grey>
Translation:
水資源挖掘站、混凝土挖掘站、金屬挖掘站與稀有金屬挖掘站產量提高<param1>%。

<grey>透過研究挖掘機的行為和結構，我們的科學家終於在採礦裝置和地質勘測領域獲得了革命性的進步。</grey>

Text:
Decoy Building that keeps single Spheres into captivity.

<grey>A theory on the purpose of the Spheres, how they navigate and how to contain the threat that they represent.</grey>
Translation:
用來捕獲單個球體的誘餌性建築。

<grey>關於球體意圖的理論，關於它們如何進行導航，以及如何遏制它們再次出現帶來威脅。</grey>
Context: TechPreset Purpose of the Spheres description
TechPreset Purpose of the Spheres display_name

Text: A way to immunize our colonists from the negative health effects of the Mirror Spheres.
Translation: 讓殖民地居民免疫鏡面球體帶來的負面健康效果的方法。

Text:
Mirror Spheres in captivity may be broken down to their building parts.

<grey>An attempt at understanding the climate changing devices that are the Mirror Spheres.</grey>
Translation:
捕獲的鏡面球體可以拆解為建造材料。

<grey>試圖瞭解這種被稱為鏡面球體的儀器，是如何改變周圍的氣象的。</grey>

Text: Push to decipher the Dreamers’ brain patterns while in trance.
Translation: 試圖解析入夢人在出神狀態下的大腦模式。

Text: Track down Number Six's physical location.
A stationary turret that protects the nearby area from hostile vehicles and incoming meteors.
Translation: 這種固定炮塔可以保護附近區域免受敵對載具和隕石損害。

Text: Focus your research to help the development of the Beyond Earth Initiative projects. Each time the research is completed you can refocus your research towards a new project. This tech is repeatable and can be researched multiple times. "The human race is a remarkable creature, one with great potential which I hope the Beyond Earth initiative will display for all to believe in." Rede Goddenberry
Translation: 集中研究力量，推進超越地球倡議專案。每次完成研究後，您都可以更改研究方向，啟動新的專案。 這項技術是重複性技術，可以多次研發。 “人類種族非常卓越，而且擁有無限的潛力。透過超越地球倡議，我希望每個人都能相信這一點。” 里德·戈登貝利

Text: Series of dangerous experiments which could lead to the discovery of a cure for the Wildfire infection.
Translation: 經過這一系列危險的實驗，最終有可能會研製出可以治療野火感染的藥物。

Text: Concrete Plant & Extractors Upgrade (Amplify) - Increases production by % but also increases Power consumption by . "From the first day to this, sheer greed was the driving spirit of civilization." Friedrich Engels
Translation: 挖掘站升級（增幅）- 產量提高%，但耗電量也會提高。 “從古至今，純粹的貪婪一直都是文明的精神驅動力。 弗里德里希·恩格斯

Text: Sensor Towers no longer require Power or maintenance. Reliable sensor data is instrumental for the exploration of Mars.
Translation: 感應塔不再需要電力與維護。 有了可靠的感測器資料，火星探索會變得更加順利。

Text: New Building: Subsurface Heater () - Increases the local temperature in cold areas and protects nearby buildings from Cold Waves. Consumes Water. Mars has an average surface temperature of −55 degrees Celsius, with inclinations to fall well beneath −130.
Translation: 新建築：地下加熱器（）- 可提高寒冷地區的溫度，並保護附近的建築免受寒流侵襲。會消耗水資源。 火星平均地表溫度為攝氏 -55度，寒冷的時候甚至會低至攝氏 -130度以下。

Text: Wind Turbine Upgrade (Polymer Blades): Power production increased by %. Hands-on observations and problem solving in the low gravity environment of Mars have helped our engineers come up with solutions for increased Wind Turbine efficiency.
Translation: 風力發電機升級（聚合物葉片）：電力產量提高%。 人類透過在低重力環境中的觀察和解決問題，為引擎開發提供了經驗，由此提高了風力發電機的工作效率。

Text: Probes are cheaper and can deep scan. "The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you." Neil deGrasse Tyson
Translation: 探測器成本更低，且能進行深層掃描。 “宇宙如何運轉，無需向你解釋。” 奈爾·德葛拉司·泰森

Text: New Building: Stirling Generator () - Generates Power. While closed the Generator is protected from dust, but produces less Power. The Stirling Radioisotope Generator is a generator based on a Stirling engine powered by a large radioisotope heater unit.
Translation: 新建築：斯特靈發電機（）- 可以產生電力。收起時雖然可以防塵，但產生的電力也會降低。 斯特靈放射同位素發電機採用了斯特靈引擎，這種引擎透過大型放射性同位素元件進行加熱。

Text: New Building: Atomic Accumulator () - Stores electrical Power. Has huge capacity but charges slowly. "History will remember the twentieth century for two technological developments: atomic energy and space flight." Neil Armstrong
Translation: 新建築：原子蓄電站（）- 可以儲存電力。容量極大，但充電速度緩慢。 “二十世紀的兩項科技成就將永遠載入史冊：原子能與航天飛行。” 尼爾·阿姆斯特朗

Text: Solar Panels are gradually cleaned from dust when closed, resulting in less frequent maintenance. Solar Panels are inherently vulnerable to dust, more so than any other equipment used on Mars. Thus automatic dust repulsion systems are put in place to spread out maintenance periods.
Translation: 太陽能板關閉時會逐漸清掃灰塵，從而降低維護頻率。 與火星上的其它裝置相比，塵土對太陽能板的影響更為嚴重。自動排塵系統可以延長太陽能板的維護週期。

Text: Refineries & Factories Upgrade (Amplify) - Increases production by % but also increases Power consumption by . Scaling power production to meet the needs of manufacturing is a challenge on Mars.
Translation: 工廠升級（增幅）- 產量提高%，但耗電量也會提高。 提高發電量以滿足生產需求，這是火星帶給我們的挑戰。

Text: Sectors can now be scanned again for deep deposits. Exploiting these deposits requires additional technologies. We've barely scratched the surface of what we can learn about the Martian environment.
Translation: 可以再次掃描區域，發現深層資源點。挖掘深層資源點同樣需要對應的新技術。 我們對火星環境的瞭解仍然是九牛一毛。

Text: New Building: VR Workshop () - a vocation building that allows colonists to experiment with virtual reality (counts towards the workshop milestone). Consumes Electronics. "How do you know it's Sci-Fi? VR is commercially viable." Shams Jorjani
Translation: 新建築：虛擬現實工坊（）- 職業性建築，殖民地居民可以在這裡進行虛擬現實相關實驗 （工作結果會計入工坊里程碑中）。需要消耗電子元件。 “這哪是什麼科幻小說？從商業層面而言，虛擬現實完全可以實現。” 夏姆斯·朱漢尼

Text: Can exploit deep Water deposits. Water reserves the size of Lake Superior are predicted to be present deep beneath the surface of Mars.
Translation: 可以開採深層水資源資源點。 據預測，火星地底深處存在蘇必利爾湖規模程度的水資源。

Text: Can exploit deep Metal and Rare Metal deposits. Digging deep can be dangerous but it is necessary for sustained metal production.
Translation: 可以開採深層金屬與稀有金屬資源點。 雖然深層挖掘伴隨風險，但對維持金屬產量很有必要。

Text: New Building: Fusion Reactor () - Generates Power. Out-Dome building which requires Workers to operate. "I would like nuclear fusion to become a practical power source. It would provide an inexhaustible supply of energy, without pollution or global warming." Stephen Hawking
Translation: 新建築：核融合反應爐（）- 可以產生電力。穹頂外建築，需要工人才能正常運轉。 “我希望核融合可以成為實用的電力來源。核融合可以提供永不枯竭的能源，也不會造成汙染或全球暖化。” 史蒂芬·霍金

Text: New Building: MDS Laser () - Destroys falling meteors in its range. The low density of the Martian atmosphere makes meteors especially dangerous; this is why installing a reliable defense system against meteors is critical for our Colony’s long term survival.
Translation: 新建築：反隕石鐳射炮（）- 可摧毀射程內的隕石。 由於火星大氣密度低，隕石極為危險。因此，對殖民地的長期生存而言，裝備可靠的防禦系統至關重要。

Text: New Building: Triboelectric Scrubber () - Emits pulses which reduce the Dust accumulated on buildings in its range. While the triboelectric effect is not very predictable or precise, it can be entrusted with removing dust from our structures.
Translation: 新建築：摩擦電清洗器（）- 可以釋放脈衝，減少範圍內建築上的塵土。 雖然摩擦起電效應難以控制，精度也不高，但非常適合清除建築物上的塵土。

Text: Low-G Lab, Research Lab, Hawking Institute & Network Node Upgrade (Amplify) - Increases production by % but also increases Power consumption. "Your best and wisest refuge from all troubles is in your science." Ada Lovelace
Translation: 低重力實驗室、研究實驗室、霍金研究所與網路節點升級（增幅）- 增加%產量，但同時增加電力消耗。 “你最好且最明智的庇護所是科學。” 阿達·洛芙萊斯

Text: Fusion Reactor Upgrade (Auto-regulator) - reduces the amount of workers. "Our present nuclear fusion reactors are classified by the methods used to support the nuclear fusion reaction, which takes place at a temperature much hotter than the surface of the Sun." Wilson Greatbatch
Translation: 核融合反應爐升級（自動調節）- 降低需要的工人數量。 “目前的核融合反應堆，是根據支撐核融合反應的方法進行分類。核融合發生的溫度比太陽表面溫度還要高。” 威爾遜·格雷特巴奇

Text: Wonder: Artificial Sun () - Produces colossal amounts of Power. It provides light for nearby Solar Panels during the dark hours and heats the surrounding area. Consumes vast amounts of Water on startup. Unlocking the secrets of the stars is now within the grasp of humanity.
Translation: 奇觀：人造太陽（）- 可以提供鉅額電力。它可以在夜間為外圍太陽能板提供光源，並加熱周邊區域。啟動時會消耗鉅額水資源。 如今，人類已經掌握了行星執行的祕密。

Text: Wonder: Omega Telescope () - Gives access to new Breakthrough Technologies and reduces overall research costs. A milestone in human history has been achieved – feeling comfortable enough living on an alien world, so much so that some people are already turning their curiosity towards the endless expanse of space once more.
Translation: 奇觀：歐米茄望遠鏡（）- 可以解鎖新的突破性技術並降低整體研究成本。 這是人類發展史上的里程碑 - 人類已經在一顆全新的星球上成功地創造了舒適的生活。正因如此，一部分人的好奇心已經再次投向了無垠的太空。

Text: The RC Transport harvests resources faster and its maximum storage is increased by . The remote location of some resource deposits calls for Transport Rover optimizations.
Translation: 遙控運輸車採集資源速度更快，最大載重量增加。 部分資源點位置偏遠，需要對運輸車進行優化才能有效開採。

Text: Drones and Rovers move % faster. An engine design optimized for low-gravity environments.
Translation: 無人機與探測車的移動速度提高%。 優化過的引擎設計，適合低重力環境。

Text: Drone Hubs are constructed with additional Drones and the maximum number of Drones is increased by . Drones being the backbone for most of the heavy and dangerous labor on Mars, it is essential our Hubs have greater operating capacity in order to employ more Drones at any given time.
Translation: 無人機中心建成後額外獲得架無人機，無人機最大數量增加。 在火星上，絕大多數費力和危險的勞動都由無人機負責。因此無人機中心必須具備更加優秀的運營能力，才能同時控制更多無人機。

Text: Generate per Sol for each RC Explorer vehicle. Multiple vehicles result in collaboration losses. AI specifically tailored for our Explorers will think for itself, gathering only the data they have deemed could be of interest. The above will greatly contribute to our research initiatives.
Translation: 每有一輛遙控探索者載具，每個太陽日就會獲得。如果有多輛探索者，加成效果會遞減。 為探索者量身定製的人工智慧。它會自己思考，自動搜集可能有價值的資料。這對我們的研究會大有幫助。

Text: New Building: Drone Hub () - Controls Drones and allocates them to different jobs. We can now rely upon ourselves to build the complex Hubs that control our de facto heavy labor force.
Translation: 新建築：無人機中心（）- 可以控制無人機，為它們分配不同的任務。 如今我們自己擁有了建造無人機中心的技術，可以自行控制這些重型勞力。

Text: New Buildings: Storages () - a set of storages that can store large amount of resources but have to be constructed and require power. "The more storage you have, the more stuff you accumulate." Alexis Stewart
Translation: 新建築：自動倉庫（）- 一系列倉儲建築，可以儲存大量的資源。但需要建造完成後才能使用，還需要電力才能運作。 “倉儲空間越大，可以積攢的東西就越多。” 亞歷克西斯·斯圖爾特

Text: Drone battery capacity increased by %. Advances in power accumulator technology allow Drones to function longer before needing to recharge.
Translation: 無人機的電池容量提高%。 蓄電池技術獲得了進步，無人機的續航時間也能變得更長。

Text: The RC Commander starts with additional Drones and command limit increased by . Unlocks new Automated Mode for RC Explorer and RC Transport. Developing a specialized AI with greater autonomy and advanced multitasking capabilities will allow our rovers to control more drones simultaneously.
Translation: 遙控指揮車初始擁有額外架無人機，控制上限提高。為遙控探索者和遙控運輸車解鎖新的自動往返模式。 我們為探測車開發出專用人工智慧。這種人工智慧擁有出色的自主性和多線任務處理能力，可以讓探測車同時控制更多無人機。

Text: New Building: Drone Assembler () - Constructs Drone Prefabs from Electronics which can then be used in Drone Hubs to construct new drones. We may now print and assemble entire Drones on Mars with Martian-mined materials.
Translation: 新建築：無人機組裝廠（）- 可以使用電子元件製作無人機預製件。之後，可在無人機中心用預製件製作新的無人機。 如今，我們已經可以透過火星上開採的材料，在火星上列印並組裝整個無人機了。

Text: New Building: Machine Parts Factory () - Produces Machine Parts from Metals. Mastering the peculiarities of Martian ores has allowed us to make 3D Metal Printers, which will serve as the foundation for all future Martian industry.
Translation: 新建築：機械零件工廠（）- 可使用金屬製造機械零件。 我們已經掌握了火星礦物的特性，可以對金屬進行三維加工列印。這將是未來火星工業的奠基石。

Text: New Building: Shuttle Hub () - Houses and refuels Shuttles that facilitate long-range transportation of resources between Depots and resettling of Colonists between Domes. Adapting an air-breathing jet engine to work in the 95% carbon dioxide atmosphere of Mars is a challenge.
Translation: 新建築：穿梭機中心（）- 所有穿梭機都可以在此處停靠、補充燃料，用來進行倉庫之間遠距離運輸任務，以及穹頂間居民再分配的任務。 由於火星的大氣含量95%都是二氧化碳，吸氣式噴射引擎的改造工程確實是一項挑戰。
二氧化碳噴射推進系統

Text: Extractors Upgrade (Fueled Extractor) - Production increased by % as long as the building is supplied with Fuel. 'We should not just consume hydrocarbon fuel but use it to develop nuclear energy, hydro power and renewable energy sources.' Vladimir Putin
Translation: 挖掘站升級（燃料式挖掘站），在挖掘站配備燃料的情況下，產量提高%。 “我們不應該僅僅消耗烴類燃料，而應該利用它們開發核能源、水力能源與可再生能源。” 弗拉基米爾·普京

Text: Refineries & Factories Upgrade (Factory AI) - performance increased by %. After extensive trials and the allocation of many resources to the program, a work-safe AI has been developed to optimize various Factory operations.
Translation: 工廠升級 （工廠人工智慧）- 工作效率提高%。 投入大量資源進行無數次實驗後，人類成功開發出了工廠專用的人工智慧，可以優化各類工廠的工作效率。

Text: Shuttle speed increased by %. Designing shuttles for flight in a low density/low pressure atmosphere is more efficient when designing them in a low density/low pressure atmosphere.
Translation: 穿梭機速度提高%。 只有設身處地在低密度、低氣壓的大氣中進行設計，才能設計出更加適合低密度、低氣壓的穿梭機。

Text: Can construct RC Commander (), RC Transport (), RC Explorer () and RC Safari (). Machine-part printing devices have reached a fidelity high enough to print the intricate parts necessary to assemble state of the art Rovers.
Translation: 可以建造遙控指揮車（）、遙控運輸車（）、遙控探索者（）和遙控觀景車（）。 機械零件列印裝置的精確度得到了進一步提高，已經足以列印組裝頂尖探測車所需的精密零件。

Text: The maximum number of Shuttles that the Shuttle Hub can house is increased by . Reaching heights unheard of in parking space sciences.
Translation: 穿梭機中心可容納穿梭機的最大數量增加。 這已經是太空科技聞所未聞的進步了。

Text: Shuttle cargo capacity increased by . Advanced shuttle drives deliver more thrust and allow for greater cargo capacity.
Translation: 穿梭機載貨量提高。 這種尖端穿梭機引擎能提供更強大的推進力，也保證了更大的載貨量。

Text: New Spire Building: Network Node () - increases the research output of all Research Labs and Hawking Institutes in the Dome. Hospital Upgrade (Remote Medic) upgrade - decreases the total work slots. Rapid transfer of information and an easier access to it could speed up research several times-fold.
Translation: 新尖塔建築：網路節點 () - 提高穹頂內所有研究實驗室和霍金研究所的科研點數產出。 醫院升級 (遠端醫療) - 降低工作崗位總數。 資訊的快速傳輸和易獲取性能夠成倍加快研發速度。

Text: Wonder: Mohole Mine () - Extracts Metals, Rare Metals and Waste Rock without the need of a deposit, while heating the surrounding area. Moholes are shafts that dig exceptionally deep in the Martian crust, releasing heat as part of a potential terraforming effort and, as a bonus, mining ore.
Translation: 奇觀：莫霍礦井（）- 無需資源點即可開採金屬、稀有金屬與礦渣，同時還能為附近區域供熱。 莫霍礦井能夠深入挖掘火星地殼。不僅能透過挖掘釋放熱能，還能獲得礦物。

Text: Wonder: The Excavator () - Produces Concrete directly from the Martian soil without requiring a deposit. Martian concrete, made from equal parts regolith and sulfur, has some vast improvements over its Earth counterpart. Red concrete is stronger, more durable and can be recycled and reused simply by reheating it.
Translation: 奇觀：挖掘機（）- 無需資源點即可從火星土壤直接生產混凝土。 火星混凝土由風化層和硫磺製成，與地球上的混凝土相比，各方面效能更加優秀。紅混凝土更堅固、更耐久，並且只需再加熱即可重複利用。

Text: More applicants will start to appear on Earth. New Building: TV Studio Workshop () - A workshop building which also generates funds for completing TV shows. PR research aimed at exposing the benefits and positive aspects of life as a Colonist on Mars.
Translation: 地球上將會有更多的應徵者開始報名您的火星計劃。 新建築：電視攝影棚工坊 () - 工坊，完成製作電視節目後可以獲得資金。 公共關係的研究目的，旨在展現火星生活美好與積極的一面。

Text: Engineers and Geologists have + performance when working in their specialty. "Geologists have a saying - rocks remember." Neil Armstrong
Translation: 工程師與地質學家在進行自己擅長的工作時，獲得+工作效率加成。 “地質學家們認為，岩石知道過去發生的一切。” 尼爾·阿姆斯特朗

Text: Increases research provided by sponsor by . "Two planets, one human race – sharing knowledge and coexisting within the Solar System." Martian Scientist
Translation: 贊助人提供的研究點數增加。 “兩個星球，一個種族。分享知識，和諧共存。” 火星科學家

Text: Scientists and Botanists have + performance when working in their specialty. "Hell yeah I'm a botanist! Fear my botany powers!" Andy Weir - The Martian
Translation: 科學家與植物學家在進行自己擅長的工作時，獲得+工作效率加成。 “哈，我就是植物學家！見識見識我的力量吧！” 安迪·威爾 - 《火星救援》

Text: Receive a one-time grant of funding. With the rising media hype about our mission, it is only a matter of social maneuvering to make the first interplanetary crowdfunding campaign a reality.
Translation: 一次性獲得資金。 各大媒體不遺餘力地宣傳著我們的任務。只要經過恰當的社會調控，就能實現第一次太陽系眾籌活動了。

Text: New Building: Martian University () - Trains Scientists, Geologists, Botanists, Medic, Engineers or Security officers. New Building: School Spire () - Teaches positive traits to children and can give the Genius trait after an upgrade. College education is always free on Mars.
Translation: 新建築：火星大學（）- 可以訓練科學家、地質學家、植物學家、醫生或警官。 新建築：學校尖塔 () - 向兒童傳授優良特性，升級後可傳授天才特性。 火星上的大學教育是永久免費的。

Text: License Martian technology for use back on Earth. Earn funding. This tech is repeatable and can be researched multiple times. "Economic exchange between Mars and Earth would be mostly in the form of intellectual property" Elon Musk
Translation: 將火星上的技術專利出口至地球，獲得資金。 這項技術是重複性技術，可以多次研發。 “地球與火星之間的大部分貿易，都將會是智慧財產權貿易。” 埃隆·馬斯克

Text: Lowers the risk of colonists developing flaws after Sanity breakdown. "Beauty is not who you are on the outside, it is the wisdom and time you gave away to save another struggling soul like you." Shannon L. Alder
Translation: 降低殖民地居民理智崩潰後出現缺陷的風險。 “美麗不取決於外表多麼光鮮，而取決於你願意付出多少智慧和時間來解救和你一樣處於痛苦中的人。” 莎倫 · L · 奧爾德

Text: Security Officers and Medics have + performance when working in their specialty. New Building: Hospital () - A larger, more improved version of the Infirmary. One can never be too prepared for the vast array of emergencies that could arise at any given moment on Mars.
Translation: 保全人員與醫療人員在正確的崗位工作時，將獲得額外 + 工作效率加成。 新建築：醫院 () - 空間更大的醫療中心，比醫務室效率更高。 人們永遠無法對火星上隨時可能發生的大量突發事件，做好充分準備。
Old Text: Security Officers and Medics have + performance when working in their specialty. New Building: Hospital () - A larger, more improved version of the Infirmary One can never be too prepared for the vast array of emergencies that could arise at any given moment on Mars.
Old Translation: 保全人員與醫療人員在正確的崗位工作時，將獲得額外 + 工作效率加成。 新建築：醫院 () - 空間更大的醫療中心，比醫務室效率更高。 人們永遠無法對火星上隨時可能發生的大量突發事件，做好充分準備。

Text: Colonists without the proper specialization suffer a lower work penalty. “A jack of all trades is a master of none, but oftentimes better than a master of one.”
Translation: 專業不匹配的殖民地居民在工作時受到的減益效果降低。 “樣樣通，樣樣鬆。但很多時候，多面手比只懂某方面的專家更有用。”

Text: New Building: Hawking Institute () - Generates Research faster than a Research Lab. "Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious." Stephen Hawking
Translation: 新建築：霍金研究所（）- 產出研究點數，比普通的研究實驗室速度更快。 “仰望星空，而不要俯視腳下。試圖發現眼前事物的合理性，去猜想到底宇宙存在的意義。永遠保持好奇心。” 史蒂芬·霍金

Text: New Spire Building: Sanatorium () - treats colonists to remove flaws. "There are no constraints on the human mind, no walls around the human spirit, no barriers to our progress except those we ourselves erect." Ronald Reagan
Translation: 新尖塔建築：療養院 （）- 可以治療殖民地居民，移除他們的缺陷。 “只要我們不作繭自縛，人類的思想將沒有約束，人類的心靈將沒有高牆，人類的進步也不會有障礙。” 羅納德·里根

Text: New Building: Art Workshop () - a vocation building that allows colonists to experiment with different forms of art (counts towards the workshop milestone). Consumes Polymers. "We don't make mistakes, just happy little accidents." Bob Ross
Translation: 新建築：藝術工坊（）- 職業性建築，殖民地居民可以在這裡進行藝術相關實驗 （工作結果會計入工坊里程碑中）。需要消耗聚合物。 “我們從不犯錯，那些只是無傷大雅的小意外。” 鮑勃·羅斯

Text: Decorations have increased Service Comfort. New Building : Amphitheater () - A building where colonists gather to perform or listen to recitals. Visitors receive a Comfort and Satisfaction boost. Reinforcing the notion of a separate and unique Martian culture makes our Colonists more positive and helps them find comfort in the uncertain world which is life on Mars.
Translation: 裝飾可以提供更多服務舒適度。 新建築：露天劇場（）- 殖民地居民聚集在此建築裡表演或欣賞朗誦。提升訪客的舒適度和滿意度。 增強火星獨特文化的概念，這能讓殖民地居民擁有更加積極的心態，也有助於他們在火星生活中獲得舒適感。
Old Text: Decorations have increased Service Comfort. Reinforcing the notion of a separate and unique Martian culture makes our Colonists more positive and helps them find comfort in the uncertain world which is life on Mars.
Old Translation: 装饰可以提供更多服务舒适度。 增強火星獨特文化的概念，這能讓殖民地居民擁有更加積極的心態，也有助於他們在火星生活中獲得舒適感。

Text: Martianborn don't take Sanity damage from disasters. Martianborn grow up in the reality of the everyday dangers of the Red Planet. It bestows upon them an inner strength that is truly a unique Martian quality.
Translation: 火星之子在面臨災害時不會損失理智度。 火星之子在危機四伏的火星中長大，因此也具備了火星居民的獨特品質，那就是堅強的內心。

Text: Martianborn don't take Sanity damage when working in out-Dome buildings. We are born on the Red Planet. We do not fear stepping outside the safety of the Dome. We embrace it.
Translation: 火星之子在穹頂外的建築工作時，不會損失理智度。 我們在火星上出生。我們並不害怕穹頂之外的危險，我們歡迎危險。

Text: Residential Building Upgrade (Home Collective) - Increases the Service Comfort of the building by . A friendly and supportive community is the key to making life easier in the harsh reality of the Red Planet.
Translation: 住宅建築升級（集合式住宅）- 住宅的服務舒適度提高。 想在環境嚴酷的火星上生存下來，友好互助的社群環境必不可少。

Text: License Martian copyrights for use back on Earth. Earn funding. This tech is repeatable and can be researched multiple times. "The conditions of extreme labor shortage combined with a technological culture will tend to drive Martian ingenuity to produce wave after wave of invention." Robert Zubrin
Translation: 將火星上的版權專利出口至地球，獲得資金。 這項技術是重複性技術，可以多次研發。 “火星上勞動力嚴重短缺的現狀，加之火星獨有的科技文化，將會推動才思敏捷的火星人創造出層出不窮的發明。” 羅伯特·祖布林

Text: Sanatorium Upgrade (Behavioral Melding) - replaces removed flaws with random Perks. A more benevolent and productive iteration of 18th century methods.
Translation: 療養院升級（行為融合）- 會以隨機特長替換移除的缺陷。 18世紀治療方法的迭代品，更人性化，也更富有成效。

Text: Wonder: Project Morpheus () - Stimulates the development of new Perks in adult Colonists throughout the entire Colony. "You take the red pill - you stay in Wonderland and I show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes."
Translation: 奇觀：莫菲斯計劃（）- 可以促進整個殖民地成年居民獲得新的特長。 “如果你選擇紅色藥丸，你就能繼續留在這個仙境，我會帶你去看愛麗絲看到的兔子窩究竟有多深。”

Text: The birth rate in any Dome is determined by the number of Male/Female couples at high Comfort.
Translation: 穹頂的生育率取決於舒適度高的男性/女性夫妻數量。

Text: The birth rate in any Dome is determined by the number of Male/Female couples at high Comfort.
Translation: 穹頂的生育率取決於舒適度高的男性/女性夫妻數量。

Text: The birth rate in any Dome is determined by the number of Male/Female couples at high Comfort.
Translation: 穹頂的生育率取決於舒適度高的男性/女性夫妻數量。

Old Text: Other
Old Translation: 其他

Text: Work performance lowered by 10. Can be caused by Sanity breakdowns. +Drinking
Translation: 工作效率降低10。理智崩潰時，可能會導致這種缺陷。+飲酒

Text: Double Sanity loss from disasters. Can be caused by Sanity breakdowns.
Translation: 發生災害時，損失的理智度加倍。理智崩潰時，可能會導致這種缺陷。

Text: Loses health during Dust Storms, even when inside a Dome.
Translation: 即使身處穹頂內部，沙塵暴期間也會損失生命值。
Old Text: Takes damage during Dust Storms, even when inside a Dome.
Old Translation: 即使身處穹頂內部，沙塵暴期間也會受到傷害。

Text: Has a 50% chance to lose 20 Sanity when visiting a Casino. Can be caused by Sanity breakdowns. +Gambling
Translation: 造訪賭場時，有50%機率失去20點理智度。理智崩潰時，可能會導致這種缺陷。+賭博

Text: Eats double rations. Can be caused by Sanity breakdowns. +Dining
Translation: 消耗雙倍食物。理智崩潰時，可能會導致這種缺陷。+用餐

Text: Will randomly visit Medical buildings and take Sanity damage if unable to do so. Interests: +Medical
Translation: 會時常跑去醫院看病。如果無法去醫院，理智度會降低。興趣：+醫療

Text: Can cause a malfunction at workplace (10% chance). Malfunctioning buildings stop working and require maintenance.
Translation: 在崗位工作時可能造成故障（10%機率）。出故障的建築無法繼續運作，需要維護後才能正常工作。

Text: Loses Health each day. Spreads to other Colonists in the Dome.
Translation: 每天都會損失生命值，還會傳染給同一穹頂中的其他居民。

Text: Loses Comfort every day while living in a Dome with population over 30. -Social
Translation: 穹頂居民超過30人的時候，每天都會失去舒適度。-社交

Text: Individual performance decreased by 20 at all jobs.
Increased performance penalty when at low Morale. Can be caused by Sanity breakdowns.
Translation: 士氣較低時，會降低更多工作效率。理智崩潰時，可能會導致這種缺陷。

Text: Performance decreased by 50 at all jobs. Can cause crime events when there are not enough Security Stations in the Dome.
Translation: 所有工作的效率降低50。當穹頂內保安中心數量不足時，會導致犯罪事件。

Text: Loses Sanity when low on Comfort.
Translation: 舒適度較低時，會降低理智度。

Text: Generates Funding when at high Comfort.
Translation: 在高舒適度時增加資金。
Old Text: Generates Funding when in the Colony.
Old Translation: 可以為殖民地增加資金。

Translation: 理智度降低的效果減半。

Text: Raises the Morale of all Colonists in the Dome. The effects of multiple Empaths stack.
Translation: 可以提高穹頂中所有殖民地居民的士氣。體貼效果可以疊加。

Text: Increased performance boost when at high Morale.
Translation: 士氣高昂的時候，工作效率也會提高。

Text: Gains additional Comfort when satisfying social interest. +Social
Translation: 當社交需求得到滿足時，可以獲得額外舒適度。+社交

Text: More health recovered while resting. Can work when health is low. +Exercise
Translation: 休息時會恢復更多生命值。即使生命值較低時也能工作。+健身
玩遊戲的時候可以恢復理智度。+遊戲

Text: Generates Research when at high Sanity.
Translation: 在高理智度時產出研究點數。
Old Text: Generates Research when in the Colony.
Old Translation: 可以為殖民地增加研究點數。

Text: Gains twice as much Comfort in gardens and parks.
Translation: 在公園和花園時，可以獲得雙倍的舒適度。

Text: Gains a temporary Morale boost every time a new technology is researched.
Translation: 每當新技術研發完成的時候，都會暫時提升士氣。

Text: Higher individual base Morale. Low Sanity never leads to suicide.
Translation: 居民基礎士氣更高，即使理智度較低時也絕不會自殺。
相信人類具有更崇高的使命 +<amount>（信仰者）

Text: No Comfort penalties when eating unprepared food or having no residence.
Translation: 食用未烹調的食物或無家可歸的時候，舒適度不會下降。

Text: Raises the Morale of all Religious people in the Dome. Benefits stack with each additional Saint.
Translation: 可以提高穹頂中所有信仰者居民的士氣。每有一位佈道者，士氣加成效果都會提高。

Text: Loses less Health without food, water, oxygen or when living in an unpowered Dome.
Translation: 當沒有食物、水或氧氣，或生活在失去電力供給的穹頂中時，生命值下降速度較慢。

Text: Individual performance increased by 20. No penalty for heavy workloads. -Relaxation
Translation: 個人工作效率增加20，高負荷工作時也不會產生負面效果。 - 休閒

Text: Synthetically created humans that function similarly to us - they breathe, they eat and they sleep. However they do not age and cannot reproduce.
Translation: 與正常人類幾乎無異的生化人，他們會呼吸、會進食、也會睡眠。但他們不會變老，也無法生育後代。

Text: Has half the lifespan of a naturally born human.
Translation: 只有正常人類一半的壽命。

Text: Dreamers make sense of the shared dream but lose Sanity during Mirages.
Translation: 入夢人能夠理解共享的夢境，但會在幻景期間失去理智度。

Text: The Dreamers have emerged from the Mirages with renewed hope. +15 performance
Translation: 幻景醒來的入夢人，擁有嶄新的希望。+15工作效率

Text: One of the first Martian Colonists.
Randomly spreads other traits of this colonist to persons in the same Dome with less than 3 traits.
Translation: 若同一穹頂中其他居民特性少於3個，這位居民的其它特性將會隨機傳播給該居民。
<green>從火星出生的居民 <amount>（火星之子）</color>

Text: Martianborn Colonists never become Earthsick. The Martianborn group of techs can improve this trait significantly.
Translation: 火星之子不會患上思鄉病。火星之子相關技術可以顯著提高這一特性。

Text: Untrained for life on Mars, which results in decreased performance at all jobs. Cannot be Earthsick. High chance to become a Renegade.
Translation: 沒有經過火星生活相關訓練，所有工作效率都會降低。不會得思鄉病，會有很大機率變成叛徒。

Text: Don't worry. They’ll tell you.<if(has_dlc('shepard'))><newline><newline>Has decreased Comfort when living near a Ranch and won't work in such buildings. Has increased Comfort when away from Ranches.</if>
Translation: 不必擔心，他們會告訴你答案。<if(has_dlc('shepard'))><newline><newline>在牧場附近居住的舒適度降低，且不會在這樣的建築裡工作。遠離牧場時舒適度提高。</if>

Text: Colonists with no specialization will perform worse at jobs that require specialized workers.
Translation: 沒有特別專長的居民，難以勝任需要專長的工作內容。

Text: A science specialist trained to work in research buildings. Interests: +Gaming, - Shopping
Translation: 科學家可以在研究機構中工作。 興趣：+ 遊戲， - 購物

Text: An engineer trained to work in factories. Interests: +Dining, - Social
Translation: 工程師可以在工廠機構中工作。興趣：+ 用餐， - 社交

Text: A security officer trained to work in security buildings. Interests: +Exercise, - Shopping
Translation: 訓練過的警官，可以在安全設施中工作。興趣：+ 健身， - 購物

Text: A geology specialist trained to work in extractor buildings. Interests: +Drinking, - Relaxation
Translation: 受過訓練的地質學家，可以在挖掘站中工作。興趣：+ 飲酒， - 休閒

Text: A botany specialist trained to work on farms. Interests: +Luxury, - Social
Translation: 受過訓練的植物學家，可以在農場中工作。興趣：+ 奢侈品， - 社交

Text: A medical specialist trained to work in medical buildings. Interests: +Luxury, - Relaxation
Translation: 受過訓練的醫療人員，可以在醫療設施中工作。興趣：+ 奢侈品， - 休閒

Text: Looking for an otherworldly holiday. Doesn't work. Grants Funding and new applicants when successfully returning to Earth based on Satisfaction. Leaves at first opportunity after 5 Sols. Loses Satisfaction while staying longer than 10 sols. +Gambling
Translation: 想在外星球度假。不會工作。當成功返回地球時，根據滿意程度給予資金和新的應徵者。5個太陽日後第一時間離開。當滯留超過10個太陽日時，失去滿意度。+賭博

Text: Children are too young to work and use many of the buildings in the Colony. They can go to School and use certain special buildings such as the Playground and Nursery.
Translation: 兒童過於幼小，無法工作，也無法使用殖民地中的許多建築。他們可以去學校上學，也可以使用特別的建築物，如遊樂場和幼兒園。

Text: A young Colonist, able to work in all buildings.
Translation: 年輕殖民地居民，可以在殖民地中工作。

Text: An adult Colonist, able to work in all buildings.
Translation: 成年殖民地居民，可以在殖民地中工作。

Text: A middle aged Colonist, approaching retirement, but still able to work in all buildings.
Translation: 中年殖民地居民，雖然馬上就要退休了，但仍可工作。

Text: A senior Colonist, too old to work.
Translation: 年邁的殖民地居民，由於太老無法工作。

Text: In this tutorial you will learn how to navigate Mars, how to land a rocket, manage Drones and construct buildings on Mars.
Translation: 在本教學中，您將會學習如何前往火星，如何降落火箭，如何管理無人機，以及如何在火星上建造建築。
Old Text: In this tutorial you will learn how to navigate Mars, how to land a rocket, manage drones and construct buildings on Mars.
Old Translation: 在本教學中，您將會學習如何前往火星，如何降落火箭，如何管理無人機，以及如何在火星上建造建築。

Text: In this tutorial you will learn how to control and use rovers as well as the basics of Exploration and Research.
Translation: 在本教學中，您將會學習如何操作使用探測車，以及探索研究相關的基本操作。

Text: In this tutorial you will learn how to setup Power, Water and Oxygen systems. You will also learn about building maintenance and how to prepare your first dome for human colonists.
Translation: 在本教學中，您將會學習如何設置電力、水資源與氧氣供應系統。此外，您還會學習與建築維護相關的知識，以及如何為人類居民準備第一個穹頂。
Old Text: In this tutorial you will learn how to setup power, water & air systems. You will also learn about building maintenance and how to prepare your first dome for human colonists.
Old Translation: 在本教學中，您將會學習如何設置電力、水資源與氧氣供應系統。此外，您還會學習與建築維護相關的知識，以及如何為人類居民準備第一個穹頂。

Text: In this tutorial you will learn how to call colonists to Mars, take care of their needs as well as learn how to manage the workforce.
Translation: 在本教學中，您將會學習如何將殖民地居民運輸至火星，如何滿足他們的需求，以及如何管理勞動力。

Text: In this tutorial you will learn how to resettle colonists in different domes and how to connect Domes with Passages.
Translation: 在本教學中，您將會學習如何將殖民地居民重新安置在不同的穹頂內，以及如何使用通道連接多個穹頂。
Old Text: In this tutorial you will learn how to resettle colonists in different domes and how to connect domes with passages.
Old Translation: 在本教學中，您將會學習如何讓殖民地居民在不同的穹頂內重新安居，以及如何使用通道連接多個穹頂。

Text: The Surviving Mars Future Contemporary Cosmetic Pack includes 10 building skins to give your colony some added flair.
Translation: 《火星求生》未來當代外觀包內含10種建築外觀，能為你的殖民地添一抹獨特風采。
Old Text: The Future Contemporary Asset Pack
Old Translation: 未來當代財產包

Translation: 雨水獲得（百分比/太陽日）

Text: Doesn't increase soil quality and global Water while frozen.
Translation: 凍結狀態下不提高土壤品質和全球水資源。

Text: Requires breathable atmosphere. Improve the Atmosphere and the Temperature of the planet to support life outside of Domes.
Translation: 需要可呼吸的大氣。改良行星的大氣和溫度以支援穹頂外的生命活動。

Text: There's no space for vital elements of the Capital City.
Translation: 首都無空間容納維生要素。

Text: At least one pipe connector must be placed.
Translation: 必須放置至少一個管線接頭。

Text: If Automated Mode is activated the RC Dozer will automatically service the nearest landscape project. It'll extract Waste Rock from the site and then dispose of it, or it'll deliver Waste Rock from dumping sites.<newline><newline>Current Status: <on_off(auto_mode_on)>
Translation: 若啟動自動模式，遙控推土機會自動執行最靠近自己的地形改造工程。它會從現場挖掘礦渣然後將其處理掉，或把礦渣從垃圾場運到現場。<newline><newline>目前狀態：<on_off(auto_mode_on)>

Text: Daily research at max avg terraforming(RP/sol)
Translation: 最大平均地球化每日研究點數（研究點數/太陽日）

Text: Vegetation types have different requirements and effects on the local Soil Quality.

Text: Converts Waste Rock into CO2, improving the Atmosphere <icon_AtmosphereTP_alt>.
Translation: 將礦渣轉化為二氧化碳，改良大氣<icon_AtmosphereTP_alt>。

Text: Delivers Water to an underground pipe network and effectively transports heat from the planetary core, improving the global Temperature<icon_TemperatureTP_alt>. Increases the local temperature in cold areas and protects nearby buildings from Cold Waves.
Translation: 將水輸入地下管線系統，有效地將行星核心的熱量向外傳遞，提升全球溫度<icon_TemperatureTP_alt>。提高寒冷地區的溫度，並保護附近的建築免受寒流侵襲。

Text: Consumes Seeds to plant wild vegetation, increasing local Soil Quality. Plants will wither or grow according to local Soil Quality and global Temperature<icon_TemperatureTP_alt> and Water <icon_WaterTP_alt>. Improves global Vegetation <icon_VegetationTP_alt> if it's less than <resource(40000,'VegetationTP')>. Doesn’t work during Dust Storms and Toxic Rains.
Translation: 消耗種子種植野生植被，提升該地土壤品質。植物會根據當地土壤品質、全球溫度和<icon_TemperatureTP_alt>水<icon_WaterTP_alt>而枯萎或生長。如果植被低於<resource(40000,'VegetationTP')>，則改善全球植被<icon_VegetationTP_alt>。在沙塵暴和毒雨期間無法運作。

Text: Burns a mixture of Fuel and locally extracted carbon to release Greenhouse gases, effectively improving the global Temperature<icon_TemperatureTP_alt>. Has significantly boosted terraforming effect at low Temperature<icon_TemperatureTP_alt>.
Translation: 將燃料和本地挖出的碳混合燃燒釋放出溫室氣體，有效改善全球溫度<icon_TemperatureTP_alt>。在低溫<icon_TemperatureTP_alt>下已有效增強地球化效果。

Text: Improves the magnetic field of the planet, decreasing the loss of Atmosphere by <resource(decay_atmosphere_reduct,'AtmosphereTP')> per Sol. Generates Research proportionally to the current Atmosphere. May trigger localized Marsquakes.
Translation: 改善行星的磁場，使每個太陽日的大氣損失量減少<resource(decay_atmosphere_reduct,'AtmosphereTP')>。根據目前大氣成比例產生研究點數。或許會引發區域性地震。

Text: The largest city on the planet and entirely open air - a bold monument to the epic success story that is the Terraforming of Mars. <em>Atmosphere should be kept breathable at all costs. In case of atmospheric failure, everyone in the Capital City may suffocate.
Translation: 行星上最大的露天城市。它是象徵火星地球化取得成功的宏偉豐碑。<em>必須不惜一切代價確保大氣處於可供呼吸狀態。如果大氣出現問題，首都裡的所有人都會窒息。

Text: Consumes Seeds to plant crops, which can be harvested for Food by Drones. Crops will wither or grow according to local Soil Quality and global Temperature<icon_TemperatureTP_alt> and Water <icon_WaterTP_alt>. Doesn’t work during Dust Storms and Toxic Rains.
Translation: 消耗種子種植作物供無人機收穫以獲取食物。作物會根據當地土壤品質、全球溫度和<icon_TemperatureTP_alt>水<icon_WaterTP_alt>而枯萎或生長。在沙塵暴和毒雨期間無法運作。

Text: Works on landscaping projects significantly faster than Drones. Can transport Waste Rock that is used for landscaping tasks.
Translation: 進行地形改造工程的速度比無人機快得多。能運輸地形改造任務所需的礦渣。

Text: Seeds are used for planting of vegetation on Mars
Translation: 種子用來在火星上種植植被。

Text: 100% Atmosphere, Temperature, Water and Vegetation terraforming
Translation: 大氣、溫度、水和植被100%地球化

Text: - Seeds import cost reduced by 50% - Bonus Prefabs: 2x GHG Factory; 2x Forestation Plants - Bonus Tech: Designed Forestation (Newly grown forests have a chance to spawn Vistas and Research Sites)
Translation: - 種子進口價格降低50% - 額外預製件：2x溫室氣體工廠、2x造林站 - 加成技術計劃造林（新生長出的森林有機率產生景觀和研究地點）

Text: Low yield and grows slowly but improves the soil, increasing the yield of the next crop. Will generate Seeds on harvest
Translation: 產量低，且成長緩慢，但會改良土壤，提高下一批作物的產量。收穫時會產生種子

Text: Low yield but grows very fast. Will generate Seeds on harvest
Translation: 產量低，但成長非常快。收穫時會產生種子

Text:
Mars is a geologically dead world. This means its metal core has solidified and cannot sustain a Magnetic Field, leaving the Martian atmosphere unprotected from the high energy particles of the Solar Wind. Unlike Earth, Mars has no seismic activity.

This is changing with the introduction of Magnetic Field Generators - technological marvels aimed at restoring a Magnetic Field for our purpose of terraforming Mars. While these devices won't create Marsquakes on a planetary scale, they could cause quakes within their immediate surroundings due to the way they function - creating hollows deep beneath the surface by melting away and even evaporating metal pockets.

Thus Marsquakes near Magnetic Field Generators are a direct result of their activity. The more generators operate, the more severe the Marsquakes will be.
Translation:
從地質學角度上說，火星這顆行星已經死去了。這意味著它的金屬核心已經凝固，無法維持磁場，從而無法保護火星大氣抵禦太陽風的高能量粒子。火星和地球不同，沒有地震活動。

隨著磁場發生器的引入，這一點將發生變化。磁場發生器堪稱技術上的奇蹟，目的是為了火星的地球化而恢復磁場。雖然這些裝置不會引起全球規模的地震，但它們可能會在其附近區域引發地震，這是它們的運作原理導致的：它們透過熔化甚至蒸發金屬凹穴的方式，在地下深處製造空洞。

因此磁場發生器的活動直接導致其附近會發生地震。執行的發生器越多，地震就越嚴重。

Old Text: Marsquake
Old Translation: 地震

Text:
With the warming up and pumping of potent greenhouse gasses into the newly created atmosphere of Mars comes natural precipitation. Rains.
