Initially, because of the gasses used, these rains will be toxic, but as the quality of the atmosphere improves - pure rainfall will take hold.

Toxic rains will harm any plant life struggling to survive in the harsh Martian soil and degrade it even further. They create toxic pools where nothing grows. Toxic pools may be cleaned up by Drones.

Pure rainfall, however, is greatly beneficial to plants and will improve the local Soil Quality when it occurs.
Translation:
隨著氣溫升高以及大量溫室氣體被注入新形成的火星大氣，自然降水出現了。也就是降雨。

起初，由於所用氣體的緣故，降下的雨具有毒性，但隨著大氣品質的提升，雨水將逐漸變得純淨。

毒雨會傷害一切在貧瘠的火星土壤中艱難求生的植物，並進一步降低土壤品質，還會產生毒水池，其中寸草不生。可以用無人機清理毒水池。

不過純淨的降雨對植物大有裨益，還能提高降雨地區的土壤品質。

Old Text: Rains
Old Translation: 雨

Text:
Seeds are used to spread plant life on the Martian surface. After researching the Martian Vegetation tech, Seeds may be imported from Earth or grown as a separate crop in Farms and Hydroponic Farms. Eventually, when more sophisticated plants (such as bushes and trees) begin to take hold on Mars - seeds can be harvested from those too.
The Martian soil is utterly un-hospitable for plants to grow, but simple lichen may eventually take hold and will begin to improve the soil quality - paving way for more sophisticated plants which will hasten the whole process.
Translation:
種子用來在火星地表散播植物生命。 研究火星植被技術後，就能從地球進口種子或是在農場以及水耕農場中將種子作為一種單獨的作物種植了。最後，當結構較為複雜的植物（如灌木和樹木）開始在火星上大規模生長時，也能從這些植物上收穫到種子。
火星土壤完全不適合植物生長，但地衣這種結構簡單的植物最後還是會大規模生長出來並改善土壤品質，為結構更加複雜的植物鋪平道路，加快改善土質整體發展。
Old Text:
Seeds are used to spread plant life on the Martian surface. After researching the Martian Vegetation tech, Seeds may be imported from Earth or grown as a separate crop in Farms and Hydroponic Farms. Eventually, when more sophisticated plants (such as bushes and trees) begin to take hold on Mars - seeds can be harvested from those too. Seeds cannot be stored in Universal Depots, only in Seed Depots and Seed Storages.
The Martian soil is utterly un-hospitable for plants to grow, but simple lichen may eventually take hold and will begin to improve the soil quality - paving way for more sophisticated plants which will hasten the whole process.
Old Translation:
種子用來在火星地表散播植物生命。 研究火星植被技術後，就能從地球進口種子或是在農場以及水耕農場中將種子作為一種單獨的作物種植了。最後，當結構較為複雜的植物（如灌木和樹木）開始在火星上大規模生長時，也能從這些植物上收穫到種子。 種子無法儲存在通用倉庫裡，只能儲存在種子倉庫和種子儲存庫中。
火星土壤完全不適合植物生長，但地衣這種結構簡單的植物最後還是會大規模生長出來並改善土壤品質，為結構更加複雜的植物鋪平道路，加快改善土質整體發展。

Old Text: Seeds
Old Translation: 種子

Text:
RC Dozers are remote-controlled vehicles that facilitate the landscaping. They can literally move mountains, making them a powerful ally to the fleet of Drones generally used for the task. Furthermore, RC Dozers are optimized for transporting large quantities of the inevitable Waste Rock by-product which accompanies changing the Martian landscape.
Incredibly durable and powerful, the machinery associated with RC Dozers is built to survive being caved in by a mountain if need be. If this were to happen, the vehicle can dig itself out and punish the mountain by flattening it or just moving it someplace else.
Translation:
遙控推土機是用來協助地形改造的遙控載具。毫不誇張地說，它們真能移走大山,這使其成為了執行地形改造任務的無人機群的得力助手。另外，遙控推土機的運輸能力得到了最優化，用來運輸改造火星地形過程中不可避免產生的大量礦渣。
遙控推土機的機器零件堅固無比且馬力強勁，就算一座山坍塌在上面依然不會被摧毀。如果發生這種事，推土機能挖出一條路逃出去並透過把山推平或移到別處的方式讓山知道厲害。

Old Text: RC Dozer
Old Translation: 遙控推土機

Text: Sustaining plant life on Mars is one of the major points of its terraforming. The spreading of vegetation on the surface of the planet requires Seeds to be imported from Earth, or grown on special crops in the Farms and the Hydroponic Farms. The Seeds are then planted by Forestation Plants, or spread in the lower atmosphere by Rockets. Initially, the quality of the local soil is barely capable to sustain a bunch of lichen species but as the lichen grow and spread, the Soil Quality will be improved. More complex plants, like grass, bushes and trees require increased local Soil Quality, higher Temperature and more Water on the planet in order to grow and spread. Bushes and trees yield Seeds, which can be harvested by Drones. Recurring Rains improve Soil Quality while Toxic Rains decrease it.
Translation: 在火星上維持植物生存是地球化的主要意義之一。植被在行星表面散佈需要從地球進口種子，或是在農場和水耕農場裡種植特殊的作物。之後造林站會進行播種，或是由火箭將種子播撒到低層大氣中。 起初，火星的當地土壤品質只能供地衣類植物勉強存活，但隨著它們的生長和散佈，土壤品質將得到改善。結構較為複雜的植物（例如草、灌木和樹木）需要更好的當地土壤品質、更高的溫度以及更多的水才能生長散佈。灌木和樹木能產出可供無人機收穫的種子。 反覆性降雨能改善土壤品質，而毒雨會降低土壤品質。

Old Text: Forestation And Seeds
Old Translation: 造林和種子

Text: The Atmosphere parameter represents the density and the composition of the Martian atmosphere. The higher this parameter is, the more Earth-like are the atmospheric pressure, Oxygen levels and cloud generation. Atmosphere is increased by the Magnetic Field Generator and Carbonate Processor buildings and also by completing the Import Greenhouse Gases Special Project. Due to the lack of a planetary magnetic field, Atmosphere is gradually lost over time. Atmosphere improvement boosts the effectiveness of Wind Turbines and MOXIEs, but makes Solar Panels less productive. Recurring Dust Storms and Meteor Storms decrease in severity with the improving of the Atmosphere and later disappear entirely. In tandem with the Temperature parameter, when both parameters are high enough, the atmosphere on Mars becomes breathable and Domes may become open-air Domes.
Translation: 大氣參數代表火星大氣的密度和成分。此參數越高，氣壓、含氧量和雲的形成就與地球越相似。 大氣由磁場發生器和碳酸鹽處理站建築提高，完成進口溫室氣體特殊工程也能提高此參數。 由於缺少磁場，大氣會持續損失。 改善大氣能提高風力發電機和氧氣生成裝置的效率，但降低太陽能板的發電量。隨著大氣的不斷改善，反覆性沙塵暴和隕石風暴的嚴重程度會不斷降低，最後會完全消失。 當溫度和大氣這兩個參數都足夠高時，火星大氣將變得可以吸入，而穹頂可以變成露天穹頂。

Text: The Temperature parameter represents the global surface temperature on Mars. The higher this parameter is, the more favorable the conditions for liquid water and Earth-like life are. Temperature is increased by the GHG Factory and the Core Heat Convector buildings as well as by completing the Launch Space Mirror Special Project. Its improvement decreases the severity of Cold Waves, before eliminating them altogether, and is required for Rains to fall. In tandem with the Atmosphere parameter, when both parameters are high enough, the atmosphere on Mars becomes breathable and Domes may become open-air Domes.
Translation: 溫度代表火星全球地表溫度。此參數越高，條件對液態水和地上生命就越有利。 溫度由溫室氣體工廠和核心熱量對流加熱站建築提高，完成發射空間反射鏡特殊工程也能提高此參數。 提高溫度可降低寒流的嚴重程度，最後使其徹底消失，降雨也需要一定的溫度。 當大氣和溫度兩個參數都足夠高時，火星大氣將變得可以吸入，而穹頂可以變成露天穹頂。

Text: The Vegetation parameter represents the spreading and diversity of vegetation and bacterial life on a planetary scale. The higher this parameter is, the more Mars looks like the tundra biome back on Earth. Vegetation is increased by completing the Seed Vegetation Special Project which becomes available when Temperature and Water levels are high enough to support primitive plant life. Once the Martian Vegetation tech has been researched, Seeds - used to spread Vegetation both locally and on the planetary scale - may be imported from Earth or grown on farms. The more vegetation there is, the faster the spreading will become and conditions will become favorable for even forests to exists on Mars. The Forestation Plant building is used to spread Vegetation locally.
Translation: 植被參數代表全球範圍內植被和細菌生命體的散佈和多樣性。此參數越高，火星看起來就越像地球上的苔原生態區。 當溫度和水參數高到能維持行星上的原始植物生命時，即可解鎖植被播種特殊工程，完成該工程科提高植被參數。研究火星植被技術後，即可從地球進口或在農場裡種植種子,種子用來在本地和全球範圍內散佈植被。 植被越多，散佈得越快，森林在火星上存在的條件也越有利。 造林站建築用來在當地散佈植被。

Text: The Water parameter represents the quality and volume of surface water on Mars. The higher this parameter is, the more and larger water bodies will appear on Mars: lakes, seas and oceans. Water is increased by evaporating it from Lakes as well as completing the Capture Ice Asteroids, Cloud Seeding and Melt the Polar Caps Special Projects. Its improvement boosts the effectiveness of Moisture Vaporators. Required for Rains and local Vegetation growth.
Translation: 水參數代表火星地表水的品質和體積。此參數越高，火星上會出現的水體就越多越大（從湖泊到海洋）。 水透過蒸發湖水提高，完成捕獲富含冰的小行星、造雲和融化極冠特殊工程也能提高此參數。 改善水能提高水氣蒐集站的效率。 降雨和當地植被的生長也需要一定的水。

Text: Special Projects are massive and ambitious undertakings aimed at achieving goals on a planetary scale. Import greenhouse gases from Earth, capture ice asteroids, nuke its polar caps to melt them or spread Seeds and watch Mars come alive - just some of the Special Projects highlighting the vital role they play in the Terraforming of Mars. Special Projects are made available by researching Techs and by increasing the Terraforming Parameters. Each project requires a Rocket to be available. All Special Projects concerning the Terraforming of Mars are colored in Green in the Planetary View.
Translation: 特殊工程是耗時長久的巨大工程，目的是達成影響整顆行星的目標。 這些特殊工程包括從地球進口溫室氣體、捕獲富含冰的小行星、用核武器轟炸極冠以將其融化或播下種子並看著火星煥發生機等。它們在火星地球化過程中扮演著至關重要的角色。 可透過研究技術和提升地球化參數的方式解鎖特殊工程。每項工程需要一枚可用的火箭。 所有與火星地球化相關的特殊工程在行星查看中以綠色顯示。

Text: No planetary terraforming. Related buildings and techs are not available.
Translation: 無行星地球化。相關建築和技術不可用。

Text:
<grey>"Things do not change; we change."
<right>Henry David Thoreau</grey><left>
Translation:
<grey>“世事未變人已變。”
<right>亨利·大衛·梭羅</grey><left>

Text: Send a Rocket to complete one of the Special Projects that appear in the Planetary View.
Translation: 派遣一枚火箭完成出現在行星視圖裡的一項特殊工程。

Old Text: Complete a Special Project
Old Translation: 完成一項特殊工程

Text: Research Adapted Vegetation and have a Forestation Plant with Plant Type set to a tree. Trees require high Temperature<icon_TemperatureTP_alt> and Water<icon_WaterTP_alt> terraforming progress.
Translation: 研究適應性植被並擁有一座將植物類型設定為一種樹木的造林站。樹木需要較高的溫度<icon_TemperatureTP_alt>和水<icon_WaterTP_alt>參數。

Text: <new_in('armstrong')>Plant a Tree on the surface of Mars
Old Text: Plant a Tree on the surface of Mars
Old Translation: 在火星地表種下一棵樹

Text: Research Lake Crafting and construct a Lake.
Translation: 研究造湖並建造一片湖泊。

Old Text: Dig a Lake
Old Translation: 挖出一片湖泊

Text: <new_in('armstrong')>Liquid Water on the surface of Mars
Old Text: Liquid Water on the surface of Mars
Old Translation: 火星地表的液態水

Old Text: First Rainfall
Old Translation: 第一場雨

Old Text: Breathable Atmosphere
Old Translation: 可呼吸的大氣

Text: Research, construct and maintain Carbonate Processors and complete Special Projects to achieve maximum Atmosphere terraforming.
Translation: 研究、建造和維護碳酸鹽處理站並完成特殊工程以達到大氣地球化參數的上限。

Old Text: Achieve 100% Atmosphere
Old Translation: 達成100%大氣

Text: Research, construct and maintain GHG Factories and Core Heat Convectors and complete Special Projects to achieve maximum Temperature terraforming.
Translation: 研究、建造和維護溫室氣體工廠和核心熱量對流加熱站，並完成特殊工程以達到溫度地球化參數的上限。

Old Text: Achieve 100% Temperature
Old Translation: 達成100%溫度

Text: Research, construct and fill Lakes and complete Special Projects to achieve maximum Water terraforming.
Translation: 研究、建造、填滿湖泊並完成特殊工程以達到水地球化參數的上限。

Old Text: Achieve 100% Water
Old Translation: 達成100%水

Text: Research and complete Seed Vegetation special projects to achieve maximum Vegetation terraforming.
Translation: 研究並完成植被播種特殊工程以達到植被地球化參數的上限。

Old Text: Achieve 100% Vegetation
Old Translation: 達成100%植被

Text: Research per Sol: Rare Metals price: $ M - All Terraforming techs are 50% cheaper for research - Forestation Plants do not require Power - Can import RC Dozers from start - Bonus Tech: Martian Vegetation (unlocks Forestation Plant) - Bonus Tech: Interplanetary Projects (unlocks terraforming special projects)
Translation: 每個太陽日的研究點數： 稀有金屬價格：$M - 所有地球化技術的研究花費降低50% - 造林站不需要電力 - 開局就能進口遙控推土機 - 加成技術：火星植被（解鎖造林站） - 加成技術：星際工程（解鎖地球化特殊工程）

Text: The planet is near uninhabitable conditions once more!
Translation: 這顆行星再次變得幾乎無法居住！

Old Text: No more Cold Waves
Old Translation: 寒流不再出現

Translation: 不再出現反覆性沙塵暴
Old Text: No more Dust Storms
Old Translation: 沙塵暴不再出現

Translation: 不再出現反覆性隕石風暴
Old Text: No more Meteor Storms
Old Translation: 隕石風暴不再出現

Translation: 純淨降雨現已成為可能
純淨降雨現已成為可能

Text: Toxic Rains can now be expected
Crash ice asteroids on Mars' surface to improve the Water levels of the planet. This action may cause a Marsquake disaster.
Translation: 使富含冰的小行星墜落在火星表面以提高行星上的水位。此操作可能會引起地震災害。
Old Text: Crash ice asteroids on Mars' surface to improve the Water levels of the planet. This action may cause a Marsquake disaster.
Old Translation: 使富含冰的小行星墜落在火星表面以提高行星上的水位。此操作可能會引起地震災害。

Text: Trigger rainfalls, that improve local soil quality and help plant life.
Translation: 觸發能改善當地土壤品質且對星球上生命有益處的降雨。

Text: Send a refurbished rocket to gather greenhouse gases from Earth's atmosphere and then dump them on Mars, improving the Atmosphere of the planet. This action may cause toxic rains that are harmful to soil quality and plant life.
Translation: 派一枚翻新的火箭搜集地球大氣中的溫室氣體並排放到火星，改善火星大氣。此操作可能導致對土壤品質和植物生命有害的毒雨降下。
Old Text: Send a refurbished rocket to gather greenhouse gases from Earth's atmosphere and then dump them on Mars, improving the Atmosphere of the planet. This action may cause toxic rains that are harmful to soil quality and plant life.
Old Translation: 派一枚翻新的火箭搜集地球大氣中的溫室氣體並排放到火星，改善火星大氣。此操作可能導致對土壤品質和植物生命有害的毒雨降下。

Text: Launch a highly reflective surface to focus more sunlight on the surface of the planet, increasing the global Temperature and the power production of all Solar Panels.
Translation: 發射一個高度反光的表面，將更多陽光匯聚到行星表面，提高全球溫度以及所有太陽能板的發電量。

Text: Launch an artificial shield to improve the magnetic field of the planet, counteracting solar wind and decreasing the loss of Atmosphere. Consumes the used rocket.
Translation: 發射人造護盾以改良行星的磁場，抵制太陽風並減少大氣損失。消耗所用的火箭。

Text: Nuke the Polar Caps, raising the Water levels and the Atmosphere of the planet. Stops all on-going Cold Waves but may cause a prolonged Dust Storm. Each successive nuking has less effect on the ocean levels and the atmosphere.
Translation: 用核彈轟炸極冠，提高行星水位並改善大氣。終止所有進行中的寒流，但可能會引起長時間的沙塵暴。每次連續轟炸對海平面和大氣的效果越來越弱。

Text: Transport a large payload of Seeds to spread cyanophytes, green algae, lichens and more complex vegetation on the surface of the planet.
Translation: 運輸大量種子以在行星地表散佈藍藻、綠藻、地衣以及結構更為複雜的植被。

Text:
As the terraforming initiative progresses, some of the blights that were more or less a fact of life are bound to disappear - hopefully forever.

Unless we turn around our good progress, Cold Waves will no longer happen near our Colony.

Note: Non-recurring Cold Waves, triggered by special circumstances, are not affected by this.
Translation:
隨著地球化方案取得進展，一些已經或多或少成為我們生活一部分的災害肯定會消失，我們希望它們永遠別再出現。

只要我們維持這種良好的發展勢頭，寒流就不會在我們殖民地附近再次發生。

注意：由特殊條件觸發的非反覆性寒流不受影響。

Text:
A much anticipated milestone in the improving of Atmospheric conditions has been reached.

The fears of a Dust Storm sweeping through our colony and causing the mayhem that goes hand in hand with the disaster is now behind our backs. 

Scientists warn, however, that if we fail to stay on track and reverse the progress that has been made, Dust Storms may make a comeback.

Note: Non-recurring Dust Storms, triggered by special circumstances, are not affected by this.
Translation:
改善大氣環境的工作已經達成了萬眾期待的里程碑。

我們可以和沙塵暴在殖民地裡肆虐的日子說再見了。

不過，科學家警告說如果我們無法維持現在的好勢頭而使進展倒退，沙塵暴或許會捲土重來。

注意：由特殊條件觸發的非反覆性沙塵暴不受影響。

Text: With our Magnetic Field Generators stacking up, we can expect localized Marsquakes to start appearing from now on. The more Generators we construct, the more devastating these quakes will be.
Translation: 隨著我們的磁場發生器越來越多，從此之後可能會發生區域性地震。我們建造的發生器越多，地震的威力就越大。

Text:
With the gradual thickening of the Martian atmosphere, Meteor Storms have already become rarer and rarer. But today our scientists believe that a line has been passed, a line beyond which the calamity that were recurring Meteor Storms will not follow. 

Mars is changing, and changing for the better. With some luck, these changes are here to stay.

Note: Non-recurring Meteor Storms, triggered by special circumstances, are not affected by this.
Translation:
隨著火星大氣層漸漸變厚，隕石風暴已經變得越來越少見。而就在今天，我們的科學家相信反覆性隕石風暴這一災害已被我們拋在腦後。

火星正在變得越來越美好。幸運的話，這些變化會持久存在。

注意：由特殊條件觸發的非反覆性隕石風暴不受影響。

Text:
The first pure rainfall is about to occur over our colony!

Rains will improve the Soil Quality and will help accelerate the forestation process of Mars. Artificial lakes will also fill during lengthy rainfalls. 

As the atmospheric conditions continue to improve, we may even see no more Toxic Rains, although we are not there yet. If atmospheric conditions worsen, however, pure rainfall may stop altogether.
Translation:
我們的殖民地即將迎來第一場純淨降雨！

降雨能改善土壤品質，且有助於加快火星上的造林進度。長時間降雨還能填滿人工湖。

隨著大氣條件不斷改善，將來甚至連毒雨都可能會不再出現。不過，如果大氣條件惡化，純淨降雨可能會消失。

Text:
Worsening atmospheric conditions on Mars will cause Toxic Rains instead of pure water rainfall.

Improving the atmospheric conditions will bring back rainfall with pure water.
Translation:
火星大氣條件惡化會導致降下毒雨而非純淨雨水。

改善大氣條件將讓降雨再次變得純淨。

Text:
Toxic Rains are poised to fall in the region, lowering the Soil Quality and killing off any vegetation more sophisticated than Lichens in affected areas. Vegetation growth will also be hampered during the disaster.

Toxic Pools can form and will render the terrain under them unusable until cleaned up by Drones.

As atmospheric conditions continue to improve, Toxic Rains will gradually give way to pure water ones.
Translation:
該地區即將降下毒雨。毒雨會降低受影響地區的土壤品質並殺死其中一切結構比地衣複雜的植物。災害期間，植被生長也會受阻。

毒雨期間還會形成毒水池。需要用無人機清理毒水池才能再次利用之前被其覆蓋的區域。

隨著大氣條件不斷改善，毒雨會逐漸被純淨降雨取代。

Text:
The atmospheric conditions on Mars have reached levels finally free of toxicity and Toxic Rains will occur no more. 

If the terraforming effort continues in this direction, only pure rainfall will occur. However, should atmospheric conditions worsen, the blight that are Toxic Rains will return.
Translation:
火星上的大氣條件終於達到了無毒的水準，毒雨不再會出現了。

如果地球化繼續朝現在的方向努力，則只會出現純淨降雨。不過，如果大氣條件惡化，毒雨災害會再次出現。

Text: Since the Founders set foot on Mars, we have dreamt of a day we could tread freely upon the red sand. Today this dream has finally manifested onto reality. Go out fellow Martians, breath in the the Martian air and be proud! We are now able to open our Domes and rely on the Martian atmosphere alone to provide the oxygen and warmth we need to survive. Effect: If opened, Domes will no longer require an Oxygen supply and will become cheaper to build. However, if conditions worsen, we stand ready to seal them up again.
Translation: 自從創始者踏上火星以來，我們一直夢想著有朝一日能在紅沙上自由漫步。今天，這個夢想終於成為了現實。火星同胞們，走出穹頂，自豪地呼吸火星的空氣吧！ 我們現在能開啟穹頂並僅依賴火星大氣提供我們生存所需的氧氣和溫度了。 效果：穹頂開啟之後，將不再需要氧氣供給，且造價降低。不過，如果條件惡化，我們也隨時準備好再次關上穹頂。

Text:
Today the sun rose above a scene so spectacularly normal, that it was everything but. Blueish skies hanging above the arid, grassy fields of what might as well have been the great plains of Utah... But was actually here, on Mars!

Our restless efforts to purify the Martian atmosphere and make it suitable for humans have never achieved a more significant milestone. We are halfway there! But there is a lot of work remaining to be done.
Translation:
今天，太陽照耀下的景象是如此平常，但實際上，卻意義非凡。藍藍的天籠罩著乾旱的草原，看起來就像是猶他大平原的景象……但其實，這可是在火星上！

我們淨化火星大氣並使其適合人類居住的努力取得了前所未有的里程碑式的成果。我們已經成功了一半！但要做的還有很多。

Text: As the atmospheric conditions have worsened the skies above are no longer blue, giving way to the all too familiar red haze once more.
Translation: 隨著大氣條件的惡化，頭頂上的天空不再湛藍，而是再次變成了我們再熟悉不過的那種紅色霧靄。

Text:
Congratulations, you have successfully made the first step towards turning Mars into a lush green heaven! You have unlocked the Seeds resource that can be imported from Earth. 

Seeds are stored into specialized Storages and used by Forestation Plants and Open Farms for planting vegetation outside the Domes. Most plants require some terraforming progress to be made. Check out the Atmosphere, Temperature, surface Water and the Vegetation coverage in the Planetary View. Improving these terraforming parameters will improve the productivity of some buildings, decrease the severity of disasters and ultimately may render Mars lush, breathable and covered with liquid water.
Translation:
恭喜，你向著將火星變為鬱鬱蔥蔥的綠色天堂成功邁出了第一步！你解鎖了種子資源（可從地球進口）。

種子儲存在專門的倉庫裡，造林站和露天農場用種子在穹頂外種植植被。大多數植物需要地球化取得一定進展。前往行星查看查看大氣、溫度、地表水以及植被覆蓋率。提高地球化參數能提高部分建築的產量，降低災害的嚴重程度，並最終把火星變得草木茂盛、空氣清新且液態水豐富。

Text: The Atmosphere parameter represents the density and the composition of the Martian atmosphere. Above certain density, Atmosphere is gradually lost over time, due to the lack of a natural magnetic field on Mars. Atmosphere is increased by buildings in the Terraforming build menu and by completing Special Projects. The Atmosphere tooltip provides further information.
Translation: 大氣參數代表火星大氣的密度和成分。大氣密度超過特定的值後，大氣就會因為火星缺少天然磁場而逐漸損失。 大氣由地球化建造選單裡的建築以及完成特殊工程提高。 大氣提示資訊裡包含更多相關內容。

Text: Terraforming Buildings are now available. Construct them to consume Seeds, affect the local Soil Quality and vegetation and to increase the 4 global terraforming parameters: Atmosphere, Temperature, Water and Vegetation. Check the Terraforming build menu section. Each building tooltip provides further information.
Translation: 地球化建築已開放。建造這些建築可生產種子、影響當地土壤品質以及植被，還能提高大氣、溫度、水和植被這4項全球地球化參數。 查看地球化建造選單部分。 每條建築提示資訊包含更多相關內容。

Text: To terraform Mars and create Earth-like environment for colonists, you have to gradually increase the 4 global terraforming parameters: Atmosphere, Temperature, Water and Vegetation. Terraforming is a long process. Once complete, humans can start breathing outside domes. Start by researching a Terraforming technology when ready. Further terraforming info is available in the Encyclopedia.
Translation: 為了將火星地球化並為殖民地居民創造與地球類似的環境，你必須逐漸提高大氣、溫度、水和植被這4項全球地球化參數。地球化是一個漫長的過程。完成之後，人類就能在穹頂外生活了。 首先，準備好後就研究一項地球化技術。 百科中包含地球化的更多相關資訊。

Text: Seeds are now available. Seeds are a new resource, which can improve local Soil Quality and the global Vegetation parameter. Import Seeds from Earth or grow them in Farms. Increase Soil Quality, Temperature and Water parameters to allow local vegetation to grow in your sector. Further terraforming info is available in the Encyclopedia.
Translation: 種子已開放。種子是一種新資源，能改善當地土壤品質以及全球植被參數。 從地球進口種子或在農場裡種植。 提高土壤品質、以及溫度和水兩項參數以使當地植被能在你所在的區域內生長。 百科中包含地球化的更多相關資訊。

Text: New terraforming special projects are available on the Planetary View. They are marked in green. Completing them will advance our terraforming efforts. Send a Rocket on an expedition to complete a terraforming Special Project. Further terraforming info is available in the Encyclopedia.
Translation: 行星查看中有新地球化特殊工程可用。它們用綠色標識。完成這類工程能推進地球化進度。 派遣火箭進行探險以完成一項地球化特殊工程。 百科中包含地球化的更多相關資訊。

Text: Temperature parameter represents the global surface temperature on Mars. Increased Temperature is required for liquid water, rains and local vegetation growth. Temperature is increased by buildings in the Terraforming build menu and by completing Special projects. The Temperature tooltip provides further information.
Translation: 溫度代表火星全球地表溫度。液態水、降雨和當地植被的生長都需要升高溫度。 溫度由地球化建造選單裡的建築以及完成特殊工程升高。 溫度提示資訊裡包含更多相關內容。

Text: Vegetation parameter represents the spreading and diversity of vegetation and bacterial life on a planetary scale. Its improvement boosts local vegetation growth speed and spread. Vegetation is increased by working Forestation Plants and by completing Special Projects. The Vegetation tooltip provides further information.
Translation: 植被參數代表全球範圍內植被和細菌生命體的散佈和多樣性。改善植被對當地植被的生長速度和散佈有積極作用。 植被由正常運轉的造林站以及完成特殊工程提高。 植被提示資訊裡包含更多相關內容。

Text: Water parameter represents the quality and volume of water on the Martian surface. Large enough quantities of liquid water will form planetary seas and oceans and affect Vegetation. Water is increased by evaporation from Lakes and by completing Special Projects. The Water tooltip provides further information.
Translation: 水參數代表火星地表水的品質和體積。足夠多的液態水會在火星上形成海洋，並影響植被。 水由蒸發的湖水以及完成特殊工程提高。 水提示資訊裡包含更多相關內容。

Text: The temperatures on the Martian surface have dropped to freezing levels once more. Water will no longer remain liquid until we manage to bring temperatures back above freezing levels.
Translation: 火星地表溫度再次降到了冰點。我們若不設法使溫度回升到冰點以上，水就會一直處於固態。
地球化進展受阻：地表水凍結

Text:
With the warming of the atmosphere on Mars, water is now sustainable in its liquid form on the surface. 

We have indeed come a long way!
Translation:
隨著火星的氣溫變暖，現在水能在地表以液態形式存在了。

我們向前邁進了一大步！

Text:
With the use of special craft we pursued and deflected the asteroids off their trajectory with nothing more than slight bumps. Thus we have managed to gracefully steer large amounts of soon to be easily accessible water towards the surface of Mars.

In this game of space billiard though, there is always a chance that the ball will hit the wrong pocket. Be ready to deal with a Marsquake.
Translation:
我們使用特殊的飛船追蹤小行星並輕輕一碰使其偏離原本的飛行路線。這樣一來，我們成功地將大量可輕易利用的水資源優雅地引向了火星地表。

不過，在這局太空撞球遊戲中，我們可能會把球撞到錯誤的球袋裡。準備好應對地震吧。

Text: The capturing of Ice Asteroids has been successfully completed!
Translation: 富含冰的小行星的捕獲工作取得圓滿成功！

Text:
Nothing happened for a short while but right as the spectators began feeling down, the wind brought the first drops of fresh water rain.

Rejoice!
Translation:
一開始什麼情況也沒有，但就在大家開始感到失望時，風吹來了第一滴純淨的雨水。

歡呼吧！

Text: In a display reminiscent to formation flying shows back on Earth, special shuttles flew wave after wave in and out of the water vapor clouds above our colony.
Translation: 一批又一批的特種穿梭機像地球上的特技飛行表演似的不斷出入著殖民地上空的蒸汽雲團。

Text:
But a large scale project has been completed today. Several hundred tons of rocks used to suck out and store Greenhouse gasses from the atmosphere on Earth have been delivered to the surface of Mars.

By crash-landing them all over the planet we have triggered a chemical reaction that dissolves the rocks and contributes towards thickening the Martian Atmosphere by unleashing the stored gasses.
Translation:
不過今天完成了一項大工程。數百噸用來吸收並儲存地球大氣中溫室氣體的岩石已被空投到了火星地表。

我們透過在星球各處從高空投下這些岩石的方式觸發了使岩石溶解的化學反應，並釋放出儲存的氣體加厚火星大氣層。

Text: Just a few of the falling rocks, delivered by autonomous crafts from Earth, were visible to the naked eye.
Translation: 只有用肉眼觀察到地球來的自給飛行器投下的少量落石。

Text: As the Space Mirror moved into place and turned stray rays of the Sun towards us, a gleam of pride manifested on every observer's face at Mission Control.
Translation: 隨著空間反射鏡就位並把射偏的太陽光射向我們，任務指揮中心的每個觀察員都面露自豪的神情。

Text: The beauty of a space mirror can give pause to even the most seasoned astro-engineer.
Translation: 壯觀的空間反射鏡能令最有經驗的航天工程師動容。

Text:
After a few minutes of nerve-wrecking anticipation, waiting for the self-assessment protocols of the Sunshade to finish its thorough checkup, a green sign appeared. The Magnetic Shield is operational!

Then the cheers erupted and so did several bottles of champagne. We did it! Congratulations, citizens of Mars!
Translation:
人們緊張地等待著遮陽護盾的自我評估程式完成全面自檢。幾分鐘後，綠燈亮了起來。磁力護盾開始運轉！

緊接著，人群中爆發出了喝彩聲和香檳的開瓶聲。我們成功了！恭喜廣大火星居民！

Text: The Magnetic Shield settled in its orbit and slowly began expanding its sun-blocking appendages.
Translation: 磁力護盾已進入軌道，並開始慢慢展開遮陽零件。

Text:
The staggering number of thermonuclear devices had unleashed a monstrous amount of energy and in a matter of seconds changed the face of Mars forever.

A giant leap forward for the Terraforming of Mars had been made, yet a heavy silence fell in the room after the flashes dimmed down. We had witnessed a somber reminder of the destructive powers that humans possess.
Translation:
數量驚人的熱核武器在短短數秒鐘之內就釋放出了令人匪夷所思的巨大能量，並永遠改變了火星的表面。

我們的火星地球化工作取得了一次巨大的飛躍，但隨著光芒黯淡下去，整個房間陷入了沉寂。目睹瞭如此景象的我們回想起了人類擁有的毀天滅地的力量。

Text: The warheads detonated in a magnificent display of light, brighter than a thousand suns.  We watched in awe from the safety of our labs.
Translation: 核彈頭爆炸釋放出亮度勝過一千個太陽的烈光。在安全的實驗室裡的我們看得目瞪口呆。

Text:
A rocket filled with billions of seeds emptied its storage unit in a well orchestrated chain of steps, spreading the seeds over a vast range of land.

Most of these seeds will take root and the resulting swath of green land will begin pumping out Oxygen into the fledgeling Martian atmosphere.
Translation:
滿載著數十億枚種子的火箭按照精心安排的一系列步驟將種子播撒到遼闊的大地上。

這些種子大部分會生根發芽，長成的一片片綠地會將氧氣輸送進正在形成的火星大氣。

Text: Three, two, one... a collective gasp and then cheers. The Project was successful.
Translation: 三、二、一……全體驚訝失聲，然後歡呼。工程取得了成功。

Text:
If we send an Expedition Rocket to place some explosives, we can rig a small eruption which would benefit our terraforming effort.

Tectonic activity is extremely rare on Mars. We should expect trouble.
Translation:
如果派遣一艘探險火箭前往安置炸彈的話，我們可以讓這座小型火山噴發，這會有助於我們的土地改造計劃。

火星上很少會發生這種地質構造活動。這可能會為我們帶來一些麻煩。

Text: We have discovered a rare tectonic activity which may lead to a volcanic eruption... With a little help from us.
Translation: 我們發現了某種罕見的地質構造活動，這種活動可能會導致火山爆發……假如我們也幫忙推一把的話。

Text: Send a team of Geologists to blow it up!
Translation: 派遣地質學家把它炸上天！

Text: unlock an expedition for <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')> which triggers a Marsquake
Translation: 解鎖<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>和<resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>的探險隊，會導致地震

Text: Send a Geologist team to trigger the tectonic activity into an eruption. We expect there is a high probability of a Marsquake.
Translation: 派遣地質學家團隊鑽探火山，讓火山爆發。這麼做會有很大的機率造成地震。

Text: There is a way to do this remotely.
Translation: 可以透過遠端遙控的辦法實現這個目標。

Text: the volcanic eruption happens instantly; Marsquake
Translation: 立刻發生火山爆發，會發生地震

Text: We have delivered a baby! A small volcano erupted on Mars.
Translation: 我們成功讓火山爆發了！火星上某座小型火山爆發了。

Text:
Thanks to your expertise in flying rockets and setting explosives - experience which is a mystery for all colonists, as you certainly know to keep your secrets safe - now we can congratulate ourselves with a tiny new volcano on a planet which was believed to be tectonically dead. Good job, Commander!  

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>.
A Marsquake has just started.
Translation:
我們本以為這顆行星的地質構造活動已經停止了，但多虧了你在發射火箭與設定炸藥方面的豐富經驗（沒人知道你這些經驗是從哪裡來的，你確實很擅長保密），我們成功地讓這顆行星出現了一座新的火山。這真是值得好好慶祝一番。幹得漂亮，指揮官！

<effect>火星獲得了 <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>與<resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>。
地震來襲了。

Text: I don't want to set the world on fire.
Translation: 我可不想讓這個世界變成一片火海。

Text:
The rocket returned after successfully rigging the tectonic activity into a volcanic eruption. We were congratulating ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet, when the distant growl indicated the eruption.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>.
A Marsquake has just started.
Translation:
火箭成功地將地質結構活動升級為一場火山爆發，之後順利返航。正當我們慶祝將火星變為更適合人類居住的星球時，遠方傳來了火山噴發低沉的轟隆聲。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>和<resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>。
地震來襲了。

Text: We have delivered a baby! A small volcano erupted on Mars.
Translation: 我們成功讓火山爆發了！火星上某座小型火山爆發了。

Text: The salty waters are located underneath a mountain, but a well-equipped expedition can dig a gallery with metal supports in the main tunnel and place explosives. When triggered, the explosion would cut the face side of the mountain and open up path for the waters to pour in the giant crater nearby, creating a small sea of salty water.
Translation: 某座山下蘊含著鹽水資源。如果有裝備精良的探險隊，就可以一邊架設金屬支架，一邊挖掘隧道，放置炸藥。引爆後，爆炸產生的衝擊波會改變山體結構，讓鹽水注入附近巨大的火山口中，形成小型海洋。

Text: Send an RC Commander to do the job.
Translation: 派遣遙控指揮車完成任務。

Text: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>, requires Metals
Send an RC Commander to place explosives and release the salty underground waters.
Translation: 派遣遙控指揮車放置炸藥，將地下鹽水資源釋放到地表。

Text: I will lead a team to manually position the explosives.
Translation: 我準備率領隊伍手動放置炸藥。

Text: Send a team to place explosives and release the salty underground waters.
Translation: 派遣隊伍放置炸藥，將地下鹽水資源釋放到地表。

Text: Why don't we just nuke it from space?
Translation: 不如直接從太空扔顆核彈，把它炸平吧？

Text: Blowing up a mountain sounds too extreme. Permission denied!
Translation: 把整座山炸開，這聽起來實在是有點太極端了。這項請求我無法批准！

Text:
The rocket returned after unleashing the salty underground waters. We can congratulate ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>.
Translation:
火箭成功地將地下水資源引到了地表，之後順利返航。好好慶祝一番吧，我們成功地把這裡變成了更適合人類居住的星球。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>。

Text: We have run tests and it's amazing: this strain which botanists have given the pet name "Elsa", is able to withstand both very low and very high temperatures. Its amazing endurance will ensure its survival and hopefully benefit our terraforming effort.
Translation: 我們經過了多次測試，測試結果非常驚人：這種被植物學家稱之為“艾爾莎”的菌株可以抵抗嚴寒與酷暑環境。它極強的耐受效能保證它在火星上生存，說不定還能為我們的土地改造計劃帶來好處。

Text: We have discovered that a Bacteria culture we have brought to Mars has managed to perfectly adapt to its dry and cold environment.
Translation: 我們發現，某種從地球帶到火星的細菌已經成功適應了火星乾燥寒冷的環境。

Text: Let it go! Send an RC Commander to release Elsa.
Translation: 任其生長！派遣遙控指揮車釋放“艾爾莎”。

Text: Send a rocket to spread Cold-Resistant Bacteria on the surface of Mars.
Translation: 派遣火箭，將這種耐寒的細菌散佈在整個火星地表。

Text: Repurpose our Moisture Vaporators and use them to spread Elsa. Big summer blowout!
Translation: 重新設定水氣蒐集站，用它們散佈艾爾莎細菌。夏季盛宴到了！

Text: postpone for 1 Sol and gain <resource(terr_veg_small,'VegetationTP')> for each working Moisture Vaporator
Translation: 1個太陽日後，每有一個正常工作的水氣蒐集站，就獲得<resource(terr_veg_small,'VegetationTP')>

Text: We can manage without Elsa. The cold never bothered me anyway.
Translation: 就算沒有艾爾莎，我們也能做得到。至少這裡的嚴寒從來沒對我造成困擾。

Text:
Elsa, the new species of Cold-Resistant Bacteria, has been spread on the surface of Mars and it quickly adapted to the environment.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>.
Translation:
這種被稱為“艾爾莎”的耐寒細菌被散佈在了火星地表上，而且馬上適應了火星的環境。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>。

Text:
We have successfully rigged our Moisture Vaporators to spread Elsa into the hostile environment of Mars!

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg_small,'VegetationTP')> for each working Moisture Vaporator.
Translation:
我們已經成功地透過水氣蒐集站，將“艾爾莎”散佈在了火星惡劣的環境之中！

<effect>每個正常工作的水氣蒐集站都可以讓火星獲得<resource(terr_veg_small,'VegetationTP')>。

Text: They all can come our way if we manage to redirect this comet to the surface of Mars. The easiest way to do this is to cause a detonation in space.
Translation: 如果能想辦法將這顆彗星重定向至火星的方向，它就會向我們的方向飛來。想實現這個目標，最簡單的方法就是在太空中製造一場大爆炸。

Text: Carbon, Hydrogen, Oxygen, Nitrogen - the building blocks of life. Report says we have detected a comet that contains all of them.
Translation: 碳、氫、氧、氮 - 這些都是構成生命的基本元素。據報告聲稱，這顆彗星中含有全部四種元素。

Text: Use drones to drill it, place fuel and detonate it.
Translation: 使用無人機在彗星上鑽孔，設定燃料，之後引爆彗星。

Text: Send a rocket over these coordinates to mount explosive charges and steer the Comet towards the Mars surface.
Translation: 向彗星發射火箭，設定炸藥改變彗星的移動方向，讓它朝火星的方向飛來。

Text: Earth governments always wanted to do some strategic weapons precision testing in space.
Translation: 地球各國政府一直打算在太空中進行戰略武器的精密度試驗。

Text: This comet may be a heavenly sign.
Translation: 這顆彗星可能是來自天堂的啟示。

Text: do nothing; all Religious Colonists gain Morale
Translation: 什麼都不做，所有有“信仰者”特性的居民士氣上升

Text:
The rocket returned after successfully steering the Comet to the surface of Mars. We can congratulate ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet!

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>.
Translation:
火箭成功地將彗星牽引至火星的方向，之後順利返航。好好慶祝一番吧，我們成功地把這裡變成了更適合人類居住的星球！

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>。

Text:
It is the core of a comet stripped of its icy tail, and yet analyses confirm it still holds a significant supply of frozen gases and water. In addition it flies so close that we need a single MDS Laser to take it down and release usable gases in the atmosphere.

The only issue with it is that it vaguely resembles the shape of a human skull and a vocal minority is convinced that shooting it would bring bad luck.
Translation:
這是彗星的核心，雖然彗星星尾的冰片已經不見了，但分析結果顯示，核心內部依然含有大量氣體與水資源。另外，這顆彗星的距離離我們很近，我們只需要用反隕石鐳射炮將它擊落，便可以將其中的氣體釋放到火星大氣中。

但唯一的問題是，這顆彗星的形狀與人類的頭骨特別相似。少部分人認為，如果擊落彗星，會為所有人帶來厄運。

Text: We have calculated the trajectory of a very peculiarly-shaped asteroid.
Translation: 我們發現了一顆形狀非常獨特的小行星。

Text: Don't bother me with silly superstitions. Just shoot it.
Translation: 別跟我扯什麼迷信信仰之類的鬼話，把它打下來就是了。

Text: gain <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>, all Idiot Colonists lose Morale
Translation: 獲得<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>，所有有“愚蠢”特性的居民士氣下降

Text: We shall hold a special ceremony and consecrate the laser to destroy this devilry.
Translation: 我們應該舉行一場特別的儀式，將鐳射炮集中起來，消滅這個惡魔。

Text: It is heading to Earth! It's our duty to save our home planet from the curse!
Translation: 它朝著地球飛過去了！保護我們的家園免遭毀滅，這是我們義不容辭的責任！

Text: I wish I lived in more enlightened times...
Translation: 要是能生活在人們更開化的時代就好了……

Text:
We have discovered a dark-colored species of Calothrix Parietina which has wonderful Cold tolerance and if spread wide enough, may produce Oxygen through photosynthesis and even absorb radiation and hasten the ice melting. 

The biologists argue how should we use it better. We'll also need a lot of food to prepare growing media which is to be distributed with the bacterial culture across the planet.
Translation:
我們發現了一種眉藻屬的生物，這種生物顏色暗淡，擁有極強的抗寒能力。如果我們將它散佈在火星上，它或許能透過光合作用製造氧氣，甚至能吸收輻射，加速冰川融化的速度。

對於該如何利用這種細菌的問題，植物學家們爭論不休。我們還需要大量的食物作為細菌的培養基，這些培養基將與這些細菌一同散佈到火星表面。

Text: A recent research paper discussed a species of Cyanobacteria which can be easily introduced to Mars.
Translation: 最近某篇研究文獻中聲稱，某種藍藻細菌可以輕易移植到火星上。

Text: Spread it only on frozen water deposits to speed up the warming of Mars.
Translation: 只把這種細菌散佈在凍結的水資源點上，以此加速火星暖化的進度。

Text: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')> and <resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>, requires Food
Send a rocket to spread cyanobacteria on frozen water deposits to speed up the warming of Mars.
Translation: 派遣火箭，將藍藻細菌散佈在凍結的水資源點處，以此加速火星暖化的進度。

Text: Spread it to places with more favorable conditions so it would produce more Oxygen.
Translation: 將藍藻細菌散佈在環境更加適宜的地方，這樣細菌就能製造更多氧氣了。

Text: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>,  requires Food
Send a rocket to spread cyanobacteria on favorable places to speed up its Oxygen production.
Translation: 派遣火箭，將藍藻細菌散佈在環境更加適宜的地方，以此加速火星產生氧氣的進度。

Text: We have people to feed, not some bacteria.
Translation: 我們要養活的是人，不是什麼細菌。

Text: do nothing; all Glutton Colonists gain Morale
Translation: 什麼都不做，所有有“貪吃鬼”特性的居民士氣上升

Text:
The new species of Cyanobacteria has been spread on the surface of Mars and for the joy of the team, it quickly adapted to the environment, effectively helping frozen waters to melt.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')> and <resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>.
Translation:
新的藍藻細菌已經被散佈在了火星表面。讓科研團隊欣喜的是，這種細菌馬上就適應了火星的氣候，有效地加快了冰川融化的速度。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>和<resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>。

Text:
The new species of Cyanobacteria has been spread on the surface of Mars and for the joy of the team, it quickly adapted to the environment, effectively producing Oxygen.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>.
Translation:
新的藍藻細菌已經被散佈在了火星表面。讓科研團隊欣喜的是，這種細菌馬上就適應了火星的氣候，高效地製造起了氧氣。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>。

Text:
"Commander, during a standard sample control procedure we have isolated a microorganism which is definitely not from Earth. We haven't seen anything like this. The team managed to bring it out of its latent state and even registered cell division! They named it Kelvin. Isn't it cute?"

You see some intangible picture from an electronic microscope where a cell lazily divides in two. If this is what it looks, with the temperature increase we have probably revived something that once lived on Mars!
Translation:
“指揮官，在某次標準的樣本控制程式中，我們分離出了一種新的微生物。這種微生物顯然不是來自地球。我們以前從來沒見過這樣的微生物。科研小組已經讓它解除了休眠狀態，它甚至已經開始進行細胞分裂了！科學家們稱它為“開爾文”。它是不是很可愛？”

透過電子顯微鏡，你看到了一個細胞懶洋洋地分裂成了兩個細胞。如果你想得不錯，隨著氣溫不斷升高，我們甚至有可能復活火星上曾經存在過的某種生物！

Text: We have discovered a multi-celled organism of extra-terrestrial origin.
Translation: 我們發現了一種多細胞核的生物，這種生物來自外星。

Text: We should create a Martian Park with original Mars life. What could go wrong?
Translation: 我們應該為起源於火星的生物建造一座火星公園。這能出什麼問題呢？

Text: Continue, but install HUGE flamethrowers in the room, as a precaution.
Translation: 繼續吧，但要在房間裡設定一架“巨大的”火焰噴射器，以防萬一。

Text: Mars is a human domain now. Destroy this organism and don't pursue this line of research.
Translation: 火星如今已經是人類的領地了。消滅這種生物，別再去管相關的研究了。

Text:
The native organism Kelvin we revived on Mars turned out to be a deadly monster. No one ever expected that to happen. It grew super fast to the size of a cat, but with tentacles; then it ate the cat of one of the scientists; then one of the scientists went looking for her cat and got eaten too, and then another one while looking for her...

In the end, the monster was heroically killed by the janitor who lost an arm, mounted a Drone claw in place of it and crafted a makeshift high voltage taser from the Drone battery. When security finally broke into the central room, they saw only the surviving janitor who was yelling "WHERE! WHERE IS THE NEXT LEVEL?!"

<effect>A Research Lab is destroyed and all workers are dead. A drone is destroyed and the Colonist <DisplayName> gains the Chronic Condition and Survivor Traits.
Translation:
我們在火星上覆活的生物“開爾文”，變成了一隻可怕的怪物。沒人想到會發生這種事情。它很快就長到了像貓一樣的大小，渾身還長出了觸手。隨後，它吃掉了某個科學家養的貓，那個去找貓的科學家也被它吃掉了。再後來，去尋找失蹤科學家的另一位科學家也被吃掉了……

最後，一位勇敢的守門人殺死了這隻怪物。這位守門人失去了一條胳膊，他把無人機的鋼爪當做義肢來用，還用無人機的電池做了一把臨時的高壓電機槍。當保安人員終於衝進中央房間內，他們只看到倖存下來的守門人在高喊著：“在哪裡？！下一層在什麼地方？！”

<effect>一間研究實驗室被摧毀了，所有的工人都喪命了。一架無人機被破壞了，殖民地居民<DisplayName>獲得了“慢性病”與“倖存者”的特性。

Text: Incinerate the monster's remains and reward the janitor.
Translation: 焚燒怪物的屍體，並獎勵守門人。

Text: Scoop the monster's remains. For science!
Translation: 採掘怪物的遺骸。為了科學！

Text: We need more of those monsters to build a Martian Park.
Translation: 為了建造火星公園，我們需要更多這樣的怪物。

Text:
The native organism Kelvin we revived on Mars turned out to be a deadly monster. No one ever expected that to happen - except you, Commander!

The creature grew super fast to the size of a cat, but with tentacles, then it tried to break free by destroying the bulletproof glass of the lab case in which it was imprisoned. The heavy industrial flamers above were auto-activated and wreathed the creature in a ring of fire. It wasn't badly hurt, but in a violent burst of rage it has torn itself to pieces. 

Seems there is a perfectly good reason why Mars has become a wasteland planet.
Translation:
我們在火星上覆活的生物“開爾文”，變成了一隻可怕的怪物。沒人想到會發生這種事情 - 幸好你早有準備，指揮官！

那隻怪物它很快就長到了像貓一樣的大小，渾身還長出了觸手。它打算破壞實驗室的防彈玻璃，從牢籠中逃出去。它的行為自動啟動了實驗室上方的工業火焰噴射器，它被包裹在熊熊烈焰之中。雖然它並沒有受到重傷，但它憑著一股洶湧的怒氣，把自己撕成了碎片。

看起來，這似乎就說得通為什麼火星是個不毛之地了。

Text: Put the monster's remains on display.
research boost by 5% in the field of Biotech
Translation: 生物技術領域的研究加快5%

Text: Scrape off the monster's remains. For science!
Translation: 消滅怪物的遺骸。為了科學！

Text: I will personally perform the dissection.
Translation: 我將親自對怪物進行解剖。

Text: Monsters or not, they deserve to live! More of them should run free in the wild.
Translation: 不管它們是不是怪物，它們都擁有活下去的權利！應該讓更多這樣的動物在原野上自由奔跑。

Text:
Who would expect that the native life forms we revived - the Kelvins, would be able to escape our custody and start to hunt humans!

<effect>Lately, there are a lot of casualties caused by them. For the last 10 Sols there are about <people_killed>% of the population killed by Kelvins.
Translation:
有誰能想到會發生這種事情呢？我們復活的本地生物 - 開爾文，從實驗室裡跑了出去，之後便開始狩獵人類了！

<effect>最近，他們造成了重大的居民傷亡。在過去的10個太陽日裡，大約有<people_killed>%的人口被開爾文殺害了。

Text: Announce a hunting season to decrease the Kelvins' population.
Translation: 宣佈狩獵期開始，減少開爾文的數量。

Text: The Kelvins have the right to live according to the laws of Nature.
Translation: 開爾文有權按照“弱肉強食”的叢林法則生存。
所有有“嬉皮”特性的居民士氣上升

Text:
There are even more casualties caused by the native life forms we revived - the Kelvins. The little monsters use the Martian vegetation to hide and hunt humans.
However, there are a lot of reports of Kelvins which tend to attack each other or even themselves when under stress.

<effect>For the last 10 Sols there are about <people_killed>% of the population killed by Kelvins.
Translation:
我們復活了火星本地的生物"開爾文"，而這些生物造成了更嚴重的傷亡。這些小怪物利用火星上的植被隱藏行跡，獵殺人類。
不過，最近有許多報告聲稱，當開爾文處於壓力狀態之下時，它們可能會攻擊同伴，甚至自殘。

<effect>在過去的10個太陽日之內，約有<people_killed>%的居民遭到了開爾文的毒手。

Text: Everyone remain calm! We have the situation under control.
Translation: 所有人保持冷靜！事態已經在我們的控制中了。

Text: Announce a hunting season to decrease the Kelvins' population.
Translation: 宣佈狩獵期開始，減少開爾文的數量。

Text: Hunting is cruel and unethical even in this extreme case.
Translation: 即使是在這種極端情況下，狩獵也依然是殘忍的、不道德的行為。

Text: all Vegan Colonists gain Morale, some more people die
Translation: 所有有“素食主義者”特性的居民士氣上升，一些居民可能會死亡

Text:
The native life forms we revived - the Kelvins, turned out to be a savage, bloodthirsty, and extremely stupid species. They acted with blind aggression towards everything - from people, to random rocks; from enemies, to mating partners. No wonder they didn't make it.

At least we have learned something from this calamity.

<effect>For the last 10 Sols there are about <people_killed>% of the population killed; the Kelvins are now extinct. New Techs have been discovered.
Translation:
事實證明，我們復活的火星生物"開爾文"，實際上是一種野蠻、嗜血、且極為愚蠢的生物。它們幾乎會盲目地攻擊遇到的一切。無論是人類還是岩石，無論是敵人還是它們的性伴侶，都會遭到它們的攻擊。怪不得它們滅絕了呢。

至少我們從這場災難中吸收到了某種教訓。

<effect>在過去的10個太陽日之內，約有<people_killed>%的居民遭到了開爾文的毒手。開爾文已經滅絕了。發現了新的技術。
所有有“膽小”特性的居民士氣上升

Text: You have to admit, the Kelvins were a sight to behold.
Translation: 你不得不承認，“開爾文”這種生物確實讓人印象深刻。
所有有“科技宅”特性的居民士氣上升

Text: Mother Nature works in mysterious ways.
Translation: 自然母親的安排總是讓人無法捉摸。
所有有“嬉皮”特性的居民士氣上升

Text:
One of the genetically revived monsters we accidentally released - a Kelvin, had bad luck today. It decided to attack Ms. <DisplayName> - a martial artist, survivalist and distant relative to the film star Nuck Chorris. According to some eyewitness reports, our girl managed to take manual control of a drone and in a glorious jousting ride, she used it to smash the monster against the dome wall. Others insist that she roundhouse kicked the monster against the wall.

<effect>A Dome is damaged. <DisplayName> became a Celebrity.
Translation:
我們之前不小心放出了基因改造過的怪物“開爾文”。而今天，其中一隻怪物碰上了硬釘子。它打算襲擊<DisplayName>小姐，這位小姐是武術大師、生存達人，還是動作巨星納克·卡里斯的遠房親戚。部分目擊者聲稱，當事人翻身乘上一架無人機，開著無人機把怪物撞進了穹頂的牆裡。還有部分目擊者堅持聲稱，是當事人使出了一記漂亮的迴旋踢，一腳把怪物踹進了牆裡。

<effect>一座穹頂受損了。<DisplayName>成為了名人。

Text: She rode a Drone to victory.
Translation: 她用無人機幹掉了怪物。

Text: She did both at the same time, while knitting with titanium wire.
Translation: 她一邊開著無人機，一邊踢死了怪物，手裡還用鈦絲織著毛衣呢。

Text:
If we manage to redirect it and take it down, it will provide plenty of frozen water to our terraforming effort. We can achieve this by mounting engines on the icy rock, and by guiding it to crash on Mars.

Giant asteroid crashing on a planet - what could go wrong?
Translation:
如果能改變它的路徑，再把它擊碎，它就可以為我們的土地改造計劃提供充足的結冰水資源。我們可以在這顆小行星上安裝引擎，然後把它推到火星的軌道上。

讓一顆巨大的行星撞擊火星，這哪裡會出什麼問題呢？

Text: We have discovered a giant ice asteroid in close proximity.
Translation: 我們發現附近有一顆體積很大的富含冰的小行星。

Text: Send drones to operate the engines and steer it on a collision course.
Translation: 派遣無人機安裝引擎，將它推到火星的軌道上。

Text: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_water_big,'WaterTP')> which will cause a Marsquake
Send a drone-controlled rocket to mount engines on the Asteroid and splash it on Mars. We should expect a Marsquake when this happens.
Translation: 發射一枚由無人機控制的火箭，在小行星上安裝引擎，讓它撞向火星。小行星撞擊火星時，我們要做好發生地震的準備。

Text: Send drones and a team to extract them, then detonate in orbit.
Translation: 派遣無人機與工作團隊開採資源，之後在火星軌道上引爆小行星。

Text: Send a team to mount engines on the Asteroid and detonate it in the atmosphere for a boost of evaporated gases and water.
Translation: 派遣工作團隊在小行星上安裝引擎，之後在大氣層中引爆小行星，提高大氣層中的大氣與水分。

Text: I will lead a team to mount the engines and crash it on the other side of Mars.
Translation: 我打算帶著一群人，在它上面安裝引擎，讓它撞向火星的另外一側。

Text: Send a team to mount engines on the Asteroid, navigate and splash it on the other side of Mars.
Translation: 派遣一隊人在小行星上安裝引擎，讓它撞向火星的另一側。

Text: I don't want to put the colony at risk.
Translation: 我可不想讓我的殖民地遇到危險。

Text:
The rocket returned after successfully steering the Ice Asteroid to the surface of Mars. We were congratulating ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet, when the distant thunder indicated the impact.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_water_big,'WaterTP')>.
<drones_lost> Drones have been lost.
A Marsquake has just started.
Translation:
火箭成功地改變了小行星的行進方向，之後順利返航。當我們正在慶祝成功將火星改造成更加適合人類居住的星球時，遠方傳來了雷鳴般的震動聲。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_water_big,'WaterTP')>。
失去了<drones_lost>個無人機。
地震來襲了。

Text:
The rocket returned after successfully detonating the Ice Asteroid. We can congratulate ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet!

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_water_small,'WaterTP')>.
Translation:
火箭成功地將小行星爆破，之後順利返航。來慶祝一番吧！我們成功地把火星改造成了更加適合人類居住的星球

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>和<resource(terr_water_small,'WaterTP')>。

Text:
The rocket returned after successfully steering the Ice Asteroid on a collision course on the other side of Mars. We can congratulate ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet!

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo_small,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_water_mid,'WaterTP')>.
Translation:
火箭成功地讓小行星撞向了火星的另一側，之後順利返航。來慶祝一番吧！我們成功地把火星改造成了更加適合人類居住的星球

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_atmo_small,'AtmosphereTP')>和<resource(terr_water_mid,'WaterTP')>。

Text:
This bacteria strain has adapted to the climate of Mars and cheerfully replicates even in these harsh conditions. We only need to release it in the underground water system and distribute it in this way around the planet, so it can thrive in the ferric oxide rich waters of the Red Planet.

The problem is, someone has spread a rumor that this bacteria causes respiratory problems. This is nonsense, but people are worried.
Translation:
這種細菌已經適應了火星的氣候，在這種嚴酷的環境下也能順利繁殖。我們只要把它釋放到地下水系統中，用這種方式將它散佈在整個火星，它就能在火星富含氧化鐵的水中茁壯成長了。

但問題在於，有人散播起了謠言，說這種細菌會導致呼吸系統的疾病。這簡直是無稽之談，但人們卻對此感到擔憂。

Text: In one of our oldest water tanks we have discovered a stable colony of iron-oxidizing bacteria.
Translation: 我們在最早設定的一批水箱中，發現了鐵氧化菌的穩定菌落。

Text: Ignore their concerns. Send a Geologist team to distribute the Bacteria.
Translation: 無視他們的擔憂，派遣地質學家團隊散佈這種細菌。

Text: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_atmo_big,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>, a few Colonists lose Morale
Translation: 解鎖<resource(terr_atmo_big,'AtmosphereTP')>和<resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>的探險隊，少量殖民地居民士氣下降

Text:
There is a small crowd in front of your office, yelling and complaining. Someone is holding a poster "DON'T IMPURIFY OUR PRECIOUS BODILY FLUIDS", another is shouting "KEEP MARS WATERS PRISTINE" - as if they ever were, before all the filtration takes place.

<effect><morale_loss_percent>% of all Colonists lose <morale_loss> for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
一小群人聚集在你的辦公室前，大喊大叫。有人手裡拿著橫幅“不要汙染我們寶貴的體液”，還有人大喊著“要保持火星水域的原始狀態”，說的就好像他們喝的水不是過濾過的水一樣。

<effect><morale_loss_percent>%的居民士氣降低<morale_loss>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日。

Text: Send a Geologist team to deliver Iron-Oxidizing Bacteria to the underground water system of Mars.
Translation: 派遣地質學家團隊，將這種鐵氧化菌散步到火星的地下水系統中。

Text: Trust me, the team will distribute the bacteria away from our water sources.
Translation: 相信我，我們的人會把這種細菌散佈在遠離我們水源的位置。

Text: Send a Geologist team to deliver Iron-Oxidizing Bacteria to the underground water system of Mars.
Translation: 派遣地質學家團隊，將這種鐵氧化菌散步到火星的地下水系統中。

Text: Ignore their concerns and use our Water Extractors to distribute the bacteria.
Translation: 無視他們的擔憂，使用水資源挖掘站散佈這種細菌。

Text: postpone for 1 Sol and gain <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')> per Water Extractor
Translation: 1個太陽日之後，每有一個水資源挖掘站，就獲得<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>和<resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>。

Text: We will never endanger the health of our colonists!
Translation: 我們是絕不會拿居民們的健康來冒險的！

Text:
The rocket returned after successfully spreading Iron-oxidizing Bacteria in the ferric oxide rich waters of the Red Planet.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo_big,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>.
Translation:
火箭成功地將這種鐵氧化菌散佈在了火星富含氧化鐵的水中，之後順利返航。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_atmo_big,'AtmosphereTP')>和<resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>。

Text:
We have successfully distributed the iron-oxidizing Bacteria into the underground water system of Mars. Those tireless little helpers are still doing our job!

However, there is a small crowd in front of your office, yelling and complaining. Someone is holding a poster "DON'T IMPURIFY OUR PRECIOUS BODILY FLUIDS", another is shouting "KEEP MARS WATERS PRISTINE" - as if they ever were, before all the filtration takes place.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')> for each working Water Extractor. <morale_loss_percent>% of Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
我們成功地將這種鐵氧化菌散佈在了火星的地下水系統中。這些不知疲倦的小傢伙會幫助我們改造星球的！

然而，卻有一小群人聚集在你的辦公室前，大喊大叫。有人手裡拿著橫幅“不要汙染我們寶貴的體液”，還有人大喊著“要保持火星水域的原始狀態”，說的就好像他們喝的水不是過濾過的水一樣。

<effect>每有一個正常工作的水資源挖掘站，火星就獲得<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>和<resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>。<morale_loss_percent>%的居民士氣降低<morale_loss>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日。

Text:
Used rocket stages, dead satellites and all kind of debris – we have surely left our mark on Mars orbit as we have done with our own planet. Even though it can eventually endanger the space flights, all this stuff tends to burn into Mars' young atmosphere and help raise the temperature levels.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_temp_small,'TemperatureTP')>.
Translation:
我們確實在火星上留下了我們的痕跡，就像我們對地球做得那樣 - 到處都是火箭推進器、衛星殘骸和各式各樣的碎片。雖然這些垃圾最終可能會對星際飛行構成威脅，但它們也會在火星的大氣層中燃燒，從而提高火星的整體溫度。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_temp_small,'TemperatureTP')>。

Text: Everywhere we Humans go, for sure there is one thing we leave behind: junk.
Translation: 無論我們人類去什麼地方，我們肯定會留下這種東西：垃圾。

Text: Looks more like a solution, not like a problem! Leave it be.
Translation: 這看起來更像是解決之道，而不是什麼問題！就隨它去吧。
所有有“懶惰”特性的居民士氣上升

Text: The terraforming initiative could actually use MORE junk in space.
Translation: 土地改造計劃說不定會用到更多太空垃圾呢。

Text: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>, requires Metals
Send an expedition to spread some more metals in space and improve the greenhouse effect on the planet.
Translation: 派遣探險隊在太空中散播更多金屬垃圾，改善這顆星球的溫室效應。

Text: This a threat to future generations. Send a Rocket to clean the skies.
Translation: 這會給子孫後代帶來威脅。派遣火箭清理太空垃圾。

Text: unlock an Expedition to reclaim resources and decrease Fuel costs
Translation: 解鎖探險隊，探險隊可以回收資源，同時降低燃料消耗

Text: Send an expedition to clean Mars space from dangerous junk.
Translation: 派遣探險隊，清理火星附近的危險垃圾

Text:
We have successfully littered Mars orbit with even more junk! 

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>. Rocket Fuel costs increased by <fuel_costs>.
Translation:
我們已經成功地在火星軌道上散播了更多垃圾！

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>。火箭燃料消耗增加<fuel_costs>。

Text:
The Martian orbital space has been successfully cleaned. Rockets no longer need additional Fuel for evasive maneuvers.

Good job, Commander! You have done something the Earthlings never attempted.

<effect>Fuel costs decreased back to normal.
Translation:
我們已經把火星軌道清理乾淨了。火箭已經不再需要消耗更多燃料來避開太空垃圾了。

幹得漂亮，指揮官！你做到了地球人從來沒嘗試過的事情。

<effect>燃料消耗降低至正常值。

Text:
Our space is still full of junk which helps our terraforming effort, but is a threat to space flights. Should we do something about it?

<effect>A Meteor Storm has started. Mars has gained <resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>. Rocket Fuel costs increased by <fuel_costs>.
Translation:
我們的太空中佈滿了垃圾，雖然這有助於土地改造計劃，但會對星際飛行造成威脅。我們應該為此做點什麼嗎？

<effect>隕石風暴來襲，火星獲得了<resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>。火箭燃料消耗增加<fuel_costs>。

Text: Junk in Space: a minor concern
Translation: 太空垃圾：不是什麼大問題

Text: Rockets may need more fuel, but for now this is acceptable.
Translation: 雖然火箭可能會需要更多燃料，但目前為止，這沒什麼大不了的。

Text: This is a threat to future generations on Mars. Send a Rocket to clean the skies.
Translation: 這會給火星上的子孫後代帶來威脅。派遣火箭清理太空垃圾。

Text:
Our space is crowded with debris and all kind of dangerous space junk which threatens the flights. Rockets need to take more and more complicate routes to avoid collision. It seems this is starting to get out of hand.

<effect>A Meteor Storm has started. Mars has gained <resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>. Rocket Fuel costs further increased by <fuel_costs>.
Translation:
我們的太空已經佈滿了隕石碎片和各式各樣的太空垃圾，這會對星際飛行構成威脅。為了躲避太空垃圾，火箭不得不採取越來越複雜的航道進行規避。太空垃圾問題似乎已經開始失控了。

<effect>隕石風暴來襲，火星獲得了<resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>。火箭燃料消耗增加<fuel_costs>。

Text: Junk in Space: a pressing issue
This may be a problem, but now is not the time to solve it.
Translation: 這可能確實是個問題，但這個問題並不需要現在解決。
所有有“熱心”特性的居民士氣下降

Text: Time to send a rocket and fix this mess while it is manageable.
Translation: 趁著一切還不算太遲，是時候發射一艘火箭，解決垃圾問題了。

Text: unlock an Expedition to reclaim resources and decrease Fuel costs
Translation: 解鎖探險隊，探險隊可以回收資源，同時降低燃料消耗

Text: Send an expedition to clean Mars space from dangerous junk and reclaim resources.
Translation: 派遣探險隊，清理火星附近的危險垃圾，同時回收資源。

Text: Send an expedition to clean Mars space from dangerous junk and reclaim resources.
Translation: 派遣探險隊，清理火星附近的危險垃圾，同時回收資源。

Text:
Our space is a graveyard of old satellites, spare parts and all kinds of debris from the size of a snowflake, to the size of a small car. No wonder when the first rain of junk appeared, it looked like an asteroid bombardment.

This issue cannot wait any longer.

<effect>A Meteor Storm has started. Mars has gained <resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>. Rocket Fuel costs further increased by <fuel_costs>.
An Expedition to reclaim resources and decrease Fuel costs has been unlocked.
Translation:
我們的太空已經變成了各種舊衛星、備用零件和各種碎片的垃圾場，這些垃圾小到雪片那麼小，大到小汽車那麼大。難怪當第一場垃圾雨來襲的時候，當時的景象就像是小行星撞擊地面一樣。

這個問題已經不能再拖延下去了。

<effect>隕石風暴來襲，火星獲得了<resource(terr_temp,'TemperatureTP')>。火箭燃料消耗進一步提高<fuel_costs>。
已解鎖探險隊，可以回收太空資源，並降低燃料消耗。

Text: Waiting this long was a mistake.
Translation: 這個問題不應該拖這麼久才解決。
所有有“膽小”特性的居民士氣下降

Text: Disregard all complaints. Everything is going according to the plan.
Translation: 對所有的投訴置之不理。一切都在按計劃進行。
所有有“愛發牢騷”特性的居民士氣下降

Text:
There is some puzzling news from the power supply supervisor. Apparently, a half-melted toolbox full of screwdrivers has smashed into a Stirling Generator and has, well, screwed it. Who may have dropped a toolbox in space, is now the smaller issue.

<effect>A building is destroyed.
Translation:
供電主管威力帶來了一件令人費解的消息。很顯然，有一臺斯特靈發電機被一個裝滿了螺絲起子、半熔化的工具箱砸壞了。或許是什麼人在太空中弄掉了工具箱，但這個問題和被損壞的發電機相比，不值一提。

<effect>一座建築被摧毀了。

Text: Junk in Space: It's Raining Junk!
Translation: 太空垃圾：垃圾如暴雨而降！

Text: From what we know, it could have been a giant ball of garbage.
Translation: 據我們所知，那可能是個巨大的垃圾球。

Text:
A box of nails has rained down from the sky, red hot from the friction with the atmosphere, and has nailed hard one of our Atomic accumulators. 

The big question remains - who found any use for nails in outer space? And who would have thrown them out?

<effect>A building has exploded.
Translation:
一盒釘子從天上落了下來，經過大氣層的時候被燒得通紅，還把我們的一座原子蓄電站釘穿了。

疑團還沒有揭開：到底是什麼人打算在太空裡用釘子釘東西？又是什麼人把這些釘子扔出來了？

<effect>一座建築爆炸了。

Text: Junk in Space: It's Raining Junk
Translation: 太空垃圾：垃圾如暴雨而降

Text: Ivan, how many times have I told you...
Translation: 伊萬，我都跟你說過多少次了……

Text: I'm still waiting for the hammer to fall.
Translation: 我還等著天上落下來一把錘子呢。

Text:
Orbital control has warned you about a giant ball of garbage heading to our location. It looks like it has formed in our orbit, but that cannot explain the traces of organic matter. Some jokingly speculate it was launched from Earth as a desperate attempt to get rid of their own junk.

<effect>A Meteor Storm is on its way. You have 1 Sol to prepare and build more MDS Lasers to protect the colony.
Translation:
軌道控制中心提醒你，一座巨大的垃圾球正在朝我們的位置落下來。雖然這個垃圾球看起來像是在火星的軌道上形成的，但這解釋不了垃圾球上的有機物質是怎麼來的。有些人開玩笑說，地球人打算處理掉他們自己的垃圾，於是就把垃圾扔過來了。

<effect>隕石風暴即將來襲。你還有1個太陽日的時間設置反隕石鐳射炮，保護殖民地。

Text: Junk in Space: It's Raining Junk
Translation: 太空垃圾：垃圾如暴雨而降

Text: Space garbage... I think I can almost smell it from here.
Translation: 太空垃圾的味道……我在這裡差不多都能聞到了。

Text: Garbage for some, treasure for others.
Translation: 對某些人來說是垃圾，對別人來說是寶物。

Text: Garbage or not, depends on how you feel about it.
Translation: 它們究竟是不是垃圾，取決於你怎麼看待它們。

Text: I have nothing to do with that, I swear.
Translation: 我發誓，那件事情和我一點關係都沒有。

Text:
A giant ball of garbage is about to splash on the surface and destroy the world as we know it! Luckily, we have lasers to blast it to smelly pieces. And what is considered junk on Earth, on Mars is useful fertilizer.

<effect>A Meteor Storm has started. Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')> for each working MDS Laser.
Translation:
一顆巨大的垃圾球即將洛在火星表面，摧毀我們所在的整個世界！幸好，我們可以用鐳射炮把它炸成臭氣熏天的小垃圾塊。雖然這種東西在地球上被當做垃圾，但在火星上卻能成為有用的肥料。

<effect>隕石風暴來襲，每個正常工作的反隕石鐳射炮都可以讓火星獲得<resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>。

Text: Junk in Space: It's Raining Junk
Translation: 太空垃圾：垃圾如暴雨而降

Text: This must be the smelliest object in the known universe!
Translation: 這簡直是整個宇宙裡最臭的東西了！

Text: We will survive this, or I'll eat my shorts.
Translation: 我們肯定不會有事的。要是我說錯了，我就把我的內褲吃了。
讓垃圾來得更猛烈些吧！

Text:
The genius has gathered statistical data and discovered that the level of violent crimes at one of our Domes is much lower than the average. He wondered why, and just recently he studied the water sources on Mars and discovered something in the water at this Dome - a chemical compound which makes people more peaceful and cooperative.

More importantly, the genius managed to isolate the compound! We call it the "Water of Peace formula". With some technical help, we can produce and distribute it over the whole planet while we terraform it, or even to Earth. With the unstable political situation back on Earth, this may be the solution for world peace!
Translation:
這位天才科學家搜集了殖民地的統計資料，發現其中一個穹頂的犯罪率遠遠低於平均水準。出於好奇，他近日研究了火星水源的情況，發現那個穹頂的水源中含有某種特殊的化合物。這種化合物可以讓人們變得更加安寧，更加樂於互相幫助。

更重要的是，這位天才科學家成功地分離出了這種化合物！我們稱之為“和平之水配方”。只要有了一定程度的技術協助，我們就可以在土地改造的過程中散佈這種化合物，甚至可以將它散佈到地球上。考慮到地球上動盪的政治局勢，這種化合物可能會為世界帶來和平！

Text: An enthusiastic colonist rushes into your office with a glorious idea.
Translation: 一位熱心的殖民地居民衝進了你的辦公室，提出了一個美妙的主意。

Text: This is a unique opportunity! Permission granted for production.
Translation: 這絕對是個千載難逢的機會！允許大規模生產。

Text: Influencing people like this sounds highly unethical. Permission denied.
Translation: 用這種方法影響人們，聽起來很不符合倫理學。拒絕請求。

Text: Let me see this diagram. Have you compared it to other statistics in the region?
Translation: 讓我看看這份圖示。你有沒有與這個地區的其它資料進行過比對？

Text:
The Water of Peace formula discovered by our genius colonist <DisplayName> is surprisingly easy to reproduce and aside from making people nicer to each other, it slightly decreases the melting point of water, which may be enough to make a difference on planetary scale. We could easily incorporate it in our water supply and irrigation systems and spread its benefits throughout the planet, or bottle it and sell it to Earth.

We don't have the resources to do both.
Translation:
根據我們的天才居民<DisplayName>的發現，這種“和平之水”的製造過程極為簡單。它除了能讓人們變得更加友善之外，還會略微降低水的熔點。如果從行星的尺度上來看的話，這樣的區別可能會導致顯著的差異。我們可以將這種化合物納入我們的水供應與灌溉系統中，讓整個星球的人都享受到它的恩澤，也可以把它製成瓶裝水賣給地球人。

我們沒有足夠的資源同時做兩件事。

Text: Go on, spread it on Mars!
Translation: 來吧，在火星上散佈它吧！

Text: Let's make some money of it. Patent it and sell it to Earth.
Translation: 咱們可以用它大賺一筆。申請這項化合物的專利，然後把它賣給地球人。
在1個太陽日內獲得<funding(funding_gain)>，後果未知

Text: Sounds too good to be true. We may need further research before we delve deeper.
Translation: 聽起來實在是太理想化了，讓人難以置信。或許我們需要進一步研究，才能得到更多結論。

Text: On second thought, we'd rather drop this project.
Translation: 仔細想想的話，還是放棄這個計劃吧。

Text:
Your security advisor comes to your office with a large folder in hand. She warns you about some suspicious activity they initially thought to be sabotage: chemical compounds missing from a lab, satellites redirected from a certain point on Mars... Turns out, our friend <DisplayName> who wanted to improve mankind with his pacifying Water of Peace, has taken things into his own hands.

<DisplayName> secretly produced a large quantity of the Water of Peace compound. The genius found a way to use water extractors for delivering it into the underground water system and even discovered that as a side effect, it slightly decreases the melting point of water, allowing for a terraforming benefit.
Translation:
你的安全顧問來到了你的辦公室，手裡拿著一個大檔案袋。她警告你最近發生了一些可疑活動，可能是有人蓄意破壞：實驗室中的化學品莫名遺失，火星某個位置的衛星莫名改道……原來是我們的朋友<DisplayName>打算透過“和平之水”來改善人類，他打算親自來完成這件事情。

<DisplayName>偷偷摸摸地生產了大量“和平之水”化合物。這位天才發現，可以利用水資源挖掘站將這種化合物注入地下水系統之中，甚至連這種化合物的副作用都能派上用場。它會略微降低水的熔點，這有助於我們的土地改造計劃。

Text: He seems really confident that it’ll work. Let's see how it unfolds.
Translation: 他看起來對這種化合物的效果充滿信心。我們來拭目以待吧。

Text: Immediately put a stop to this unsanctioned activity!
Translation: 立刻阻止這種未經許可的行為！
天才居民的理智度將會下降

Text:
The research confirmed the claims of <DisplayName>, our genius. The Water of Peace really helps people soothe their emotions, reduce stress and aggression and be better people in general. When one compares renegade activity and crime rates in different domes and back on Earth, the Dome where the Water of Peace compound was discovered shines with much better numbers. 

Yet the comparison of different statistics shows an alarming trend. The rate of people with extraordinary low IQ in this Dome is unexpectedly high. There may be some connection, or this may be a random correlation.
Translation:
研究人員證實了我們的天才<DisplayName>的說法。和平之水確實能幫助人們緩和情緒，減輕壓力與攻擊性，從而對其他人變得更加友善。透過比較不同穹頂的叛徒行為與犯罪率，以及與地球的資料進行比對，研究人員發現，擁有和平之水的穹頂在這些方面的資料確實要低得多。

然而，其它方面的數據卻讓人不得不警惕。這個穹頂內智力極端低下人口的比例遠遠超出正常值。兩者之間或許有某種聯絡。當然，也可能只是巧合而已。

Text: It is a random correlation. Spread the Water of Peace and save the world!
Translation: 這不過是巧合而已。立刻散佈和平之水，拯救這個世界吧！

Text: It is alarming. Put a stop to this project.
Translation: 這讓人不得不保持警惕，這項計劃該叫停了。

Text:
"Commander, the operation went as planned. We produced vast quantities of the Water of Peace and placed them in them water extractors. When they workd, this water of Piece entered them undergraund deposits. It didnt work purfect as mars wata supply is veri lou but it stil afekted a lots of peoples. We fil gud as we never biin frends liek dis befor. All is wel comander no wore!!!!!""

It seems this Water of Peace reacted chemically with another element in the Martian waters and now not only affects the natural aggressiveness of human beings, but it also drastically reduces their overall intelligence. 

<effect><count_idiots> Colonists gain the Idiot and the Enthusiast traits. Mars has gained <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>. The genius loses Sanity.
Translation:
“指揮官，計劃進行得很順利。我們製造了大量和平之水，把它們注入了水資源挖掘站裡。這樣一來，水資源挖掘站在執行的時候，就楞把這種水注入地下水中。隨然計劃不是特憋順力，因為火興的水資源不是很衝足，但還是有很多句民收到了影響。我們柑橘非常開欣，我悶從來沒甘菊到這麼友號！智慧官！這一切都太沒號了！！！！”

“和平之水”似乎與火星水中某種其它化合物發生了反應，它雖然減弱了人類的攻擊行為，但也同樣大大地拉低了所有人的智力。

<effect><count_idiots>殖民地居民獲得“愚蠢”與“熱心”特性。火星獲得了<resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>。天才的理智度下降了。
這樣的結果真是太可怕了。

Text:
You receive a text message from your Sponsor back on Earth.

"Greetings comander! We ar veri greatful of dis shipment of speshul wata u sented us. It is veri gud and we fiil hepi and gud frends mor dan ever. Plese send mor! U ar greit."

It seems this Water of Peace reacted chemically with another element on Earth and now not only affects the natural aggressiveness of human beings, but it also drastically reduces their overall intelligence. 

<effect>Gain <funding(funding_gain)> and lose all Sponsor research for <sols(pause_research)> Sols.
Translation:
你收到了地球的贊助者發來的資訊。

“哩好呀！紙揮官！我們肥腸感謝哩們給我們整過來的這靴水。這鞋水真是臺幫了，我們柑橘非常開欣，我悶從來沒甘菊到這麼友號。在給俺們點吧！磊們真是臺棒了。”

“和平之水”似乎與地球水中某種其它化合物發生了反應，它雖然減弱了人類的攻擊行為，但也同樣大大地拉低了所有人的智力。

<effect>獲得<funding(funding_gain)>，在<sols(pause_research)>個太陽日內失去所有贊助者的研究點數。

Text: Nobody on Earth will ever spot the difference.
Translation: 地球上不會有人意識到發生了變化。

Text: I cee no trobles here. Jus giv me anoder glas of wata.
Translation: 窩尋思沒啥問提，再給窩們店水就行了。

Text:
Planetary scale temperature changes have created huge salty geysers from an underground brine deposit.

We can send digging and pumping equipment to speed up the process and turn these waters into a surface stream. It won't be easy nor pretty, but it's a start. 

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_water_small,'WaterTP')>.
Translation:
由於行星級別的溫度變化，地下滷水礦床中產生了巨大的鹽水間歇泉。

我們可以派出挖掘裝置與抽水裝置來加速這個過程，把這些地下水變成地表水流。這個過程會既困難、又費力，但這總歸是個開始。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_water_small,'WaterTP')>。

Text: A planetary survey has revealed a huge underground deposit of salty water.
Translation: 透過行星調查，我們發現地下埋藏著巨量的鹽水沉積資源。
Old Text: A planetary survey has revealed a huge underground deposit or salty water.
Old Translation: 透過行星調查，我們發現地下埋藏著巨大的沉積資源，或是鹽水資源。

Text: Send drones to widen the water entrances and form a river bed.
Translation: 派遣無人機拓寬地下水入口，形成河床。

Text: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_water,'WaterTP')>, requires Machine Parts
Send an expedition to release the salty underground waters.
Translation: 派遣探險隊，釋放地下鹽水資源。

Text: I will lead a team to mount the equipment.
Translation: 我來帶領團隊安裝裝置。

Text: unlock a bigger Expedition for <resource(terr_water_big,'WaterTP')>, requires Machine Parts
Translation: 解鎖規模更大的<resource(terr_water_big,'WaterTP')>探險隊，需要機械零件

Text: Send an expedition to release the salty underground waters.
Translation: 派遣探險隊，釋放地下鹽水資源。

Text: This is a tourist magnet natural wonder! Advertise it on Earth.
Translation: 這麼了不起的自然景觀，一定能吸引很多遊客！向地球進行宣傳。

Text: Why do anything about it, when it happens anyway with climate changes?
Translation: 反正隨著氣候變化，地下水自己也會湧上來，我們幹嘛非要動手呢？

Text: do nothing; all Lazy Colonists gain Morale
Translation: 什麼都不做，所有有“懶惰”特性的居民士氣上升

Text:
The rocket returned after unleashing the salty underground waters. We can congratulate ourselves with another step towards a more habitable planet.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_water_big,'WaterTP')>.
Translation:
火箭成功地將地下水資源引到了地表，之後順利返航。好好慶祝一番吧，我們成功地把這裡變成了更適合人類居住的星球。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_water_big,'WaterTP')>。

Text:
It doesn't look like something which can be produced here on Mars, neither back on Earth. And when our scientists tried to cut a piece of it with a laser, things went really crazy. Apparently, any light projected through the pyramid comes back from one of its sides minutes or hours later, with an interval which differs according to the laser used. One thing is certain: this artifact has an alien origin.

We are confused with all of the proposed theories - starting from "a medium for contacting an alien civilization", to "compressed space which holds a whole universe". Of course, the old mantra about observation changing the observed object was also repeated. 

Scientists can talk like that for days, but someone has to make a decision and give some direction to their research.
Translation:
這種東西看起來並不是火星上產出來的，也不像是地球上產出來的。當我們的科學家打算用鐳射把它切下來一塊的時候，詭異的事情發生了。射入金字塔中的鐳射，在幾分鐘乃至幾小時後，從金字塔的另一端反射了回來。反射的間隔時間根據鐳射性質的不同而不同。有一件事情可以確定：這是外星人的造物。

關於它的用途，有人說是“外星人與其它文明進行溝通的媒介”，還有人說“它可以將整個宇宙壓縮在這個小空間裡”，我們被搞得一頭霧水。當然，大家也在不斷地討論著觀測它的時候看到的異象。

科學家們可以沒完沒了地說上好幾天，但必須有人做出決定，為他們的研究指明方向。

Text: A colonist found this crystal pyramid - placed at a dome entrance just like an abandoned baby.
Translation: 某位居民發現了這個水晶製成的金字塔。它就被放在某個穹頂的門口，像是被遺棄的嬰兒一樣。

Text: This is either a warning or some act of aggression. Be careful!
Translation: 這有可能是個警告，也有可能是某種侵略的前兆。務必當心！

Text: unknown effect; many Security Officers gain Morale
Translation: 效果未知，大量警官士氣上升

Text:
When you start receiving reports about a weird shimmering here and there within our vegetation patches, with wildfires starting for no visible reason, your people are prepared to act accordingly. Fires are put down and people are reassured everything is in under control.

<effect>Something is about to happen.
Translation:
你陸續接到了報告，說植物種植區中到處都出現了詭異的閃光現象，很多地方也由於不明原因發生了火災。你的人民做好了應對火災的準備。所有的火都已經被撲滅了，大家再次相信一切依然處於掌握之中。

<effect>有什麼事情要發生了。

Text:
You were unprepared when reports started coming about this weird shimmer of air here and there within our vegetation patches, bushes moving by themselves and moss growing in strange colors.

<effect>Some Botanists lose Sanity. Something is about to happen.
Translation:
你還沒準備好，各式各樣的報告就湧了進來，說植物種植區中到處都出現了詭異的閃光現象，灌木叢會自己動起來，苔蘚的顏色也變得非常詭異。

<effect>部分植物學家的理智度下降了。有什麼事情要發生了。

Text:
You were unprepared when reports started coming about this weird shimmer of air here and there, flying utensils and levitating furniture. Ancient stories about ghosts were retold again and again, people panicked and accidents happened.

<effect>A few Colonists lose Sanity. Something is about to happen.
Translation:
你還沒準備好，各式各樣的報告就湧了進來，說到處都出現了詭異的閃光現象，各種用品和傢俱會自己漂浮起來。人們開始一遍又一遍地講起了古老的鬼故事，大家驚慌失措，還發生了各種事故。

<effect>少量居民的理智度下降了。有什麼事情要發生了。

Text: Whoever "they" are, I believe they are trying to help us.
Translation: 雖然不知道“它們”是誰，但我認為它們打算幫助我們。

Text: unknown effect; some Scientists gain Morale
Translation: 效果未知，部分科學家士氣上升

Text:
Then you start receiving reports about a weird shimmering here and there within our vegetation patches, with wildfires starting for no visible reason. Your people were unprepared to act fast enough and some damage couldn't be reverted. 

<effect>Lose <resource(terr_veg_loss,'VegetationTP')>. Something is about to happen.
Translation:
你陸續接到了報告，說植物種植區中到處都出現了詭異的閃光現象，很多地方也由於不明原因發生了火災。你的人民並沒有做好萬全準備，火災造成了某些不可挽回的損失。

<effect>失去<resource(terr_veg_loss,'VegetationTP')>。有什麼事情要發生了。

Text:
Your terraforming advisor comes to your office with a somewhat uncertain smile on her face. Good things are happening, as you predicted. She tells you about a weird shimmer of air here and there within our vegetation patches, bushes moving by themselves and flowers blooming out of season. 

<effect>Gain <resource(terr_veg_gain,'VegetationTP')>. Something is about to happen.
Translation:
你的土地改造顧問走進了你的辦公室裡，她的臉上帶著某種不太確定的笑容。和你預想得一樣，好事發生了。她告訴你，植物種植區中到處都出現了詭異的閃光現象，灌木叢會自己動起來，到處都盛開著不合時宜的鮮花。

<effect>獲得<resource(terr_veg_gain,'VegetationTP')>。有什麼事情要發生了。

Text:
You were unprepared when the reports started coming about this weird shimmer of air here and there, flying utensils and levitating furniture. Ancient stories about ghosts were retold again and again, people panicked and accidents happened.

<effect>Some Colonists lose Sanity. Something is about to happen.
Translation:
你還沒準備好，各式各樣的報告就湧了進來，說到處都出現了詭異的閃光現象，各種用品和傢俱會自己漂浮起來。人們開始一遍又一遍地講起了古老的鬼故事，大家驚慌失措，還發生了各種事故。

<effect>部分居民的理智度下降了。有什麼事情要發生了。

Text: The creators of the pyramid may need our help.
Translation: 金字塔的創造者或許需要我們的幫助。

Text: unknown effect; many Medics gain Morale
Translation: 效果未知，大量醫務人員士氣提高

Text:
You start receiving reports about a weird shimmering here and there within our vegetation patches, with wildfires starting for no visible reason. Your people were unprepared to act fast enough and some damage couldn't be averted. 

<effect>Lose <resource(terr_veg_loss,'VegetationTP')>. Something is about to happen.
Translation:
你陸續接到了報告，說植物種植區中到處都出現了詭異的閃光現象，很多地方也由於不明原因發生了火災。你的人民並沒有做好萬全準備，火災造成了某些不可挽回的損失。

<effect>失去<resource(terr_veg_loss,'VegetationTP')>。有什麼事情要發生了。

Text:
You were unprepared when the reports started coming about this weird shimmer of air here and there within our vegetation patches, bushes moving by themselves and moss growing in strange colors.

<effect>Many Botanists lose Sanity. Something is about to happen.
Translation:
你還沒準備好，各式各樣的報告就湧了進來，說植物種植區中到處都出現了詭異的閃光現象，灌木叢會自己動起來，苔蘚的顏色也變得非常詭異。

<effect>大量植物學家的理智度下降了。有什麼事情要發生了。

Text:
People are enthusiastic about meeting friendly alien creatures, so when reports started coming about this weird shimmer of air here and there, flying utensils and levitating furniture, a lot of people were excited instead of frightened.

<effect>Some Scientists gain Morale. Something is about to happen.
Translation:
人們一直熱切期望能遇到友善的外星生物。因此，當有人發現到處出現了奇怪的閃光，各種用品和傢俱會自己漂浮起來時，許多人不禁沒有感到害怕，反而充滿了興奮之情。

<effect>部分科學家士氣上升。有什麼事情要發生了。

Text:
The lead researcher investigating the alien Pyramid has come to your office with exciting news. When an ultraviolet laser at a  particular wavelength is directed at the object, the reaction interval is zero: in this case, the light comes out immediately, and it projects a 3D picture of geometrical proportions. The scientist managed to decrypt a simple message, and its rough meaning is in front of you in the form of text compiled by her.

YOU ARE 1. WE ARE 1. SUM IS MORE THAN 2.

As it seems, they have recognized us as another intelligent species which makes the Universe a less lonely place and probably opens the door to future cooperation.

We have no means to communicate with these creatures. We can only give them an answer with our actions, and hope all is settled.
Translation:
負責研究金字塔的首席研究員走進了你的辦公室，為你帶來了激動人心的消息。當某種特定波長的紫外線鐳射直射入這個物體時，反應間隔為零。在這種情況下，射入內部的鐳射立刻就射了出來，並投射出了某種特定比例的三維影像。這位科學家成功破解了一條簡單的訊息。她將這條資訊的意思編纂為簡要的文字，放在你面前。

你們是1，我們也是1，1加1大於2。

看起來，他們似乎把我們視作另一種擁有智慧的物種。這樣一來，宇宙便不再那麼令人感到孤獨。說不定這還為我們創造了進一步合作的機會。

我們沒有辦法與這種生物進行交流。我們只能透過實際行動來表達我們的意願，希望一切都會順利。

Text: We are not alone in the Universe! Try to learn from them.
Translation: 我們並不是宇宙中唯一的生命！從他們身上學習知識吧。
部分科學家理智度下降，獲得<research(research_some)>

Text: We are not to communicate with them yet. Do not get too close.
Translation: 我們暫時不打算與他們接觸。別和他們走得太近。

Text: a few Scientists lose Sanity, gain <research(research_few)>
Translation: 少量居民理智度下降，獲得<research(research_few)>

Text: I've had my head tilted up to the stars for as long as I can remember...
Translation: 自我記事的時候起，我總是渴望擁抱天上的群星……
大量科學家理智度下降，獲得<research(research_many)>

Text:
"I can't take it anymore!" - yells assistant <DisplayName>. "It is following me everywhere, even in the bathroom."

Looking at the report, you see the colonist has ordered a Drone to crash against the dome wall where one of the alien shades was harmlessly shimmering and flickering -  or whatever aliens do when not buzzing shapes of ideas in people's heads. The dome is cracked and the drone is smashed beyond repairs. Of course, no aliens were harmed in the process.
Translation:
“我已經受不了了！”助手<DisplayName>大喊大叫道.“它一直在跟著我，就連我上廁所都不放過我。”

正當你看著這份報告的時候，你注意到某個居民正在命令一臺無人機撞向某個穹頂的外牆，外星人的陰影在那裡人畜無害地閃著光。或者說，當這些外星人不在人們腦中嗡嗡作響時，他們一直都那樣閃著光。穹頂被撞破了，無人機粉身碎骨，徹底損壞了。當然，在這個過程中，沒有任何外星生物受傷。

Text: This is a shameful display of primitive fears. Here we represent humankind!
Translation: 我們表現出了最原始的恐懼，這實在是太丟人了。我們可是所有人類的代表啊！

Text:
<DisplayName> nods and agrees, but you can see things will be hard for them to overcome. Not everyone has your willpower and dedication, but who said the Red planet should go easy on us?

<effect>Gain <research(research_few)> Research. <DisplayName> lost Sanity and became a Loner.
Translation:
<DisplayName>點點頭答應了，但你看得出來，想讓他克服困難並不容易。並不是所有人都有像你一樣的意志與決心，但我們早就知道這顆紅色的星球一定會充滿挑戰，不是嗎？

<effect>獲得<research(research_few)>研究點數。<DisplayName>理智度下降，獲得了“獨行者”特性。

Text: This is understandable. We all have to overcome unexpected difficulties.
Translation: 這完全可以理解。我們所有人都不得不克服預料之外的困難。
所有科學家恢復理智度

Text:
<DisplayName> feels like you understand their problems and is thankful for that. Rumor spreads and people look up to you with trust.

<effect>All Scientists regained Sanity. <DisplayName> became Composed.
Translation:
<DisplayName>認為你理解了他的困境，對你表示感謝。流言不脛而走，你的人民對你充滿了信任。

<effect>所有的科學家恢復了理智度。<DisplayName>獲得了“冷靜沉著”特性。

Text: Let me speak to this person.

<DisplayName> is defensive at first, but then becomes more open and trusts you with their fears and troubles. After a long conversation they leave your office relieved from the burden of guilt and thankful for your concern.

<effect><DisplayName> gained Morale and Sanity, and became an Enthusiast.
Translation:
<DisplayName>最初對此很抗拒，但慢慢地開始對你敞開心扉，對你訴說了他的恐懼與麻煩。談了很久之後，他離開了你的辦公室，內心的負罪感也一掃而空格。他對你表達了他的感謝之情。

<effect><DisplayName>的士氣與理智度升高，獲得了“熱心”特性。

Text:
The creatures of shimmering air who have revealed to us the secrets of the universe have another message for us. Now we know the correct way to read it and our scientists are excited to make a second contact. The message reads:

WE ADD. YOU ADD. EQUATION. THANKS FOR ALL THE <><.

We have learned from them and they have learned from us. Everyone is happy. We can only hope that future encounters with sentient species would be so much fruitful.
Translation:
這些向我們揭示了宇宙祕密的外星生物們，為我們帶來了另一條消息。現在，我們已經知道該如何閱讀他們的資訊了，我們的科學家很高興能與他們再次接觸。資訊是：

我們，加法。你們，加法。等式成立。感謝你們的<><。

我們從他們身上學到了知識，他們也從我們身上學到了知識。這是個雙贏的結局。我們只希望與外星生物未來的接觸，也能像這樣頗有收穫。

Text: What is the meaning of it all?

Translation: 所有有“科技宅”特性的居民士氣上升

Text:
The lead researcher investigating the alien Pyramid has come to your office with exciting news.
