When an ultraviolet laser at a  particular wavelength is directed at the object, the reaction interval is zero: in this case, the light comes out immediately, and it projects a 3D picture of geometrical proportions. The scientist managed to decrypt a simple message, and its rough meaning is in front of you in the form of text compiled by her.

CHANGE IS PROPER. WE ADD TO YOUR SUM. YOU MULTIPLY.

As it seems, for some reason they enjoy our terraforming effort and are willing to support it. Try not to think why they are happy with us "multiplying". 

We have no means to communicate with these creatures. We can give them an answer only with our actions, and hope all is settled.
Translation:
負責研究金字塔的首席研究員走進了你的辦公室，為你帶來了激動人心的消息。當某種特定波長的紫外線鐳射直射入這個物體時，反應間隔為零。在這種情況下，射入內部的鐳射立刻就射了出來，並投射出了某種特定比例的三維影像。這位科學家成功破解了一條簡單的資訊。她將這條資訊的意思編纂為簡要的文字，放在你面前。

變化是適當的。我們協助。你們繁衍。

看起來，出於某種原因，他們對我們的改造計劃很感興趣，願意協助我們。至於他們為什麼對我們的“繁衍”這麼感興趣，暫時還是別去想了吧。

我們沒有辦法與這種生物進行交流。我們只能透過實際行動來表達我們的意願，希望一切都會順利。

Text: Even the aliens are impressed by our terraforming project!
Translation: 就連外星人都對我們的土地改造計劃深受觸動！

Text: a few Colonists gain Morale, gain <resource(terr_veg_gain_small,'VegetationTP')>
We should do even better! Maximize effort on terraforming!
Translation: 我們應該再加把勁！把一切重心都放在到土地改造上！

Text: We should organize our cooperation in an orderly fashion.
Translation: 我們應該井然有序地進行合作。

Text:
"ALIENS INVADING MARS! Terrible creatures crawling in the domes! Unspeakable things happen on the red planet! Authorities refuse to comment. How long will they hide THE HORRIBLE TRUTH?!?"

You read the news from the page of a popular e-Tabloid on Earth, and your head feels heavy. The tourist <DisplayName> appears to be a sensation-hungry correspondent of the yellow press. Soon your screen flickers with messages from Earth media, random people and, most importantly, your sponsor.

Everything is okay with the extraterrestrials and we hardly notice their presence lately, but how do we explain this to the Earthlings and avert the panic?
Translation:
“外星人侵略火星！穹頂裡潛伏著恐怖的怪物！這顆紅色星球上發生了不可言說的事情！當局對此拒絕發表任何看法。恐怖的真相！他們還要掩蓋多久？！？”

你讀著地球上的熱點新聞，感覺大腦疲憊不堪。遊客<DisplayName>似乎是個追求流量的小道記者。沒過多久，你的電腦螢幕上就充斥著來自地球媒體的各種資訊。重要的是，其中還包括你的贊助者。

關於外星生物的一切都很平靜，我們最近甚至幾乎注意不到他們的存在。但我們該如何向地球人解釋這一切？該如何避免恐慌？

Text: Talk to them and demand they publish another article telling the truth.
Translation: 與對方對話，要求對方發表另一篇實事求是的報導。

Text:
Under pressure, <DisplayName> agrees to write another article, explaining that the Martian "shimmering" aliens are absolutely harmless and they don't even show around, let alone pose a threat to someone.

No one seems to have read the second article. Your Sponsor though has a hard time explaining and addressing absurd claims.

<effect>Your Sponsor research has been lost for <sols(pause_research)> Sols. You have gained <tourists> Tourist Applicants.
Translation:
在壓力之下，<DisplayName>答應寫另一篇文章，向大家解釋解釋火星上的“閃光”外星人其實是完全無害的。他們幾乎從不現身，更不用說會對任何人造成威脅了。

但似乎根本沒人去看第二篇文章。為了向懷疑的人們解釋清楚，處理各種荒誕的索賠要求，你的贊助者花了不少時間。

<effect>在<sols(pause_research)>個太陽日內，你無法從贊助者處獲得研究點數。你獲得了<tourists>位遊客應徵者。

Text: Mock it in your personal blog.
Translation: 在你的個人部落格上噴這篇文章。

Text:
Being a popular blogger yourself, you have already spread ridiculous rumors about the "shimmering shades" of aliens on Mars. No one with their mind would believe this is something more than crazy conspiracy theories, so when the article of <DisplayName> comes out, all you need to do is just mock it.

<effect>There are <tourists_wacko> wacko Tourist Applicants though.
Translation:
作為一位知名博主，你早就在自己的部落格上寫過關於火星上的“閃光影子”之類的荒誕故事了。所有人都把這當成無稽之談，根本不會有人真的相信你筆下的一切。所以，當<DisplayName>的文章發出來的時候，你只要噴他就行了。

<effect>不過，你還是獲得了<tourists_wacko>位不知在想什麼的遊客應徵者。

Text: Stage a heroic battle against the evil aliens and request humanitarian aid.
Translation: 自導自演一場與邪惡外星人的戰鬥，以此請求人道援助。

Text:
You manage to gather a group of colonists in exploration suits, armed with air compressors, and urge them to fight an imaginary foe on the streets of the dome. You film them with a flickering camera and "accidentally" leak the video.

Everyone on Earth cheers for the brave Martian colonists. Your Sponsor is disgusted.

<effect>Your Sponsor research has been lost for <sols(pause_research)> Sols. You have gained <funding(money_gain)> as foreign aid.
Translation:
你召集了一大群穿著探險服的殖民地居民，讓他們拿著空氣壓縮機，命令他們在穹頂的街道上與一群根本不存在的敵人假裝戰鬥。你用攝影機拍下了整個戰鬥過程，並不小心“洩露”了這份影像。

所有地球人都為你們的英勇行為歡呼雀躍，但你的贊助者對此感到很厭惡。

<effect>在<sols(pause_research)>個太陽日內，你無法從贊助者處獲得研究點數。你獲得了<funding(money_gain)>人道支援。

Text:
It was just some yellow article at first, but since you didn't deny, it sparked the curiosity of more serious investigating journalists. It became the story of the year back on Earth. 
Unneeded attention is bad for business, as it seems.

<effect>Rare Metals export price has been decreased to 50% for <sols(pause_research)> Sols.
There are <tourists> curious Tourist Applicants though.
Translation:
最開始這不過是小道消息而已，但由於你沒有發表任何否定宣告，這條消息漸漸吸引了更多認真調查的記者們。這條消息成了地球年度新聞。
看起來，這些不必要的關注似乎對火星的貿易造成了負面影響。

<effect>稀有金屬出口價格降低至50%，持續<sols(pause_research)>個太陽日。
不過，我們也獲得了<tourists>位充滿好奇的遊客應徵者。

Text:
The creatures appearing like shimmering air who helped in our terraforming effort have another message for us. Now we know the correct way to read it and our scientists are excited to make a second contact. The message reads:

CHANGE IS 1. TOTAL IS PROPER. INCREASE TO INFINITY.

It feels like a pat on the shoulder. We may never learn why they wanted us to survive as a species.
Translation:
那些閃閃發光的生物協助了我們的土地改造工作，現在，他們為我們帶來了另一條消息。現在，我們已經知道該如何閱讀他們的訊息了，我們的科學家很高興能與他們再次接觸。訊息是：

變化是1。總和正確。增長至無限。

這聽起來像是在誇讚我們。或許我們永遠也弄不清楚，他們為什麼希望我們這個物種存續下去。

Text: We have received another crystal pyramid.
Translation: 我們獲得了另一個水晶金字塔。

Text: A pat on the shoulder? We deserve it!
Translation: 是在誇讚我們嗎？這是我們應得的獎賞！

Text: Now we owe the same favor to whoever needs it.
Translation: 現在，無論是誰需要幫助，我們都應當給予他們同等的幫助。

Text:
The lead researcher investigating the alien Pyramid has come to your office with exciting news. When an ultraviolet laser at a  particular wavelength is directed at the object, the reaction interval is zero: in this case, the light comes out immediately, and it projects a 3D picture of geometrical proportions. The scientist managed to decrypt a simple message, and its rough meaning is in front of you in the form of text compiled by her.

THIS PLANET IS OUR HOME. WE MADE IT BE AS IT IS. SET CHANGE TO 0.

As it seems, they claim they have "xenoformed" Mars to the state in which we found it, and they don't want you to terraform it, for it will lose its favorable conditions for them. 

We have no means to communicate with these creatures. We can give them an answer only with our actions, and hope all is settled.
Translation:
負責研究金字塔的首席研究員走進了你的辦公室，為你帶來了激動人心的消息。當某種特定波長的紫外線鐳射直射入這個物體時，反應間隔為零。在這種情況下，射入內部的鐳射立刻就射了出來，並投射出了某種特定比例的三維影像。這位科學家成功破解了一條簡單的資訊。她將這條資訊的意思編纂為簡要的文字，放在你面前。

這顆星球是我們的家園。是我們把它變成了現在的樣子。調整變化值至0。

聽起來，這些外星人聲稱，是他們把火星改造成了現在的樣子。他們不希望你進行土地改造，因為這樣會使火星變得不適宜他們生存。

我們沒有辦法與這種生物進行交流。我們只能透過實際行動來表達我們的意願，希望一切都會順利。

Text: You can't take Mars from me! Send Security Officers to preserve order.
Translation: 你們別想從我手中奪走火星！派遣警官維持秩序

Text: lose <resource(terr_veg_loss_small,'VegetationTP')>, some Security Officers lose Sanity
Slow down terraforing and try to leave some places of Mars untouched.
Translation: 減緩土地改造的進度，並保留一部分土地不進行改造。

Text: I know how to postpone the changes without losing too much work.
Translation: 我知道該如何在不損失太多工作成果的情況下，減緩土地改造的進度。

Text:
A little girl sneaks into your office and rides the visitors' chair. Miss <DisplayName> looks very excited.

"I have to show you something", she says, and gives you a stern look. "But it's a secret! You mustn't tell anyone."

"Why me?"

"'Cause you're the Commander, of course" - she looks disappointed how silly adults are. "Will you come?"
Translation:
一個小姑娘溜進了你的辦公室，騎在訪客席上。<DisplayName>小姐看起來非常興奮。

“我有東西要給你看，”她嚴厲地看了你一眼。“但這是個祕密！你絕對不準和別人說！”

“為什麼要告訴我呢？”

“當然因為你是這裡的指揮官了啊！”她看起來很失望，像是在說“大人們真蠢”一樣。“你要來看嗎？”

Text: Sorry, lass, no time for games. I have a colony to look after.
Translation: 抱歉，小姑娘，我沒時間陪你玩。我還要照顧整座殖民地呢。

Text:
It seems you were right to stay on your post, since shortly after the girl leaves, an emergency signal flickers on the terraforming sensors screen. In the next few hours you are busy with the containment of a forest fire, a dome garden burnt to ashes and a whole pile of reports about "shimmering shades" here and there. You may have thought those strange creatures gave up, but it seems there are still some of them.
At least your people are relieved you're always vigilant.

<effect>Mars has lost <resource(terr_veg_loss,'VegetationTP')>. A Garden is destroyed.
All worker Colonists gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
你的決定似乎是正確的，因為那個女孩離開不久之後，你的土地改造感測螢幕上就傳來了緊急訊號。在接下來的幾個小時裡，你都在忙著森林大火的撲救工作。一座穹頂花園被燒成了平地，你還收到了一大堆關於“閃光的影子”在各地出現的報告。你本以為這種奇怪的生物已經放棄了，但似乎它們之中仍有一部分在與你們對抗。
不過，由於你始終保持警惕，至少你的人民可以鬆口氣了。

<effect>火星失去了<resource(terr_veg_loss,'VegetationTP')>。一座花園被毀掉了。
所有工人士氣提高<morale_gain>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日。

Text:
The little girl leads you to a Dome garden. "See", she says and points, "this is the sad Boogeyman".

There is really a patch of wavering, shimmering space in the bushes.

"What does he want?"

The girl looks at you as if you are extremely stupid to ask. "He hates it here. Our planet... their planet, it was their home. And it hurts them. He says, we stop planting veggies for a while. They need some more time to leave."
Translation:
小姑娘把你帶到了某座穹頂的花園裡。“你看，”她指著什麼東西，對你說道，“這就是那個悲傷的怪物”。 

你真的在樹叢裡看到了一小塊閃閃發光，搖擺不定的東西。

“他想幹什麼？”

小女孩看著你，彷彿你這個問題實在是太蠢了一樣。“他討厭這個地方。我們的星球……他們的星球，這裡曾是他們的故鄉。他們很難過。他說，我們應該暫時停止種植植物。他們需要一些時間離開這裡。”

Text: Some vegetation may wither, but I suppose we can do that.
Translation: 有些植被可能會枯萎，但我猜應該不是什麼大問題。

Text:
With heavy heart, you order a central irrigation shutdown. In the next few hours you receive worried reports about withering plants, but a promise is a promise.

Just when you're beginning to regret it a little, your assistants find another Pyramid. The message it contains speaks nothing to you - but physicists are in awe.

<effect>Mars has lost <resource(terr_veg_loss_big,'VegetationTP')>.
You have gained <research(research)>.
Translation:
你懷著沉重的心情，下令關閉了中央灌溉系統。在接下來的幾個小時裡，到處都傳來了關於植物枯萎的報告，但做人應當言而有信。

正當你有點後悔自己這個決定的時候，你的助手們找到了另一個金字塔。上面沒有任何給你的資訊，但物理學家們都懷著敬畏的心情。

<effect>火星失去了<resource(terr_veg_loss_big,'VegetationTP')>。
你獲得了<research(research)>。

Text: Sorry, girl, we have worked hard to create what we have here.
Translation: 抱歉，小姑娘，我們花了很大力氣才走到這一步。

Text:
When you return to your office, an emergency signal welcomes you on the terraforming sensors screen. In the next few hours you are busy with the containment of a forest fire and a whole pile of reports about "shimmering shades" here and there. It looks like the alien creatures are sore losers.

Good thing the girl has warned you, so you can act swiftly and efficiently. However, people tend to blame you for not being on your post when it all started - as if you could do something more.

<effect>Mars has lost <resource(terr_veg_loss_small,'VegetationTP')>.
All worker Colonists have lost <morale_penalty> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
當你回到辦公室時，你的土地改造感測螢幕上顯示著緊急訊號。在接下來的幾個小時裡，你都在忙著森林大火的撲救工作，你還收到了一大堆關於“閃光的影子”在各地出現的報告。看起來，這群外星生物可真是輸不起。

幸好小姑娘提醒了你，你才能遊刃有餘地處理這件事情。然而，由於事發的時候你不在崗，人們因此而責難你，就好像如果你在崗就能避免更多損失一樣。

<effect>火星失去了<resource(terr_veg_loss_small,'VegetationTP')>。
所有工人士氣降低<morale_penalty>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日。

Text: There is no sign from the mysterious alien species which once resisted our terraforming effort. Have they given up and went somewhere else? Have they gone extinct? We may never find out.
Translation: 那些抵抗過土地改造計劃的外星生物們，如今已經銷聲匿跡了。他們是認輸了嗎？還是去了別的地方呢？他們已經滅絕了嗎？答案已經無從而知了。

Text: Since quite some time there are no reports of shimmering air anymore.
Translation: 已經有很長一段時間沒人見到過那些閃閃發光的東西了。

Text: I am sorry we couldn't find a better solution, but I'm also relieved.
Translation: 很抱歉，我們找不到更好的解決辦法，但我也鬆了一口氣。

Text:
The terraforming expert leads you to a large aquarium in the lab. "Commander, look!". You see something resembling a large brown pot, almost half your height, with a large opening on the top side. You flinch with a small deja vu feeling running through you. You almost expect that something will crawl up from there and jump through the glass. Of course, this is just a Sea Sponge, a harmless creature which can live well in the salty waters of Mars.

"We have given it a name", grins your advisor. We call it "Nostromo".

Damn scientists and their sense of humor. Under what name would you announce the spreading of this organism on Mars?

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>.
Translation:
土地改造專家把你帶到了實驗室的大型水族館處。“快看，指揮官！”你看到了一個像褐色大罐子一樣的東西，罐子幾乎有你的一半高，上面還有個寬闊的開口。你退了一步，體內流過某種似曾相識的感覺。你甚至已經感覺到，好像有什麼東西要從裡面爬出來，從玻璃上面跳出來一樣。當然，這不過是人畜無害的海綿動物而已，它可以在火星的海水中生活。

“我們還給它取了個名字，”你的顧問笑著對你說，它叫“諾史莫號”。

這些煩人的科學家，連開玩笑都開得這麼煩人。既然你準備在火星上繁殖這種生物，你準備給它起個什麼名字呢？

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>。

Text: The conditions on Mars have improved enough to introduce simple organisms like the Sea Sponges.
Translation: 火星上的環境已經得到了充分改善，像海綿動物這樣的簡單生物已經可以存活了。
所有有“科技宅”特性的居民士氣上升
所有有“多愁善感”特性的居民士氣上升
所有有“熱心”特性的居民士氣上升
所有有“信仰者”特性的居民士氣上升

Text:
It will be within shooting range of our MDS Lasers in 1 Sol. We can destroy them to trigger a shower of ice crystals and meteorites to the planetary surface.

<effect>You have 1 Sol to place additional MDS Lasers in order to intercept some of the meteorites.
Translation:
一個太陽日後，它們就會進入反隕石鐳射炮的射程。如果摧毀隕石，其中的冰晶和隕石碎片便會落在火星地表上。

<effect>你還有一個太陽日設定額外的反隕石鐳射炮，攔截來襲的流星群。

Text: We have located a large ice meteorite cluster which will fly nearby.
Translation: 我們發現了一個冰隕石叢集，它即將從火星附近擦過。

Text: The meteorites which we manage to shoot will explode in debris fallout and enrich the Martian atmosphere with evaporated water and gases. On the other hand, they will probably cause some damage.
Translation: 如果能順利擊中隕石，隕石就會爆炸，讓火星的大氣層擁有更多水蒸氣與其它氣體。但另一方面，它或許也會造成一定程度的損害。

Text: Now is the perfect time for fireworks!
gain <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> for each working MDS Laser; trigger a Meteor Storm
Translation: 每有一個正常工作的反隕石鐳射炮，獲得<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>，發生隕石風暴

Text: gain <resource(terr_atmo_big,'AtmosphereTP')> for each working MDS Laser; trigger a heavy Meteor Storm
Translation: 每有一個正常工作的反隕石鐳射炮，獲得<resource(terr_atmo_big,'AtmosphereTP')>，發生大型隕石風暴

Text: Let me adjust the targeting parameters.
Translation: 我來調整一下目標參數。

Text: gain <resource(terr_atmo_big,'AtmosphereTP')> for each working MDS Laser; trigger a Meteor Storm
Translation: 每有一個正常工作的反隕石鐳射炮，獲得<resource(terr_atmo_big,'AtmosphereTP')>，發生隕石風暴

Text: Let me optimize the trajectory estimation to completely vaporize them.
Translation: 我來優化一下軌道估算，把流星群徹底蒸發。

Text: gain <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> for each working MDS Laser
Translation: 每有一個正常工作的反隕石鐳射炮，獲得<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>

Text: Meteor bombardment doesn't sound like a safe thing to do for our colony.
Translation: 聽起來，隕石雨對我們的殖民地恐怕不太安全。

Text:
"Commander, take a look!". She produces a complicated model of a fuel refinery. "Don't mind the smoke. We can now emit as much filth as we want to!"

It takes some time to grasp her idea: we can improve our fuel refineries in such an eco-unfriendly way, they would use up more Water and dump a tremendous amount of exhaust gases in the atmosphere. This, in turn, would help us terraform the Martian atmosphere over time. We can even expect some efficiency improvement - provided, of course, one is inclined to call "efficiency" when +50% amount of Water is used for a mere 10% Fuel production increase.

<effect>Fuel Refineries can be "improved" to waste 50%-100% more Water, produce 10%-25% more Fuel and slightly increase planetary Atmosphere over time.
Translation:
“指揮官，快來看看！”她製作了一個複雜的燃料精煉廠的模型。“不要介意那些黑煙。我們想排多少黑煙，就能排多少！”

你花了一些時間才弄清楚她的想法：我們可以透過破壞環境的方式來提高燃料精煉廠的效率。這樣會消耗更多的水資源，也會向大氣中排放成噸的廢氣。假以時日，排出去的廢氣會有助於火星的土地改造計劃。我們甚至可以進一步提高精煉廠的效率。可想想看，我們多消耗了50%的水資源，卻僅僅能提高10%的產量，這樣的“效率”也不過爾爾。

<effect>可以進一步“改善”燃料精煉廠的效率。透過多耗費50% - 100%的水資源，額外提高10% - 25%的燃料產量，同時緩慢地改善火星的大氣狀況。

Text: A soot-covered engineer appears to your door with a wild smile on her face.
Translation: 一位滿身煤灰的工程師出現在你的門前，臉上帶著狂野不羈的笑容。

Text: unlock a research for Overloaded Fuel Refineries
Translation: 解鎖過載燃料精煉廠的研究專案

Text: Nice idea! Let's exploit it to the limit!
Translation: 真是個好主意！既然要幹，那就幹到底吧！

Text: unlock a research for Advanced Overloaded Fuel Refineries
Translation: 解鎖高階過載燃料精煉廠的研究專案

Text:
This mineral contains calcium fluoride with traces of Uranium-238. It is beautifully violet, slightly radioactive and it makes your Commander's office smell like hell. 

What is important is that when crushed, this mineral releases gases in the atmosphere which help the greenhouse effect on Mars. All we need to do is to set explosives and blow it up!
Translation:
這種礦物含有氟化鈣與微量鈾238。它呈現漂亮的紫羅蘭色，具有微弱的放射性，但也讓你的指揮官辦公室變得臭不可聞。

不過，重要的是，這種礦物受到撞擊時會散發出氣體，從而改善火星上的溫室效應。我們只需要安好炸藥，把它們炸上天就行了！

Text: A routine planetary survey discovered a huge deposit of antozonite.
Translation: 透過常規行星調查，我們發現了一大片嘔吐石資源點。

Text: Send only drones to do the job.
Translation: 只派遣無人機進行這項任務。

Text: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_temp_small,'TemperatureTP')>; triggers a Dust Storm
Translation: 解鎖<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>和<resource(terr_temp_small,'TemperatureTP')>的探險隊，會導致沙塵暴

Text: Send an expedition to detonate a mineral deposit for a terraforming improvement. We should expect a Dust Storm.
Translation: 派遣探險隊引爆嘔吐石資源點，推進土地改造計劃。我們應該做好應對沙塵暴的準備。

Text: And you thought your job stinks? Send the geologists!
Translation: 你覺得你的工作就是一坨臭屎嗎？讓地質學家去吧！

Text: unlock a bigger Expedition for <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_temp_mid,'TemperatureTP')>; triggers a Dust Storm
Translation: 解鎖<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>和<resource(terr_temp_mid,'TemperatureTP')>的大規模探險隊，會導致沙塵暴

Text: Send an expedition to detonate a mineral deposit for a terraforming improvement. We should expect a Dust Storm.
Translation: 派遣探險隊引爆嘔吐石資源點，推進土地改造計劃。我們應該做好應對沙塵暴的準備。

Text: Why do half the job? Let's nuke it and escalate the effect.
Translation: 幹嘛要做得這麼半吊子？直接用核彈炸它，進一步強化效應吧。

Text: So now we detonate toxic radioactive rocks in order to make the planet habitable? Just no.
Translation: 所以，為了讓這個星球更加適宜居住，我們要引爆有毒、有放射性的礦石嗎？算了吧。

Text:
The expedition returned, with drones bruised and covered with dust, but fully functional. You have the honor of pressing the button. A distant thunder indicates the minerals have been successfully detonated.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_temp_small,'TemperatureTP')>.
Dust Storm approaching.
Translation:
探險隊回來了。無人機上到處都是劃痕，還佈滿了灰塵，但順利地完成了任務。按下按鈕的權力就交給你了。你聽到遠方傳來了一陣低沉的轟隆聲，礦脈已經成功引爆了。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>和<resource(terr_temp_small,'TemperatureTP')>。
沙塵暴即將來襲。

Text:
The expedition returned, with geologists tired and dirty, but happy with a job well done. You have the honor of pressing the button. A distant thunder indicates the minerals have been successfully detonated.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')> and <resource(terr_temp_mid,'TemperatureTP')>.
Dust Storm approaching.
Translation:
探險隊回來了。地質學家們渾身髒物，疲憊不堪，但他們順利完成了任務，感到很開心。按下按鈕的權力就交給你了。你聽到遠方傳來了一陣低沉的轟隆聲，礦脈已經成功引爆了。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_atmo,'AtmosphereTP')>和<resource(terr_temp_mid,'TemperatureTP')>。
沙塵暴即將來襲。

Text:
Your biochemistry advisor comes with a petri dish in hand and a triumphant smile on her face. "Commander, see who survived the last ten years in the freezer!"

The cute microscopic water bears are able to withstand unbelievable amounts of pressure, cold, heat and radiation, provided they have just a little moisture. Their natural resilience will give us a solid species to lean on while building a biosphere here on Mars.
Translation:
你的生物化學顧問來了。她手裡拿著培養皿，臉上掛著勝利的笑容。“指揮官，來看看過去十年都生活在冷庫裡的小傢伙吧！”

只要有一點點水分，這種可愛的微型水熊就能承受難以置信的氣壓、低溫、高溫與輻射環境。它們強大的適應能力為我們提供了可靠的物種來源，我們可以以此在火星上建立生物圈。

Text: Now that we have liquid water on Mars, we can introduce those fascinating little creatures to it.
Translation: 如今，火星上已經有液態水了，我們可以將這種了不起的小傢伙散佈在火星環境中。
火星，準備迎接新的征服者吧！

Text: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>, requires Food
Send a rocket to distribute Tardigrades over Mars water sources.
Translation: 派遣火箭，將這種緩步動物散佈在火星的水源中。

Text: We can prepare canisters with tardigrades and shoot them from space.
Translation: 我們可以將這種生物置於容器中，從太空將它們射入水中。

Text: unlock an Expedition for <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>, requires Metals
Send a rocket to shoot Tardigrade canisters from space.
Translation: 派遣火箭，從太空中將這種生物射入水中。

Text: We can't do such cruel things to these cute water bears.
Translation: 我們不能對這些可愛的水熊做這麼殘忍的事情

Text:
The rocket returned after successfully spreading our cute microscopic Tardigrade survivalists throughout the cold waters of the Red Planet.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>.
Translation:
火箭成功地將這種可愛的小傢伙散佈到了火星冰冷的水中，之後順利返航。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>。

Text:
"Commander, remember the canisters with Tardigrades we have spread in Mars' waters some time ago? Well, turns out their population has reached as far as the poles, and most of them actually survived the blast! Even more to that, their new generation has developed higher tolerance to unfavorable conditions. We can have a party, Commander!"

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>.
Translation:
“指揮官，還記得咱們之前往火星的水中散佈的那種緩步動物嗎？結果顯示，它們的數量大量繁殖，而且絕大部分水熊都在衝擊中倖存了下來！不僅如此，新一代的水熊甚至發展出了對惡劣環境更強大的適應能力。咱們可以開個派對了，指揮官！”

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>。

Text: Your biochemistry advisor enters your office, her cheeks red and her face glowing with happy triumph.
Translation: 你的生物化學顧問走進了你的辦公室。她臉頰通紅，臉上洋溢著勝利的喜悅。

Text:
Your security advisor comes to your office with a rare expression of confusion on her face. She explains there is a colonist who has been caught counterfeiting documents about himself. The strange thing is, on the fake identity chip he produced, he is 30 years old; and the previous one shows 53. She was diligent enough to check further and she discovered a chain of similar infringements... as it seems, all done by the same person. Unlikely as it sounds, this man had lived for decades without aging a day.

We know him by the name of John Altmann.
Translation:
你的安全顧問走進了你的辦公室，她的臉上露出了罕見的困惑表情。她對你說，她的人抓住了一個偽造身份證件的居民。奇怪的是，這張偽造的身份證件顯示他已經有30歲了，而他之前的偽造證件顯示他有53歲。她不斷地調查更早之前的事件，結果發現了一連串的身份偽造事件……而且，這一系列事件似乎都是此人所為。雖然聽起來難以置信，但這個人已經活了幾十年，卻沒有任何衰老跡象。

這個人的名字叫做約翰·阿特曼。

Text: Arrange a private meeting with this person.
Pretend we haven't noticed and secretly watch him.
Translation: 假裝沒有留意到他，對他進行祕密監視。

Text: Let him be, whoever he is.
Translation: 不管他是誰，不用管就是了。

Text:
Mr. Altmann tells you the story of a colonist who has discovered here a unique type of moss: an extract of it can be health improving, prolong one's life and even repair damaged DNA chains. 

The colonist who made this discovery was Mr. Altmann himself. He lived for very long time - over the years he has faked his own death and changed his identity several times. Eventually he became tired of hiding something in a world that is already too small, and became negligent about keeping his secret safe.

This moss he discovered reproduces very slowly and there just isn't enough for everybody. And the irony of the situation is, the moment when the shifting climate of Mars settles to more Earth-like conditions, it will be extinct.
Translation:
阿特曼给你讲了一个故事：某位殖民地居民发现了一种特殊的苔藓，这种苔藓的提取物可以改善健康状况，延长寿命，甚至修复受损的DNA结构。

這位殖民地居民正是阿特曼先生本人。他已經活了很長時間了。由於活得太久，他不得不多次假裝死亡，更換自己的身份。最終，他已經厭倦了躲在這個狹小的世界裡，也漸漸地不再那麼謹慎地保守自己的祕密。

他發現的這種苔蘚生長速度極慢，沒辦法給所有人都服用。更諷刺的是，由於火星的環境與地球的環境越來越相似，這種苔蘚正面臨著滅絕的風險。
大家理當知道這件事情。

Text: This treasure must be shared with the people! I know the right people.
Translation: 這樣的寶藏必須與別人分享！我知道該分享給哪些人。
你能想像它無窮的可能性嗎？！

Text: Your secret is safe with me.

Your security advisor reports that Mr. Altmann somehow found out he was being watched. He managed to steal a space suit and disappear. Security officers found a package and a note in his apartment:

"Commander, I have my reasons to believe that you will grasp what I have to say. I am an ambassador from another civilization which conquered space long ago. My mission here is done and I assure you that I have the best possible impression of your people. I shall advocate for you in the Galactic Council. Now I know I have to disappear for the good of everyone. Don't look for me, for you will not find me. 
As a parting gift, I'm leaving this growth substance. Spread it throughout Mars and let it flourish."

Your botanists confirm that the substance is some sort of a moss which can slowly replicate.

<effect>John Altmann disappeared. Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>.
Translation:
你的安全顧問告訴你，阿特曼先生不知為何發現自己遭到了監視。他偷走了一套太空服，之後銷聲匿跡。警官在他的公寓中發現了一個包裹，以及一張紙條：

“指揮官，我知道你會明白我這些話的意思。我是來自另一個星際文明的大使，我們的文明很久以前就征服了整個宇宙。我在這裡的任務已經完成了。我向你保證，你們給我留下了非常出色的印象。我會在銀河議會中為你們美言的。不過，為了大家好，我不得不離開了。不用再找我了，因為你是找不到我的。
作為臨別的贈禮，我給你留下了這種會生長的物質。把它散佈在火星上，讓它生長繁殖吧。”

你的植物學家發現，這種物質是某種苔蘚，它可以在火星上緩慢地繁殖。

<effect>約翰·阿特曼消失了。火星獲得了<resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>。

Text: So they were watching us all the time!
Translation: 原來他們一直都在監視我們！

Text: a few Colonists gain the Nerd trait
Translation: 少量居民獲得“科技宅”特性

Text: Aliens? We are not that gullible... Send his description to Interpol!
Translation: 外星人嗎？我們可沒那麼容易上當受騙……把他的樣子發到國際刑警那邊！

Text:
Your security advisor reports that Mr. John Altmann, the colonist she has found out to have extraordinary long life, has recently disappeared. He probably boarded a rocket.

Your terraforming advisor also has some news. There is a substantial rise of the Vegetation parameter, and botanists are baffled why. You may have your reasons to believe this is a good-bye gift from Mr. Altmann, but we will never learn the truth.

<effect>John Altmann disappeared. Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>.
Translation:
你的安全顧問告訴你，約翰·阿特曼先生，也就是那個壽命極長的殖民地居民，最近消失了。他可能是乘火箭去了別的地方。

你的土地改造顧問也給你帶來了新的消息。殖民地植物的各種參數都有了大幅度提高，植物學家對此一頭霧水。或許這是來自約翰·阿特曼先生的臨別贈禮吧，但已經沒有辦法找到真相了。

<effect>約翰·阿特曼消失了。火星獲得了<resource(terr_veg,'VegetationTP')>。

Text: Was he an alien? The truth is out there, but we may never know.
Translation: 他是個外星人？真相就在那裡，但我們永遠都不會知道了。
所有有“科技宅”特性的居民士氣上升

Text: Mother Nature works in mysterious ways.
Translation: 自然母親的安排總是讓人無法捉摸。
所有有“嬉皮”特性的居民士氣上升

Text: Send his description to Interpol, let them deal with him.
Translation: 把他的樣子發給國際刑警，讓他們負責處理吧。

Text:
This morning, Mr. Altmann was found dead in his apartment. He was barbarously decapitated with a long kitchen knife. A masked colonist was seen to leave his place, screaming "There can be only one!".

On the bright side, the research of the mysterious moss which provided the extraordinarily long life of the late Mr. Altmann has revealed interesting possibilities. This kind of vegetation is unstable, but it can greatly improve the biosphere for other species. Or, alternatively, we can experiment with improvements of the human genome.

<effect>John Altmann is dead.
Translation:
這天早晨，有人在阿特曼先生的公寓中找到了他的屍體。他被人用一把長餐刀殘忍地砍掉了腦袋。有人看到一個戴著面具的殖民地居民從他的公寓裡跑了出來，高聲喊著：“只能有一個！”

另一方面，科學家們研究了這種神祕的苔蘚，證實這種苔蘚可以大大延長壽命。已故的阿特曼先生為我們揭開了全新的可能性。這種植物不太穩定，但可以顯著改善其它物種的生物特性。或者，我們也可以進行實驗，用它來改善人類基因組。

<effect>約翰·阿特曼已經死亡。

Text: The future of humankind matters more than our lives.
Translation: 人類的未來比我們自己的生命更加重要。

Text: The universe has any meaning only through Human perspective.
Translation: 只有透過人類的眼睛，這個宇宙才有意義。

Text: We're here to help Old Earth solve its problems.
Translation: 我們得幫助地球老母親解決問題。

Text: send it to Earth and gain <funding(funding_gain)>
We can artificially replicate this moss and create a more adaptive GMO sort.
Translation: 我們可以人工培育這種苔蘚，獲得適應性更強的基因改造品種。

Text: The moss of Mr. Altmann is not enough to make us all immortal, but we can learn so much from it and improve our very nature. We could live a happy life, unrestrained by the burden of old age, or even be reborn by transferring our consciousness to a young body!
Translation: 阿特曼留下的苔蘚並不足以讓我們所有人長生不老，但我們可以從中學到很多東西，改善我們的機體結構。我們可以過上幸福的生活，不用再受到衰老的約束，甚至可以將意識轉移到年輕的肉體上，從而獲得重生！

Text: It always bothered me that just when you learn the ropes, you lose the strength to pull them.
Translation: 有些事情，你一旦知道了真相，你也就失去了繼續下去的動力。
解鎖突破性技術：青春永駐

Text: If I could be young again, I'd never make the same mistakes. I shall explore new options!
Translation: 如果我能返老還童，我絕不會再犯下同樣的錯誤了。我會嘗試新的做法！
解鎖突破性技術：鳳凰計劃

Text: On second thought, all is vanity.
Translation: 轉念一想，一切都是虛妄罷了。

Text:
He wants to intentionally make shuttles a lot less effective by doubling the fuel consumption. As a result, they would produce a hell of exhaust gases which ultimately contribute to a Greenhouse effect for warming up Mars. Also, shuttles may move a bit faster. We can only hope they won't accidentally explode.

<effect>Shuttles can be "improved" to burn 50%-100% more Fuel, move 10%-25% faster and slightly increase planetary Temperature over time.
Translation:
他打算讓穿梭機消耗雙倍的燃料，故意降低穿梭機的燃料效率。這樣一來，穿梭機就會向大氣中排放成噸的廢氣，改善火星上的溫室效應。不僅如此，穿梭機的速度也會略有提高。我們只希望這種穿梭機不會發生爆炸事故。

<effect>可以進一步"改善"穿梭機的效率。透過多耗費50% - 100%的燃料，使穿梭機的速度額外提高10% - 25%，同時緩慢地改善火星的氣溫狀況。

Text: An engineer comes to your office with a bunch of schematics in hand and a ridiculous idea in mind.
Translation: 某位工程師來到你的辦公室。他手裡拿著一堆圖表，腦子裡裝著荒謬的想法。

Text: Oh, I like my shuttles dirty.
Translation: 哦，我就喜歡把穿梭機弄得髒兮兮的。

Text: unlock a research for Shuttle Afterburners
Translation: 解鎖穿梭機加速器的研究專案

Text: Everyone can screw up something, but it takes a real engineer to do it good and proper!
Translation: 每個人都可能會把事情搞砸，但只有真正的工程師才能又快又好地做對事情！

Text: unlock a research for Advanced Shuttle Afterburners
Translation: 解鎖高階穿梭機加速器的研究專案

Text: What's next? Nuke our Domes to heat up the planet?
Translation: 那接下來呢？準備用核彈炸平咱們的穹頂，讓火星的溫度升高嗎？

Text: Because of the new design, when a shuttle is watched from the ground, there can be seen thin trails of vaporized water. Some people are convinced these "chemtrails" are part of your wicked plan to conquer their minds using psychotropic substances spread by the shuttle afterburners.
Translation: 由於穿梭機的新式設計，穿梭機在飛行時，地上的人可以看到水氣蒸發時產生的痕跡。一部分人相信，這種“化學藥品留下的痕跡”是你邪惡計劃的一部分。你打算透過穿梭機的加速器來散播精神藥品，從而控制人們的心智。

Text: Publish all the plans and schematics of shuttles and their afterburners.
Translation: 公開計劃全部內容，闡明穿梭機與加速器的全部構造與相關圖表。

Text:
"That's what they want us to believe!"

Surprisingly, it seems there are people who only accept proof that supports their viewpoint - and there are others who think that since you are being defensive, you definitely have something to hide.

It's not easy to be the Commander.

<effect>All Idiot colonists and <morale_percent>% non-Engineer colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
“他們就打算讓我們相信這些鬼話！”

令你驚訝的是，很多人只接受能支援他們觀點的證據。還有很多人認為，既然你公開為自己辯護，那你肯定是隱藏了什麼祕密。

指揮官真是難當啊。

<effect>所有具有“愚蠢”特性的殖民地居民與<morale_percent>%的非工程師居民士氣降低<morale_loss>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日。

Text: Publicly dismantle a shuttle and put it on display to show there is nothing wrong.
Translation: 公開拆開穿梭機，讓所有人看到並沒有什麼不對勁的東西。

Text:
Everything goes smoothly and by the numbers - there is a crowd of curious colonists; the chief engineer dismounts the shuttle and cracks jokes; people applaud. 

However, an hour later you get a report of masked colonists breaking into a Shuttle Hub and destroying shuttles - probably to ensure they are not being lied to about the "chemtrails".
Sometimes it's hard when people live so close together.

<effect><shuttles_lost> Shuttles have been lost.
Translation:
一切進展得都很順利，有條不紊。一群好奇的居民圍了上來，首席工程師一邊拆卸著穿梭機，一邊說著笑話，大家紛紛為他鼓掌。

然而一個小時後，你收到了一份報告。報告聲稱一群蒙面的居民闖入了穿梭機中心，摧毀了所有的穿梭機。他們可能只是想確信證明他們沒有被騙。
有時候，人和人生活得太近也會造成麻煩。

<effect>你失去了<shuttles_lost>艘穿梭機。

Text: Devise a story about shuttles spraying a special fluid to protect the public from aliens.
Translation: 編造一個故事，聲稱這是一種特殊的液體，用來保護公眾免受外星人傷害。

Text:
There are colonists who are excited about that. There are others who are unable to see the bigger picture and feel frustrated about it. You can't make everyone happy, it seems.

<effect>All Idiot colonists gain the Nerd trait. 
<morale_percent>% Engineer colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
有的居民對此表示非常興奮。還有的居民不能理解這麼做的深意，對你的行為表示很失望。看起來，沒辦法讓所有人都開心。

<effect>所有擁有“愚蠢”特性的居民獲得“科技宅”特性。
<morale_percent>%的工程師居民士氣降低<morale_loss>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日。

Text: This is ridiculous. Do nothing and refuse to comment.
Translation: 這簡直是無稽之談。什麼都不做，拒絕對此發表評論。

Text:
It seems there are some who don't trust you to decide what is best for the colony.

An aggressive crowd gathers near a Shuttle Hub, but your security officers stand strong, solid and imperturbable in front of it. People shout a bit, then disperse.

<effect>All Idiot colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
看起來，有些人不相信你，也不相信你做的一切都是為了殖民地著想。

一群暴民衝向穿梭機中心，但你的警官組成了一道無法逾越的防線，把他們擋在了外面。人們大喊大叫了一陣子，之後便四散而去了。

<effect>所有擁有“愚蠢”特性的居民士氣下降<morale_loss>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日。

Text:
It seems there are some who don't trust you to decide what is best for the colony.

An aggressive crowd manages to get into one of the shuttle hubs and cause irreversible damage to the electronics. Since you don't have enough security, there is nothing to do to stop them from destroying the sensitive equipment.

<effect>All Idiot colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols. 
A Shuttle Hub has been destroyed.
Translation:
看起來，有些人不相信你，也不相信你做的一切都是為了殖民地著想。

一群暴民衝進了穿梭機中心，對其中的電子元件造成了無法修復的損害。由於你沒有足夠的警備人員，你只能眼睜睜地看著他們亂打亂砸那些精密的裝置。

<effect>所有擁有"愚蠢"特性的居民士氣下降<morale_loss>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日。
一處穿梭機中心被毀。

Text:
The famous scientist Dr. Washington Irving who has spent his entire life working on various exotic projects, has recently died. His scientific legacy happened to fall in the hands of the ruthless governor of the insignificant island of Equatorico. He contacted us with an offer to sell the most valuable work of the deceased genius – a vial of Water-Nine, an unstable water formula consisting of different isotopes of Hydrogen and Oxygen. One of the wondrous properties of this water is that it can enter a chemical reaction with frozen water and turn it into Water-Nine, promising a quick Temperature and Water increase even in the harsh conditions of Mars, with overall gain estimated above 10%!

The only problem is, this greedy governor requested a ridiculous sum for a single precious vial of Water-Nine.
Translation:
著名的科學家華盛頓·歐文博士近日去世了，他的一生都在研究各種奇異的專案。不巧的是，他的科學遺產落入了某個微不足道的赤道小國殘忍無情的統治者手中。這位統治者與我們聯絡，打算賣掉去世科學家最有價值的工作成果 - 一瓶“九號水”。這種水是由氫元素與氧元素的各種同位素構成的不穩定化合物。這種水擁有極為神奇的特性，它可以與冰發生化學反應，將冰變為九號水。即使在火星這種嚴酷的條件下，它也能快速提高火星溫度和水資源的總含量，總增幅預計會超過10%！

唯一的問題是，這位統治者為這瓶九號水開出了讓人難以置信的天價。

Text: A scientist from Earth discovered a new form of water.
Translation: 地球上的某位科學家發現了另一種分子結構的水。

Text: It is a small cost for such a great improvement!
Translation: 這種水造價低廉，卻能帶來巨大的改善！

Text:
As long as the first drop of water touches the ice, it starts smoking and hissing. A bubbling crater forms on the surface of the ice deposit, quickly extending its diameter in a violent reaction. The little traces of frozen water in the air above it pick up its motion and swirl in a growing, roaring, thundering hurricane. Before we can do anything, it reaches for the sky, thickening in a giant cloud. Then holes open in the clouds, each like a reverse whirlpool of buzzing, roaring air, in the most magnificent storm ever seen on Mars.

How complicated and unpredictable the machinery of life really is!

<effect>Mars has lost <resource(terr_atmo_loss,'AtmosphereTP')>, and gained <resource(terr_temp_gain,'TemperatureTP')> and <resource(terr_water_gain,'WaterTP')>.
Dust Storm incoming.
Translation:
水剛剛滴在冰上，冰就開始冒煙，發出嘶嘶聲。一開始，冰層表面出現了一個冒著氣泡的小坑，隨後發生了劇烈的反應。空中凝冰的水汽加速了它的運動，它像漩渦一樣盤旋，發出了低沉的吼聲，隨後漸漸變成了雷鳴般的颶風。在我們來得及干預之前，它已經升到了空中，變成了一團濃密的雲霧。隨後，雲霧中出現了許多空洞。每個空洞都像個嗡嗡作響的漩渦，漩渦反向旋轉，發出了雷鳴般的聲音，最後形成了火星上有史以來最壯觀的風暴。

大自然的規律是多麼複雜，又是多麼難以預料啊！

<effect>火星失去了<resource(terr_atmo_loss,'AtmosphereTP')>，獲得了<resource(terr_temp_gain,'TemperatureTP')>和<resource(terr_water_gain,'WaterTP')>。
沙塵暴即將來襲。

Text: Put this "governor" on the private line. I know a thing or two about him.
Translation: 把這位“統治者”的電話接過來，我對他略知一二。

Text: gain more than <resource(10000,'TemperatureTP')> and <resource(10000,'WaterTP')>, unknown consequences

As long as the first drop of water touches the ice, it starts smoking and hissing. A bubbling crater forms on the surface of the ice deposit, quickly extending its diameter in a violent reaction. The little traces of frozen water in the air above it pick up its motion and swirl in a growing, roaring, thundering hurricane. Before we can do anything, it reaches for the sky, thickening in a giant cloud. Then holes open in the clouds, each like a reverse whirlpool of buzzing, roaring air, in the most magnificent storm ever seen on Mars.

How complicated and unpredictable the machinery of life really is!

<effect>Mars has lost <resource(terr_atmo_loss,'AtmosphereTP')>, and gained <resource(terr_temp_gain,'TemperatureTP')> and <resource(terr_water_gain,'WaterTP')>.
Dust Storm incoming.
Translation:
水剛剛滴在冰上，冰就開始冒煙，發出嘶嘶聲。一開始，冰層表面出現了一個冒著氣泡的小坑，隨後發生了劇烈的反應。空中凝冰的水汽加速了它的運動，它像漩渦一樣盤旋，發出了低沉的吼聲，隨後漸漸變成了雷鳴般的颶風。在我們來得及干預之前，它已經升到了空中，變成了一團濃密的雲霧。隨後，雲霧中出現了許多空洞。每個空洞都像個嗡嗡作響的漩渦，漩渦反向旋轉，發出了雷鳴般的聲音，最後形成了火星上有史以來最壯觀的風暴。

大自然的規律是多麼複雜，又是多麼難以預料啊！

<effect>火星失去了<resource(terr_atmo_loss,'AtmosphereTP')>，獲得了<resource(terr_temp_gain,'TemperatureTP')>和<resource(terr_water_gain,'WaterTP')>。
沙塵暴即將來襲。

Text: I know the effect will exceed the expectations, but at the price of an eco-catastrophe.
Translation: 我知道它擁有超乎預期的效果，但也會帶來一場生態災難。

Text: trigger a Dust Storm, lose <resource(terr_atmo_loss,'AtmosphereTP')> and gain <resource(terr_temp_gain,'TemperatureTP')> and <resource(terr_water_gain,'WaterTP')>
Old Text: trigger a Dust Storm, lose <resource(terr_atmo_loss,'WaterTP')> and gain <resource(terr_temp_gain,'TemperatureTP')> and <resource(terr_water_gain,'WaterTP')>
Old Translation: 發生沙塵暴，失去<resource(terr_atmo_loss,'WaterTP')>，獲得<resource(terr_temp_gain,'TemperatureTP')>與<resource(terr_water_gain,'WaterTP')>

Text:
As long as the first drop of water touches the ice, it starts smoking and hissing. A bubbling crater forms on the surface of the ice deposit, quickly extending its diameter in a violent reaction. The little traces of frozen water in the air above it pick up its motion and swirl in a growing, roaring, thundering hurricane. Before we can do anything, it reaches for the sky, thickening in a giant cloud. Then holes open in the clouds, each like a reverse whirlpool of buzzing, roaring air, in the most magnificent storm ever seen on Mars.

We have paid dearly for meddling with nature... But in this world, you get what you pay for.

<effect>Mars has lost <resource(terr_atmo_loss,'AtmosphereTP')>, and gained <resource(terr_temp_gain,'TemperatureTP')> and <resource(terr_water_gain,'WaterTP')>.
Dust Storm incoming.
Translation:
水剛剛滴在冰上，冰就開始冒煙，發出嘶嘶聲。一開始，冰層表面出現了一個冒著氣泡的小坑，隨後發生了劇烈的反應。空中凝冰的水汽加速了它的運動，它像漩渦一樣盤旋，發出了低沉的吼聲，隨後漸漸變成了雷鳴般的颶風。在我們來得及干預之前，它已經升到了空中，變成了一團濃密的雲霧。隨後，雲霧中出現了許多空洞。每個空洞都像個嗡嗡作響的漩渦，漩渦反向旋轉，發出了雷鳴般的聲音，最後形成了火星上有史以來最壯觀的風暴。

我們為干涉自然的行為付出了慘重的代價……但有失必有得，這個世界就是如此。

<effect>火星失去了<resource(terr_atmo_loss,'AtmosphereTP')>，獲得了<resource(terr_temp_gain,'TemperatureTP')>和<resource(terr_water_gain,'WaterTP')>。
沙塵暴即將來襲。

Text: do nothing; all Gambler Colonists lose Morale
Translation: 什麼都不做，所有有“賭徒”特性的居民士氣下降

Text:
"Commander, meet our guest from the Great Salt Lake! Isn't she beautiful?"

There is a small monster in the jar - apparently, a brine shrimp. Your advisor jabbers enthusiastically about this creature, which seems to be naturally adapted to... well, everything. Low oxygen? No problem, it's a hemoglobin cheater. Cold water? Well okay, its eggs can survive the temperature of liquid air. Salty water? It's like, "whoa, add some toxins to spice it up, I'll go get my girl".

Looks like the brine shrimps can be among the first animal species we can introduce to Mars.
Translation:
“指揮官，和我們大鹽湖的客人見個面吧！她真可愛，是吧？”

罐子裡有一隻小怪物，很顯然，應該是隻鹽水蝦。你的顧問熱情洋溢地和你說著關於這隻動物的事情，它似乎已經適應了……這麼說吧，適應了各種環境。氧氣不足？沒問題，它的血紅蛋白撐得住。溫度過低？問題不大，它的卵可以在低溫液體中存活。含鹽度過高？對它來說就像是“來吧，再來點，讓我先嗨起來再去把妹”。

看起來，這種鹽水蝦可以成為我們在火星上培育的第一種動物物種。

Text: A terraforming expert comes to your office with a silly smile on her face, holding a jar with something ugly inside.
Translation: 一位土地改造專家走進了你的辦公室，她的臉上掛著傻乎乎的笑容，還捧著一個裝著某隻醜東西的罐子。

Text: Go on then, take a rocket and spread those ugly creatures on Mars!
Translation: 去吧，派一艘火箭，把這種醜東西散佈到整個火星上吧！

Text: Send a rocket to distribute Brinewater Shrimps from Earth over Mars water sources.
Translation: 派遣火箭，在火星的水中散佈這種鹽水蝦。

Text: We'll name a random Dome after the Martian Shrimp. Let them do the job!
Translation: 我們會以這種鹽水蝦的名字，隨機命名某個穹頂。讓它們好好幹吧！

Text: gain <resource(terr_veg_small,'VegetationTP')>, all Colonists in the renamed Dome gain Morale
Translation: 獲得<resource(terr_veg_small,'VegetationTP')>，重新命名穹頂中的所有居民士氣上升

Text: We can develop a low-G shrimp better adapted to the conditions on Mars.
Translation: 我們可以培育出新品種的低重力蝦，可以適應火星上的環境。

Text: No thanks. These creatures give me nightmares.
Translation: 算了吧，這些東西會讓我做噩夢的。

Text:
The rocket returned after successfully spreading brine shrimps throughout the cold salty lakes of the Red Planet.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg_mid,'VegetationTP')>.
Translation:
火箭成功地將這種蝦散佈到了火星冰冷的鹽水湖中，之後順利返航。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_veg_mid,'VegetationTP')>。

Text:
The terraforming expert leads you to a small brine pool not far from your Dome. "Commander, see for yourself! They're so cute!". 

With a closer look, you observe scores of creatures which crawl, swim and jump in and out of the water like some ugly grasshoppers.

<effect>Mars has gained <resource(terr_veg_big,'VegetationTP')>.
Translation:
土地改造專家把你帶到了穹頂附近的某個小鹽水池中。“指揮官，你自己看看吧！它們可真可愛！”

你仔細看了一眼，發現水裡到處都是這種像蝗蟲一樣醜陋的生物。它們在水中爬行，游來游去，還時不時地蹦出水面。

<effect>火星獲得了<resource(terr_veg_big,'VegetationTP')>。
看看這些漂亮的小傢伙啊！

Text: Ugh, um, they look okay, I guess.
Translation: 呃，嗯，它們看起來還不錯吧，我猜。

Text: The things I do for terraforming Mars.
Translation: 這就是我改造火星的成果。

Text: The Terraforming field deals with Mars' global Atmosphere, Temperature, Water and Vegetation, Special Projects, production of Seeds, planting of different vegetation types and landscaping.
Translation: 地球化領域涉及：火星的全球大氣、溫度、水和植被、特殊工程、種子的生產、各種類型植被的種植以及地形改造。
Old Text: Contains technologies related to terraforming and landscaping projects.
Old Translation: 包含於地球化以及地形改造工程相關的技術。

Text:
Instantly gain <param1>% in all terraforming parameters.

<grey>"Is such a thing even possible? Yes, it is!" 
<right>Giorgio A. Tsoukalos</grey><left>
Translation:
所有地球化參數立刻上升<param1>%。

<grey>“這種事可能嗎？可能啊！”
<right>喬吉奧·A·佐卡洛斯</grey><left>

Text:
Newly grown forests have a chance to spawn Vistas and Research Sites.

<grey>"For in the true nature of things, if we rightly consider, every green tree is far more glorious than if it were made of gold and silver." 
<right>Martin Luther</grey><left>
Translation:
新種植的森林有機率產生景觀和研究地點。

<grey>"如果我們正確地思索萬物的本質，就會明白金樹銀樹都不如棵棵綠樹。"
<right>馬丁- 路德</grey><left>

Text:
Lake pumps are self-sufficient and no longer need to be supplied with Water.

<grey>"Water is a very good servant, but it is a cruel master." 
<right>C.G.D. Roberts</grey><left>
Translation:
湖水泵變為自給自足，不再需要供應水。

<grey>“水用起來方便，伺候起來難。”
<right>C.G.D.羅伯茨</grey><left>

Text:
Landscaping projects progress without the need of Drones and are generally faster.

<grey>"Nothing is built on stone; all is built on sand, but we must build as if the sand were stone." 
<right>Jorge Luis Borges</grey><left>
Translation:
地形改造工程無需無人機就可進行，且總體速度加快。

<grey>“萬物皆建於沙子而非石頭上，但我們得把沙子當成石頭。”
<right>豪爾赫·路易斯·博爾赫斯</grey><left>

Text:
Halves the Water<icon_WaterTP_alt> and the Temperature<icon_TemperatureTP_alt> requirements of grass, bushes, trees and Open Farm crops.

<grey>"The leaves and the light are one." 
<right>Albert Einstein</grey><left>
Translation:
使草、灌木、樹木和露天農場作物的水<icon_WaterTP_alt>和溫度<icon_TemperatureTP_alt>需求減半。

<grey>“葉子離不開陽光。”
<right>阿爾伯特·愛因斯坦</grey><left>

Text: Genetically engineer a species of a shrimp which can benefit from Mars' low gravity and gain the ability to crawl and jump to the nearest water source on its own. Gain <resource(3000,'VegetationTP')>.
Translation: 用基因工程培育出一種蝦，這種蝦能從火星的低重力環境中獲益，並能自主爬行並跳入離自己最近的水源。獲得<resource(3000,'VegetationTP')>。

Text: Fuel Refineries consume 50% more Water and produce 10% more Fuel, contributing to planetary Atmosphere by <resource(15,'AtmosphereTP')> per Sol for every working Fuel Refinery.
Translation: 燃料精煉廠的水資源消耗量提高50%，燃料產量提高10%。每座正常運轉的燃料精煉廠每個太陽日為行星大氣貢獻<resource(15,'AtmosphereTP')>。

Text: Fuel Refineries consume 100% more Water and produce 25% more Fuel, contributing to planetary Atmosphere by <resource(30,'AtmosphereTP')> per Sol for every working Fuel Refinery.
Translation: 燃料精煉廠的水資源消耗量提高100%，燃料產量提高25%。每座正常運轉的燃料精煉廠每個太陽日為行星大氣貢獻<resource(30,'AtmosphereTP')>。

Text: Shuttle Hubs consume 50% more Fuel and Shuttles move 10% faster, contributing to planetary Temperature by <resource(5,'TemperatureTP')> per Sol for every Shuttle in flight.
Translation: 穿梭機中心的燃料消耗量提高50%，穿梭機移動速度加快10%，每架飛行中的穿梭機每個太陽日為行星溫度貢獻<resource(5,'TemperatureTP')>。

Text: Shuttle Hubs consume 100% more Fuel and Shuttles move 25% faster, contributing to planetary Temperature by <resource(10,'TemperatureTP')> per Sol for every Shuttle in flight.
Translation: 穿梭機中心的燃料消耗量提高100%，穿梭機移動速度加快25%，每架飛行中的穿梭機每個太陽日為行星溫度貢獻<resource(10,'TemperatureTP')>。

Text:
Research the life improving formula discovered by one of our colonists and verify its presumed qualities. 
As a side effect, one may expect a 5% boost in the field of Biotech.
Translation:
研究一位殖民地居民發現的配方並驗證其是否像推測的那樣擁有改善生活的功效。
作為副作用，生物技術領域可能會獲得5%加速。

Text: New Resource: Seeds - used to plant vegetation on Mars. Can be brought from Earth or grown in Farms and Hydroponic Farms. New Building: Forestation Plant () - plants vegetation around it-self at the cost of Seeds. Increases local Soil Quality and improves global Vegetation , "Vegetation is the basic instrument the creator uses to set all of nature in motion." Antoine Lavoisier
Translation: 新資源：種子 - 用來在火星上種植植被。可以從地球運來，也可以在農場和水耕農場中種植。 新建築：造林站（）- 消耗種子在周圍區域種植植被。提高當地土壤品質並改善全球植被。 “植被是造物主讓自然界中的一切運轉起來的基本工具。” 安託萬·拉瓦錫

Text: Unlocks the construction of RC Dozer - a vehicle that can be used for landscaping projects. RC Dozers can also be ordered from Earth. "There's something about taking a plow and breaking new ground. It gives you energy." Ken Kesey
Translation: 解鎖遙控推土機的生產。這種載具能用來進行地形改造工程。也能從地球訂購遙控推土機。 “拿起犁耕地有其特別之處。就是它使你充滿幹勁。” 肯·凱西

Text: Discover new Planetary Anomalies. "Until you cross the bridge of your insecurities, you can’t begin to explore your possibilities." Tim Fargo
Translation: 發現新行星異象。 “你只有在克服不安全感之後才能開始探索自身的可能性。” 提姆·法戈

Text: Drones work faster on landscaping projects. "If geometry is dressed in a suit coat, topology dons jeans and a T-shirt." David S. Richeson
Translation: 無人機進行地形改造工程的工作速度加快。 “如果幾何學穿的是西裝外套，那地質學穿的就是牛仔褲和T恤。” 大衛·S·理查森

Text: New Building: GHG Factory () - burns Fuel to increase the Temperature of Mars, using greenhouse gases. "You could warm Mars up, over time, with greenhouse gases." Elon Musk
Translation: 新建築：溫室氣體工廠（）- 燃燒燃料，利用溫室氣體提高火星溫度。 “假以時日，溫室氣體甚至能使火星暖化。” 埃隆·馬斯克

Text: Get a one-time subsidy of Funding from your sponsor. "Wisdom outweighs any wealth." Sophocles
Translation: 從你的贊助者處獲得資金的一次性津貼。 “智慧是最寶貴的財富。” 索福克勒斯

Text: Raising the ground via landscaping costs less Waste Rock. Lowering ground via landscaping produces more Waste Rock. "We can look out on an alien landscape that no one has seen before and find it beautiful." David Grinspoon
Translation: 透過地形改造抬高地面消耗的礦渣減少。透過地形改造降低的地面產生的礦渣增加。 “我們看著他人從未見過的外星景觀時，也能發現它的迷人之處。” 大衛·葛林斯普

Text: Unlocks the Import Greenhouse Gases (improves Atmosphere ) and Capture Ice Asteroids (improves Water ) special projects, accessible via the Planetary View. "If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else." Booker T. Washington
Translation: 解鎖進口溫室氣體（改善大氣）以及捕獲富含冰的小行星（改善水）這兩項可透過行星查看進行的特殊工程。 “如果你想要提升自我，那就先提升他人。” 布克·T·華盛頓

Text:
Vegetation grows <param1>% faster.

<grey>"Like people, plants respond to extra attention." 
<right>H. Peter Loewer</grey><left>
Translation:
植被生長速度加快<param1>%。

<grey>“植物和人一樣，會對額外的關懷作出回應。”
<right>H·彼得·洛伊</grey><left>

Text: Unlocks the creation of artificial lakes via landscaping. Evaporating water improves local Soil Quality and Water of Mars. "The little lake you love is the biggest ocean for you!" Mehmet Murat ildan
Translation: 解鎖透過地形改造建造人工湖。蒸發水可改善火星的當地土壤品質和水。 “對你而言，心愛的小湖就是最廣闊的海洋！” 穆罕默德·穆拉特·伊爾丹

Text: Unlocks planting of Bushes and Trees in Forestation Plants. Fully-grown Bushes and Trees are harvested for Seeds by Drones. "Trees are the earth's endless effort to speak to the listening heaven." Rabindranath Tagore
Translation: 解鎖透過造林站種植灌木和樹木。無人機可從完全長成後的灌木和樹木中收穫種子。 “樹，是大地對諦聽的天空無止息的傾訴” 拉賓德拉納特·泰戈爾

Text: Wonder: Carbonate Processor () - improves the Atmosphere of Mars by burning Waste Rock. "When fire is applied to a stone it cracks."
Translation: 奇觀：碳酸鹽處理站（）- 透過燃燒礦渣的方式改善火星大氣。 ”火能把石頭燒裂。”

Text: Tourists pay % more Funding when going back to Earth. Receive Tourist applicants. "People don’t take trips, trips take people." John Steinbeck
Translation: 當遊客返回地球時，額外支付%的資金。獲得遊客應徵者。 “不是人在旅途，而是旅途載人。” 約翰·史坦貝克
Old Text: Tourists pay % more Funding to come to Mars. Receive Tourist applicants. "People don’t take trips, trips take people." John Steinbeck
Old Translation: 遊客為前往火星而支付的資金增加%。獲得遊客應徵者。 "不是人在旅途，而是旅途載人。" 約翰- 史坦貝克

Text: New Building: Open Farm () - plants edible crops at the cost of Seeds. Fully-grown plants are harvested for Food by Drones. "If the amount of hours spent on FarmVille were spent on actual farming, imagine what we could achieve." Adam Dell
Translation: 新建築：露天農場（）- 消耗種子種植糧食作物。無人機可從完全長成的植物中收穫食物。 “假如人們把玩‘開心農場’的時間花在真的下地務農上，想想看我們現在能取得何等成就吧。” 亞當·戴爾

Text: Wonder: Magnetic Field Generator () - decreases the loss of Atmosphere due to lack of magnetic field. "Magnetism, as you recall from physics class, is a powerful force that causes certain items to be attracted to refrigerators." Dave Barry
Translation: 奇觀：磁場發生器（）- 減少由缺少磁場引起的大氣損失。 “正如大家在物理課上學過的那樣，磁力這種強大的作用力能使特定物品被吸引到電冰箱上。” 戴夫·巴里

Text: Wonder: Core Heat Convector () - improves the Temperature of Mars gradually. Consumes Water. "If the world seems cold to you, kindle fires to warm it." Lucy Larcom
Translation: 奇觀：核心熱量對流加熱站（）- 逐漸改善火星溫度。消耗水資源。 “如果你覺得世界太冷，那就點起火焰給它送溫暖。” 露西·拉科姆

Text: Unlocks the Melt the Polar Caps (improves Water ) special project, accessible via the Planetary View. "This will be the first of a thousand worlds that we will give life to. For we are gods, and we are lonely, so we shall create." Adrian Tchaikovsky, Children of Time
Translation: 解鎖融化極冠（改善水）這項可透過行星查看進行的特殊工程。 "我們將把生命賜予上千顆星球，這是第一顆。因為我們是孤單的神，所以我們定要創造。" 阿德里安·柴可夫斯基，《時光之子》

Text: GHG Factory, Core Heat Convector, Magnetic Field Generator and Carbonate Processor gain Amplify upgrade, which improves their performance at the cost of increased Power consumption. "It takes as much energy to wish as it does to plan." Eleanor Roosevelt
Translation: 溫室氣體工廠、核心熱量對流加熱站、磁場發生器和碳酸鹽處理站獲得增幅升級，以消耗更多電力為代價提升工作效率。 “盼望花費的精力和制定計劃一樣多。” 埃莉諾·羅斯福

Text: Unlocks the Launch Space Mirror (improves Temperature) and Launch Magnetic Shield (decreases loss of Atmosphere ) special projects, accessible via the Planetary View. "Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine." Anthony J. D'Angelo
Translation: 解鎖發射空間反射鏡（改善溫度）以及發射磁力護盾（減少大氣損失）這兩項可透過行星查看進行的特殊工程。 “無論你去何方，無論天氣如何，永遠帶著你自己的小太陽。” 安東尼·J·D·安吉洛

Text: Unlocks the Seed Vegetation (improves Vegetation ) and Cloud Seeding (improves Water ) special projects, accessible via the Planetary View. "The winds of grace are always blowing, but you have to raise the sail." Ramakrishna
Translation: 解鎖“植被播種”（改善植被）和造雲（改善水）這兩項可透過行星查看進行的特殊工程。 “和煦的風永遠在吹，但你得揚起風帆才能啟程。” 羅摩克里希納

Text: Represents the density and composition of the Martian atmosphere. The higher this parameter is, the more Earth-like the atmospheric pressure, Oxygen levels and cloud generation are.The improving Atmosphere decreases the severity of Dust Storms and Meteor Storms and creates environmental conditions for Toxic Rains and clear water Rains to occur.Atmosphere applies terraforming boost to the Power production of Wind Turbines and to the Oxygen production of MOXIEs. Decreases the Power production of Solar Panels.At maximum improvement, the atmosphere of Mars becomes breathable rendering domes and pressure suits obsolete.
Translation: 代表火星大氣的密度和成分。此參數越高，大氣壓力、含氧量和雲的形成就和地球越相似。改善大氣可降低沙塵暴以及隕石風暴的嚴重程度，並為毒雨和清水雨的產生創造環境條件。大氣為風力發電機的電力產量以及氧氣生成裝置的氧氣產量提供地球化加成。降低太陽能板的電力產量。升到最大值時，居民可在火星大氣中直接呼吸，不再需要穹頂和增壓服了。
Old Text: Represents the density and composition of the Martian atmosphere. The higher this parameter is, the more Earth-like are the amospheric pressure, Oxygen levels and cloud generation.The improving Atmosphere decreases the severity of Dust Storms and Meteor Storms and creates environmental conditions for Toxic Rains and clear water Rains to occur.Atmosphere applies terraforming boost to the Power production of Wind Turbines and to the Oxygen production of MOXIEs. Decreases the Power production of Solar Panels.At maximum improvement, the atmosphere of Mars becomes breathable rendering domes and pressure suits obsolete.
Old Translation: 代表火星大氣的密度和成分。此參數越高，大氣壓力、含氧量和雲的形成就和地球越相似。改善大氣可降低沙塵暴以及隕石風暴的嚴重程度，並為毒雨和清水雨的產生創造環境條件。大氣為風力發電機的電力產量以及氧氣生成裝置的氧氣產量提供地球化加成。降低太陽能板的電力產量。升到最大值時，居民可在火星大氣中直接呼吸，不再需要穹頂和增壓服了。

Text: Represents the global surface temperature on Mars. The higher this parameter is, the more favorable the conditions for Earth-like life are.The improving Temperature decreases the severity of Cold Wave and creates environmental conditions for Toxic Rains and clear water Rains to occur.Increased Temperature is required for liquid water to be present on the surface of Mars and in lakes. High enough Temperatures are also paramount for the habitability of the Martian surface and to be able to have open-air Domes.
Translation: 代表火星全球地表溫度。此參數越高，生存條件對地球生命形式就越有利。改善溫度可降低寒流的嚴重程度，並為毒雨和清水雨的產生創造環境條件。需要升高溫度，液態水才會出現在火星地表和湖泊裡。足夠高的溫度對火星地表的宜居度以及露天穹頂的實現至關重要。
Old Text: Represents the global surface temperature of Mars. The higher this parameter is, the more favorable are the conditions for Earth-like life.The improving Temperature decreases the severity of Cold Wave and creates environmental conditions for Toxic Rains and clear water Rains to occur.Increased Temperature is required for liquid water to be present on the surface of Mars and in lakes. High enough Temperatures are also paramount for the habitability of the Martian surface and to be able to have open-air Domes.
Old Translation: 代表火星全球地表溫度。此參數越高，生存條件對地球生命形式就越有利。改善溫度可降低寒流的嚴重程度，並為毒雨和清水雨的產生創造環境條件。需要升高溫度，液態水才會出現在火星地表和湖泊裡。足夠高的溫度對火星地表的宜居度以及露天穹頂的實現至關重要。

Text: Represents the spreading and diversity of vegetation and bacterial life on a planetary scale. The higher this parameter is, the more Mars looks like the tundra biome back on Earth, with the ultimate goal to become a quite harsh, yet habitable second home for Humanity.The improving Vegetation increases the likelihood that plants will replicate and spread.As wild vegetation improves, sporadic vegetation booms will occur. Increased concentration of seeds in the wind causes lichen, grass, bushes or trees to spread throughout the colony.
Translation: 代表全球範圍內植被和細菌生命體的散佈和多樣性。此參數越高，火星看起來就越像地球上的苔原生態區，最終目標是變成一個環境惡劣但仍能居住的人類第二家園。改善植被可提高植物繁殖和蔓延的機率。隨著野生植被的改善，偶爾會發生植被激增的情況。提高風中的種子濃度可令地衣、草、灌木或樹木佈滿整個殖民地。
Old Text: Represents the spreading and diversity of vegetation and bacterial life on a planetary scale. The higher this parameter is, the more Mars looks like the tundra biome back on Earth, with the ultimate goal to become a quite harsh, yet habitable second home for Humanity.<newline><newline>The improving Vegetation increases the likelihood that plants will replicate and spread.
Old Translation: 代表全球範圍內植被和細菌生命體的散佈和多樣性。此參數越高，火星看起來就越像地球上的苔原生態區，最終目標是變成一個環境惡劣但仍能居住的人類第二家園。<newline><newline>改善植被可提高植物繁殖和蔓延的機率。

Text: Represents the quality and volume of surface water on Mars. The higher this parameter is, the more and larger water bodies will appear on Mars: lakes, seas and oceans.The improving Water creates environmental conditions for Toxic Rains and clear water Rains to occur.Water applies terraforming boost to the Water production of Moisture Vaporators.
Translation: 代表火星地表水的品質和體積。火星上會出現的水體就越多越大（從湖泊到海洋）。改善水能為毒雨和清水雨的產生創造環境條件。水為水氣蒐集站的水資源產量提供地球化加成。
Old Text: Represents the quality and volume of surface water on Mars. The higher this parameter is, more and larger water bodies will appear on Mars: lakes, seas and oceans.The improving Water creates environmental conditions for Toxic Rains and clear water Rains to occur.Water applies terraforming boost to the Water production of Moisture Vaporators.
Old Translation: 代表火星地表水的品質和體積。火星上會出現的水體就越多越大（從湖泊到海洋）。改善水能為毒雨和清水雨的產生創造環境條件。水為水氣蒐集站的水資源產量提供地球化加成。

Translation: Noto Sans CJK SC Regular, 22, aa
Noto Sans CJK SC Regular, 18, aa

Text: Bushes produce small amount of Seeds when fully-grown.
Translation: 灌木完全長成後產出少量種子。

Text: Lichen improve local Soil Quality. They don't require Soil Quality to grow but do not spread on their own.
Translation: 地衣改善當地土壤品質。它們的生長對土壤品質沒有要求，但不會自主蔓延。
Old Text: Lichens slightly increase local Soil Quality. They don't require Soil Quality to grow but do not spread on their own.
Old Translation: 地衣可略微提高當地土壤品質。它們的生長對土壤品質沒有要求，但不會自主蔓延。

Text: Mixed Trees produce very large amount of Seeds when fully-grown.
Translation: 各類樹木完全長成後產出數量龐大的種子。

Text: Trees produce large amount of Seeds when fully-grown.
Translation: 樹木完全長成後產出大量種子。

Text: Herbs produce small amount of Food. They grow quickly and slightly improve the local Soil Quality.
Translation: 藥草產出少量食物它們生長迅速，能略微改善當地土壤品質。

Text: Potatoes grow slowly but give a plentiful harvest. They significantly decrease the local Soil Quality, slowing down the growing of following crops.
Translation: 馬鈴薯生長緩慢但產量高。它們會大幅降低當地土壤品質，減慢下一批作物的生長速度。

Text: Cover Crops grow slowly and have very low yield on harvest. They significantly increase the local Soil Quality, improving the growth time of following crops.
Translation: 覆土作物生長緩慢且產量很低。它們會大幅提高當地土壤品質，加快下一批作物的生長速度。

Text: Leaf Crops grow relatively quickly and are a good source of Food. They slightly decrease the local Soil Quality.
Translation: 葉類作物生長相對較快，是良好的食物來源。它們略微降低當地土壤品質。

Text: Wheat has medium growth time and average Food yields.
Translation: 小麥的生長時間和平均食物產量中等。
<ButtonA>開啟百科<newline><DPad> 導航 <DPadDown> 關閉

Text: Contributes to the currently selected research project: . The following stats are summary of the predicted Research production for the current Sol. Research per Sol Lifetime research
Translation: 可以為目前選擇的研究專案提供加成：以下資料是目前太陽日的研究點數總產量的預計值。 每個太陽日的研究點數 生命週期研究點數

Text: Summary of the base terraforming effect of this building and the expected effect of all similar buildings. As long as this building is supplied with the required resources and working, it will gradually change one of the planetary parameters: Atmosphere, Temperature, Water or Vegetation.
Translation: 此建築的基礎地球化效果以及所有類似建築的預期效果的總覽。只要給此建築提供所需的資源且該建築正常運轉，它就會逐漸改變一項行星參數：大氣、溫度、水或植被。
Old Text: Summary of the base terraforming effect of this building and the expected effect of all similar buildings. As long as this building is supplied with the required resources and working, it will gradually changes one of the planetary parameters: Atmosphere, Temperature, Water or Vegetation.
Old Translation: 此建築的基礎地球化效果以及所有類似建築的預期效果的總覽。只要給此建築提供所需的資源且該建築正常運轉，它就會逐漸改變一項行星參數：大氣、溫度、水或植被。

Text: As the Martian atmosphere increasingly thickens, more and more of it gets lost due to the lack of a magnetic field. Stationary Magnetic Field Generators and Magnetic Shields launched into orbit reduce this loss of Atmosphere.
Translation: 隨著火星大氣層越來越厚，因缺少磁場而損失的大氣也越來越多。固定的磁場發生器和發射到軌道上的磁力護盾能減少大氣損失。

Text: Display visual representation of the underlying Soil Quality.
Translation: 直觀顯示下層土壤品質。

Text: Select new cropCtrl + on crop Select in all
Translation: 選擇新作物Ctrl + 作物用於所有

Text: Select new cropCtrl + on crop Select in all
Translation: 選擇新作物Ctrl + 作物用於所有

Text: The area in which Seeds will be spread in an attempt to plant the selected vegetation types.<newline><newline>Plantation area<right><SelectionRadiusScale> hexes
Translation: 播下選中植被類型種子的區域。<newline><newline>種植區域<right><SelectionRadiusScale>格

Text: Summary of the soil quality in range of this building. Most vegetation types require more or less fertile land to grow and spread seeds. The soil quality is improved by purewater rain and new vegetation. Acid rains and some plants may decrese it.
Translation: 此建築範圍內的土壤品質總覽大多數類型的植被需要肥沃程度不同的土壤才能生長和傳播種子。純淨降雨和新植被能改善土壤品質。酸雨和部分植物會降低土壤品質。

Text: The amount of resources which can be harvested from vegetation in this building's range. Harvesting is a low priority operation and is done by idling Drones.
Translation: 收穫此建築範圍內的植被時可獲得的資源量。收穫工作的優先順序較低，由閒置的無人機進行。

Text: Green Planet is the second expansion of Surviving Mars, allowing late-game terraforming of your sector and the entire Mars.
Translation: 綠色星球是《火星求生》的第二部資料片，讓玩家能在遊戲後期地球化自己所在的區域乃至整個火星。

Text: "All the gold which is under or upon the earth is not enough to give in exchange for virtue."<newline><right> - Plato
Translation: “世上所有的黃金，都不足以換取美德。”<newline><right> - 柏拉圖

Text: "To light a candle is to cast a shadow."<newline><right>- Ursula K. Le Guin
Translation: “點燃蠟燭時，也會投下陰影。”<newline><right>厄休拉·K·勒吉恩

Text: An anomalous object emitting a mysterious light.
Translation: 悖於常理的物質，會發出神祕的光芒。

Text: "The gods do not protect fools. Fools are protected by more capable fools."<newline><right>- Larry Niven
Translation: “眾神不保護愚人，愚者被更有能力的愚者們保護著。”<newline><right>- 拉里·尼文

Text: Anomalous alien object with unspecified origin.
Translation: 悖於常理的異型物體，起源不詳。

Text: Uses Water to create a potential target for Wisps. The Wisps will be held inside during the night.
Translation: 消耗水資源，吸引幽光。幽光在夜間會被監禁在陷阱中。
使用多個幽光照明的燈具。
使用單個幽光照明的燈具。

Text: When we tried to scan one of the sectors, our sensors went blind. Upon closer inspection we discovered that the source of the interference was a mysterious crystalline entity. It’s huge, how could we have missed it?
Translation: 當我們準備掃描其中一個區域的時候，我們的探測器失靈了。經過進一步調查，我們發現干擾源來自於一大塊神祕晶體。這塊晶體非常龐大，我們當初怎麼會沒注意到它呢？

Text: The dark crystal is just standing there, refracting the light in a peculiar way. Intense energy vortices around the entity cause vibrations in the atmosphere and give birth to Electrostatic Dust Devils. Some of our scientists proposed that the crystals have energy-manipulating properties and so were able to obfuscate their presence in the area despite their proportions. Of course, all of this is just a hypothesis – we need more research to reach a conclusion. A peculiar Alien Crystal has been revealed in Sector . The sector can’t be scanned for now. The Crystalline Entity Properties tech has become available. Research it to gain more insight on the mystery.
Translation: 這塊黑水晶就矗立在地面上，射向它的光線會以古怪的方式折射而出。這塊晶體周圍縈繞著強大的能量漩渦。這種能量會造成大氣振動，從而產生電磁塵捲風。我們中的一部分科學家認為，這種晶體擁有控制能量的特性。因此儘管體積巨大，它還是成功地將自己的形跡隱藏了起來。當然，這一切不過是假設而已。我們需要進行進一步研究，才能得到確鑿的結論。 您在區域之中發現了一塊怪異的異型水晶。目前區域暫時無法進行掃描。 您已經可以研究水晶實體特性技術了。研究相關技術，尋找關於該謎團的更多答案。

Text: Maintain caution around the crystals until we know more.
Translation: 在我們對這塊水晶有更多瞭解之前，一定要保持警惕。

Text: We have discovered a mysterious alien crystal in one of the map sectors. It’s blocking our scanners somehow. We need to complete the research Crystalline Entity Properties in order to know more.
Translation: 我們在地圖的其中一片區域中，找到了一塊神祕的異型水晶。它透過某種方式遮蔽了我們的掃描裝置。為了瞭解更多資訊，我們需要完成水晶實體特性相關技術的研究工作。
Old Text: We have discovered a mysterious alien crystal in one of the map sectors. It’s blocking our scanners somehow. We need to complete the research CrystalsBuilding Entity Properties in order to know more.
Old Translation: 我們在地圖的其中一片區域中，找到了一塊神祕的異型水晶。它透過某種方式遮蔽了我們的掃描裝置。為了瞭解更多資訊，我們需要完成水晶實體特性相關技術的研究工作。

Text: The bizarre alien crystals appear to soak up all forms of waves directed at them. Our team suggests that if we feed enough energy to the entities, their physical properties would change dramatically.
Translation: 這塊怪異的異形水晶似乎能吸收所有朝它而去的能量波。我們的研究團隊認為，如果能將足夠的電力充入水晶中，水晶的物理特性將會發生巨大變化。

Text:
We are unable to predict the effects of such an action but the Chiefs of Staff suggest that this could be the only logical way of finding out what’s going on.

<effect>Crystals can be fed energy. When powered up completely, their properties will change.
Translation:
我們目前無法預測這樣的行為會導致什麼樣的結果。但參謀長認為，如果想弄清楚水晶的特性，這是唯一一條可行之路。

<effect>您可以向水晶充能了。完全充能之後，水晶的特性也會發生改變。

Text: We could give it a try… but tread carefully!
Translation: 我們可以嘗試一下……但務必要小心行事！
Old Text: We could give it a try… but thread carefully!
Old Translation: 我們可以嘗試一下……但務必要小心行事！

Text: Our scientists have completed the Crystalline Entity Properties research project which revealed that the alien crystals can be fed energy via our power grid. Who knows what could happen if we actually provide them with the required energy?
Translation: 我們的科學家已經完成了水晶實體特性相關的研究工作。研究發現，我們可以透過電網，對這塊水晶進行充電。如果水晶獲得了需要的電能之後，誰知道會發生什麼事情呢？

Text: The power flowed through the alien crystal and it started humming with low vibration. The tiny dust devils forming around it dispersed and a ray of light beamed from it towards the stars. Such a magnificent sight!
Translation: 能量流入了異型水晶之中，水晶開始低頻振動，發出了嗡嗡聲。水晶周圍的小型塵捲風逐漸消失，一束光芒從它的內部射向群星之中。這真是壯觀的一幕啊！

Text:
Our sensors went crazy as mathematical sequences started feeding us information about the surrounding area. Immediately, tiny specks of dust started shedding from the outer layer of the crystal. Our analysis indicates that these are filled with various rare metals!

The Chief Scientist is fascinated, to say the least! She suggests that we power up more crystals, but to do it carefully as it appears that the entities are quite susceptible to energy fluctuations which can threaten their integrity. On the other hand, the Tactical Commander suggests that we must torch one of the crystals, crack it open and see what’s inside of it – as usually, he suspects some kind of threat for the colony.

<effect>Powered up crystals instantly reveal their sector and stop emitting Electrostatic Dust Devils. They produce small amounts of Rare Metals over time while powered.

<effect>You can destroy powered-up crystals to instantly gain Research Point rewards.

<hint>Power up more crystals to progress through the Mystery.
Translation:
我們的感測器讀數開始狂飆，周圍地區的資訊透過數學序列不斷顯示在我們眼前。塵土的碎塊開始從水晶的外層結構上不斷脫落。經過檢查，我們發現這些碎塊中包含著各式各樣的稀有金屬！

毫不誇張地說，我們的首席科學家已經徹底對它著了迷！她建議我們對水晶繼續進行充能，但一定要非常小心，因為水晶實體似乎對能量波動非常敏感，而能量波動可能會破壞水晶的整體結構。而另一方面，我們的戰術指揮官建議我們把其中一塊水晶點燃，把它砸開，看看裡面有什麼東西。和往常一樣，他懷疑這塊水晶會威脅到殖民地的安全。

<effect>水晶在充能之後，立刻顯現出了它內部的構造，周圍的電磁塵捲風也停止了。當處於充能狀態時，它會慢慢生成少量稀有金屬。

<effect>您可以摧毀完全充能的水晶，並立刻獲得研究點數獎勵。

<hint>請為更多這樣的水晶充能，加快謎團的解決進度。

Text: The moment we powered up one of the crystals, the Dust Devils in the area stopped and it revealed the sector! On top of that, the crystal started shedding tiny amounts of Rare Metals! Maybe it is a good idea to continue giving them energy!
Translation: 當水晶完成充能的一瞬間，周圍的塵捲風立刻停了下來，水晶的內部構造也顯現出來了！更重要的是，少量稀有金屬開始從水晶表面不斷脫落！或許我們應該繼續對它們進行充能！

Text: The crystals appear to be something greater than mere physical anomalies. Some members of our team described them as intelligent entities, as crazy as that sounds.
Translation: 這塊水晶似乎並不僅僅是什麼物理異象。雖然聽起來非常荒唐，但我們團隊中的部分成員認為，這些水晶是擁有智慧的實體。

Text:
Since the last one we powered up, they began to project a holographic image of something we initially believed to be a star chart. A more thorough examination revealed that they are showing the relative positions of the other crystals we haven’t yet powered up. As weird as it seems, we all get the impression that they urge us to complete the process for the rest of them.

<hint>Power-up all Alien Crystals to complete the mystery.
Translation:
當我們完成了最後一塊水晶的充能之後，它們開始投射出了全息影像。我們最初以為它是某種星圖。但經過更深入的調查之後，我們發現，這幅影像顯示的是其它尚未進行充能的水晶位置。儘管這聽起來很古怪，但我們有種感覺，這些水晶似乎在催促我們完成其餘水晶的充能工作。

<hint>為所有的異形水晶充能，完成謎團。

Text: I wonder what they are trying to show us.
Translation: 我很好奇它們打算向我們展示什麼。

Text: Some of our team members suggest that we should power-up more Alien Crystals and observe their behavior.
Translation: 團隊裡有人建議為更多異形水晶充能並觀察其行為。

Text: Last night, nightmares plagued the colony. We all experienced an overwhelming feeling of loss and grief. Could this be related to the destruction of the crystals?
Translation: 昨天晚上，整個殖民地的人都做起了噩夢。我們所有人都感覺到了一陣壓倒性的失落與悲傷。莫非因為我們摧毀了水晶，才導致了這樣的結果？

Text:
At today’s briefing the Chief Scientist has presented us with her conclusion – our actions are to blame for the permanent change in the behavior of the crystals. Their energy signature has changed and they no longer emanate their gleeful auras. The Chief Scientist gave us the stare while we were reviewing the data.

The silence was broken by the Tactical Commander who dismissed the allegations. ‘How could you believe that some stones could possess intelligence and personality? They are simply exotic matter for us to harvest and exploit!’. We kept it professional and no argument was started, but many of us somehow knew that we have harmed living beings.

<hint>Destroy all Crystals to finish the Mystery.
Translation:
在今天的會議上，首席科學家帶來了她的結果。由於我們的行為，水晶的行為模式發生了不可逆轉的變化。它們的能量形態發生了改變，已經不再會發出愉悅的氛圍了。當我們對資料進行審核時，首席科學家一直在瞪著我們看。

打破沉默的人是戰術指揮官，他對首席科學家的指控提出了反駁。“你竟然認為，這些石頭擁有智力和人格嗎？它們不過是異星物質，在等待我們進行開採發掘而已！”儘管我們保持著專業態度，並沒有因此引起爭執。但不知為何，我們之中很多人認為，我們傷害了其它的生靈。

<hint>摧毀所有水晶，完成謎團。

Text: We will do whatever it takes to pave the way for the future generations on Mars.
Translation: 無論付出怎樣的代價，我們都要為火星上的後代鋪平道路。

Text: The continuous destruction of the alien crystals has led to some irreversible change in their shared behaviour. We can only continue to harvest them for the precious research information they provide.
Translation: 我們不斷地摧毀異形水晶，水晶的行為模式也出現了不可逆轉的變化。為了獲得水晶中蘊含的珍貴研究資料，我們只能繼續摧毀水晶。

Text: Human nature is such that we have to learn how to live with the consequences of our irreversible actions. For we usually understand the beauty and the value of things only after we have destroyed them.
Translation: 既然我們的行為已經帶來了不可逆轉的結果，我們就必須學會適應這種結果，人性就是如此。通常而言，只有當我們摧毀了美麗的事物之後，我們才會理解到它們的美麗與它們的價值。

Text:
One by one, the Alien Crystals perished under our rule. We perceived them as mere resources, as milestones on our path to master the Universe. Only until we have finally gathered all the pieces we were able to see the puzzle and understand the wrongness of our actions. The crystals weren’t singular entities but rather the different organs of an intelligent, thinking alien being.

For millennia the creature traveled through the vast expanse of space in its primal form - a swarm of meteor-like crystals. It fell on Mars and began its cocoon period, forming the outer shell of its parts from the fine dust and absorbing the bleak solar radiation. It probably felt hope when we arrived and started feeding it energy, but then we could only imagine its desperation when it realized we were killing it. It tried to warn us, to talk to us, to plead us, but we ignored it. Now it’s only a memory. And we ask ourselves, was it worth it?l
Translation:
在我們的命令之下，這些異型水晶一個接一個地消失了。我們只把這些水晶當成資源，當成我們宇宙發掘之旅上的里程碑。直到我們將所有的碎片聚集在一起，我們才終於找到了答案，意識到我們的行為有多麼錯誤。這些水晶並不是各自獨立的實體，而是一個有智慧、有思想的外星生物的不同器官。

幾千年來，這個生物以它原始的形態 - 一大群像流星一樣的水晶，跨越了廣闊的宇宙空間。當它落在火星上之後，它便開始結繭，吸收火星上的塵土結成外殼，同時吸收微弱的太陽輻射。當我們到達火星，開始為它進行充能時，它或許還感覺到了希望。但當它意識到我們正在殘殺它時，它心中的絕望可想而知。它試圖警告我們，想要與我們交流，想要懇求我們，但我們卻忽視了它。現在，這一切都只存在於我們的記憶之中了。我們捫心自問，這樣做真的值得嗎？！

Text: Regrets bring nothing constructive. We did what was needed to survive and thrive.
Translation: 悔恨不會帶來任何建設性的東西。為了生存，為了發展，我們做了不得不做的事情。

Text: The last of the crystal entities has been destroyed. We feel richer in knowledge but deprived of some higher truth we could have witnessed. But the prosperity of humans on Mars has been secured thanks to our actions, and that’s what matters.
Translation: 最後一塊水晶也被摧毀了。我們獲得了更豐富的知識，但也錯失了可能瞭解更高層次真理的機會。但由於我們的舉動，火星上的人類得以繁榮發展，這才是最重要的事情。

Text: We watched the transformation of the Alien Crystals in awe. They shed their shells and their beautiful energy forms converged into a single vortex high in the pale Martian skies. We all basked in their light and the joy which vibrantly emanated from them.
Translation: 我們懷著敬畏的心情，看著異形水晶完成了蛻變。蛻下外殼之後，它們展現出了美麗的能量形態，在火星蒼白的天空中形成了一個漩渦。我們所有人都沐浴在亮光中，感受到了他們身上發出來的喜悅之情。

Text: We have unraveled another of the nature’s wondrous mysteries and the magnificent sight and the sense of accomplishment were worth all the effort. The crystals were the cocoon form of a single entity which lied dormant for millennia under the bleak sun on Mars. We fed it and nurtured it, giving it the energy it lacked on the Red Planet and it tried to repay us the favor. Now that its parts have all transformed and converged into a singular entity, it is ready to take back to the stars from where it came. We all know all of this because we feel its joy and can hear its song, deep into our minds. Farewell, cosmic traveler! And come back if you want to visit your old friends some day! A large amount of resources has been placed near the colony as a farewell gift. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: 我們成功解開了自然界的另一個謎團，親眼目睹了那壯美的一幕，感受到了成就感，這一切都讓我們的努力沒有白費。這些水晶都是某個外星生物的繭殼，這個外星生物在火星黯淡的日光之下沉睡了數千年。我們哺育了它，給予了它火星上缺少的能量，而它也打算報答我們的恩情。現在，它所有的部分都已經完成了蛻變。它重新變回了一個整體，準備返回它的故鄉星系。我們知道這一切，是因為我們感受到了它的喜悅，聽到了它的歌聲，這一切都映入了我們的意識之中。 再見了，宇宙旅行者！如果還想再見見你的老朋友們，就再回來一趟吧！ 作為臨別贈禮，您的殖民地附近被放置了大量資源。 您獲得了新的技術，。

Text: We were truly blessed to witness such an awe-inspiring event!
Translation: 能親眼見識到這麼令人驚歎的一幕，我們實在是太幸運了！

Text: By powering up all the crystals, we helped the alien creature which lied dormant and marooned on Mars complete the next phase of its life cycle. It has taken off to the stars, and we all know that our first contact with an alien race has earned us a friend.
Translation: 我們為所有的水晶都充滿了能量，幫助了這隻在火星上擱淺陷入休眠的外星生物，讓它成功進化到了生命的下個階段。它已經飛向了群星之中。我們都意識到，我們與外星種族的首次接觸，為我們贏得了一位外星友人。

Text: The destroyed crystal brings even more exotic matter for our scientists to analyze, but there's something else. A shared feeling of grief and loss takes over the colony the moment the crystal dissolves.
Translation: 被摧毀的水晶是更加特別的物質，可以讓我們的科學家進行分析，但並不僅僅如此。當水晶被摧毀的時候，整個殖民地的居民都感受到了一陣強烈的失落與悲傷，

Text: The Chief Scientist with her inquisitive mind made the observation that the entire team feels the same, even those who aren't directly involved in the destruction of the crystal. She is sure that the crystals are begging us to stop hurting their brethren and that’s why she has filed a request to cease all operations on crystal salvaging. The Tactical Commander urges us to dismiss such claims as ‘ludicrous’ and to think about the scientific possibilities ahead of us.
Translation: 首席科學家敏銳地意識到，整個團隊感覺到了相同的情感。哪怕是那些並沒有直接參與破壞水晶的人，也同樣感覺到了這種情感。她非常肯定，這些水晶正在懇求我們不要傷害它們的同類。因此，她請求立刻停止所有的水晶開採行動。戰術指揮官催促我們不要理會這種“荒唐可笑”的要求，而應當考慮擺在我們面前的科學上的可能性。
Old Text: The Chief Scientist with her inquisitive mind made the observation that all colonists present on Mars feel the same, even those who aren’t directly involved in the destruction of the crystal. She is sure that the crystals are begging us to stop hurting their brethren and that’s why she has filed a request to cease all operations on crystal salvaging. The Tactical Commander urges us to dismiss such claims as ‘ludicrous’ and to think about the scientific possibilities ahead of us.
Old Translation: 首席科學家敏銳地意識到，所有火星上的居民都感到了相同的感受。哪怕是那些並沒有直接參與破壞水晶的人，也同樣感覺到了這種情感。她非常肯定，這些水晶正在懇求我們不要傷害它們的同類。因此，她請求立刻停止所有的水晶開採行動。戰術指揮官催促我們不要理會這種“荒唐可笑”的要求，而應當考慮擺在我們面前的科學上的可能性。

Text: The colony comes first, no matter what.
Translation: 無論發生什麼事情，殖民地都應該是我們的第一要務。

Text: The destruction of the alien crystal has earned us a lot of research data. This reveals the crystals’ tremendous scientific potential. But would it be a valid moral decision to place ourselves before the crystals?
Translation: 透過摧毀異型水晶，我們獲得了相當可觀的研究資料。這些資料昭示了這塊水晶巨大的科學潛力。但把我們需求放在這些水晶之前，這真的是個符合倫理的決定嗎？

Text: A sinkhole appeared overnight. It's more than 10 meters across and dangerously close by.
Translation: 一夜之間，憑空出現了一個天坑。天坑尺寸超過10公尺，貿然接近非常危險。

Text:
We should send an Explorer to assess the danger the sinkhole poses ASAP.

<effect>A new anomaly appears at the sinkhole site.
Translation:
我們應該立刻派出一臺探索者，評估天坑會帶來的危險。

<effect>天坑的位置出現了一個新的異象。

Text: A mysterious sinkhole on the surface of Mars.
Translation: 火星表面出現了一個神祕的天坑。

Text: A mysterious sinkhole has appeared on Mars. We should probably investigate it.
Translation: 火星上出現了一個神祕的天坑。或許我們應該調查一番。

Text: St. Elmo’s Fire: A Turn for the Positive
Translation: 聖艾爾摩之火：情況好轉

Text: We analyzed the sinkhole and deem it to be stable and not a safety concern.
Translation: 我們對天坑進行了分析，確定它性質穩定，不會帶來安全問題。

Text:
It is quite visible during the day and all vehicles have already added it to their navigation systems so they can easily avoid it.

The sinkhole exposed ancient lava tubes beneath the surface – rich in natural occurring polymers. This is truly a very interesting discovery we can exploit in several ways.
Translation:
天坑在白天的時候肉眼可見，所有的載具都在導航系統中加入了它的位置，以便遠遠地繞開它。

天坑表面之下，暴露著遠古時期形成的熔岩洞。這種熔岩洞含有豐富的聚合物。這確實是個很有趣的發現，我們可以從很多方面進行利用。
聚合物自然是多多益善。（獲得<polymers(choice_param1)>）

Text: We may learn a lot from this exposition. Leave it intact. (Gain <research(choice_param2)>)
Translation: 或許我們可以從暴露的熔岩洞中學到很多新東西。還是不要碰它了。（獲得<research(choice_param2)>）

Text: The sinkhole turned out to be the entrance to ancient lava tubes below the surface of the planet.
Translation: 這個天坑其實是個入口，可以通往火星內部遠古時期形成的熔岩洞。

Text: St. Elmo’s Fire: Illuminating a Mystery
Translation: 聖艾爾摩之火：啟迪謎團

Text: Vivid lights - hovering just slightly above the ground - were witnessed “roaming” around water containing structures for the better part of the Martian night.
Translation: 不止一次，有人在晚上的時候，親眼目睹了幾團亮光“飄蕩”在天坑附近 - 這些亮光漂浮在略高於地面的高度，四處遊蕩。

Text:
We have limited surveillance footage that gives some credibility to the eye witnesses. 

Accounts like these are nothing new in general; the strain of the night shift is usually the culprit in such cases but the consistency and the sheer quantity of the reports make this one tough to dismiss.

Not to mention we seem to have unaccounted losses of water from our life support network.

<effect>Mysterious lights will appear at night and drain Water.
<hint>Turning off Water storages will protect our reserves, but not the rest of the Life Support grid.
Translation:
我們的監控錄下來了一部分影像，提升了目擊者的陳述的可信度。 

像這樣的報告通常不是什麼新鮮事，夜班工作的壓力通常都是這類奇思異想的罪魁禍首。但這一次，報告的數量非常多，而且報告呈現出了高度的一致性，這讓我們無法置之不理。

除此之外，我們的生命供給網路中似乎損失了大量的水資源。

<effect>神祕的亮光會在晚上出現並吸收水資源。
<hint>關閉水資源儲存設施可以防止其中的水資源流失，但生命供給網路的水資源仍會流失。

Text: Unsettling. I doubt we have seen the last of this phenomenon.
Translation: 這真是讓人不安。這種現象恐怕還會繼續下去。

Text: Mystery lights have began to appear near water-containing buildings at night and drain them.
Translation: 神祕的亮光會在夜裡出現，它們會接近包含水資源的建築物，吸取其中的水分。

Text: St. Elmo’s Fire: Nights of Wonder
Translation: 聖艾爾摩之火：奇蹟之夜

Text: Ball lightning, St. Elmo’s Fire, or most probably something entirely different? Our citizens call them simply “wisps”.
Translation: 這究竟是球形閃電，是聖艾爾摩之火，還是某種截然不同的現象？我們的居民們稱它們為“幽光”。

Text:
They are fascinated with these strange lights, and who’s to blame them. They appear every night, “dance” around for a while and then go with the dawn - taking some of our precious water along and leaving us none the wiser. 

All in all, our scientists feel they have made enough observations and have data to work with towards solving this mystery, should we feel it takes priority.

<effect>St. Elmo’s Fire Research is available.
Translation:
他們陶醉在這種奇異的光芒之中，又有誰能責怪他們呢？這些光芒每天晚上都會出現，在附近“翩翩起舞”。黎明時分，它們就會消失，帶走一部分貴重的水資源，而我們對它依然一無所知。

無論如何，我們的科學團隊認為他們已經做了充分的觀察工作。如果我們認為這件事情是當務之急，他們隨時可以開始進行對謎團的研究。

<effect>對聖艾爾摩之火的研究已經可以開始了。

Text: We will get to the bottom of this.
Translation: 我們一定會把這件事情調查得水落石出。

Text: The St. Elmo’s Fire tech could reveal more about the strange events happening on Mars.
Translation: 研究聖艾爾摩之火相關技術，可以幫助我們進一步瞭解火星上發生的奇異事件。

Text: St. Elmo’s Fire: Follow the Light
Translation: 聖艾爾摩之火：跟隨光芒

Text: Observing at a distance won’t do when it comes to understanding the wisps. That much has become quite obvious by now.
Translation: 僅僅是在遠處觀察，是無助於理解幽光的本質的。這一點已經非常明確了。

Text:
