What has also become obvious is the strain on our water supply. Still, we know nothing of our thieves, save they originate from the sinkholes appearing all around.

Many feel that returning our Explorer for further analysis at a sinkhole site may be the only move we can currently make.

We have identified a sinkhole perfect for the task.

<hint>Send an Explorer to scan the anomaly at the chosen sinkhole site.
Translation:
而另一點非常明確的事實是，我們的水資源已經告急了。但我們只知道，這群偷水賊是從附近的天坑中產生的。除此之外，我們對它依然一無所知。

很多人認為，我們目前唯一能做的事情，就是讓探索者返回天坑，進行進一步的分析。

我們已經找到了一處非常適合分析的天坑。

<hint>指派探索者前往目標天坑，對異象進行分析吧。

Text: We have to do risk management.
Translation: 我們必須做好風險管控工作。

Text: This sinkhole is ideal for further analyzing.
Translation: 這個天坑非常適合進行進一步分析。

Text: Sending an Explorer to the sinkhole near the colony would allow us to gain more intel on the nature of the wisps.
Translation: 派遣探索者前往殖民地附近的天坑，這可以讓我們進一步瞭解這些幽光的本質。

Text: St. Elmo’s Fire: To Redefine Life
Translation: 聖艾爾摩之火：重新定義生命

Text: Are wisps alive? Perhaps a non-carbon based life form? Are they intelligent?
Translation: 這些幽光是有生命的嗎？或許它們並不是碳基生物？它們也有智慧嗎？

Text:
So far what we know is that given water the wisps will use it to multiply, lighting up in certain areas and activating some vaguely understood mechanism which at face value resembles cell signaling – native to our current understanding of biological life. 

So they have processes for self-sustaining and cell signaling, albeit no actual cells, still two pillars of the definition of life as we employ it.

There is a discussion going on Mars. What comes out of it may cast a long shadow, far down the road head.
Translation:
到目前為止，我們瞭解的情況是：只要獲得水源，它們就會增殖，會在特定區域內發光，還會激發某種我們並非完全瞭解的機制。基於我們目前對生物生命的瞭解，這種機制看起來與細胞訊號傳導過程類似。

總體而言，它們具有自我維持過程與細胞訊號傳導過程。儘管並沒有真正的細胞組織，它們依然擁有生命的兩個重要特徵。

火星居民之間展開了一場討論。討論的結果，可能會對我們接下來的決策產生長期的影響。

Text: We are writing the textbooks on this one.
Translation: 我們正在編寫關於幽光的說明手冊。

Text: Recent findings about the wisps have given rise to the hypothesis that they may be a form of non-carbon based life. A discussion has began on how to treat the wisps going forward.
Translation: 對幽光的最新研究成果，讓我們有了新的假設。我們認為，它們可能屬於某種非碳基生命。接下來，應該如何對待幽光，人們已經對這個問題展開了討論。
聖艾爾摩之火：還要更多！

Text: Our scientists have come forward with an experiment hoping to improve our grasp of the wisp situation.
Translation: 我們的科學家們提出了一個實驗方案，可以幫助我們進一步瞭解幽光的本質。

Text:
What the plan lacks in elegance it makes up with simplicity to execute. 

Dubbed "Experiment 03-K64", the plan is that we construct a massive water tank, concentrating an unprecedented amount of water in a very small area and basically to see how the wisps feel about it.

<goal>Construct a new Large Water Tank and fill it with water. Even if you already have a Large Water Tank you have to build a new one.
Translation:
雖然這個計劃不怎麼精緻，但執行起來很簡單。

計劃代號“03-K64實驗”，具體內容為我們建造一個巨大的水箱，將極大量的水資源聚集在較小的區域內，看看幽光對此會有怎樣的反應。

<goal>建造一個新的大型水箱並往裡面裝水。

Text: Oh, I expected something more elaborate. Go ahead.
Translation: 哦，我還指望他們能提出更精細的計劃呢。那就這麼辦吧。

Text: Construct a new Large Water Tank and fill it with water in order to attract wisps and observe their behavior closely.
Translation: 建造一個新的大型水箱並往裡面裝水，以吸引幽光並仔細觀察其行為。
Old Text: Constructing a Large Water Tank would allow us to attract more wisps and observe their behavior closely.
Old Translation: 建造一個大型水箱，這樣我們就能吸引更多幽光，近距離觀察它們的行為模式。

Translation: 聖艾爾摩之火：虹色奇觀

Text: In a vivid display of unearthly beauty, a surge in wisp activity far surpassing our most optimistic expectations played out before our eyes!
Translation: 幽光出現了爆發式的活動，遠遠超出了我們最樂觀的預期。它們在我們眼前展現出了驚人的美麗！

Text:
The water tank succeeded in attracting larger than ever numbers of wisps, bringing great amounts of knowledge with them. 

Ranging from the ability to determine the age of individual lights to finding behavioral patterns unique to some but absent in others, our scientists are eager to get to sorting through the treasure trove of data that was just made available for them.

<effect>Will of the Wisp tech is available.
Translation:
水箱吸引了體積更大的幽光，幽光的數量也變得更多。由此，我們得以瞭解到它們蘊含的豐富知識。

這些知識範圍廣泛，從鑑定單個幽光的形成年齡，到發覺部分幽光個體與眾不同的獨特行為模式。我們的科學家們已經迫不及待地想要探索這些資料寶庫，對得到的結果進行分類了。

<effect>幽光意志技術已經可以開始研究了。

Text: The Large Water tank attracts multiple wisps.
Translation: 大型水箱吸引了多個幽光。

Text: St. Elmo’s Fire: The Light Traps
Translation: 聖艾爾摩之火：誘光陷阱

Text: Our science team has been working tirelessly to design this new miracle of engineering – The Light Trap.
Translation: 我們的科研團隊透過孜孜不倦的研究，設計出了工程學的新奇蹟 - 誘光陷阱。

Text:
The name, ironic as much as it is unimaginative, is meant to lure in the wisps with water the same way an actual light trap lures in insects with light, leaving them trapped inside.

Our scientists are quite eager to try out the prototype.

<goal>Construct a Light Trap.
Translation:
諷刺的是，這個名稱本身倒是非常缺乏想像力。這種裝置就像使用燈光誘捕昆蟲的誘蟲燈一樣，它可以使用水將幽光誘捕而來，將其困在陷阱裡。

我們的科學家們已經迫不及待地想試用一下原型機了。

<goal>建造一個誘光陷阱。

Text: We should try this out at once!
We should construct a Light Trap to try and capture a wisp for further analysis.
Translation: 我們應該建造一個誘光陷阱，把幽光抓住，進行進一步分析。
聖艾爾摩之火：魔法之光

Text: It works! The Light trap is able to lure and capture wisps within its vicinity.
Translation: 成功了！誘光陷阱成功地捕住了幽光。

Text:
The wisps radiate heat and are so luminous that our scientists can come up with easy methods of harnessing their energy.

While we should eventually decide on where we stand towards these lights being allowed to pursue their goals freely or not, for the time being – due to their mesmerizing beauty - we have allowed for captured wisps to be displayed in decorative lamps within our Domes for all to enjoy.

<effect>New decorative buildings available per 10 wisps captured.
Translation:
這些幽光會發出熱量，還會發出耀眼的光芒。我們的科學家可以輕而易舉地找到方法，駕馭它們的能量。

等到研究的最後階段，我們必須做出決定，是讓它們重歸自由，還是將它們囚禁至此。不過就目前階段而言，它們實在是太漂亮了。我們允許大家把抓來的幽光作為裝飾燈具擺在穹頂裡，讓所有人都能欣賞這一美景。

<effect>每捕獲10個幽光，就會解鎖新的裝飾性建築。

Text: This will help brighten the mood in the colony.
Translation: 這種裝飾建築可以改善殖民地居民的心情。

Text: We managed to capture our first wisps! The Light Trap project was clearly a good idea!
Translation: 我們已經成功地捕獲了第一個幽光！誘光陷阱計劃確實是個好主意！

Text: St. Elmo’s Fire: Prisoners of Light
Translation: 聖艾爾摩之火：光之囚徒

Text: The Light Trap has succeeded flawlessly with its task to lure and hold wisps within its confines.
Translation: 誘光陷阱完美地實現了它的目的。它成功地將幽光引誘而來，將其限制在禁閉空間之中。

Text:
Once the wisps were in custody, the philosophical conversation on how to treat the lights, as animate or inanimate entities, was revived.

The science community is split on moral grounds, should we confine the wisps and experiment on them to widen our knowledge of the universe, or should we strive for a more symbiotic existence in which we trade water for the electrical power which can be harnessed from them.
Translation:
當我們捕獲這些幽光之後，關於我們應該如何對待它們，以及它們究竟算不算是生命體諸如此類的哲學討論又出現了。

科學團隊在道德立場方面出現了不同的態度。我們應該繼續囚禁這些幽光，對它們進行實驗，瞭解更多關於這個宇宙的知識嗎？還是說，我們應該追求互利共生，將水資源送給它們，以此換取可以利用的電力？
互利共生。（使用水資源換取電力）

Text: Experiment upon them. (Gain RP for every captured wisp)
Translation: 對它們進行實驗。（每捕獲一個幽光，都可以獲得研究點數）

Text: In the wake of this beautiful and magnificent discovery of alien life, which is not carbon based, we have opted for a harmonious existence and declined to withhold the wisps from their needs.
Translation: 接觸到這種美麗輝煌的非碳基外星生命之後，我們與它們採取了互利共生的生存方式，不再阻止它們獲得它們需要的資源。

Text: On the contrary, we will allow free access to our water supply and in return we will take advantage of their magnificent luminance to generate equally needed power. We have chosen the symbiotic way of existence with the wisps as a society. Eventually they will shed their secrets, but it is decided that shall come through observations and not experimentation on them in captivity. Wisps will continue appearing but will trade Water for Power. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: 相反，我們允許它們自由使用我們的水資源。作為回報，我們可以從它們發出的耀眼亮光中，獲得同樣重要的電力資源。 我們選擇了互利共生的生存方式，與幽光們共同形成了一個族群。到最後，它們也向我們敞開了它們的祕密。不過，這些祕密是我們透過觀察瞭解的，並不是透過囚禁與實驗得來的。 幽光會繼續出現，不過您可以使用水資源換取電力。 您獲得了新的技術，。

Text: We welcome these fellow life forms.
Translation: 我們歡迎這些同為生命的夥伴們。

Text: Symbiotic way of coexisting was deemed the best way to forward. We will be able to use the wisps to gain more energy for the colony as long as we feed them with water.
Translation: 我們認為，互利共生是最好的發展方式。只要能為幽光提供水資源，我們就可以透過它們，讓殖民地獲得更多電力。
聖艾爾摩之火：為了科學！

Text: With so many wisps in our custody, we see endless opportunities to expand our knowledge of an exotic life form.
Translation: 捕獲這麼多幽光之後，我們擁有了無窮無盡的機遇，可以進一步拓展對這種異星生命的瞭解。

Text: Our research however seems to weaken them and each individual fades away after a varying amount of experimentation done on them. We try our best to preserve the lights with free access to water – but they stop consuming it with time and simply wither away. The theory is, as they won’t be able to upkeep their population – after a while, the wisps will cease to appear. Until then, however, we will have learned a lot. Trapped Wisps will generate RP per killed wisp. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: 然而，我們的研究似乎對它們造成了損傷。每個幽光在經過一系列實驗之後，都會逐漸黯淡下來。 我們已經盡我們所能地不傷害它們，讓它們可以自由享用水資源 - 但它們卻漸漸地不再消耗水資源，慢慢黯淡消亡。我們猜想，它們無法繼續維持它們的族群數量。一段時間之後，這些幽光就不再會出現了。不過在那之前，我們肯定已經掌握了很多知識了。 每消滅一個幽光，都可以獲得研究點數。 已獲得新技術，。

Text: Gaining knowledge and halting the water losses was deemed best way ahead. Captured wisps will provide a valuable boost to our science program.
Translation: 不僅能獲得新的知識，還能減少水資源消耗，這是最好的做法。捕獲的幽光可以為我們的科研計劃提供重要的促進作用。
聖艾爾摩之火：消逝的光芒

Text: We captured and held the wisps prisoners. Subjected them to countless experiments and we know a lot more now.
Translation: 我們捕獲了幽光，將它們囚禁了起來。透過強迫它們參加無數實驗，我們掌握了許許多多的新知識。

Text:
The Universe showed us life can come in many forms and although some would question if the wisps were truly alive - fact is they withered and faded the same way a wild beast withers in captivity.

Did they learn to avoid us or did we do irreversible damage to their population we may never know. Now only the sinkholes remain - dark and silent. Grotesque mementos of the time the Universe graced us with the wonder of the wisps.

<effect>No more wisps will appear on the surface of Mars.
Translation:
宇宙讓我們明白，生命的形態多種多樣。雖然依然有人質疑這些幽光是不是真的具有生命 - 但事實上，它們會枯萎、會凋零，就像被囚禁在籠中的動物一樣。

是它們已經學會了躲避我們，還是我們對它們的族群造成了不可逆轉的傷害，答案已無從可知。如今，那裡只剩下黑暗而寂靜的天坑。曾幾何時，宇宙曾讓我們親眼目睹了幽光這一奇蹟。

<effect>現在，火星表面已經不再會有幽光出現了。

Text: We are left poorer without them. Farewell wisps.
Translation: 失去了它們，我們變得一蹶不振。再見了，幽光。
區域<u(reg_param1)>內的一個天坑開啟了

Text: St. Elmo’s Fire: Getting Our Hands Dirty
Translation: 聖艾爾摩之火：不擇手段

Text: Our Explorer is just above what we hypothesize to be an entry point to a vast complex made entirely out of ancient lava-tube tunnels.
Translation: 我們的探索者正停在目標區域，我們猜測那裡應該是某個入口點，可以通往遠古時期形成的熔岩隧道群。

Text:
This specific opening also happens to be perfectly fit for lowering the vehicle inside, hoping to track the whereabouts and behavior of the wisps during the day.

Take heed however, we have no idea what awaits inside and if we will be able to recover the Explorer once lowered. It may be a risk worth taking.
Translation:
巧的是，這個入口點剛好非常適合降入載具，有可能能在白天的時候追蹤到幽光的下落，瞭解它們的行為模式。

不過要小心，我們並不清楚裡面有什麼東西。如果探索者真的降下去了，我們也不確定能否將其回收。或許我們值得冒這個險。

Text: We must know, lower the Explorer!
Translation: 我們必須弄清楚，讓探索者下去！

Text: Our Explorer is too valuable to lose in this manner.
Translation: 我們的探索者太珍貴了，絕不能讓它冒這個險。

Text: The Explorer descends down the sinkhole. It's risky but could be worth it if we can discover more about the Wisps.
Translation: 探索者進入了天坑。雖然有風險，但如果能瞭解更多關於幽光的資訊，這一切都是值得的。

Text: St. Elmo’s Fire: The Light At The End Of The Tunnel
Translation: 聖艾爾摩之火：隧道盡頭的光芒

Text: We received a signal from our Explorer after hours of silence.  Massive amounts of data were transmitted before falling silent one final time.
Translation: 經過幾個小時的沉寂之後，我們收到了探索者發來的訊號。我們收到了極為豐富的資料，之後，它便永遠地陷入了沉寂之中。

Text:
The data it sent shows there are buried caverns filled with multitudes of wisps – most of which exhibit dormant behavior and so far do not react in any way to the presence of our vehicle.

Those which have been to the surface and have been near liquid water go through a process which results in several new wisps being “born” out of it. It is truly fascinating and we have never seen anything of the sort on Earth.

Sadly our engineers see no way of extracting the Explorer; still sacrificing it has given us priceless knowledge of a magnificent alien phenomenon.

<effect>Gained <research(reg_param1)>.
Translation:
探索者的資料表明，被掩埋的山洞裡充滿了大量的幽光。絕大部分幽光保持著休眠狀態。到目前為止，它們對我們的探索者並沒有做出任何反應。

而到達地表，接近水源的幽光則經歷了某個過程。這個過程之後，幾個新的幽光從它體內“誕生”而出。這真是太驚人了，我們在地球上從未見過這樣的情形。

不幸的是，我們的工程師們沒辦法回收那臺探索者。不過，它的犧牲依然為我們換來了無價的知識，讓我們更加了解這種壯觀的外星生命。

<effect>獲得<research(reg_param1)>。

Text: Amazing! Sacrificing it was not in vain.
Translation: 真是太驚人了！這臺探索者沒有白白損失。
Old Text: Amazing! Its sacrifice was not in vain.
Old Translation: 真是太驚人了！它的犧牲沒有白費。

Text: The Explorer sends massive amounts of information before the signal dies. The vehicle is lost.
Translation: 探索者在訊號消失之前，發來了容量龐大的資訊。載具消失了。
Old Text: The Explorer sends massive amounts of information before its battery dies and is lost.
Old Translation: 探索者在電池耗盡陷入沉寂之前，發來了容量龐大的資訊。

Text: St. Elmo’s Fire: The Source of Life
Translation: 聖艾爾摩之火：生命之源

Text: With hot plasma cores and using magnetic levitation to move around the surface effortlessly, the wisps still remain a mystery.
Translation: 雖然知道幽光擁有熱等離子體芯，可以透過磁懸浮的方式自由移動，但對我們而言，幽光依然是個謎團。

Text:
What our scientists have confirmed, however, is that they do indeed move with a purpose - to suck out water from our reserves. 

Furthermore, the lights have telltale signs which enable us to recognize individuals among them. Observing these individuals we have noticed that the more water they obtain one night, the more individuals appear for the first time the next – pointing towards a hypothetical method of multiplication based on liquid water.
Translation:
不過，我們的科學家已經證實，它們的行動是具有目的性的 - 從我們的水箱中吸取水資源。

不僅如此，它們還會發出各自不同的光芒。我們可以由此辨認處它們之中每個獨立的個體。透過觀察這些個體，我們發現，它們在夜晚獲得的水資源越多，下一次出現的新個體就會越多。這些事實表明，它們可能是透過液態水進行繁殖的。

Text: Well, we needed to know that for sure I guess.
Translation: 當然，我們必須想辦法證實這一點。

Text: A new research confirmed that the lights actively seek out our water reserves in order to multiply through some vaguely understood mechanism.
Translation: 新的研究結果證明，這些幽光會不斷尋找水資源，以透過某種尚不明瞭的機制進行分裂繁殖。
Old Text: A new research confirmed that the lights actively seek out our water reserves in order to multiply through some poorly understood mechanism.
Old Translation: 新的研究結果證明，這些幽光會不斷尋找水資源，以透過某種尚未清楚的機制進行分裂繁殖。

Text: All stations, red alert! Mission Control, an enormous alien object has just materialized near our colony’s perimeter! This thing is unbelievable, you have to see it yourself!
Translation: 所有崗位，拉響紅色警報！任務指揮中心，一個巨大的異型物體剛剛在我們殖民地的外圍成型了！這實在是太難以置信了，你必須得親自來看看！

Text:
Our scanners cannot penetrate the outer shell of the megastructure. It didn’t attempt to communicate, either. It… just floats there, in the thin Martian air, like a menacing presence of an unknown threat.

<effect>An enormous alien megastructure has appeared above the colony.
Translation:
我們的掃描器無法穿透這座超級巨像的外殼。而它也沒有發出任何想要溝通的企圖。它……只是漂浮在那裡，漂浮在火星稀薄的空氣中，就像某種未知的威脅在惡意面對我們一樣。

<effect>一座巨大的異型巨像出現在殖民地上空。

Text: Maintain vigil and inform me immediately if the situation changes.
Translation: 保持警戒。如果情況發生變化，立刻通知我。

Text: An enormous alien megastructure has appeared above the colony.
Translation: 一座巨大的異型巨像出現在了殖民地上空。
梅塔特隆：梅塔特隆的聲音

Text: I need to talk to you, Commander. I think that something strange is going on with me… It’s the monolith. I feel its alien thoughts inside of my head. It speaks to me, I just don’t understand why but it has chosen me to be its speaker.
Translation: 我得和你談談，指揮官。我覺得，我身上發生了某些奇怪的事情……都是那個大傢伙弄的。我覺得，我的腦海裡響起了外星人的聲音。它在和我交談。我不知道這是怎麼回事，但它選中了我作為它的發言人。

Text: At first I thought I was going crazy, but the medics tell me that nothing’s wrong with me. Since the monolith appeared above us I have been dreaming dreams that aren’t mine. I see things that I cannot understand. And I feel that some strange truth is forming inside my mind, and it urges me to tell it to the world. I am afraid, but also excited, because I feel that this will be important.
Translation: 一開始，我也以為我是發瘋了。但醫療人員告訴我，我的身體沒有任何異常。自從那個大傢伙降臨在我們上方之後，我就一直會做和我無關的夢。我會看到我根本無法理解的東西。我還感覺到，我的意識深處正在形成某種奇怪的真理。它催促著我，讓我把它傳播給全世界。我很害怕，但我也很興奮。因為我覺得，這應該會很重要。
Old Text: At first I thought I was going crazy, but the medics tell me that nothing’s wrong with me. Since the monolith appeared above us I had been dreaming dreams that aren’t mine. I see things that I cannot understand. And I feel that some strange truth is forming inside my mind, and it urges me to tell it to the world. I am afraid, but also excited, because I feel that this will be important.
Old Translation: 一開始，我也以為我是發瘋了。但醫療人員告訴我，我的身體沒有任何異常。自從那個大傢伙降臨在我們上訪之後，我就一直會做和我無關的夢境。我會看到我根本無法理解的東西。我還感覺到，我的意識深處正在形成某種奇怪的真理。它催促著我，讓我把它傳播給全世界。我很害怕，但我也很興奮。因為我覺得，這應該會很重要。

Text: It sounds crazy, but I want to believe...
Translation: 雖然這聽起來像是一派胡言，但我想要相信這一切……

Text: The times of challenge are upon us. We are chosen to represent all humans and face the trials of the Monolith. If we prove worthy we will be rewarded. But if we fail...
Translation: 我們必須準備迎接時間的挑戰了。它選中我們作為所有人類的代表，要求我們面對巨像的試煉。如果我們能證明自己的價值，我們就能得到獎賞。但如果我們失敗的話……

Text:
Metatron, as the Monolith desires to be called, was created to visit and test intelligent species all over the galaxy. It will put us through trials and will make us realize whether we are worthy to take our place among the star-faring species. The stars are cold and bitter and many unknown opportunities and dangers await us there. We must prove that we can understand, that we can survive and thrive in any environment and situation.

Metatron doesn’t care if we want to be tested. It has simply come to announce the beginning of the trial so we can prepare. I’m afraid, Commander, but I’ll give anything to make it through this.

<goal>You will be put through a series of trials. Metatron will create waves of anomalies which will test your ingenuity and resolve. Adapt and survive!

<effect>Offerings are anomalies with limited duration. When analyzed, they will reward you for your efforts.
Translation:
那尊巨像希望我們稱它為梅塔特隆。它存在的目的，就是訪問整個銀河系的智慧物種，讓他們參加試煉。它會讓我們經受考驗，讓我們明白，我們自己究竟有沒有資格，在星際族群之中佔有一席之地。星際世界寒冷而艱險，有各式各樣的未知機遇與危險在等待著我們。我們必須證明我們理解這一切，證明我們足以在任何環境、任何條件下存活下來，茁壯成長。

梅塔特隆根本不在乎我們想不想參加試煉。它只是來宣佈試煉已經開始，讓我們做好準備。我很害怕，指揮官，但我願意付出一切努力通過試煉。

<goal>你將會面對一系列的挑戰。梅塔特隆會創造出一系列異象，測試你的天分與能力。適應自然，生存下來吧！

<effect>挑戰內容是在限定時間內解決異象。只要完成對異象的分析，您就能獲得獎勵。

Text: We have faced harder challenges. Haven’t we proven worthy enough?
Translation: 更困難的挑戰我們都經歷過。難道我們還不足以證明價值嗎？

Text: The alien structure has spoken through the voice of one of our own, claiming to be called Metatron. It has issued us a challenge, regardless of whether we wish to participate. It wants us to start by analyzing timed anomalies to see whether we can express curiosity and perseverance.
Translation: 那座外星巨像透過我們之中某個人的聲音與我們進行了交流，它自稱梅塔特隆。它向我們發起了挑戰，全然不顧我們有沒有參與的意願。首先，它想要我們分析持續時間有限的異象，以確認我們是否能表現出好奇心與毅力。
Old Text: The alien structure has spoken through the voice of one of our own, claiming to be called Metatron. It has issued us a challenge, regardless of whether we wish to participate, and will give us rewards for our progress in the form of timed anomalies.
Old Translation: 那座外星巨像透過我們之中某個人的聲音與我們進行了交流，它自稱梅塔特隆.它強行塞給了我們某個挑戰，不給我們選擇的餘地。如果我們能在限定時間內解決異象，就能獲得它的獎勵。

Text: We have endured a lot more than Metatron expected from a young inexperienced species like ours. But endurance is not enough. It wants more – it wants us to grow, to become even better.
Translation: 儘管身為缺乏經驗的新生種族，但我們的忍耐力已經遠遠超出了梅塔特隆的期待。不過，僅僅忍耐是不夠的。它還要更高的要求 - 它希望我們成長，希望我們變得更好。

Text:
Its final task for us is to make a mark of progress, an effigy of our readiness to evolve and an example for the rest of our species to follow. But if we fail to do this within a reasonable time, we would fail.

<effect>The Project Morpheus tech has become available.

<goal>Construct the Project Morpheus wonder within <reg_param1> Sols to successfully complete the Mystery.
Translation:
它最後的任務是要求我們完成進步的標誌，證明我們已經準備好迎接進化，讓我們族群的其他人也能效仿我們的榜樣。不過，如果不能在限定時間內完成，試煉就會失敗。

<effect>莫菲斯計劃技術已經可以研究了。

<goal>在<reg_param1>個太陽日內，建造莫菲斯計劃這一奇蹟，完成謎團。

Text: We managed to come this far, so it’s a possibility.
Translation: 我們已經走到這一步了，這個目標是有可能實現的。

Text: Metatron has tasked us with constructing Project Morpheus in 20 Sols. It will be the testimony that we can be survivors and thrive in any environment.
Translation: 梅塔特隆要求我們在20個太陽日內建造出莫菲斯計劃。有了這一奇蹟，便足以證明我們可以在任何環境中存活下來，茁壯成長。
Old Text: Metatron has tasked us with constructing Project Morpheus. It will be the testimony that we can be survivors and thrive in any environment.
Old Translation: 梅塔特隆要求我們建造莫菲斯計劃。有了這一奇蹟，便足以證明我們可以在任何環境中存活下來，茁壯成長。

Text: Metatron gave us access to the knowledge of the stars and opportunities to grow and become stronger. But the peaceful times are over, it says, and now it will test our ability to adapt and survive.
Translation: 梅塔特隆賜予了我們群星的知識，讓我們有機會茁壯成長，變得更加強大。然而它說，寧靜的日子已經結束了，它準備考驗我們適應與生存的能力了。

Text:
Metatron has evaluated our ways and has chosen the harshest adversity for us. The Ion Storms will descend upon our colony like a scourge and will deprive us of our greatest power – our technology, our machines which sustain our life.

‘Adapt, expand, evolve.’ These are its words.

<effect>Ion Storm Clouds target your colony and disable all out-dome buildings in their radius. Colonists and in-dome buildings are unaffected.

<hint>Create redundant systems to circumvent the Ion Storm Clouds.
Translation:
梅塔特隆對我們進行了評估，決定以最困難的逆境來考驗我們。離子風暴將會像一場災難一樣降臨在我們的殖民地上。屆時，我們將會失去我們最重要的力量 - 我們賴以為生的技術與機器。

“適應吧，發展吧，進化吧。”它是這麼說的。

<effect>離子風暴雲會降臨在您的殖民地上，風暴雲範圍內的所有穹頂外建築都會失效。但殖民地居民與穹頂內建築不會受到影響。

<hint>建造備用的系統，減輕離子風暴雲帶來的影響。

Text: We didn’t ask for this! But I guess we don’t have a choice...
Translation: 我們沒想要這樣的麻煩！但我猜，我們別無選擇……

Text: Metatron has started creating Ion Storms to put us on a harder challenge. We must watch for when they are about to strike and create redundant systems to circumvent their effect.
Translation: 梅塔特隆已經開始召喚離子風暴雲，將我們推向更加困難的挑戰之中。我們必須留意離子風暴雲的降臨時間，並建造備用的系統，以減輕它們帶來的影響。

Text: Our scientists have observed Metatron’s behavior closely and believe they can predict the arrival of Ion Storms.
Translation: 透過密切觀察梅塔特隆的行為模式，我們的科學團隊認為，他們可以預測離子風暴的到來時間。

Text:
Some of the scientists even suspect that the alien megastructure purposely gives us hints by changing its energy signature slightly before creating an Ion Storm. If they are right, then it seems we are looked upon like pupils by a stern tutor.

<effect>Ion Storm Prediction tech has become available.
Translation:
部分科學家們甚至認為，這座外星巨像在召喚離子風暴之前，會特地略微改變能量特徵模式，以讓我們獲得提示。如果他們想得沒錯，我們看起來就像是一群學生，正在接受嚴厲導師的教導。

<effect>離子風暴預測技術已經可以研究了。

Text: Our scientists have proposed a method to predict the behavior of the Ion Storms created by Metatron.
Translation: 我們的科學家們發現了一種方法，可以提前預測梅塔特隆召喚而來的離子風暴。

Text: Revel in the passing of the great storm. Emerge victorious, remade and stronger. This is the gift of Metatron, the messenger.
Translation: 我們陶醉在風暴結束的喜悅之中。我們獲得了勝利，得到重塑，變得更強。這就是使者梅塔特隆給我們的禮物。

Text:
The Messenger wishes to increase the strain on us even further. It is about to unleash a massive wave of Ion Storm Clouds. We, as always, have to endure it.

<effect>The next wave will send out a large number of Ion Storm Clouds.
Translation:
使者打算進一步挑戰我們的極限。它準備召喚一波規模龐大的離子風暴雲。而我們也必須一如既往，忍耐下來。

<effect>下一波將會出現多團離子風暴雲。

Text: The messenger of the stars vanishes as abruptly as it had arrived. We are left alone, still shaken by the incredible events we’ve just survived. But the gift of Metatron burns deeply inside each and every one of us – the realization of our inner strength and incredible potential.
Translation: 群星的使者突然之間消失了，就像它憑空出現時一樣。我們呆立原地。那些努力撐過的驚人挑戰，依然迴盪在我們心中。不過，梅塔特隆的禮物已經深深地印在了我們每個人心中。它讓我們意識到我們內心的力量，以及我們難以置信的潛力。

Text: The alien megastructure is gone without an explanation for the goal of its mission – no more than it already told us. We are still clueless about the nature of the Cosmos that awaits us beyond the cradle of our solar system. Would it really be that deadly and unwelcoming as the megalith warned? What’s really out there? Probably this was just another devious trick of the artefact and its mysterious creators – to show us the potential for expansion and to plant the seed of curiosity inside of us. One could say that humankind didn’t need any of the challenges and gifts of Metatron, that we were strong and inquisitive enough on our own. But it’s true that now our craving for exploration and expansion has been fueled even more. You have completed Metatron’s challenges! The Mystery is over. Gained a new Technology,
Translation: 那座異型巨像消失了，也沒有向我們解釋它的任務的最終目標 - 只有它告訴過我們的那些話而已。在我們的太陽系搖籃之外，我們依然不知道會有怎樣的宇宙在等著我們。它真的會像那座巨像警告我們的那樣致命，那樣不歡迎外來者嗎？那裡究竟有什麼？ 或許，這僅僅是這座巨像和它神祕的創造者的另一個惡作劇。它讓我們意識到了我們成長的潛力，在我們心裡植入了好奇的種子。有人會說，人類並不需要梅塔特隆的挑戰與禮物，因為我們人類本身已經足夠強大，足夠好奇。這麼說也無可厚非。但在梅塔特隆的推動下，我們探索宇宙與拓展疆域的能力確實得到了進一步提高。 您已經完成了梅塔特隆的挑戰！謎團已結束。 您獲得了新的技術，
這再一次證明了人類的偉大！

Text: We have proven that the human race is worthy of taking its place among the stars! Metatron has disappeared, leaving us with our triumph.
Translation: 我們已經證明，人類有價值在群星之中印下自己的足跡！梅塔特隆消失了，所有人都在歡慶勝利。
梅塔特隆：我們自己的過錯

Text: As the final seconds of Metatron’s ultimatum pass, we’re expecting the sky to come crashing down on us. But nothing like this happens. The alien thing vanishes as abruptly as it had arrived. We’re left alone and undamaged. But deep inside of us we feel broken and humiliated.
Translation: 梅塔特隆最後通牒的幾秒鐘過去之後，我們本以為天都會塌下來。但事實上，什麼都沒發生。那個異型造物突然消失了，正如它憑空出現一樣突兀。我們留在原地，毫髮無傷。但我們內心深處卻感到了難過與屈辱。

Text:
The apocalyptic scenarios we imagined didn’t come to bear. The alien megastructure is gone without condemning our inability to fulfill its tasks. We weren’t vanquished as part of some gigantic disaster, as it would happen with a failed experiment.

But we bear the mark of our failure. We know that we were tried and found wanting. Now, the stars would appear even more distant and somewhat unfriendly. Would our children’s children look at the dark skies and view them with regret and suspicion? Or were we simply given more time to complete the final challenge – to not give up and learn the harsh lesson, emerging stronger in the future?

<effect>You have failed Metatron’s challenges! The Mystery is over.
Translation:
我們想像中的世界末日景象並沒有到來。那座異型巨像消失了，並沒有因為我們沒有完成挑戰而責難我們。我們並沒有在大災變中被毀滅殆盡，也沒有有面對實驗失敗應有的惡果。

但我們被打上了失敗的印記。我們知道，我們接受了它們的試煉，而它們認為我們還不夠資格。如今，群星似乎離我們更加遙遠了，還似乎帶著某種敵意。我們孩子們的孩子們，以後會不會帶著悔恨與懷疑的心情，盯著漆黑的天空？或者說，它們只是給了我們更多時間，讓我們為最後的挑戰做準備？永不放棄，從慘痛的教訓中吸收經驗，以後變得更加強大才是正途？

<effect>您沒有通過梅塔特隆的挑戰！謎團結束了。

Text: We will prove the Universe wrong! We will prevail whatever challenge comes!
Translation: 我們要向這個宇宙證明，它們錯了！無論接下來面對怎樣的挑戰，我們都一定會成功！

Text: Metatron has deemed us unworthy of exploring the stars. The alien megastructure disappeared without causing any harm, apart from hurting our confidence.
Translation: 梅塔特隆認為我們沒有資格探索群雄。異型巨像消失了，我們毫髮無傷，但我們的自信心受到了損害。

Text: Detecting the slight changes in Metatron's energy emissions could allow us to predict incoming Ion Storms.
Translation: 透過檢測梅塔特隆能量釋放模式的微小差異，我們可以對來襲的離子風暴進行預測。

Text: Research project focusing on revealing the secrets of the energy manipulation properties of the mysterious Alien Crystals.
Translation: 研究神祕異型水晶能量操控方面的特性，瞭解異型水晶的祕密。

Text: An attempt to better understand the mysterious wisps, their method of propulsion and behavior- based on gathered observational data.
Translation: 透過搜集觀察資料，分析幽光的驅動與行為模式，進一步瞭解神祕的幽光。

Text: Knowing what drives the wisps our scientists want to design a method of capturing them for further analysis.
Translation: 瞭解幽光的激勵源之後，我們的科學家們打算設計一種可以捕捉它們的裝置，用來進行進一步分析。

Text: Three new mysteries introducing extraterrestrial entities and strange phenomena.
Translation: 三個全新謎團，您將遭遇外星物種與奇異現象。

Old Text: Living Quarter
Old Translation: 宿舍

Old Text: Big Wind Turbine
Old Translation: 大型風力發電機

Old Text: Big Wind Turbines
Old Translation: 大型風力發電機

Text: Generates Power. Increased production during Dust Storms and at high elevations.
Translation: 可以產生電力。在沙塵暴和高海拔地區時，發電量會提高。無法旋轉。
Old Text: Generates Power. Increased production during Dust Storms and at high elevations. Can't be rotated.

Text:
Wind turbines generate electrical power from the Martian winds. The amount generated depends on how powerful the winds they are exposed to are, so proper positioning is essential as higher ground tends to be windier.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

While wind speeds on Mars are generally mild, they can reach incredible speeds during dust storms. Still, the thin Martian atmosphere dictates that the average wind turbine would need winds around six times more powerful than those on Earth to create the same amount of thrust.
 
This technological challenge to take advantage of what little wind there is on Mars was solved by opting for vertical axis wind turbines, which are capable of catching the wind from all directions, instead of simply horizontal.  The materials used are light enough to self-start on much weaker forces than those most commonly used on Earth.
Translation:
風力發電機可以藉助火星風能產生電能，發電量取決於發電機所謂位置的風力。因此，發電機的選址非常重要，因為海拔更高的位置往往風力也會更大。

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000><left>

儘管火星上的風速通常較低，但在沙塵暴期間，風速可以達到令人難以置信的數字。儘管如此，火星的大氣非常稀薄。因此若想與地球上的風力發電機產生同等強度的推力，需要相當於地球六倍以上強度的風力才行。

這種風力發電機沒有採用傳統的水平轉軸，而是採用了豎直轉軸結構，使得發電機可以從各個方向捕捉風力，從而解決了火星上風力過弱的問題。發電機採用了非常輕質的材料，可以在比地球弱得多的風力環境下自行運轉。
可使用金屬製造機械零件。
可使用稀有金屬製造電子元件。

Text: Provides living space. Resting residents recover Comfort faster compared to other Residences.
Translation: 可以提供生活空間。與其它住宅相比，公寓可以讓居民們以更快的速度恢復舒適度。

Text: Distributes hot meals and fresh produce. Consumes Food on each visit.
Translation: 銷售熟食與新鮮農產品。每次造訪時會消耗食物。
Old Text: Distributes hot meals and fresh produce.
Old Translation: 銷售熟食與新鮮農產品。

Text: A place to purchase authentic Martian works of art. Consumes Polymers on each visit.
Translation: 可以在火星上購買藝術品的場所，每次訪問時會消耗聚合物。
Old Text: A place to create and enjoy authentic Martian works of art. Consumes Polymers on each visit.
Old Translation: 可以在火星上製造於享受藝術品的場所，每次訪問時會消耗聚合物。

Text: Provides space for R&R and fancy cocktails.
Translation: 提供各種高檔雞尾酒的場所。

Text: A recreational area with cultivated vegetation.
Translation: 種滿植被的休閒娛樂區。

Text: A collection of 26 buildings and skins - 9 buildings with new sizes and 17 skins of existing buildings.
Translation: 26款建築和面板 - 9種全新尺寸的建築和現有建築的17款面板。

Text: The Deluxe Upgrade Pack of Surviving Mars provides ambitious colonists with a variety of new ways to customize their new homes and domes.
Translation: 火星生存豪華升級包，為雄心勃勃的居民提供了各種新配件，可以自定義他們的新家和穹頂。

Text: Travelling to our Colony.Flight progress: %.Trading for
Translation: 正在前往我方殖民地。飛行進度：%用交換

Text: <red>Rockets can't take off during dust storms.</red>

Translation: 正在解除安裝貿易資源：<resource(amount, res)>

Text: Sent by the Colony of <rival><newline>Will exchange <resource(exp_amount, exp_res)> for <resource(imp_amount, imp_res)>
Translation: 由<rival>殖民地派遣<newline>將用<resource(exp_amount, exp_res)>交換<resource(imp_amount, imp_res)>

Text: Sent by the Colony of <rival><newline>Will exchange <resource(exp_amount, exp_res)> for <resource(imp_amount, imp_res)><newline><newline><red>Rockets can't land during dust storms.</red>
Translation: 由<rival>殖民地派遣<newline>將用<resource(exp_amount, exp_res)>換取<resource(imp_amount, imp_res)><newline><newline><red>沙塵暴期間，火箭無法降落。</red>

Text: No Rival Colony wants to trade
Translation: 無想要交易的對手殖民地

Text: Waiting for import/export resource to be set
Translation: 等待設定進口/出口的資源

Text: An automated flying drone controlled by a Drone Hub, Rocket or RC Commander. Gathers resources, constructs buildings and performs maintenance. Doesn't fly during Dust Storms.
Translation: 由無人機中心、火箭或遙控指揮車控制的全自動飛行無人機。可用來搜集資源，建造或維護建築。沙塵暴期間無法飛行。

Text: Quickly transports resources between Depots and Colonists between Domes.
Translation: 可快速在各倉庫間運輸資源，也可快速在各穹頂之間運輸殖民地居民。

Old Text: <condition_text>[Not available: <sols(cooldown)>]</condition_text> <reply>
Old Translation: <condition_text>[不可用：<sols(cooldown)>]</condition_text><reply>

Text: Remote-controlled vehicle that extracts Metals and Rare Metals from underground deposits. Drilling wastes 50% of the production.
Translation: 能從地下資源點挖掘金屬與稀有金屬的遙控載具。鑽探浪費50%產量。
<red>可用空間不足，無法卸下資源</red>

Text: Give command to Drill an underground deposit for Metals or Rare Metals.

Translation: 此建築物不再需要人員操作，且工作效率始終保持為<upgrade1_add_value_2>。

Text: The remains of an Ark Pod. Can be salvaged for resources.
Translation: 方舟艙的殘骸您可以將其回收，獲得資源。

Old Text: Drop Pod
Old Translation: 空投艙

Text: The remains of a Large Supply Pod. Can be salvaged for resources.
Translation: 大型補給艙的殘骸你可以將其回收，獲得資源。
Old Text: The remains of a Drop Pod. Can be salvaged for resources.
Old Translation: 空投艙的殘骸您可以將其回收，獲得資源。

Text: Foreign aid sent by the <SponsorName> Colony.
Foreign rocket sent by the <SponsorName> Colony.
Another colony sent relief aid in response to our distress call.
Translation: 一座殖民地收到我們的求救訊號送來了救援物資。

Text: Delivers cargo or Colonists to Mars. Commands nearby Drones. Contaminates nearby buildings with dust when landing and taking off. Requires Fuel for the return trip to Earth.
Translation: 可以向火星運輸居民或貨物，也可以控制附近的無人機。它在起飛和降落時，會對附近的建築物造成塵土汙染，而且需要足夠的燃料才能返回地球。

Text: Offers resources for export to other colonies on Mars. Rival colonies will send trade offers only if import and export resources are set. Accessible only for Rockets belonging to other colonies. Nearby buildings and vehicles are protected from dust during landings and takeoffs.
Translation: 提供資源以出口到火星上的其他殖民地。只有在設定好進口和出口資源後，對手殖民地才會發來貿易請求。僅供其他殖民地的火箭使用。火箭起飛和降落期間，保護附近的建築物與載具免受塵土汙染。

Text: "We are proud to have our flag here, on the red planet."
Translation: “在這顆紅色星球上升起旗幟令我們倍感自豪。”

Text: "We are proud to have our flag here, on the red planet."
Translation: “在這顆紅色星球上升起旗幟令我們倍感自豪。”

Text: "We are proud to have our flag here, on the red planet."
Translation: “在這顆紅色星球上升起旗幟令我們倍感自豪。”

Text: "We are proud to have our flag here, on our Asteroid."
Translation: “在這顆小行星上升起旗幟令我們倍感自豪。”

Text: Make the Martian night a little brighter.
Translation: 可以讓火星的夜晚變得略微更加明亮。

Text: People fantasized about pyramids and obelisks on Mars once. Now we build them, just because we can.
Translation: 人們曾幻想火星存在金字塔和方尖碑。現在我們真的把它們造出來了，因為我們就是有這樣的實力。

Text: "We are an impossibility in an impossible universe."
Translation: “在這個殘酷無情的宇宙中，我們的存在本身就是個不可能發生的奇蹟。”

Text: "In honor of the Founders of Mars."

Translation: 開啟時，可以+<upgrade1_mul_value_1>%額外電力產量。

Text: Generates Power. When closed the generator is protected from dust, but produces less Power. Heats the surrounding area when opened.
Translation: 可以產生電力。收起時雖然可以防塵，但產生的電力也會降低。開啟時可為周圍區域供熱。
Old Text: Generates Power. When closed the generator is protected from dust, but produces less Power. Heats the surrounding area when opened. Performance deteriorates over time down to 50%.
Old Translation: 可以產生電力。收起時雖然可以防塵，但產生的電力也會降低。開啟時可為周圍區域供熱。工作效率會隨時間逐漸降低至50%。

Text: +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% Production as long as the building is supplied with Fuel. If not supplied with Fuel, the building will continue to operate but will lose the bonus.
Translation: 在建築配備燃料的情況下，+<upgrade1_mul_value_1>%產量。若未配備燃料，雖然建築會繼續運轉，但不會獲得加成效果。

Old Text: RC Transports Beta
Old Translation: 貝塔型遙控運輸車

Text: Remote-controlled vehicle that extracts Metals and Rare Metals from underground deposits (but not deep deposits). Drilling wastes 50% of the materials in the deposit.
Translation: 能從地下資源點（非深層資源點）挖掘金屬與稀有金屬的遙控載具。鑽探浪費資源點50%的材料。

Old Text: RC Transports Alpha
Old Translation: 阿爾法型遙控運輸車

Old Text: Curiosity Explorers
Old Translation: 好奇號探索者

Old Text: RC Commanders Tau
Old Translation: 陶型遙控指揮車

Text: Remote-controlled vehicle that transports, controls and repairs Drones. Acts as a Sensor Tower while idle.
Translation: 遙控載具，可以用來運輸、操控和修理無人機。閒置時可視為一座感應塔。

Text: Remote-controlled vehicle that transports, controls and repairs Drones. During the day it can gather Power via its solar panels to act as a power producer if connected to a network.
Translation: 遙控載具，可以用來運輸、操控和修理無人機。白天時可用太陽能板產生電力。如果與電網相連，則可為其他設施提供電力。

Text: Remote-controlled vehicle that harvests Concrete from deposits, gathers resources from surface deposits and transports resources.
Translation: 此遙控載具能從資源點收穫混凝土，也能從地表資源點搜集資源以及運輸資源。

Old Text: RC Transport Alpha
Old Translation: 阿爾法型遙控運輸車

Text: Remote-controlled vehicle that extracts Metals and Rare Metals from underground deposits (but not deep deposits). Drilling wastes 50% of the materials in the deposit.
Translation: 能從地下資源點（非深層資源點）挖掘金屬與稀有金屬的遙控載具。鑽探浪費資源點50%的材料。

Text: An automated flying drone controlled by a Drone Hub, Rocket or RC Commander. Gathers resources, constructs buildings and performs maintenance. Doesn't fly during Dust Storms.
Translation: 由無人機中心、火箭或遙控指揮車控制的全自動飛行無人機。可用來搜集資源，建造或維護建築。沙塵暴期間無法飛行。

Text: Reveals deposits in the scanned area.
Translation: 可以顯示掃描區域內是否含有資源點。

Text: Immediately scans a Sector and the four adjacent Sectors for deposits and anomalies.
Translation: 立刻掃描一塊區域和與其鄰近的四塊區域，以發現資源點和異象。
Old Text: Reveals deposits in five adjacent sectors.
Old Translation: 可顯示五個鄰近區域內的資源點。

Text: Generates Power. Heats the surrounding area when opened.
Translation: 可以產生電力。開啟時可為周圍區域供熱。
Old Text: Generates Power. Heats the surrounding area when opend.
Old Translation: 可以產生電力。開啟時可為周圍區域供熱。

Text: Houses and refuels Shuttles that facilitate long-range resource transportation between Depots and resettling of Colonists between Domes.
Translation: 所有穿梭機都可以在此處停靠、補充燃料，用來進行倉庫之間遠距離資源運輸任務，以及穹頂間居民再分配的任務。

Text: A place to meditate and seek meaning beyond the physical world. Visitors recover Sanity.
Translation: 人們可以在這裡冥想並探求超然於有型世界之外的意義。訪客可恢復理智度。

Text: An advanced solar array that generates Power during daytime. Does not produce Power during Dust Storms. Requires less maintenance than regular Solar Panels, but can't be closed.
Translation: 可在白天產生電力的高階太陽能板陣列。在沙塵暴期間不產生電力。需要維護的頻率低於普通太陽能板，但無法關閉。

Text: A fully automated facility that extracts Metals from underground deposits without the need for Colonist workers.<newline><newline>All extractors contaminate nearby buildings with dust.
Translation: 不需要殖民地居民操作就能從地下資源點挖掘金屬的全自動設施。<newline><newline>所有的挖掘站都會對周圍建築造成塵土汙染。

Text: Produces Concrete and does not require a deposit. Consumes Fuel. All extractors contaminate nearby buildings with dust.
Translation: 不需要資源點就能生產混凝土。消耗燃料。所有的挖掘站都會對周圍建築造成塵土汙染。

Text: Generates funding. Working in a corporate environment can be soul-sucking so all workers take Comfort penalties.
Translation: 產生資金。在企業環境下工作會讓人心力交瘁，因此所有工人都會承受舒適度減益。

Text: Works on awesome new titles that gamers on Earth and Mars can enjoy. Released titles grant Funding, but profits tend to be unpredictable.
Translation: 為地球和火星居民開發高大上的新遊戲。發售遊戲可獲得資金，但利潤往往無法預測。

Text: Slowly processes Waste Rock into useful construction materials. Produces small amounts of Metals.
Translation: 慢慢將礦渣處理成有用的建築材料。生產少量金屬

Text: Slowly processes Waste Rock, filtering for precious elements. Produces small amounts of Rare Metals.
Translation: 慢慢對礦渣進行篩選處理，產出稀有元素。生產少量稀有金屬。

Text: An outside research building dedicated to experimental research in a Low-G environment. The first operational lab provides a permanent tech cost reduction to Physics and Biotech research fields.
Translation: 專門在低重力環境下進行實驗研究的穹頂外科研建築。第一座正常運轉的實驗室永久降低物理學和生物技術研究領域的技術花費。

Text: Money can't buy everything, but it can buy a lot! Colonists can satisfy all their interests here, except medical checks. The service quality is lower than in the more specialized service buildings.
Translation: 金錢買不到一切，但能買到的東西也不少！這裡能滿足殖民地居民的一切興趣，醫療檢查除外。服務品質低於更為專門的服務建築

Text: The health benefits of martial arts are unquestionable. Visitors recover Health and may become Fit.
Translation: 毋庸置疑，習武有益身心健康。恢復生命值的訪客可能會變得健壯。
為火箭補充燃料並發射火箭

Text: Have a complex of 3 connected Domes and population of 50 Colonists
Translation: 擁有3座相連的穹頂以及50位殖民地居民
耗盡10處地下金屬資源點
擁有8座完全佔滿的生態建築

已建造自動化金屬挖掘站

Text:
Supply Pods are an alternative way to bring cargo from Earth to Mars. They arrive faster than Rockets, are single use each and may be salvaged once they crash-land at a chosen location. Supply Pods can bring less cargo than a Rocket can as well as just a single Rover.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

Landing pods are especially useful during the fledgling phase of the colony because of their relatively low price and short arrival time.
Translation:
補給艙是把貨物從地球運到火星的另一種途徑。它們到達速度比火箭快，每個補給艙只能使用一次。在指定地點迫降後可以被回收。補給艙可裝載的貨物比火箭少，也只能運送一輛探測車。

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000><left>

在殖民地發展初期，補給艙因其低廉的價格和較短的到達時間而特別實用。

Text:
The Japanese Wasp Drones are the workhorse of the Colony. They are tasked with distributing resources, gathering resources from surface deposits, as well as building, maintaining and repairing structures. Their unique trait is that they can fly over obstacles and thus complete their goals regardless of the treacherous Martian terrain.

Wasp Drones would complete most of their tasks autonomously, but only so in the service range of a Drone Controller - either a Drone Hub, a Rocket or RC Commander.

Wasp Drones run on batteries and need to charge up frequently. RC Commanders and Recharge Stations, including the ones that come with the Drone Hub, provide the much needed battery power.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

Wasp Drones are agile, yet powerful semi-autonomous robots. Their versatility comes not only from their vast assortment of work tools, but also from their ability to float and quickly traverse over terrain features otherwise inaccessible by other ground-based vehicles.
Translation:
日本黃蜂無人機是殖民地的勞動力。它們負責分配資源以及從地表資源點搜集資源，還能建造、維護和修復建築。飛行是它們的獨特能力，這意味著它們能無視火星的險惡地形完成任務。

黃蜂無人機能自動完成大多數任務，但期間必須處於無人機控制器（無人機中心、火箭或遙控指揮車）的服務範圍內。

黃蜂無人機靠電池運轉，需要經常充電。遙控指揮車和充電站（包括無人機中心自帶的充電站）都能為它們的電池充電。

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000><left>

黃蜂無人機是機動靈活而功能強大的半自主機器人。它們擁有多種多樣的作業工具，還能無視地形快速到達其他地面載具到不了的區域，因此擁有很強的泛用性。

Text:
The RC Constructor is a remote-controlled vehicle equipped with a cargo hold that can pick up and carry resources from and to various storage units across the surface of Mars. It can set up transport routes and maintain the flow of resources between two points of the map. Another function of the RC Constructor is to gather resources from surface deposits of Metals and Polymers.

The unique feature of the RC Constructor is the ability to construct buildings on its own without the assistance of Drones. It utilizes the resources it carries on board, and it the required amount of resource blocks is delivered to the construction site, it can autonomously finish the building process.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

The agenda of the Indian Colonization Program was to win the space race by doing what they do best – building their own path to victory. The RC Constructor was especially designed with that purpose in mind, to allow the resourceful Commander to quickly develop the growing Colony, setting up robust facilities and freeing valuable drone time.
Translation:
遙控建造車是一種裝有貨艙的遙控載具，能從火星表面的各種儲存單元裝載資源並運到其他儲存單元。它能設定運輸路線並在地圖的兩點之間維持資源流動。遙控建造車的另一項功能是從地表資源點搜集金屬和聚合物。

遙控建造車特有的功能是在沒有無人機協助的情況下建造建築物。它使用自身攜帶的資源以及送到施工地點的所需資源塊自主完成建造工作。

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000><left>

大搞建設是印度殖民計劃的拿手好戲，他們也打算用這種方式在太空競賽中取勝。出於這個目的，他們設計了遙控建造車，以便足智多謀的指揮官迅速發展正在壯大的殖民地，建造堅固的設施並節約寶貴的無人機時間。

Old Text: RC Transport Beta
Old Translation: 貝塔型遙控運輸車

Text:
The RC Driller is a unique remote-controlled vehicle developed by the Russian Colonization Program. When ordered to exploit an underground Metals or Rare Metals deposit, it deploys its in-built driller probe and starts extracting the valuable resources from deep below.

While doing so it wastes 50% of the production, but on the other hand it grants access to otherwise hard to get resources without the need of operational Dome and the presence of Colonists nearby. The normal logic for accessing an underground deposit applies – the relevant technology would be required to access Deep Deposits.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

The Russian technology had proven reliable and robust, developed around one simple purpose – get the job done. The RC Driller makes no difference, and while it has some flaws, it provides an invaluable option to the ambitious Commander – the ability to rely less on the topography of the Red Planet and the presence of surface Metals deposits.
Translation:
遙控鑽探車是俄羅斯殖民計劃開發的獨特遙控載具。當它接收到從地下金屬或稀有金屬資源點開採資源的指令時，就會部署它的內建鑽探器並開始挖掘地下深處的寶貴資源。

挖掘時會浪費50%的產量，但另一方面，它能在周圍沒有正常運轉的穹頂以及沒有殖民地居民的情況下開採到難以獲取的資源。一般情況下開採地下資源時的操作規則對它也適用。若想開採深層資源點，則需要研究相關技術。

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000><left>

事實證明俄羅斯的技術裝置可靠又耐用，其開發理念簡單明確且只有一條：能完成任務。遙控鑽探車也是如此。儘管有缺陷，但它讓有野心的指揮官多了一種極其寶貴的選擇，讓他們可以不再那麼依賴火星測繪學以及地表金屬資源點。

Text:
RC Harvester is a remote-controlled vehicle tasked with a cargo hold which can pick up and carry resources from and to various storage units across the surface of Mars. It can set up transport routes and maintain the flow of resources between two points of the map. Another function of the RC Harvester is to gather resources from surface deposits of Metals and Polymers.

The unique feature of RC Harvester is the ability to extract Concrete from Concrete Deposits. Ordering the vehicle to the deposit allows it to start sifting through the deposit area, slowly moving and gathering Concrete into its cargo hold. It would stop doing so once its cargo hold has been filled.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

Blue Sun Corporation have a singular purpose in mind when they set on colonizing Mars – get rich fast. To the top brass of the Corporation building an expensive and hard to maintain Concrete Extractors early on would slow down the development of profitable mining operation and would pose a risk of losing the space race to another Mission. The stakes were too high and the RC Harvester was quickly pushed through test sequences and added to the arsenal of the determined Commander.
Translation:
遙控收穫車是一種裝有貨艙的遙控載具，能從火星表面的各種儲存單元裝載資源並運到其他儲存單元。它能設定運輸路線並在地圖的兩點之間維持資源流動。遙控收穫車另一項功能是從地表資源點搜集金屬和聚合物。

遙控收穫車特有的功能是從混凝土資源點挖掘混凝土。命令該載具前往資源點就能讓它在資源點區域開始篩選，一邊慢慢移動一邊將混凝土搜集進貨艙中。貨艙裝滿時，它將停止搜集。

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000><left>

蒼日公司決定在火星上殖民時只有一個目的：迅速致富。公司高層認為在初期建造昂貴又難以維護的混凝土挖掘站會拖慢利潤豐厚的採礦作業的發展，進而使他們有在太空競賽中敗給其他代表團的風險。事關重大，於是他們優先完成了對遙控收穫車的測試，並將其交給了決心取勝的指揮官。

Old Text: RC Transport Alpha
Old Translation: 阿爾法型遙控運輸車

Text:
The RC Generator is a remote-controlled vehicle which can transport and deploy Drones to remote areas if needed. It can also repair any damaged Drones and return them to operational state.

RC Generator is equipped with its own energy source in the form of Solar Panel which, during the day, accumulates Power. If the vehicle is positioned near a power cable, it can act as a Solar Panel, giving its energy production to the given network.

RC Generator is powered by a Solar Panel, installed on the top of its hull. The power produced by this system is enough to charge the capacitors of the rover and can even render this power to a power network if it is placed near a power cable. Just like a regular Solar Panel, the RC Generator would produce power only during the day.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

The ambition of the PRC to colonize Mars and absorb its vast riches into its fold required new instruments. Enter the RC Generator. The robust vehicle was designed with a singular purpose in mind – to provide the life-blood of a quickly growing colony. Its autonomous power capabilities allow it to power large amounts of Drones and quickly create remote, self-sufficient resource operations. The perfect tool for the ambitious Commander, this unique vehicle will allow China to make another Great Leap Forward.
Translation:
遙控發電車是一種遙控載具，可以在必要時將無人機運送部署到偏遠地區。它還能修復受損的無人機，使其恢復運轉。

遙控發電車裝備有太陽能板，能在白天積聚電力。如果載具位於電纜附近，則可當成太陽能板使用，用自身產出的能量為電網供電。

遙控發電車的頂部安裝有為其供電的太陽能板。此系統產生的電力足夠給探測車的電容器充電。它處於電纜附近時，甚至還能將此電力提供給電網。遙控發電車和常規太陽能板一樣，只在白天產生電力。

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000><left>

雄心勃勃的中國想要在火星上殖民，並將其豐富的資源佔為己有。為了實現這一目標，中國需要新式裝備。於是遙控發電車應運而生。這種堅固的載具設計目的只有一個：為快速發展的殖民地提供急需的電力。它能依靠其自主發電的能力為大量無人機充電，並迅速在偏遠地區開展自給自足的資源開採作業。這種獨特的載具是有雄心的指揮官的理想工具，它將幫助中國再一次實現飛躍。

Old Text: RC Commander Tau
Old Translation: 陶型遙控指揮車

Text:
RC Seeker is a remote-controlled vehicle which can transport and deploy Drones to remote areas if needed. It can also repair any damaged Drones and return them to operational state.

RC Seeker is equipped with a sensor array which is deployed when the vehicle isn't moving. This equipment acts as a Sensor Tower and significantly speeds up the scanning process of nearby sectors of the map and in prediction of incoming disasters.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

Mars is full of curiosities and wonders, veiled only by the humans’ inability to notice and understand them. The leaders of the European Space Program firmly believe that the key to making the Red Planet our second home is not in fighting it, but rather understand it and adapt to it. This was the reason they made exploration a paramount. The RC Seeker allows the craft Commander to quickly discover the best places for future expansion and delve into the mysterious scientific discoveries that lie hidden on the surface of the lifeless planet.
Translation:
遙控探尋車是一種遙控載具，可以在必要時將無人機運送部署到偏遠地區。它還能修復受損的無人機，使其恢復運轉。

遙控探尋車裝備有感應器陣列，可在載具靜止不動時部署。此裝備可當成感應塔使用並大幅提升附近地圖區域的掃描速度，還能預報即將到來的災害。

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000><left>

火星到處是令人驚歎的奇景，發現它們的唯一障礙是人類觀察和理解能力的不足。歐洲太空計劃的領袖們相信將火星變為我們第二家園的關鍵並非與之對抗，而是理解並適應它。因此他們將探索視為重中之重。機智的指揮官可以用遙控探尋車快速發現未來擴張的最佳地點，並深入研究埋藏在這顆無生命星球地表下的神祕科學發現。

Old Text: RC Commander Omega
Old Translation: 歐米茄型遙控指揮車

Text:
Jumper Shuttles follow a fast parabolic course over the terrain, traversing great distances in mere moments. They pick up and deliver resources and Colonists around the surface of Mars, wherever needed. When not in use, they are stationed at Jumper Shuttle Hubs, where they are maintained and refueled.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

Jumper Shuttles were proven a great advancement for the newly sprouting colonies on Mars, but they became a great hit when the marketing team at Paradox Interactive put on a series of web videos from the cameras in the passenger cockpits with the descriptive name “Colonists React to Jumper Shuttles”.
Translation:
跳躍穿梭機能以拋物線的行進軌跡迅速越過地形，頃刻間便能前進很遠的距離。它們能在火星表面將資源與殖民地居民運送到任意指定地點。閒置時，跳躍穿梭機會停駐在穿梭機中心進行維護與加油。

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000><left>

事實證明跳躍穿梭機在很大程度上推動了殖民地初期的發展，而Paradox Interactive的營銷團隊將乘客座艙內攝影機拍攝到的一系列影片冠以《乘坐跳躍穿梭機是種怎樣的體驗》的標題釋出在網上後，這種穿梭機迅速走紅。

Text: Research per Sol: Rare Metals price: $ M - Zeus Rocket - increased rocket payload ( kg) - Advanced Stirling Generator - generates power and can protect from Cold Waves - Colonists never get Earthsick - Food supply from Passenger Rockets increased (x10) - Rockets synthesize Fuel - Start with a Self-Sufficient Dome prefab
Translation: 每太陽日研究點數： 稀有金屬價格：$M - 宙斯火箭 - 火箭載重量提升（公斤） - 高階斯特靈發電機 - 產生電力且可抵禦寒流 - 殖民地居民永遠不會得思鄉病。 - 客運火箭提供更多食物（x10） - 火箭會自動合成燃料 開局就擁有一個自給自足的穹頂預製件
此模式適合首次遊玩的玩家

Text: Research per Sol: Rare Metals price: $ M - Zeus Rocket - increased rocket payload ( kg) - Advanced Orbital Probe - scans five sectors - Megamall - service building that satisfies most interests - Periodic additional funding
Translation: 每太陽日研究點數： 稀有金屬價格： $ M - 宙斯火箭 - 火箭載重量提升（公斤） - 高階軌道探測器 - 掃描5塊區域 - 超級購物中心 - 滿足大多數興趣的服務建築 - 定期提供額外資金

Text: Research per Sol: Rare Metals price: $ M - RC Harvester - transporter rover that can harvest concrete from regolith deposits - Corporate Office - employs workers and generates funding - Can buy Applicants with funding - Additional Rockets are significantly cheaper - Probes can discover deep Rare Metal deposits - Bonus Tech: Deep Metal Extraction (can extract deep metals and deep rare metals deposits)
Translation: 每太陽日研究點數： 稀有金屬價格： $ M - 遙控收穫車 - 可從風化層資源點收穫混凝土的運輸探測車 - 企業辦公樓 - 僱傭工人並產生資金 - 可用資金購買應徵者 - 額外火箭的價格非常便宜 - 探測器可以發現深層稀有金屬資源點 - 加成技術：深層金屬挖掘（能採集深層金屬與稀有金屬資源點）

Text: Research per Sol: Rare Metals price: $ M - RC Generator - RC Commander that can generate power as a solar panel - Tai-chi Garden - small exercising garden, visitors recover small amounts of Health and may become Fit - Passenger Rockets carry 10 additional Colonists - Applicants are generated twice as fast
Translation: 每太陽日研究點數： 稀有金屬價格： $ M - 遙控發電車- 能像太陽能板一樣產生電力 - 太極園 - 小型鍛鍊園地，訪客可恢復少量生命值並變得健壯 - 客運火箭可以搭載10名額外的殖民地居民 - 應徵者產生速度加倍

Text: Research per Sol: Rare Metals price: $ M - RC Constructor - transporter rover that can construct buildings - Metals Refinery - slowly converts Waste Rock into Metals - All building costs reduced by 20% - Bonus Tech: Low-G Engineering (unlocks Medium Dome)
Translation: 每太陽日研究點數： 稀有金屬價格： $ M - 遙控建造車 - 能建造建築物的運輸探測車 - 金屬精煉廠 - 能將礦渣慢慢轉化為金屬 - 所有建築的建造成本降低20% - 加成技術：低重力工程學（解鎖中型穹頂）

Text: Research per Sol: Rare Metals price: $ M - RC Seeker - RC Commander that works as a sensor tower when stationary - Low-G Lab - a research building that is built outside domes and reduces the cost of Biotech and Physics techs - 5 extra starting technologies - Gain Funding every time a tech is researched. Gain double if it's a Breakthrough tech
Translation: 每太陽日研究點數： 稀有金屬價格： $ M - 遙控探尋車 - 此遙控指揮車靜止不動時可當成感應塔使用 - 低重力實驗室 - 建造於穹頂外的科研建築，可降低生物技術和物理學技術的花費 - 遊戲開始時擁有5項額外技術 - 每研發一項技術，都能獲得額外資金。如果是突破性技術，可獲得雙倍額外資金。

Text: Research per Sol: Rare Metals price: $ M - Dragon Rocket - has smaller cargo capacity () but is faster and requires less fuel - Solar Array - a large cluster of solar panels that have lower maintenance cost but are vulnerable to dust storms - Drone Hubs start with additional Drones - 50% cheaper advanced resources
Translation: 每太陽日研究點數： 稀有金屬價格： $ M - 飛龍火箭 - 載貨容量較小（）但速度更快，需要燃料也更少 - 太陽能板陣列 - 大型太陽能板叢集，維護花費較低，但無法抵禦沙塵暴 - 無人機中心一開始就擁有額外的無人機 - 高階資源價格降低50%

Text: Research per Sol: Rare Metals price: $ M - Large Supply Pod - special supply pod that can carry more cargo - Rare Metals Refinery - turns waste rock into rare metals - Colonists grant funding when they arrive on Mars - Passages cost no resources and are constructed instantly - Colonists suffer no penalties when using passages to work or visit connected domes - 5 free Large Supply Pods
Translation: 每太陽日研究點數： 稀有金屬價格：$M - 大型補給艙 - 能攜帶更多貨物的特殊補給艙 - 稀有金屬精煉廠 - 將礦渣變為稀有金屬 - 殖民地居民到達火星時提供資金 - 通道不需要資源，且瞬間建造完成 - 殖民地居民使用通道前往連接的穹頂拜訪或工作時不會獲得減益。 - 5個免費大型補給艙

Text: Research per Sol: Rare Metals price: $ M - Ark Pod - a supply pod that can carry passengers - Temple Spire - a service spire that satisfies Social interests and restores Sanity to visitors - All Colonists have the Religious trait - Birthrate is doubled - Hydroponic Farms performance reduced by 50 (drawback)
Translation: 每太陽日研究點數： 稀有金屬價格： $ M - 方舟艙 - 能運載乘客的補給艙 - 神殿尖塔 - 滿足訪客社交興趣並為其恢復理智度的服務尖塔 - 所有殖民地居民都擁有信仰者特性 - 生育率翻倍 - 水耕農場的工作效率降低50（劣勢）

Text: Research per Sol: Rare Metals price: $ M - RC Driller - a special rover that can extract resources from underground deposits but wastes some of the deposit - Concrete Plant - an automated extractor that produces concrete without the need of a deposit but consumes fuel - Bonus Tech: Fueled Extractors (extractor upgrade that boosts production but consumes Fuel) - Fueled Extractors upgrade is free - Fuel Refinery prefab costs less - Rockets have extended travel time (drawback)
Translation: 每太陽日研究點數： 稀有金屬價格： $ M - 遙控鑽探車 - 能從地下資源點開採資源的特殊探測車，不過會浪費部分資源。 - 混凝土工廠 - 不需要資源點就能生產混凝土的自動化挖掘站，但消耗燃料。 - 加成技術：燃料式挖掘站 （可升級挖掘站，使其透過消耗燃料的方式提高產量） - 燃料式挖掘站免費升級 - 燃料精煉廠預製件價格更低 - 火箭往返時間更長（劣勢）

Text: Research per Sol: Rare Metals price: $ M - Jumper Shuttle - faster shuttles that use parabolic trajectories - Game Developer - produces games which grant funding depending on their success - Discover more Breakthrough Anomalies - Researching a Breakthrough Tech grants Applicants - Rockets require more fuel to launch (drawback)
Translation: 每太陽日研究點數： 稀有金屬價格： $ M - 跳躍穿梭機 - 行進軌跡為拋物線的高速穿梭機 - 遊戲開發大樓 - 製作遊戲，根據遊戲的成功程度獲得資金 - 可發現更多突破性異象 - 研發突破性技術可獲得應徵者 - 火箭需要更多燃料才能發射 （劣勢）

Text: Research per Sol: Rare Metals price: $ M - Wasp Drone - faster, flying drone - Automatic Metals Extractor - a Metal Extractor that doesn't require workforce - Rovers - cost and weight lowered by 50% - Exploring a sector grants research points - All specialists perform better (+10 performance) - Applicant generation reduced (drawback)
Translation: 每太陽日研究點數： 稀有金屬價格：$M - 黃蜂無人機 - 速度更快的飛行無人機 - 自動金屬挖掘站 - 不需要勞動力的金屬挖掘站 - 探測車重量和價格降低50% - 探索區域可獲得研究點數 - 所有專家工作效率提高（+10工作效率） - 應徵者產生數量減少 （劣勢）

Text: To use a Covert Operation against another colony you will need a fully fuelled Rocket and a crew of Security Officers.<newline><newline>All Covert Ops will lower your Standing with the target colony and have a chance to fail.
Translation: 你需要一枚裝滿燃料的火箭和一隊警官才能向其他殖民地發起祕密行動。<newline><newline>一切祕密行動都會降低你在目標殖民地的聲望，並有一定機率失敗。

Old Text: Steal Drones
Old Translation: 竊取無人機

Text: Japan's Drone technology is not compatible with ours.
Translation: 日本的無人機技術與我們的不相容。

Text: Our Drone technology is not compatible with theirs.
Translation: 我們的無人機技術與他們的不相容。

Old Text: Steal tech
Old Translation: 竊取技術

Old Text: Recruit Colonists
Old Translation: 招募殖民地居民

Text: Sabotage buildings to delay milestone and Expedition progress<RiskTextSabotage>
Old Text: Sabotage buildings
Old Translation: 破壞建築

Text: sets back the target, cancels milestone and Expedition progress
Translation: 令目標受挫，取消里程碑和探險隊進度

Text: Attempt to recruit Colonists without Flaws from the rival Colony.
Translation: 試圖從對手殖民地招募沒有缺陷的殖民地居民。

Old Text: get many non-specialists
Old Translation: 獲得大量非專家

Old Text: get few specialists
Old Translation: 獲得少量專家

Translation: 獲得一名傑出的殖民地居民
Old Text: get one exceptional Colonist
Old Translation: 獲得一名傑出的殖民地居民

Text: But of course! Sending some resources won't put too much weight on our economy.
Translation: 當然可以！送去一些資源也不會給我們的經濟帶來太大壓力。

Text: Say no more, my friend! We shall immediately provide the help you requested. No effort is too big for an old friend, isn't it?
Translation: 不必多說了，朋友！我們立刻給你提供援助。為了朋友，我兩肋插刀，在所不辭。

Text: I see – there is an issue you can't handle by yourself. Very well then, we'll send some help.
Translation: 明白了，你遇到了自己無法解決的問題。那好吧，我們願意提供援助。

Text: A Commander with your skills may yet have some trouble from time to time. That's understandable and we'll send help.
Translation: 你這樣高明的指揮官有時候也會遇到難題。這是可以理解的，我們願意提供援助。

Text: Seriously? How can you believe we would help you, after everything you've done?!
Translation: 你是說笑的吧？你幹了那麼多“好事”，現在還指望我們會幫你嗎？

Text: Hah! I knew you'd come to me crying, but you must be a fool to expect we'd help you.
Translation: 哈！我就知道你會哭哭啼啼地來求我，但要是你以為我們會幫你，你就蠢到家了。

Text: Oh, you're in trouble now? Deal with it, happy tree friend.
Translation: 哦，現在你遇到麻煩啦？自己解決吧，表面兄弟。

Text: Ha-ha! Let you fall and we be taking over. All your base are belong to us!
Translation: 哈哈！等你完蛋後就是我們說了算了。你的基地屬於我們了！

Text: I'm sorry, we can't really help you at this time. Please consider asking someone else.
Translation: 抱歉，目前我們無法援助你。你可以考慮問問別人。

Text: I understand your predicament, but we can't afford to send help at this time.
Translation: 我理解你身處的困境，但我們目前沒有餘力援助你。

Text: Good day, Commander. Please make it short, comm time is precious.
Translation: 祝你愉快，指揮官。請長話短說，通訊時間很寶貴。

Text: Let me explain this to you once. If I ever kill you, you'll be awake, you'll be facing me, and you'll be armed.
Translation: 我把話和你說清楚吧。如果我要殺你，我會在你清醒且全副武裝時堂堂正正地動手。

Text: Oh, it's you. If this is the future, I'd like to live in the past.
Translation: 哦，是你啊。如果這就是未來，那我寧願活在過去。

Text: Seek redemption, poor stray soul, and your sins may be forgiven.
Translation: 尋求救贖吧，迷途的可憐靈魂，那樣的話你的罪過或許能得到寬恕。

Text: What now, you need some help to fill your tax returns or what?
Translation: 又怎麼了，你要我幫你填納稅申報單還是什麼？

Text: They say in a democracy one must respect the choice of the people, even though they may be ignorant and misguided. And – here you are!
Translation: 都說在民主國家裡，儘管人民或許懵懂無知並被誤導，但你還是必須尊重人民的選擇。於是你變成了這樣！

Text: Know what, my droog? A Russian babushka would make a better Commander than you.
Translation: 你知道嗎，小夥計？俄羅斯老奶奶當指揮官都比你厲害。

Text: Hi, Commander. You probably have quite a lot of fuel. I think we should bring you some freedom and democracy!
Translation: 你好，指揮官。你的燃料大概多的用不完。我認為我們應該送你一些自由與民主！

Text: Greetings, friend! How can we help you?
Translation: 你好，朋友！需要我們如何效勞？

Text: Hello dear! Happy to see you. If we can help in any way, just name it!
Translation: 你好，親愛的！很高興見到你。有什麼要求儘管開口！

Text: Good morning, Commander! I hope I find you in good health. How can we help?
Translation: 早上好，指揮官！祝你身體健康。需要我們如何效勞？

Text: Oh, it's you, my friend! I'm glad to see you on screen. How is everything going?
Translation: 是你啊，朋友！很高興在螢幕上看到你。近況如何啊？

Text: I used to be an astrogeologist like you, but then I took an asteroid in the sensor tower.
Translation: 我以前和你一樣也是個天文地質學家，直到我的感應塔中了一顆小行星。

Text: Ni hao, comrade, let's go party... There's no party like our party!
Translation: 你好，夥伴，我們去開派對吧……我們的派對獨一無二！

Text: Hello, Commander! I see you're player too!
Translation: 你好，指揮官！看來你也是個玩家啊！

Text: Good morning, Commander! You know, I had a weird dream again last night... Do you think it may be related to a childhood trauma?
Translation: 早上好，指揮官！我知道，我昨晚做了個詭異的夢……你覺得這會不會和童年創傷有關呢？

Text: Hello, Commander. Which one is harder – running a colony or rocket science? You seem to have talent for both.
Translation: 你好，指揮官。經營殖民地與火箭科學哪個更難？你似乎在這兩方面都很有才華。

Text: Ah, it's you. What trouble are you brewing this time?
Translation: 是你啊。這次你又在打算惹出什麼麻煩了？

Text: You are a poor excuse of a Commander. How come you're still in power?!
Translation: 你是一名不合格的指揮官。你怎麼還沒被趕下臺？

Text: Oh, it's you, Commander. I heard you were a City Mayor back on Earth. I often wonder – have they sent you to space in order to save their city, or what?
Translation: 哦，是你啊，指揮官。聽說你在地球上當過市長。我經常尋思，他們派你上太空是為了拯救他們的城市還是什麼？

Text: Commander. Does your colony flourish already, or you need to hug a few more trees?
Translation: 指揮官。你的殖民地已經欣欣向榮了嗎？還是說你需要再釋放一下壓力？

Text: Greetings. Listen carefully, for our words are backed with NUCLEAR WEAPONS!
Translation: 你好。乖乖聽好我們說的每個字，否則核彈伺候！

Text: Begone, heretic, and do not tempt my anger!
Translation: 快滾吧，異教徒。別惹我發怒！

Text: Greetings, Commander. What assistance do you need?
Translation: 你好，指揮官。需要什麼幫助嗎？

Text: Good day, Commander. How is your colony holding up?
Translation: 你好，指揮官。你的殖民地狀況還好嗎？

Text: Oh, it's you. If this is the future, I'd like to live in the past.
Translation: 哦，是你啊。如果這就是未來，那我寧願活在過去。

Text: Hello, is this planet Earth? Oh, it's you, Commander.
Translation: 你好，這裡是地球嗎？哦，是你啊，指揮官。

Text: Greetings, Commander. Oh, one of those disturbing drones of yours is behind your back, watching me as if it tracks my every move. Can you put it away, please?
Translation: 你好，指揮官。哦，你身後有個令人不安的無人機，它似乎在監視著我的一舉一動。請問能否把它收起來呢？

Text: Hello, Commander. How are things going in your colony? Do you want us to sell you not-a-flamethrower already?
Translation: 你好，指揮官。你殖民地狀況如何？你是否想從我們這裡買個非噴火器呢？

Text: Thank you! We really appreciate the help.
Translation: 謝謝你！真的很感謝你出手相助。

Text: Thank you! We'll put your gift to good use!
Translation: 謝謝你！我們會好好利用你的禮物！

Text: Well, maybe you're not as bad as I thought.
Translation: 嗯，看來你並沒有我以為的那麼差勁。

Text: We appreciate your intents, but we don't need your help.
Translation: 謝謝你的好意，但我們不需要你的幫助。

Text: I am grateful for your proposal, but maybe not this time. After all, our colony provides everything we need.
Translation: 謝謝你的提議，但還是下次吧。畢竟，我們殖民地能自給自足。

Text: I see through your motives. Keep your presents to yourself.\n\nTimeo Danaos et dona ferentes...
Translation: 我看穿了你的意圖。禮物你自己收著吧。\n\n黃鼠狼給雞拜年，沒安好心……

Text: Yes, I believe our colonies will benefit from trading as long as you find our terms satisfactory.
Translation: 嗯，只要你對我們的條件感到滿意，我們雙方的殖民地就能從貿易中獲益。
Old Text: Yes, I believe our colonies will benefit from trading.
Old Translation: 好的，我相信我們雙方的殖民地能透過貿易實現互利共贏。

Text: We appreciate your offer, but we have no interest in trading right now.
Translation: 感謝你的提議，但我們目前對貿易不感興趣。

Text: In the light of recent events, I don't believe we have mutual interest in trading.
Translation: 考慮到最近發生的事，我認為貿易並不符合我們雙方的共同利益。
你空洞的威脅對我們不起作用。

Text: You, filthy by-product of a fungal farm! I wouldn't visit your stinkin' colony even wearing a space suit!
Translation: 你這個真菌農場裡髒兮兮的副產品！我穿著太空服都不願訪問你臭烘烘的殖民地！

Text: You, drone-brained produce of a faulty assembler, why don't you go bother someone of your own IQ?!
Translation: 你這個無人機一樣的傻子，就這點智商還敢來和我打交道？！

Text: Have you been hit by a wind turbine on the head, or there just isn't enough Oxygen production in your colony?!
Translation: 你腦袋被風力發電機撞了嗎，還是你殖民地的氧氣不足？

Text: What is wrong with you?! What have we done to deserve this?
Translation: 你什麼毛病？！憑什麼這麼對我們？

Text: How dare you? Mind your language, or I'll make you regret this.
Translation: 你好大的膽子！注意你的言辭，不然就讓你後悔。

Text: Can you also spare some shuttles?
Translation: 你能再給我們一些穿梭機嗎？

Text: -25 Standing, aid Rocket is on the way, get 2 Shuttle Hub prefabs
Translation: -25聲望，援助火箭正在趕來，獲得2個穿梭機中心預製件

Text: -20 Standing, aid Rocket is on the way

Translation: 我換個說法表達我的請求……

Old Text: They do not have enough
Old Translation: 他們的資源不足

Old Text: Offer help
Old Translation: 提供幫助

Text: send resources with a Rocket, gain Standing
Translation: 用火箭送去資源，獲得聲望
派遣一枚火箭進行貿易

Old Text: Exchange techs
Old Translation: 交換技術

Old Text: Send distress call
Old Translation: 傳送求救訊號

Translation: 請求獲得資源，失去聲望

Text: lose Standing with the target Colony, gain Standing with other Colonies
Translation: 在目標殖民地的聲望下降，在其他殖民地的聲望上升

Text: We will send you the gift as soon as possible.
Translation: 我們會儘快把禮物送給你。

Text: We will provide medical expertise instead.
Translation: 我們改為提供醫療方面的專門知識。

Text: We are always eager to help our fellow Martians!
Translation: 我們向來樂於幫助火星同胞！

Text: You will accept <concrete(50000)>  and you will like it!
-40 Standing; +20 Standing with all other Rival Colonies
Translation: -40聲望，在所有其他殖民地+20聲望

Text: -40 Standing; +10 Standing with all other Rival Colonies
Translation: -40聲望，在所有其他殖民地+10聲望

Text: We will exchange <tech_player> for <tech_ai> with you.
Let's do this some other time.
We will provide medical expertise instead.
Translation: 我們改為提供醫療方面的專門知識。

Text: There is much potential in your idea, my friend.
Translation: 你的想法很有潛力，朋友。

Text: Perfect time to test my newest gizmo, the "Pied Piper".
Translation: 現在是測試我的最新發明“花衣魔笛手”的絕佳時機。

Text: Should we task <number> Security Officers to fly to the rival colony and steal some of their Drones?
Translation: 我們是否派遣<number>位警官飛往對手殖民地並竊取他們的無人機？

Text: Should we task <number> Security Officers to fly to the rival colony and try to steal technological advances?
Translation: 我們是否派遣<number>位警官飛往對手殖民地並竊取他們的先進技術？

Text: Should we task <number> Security Officers to fly to the rival colony and try to recruit colonists?
Translation: 我們是否派遣<number>位警官飛往對手殖民地並設法招募殖民地居民？

Text: Should we task <number> Security Officers to fly to the rival colony and sabotage strategic buildings there?
Translation: 我們是否派遣<number>位警官飛往對手殖民地並破壞戰略建築？

Text: What a glorious idea, Commander! I think that exchanging research papers will bring many benefits to our colonies.
Translation: 指揮官，這正是個絕妙的主意！交換研究論文將對我們的殖民地大有裨益。

Text: Sounds reasonable, commander. All those eggheads from both colonies will be jolly happy to work together.
Translation: 聽起來挺合理的，指揮官。我們雙方殖民地的書呆子們肯定非常樂意展開合作。

Text: We would never share our secrets with treacherous scum like you!
Translation: 我們永遠不會和你這種陰險狡詐的人渣分享祕密！

Text: I don't believe we know each other enough for such a serious step in our relationship. Perhaps we will get there, some day.
Translation: 我覺得我們對彼此的瞭解還不夠深入，無法推動我們的關係邁出這意義重大的一步。或許有朝一日能邁出吧。

Text: We may not have put so much effort in research like you and we have no technologies to offer. There are more important things in life than science!
Translation: 我們可能不像你那樣重視科研，因此沒有拿得出手的技術。生活中還有比科學更重要的事！

Text: I'm sorry, but your current research achievements are of no interest for us.
Translation: 抱歉，但你目前在研究上取得的成就對我們無吸引力。

Text: <rival_colony> is no longer offering <resource(number2, res2)> for <resource(number1, res1)>
<rival_name> will scan a Planetary Anomaly in <countdown>
The rocket and its entire crew were seized by <rival>
Translation: 火箭和其中的所有乘員都被<rival>逮住了
招募到的稀有殖民地居民：<trait_name>

Text: None of the other Colonies responded to our distress call
Translation: 無殖民地回應我們的求救訊號。

Old Text: <rival> is offering <resource(import_amount, import_res)> for our <resource(export_amount, export_res)>
Old Translation: <rival>提供<resource(import_amount, import_res)>換取我們的<resource(export_amount, export_res)>

Old Text: <rival_colony> is offering <resource(number2, res2)> for <resource(number1, res1)>
Old Translation: <rival_colony>以<resource(number1, res1)>提供<resource(number2, res2)>

Text: <rival> is offering <resource(import_amount, import_res)> for our <resource(export_amount, export_res)>
If you further wish to challenge yourself and strive for perfection, you may always try to complete the milestones. Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:
Translation: 如果你想進一步挑戰自我並追求完美，可以想辦法完成里程碑。 任務贊助者： 指揮官履歷： 總分：

Text: Congratulations! You have successfully completed all the goals your sponsor had set for you to accomplish on Mars.
Translation: 恭喜！你在火星上成功完成了贊助者為你設定的所有目標。

Text: From the first human step on the Moon, to establishing a successful colony on Mars, The United States has re-established itself time and again as the spearhead of humanity’s reach towards the stars. Your efforts have effectively ensured the US will remain the main authority in a multi-planetary human race in the foreseeable future. If you further wish to challenge yourself and strive for perfection, you may always try to complete the milestones. Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:
Translation: 從人類首次登月，到成功在火星上建立殖民地，美國一次次成功扮演了人類探索群星的排頭兵。你的努力有效確保了美國在未來一段時期內依然是人類星際探索領域的權威。 如果你想進一步挑戰自我並追求完美，可以想辦法完成里程碑。 任務贊助者： 指揮官履歷： 總分：

Text: Congratulations Commander, you have successfully fulfilled all tasks set before you by Congress and the entire mission is deemed an absolute success!
Translation: 祝賀你，指揮官，你成功完成了國會交給你的任務，整個任務取得了圓滿成功！

Text: From a trade agreement meant to avoid another destructive war, came the most advanced space program ever envisioned. By working together the nations of Europe have ensured that humanity will have a future amidst the Stars and have proven the necessity that the rest of world adopts the European Model. If you further wish to challenge yourself and strive for perfection, you may always try to complete the milestones. Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:
Translation: 從這項旨在防止戰爭爆發的貿易協定中產生出了人們能想像出的最先進的太空計劃。歐洲各國齊心協力，確保了人類將在茫茫星海中擁有未來，也證明了世界上其他國家有必要採用歐洲的模式。 如果你想進一步挑戰自我並追求完美，可以想辦法完成里程碑。 任務贊助者： 指揮官履歷： 總分：

Text: Commander, the collective effort of the united European nations has culminated with your extraordinary success! Congratulations!
Translation: 指揮官，歐洲各國的共同努力最終換來了你的非凡成功！祝賀你！

Text: A solid foothold on Mars has been established. The shareholders are happy with the numbers and humanity’s imagination has been once again captured and brought towards the stars, this time with no politician’s face behind the success but the dreams of the greatest visionary and entrepreneur of our age and their properly placed trust in capable people sharing the vision. If you further wish to challenge yourself and strive for perfection, you may always try to complete the milestones. Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:
Translation: 我們已經在火星上站穩了腳跟。股東們對數字很滿意，人類的想像又一次成為了現實，我們向星海邁出了成功的一步。這一次，成功的背後不再是政客的臉，而是我們這個時代最傑出的遠見者以及企業家的夢想，以及他們對與自己有相同願景的人才的信任。 如果你想進一步挑戰自我並追求完美，可以想辦法完成里程碑。 任務贊助者： 指揮官履歷： 總分：

Text: Congratulations Commander! You have achieved that which the cynics said cannot be done by a non-governmental entity – and yet here we are.
Translation: 恭喜您，指揮官！悲觀者曾說非政府團體想完成這項任務是不可能的，而我們真的做到了。

Text: Unparalleled technological superiority entangled with a deep understanding of Nature – and ultimately mastery over it – has always been the great nation of Japan’s ambition. And today all of the world will know that we were the only people on Earth capable of doing so - in large part by your hard work and sacrifices. If you further wish to challenge yourself and strive for perfection, you may always try to complete the milestones. Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:
Translation: 發展出他國無法企及的先進技術，以及深入瞭解並最終駕馭大自然始終是大日本國的野心。今天，全世界都將明白，這種事地球上只有我們能辦到，這很大程度上靠的是我們的勤奮與獻身精神。 如果你想進一步挑戰自我並追求完美，可以想辦法完成里程碑。 任務贊助者： 指揮官履歷： 總分：

Text: Japanese innovation has proven paramount to humanity’s desire to live amidst the stars. You have made your people proud, Commander.
Translation: 人們能實現在其他星球上居住的願望，日本的創新精神居功至偉。指揮官，你的同胞因你而自豪。

Text: When our politicians failed the people of Brazil, the people took a stand and ensured that with the changes they brought Brazil not only becomes a successful nation up to par with the richest and the mightiest, but ultimately also achieves a success no other world power could – the first colony on Mars! If you further wish to challenge yourself and strive for perfection, you may always try to complete the milestones. Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:
Translation: 巴西的政客辜負了人民，於是人民奮發自強，確保了巴西不僅能和世界上最強大富有的國家並駕齊驅，最後還取得了其他各國都沒能取得的成功：在火星上建立了第一座殖民地！ 如果你想進一步挑戰自我並追求完美，可以想辦法完成里程碑。 任務贊助者： 指揮官履歷： 總分：

Text: Commander, your name will top the lists of humanity’s heroes for ages – probably forever. We salute you!
Translation: 指揮官，你的大名將登上人類英雄名單的榜首流傳後世，或許直到永遠。我們向你致敬！

Text: Commander, thanks to your efforts Thanks to your efforts Blue Sun Corporation has ensured humankind that Mars is truly the new frontier, and that we are the key-holders to the new future of humankind. Continue to achieve our goals and we will make sure that the rewards you have received so far would seem like nothing compared to what’s to come! Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:
Translation: 指揮官，多虧了你的不懈努力，蒼日公司切實將火星變成了人類的新邊疆，人類嶄新未來的鑰匙也掌握在我們手中。繼續為我們實現目標吧，與以後的獎勵比起來，你到目前為止得到的獎勵根本不值一提！ 任務贊助者： 指揮官履歷： 總分：

Text: Dear shareholders, dear board directors! Let’s applaud the Commander, whose name has become a guarantee for reliability, ambition and prosperity! A person who made our shared goals of profit and growth a paramount!
Translation: 親愛的股東們，親愛的董事會成員們！請把掌聲獻給指揮官。他的名字就是可靠、雄心與繁榮的代名詞！他為我們圓滿實現了盈利與發展的共同目標！

Text: Our traditions combined with our commitment to change and innovate have always been the guarantee for the success of building a prosperous society, both on Earth and now on the Red Planet. The world beholds the wonders we have built with awe and appreciation so we realize our responsibility to create a diverse, open and inclusive future for everyone. This is why you should never stop here and pursue more goals, always striving for perfection. Always remember – you have the eyes of the Party and the World at you, Commander! Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:
Translation: 我們一直以來都不忘傳統，同時力求變革，這保障了我們在地球和火星上成功建設出了繁榮的社會。世界人民目睹我們建造出的奇蹟後讚歎不已，我們也藉此盡到了為所有人創造一個開放、多元化以及相容幷包的未來的責任。 因此你絕不應駐足不前，而應該放眼更多目標，不斷追求完美。指揮官，要記住，你是黨和世界關注的焦點！ 任務贊助者： 指揮官履歷： 總分：

Text: You, Commander, remained true to our original aspiration and succeeded in securing a decisive victory for the entire humankind, with China as its vanguard. We congratulate you!
Translation: 指揮官，你不忘初心，成功為全人類爭取到了決定性的勝利，讓中國走在了世界的最前沿。祝賀你！

Text: You have demonstrated an enviable skill and potential for overcoming any challenge Mars has to offer. Since the dawn of time, the Indian civilization has invested heavily in the potential of our diverse and bright people and in the effort to build our own future ourselves. If you wish to further challenge yourself or strive for perfection, you can always attempt to complete more goals. Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:
Translation: 你展現出了令人羨豔的精湛技巧，以及克服火星上一切挑戰的潛能。自古以來，印度文明為了建設我們自己的未來，十分注重培養我們多種多樣且聰明伶俐的人民。 如果你想進一步挑戰自我並追求完美，可以想辦法完成更多目標。 任務贊助者： 指揮官履歷： 總分：

Text: Congratulations, Commander! Our people look upon you as a herald of new age of prosperity, marked by the colonization of the Red Planet!
Translation: 恭喜您，指揮官！我們的人民視你為新時代的使者，而火星上的殖民地就是證明！

Text: Your heroic deeds on Mars lit a path for all humankind to follow. The Church ordered you to achieve a set of difficult tasks and you were not found wanting. You, and your brave Colonists, have set an inspiring example for people on Earth, who now flock under the wings of the Church to be led out of the cradle of the homeworld and among the stars. Rejoice, Commander, for Mars offers many more challenges for the one who is led by the burning faith and the desire to constantly prove in the eyes of the Creator. Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:
Translation: 你在火星上的英勇事蹟為全人類照亮了前路。本教將一系列困難的任務交給了你，而你完成得十分出色。你和你勇敢的殖民地居民們成為了地球人民的光輝榜樣。他們現在爭相湧入本教的懷抱，以求離開故鄉的搖籃，飛向茫茫星海。 歡呼吧，指揮官。火星為信仰堅定且渴望向造物主不斷證明自己的人準備了更多挑戰。 任務贊助者： 指揮官履歷： 總分：

Text: Humanity has reached far, surviving the dark ages of ignorance through the guidance of the prophets of enlightenment. You, Commander, are truly one of those individuals, touched by the divine spark, whose example shines like a torch for all of us.
Translation: 人類在啟蒙先知的引導下挺過了無知的黑暗時代，到現在已經取得了長足的進步。指揮官，你是真正蒙受神恩的少數幸運兒之一，也是其他人的光輝典範。

Text: You proved to be a modern-day hero of the Russian nation, displaying the valor and resolve so common for our great people! Under your rule the Russian colony on the Red Planet expanded and proved that the ambitions of our people are not to be taken lightly! Yet there is way more to be done on Mars, new goals and new challenges await the one who believes there’s more to be improved! Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:
Translation: 你展現出了我們偉大民族共有的勇氣與決心，用行動證明了自己是俄羅斯的現代英雄！在你的統治下，火星上的俄羅斯殖民地不斷擴張，並證明了我們民族的雄心壯志絕非兒戲！ 但在火星上的工作遠沒有結束，還有新目標和新挑戰等待著精益求精者去完成！ 任務贊助者： 指揮官履歷： 總分：

Text: Commander! You achieved all mission goals, regardless of the adversities you faced on Mars! A true pioneer - well done!
Translation: 指揮官！你在火星上克服艱難險阻，完成了所有任務目標！太了不起了，你是真正的開拓者！

Text: As you know, the future of the team at Paradox Interactive is tightly related to your progress with the colonization of Mars. After refusing to announce the continuation of the Victoria franchise, we had to consider our options and moving permanently to Mars was the safest one. Thank you for making this possibility a certainty! Consider taking more goals for the next milestone to show us even more determination and support. Mission Sponsor: Commander Profile: Total Score:
Translation: 如你所知，Paradox Interactive團隊的未來與你在火星上殖民的進展息息相關。我們宣佈拒絕製作《維多利亞》系列的續作後，不得不考慮可行的方案，而在火星上永久定居是最安全的做法。感謝你讓這一可能成為了現實！ 你可以考慮為達成下一個里程碑而繼續完成目標，以進一步向我們表明你的決心與支援。 任務贊助者： 指揮官履歷： 總分：

Text: Thank you for completing your mission goals, Commander. Once again your submission documentation is up to par and we enjoyed reading through it. The team at Paradox Interactive HQ is grateful for your patience and determination.
Translation: 指揮官，感謝你完成了任務目標。你提交的證明檔案依然出色，令我們賞心悅目。Paradox Interactive總部的團隊感謝你的耐心與決心。

Text: <DisplayName> is deeply in love with another Colonist they fear is out of their league. They wish to propose during a very romantic moment, one that involves a serious display of fireworks.
Translation: <DisplayName>深愛上了另一位殖民地居民，但擔心自己配不上對方。此人想要在一個煙花綻放的浪漫時刻向對方求婚。

Text: A gloomy looking Colonist approaches you and shares something personal.
Translation: 一位憂鬱的殖民地居民找上了你並與你分享自己的私事。

Text: I can't say no to a hopeless romantic. Let's have us some fireworks!
Translation: 我無法拒絕這種無可救藥的情種。我們來放煙火吧！

Text: I will do anything for love but I won't do that.
Translation: 為了愛我什麼都願意做，那個除外。

Text:
A race to cross the great Arcadian plains! With quite a motivating reward fund of <funding(reward)> - courtesy of said organizations. The plan is that every Mars mission commits one Explorer to the race.

All colonies must commit to the race for it to transpire at all. First one across gets all the funding.
Translation:
跨越阿卡狄亞平原！競速賽正式開始！上述組織還會提供一筆可觀的資金<funding(reward)>。根據賽事規則，火星上的每個殖民地都要派出一輛探索者參加比賽。

必須所有殖民地都參加比賽，比賽才會正式開始。第一個穿過終點線的殖民地可以獲得全部獎金。

Text: In a bid to ease tensions between the separate colonies on Mars, several organizations on Earth have proposed a sporting event as a show of good faith and an outlet for our extreme competitiveness.
Translation: 為了緩解火星上不同殖民地之間的緊張關係，地球上的幾個組織決定舉辦一場比賽來表達尋求和平的誠意，同時為各個殖民地提供釋放競爭壓力的機會。

Text: Well, why not? Prepare the Explorer! Name it Vigor!
Translation: 來啊，誰怕誰啊？準備探索者！就叫它勇氣號！

Text: a shot at winning <funding(reward)>. Temporarily lose one RC Explorer.
Translation: 有可能贏得<funding(reward)>。暫時失去一臺遙控探索者。

Text: I see no good faith to be had. Pass.
