Translation: 我覺得肯定會有人作弊，還是算了吧。

Text: Forget good faith, maybe we can increase our odds somehow... prepare two Explorers!
Translation: 別管什麼正當競爭了，或許我們可以想辦法提高贏面……準備兩臺探索者！

Text: temporarily lose two RC Explorers, better odds at winning. Chance to get caught.
Translation: 暫時失去兩臺遙控探索者，贏面更大。有可能會被發現作弊。

Text:
As carefully as we tried to hide the second Explorer in the dusty plains of Arcadia, video footage emerged of it and we have been disqualified.

The odds of video surveillance recording at that exact location were so meager that we can't help but wonder if we were the only ones playing unfair.

Guess we'll never know.
Translation:
當我們小心翼翼地準備把第二臺探索者放在塵土飛揚的阿卡狄亞平原上時，監控錄影卻拍到了我們作弊的行為，我們被取消了資格。

在那種位置剛好會有監控錄影的機率實在是太小了，我們不禁懷疑起來，作弊的人是不是只有我們自己。

至於真相如何，估計我們永遠都不會知道了。

Text: Turns out we underestimated our rivals and we were caught red handed in our attempt to rig the race.
Translation: 事實證明，我們低估了我們的對手。當我們準備作弊的時候，我們被抓了個正著。

Text: Disqualified from race. Explorers confiscated. Standing penalty with rivals.
Translation: 取消資格的處分。沒收探索者的處分。在競爭對手處聲望下降的處分。

Text:
We did our best. Our Explorer was in top-notch condition and had seen modifications to lighten it up as much as possible. 

Still we came in at a distant second place to <DisplayName>.

Our Explorer will be returned to us via Supply Pod shortly.
Translation:
我們已經很努力了。我們的探索者處於最佳狀態，我們還對它進行了改造，讓它的重量儘可能地變輕。

但即便如此，我們也屈居二位，與第一位<DisplayName>相差很大一段距離。

探索者將很快透過補給艙送回來。

Text:
Our second Explorer, meant to give us a serious edge at winning the long distance Arcadia Cross race came in at second place despite the advantage!

There is no way <DisplayName> could have played fair! This is not mathematically or physically possible! But we can't prove a thing.

Our Explorers will return shortly.
Translation:
我們派出了第二臺探索者，本以為能在阿卡狄亞競速賽中佔有優勢，但結果依然屈居二位！

<DisplayName>肯定是作弊了！無論是從數學上還是從物理學上來說，這種事情都是不可能的！但我們沒有證據證明他們作弊。

我們的探索者很快就會退回來了。

Text: This is impossible! Everything was thought of and executed perfectly!
Translation: 這真是太讓人難以置信了！一切都按照計劃進行，完美無缺！

Text:
As celebrations break out in our colony, something quite unexpected happened. All rival leaders called to personally congratulate you and after the brief conversations a feeling that maybe, just for a while, the rivalry could slow down.

Possibly just wishful thinking, but a nice thought nonetheless.
Translation:
當我們在殖民地慶祝的時候，發生了某件讓人意想不到的事情。所有競爭對手的指揮官們都親自給你打來了電話，祝賀你獲得了勝利。簡短的交流之後，你感覺你們之間的競爭或許會減緩，哪怕僅僅是一段時間也好。

或許這只是你的一廂情願，但至少也是個不錯的想法。

Text: With hundreds of millions of viewers from Earth, and quite possibly every soul on Mars, the Arcadia Cross race came to a dramatic end - and our Explorer, Vigor, came out victorious.
Translation: 在地球幾十億人的注視之下，或許也是在所有火星居民的注視之下，阿卡狄亞競速賽順利落幕。我們的探索者“勇氣號”獲得了勝利。
獲得<funding(reward)>。在競爭對手處的聲望提高。

Text:
The meteor was detected quite late and <DisplayName>'s colony is helpless to do anything about it. 

We, on the other hand, are in a position to collide one of our Rockets with the meteor to deviate its course just enough so it misses the rival colony. 

This will, however, trigger a deadly meteor storm right above our colony from the debris of the blast.
Translation:
發現隕石時已經遲了，<DisplayName>的殖民地現在已經無能為力。

而我們有辦法用一枚火箭撞上隕石，使其行進路線變化到剛好能與對手殖民地擦肩而過的程度。

然而這麼做會引發致命的隕石雨，連同爆炸產生的碎片一起砸到我們殖民地的頭上。

Text: A large meteor is on an impact course towards a rival colony.
Translation: 一顆大型隕石即將撞上一座對手殖民地。

Text: We can't stay idle and leave our fellow Martians to die. Fire the rocket!
Translation: 我們不能見死不救。發射火箭！

Text: lose a Rocket and trigger a Meteor Storm. Save the Colony of <DisplayName>
Translation: 失去一枚火箭並觸發隕石風暴。拯救<DisplayName>殖民地

Text: A rocket was quickly prepared and launched directly at the meteor.
Translation: 我們迅速準備好一枚火箭並將其直接向著隕石發射了出去。

Text:
The collision altered the course of the deadly meteor just enough so it collided in safe distance of the other colony.

Celebrations are due, but first we must brace for the meteor storm about to hit us.
Translation:
撞擊改變了致命隕石的飛行軌跡，並在其墜落地點和對手殖民地之間製造了一段安全距離。

我們理應慶祝一番，但首先我們必須挺過即將來襲的隕石風暴。

Text: I am responsible for the lives of our colonists and can't put them in danger. I am sorry.
Translation: 殖民地居民的生命安全是我的責任，我不能拿他們的性命開玩笑。抱歉。

Text: the Colony of <DisplayName> will be destroyed
The window in which we could have acted to save the rival colony quickly passed.
Translation: 我能拯救對手殖民地的時機轉瞬即逝。

Text:
Soon after a marsquake is detected. News of the complete destruction of <DisplayName>'s colony followed shortly.

Many lives were lost.
Translation:
很快我們就偵測到了地震。緊接著就傳來了<DisplayName>的殖民地被夷為平地的消息。

死了很多人。

Text: Following our heroic intervention which saved an entire rival colony, all other colonies are sending us gifts of good will.
Translation: 我們英勇的挽救了一整座殖民地後，所有其他殖民地紛紛向我們示好並送來了禮物。

Text: get Supply Pods with advanced resources, standing boost with all Colonies
Translation: 獲得裝有高階資源的補給艙，在所有殖民地中的聲望提升。

Text:
Operating a stolen vehicle all the way from <DisplayName>'s colony to here, a young man by the name of Still Osbourne has made contact with us.

He wishes we grant him asylum and in return he will give us precious knowledge. 

Doing so will most definitely put a serious dent on our relations with our friends - <DisplayName>.
Translation:
一個叫做斯蒂爾·奧斯伯恩的年輕人開著一輛偷來的車，從<DisplayName>的殖民地一路開到了我們這裡。

他希望我們能為他提供庇護。作為回報，他會與我們分享寶貴的知識。

如果這麼做的話，我們與<DisplayName>的關係可能會受到嚴重影響。

Text: An awkward situation has made its way to our door step.
Translation: 我們的殖民地碰到了一件麻煩事。

Text: Ignore the message, make sure no one knows about it.
Translation: 無視消息，確保沒人知道這件事情。

Text: Bring him in. Maybe he'll be worth some reward if returned.
Translation: 讓他進來吧。如果我們把他押回去，或許能得到某些好處。

Text: morale penalty to colonists. <funding(buyout)> reward from friendly colony
Translation: 殖民地居民士氣下降，從盟友殖民地處獲得<funding(buyout)>獎勵

Text: What could have made him take this perilous trip? Grant Still Osbourne asylum.
Translation: 他到底發生了什麼事情，才會不惜冒著生命危險也要逃過來？為斯蒂爾·奧斯伯恩提供庇護。

Text: receive stolen tech from rival, severe standing penalty, colony morale boost
Translation: 獲得從對手那裡偷來的技術，聲望嚴重下降，殖民地士氣升高

Text:
As it turned out, the package from the colony of <DisplayName> contains a huge pile of... let's call it "fertilizer". We may have really pissed those people, but this is a bad joke nevertheless.

What is your response to this provocation?
Translation:
原來，來自<DisplayName>的包裹中裝著一大坨……這麼說吧，一大坨“肥料”。說不定我們確實惹火了那群人，但不管怎樣，這只不過是個惡作劇而已。

對於這樣的挑釁，我們該如何應對？

Text: A rival colony has sent a big package addressed to you, personally.
Translation: 某個對手殖民地給你送來了一個巨大的私人包裹。

Text: Start operation "Totally Not Dust Storm" - send it back and drop it over one of their Domes.
Translation: 開始“這可不是什麼沙塵暴”計劃，把它原封不動地送回去，丟到他們的穹頂上。

Text: lose <standing_loss> Standing with <DisplayName>; all Party Animal Colonists gain Morale
Translation: 失去<DisplayName>處的<standing_loss>聲望，所有擁有“派對狂人”特性的居民士氣上升

Text: Contact all colonies and make a stern statement.
Translation: 與所有的殖民地聯絡，並發表嚴正宣告。

Text: gain <standing_gain_low> Standing with all Colonies; a few Colonists lose Morale
Translation: 在所有的殖民地處獲得<standing_gain_low>聲望，少量居民士氣下降

Text: Do nothing. Reacting to such a stupid joke would be beneath us.
Translation: 什麼都不做。不過是個笑話而已，如果我們當真了，那就太丟人了。

Text: gain <standing_gain_high> Standing with <DisplayName>; a few Colonists lose Morale
Translation: 與<DisplayName>的聲望提高<standing_gain_high>，少量居民士氣下降

Text:
Because the time frame in which the accidents happened was rather small, the ensuing quick investigation found software corruption in all of the involved Drones - corruption our engineers say can only happen if their system was hacked.

Although an obvious act of sabotage, we can't prove who is to blame precisely. What we can do is raise the issue to Earthly judicial bodies - which will probably hinder all of our rival's (not just the guilty one's) operations for a short while.
Translation:
由於事故的時間段非常短，經過快速調查，檢查人員發現所有發生事故的無人機都出現了軟體損壞的情況。根據工程師的說法，只有系統遭到了駭客入侵，才會出現這樣的損壞。

儘管這明顯屬於破壞行為，但我們卻無法指出究竟是什麼人做了這樣的事情。我們能做的事情，只有將這場事故報告給地球上的司法機構。這樣一來，我們所有的對手（不僅僅是犯罪者）的發展速度可能都會減緩一段時間。

Text: Several colonists were injured today, the severity of their injuries varying, in accidents that all involved Drones.
Translation: 今天，有幾位殖民地居民受傷了。他們受傷的嚴重程度各不相同，而且所有的事故都有無人機在場。

Text: Of course we will ring the bell on this one. Inform the UN.
Translation: 這種事情當然要敲響警鐘，通知聯合國吧。

Text: all rivals lose funding and standing with you
Translation: 所有的競爭對手資金減少，你在他們那裡的聲望下降

Text: No one was killed, fortunately. Just make sure our Drones are better protected from now on.
Translation: 幸好沒人喪生，想辦法讓我們的無人機獲得更好地保護。

Text:
Because they deduced the window of opportunity was sure to close fast, they inserted a Trojan Horse to look around and try and hinder whatever operations they could. 

While looking for a system weakness, our hackers stumbled upon very salacious information, which is sure to do serious PR damage to the colony of <DisplayName>.

Sharing the information will also make it quite hard to deny running spies on Mars on our part.
Translation:
他們推斷，恐怕用不了多久，這個漏洞就會被修復。因此，他們在系統內植入了木馬，可以監視對方的系統，同時阻止對方的操作。

在尋找系統漏洞的過程中，我們的駭客偶然發現了非常淫穢的影片。如果這樣的影片流出去，肯定會對<DisplayName>的公關產生巨大的影響。

不過，如果把這樣的影片發出去，我們的間諜行為幾乎也一定會被發現。

Text: Our cyber security team has taken advantage of a gaping hole within one of our rivals’ network defenses.
Translation: 我們的網路安全團隊發現，某位競爭對手的網路防禦系統存在漏洞。

Text: No need, just hinder their production.
Translation: 沒必要，只要干擾他們的生產工作就行了。
在地球上分享這段影片。

Text: rival loses colonists and money, we lose standing with all rivals
Translation: 對手失去居民與金錢，我們在所有對手中的聲望下降

Text: Warn them – this could be embarrassing for us all.
Translation: 警告他們，他們的行為可能會讓我們所有人都身處困境。

Text: Anyone up for some good old blackmailing?
The Rover is a testimony of a long-lost expedition at these coordinates. We still haven’t recovered any information from the black box. What do you suggest?
Translation: 這輛探測車證明了一支很久之前就下落不明的探險隊曾到過這些座標。我們仍未從黑盒子裡取得任何資訊。你有什麼建議？

Text: We have discovered a derelict Rover and recovered its intact black box.
Translation: 我們發現了一輛遺棄的探測車，並從其中回收了完好無損的黑盒子。
Old Text: We have discovered a derelict rover and recovered its intact black box.
Old Translation: 我們發現了一輛遺棄的探測車，並從其中回收了完好無損的黑盒子。

Text: Salvage the data in the black box.
The Rover's black box contained an unknown virus!
Translation: 探測車的黑盒子裡含有一種不明病毒！

Text:
We found this out the hard way - when the black box was connected to the Colony's computer systems to be decrypted, the virus infected them. We managed to quarantine it successfully, but not before it gained access to the Colony's financial accounts.

<effect>You have lost <funding_lost>% of your current Funding.
Translation:
我們發現的同時也嚐到了苦頭。當我們把黑盒子連接到殖民地電腦系統以進行解密時，病毒感染了系統。我們設法成功隔離了病毒，但病毒已經感染了殖民地的財務帳戶。

<effect>你損失了目前資金的<funding_lost>%。

Text: The Rover's black box contained invaluable research information which allowed us to discover a new Breakthrough!
Translation: 探測車的黑盒子裡裝有無價的研究資訊，我們靠它發現一項新突破性技術！
Old Text: The Rover's black box contained invaluable research information which would allow us to discover a new Breakthrough!
Old Translation: 探測車的黑盒子裡裝有無價的研究資訊，有了它，我們能發現一項新突破性技術！

Text: <effect> A new Breakthrough tech has become available.
Take the Rover back to the Colony.
Old Text: Take the Rover back to the Colony
Old Translation: 將探測車帶回殖民地

Text: The moment the Rover is activated it goes berserk.
Translation: 剛剛啟動探測車，它就失控了。

Text:
The vehicle drives through the expedition camp and smashes itself against the Rocket's hull. The damage is light, but it still would require on-site repairs.

<effect>The expedition is delayed.
Translation:
這輛車橫穿了探險隊營地，並狠狠地撞上了火箭。損傷不嚴重，但仍需要現場維修。

<effect>探險推遲。

Text: The Rover is damaged beyond repair, but it has enough energy to open its hatch and let out a bunch of Drones which obediently enter our Rocket.
Translation: 探測車已受損到無法修復的地步，但它仍有足夠能量開啟艙口並放出一群無人機。這群無人機乖乖地開進了我們的火箭裡。
Old Text: The Rover is damaged beyond repair, but it has enough energy to open its hatch and let out a bunch of Drones which obediently enter the Rocket.
Old Translation: 探測車已受損到無法修復的地步，但它仍有足夠能量開啟艙口並放出一群無人機。這群無人機乖乖的開進了火箭裡。

Old Text: <effect>You will receive <new_drones> Drone Prefabs upon expedition return.
Old Translation: <effect>探險隊歸來時，你將獲得<new_drones>個無人機預製件。

Old Text: Dismantle the Rover
Old Translation: 拆卸探測車

Text: It seems that an unknown Colony had sent an ill-prepared expedition team to this location. Their equipment failed and they never managed to return to their home. We’ve identified the remains of several Colonists who lost their lives in the line of duty.
Translation: 似乎有一個不明殖民地將一支準備不充分的探險隊派到了此地點。他們的裝置失靈，沒能回家。我們發現了若干具殖民地居民的遺體，他們在工作第一線上獻出了生命。

Text: We’ve discovered the crashed remains of another expedition.
Translation: 我們發現了別的探險隊的遺骸。

Text: Bury them, then salvage the useful equipment.
Translation: 把他們安葬，並回收有用的裝備。

Old Text: gain <research(salvaged_data)> and <salvaged_drones>
Old Translation: 獲得<research(salvaged_data)>和<salvaged_drones>

Text: Bring the remains here, we'll bury them with honors.
Translation: 把遺骸帶回來，我們要舉行隆重的葬禮。

Text: all Colonists gain <morale_up> Morale for <sols(morale_up_sols)> Sols
Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣提升<morale_up>，持續<sols(morale_up_sols)>個太陽日。

Text:
This points towards obvious acts of sabotage by some unknown actors.

Investigations are underway as we speak.
Translation:
很顯然，這些故障是某些不明人物的破壞行為。

目前，調查工作正在進行。

Text: Several factories have suffered malfunctions - all critical and all at the exact same time.
Translation: 幾家工廠出現了重大故障，這些重大故障都是同時發生的。

Text: Even here, we are still at each other's throats.
Translation: 哪怕是在火星上，我們也劍拔弩張。

Text: I have the feeling that I know who did this. Investigate first, though.
Translation: 我大概知道這件事是誰幹的，不過還是先調查吧。

Text:
We believe <DisplayName> is behind these covert actions, based on intel shared by other rivals earlier. 

We currently have no way to strike back and our evidence won't hold, should we bring it to courts on Earth.
Translation:
從其他競爭對手此前分享給我們的情報來看， 這件事的主謀應該是<DisplayName>。

我們目前沒有辦法進行反擊，就算真的把這個情況報告給地球的司法機構，我們的證據也站不住腳。

Text: More acts of sabotage – several buildings have sustained further damage.
Translation: 殖民地裡出現了更多破壞行為，多座建築遭到了損害。

Text: Repair the damage. An opportunity will present itself.
Translation: 修復建築吧，會有機會的。

Text:
To all except one - <DisplayName>’s.

Frustrated, as are we, by their recent activity on Mars, the  colonies propose an alliance aimed at crippling <DisplayName>’s mission.

A three step plan is laid out – signing on to it will require we share the considerable financial burden the retaliatory measures will bring.

The first step is aimed at supplies en-route to Mars while still in low Earth orbit. Strikes masked as unfortunate space debris collisions will suffocate their lifeline from Earth.
Translation:
除了<DisplayName>之外。

最近，我們所有人都被他們在火星上的行為搞得很窩火，因此所有的殖民地決定聯合起來，一起對付<DisplayName>。

郵件中制定了三步走計劃，如果簽署這份協議，所有的殖民地都要承擔相當程度的財政負擔。

第一步目標，是在低地球軌道上切斷他們的補給線。我們會攻擊他們的補給艙，並偽裝成是太空碎片碰撞的意外事故，切斷他們的補給。

Text: A message has been sent to all Martian Missions’ Commanders.
Translation: 所有的火星指揮官都收到了一封郵件，
開始對<DisplayName>的祕密破壞行動

Text: We will upgrade our defenses against such activities without effectively going to war. Turn down the proposal.
Translation: 我們只要升級防禦系統就行了，沒必要非開戰不可。拒絕這份協議。
可以有效地防禦接下來的破壞

Text: I decline to descend into such barbarism. Ignore them until they see the error of their ways.
Translation: 我拒絕參與這種野蠻行為。不要理會他們，等他們自己認識到自己的錯誤吧。

Text: sabotages will continue for an unknown time period
Translation: 破壞行動會繼續發生，持續時間未知

Text:
<DisplayName>’s capacity has greatly shrunk and they have halted all offensive operations for the time being. 

The Second phase of the plan involves the artificial diverting of meteors towards their general location. One space mining company from Earth is well equipped to do so for the right price.
Translation:
<DisplayName>的殖民地運轉能力遭到了嚴重削弱，他們暫時停止了所有的破壞行為。

第二步計劃是，將所有來襲的隕石都透過人工引導，引導到他們所在的位置。只要給他個合適的價格，地球上的星際礦業公司就能替我們做這件事情。

Text: Our aggressive rival has already begun feeling the pain our combined efforts to cripple their supplies from Earth are inflicting.
Translation: 我們破壞了對手的補給線。在我們的聯手絞殺之下，我們好鬥的對手已經感到了切膚之痛。

Text: further damage to the colony of <DisplayName>
No, this is enough. Put a stop to the madness.
Translation: 算了，已經夠意思了。這樣的瘋狂行為該打住了。

Text: lose standing with all other colonies
Translation: 在所有其它殖民地的聲望下降

Text:
Our joint efforts have effectively brought <DisplayName>’s colony to its knees and we doubt they will be able to muster up any malicious activity within the foreseeable future.

This being said, our allies are determined to see the plan through. 

The third phase awaits financial commitment. It involves knocking out their remaining power producers. This will put an end to <DisplayName>’s ambitions on Mars and will probably take many lives.
Translation:
我們的合作得到了明顯的效果，<DisplayName>的殖民地已經奄奄一息。在可預見的很長一段時間內，他們恐怕都沒辦法再進行任何破壞活動了。

話雖這麼說，我們的盟友依然下定決心，準備完成最後一步計劃。

第三步計劃依然在等待財務支援。這步計劃會破壞他們所有殘餘的發電建築。這樣一來，<DisplayName>在火星上的野心就徹底完蛋了，不過可能也會讓許多人喪命。

Text: Phase 2 has crippled their industry and most of their life support.
Translation: 計劃的第二步破壞了他們的工廠與絕大部分生命供給系統。

Text: destroy <DisplayName>'s colony, morale penalty to all colonists
Translation: 摧毀<DisplayName>的殖民地，所有居民士氣下降

Text: We will not take part in this.
Translation: 我們不打算再幹下去了

Text: destroy <DisplayName>'s colony, -35 standing with other colonies
Translation: 摧毀<DisplayName>的殖民地，在其它殖民地處的聲望-35

Text: We have gone too far, we must stop this. We will pay to hinder offensive efforts!
Translation: 已經幹得太過火了，不能再這樣下去了。我們必須想辦法阻止他們的行為！

Text: save <DisplayName>'s colony, -50 standing with other colonies, morale boost to all colonists
Translation: 拯救<DisplayName>的殖民地，在其它殖民地處的聲望-50，所有居民士氣上升

Text: The agents of <DisplayName> sabotaged our Factories
<DisplayName> will no longer sabotage our buildings
We lost standing with our former allies
Translation: 我們在前盟友處的聲望下降了

Text:
Several colonists have been killed.

Our experts have begun fixing the data block as we speak. However, preliminary analysis of the problem suggests it is sabotage from our rivals here on Mars.

Because of the technical difficulties we are experiencing, it will cost us further research to name the culprit.
Translation:
幾位居民在事故中喪命。

我們的專家團隊已經在修復資料傳輸問題。不過，經過初期分析之後，我們認為這場爆炸是由於其它競爭對手的破壞行為造成的。

由於我們目前遇到了技術故障，如果想找出罪魁禍首，就要耗費更多研究點數。

Text: Alert! Something is wrong. All data transfers from Earth have ceased after an explosion rocked our colony.
Translation: 警報！發生事故了。我們的殖民地發生了爆炸，爆炸後，所有來自地球的資料傳輸都中斷了。

Text: Just fix the problem. We cannot afford more research setbacks.
Translation: 把故障修好就行了，我們可不能浪費更多研究點數了。
在5個太陽日內，無法獲得來自贊助者與科研外包的研究點數

Text: Yes, fix the problem, but also find out who is responsible. We must know our enemies!
Translation: 把故障修好，但也一定要找出來到底是誰幹的。我們必須瞭解敵人的情況！

Text: no Outsource/Sponsor research for 15 Sols. Discover the culprit
Translation: 在15個太陽日內，無法獲得來自贊助者與科研外包的研究點數。但能找出罪魁禍首

Text:
With high confidence, our agents have reached the conclusion that <DisplayName> is to blame.

As things stand now, we have no way of retaliating. However, we have mustered up a long-term plan through which, should the opportunity ever arise, we may get payback for their reckless actions.
Translation:
我們的特工非常肯定地指出，<DisplayName>就是罪魁禍首。

但目前，我們並沒有任何辦法進行報復。不過，我們已經制定了一項長期計劃。一旦有機會，我們就會執行這項計劃，讓敵人為他們莽撞的行為付出代價。

Text: Commander, we know who our saboteurs were.
Translation: 指揮官，我們已經找到破壞者了。

Text: We can't let this go unpunished. Set aside funds and wait for the perfect opportunity.
Translation: 我們不能讓他們就這麼逍遙法外。設定專項資金，等待報復的機會。

Text: should the opportunity ever arise, and it may not, you will be able to exact revenge.
Translation: 如果有機會，你就可以進行報復，但機會也可能不會出現。

Text: We cannot concern ourselves with petty squabbles. Our mission is too important.
Translation: 我們不能把精力浪費在這種瑣碎的事情上。我們的任務太重要了。

Text:
A combination of circumstances has revealed a weakness in the colony of <DisplayName>.

We now have the opportunity to take revenge for the crime committed against us.

Note that the nature of this weakness means that we most probably will eliminate the presence of <DisplayName> on Mars and it will seem like a calculation error on their part which cannot be traced to us.

Truth be told, it really will be a calculation error on their part, just not the one which could reroute flammable chemicals to their oxygen supply, but the one which they made long ago when they chose to endanger our colonists.

We need your approval to go forward with the plan.
Translation:
各種資料顯示，<DisplayName>的殖民地存在著安全漏洞。

他們曾經對我們犯下過罪行，而如今，我們可以藉著這個機會進行報復。

值得一提的是，這個安全漏洞會導致一場災難，很可能會把<DisplayName>的殖民地直接從火星上消滅掉。而這場災難乍看之下似乎是計算錯誤造成的，根本沒人能追溯到我們頭上。

說實話，這確實是他們的計算錯誤，這指的不僅僅是他們的可燃化學品供氧路線可以被修改的計算錯誤。很久以前，他們決定加害我們的殖民地居民，這才是他們真正的錯誤。

我們需要你的許可才能執行這項計劃。

Text: A long time ago, a crime was committed against our colony. It's payback time.
Translation: 很久以前，他們對我們的殖民地犯下了罪行。如今，他們該血債血償了。

Text: It was so long ago, and things are different now. Abort!
Translation: 事情已經過去很久了，此一時彼一時。還是算了吧！

Text: We will never forget the lives they have taken from us. Go ahead!
Translation: 我們絕不會忘記那些死在他們手上的居民。動手吧！

Text: Many of the Martianborn from the colony of <DisplayName> want to visit the Earth. Yet their commander wouldn't spare a Rocket for leisure.
Translation: <DisplayName>殖民地的很多火星之子想要去地球看看。但他們的指揮官不願為了觀光的目的而動用火箭。
Old Text: Many of the Martianborn from the colony of <DisplayName> want to visit the Earth. Yet their commander cannot spare a Rocket for leisure.
Old Translation: <DisplayName>殖民地的很多火星之子想要去地球看看。但他們的指揮官沒有空餘的火箭了。

Text: Some wealthy young Martians from another colony need a change of scenery.
Translation: 另一座殖民地的一些年輕又有錢的火星之子想要看看不一樣的風景。

Text: If they have the money, we will gladly help them spend it.
Translation: 只要他們有錢，我們幫他們花還不是一句話的事。

Text: Why travel to Earth? Persuade them to come to our colony and live a life of luxury!
Translation: 為什麼去地球呢？說服他們來我們的殖民地享受榮華富貴！
Old Text: Why travel to Earth? Persuade them come to our colony and live a life of luxury!
Old Translation: 為什麼去地球呢？說服他們來我們的殖民地享受榮華富貴！

Text: gain <workers_gain> Youth Whiner Martianborn Colonists and <applicants_gain_low> Tourist Applicants
Translation: 獲得<workers_gain>名愛發牢騷的年輕火星之子殖民地居民和<applicants_gain_low>名遊客應徵者

Text: I don't have time for babysitting.
The old gentleman's health isn't very good though. Some say he may not survive the journey from the colony of <DisplayName>.
Translation: 不過老先生的身體狀況不怎麼理想。有人說他也許會死在從<DisplayName>殖民地來這裡的途中。

Text: A senior professor from another colony wants to move to our wonderful home.
Translation: 另一座殖民地的一位老教授想要搬來我們的美好家園。

Text: He is welcome! I'll do everything in my power to ensure he arrives safe and sound.
Translation: 歡迎歡迎！我會竭盡所能保證他安然無恙地到達。

Text: gain a Senior Genius Scientist with Chronic Condition
Translation: 獲得一名患有慢性病的老年天才科學家。

Text: I admire his works too much to be able to take this risk.
Translation: 正因為我對他的工作無比景仰，我才無法冒這個險。

Text:
The old professor who planned to live in our colony died peacefully in his sleep. The neighbor colony informed you that in his last will he gifted his last works to us. 

We have gained <research(research_genius)> Research.
Translation:
打算來我們殖民地居住的老教授昨晚在睡夢中安然離世。相鄰殖民地通知你說他最後的願望是把自己的遺言贈與我們。

我們獲得了<research(research_genius)>研究點數。

Text: The people from the colony of <DisplayName> have forged strong bonds with our colonists. Some of them would like to live here, or at least come and go as they like.
Translation: <DisplayName>殖民地的居民與我們的居民之間結下了深厚的情誼。他們中一部分人想搬來這裡居住，或至少能隨意來訪和離開。
Old Text: The people from the colony of <DisplayName> have forged strong bonds with our people. Some of them would like to live here, or at least come and go as they like.
Old Translation: <DisplayName>殖民地的居民與我們的居民之間結下了深厚的情誼。他們中一部分人想搬來這裡居住，或至少能隨意來訪和離開。

Text: The people from another colony requested permission to visit us.
Translation: 另一座殖民地的居民請求獲得來探訪我們的許可。

Text: They are our friends! They are welcome to visit as they like.
Translation: 他們是我們的朋友！他們可以隨意來訪。

Text: all Colonists gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣上升<morale_gain>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日。

Text: Friends will be friends, but the colony's security comes first.
Translation: 我們是朋友沒錯，但安全第一。
Old Text: Friends will be friends, but the colony security comes first.
Old Translation: 我們是朋友沒錯，但安全第一。

Text: all Security Officers gain <morale_gain_high> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
Translation: 所有警官士氣上升<morale_gain_high>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日。

Text: "We were here first!" They threaten to sabotage and destroy the useful resources on site rather than allow us to claim even a tiny portion of them.
Translation: “我們先到的！”此人威脅說要摧毀這裡的有用資源，連一點點都不肯給我們。

Text: The expedition encountered personnel from a rival Colony. The rivals are hostile and uncooperative, claiming they have exclusive rights on exploiting the Anomaly site.
Translation: 探險隊遇到了來自對手殖民地的居民。這幫人充滿敵意且不願合作。他們稱此異象地點歸他們所有，不許其他人接近。

Text: Teach them a lesson – but be careful!
Translation: 給他們個教訓，但下手要有分寸！

Text: After your decisive actions, the rival expedition quickly packs up and goes.
Translation: 你果斷採取行動後，對手探險隊迅速打包離開了。

Text:
Advancing in a line towards the rivals, with tools risen up menacingly was enough for them to lose courage and beat it. Finally you can explore the riches of Mars.

<effect>The expedition will return with <metals(metals_gained)> and <polymers(polymers_gained)>.
Translation:
你的人排成一排，舉起工具，殺氣騰騰地向對手前進，並成功把他們嚇跑了。你終於可以探索富饒的火星了。

<effect>探險隊將帶著<metals(metals_gained)>和<polymers(polymers_gained)>返回。

Text: The rivals turned out to be far more aggressive and determined than you thought. After a short brawl you are forced to retreat.
Translation: 你沒想到對手決心居然如此堅定，也很能打。短暫的戰鬥後，你被迫撤退。

Text:
No serious damage was caused, but the repair and recovery time will surely allow the rival expedition to claim rights of the location.

<effect>The expedition will return with a delay.
Translation:
沒有造成什麼嚴重損傷，但在你休整期間，對手探險隊肯定會佔領該地點。

<effect>探險隊歸期將推遲。

Text: the expedition returns, the anomaly is lost
Translation: 探險隊決定返回並將異象拱手讓人。

Text: The rival expedition receives new orders from their Commander, and after a couple of hours they pack up and leave.
Translation: 對手探險隊接到了指揮中心發來的新命令，幾小時後便打包離開了。

Text:
Finally, you can explore the wonders of Mars hidden on the location.

<effect>You have gained <research(research_political)>.
Translation:
最後，你成功探索了藏在此處的火星奇景。

<effect>你獲得了<research(research_political)>。

Text:
The hassle was worth it, for the anomaly revealed unseen wonders of science and opened up a new path of thinking for your Scientists.

<effect>A new Breakthrough tech has become available.
Translation:
這些不愉快是值得的，因為異象向我們展示出了不為人知的科學奇觀，為我們的科學家們提供了新思路。

<effect>一項新突破性技術已開放。

Text:
Finally, you can explore the wonders of Mars hidden on the location.

<effect>You have gained <research(research_political2)>.
Translation:
最後，你成功探索了藏在此處的火星奇景。

<effect>你獲得了<research(research_political2)>。

Text: The rival expedition receives new orders from their Commander, and after a couple of hours they pack up and leave.
Translation: 對手探險隊接到了指揮中心發來的新命令，幾小時後便打包離開了。

Text:
The hassle was worth it, for the anomaly revealed unseen wonders of science and opened up a new path of thinking for your scientists.

<effect>A new Breakthrough tech has become available.
Translation:
這些不愉快是值得的，因為異象向我們展示出了不為人知的科學奇觀，為我們的科學家們提供了新思路。

<effect>一項新突破性技術已開放。

Text:
The colony of <DisplayName> plans to build a giant mobile colony which would slowly crawl towards resource sites, harvest them and move forward when they are depleted. Even crazier, they expect that others will follow their example and in time bigger colonies would assimilate the smaller ones.

One thing is certain: such ambitious goal cannot be accomplished in the next few hundred years.
Translation:
<DisplayName>殖民地打算建造一座巨型移動殖民地，這樣他們就能緩慢的移動到資源點所在位置，採集完畢後還能繼續移動。更瘋狂的是，他們希望其他人能效仿他們的做法，以後較大的殖民地能吸收較小的殖民地。

有一點是肯定的：這個宏偉目標要到幾百年後才能實現了。

Text: Another colony has announced some insane theory about "Mobile Colonies" and “City Darwinism”.
Translation: 一座殖民地發表了“移動殖民地”和“城市達爾文主義”一類的瘋狂理論。

Text: This is ridiculous! It just can’t work.
Translation: 這太荒唐了！不可能實現的！

Text: This is the future! We will consider starting such project.
Translation: 這就是未來！我們會考慮開始類似工程。

Text: Don’t worry! We are secretly working on such project already.
Translation: 不用擔心！我們已經在私下裡進行這項計劃了。

Text:
Some are aimed at factory and extractor workers, claiming a culture of elitism that gives Scientists, Medics and the likes privileged status within the colony.

Others are meant to agitate the same Medics and Scientists, with some clips claiming that many of the unpopular decisions the leadership of the colony has made are because of pressure put on by the factory workers.
 
Until we get all our firewalls running again, we can block only a few of the channels. Some will have to remain online for a short duration during which they can and will be watched by many colonists.
Translation:
有些影片的煽動對象的是工廠和挖掘站的工人，聲稱殖民地裡有一種精英文化令科學家、醫生這類團體享受特權。

還有一些的煽動對象卻是剛剛提到的那些醫生和科學家，聲稱殖民地領袖是因為遭到工廠工人的施壓才做出了很多不得人心的決定。

在我們的防火牆完全恢復運轉之前，我們能阻擋頻道的數量十分有限。有些頻道在短時間內將正常播出節目，這些節目會被很多殖民地居民看到。

Text: Commander, an unknown rival is streaming propaganda videos at us - videos aimed at inciting discord between several classes of colonists.
Translation: 指揮官，一個身份不明的對手正在向我們直播宣傳影片，這些影片目的是煽動殖民地居民不同階層之間的不和。

Text: We can't afford to agitate the workers in factories and extractors.
Translation: 千萬不能激怒工廠和挖掘站裡的工人。

Text: Medics and Scientists lose Morale for <sols(duration)> Sols
Translation: 醫生和科學家士氣下降，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日
Old Text: Medics and Scientists lose morale for <sols(duration)> Sols
Old Translation: 醫生和科學家士氣下降，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日

Text: The Morale in our infirmaries and labs is a top priority.
Translation: 我們應最優先考慮醫務室和實驗室的士氣。

Text: Geologists and Engineers lose Morale for <sols(duration)> Sols
Translation: 地質學家和工程師士氣下降，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日
Old Text: geologists and engineers lose morale for <sols(duration)> Sols
Old Translation: 地質學家和工程師士氣下降，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日

Text:
With so many devices found it is safe to assume that our rivals have stepped up their technological espionage game. 

Common sense dictates we close our Labs to sniff out all spy devices.
Translation:
我們找到了很多裝置，可以斷定我們的對手已經向我們全面展開了技術間諜活動。

按照常理，我們應該關閉實驗室以搜出所有間諜裝置。

Text: Worried Scientists have found spying devices in not one, but three of our labs!
Translation: 憂心忡忡的科學家們在三座實驗室裡發現了間諜裝置！

Text: I've never been a fan of common sense. The labs continue to work while the cleaning takes place.
Translation: 我向來不按常理出牌。實驗室在清理期間繼續工作。

Text: output of research buildings set to <hinder>% for <sols(duration_work_and_clean)> Sols
Translation: 研究點數產量設為<hinder>%，持續<sols(duration_work_and_clean)>個太陽日
Old Text: output of research buildings set to <hinder>% for <sols(duration)> Sols
Old Translation: 研究點數產量設為<hinder>%，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日

Text: Close all labs down and rid them of these devices.
Translation: 關閉所有實驗室，把這些裝置全部清理掉。
研究建築關閉，持續<sols(duration__clean)>個太陽日

Text:
"Live music! Low-G dancing! Masked ball and romance! Come to the Colony of <DisplayName> and experience the greatest carnival beyond Earth! Let's make Mars the god of beauty!"

You look thoughtfully at the small crowd discussing the poster. People look excited.
Translation:
“現場音樂！低重力跳舞！浪漫的化裝舞會！想要體驗地球之外最棒的狂歡節嗎？就來<DisplayName>殖民地吧！我們讓火星變成美神吧！”

你若有所思地看著正在對海報議論紛紛的一小群人。人們看起來很興奮。

Text: Another Colony is planning a grand carnival, trying to attract our Tourists.
Translation: 另一座殖民地正在策劃盛大的狂歡節，意圖吸引我們的遊客。

Text: Move along, people! We have a planet to colonize.
Translation: 大家請移步！我們還要在這顆星球上殖民呢。

Text: Nice carnival! It would be such a pity if something bad happened.
Translation: 狂歡節看起來不錯嘛！萬一出事就糟糕了。

Text: all Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_loss_sols)> Sols, -25 Standing
Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣下降<morale_loss>，持續<sols(morale_loss_sols)>個太陽日，-25聲望

Text: Let's have a carnival of our own!
Translation: 我們舉辦自己的狂歡節吧！
Old Text: Let's have a carnival on our own!
Old Translation: 我們舉辦自己的狂歡節吧！

Text: Amateurs! We'll show them what a real Carnival looks like.
Translation: 一幫門外漢！我們會讓他們見識見識什麼叫真正的狂歡節。

Text: gain <applicants_gain_high> Tourist Applicants and <applicants_gain_low> Sexy Applicants
Translation: 獲得<applicants_gain_high>名遊客應徵者和<applicants_gain_low>名性感尤物應徵者
我們來組織無人機鬥機大會吧！
失去2架無人機，獲得<applicants_gain_high>名遊客應徵者

Text:
You find leaflets spread on the ground in one of your Domes. "Are you ambitious, intelligent, well educated?", says the leaflet. "Are you familiar with computer sciences, rocket science and two foreign languages? Do you have a doctor's degree? Are you a natural leader? If the answer is YES, then GET LOST! We're hiring unqualified workers!"

The colony of <DisplayName> offers generous payment and other benefits to any of your Colonists who would like to leave your colony and start working for them.
Translation:
你發現一座穹頂內地上到處都是傳單。傳單上寫著：“你是否胸懷大志、聰明伶俐且受過良好教育？你是否熟悉電腦科學、火箭科學，並掌握兩門外語？你是否擁有博士學位？你是天生的領袖嗎？如果是，那就有多遠滾多遠吧！我們只僱傭不合格的工人！”

<DisplayName>殖民地面向你的殖民地招工，待遇優厚、福利齊全。不管是誰，只要願意離開你的殖民地為他們工作，他們就來者不拒。

Text: Another Colony is trying to steal our workers.
Translation: 一座殖民地正試圖挖走我們的工人。

Text: Everyone is free to pursue happiness for themselves and their family.
Translation: 人人都有為自己以及自己的家庭追求幸福的權利。
Old Text: They are free to go, if they want to.
Old Translation: 他們想去的話就放他們去。

Translation: 失去<workers_loss>%無專長的殖民地居民，+25聲望

Text: There is a special contractual clause that stops them from leaving.
Translation: 有特殊的契約性條款規定他們不得離開。

Text: all Colonists without specialization lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_loss_sols)> Sols, -25 Standing
Translation: 所有無專長的殖民地居民士氣下降<morale_loss>，持續<sols(morale_loss_sols)>個太陽日，-25聲望

Text: Outbid the rivals. Money solves all problems.
Translation: 開出更優厚的待遇。有錢能使鬼推磨。

Text: There is no honor among thieves.

Old Text: gain <workers_gain> Colonists without specialization
Old Translation: 獲得<workers_gain>位無專長的殖民地居民

Translation: 獲得<workers_smallgain>位殖民地居民和5個無人機預製件
Old Text: gain <workers_smallgain> Colonists without specialization and <workers_smallgain> Drone prefabs
Old Translation: 獲得<workers_smallgain>位無專長的殖民地居民和<workers_smallgain>個無人機預製件

Text:
A stolen Rover arrived from the infected colony of <DisplayName>. A colonist and a child in protective suits are holding hands in front of the airlock of one of your Domes. They look scared.

"Our colony is in chaos", they say. "Please let us in, or send help."
Translation:
從被感染的<DisplayName>殖民地開來了一輛失竊的探測車。一個殖民地居民和一名兒童穿著防護服，在你一座穹頂的氣閘外手拉手。他們看起來很害怕。

“我們的殖民地現在一片混亂，”一人說道。“請放我們進去，或派人幫幫我們。”

Text: A virulent disease is spreading in another Colony.
Translation: 一座殖民地爆發了惡性疾病。

Text: Send medical workers to help contain the outbreak.
Translation: 派出醫療工作者協助抑制疾病爆發。

Text: all Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols, -25 Standing
Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣下降<morale_loss>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日，-25聲望

Text: Accept some refugees under strict medical supervision.
Translation: 收容部分難民，並對他們進行嚴格的醫療監督。

Text: gain <workers_gain_high> Colonists, 10% of all Colonists get Chronic Condition
Translation: 獲得<workers_gain_high>位殖民地居民，所有殖民地居民中的10%患上慢性病

Text: Send Drones operated by our Medics.
Translation: 派遣由我們的醫生操控的無人機。

Text: lose 2 Drones and <workers_loss_low>% Medics, all Colonists gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
Translation: 失去2架無人機和<workers_loss_low>%醫生，所有殖民地居民士氣上升<morale_gain>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日
Old Text: lose 2 Drones and <workers_gain_low>% Medics, all Colonists gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
Old Translation: 失去2架無人機和<workers_gain_low>%醫生，所有殖民地居民士氣上升<morale_gain>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日

Text: Send trained Officers to help restore order.
Translation: 派出訓練有素的警官協助維持治安。

Text:
Our Security Officers who were sent to help the infected colony have now returned home. They have passed all medical checks and it is confirmed they are not contaminated.

Only in their eyes and harsh faces you can see the horrors they have witnessed...
Translation:
之前奉命援助被感染殖民地的警官們回家了。他們通過了所有醫學檢查，已確認他們並未受感染。

從他們的眼神和板著的臉判斷，他們肯定目睹了非常可怕的景象……

Text:
You see the daily market stats and notice an alarming trend. The Colony of <DisplayName> has started a trade war with you, flooding the markets with Rare Metals, offered at a much lower price. 

Your trade agent from Earth is worried enough to make a direct call. The 14-minutes pause until each other's words are delivered gives you enough time to think on your marketing strategy.
Translation:
你看著市場每日的動態，發現了令人不安的趨勢。<DisplayName>殖民地向你發起了貿易戰，他們正在以低得多的價格傾銷稀有金屬。

你在地球上的貿易代理人十分擔憂，直接給你打了個電話。14分鐘的通訊延遲給了你足夠的時間思考市場策略。

Text: Another Colony is selling Rare Metals at a much lower price.
Translation: 一座殖民地正在以低得多的價格出售稀有金屬。

Text: They can't keep this up for long. We can wait.
Translation: 他們這樣是搞不長久的。我們靜觀其變。

Text: Rare Metals price -25% for 20 Sols, +25 Standing
Translation: 稀有金屬價格價格-25%，持續20個太陽日，+25聲望

Text: We can organize some stock market shenanigans to press them.
Translation: 我們可以在股市上搞出點動靜打壓他們。

Text: We can work out a barter deal with our trade partners.
Translation: 我們可以和貿易伙伴們達成易貨交易。

Text: Rare Metals price -25% and advanced resources price -20% for 20 Sols
Translation: 稀有金屬價格-25%，高階資源價格-20%，持續20個太陽日

Text: Isn't that cute! We can easily dump the prices even lower!
Translation: 他們太天真了！我們可以輕輕鬆鬆把價格壓得更低！

Text: Rare Metals price -50% for 10 Sols and then +25% for next 10 Sols
Translation: 稀有金屬價格-50%，持續10個太陽日，然後在接下來的10個太陽日裡+25%

Text: No problems! China's great market will buy anything we sell!
Translation: 沒問題！不管我們賣啥，偉大的中國市場都會照單全收！

Text:
Our strategy was super successful. Our rivals couldn't keep up and now we have the upper hand.

Rare Metals price +<price_increase_small>% for 10 Sols.
Translation:
我們的計策大獲成功。我們的對手跟不上我們的節奏，現在我們佔了上風。

稀有金屬價格+<price_increase_small>%，持續10個太陽日。

Text: The markets have normalized and the prices of Rare Metals, Polymers, Machine Parts and Electronics are now as they were before the crisis.
Translation: 市場使稀有金屬、聚合物、機械零件和電子元件的價格恢復到了危機之前的正常水準。

Text:
Starvation is a constant threat on this untamed planet. The colony of <DisplayName> was coping well for a while, but recent reports estimate they can't really handle their agriculture development. 

It's just a matter of time before things get out of hand.
Translation:
在這顆蠻荒的星球上，飢餓的威脅始終揮之不去。<DisplayName>殖民地一開始處理得還不錯，但最近的報告指出他們的農業發展搞得不盡如人意。

事態失控只是時間問題。

Text: Another Colony is having trouble growing their crops.
Translation: 一座殖民地在種植作物方面出了問題。

Text: Send some of our Botanists to help. Teach a man to fish...
Translation: 派幾名我們的植物學家去幫忙。授之以漁……

Text: No one said that surviving Mars is easy. We can't spare these specialists.
Translation: 沒人說過在火星上求生很容易。恕我們無法派出這些專家。

Text: all Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols, -25 Standing
Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣下降<morale_loss>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日，-25聲望

Text: Invite over some of them. We can feed everyone.
Translation: 把他們一部分居民請過來。我們有能力給所有人提供食物。
獲得<workers_gain_low>位貪吃鬼殖民地居民

Text: Send some of our people to teach them.
lose <workers_loss>% Vegans, all Colonists gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_sols)> Sols
Translation: 失去<workers_loss>%素食主義者，所有殖民地居民士氣上升<morale_gain>，持續<sols(morale_sols)>個太陽日。

Text: Feed the hungry and help those in trouble.
Translation: 給飢餓者提供食物，給有困難者提供幫助。
獲得<workers_gain_high>位信仰者貪吃鬼殖民地居民

Text:
"Come to watch the MarsCraft Tournament LIVE! The most immersive gaming experience in the Solar system awaits you! Sponsored by the colony of <DisplayName>."

This ad runs on some of the most renowned TV channels on Earth. Your secretary is in shock that there are people willing to travel to Mars in order to live watch some stupid game.
Translation:
“來看《火星爭霸》錦標賽直播吧！整個太陽系最棒的沉浸式遊戲等你來體驗！由<DisplayName>殖民地贊助。”

這條廣告在地球上若干個最有人氣的電視頻道中播出。你的祕書驚訝萬分，居然有人就為了現場觀看愚蠢的遊戲比賽而願意飛來火星。

Text: Another Colony is organizing a large scale  gaming competition, highly anticipated by all Gamer Colonists.
Translation: 一座殖民地正在組織大規模遊戲比賽，受到了殖民地居民中游戲玩家的高度關注。

Text: Surviving Mars is not a game!
We can make our own gaming tournament!
Translation: 我們可以自己舉辦遊戲錦標賽！
獲得<workers_gain>位遊戲玩家殖民地居民，-25聲望

Text: We'll gather a team to participate and try to take the grand reward!
Translation: 我們會組建一支戰隊參賽，並努力拿下大獎！

Text: Gamer Colonists have chance to lose or gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_loss_sols)> Sols
Translation: 遊戲玩家殖民地居民的士氣有一定機率下降或上升<morale_gain>，持續<sols(morale_loss_sols)>個太陽日

Text:
Our team has played well, but we lost the MarsCraft Tournament. 
GG.

All Gamer Colonists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_loss_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
我們的隊伍表現出色，但還是沒能在《火星爭霸》錦標賽中獲勝。
GG。

所有擁有“遊戲玩家”特性的居民士氣下降<morale_loss>，持續<sols(morale_loss_sols)>個太陽日。

Text:
Our team smashed the competition and we won the grand prize of the MarsCraft Tournament!

All Gamer Colonists gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_loss_sols)> Sols.
Translation:
我們戰隊所向披靡，贏得了《火星爭霸》錦標賽的大獎！

所有遊戲玩家殖民地居民士氣上升<morale_gain>，持續<sols(morale_loss_sols)>個太陽日。

Text: We’ll make a Game Design Tournament instead!
Translation: 我們舉辦遊戲設計錦標賽吧！

Text: gain <workers_gain> Enthusiast Gamer Colonists, all Gamers gain <morale_gain> Morale for <sols(morale_loss_sols)> Sols
Translation: 獲得<workers_gain>位熱心遊戲玩家殖民地居民，所有遊戲玩家士氣上升<morale_gain>，持續<sols(morale_loss_sols)>個太陽日

Text: Let's see if they can compete with our low-G giant fighting robots competition!
Translation: 看看他們能否與我們的低重力巨型機器人大戰相抗衡！

Text: lose 3 Drones, gain <applicants_gain_high> Tourist and <applicants_gain_low> Engineer Enthusiast Applicants
Translation: 失去3架無人機，獲得<applicants_gain_high>位遊客和<applicants_gain_low>位工程師熱心應徵者

Text:
"Dear Dr. Oddlove", says an email, redirected to you by a loyal Scientist. "We have built this amazing research facility of the future! The only thing it needs is the expertise of a renowned academic like you. We cordially invite you to join us and...."

Agents from the colony of <DisplayName> have contacted some of our leading scientists with offers to join them or at least sell out our research secrets.
Translation:
“親愛的奧德拉夫博士：”這是一位忠誠的科學家轉發給你的電子郵件的開頭。“我們建造了神奇的未來研究設施！現在它只需要您這樣德高望重的科研人員的專業知識了。我們誠摯邀請您與我們一道……”<DisplayName>殖民地的代理人

聯絡了若干位我們的主要科學家，意圖把他們挖走，或至少要他們洩露我們的研究機密。

Text: Another Colony is trying to steal our Scientists.
Translation: 一座殖民地正試圖挖走我們的科學家。

Text: Okay, but there is a contractual penalty for failure to fulfill obligations.
Translation: 好吧，可合約規定，未能履行義務者將遭到懲罰。
Old Text: There is a contractual penalty for failure to fulfill obligations.
Old Translation: 合約規定，未能履行義務者將遭到懲罰。

Old Text: lose <workers_bigloss>% Scientists, gain <funding(funding_gain)>, +25 Standing
Old Translation: 失去<workers_bigloss>%科學家，獲得<funding(funding_gain)>，+25聲望

Text: See the small print on this contract? They can't leave.
Translation: 你看到這張合約上的小字了嗎？他們走不了的。

Text: all Scientists lose <morale_loss> Morale for 10 Sols, -25 Standing
Translation: 所有科學家士氣降低<morale_loss>，持續10個太陽日，-25聲望
Old Text: all Scientists lose <morale_loss> Morale for <sols(morale_loss_sols)> Sols, -25 Standing
Old Translation: 所有科學家士氣降低<morale_loss>，持續<sols(morale_loss_sols)>個太陽日，-25聲望

Text: Okay, but they must send back secret reports of their work. Mutually assured deception!
Translation: 可以，但他們必須把他們工作的祕密報告發回來。爾虞我詐！
Old Text: Mutually assured deception!
Old Translation: 爾虞我詐！

Text: lose <workers_bigloss>% Scientists, Research boost by 2% in a random field
Translation: 失去<workers_bigloss>%科學家，隨機領域的研究加速2%
Old Text: gain <research(research_gain)>, Research cost in a random field increased by 10%
Old Translation: 獲得<research(research_gain)>，隨機領域的研究消耗增加10%

Text: Send some of our Scientists as double agents.
Translation: 派幾名我們的科學家去當雙重間諜。

Text: lose <workers_bigloss>% Scientists, Research boost by 5% in a random field
Translation: 失去<workers_bigloss>%科學家，隨機領域的研究加速5%
Old Text: lose <workers_loss>% Scientists, Research cost in a random field decreased by 10%
Old Translation: 失去<workers_loss>%科學家，隨機領域的研究消耗減少10%

Text: Our Officers should be able to pass as Scientists and steal their secrets.
Translation: 我們的警官應該能偽裝成科學家並竊取他們的機密。

Text: lose <workers_loss>% Security Officers, Research boost by 3% in a random field
Translation: 失去<workers_loss>%科學家，隨機領域的研究加速3%
Old Text: lose <workers_loss>% Security Officers, Research cost in a random field decreased by 10%
Old Translation: 失去<workers_loss>%警官，隨機領域的研究消耗減少10%

Text:
This person from the colony of <DisplayName> claims to be a Messiah and a miracle-worker, gathering an increasing number of followers with each Dome visited.

Now this person decided to come to our colony and “convert it to the true faith”. The prophet wants your colonists to repent and change their wicked ways.
Translation:
<DisplayName>殖民地來的此人自稱是能創造奇蹟的彌賽亞，此人每去一個穹頂，其追隨者也越來越多。

現在此人決定來我們穹頂，並“另其皈依真正的宗教信仰”。先知要求你的殖民地居民懺悔並痛改前非。

Text: There is a religious prophet trying to convert our colonists to a new cult.
Translation: 有一名宗教先知想要我們的殖民地居民皈依新教派。

Text: Our colony respects the freedom of religious views.
Translation: 我們殖民地尊重宗教信仰。

Text: gain a Guru and <apostles_count> Religious Renegade Colonists, +25 Standing
Translation: 獲得一位導師和<apostles_count>位信仰者叛徒殖民地居民，+25聲望

Text: You shall not pass! Access denied.

Translation: 失去<religious_loss>%信仰者殖民地居民，-25聲望

Text: We will accept their teachings as our official religion.
Translation: 我們會把此人的教誨定為官方宗教。

Text: <renegades_gain>% of all Religious become Renegades, gain a Guru and <apostles_count> Religious Colonists
Translation: <renegades_gain>%信仰者變為叛徒，獲得一位導師和<apostles_count>位信仰者殖民地居民
沒人希望在火星上搞宗教法庭！

Text: gain a Saint and two Religious Colonists
Translation: 獲得一位佈道者和兩位信仰者殖民地居民
Old Text: gain a Saint and <apostles_count> Religious Renegade Colonists, lose <religious_loss>% Religious Colonists
Old Translation: 獲得一位佈道者和<apostles_count>位信仰者叛徒殖民地居民，失去<religious_loss>%信仰者殖民地居民

Text:
Communications with the rocket are purely on the machine level as attempts to establish contact with any potential crew have so far gone unanswered. As no one is making claim of ownership over the rocket and there are no visible insignia to identify its origin, we are in position to do as we wish.

Just a word of caution, in these competitive times, trickery and acts of sabotage are not above anyone - even here on Mars.
Translation:
與該火箭的通訊僅僅停留在機器層面，到目前為止仍未有火箭上的工作人員回應我們。由於無人認領該火箭，且火箭上也沒有任何表明其歸屬的標記，我們可以對其進行隨意處置。

但要提個醒，在這個競爭激烈的時代，人人都有可能耍陰謀詭計，火星上也一樣。

Old Text: Mystery Rocket
Old Translation: 神祕火箭

Text: A mystery Rocket has entered orbit and is signaling readiness to make touchdown.
Translation: 一艘神祕的火箭進入了軌道，並發訊號表示已經準備好著陸了。
Old Text: A mystery rocket has entered orbit and is signaling readiness to make touchdown.
Old Translation: 一艘神祕的火箭進入了軌道，並發訊號表示已經準備好著陸了。

Text: There may be helpless crew members onboard. Land the rocket immediately!
Translation: 火箭上的船員或許處於孤立無援狀態。立刻讓火箭著陸！
Old Text: There may be crew in helpless condition onboard. Land the rocket immediately!
Old Translation: 火箭上的船員或許處於孤立無援狀態。立刻讓火箭著陸！

Text: Observe the Rocket for a Sol or two and land it afterwards.
Translation: 先觀察一兩個太陽日再允許火箭著陸。
Old Text: Think twice, act once. Observe the rocket for a day or two before landing it.
Old Translation: 三思而後行。先觀察個一兩天再允許火箭著陸。

Text: Remember Homer’s Iliad? We are not falling for this old trick. Ignore it.
Translation: 記得荷馬的《伊利亞特》嗎？這種把戲早就過時了，我們不會上當的。無視它。
Old Text: I’ve read Homer’s Iliad as well. I am not falling for this one. Ignore it.
Old Translation: 我也讀過荷馬的《伊利亞特》。我不會上當的。無視它。

Text:
The Rocket had ten passengers on board - all pronounced dead upon examination. 

Something had damaged the Rocket just as it entered Mars's orbit and before the last of them lost consciousness from oxygen loss, they managed to send a distress call - a call we sadly ignored.

<effect>All Colonists lose Morale.
Translation:
火箭上本來有10位乘客，檢查時已全部喪命。

火箭在進入火星軌道時因不明原因受損，他們在因缺氧而昏迷之前成功傳送出了求救訊號，可惜的是我們無視了這個訊號。

<effect>所有殖民地居民士氣降低。

Text: You finally land the mystery Rocket only to reveal a gruesome scene.
Translation: 神祕的火箭終於著陸，上面的景象卻慘不忍睹。

Text: I don't know what to say...

The Rocket is unmanned. There are plenty of food supplies onboard, all of which seem to sport an odd mutation.

Thorough examination of the supplies reveal a potent disease present, most probably meant to ruin our crops. Had we landed the Rocket sooner, we probably wouldn't have detected the corruption in time.

Nothing to identify the perpetrators of what was obviously a sabotage attempt can be found inside the Rocket.
Translation:
火箭無人駕駛。上面裝有大量食物，但發生了奇特的變異。

對這些物資景象徹底檢查後，我們發現了一種很可能用來摧毀我們作物的惡性疾病。假如當初我們讓火箭早一些著陸，或許無法及時偵測到病變。

這次蓄意破壞的幕後黑手顯然不在火箭裡。

Text: You land the mystery Rocket and send an investigation team.
Translation: 你讓神祕的火箭著陸，並派出了一支調查隊。

Text: Guess we dodged a bullet there.

As they enter the rocket they find ten passengers in helpless condition but still alive. You quickly organize a rescue effort and bring the colonists to your colony for care.

Later you learn that they were meant to reach a rival colony but had suffered technical difficulties during the trip. 

Out of gratitude the rescued passengers have decided to stay with us.
Translation:
他們進入火箭時，發現10名無助的乘員，但他們還活著。你迅速組織營救並將這些居民帶回你的殖民地接受治療。

後來你得知他們原本的目的地是一座對手殖民地，但飛行途中發生了技術故障。

獲救的乘員決定留在我們的殖民地以示感謝。

Text: Immediately after landing the mystery Rocket you send a team to investigate.
Translation: 神祕火箭一著陸你就派遣隊伍前去調查。

Text: The more the merrier! Welcome to your new home!
Translation: 越多越好！歡迎來到你們的新家！

Text:
That's why everyone was so surprised to see blight affecting the crops.  The damage is extensive and will seriously lower performance of our food producing facilities until removed entirely.

After many hours of researching the nature of the mysterious plant disease its artificial nature became evident. This was nothing less than an act of sabotage against our colony.

Sadly, no clues pinpointing whom to put the blame on were found. We suspect some connection with the mysterious Rocket.

<effect>All Farms and Hydroponic Farms have lowered performance for <sols(duration)> Sols.
Translation:
所以大家看到影響我們作物的疫病才如此驚訝。損失很嚴重，我們的食物生產設施的工作效率會大幅降低，直到將疾病根除為止。

對神祕植物疾病的本質進行數小時的緊張研究後，我們發現這種病顯然是人為創造的。這完全是對我們殖民地的蓄意破壞。

可惜的事，我們找不到線索確定是誰幹的。我們懷疑此人與神祕火箭有關。

<effect>所有農場和水耕農場的工作效率降低，持續<sols(duration)>個太陽日。

Text: Food is grown in a very strictly controlled environment on Mars.
Translation: 火星上作物的種植環境處於嚴格的控制之下。

Text: Landing the Rocket was a hasty decision that we will regret for a while.
Translation: 允許火箭著陸的決定做得很倉促，我們將來會後悔的。

Text: Since nobody has contacted us and the Rocket has no insignia and all we will take advantage of this fortunate occurrence.
Translation: 由於沒人聯絡我們，火箭上也沒有任何標記之類的東西，我們就當撿了個大便宜吧。

Text: The mystery Rocket has landed, and it was filled with precious resources.
Translation: 神祕的火箭已著陸，裡面裝滿了珍貴的資源。

Text:
There are lots of food supplies inside, prepared and packaged for use on some Martian colony.

Experts examined the food and concluded everything to be in order. 

With nobody contacting us with claims over the rocket we will keep the supplies.
Translation:
裡面裝有大量加工好的食物，已經包裝完畢，供某個火星殖民地使用。

專家對食物進行了檢驗，結果一切正常。

由於沒人聯絡我們認領火箭，這些資源我們就留下自用了。

Text: You guide the Rocket's landing and send cautious investigators.
Translation: 你引導火箭著陸，並派出了謹慎的調查者。

Text: Lady luck has smiled on us today.
Translation: 今天我們得到了幸運女神的眷顧。
神祕火箭已準備好降落。
神祕火箭已準備好降落。

Text:
Looking over the basic parameters of the mission, which have been made public, you quickly come to the conclusion that their plans have significant flaws. 

From a position of experience you have a chance to influence how this new colony will fare.
Translation:
他們公開了殖民計劃的基本資料。你簡要地瀏覽了資料之後，就發現他們的計劃存在重大缺陷。

根據你積累的經驗，你可以影響這個新殖民地未來的發展方向。

Text: Somewhat late into the space race, a new Mars mission has been announced out of the blue.
Translation: 不知為何，已經到了太空競賽的後期階段，突然有個新的殖民者決定進行火星殖民計劃。

Text: They have no chance. Send a team of experts to help.
Translation: 這樣下去，他們就死定了。派一群專家幫助他們吧。

Text: send 10 experienced colonists to help the new colony out.
Translation: 派遣10位經驗豐富的殖民地居民，幫助新的殖民地發展。

Text: Wish them luck. They are going to need it.
Translation: 祝他們好運吧，只有好運才能拯救他們。

Text: the new colony fails to establish a solid foothold on Mars.
Translation: 新的殖民地無法在火星上建立穩固的立足點。

Text:
The colony of <DisplayName> has not forgotten the favor and today they send us gifts as a sign of gratitude.

Looking back, had we not sent the experienced colonists, which now occupy vital positions within their colony, they would have most certainly perished.
Translation:
<DisplayName>的殖民地並沒有忘記你的恩惠。今天，他們給我們送來了禮物，以表達他們的感激之情。

回首過去，如果當初不是我們派遣有經驗的居民，在他們的殖民地中擔當重要的官職，他們多半早就喪生了。

Text: Sometime ago, we helped a fledgling colony establish a foothold on Mars.
Translation: 之前，我們曾幫助某個尚未羽翼豐滿的殖民地在火星上站穩了腳跟。

Text: This brings a tear to the eye.
we received several Supply Pods with gifts
Translation: 我們收到了幾個補給艙，裡面裝滿了禮物

Text:
Spam mail being a rare curiosity on Mars (hoorah for the new world order) you suddenly get quite nervous but after reading through the first couple of mails you begin to calm down.

Some Scientists believe they are being followed wherever they go. They believe they will get kidnapped by rival agents because of the sensitive research they are working on. The scientists would like to boost security inside the domes as they feel the shadow actors will make their move within the next day or two.

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>] The large volume of complaints suggest there is a real cause for concern. </if>

<goal>If you accept, you must build <target> Security Stations within <sols(timeframe)> Sols.
Translation:
垃圾郵件在火星上極其罕見（新世界就是好啊），而你居然收到了，一開始還怪緊張的，但讀了幾封後，你冷靜了下來。

一些科學家相信自己無論去哪裡都有人跟蹤。他們相信自己會被對手派來的間諜綁架，因為他們正在進行的研究十分敏感。科學家們想要強化穹頂內的治安，因為他們感覺跟蹤者在在接下來的一兩天內動手。

<if(is_commander("psychologist"))>[<commander_profile>]投訴的人很多，說明這並非杞人憂天。</if>

<goal>如果你接受，你就必須在<sols(timeframe)>個太陽日內建造<target>座保安中心。

Text: Hard at work in your office, you decide to check your mail only to see that it has suddenly accumulated 200 unread messages.
Translation: 在辦公室裡忙碌的你決定看看郵箱裡為何突然出現了200封未讀郵件。
Old Text: Hard at work in your office, you decide to check your mail only to see that it had suddenly accumulated 200 unread messages.
Old Translation: 在辦公室裡忙碌的你決定看看郵箱裡為何突然出現了200封未讀郵件。

Text: Our Scientists are overworked. Dismiss the issue.
Translation: 我們的科學家們只是太累了。對此事不予重視。

Text: Better be safe than sorry. We should tighten up security.
Translation: 萬事小心勝過事後懊悔。我們應該加強治安。

Text: The large volume of complaints suggests there is a real cause for concern.
Translation: 投訴的人很多，說明這並非杞人憂天。
Old Text: The large volume of complaints suggest there is a real cause for concern.
Old Translation: 投訴的人很多，說明這並非杞人憂天。

Text:
The news came today - <scientists> of our Scientists didn't show up for work at their respective shifts.

When their colleagues tried to contact them they didn't answer and their homes were vacant. No trace of a struggle or any shred of reason behind their disappearance can be found.

You sit at your desk, staring blankly at the wall. If only you had believed them...
Translation:
今天傳來消息稱我們有<scientists>位科學家沒有上班。

他們的同時聯絡他們時，他們沒有應答，家裡也空無一人。沒有發現掙扎的跡象，我們對他們失蹤的原因完全沒有頭緒。

你坐在辦公室裡，呆呆地盯著牆看。要是當初相信他們該多好啊……

Text: Was there real reason for concern or where they just paranoid? That you may never know.
Translation: 這種擔憂有理有據嗎？還是說他們只是杞人憂天？你或許永遠也無從得知了。

Text: Two whole Sols have passed and all our Scientists are safe and sound.
Translation: 整整兩個太陽日過去了，所有科學家都安然無恙。

Text: At least things are back to as normal as they could be up here.
Translation: 至少一切儘可能地恢復了正常。

Text:
Yet, our scientists are still here. Acting embarrassed, they say they no longer feel threatened. Maybe whoever was planning the abduction has changed their mind?

We may never know.
Translation:
然而科學家們一個也沒少。他們尷尬地表示已經感覺不到威脅了。或許綁架策劃者改變主意了？

這誰也說不準。

Text: The two Sol window the scientists were worried about has passed and our security upgrade measures are incomplete.
Translation: 科學家們擔心會出事的兩天過去了，我們的安全措施升級尚未完成。

Text:
A Research Lab has been raided by unknown forces, that left a trail of dead colonists behind them. Surveillance footage goes black right at the time of the act and there are virtually no traces left behind. How they entered, or left the Dome remains a complete and utter mystery.

<effect><deathcount> Colonists were killed by rival spies.
Translation:
不明勢力襲擊了一座研究實驗室，還沿途殺害了很多殖民地居民。監控錄影在襲擊發生時突然黑畫面，沒有留下一絲證據。他們是如何出入穹頂的呢？我們至今仍百思不得其解。

<effect><deathcount>殖民地居民被對手間諜殺害。

Text: First you heard the alarms, then you saw the commotion. Then you received the call.
Translation: 你先聽到了警報聲，然後看到了騷動。之後你接到了電話。

Text: Raise the issue with Earth. There's nothing more we can do.
Translation: 把這件事交給地球處理吧。我們已經無能為力了。
所有殖民地居民士氣下降。

Text: I will give out a speech blaming all other Colonies to appease the Colonists.
Translation: 我會發表演說，譴責所有其他殖民地，以安撫民眾。
在所有對手中的聲望下降

Text:
While <DisplayName> was not employed by a rival colony, they did send all info stolen to a third party intelligence gathering firm on Earth, which in turn most probably sold the information to anyone interested.

A legal process on Earth will likely win us reparations from rivals who took advantage of the firm's services, but with <DisplayName> being a respected and senior colonist of ours, this can have devastating effects on our colony's morale.
Translation:
雖然<DisplayName>並不是其它殖民地僱傭的間諜，但這個人確實把偷來的資料轉賣給了地球上的第三方情報機構，這些資料多半已經被轉賣給了其他感興趣的買家。

如果走法律程式，這多半會提高我們在競爭對手那裡的聲望。但<DisplayName>在我們的社群中一直是位受人尊敬的高層成員，如果這件事情公之於眾，可能會對殖民地的士氣造成毀滅性的打擊。

Text: Today we learned that an upstanding member of our community has been a spy since the day they arrived on Mars.
Translation: 今天我們發現，社群中某位受人尊敬的成員其實是個間諜。從我們抵達火星的那一刻開始，他就一直在進行間諜工作。

Text: Apprehend the spy and send them to court.
Translation: 逮捕間諜，將其送上法庭。

Text: receive <funding(reperations)>, <standing> Standing with all rivals, <morale penalty> Morale for all Colonists
Translation: 獲得<funding(reperations)>，所有競爭對手處的聲望提高<standing>，所有居民的士氣<morale penalty>

Text: Limit all access they have to sensitive material and let them live out their days peacefully.
Translation: 限制此人所有接觸敏感資訊的渠道，讓他安度餘生。

Text:
The leaders of the other colonies have each contacted us with a request to grant them partial access to the Space Elevator.  

Allowing them to use it will increase our influence on Mars while allowing other colonies to advance their own economies. 

If we deny their request, it could become a point of friction.
Translation:
其他殖民地的領袖紛紛聯絡我們，請求獲得太空電梯的部分使用權。

允許他們使用可以增加我們在火星上的影響力，同時推動其他殖民地的經濟發展。

如果拒絕他們的請求，此事或許會引發摩擦。

Text: Even though there are other colonies on Mars, our Space Elevator remains unique.
Translation: 雖然火星上有其他殖民地，但只有我們擁有太空電梯。
Old Text: Even though there are other colonies on Mars, the our Space Elevator remains unique.
Old Translation: 雖然火星上有其他殖民地，但只有我們擁有太空電梯。

Text: Of course, let our brothers and sisters on Mars benefit from our success.
Translation: 好啊，讓我們火星上的兄弟姐妹從我們的成功中受益。

Text: gain standing with other colonies, boost their economy
Translation: 提升在其他殖民地中的聲望，推動他們的經濟發展

Text: Fair enough. But business is business. Charge ‘em.
Translation: 可以。不過我們得公事公辦。他們得交錢。
獲得<funding(bonus_funding)>，推動他們的經濟發展
Old Text: gain funding, boost their economy
Old Translation: 獲得資金，推動他們的經濟發展

Text: The Space Elevator is our achievement. Request denied!
Translation: 太空電梯是我們的成就。拒絕請求！
降低在其他殖民地中的聲望

Text:
This presents us with a golden opportunity to infiltrate the colony of <DisplayName> and perform both espionage and sabotage tasks. 

With the proper training, Trish Sanders can do both, however, we have to act fast.
Translation:
這是我們潛入<DisplayName>殖民地進行間諜和破壞活動的絕佳機會。

只要進行正確的訓練，特麗希·桑德斯一人能完成兩項任務，不過我們動作要快。

Text: An applicant slated to come to our colony has been listed as a desired applicant by a Rival Colony as well, obviously by mistake.
Translation: 一位計劃來我們殖民地的應徵者也在對手殖民地的接待名單裡，顯然是有人搞錯了。

Text: Send Sanders to training camp. We can't miss this opportunity.
Translation: 派桑德斯去訓練營我們不能錯過這個機會。

Text: After a hasty training and a trip to Mars, our agent has successfully infiltrated our rivals. Commence operation "Spy Games".
Translation: 我們的特工倉促地完成訓練並飛來火星後，成功的潛入了對手殖民地。開始“間諜遊戲”行動。

Text:
Agent Sanders has established a communications channel with us. Initial plans are to steal any technology deemed of value.

We are told to expect results within a few Sols.
Translation:
桑德斯特工與我們建立了通訊頻道。最初的計劃是竊取一切有價值的技術

據稱我們幾個太陽日後就能看到結果。

Text: I don't want to antagonize our already strained relationship. Pass.
Translation: 我們的關係已經很緊張了，我不想火上澆油。這次就算了。

Text: We have no idea of Trish Sander's fate. We expect that these circumstances will sour the diplomatic relations with our rivals.
Translation: 我們不知道特麗希·桑德斯的命運會如何。這種情況會令我們與對手的外交關係惡化。

Text:
All Factories broke down at once. So did our energy producers.

This looks like an act of purposeful sabotage, but there is no assailant to blame, just vague traces of malicious activity here and there.
 
Commander, there is one other thing. Agent Sanders is nowhere to be found. Her room has been swept clean, her account emptied. 

<effect>All Factories and Power Producers have malfunctioned.
Translation:
所有工廠同時發生故障。我們的發電建築也是如此。

透過各處留下的蛛絲馬跡判斷，似乎是有人蓄意破壞，但還不知道此人是誰。

指揮官，還有一件事。桑德斯特工不見了。她的房間被清掃一空，她帳戶上的錢全沒了。

<effect>所有工廠和發電建築發生故障。

Text: Commander, the entire base is an state of emergency - just within a few minutes several disastrous events crippled our colony.
Translation: 指揮官，整座基地正處於緊急狀態。短短幾分鐘裡，幾次災難性事件令我們的殖民地癱瘓了。

Text: Trish Sanders, you played us all.

A special Shuttle brought in by our sponsor picked up agent Sanders and she is now safely en route to our colony.

<effect>Agent Sanders becomes a colonist.
Translation:
我們的贊助者派了一架特別穿梭機去接桑德斯特工，她現在很安全，正在來我們殖民地的路上。

<effect>桑德斯特工變成了殖民地居民。

Text: Our agent has reached the designated escape area and activated the beacon.
Translation: 我們的特工已經到達了指定逃生區域並啟動了信標。

Text: Welcome to your new home, agent Sanders. You are a hero!
Translation: 桑德斯特工，歡迎來到你的新家！你是個英雄！

Text:
Agent Trish Sanders evaluates she is well in the clear and hasn't attracted any suspicion.

Meanwhile, a new opportunity directly presented itself - two large cargo deliveries are planned to happen the next week, with a 3 Sol gap between them.

Agent Sanders has gained access to their landing guidance software and can reroute one of the deliveries and make it look like a malfunction. Some preparation is required. The hastier the operation - the bigger the risk.

<effect>You have discovered a new tech.
Translation:
特麗希·桑德斯特工估計自己已經安全逃出且沒有引起懷疑。

與此同時，新的機遇送上門來了。按照計劃，下週會到兩大批貨，兩批貨到達時間有3個太陽日的間隔。

桑德斯特工有著陸導航軟體的使用權，可以改變一批貨的運送路線，並使其看起來像機器發生故障所致。需要做一些準備。行動越倉促，風險就越大。

<effect>你發現了新技術。

Text: Operation Spy Games has delivered its first results - a huge data package revealing a new tech to us has been sent by our agent.
Translation: 間諜遊戲行動初見成效。我們的特工向我們發來了巨大的資料包，其中包含一項新技術。

Text: Act fast and secure the first cargo shipment.
Translation: 快速行動並奪取第一批貨。

Text: Take your time and make sure everything is perfect. Secure the second shipment.
Translation: 慢慢來，確保萬無一失。奪取第二批貨。

Text: Getting caught will be disastrous. Extract the agent. Mission complete!
Translation: 被逮到就大事不妙了。疏散特工。任務完成！

Text: terminate Spy Games and bring Trish Sanders back
Translation: 終止間諜遊戲並接特麗希·桑德斯回家

Text:
This brazen act of theft has raised several flags, but our agent assesses she is still in the clear and in a good position to do real harm now.

With enough information and network access, agent Sanders can perform contained or massive sabotage operations around <DisplayName>'s colony.

Agent Sanders awaits further orders.
Translation:
這一大膽的偷竊行為引起了人們的注意，但我們的特工估計還沒有人懷疑她。她現在已經準備好造成真正的破壞了。

桑德斯特工擁有足夠的資訊和網路使用權，可以在<DisplayName>的殖民地裡進行小規模或大規模破壞行動。

桑德斯特工正在等待進一步指示。

Text: Spy Games reaps more rewards. The Supply Pods are above our colony and fully under our control.
Translation: 間諜遊戲再獲成功。補給艙已經來到了我們殖民地的上空，完全處於我們的控制之下。

Text: Make sure to do as much damage as possible. Cripple them!
Translation: 造成的破壞越嚴重越好。搞垮他們！

Text: Make the sabotage targeted and contained. Don't take any unnecessary risks!
Translation: 對特定目標進行破壞即可。不要節外生枝！

Text: smaller chance of failure, less damage done
Translation: 失敗機率較低，破壞程度較輕

Text: Our agent has done enough. Extract her!
Translation: 我們的特工做得已經夠多了。接她回來！

Text: terminate Spy Games and bring Trish Sanders back
Translation: 終止間諜遊戲並接特麗希·桑德斯回家

Text:
By sabotaging factories, the electrical grid and also pipe ways all at once, our agent has seriously hindered <DisplayName>'s progress.

Their entire colony is on heightened security alert and any further operations carry considerable risks.

This being said, agent Sanders informs us of a very valuable breakthrough technology that <DisplayName> recently researched. Better yet, the technology is within our grasp.
Translation:
我們的特工同時破壞了工廠、電網和管道，嚴重阻礙了<DisplayName>的發展。

他們整座殖民地處於安全警戒狀態，繼續執行任務將冒相當的風險。

話雖如此，桑德斯特工告知我們<DisplayName>最近研究了一項非常寶貴的突破性技術。更妙的是，這項技術我們唾手可得。

Text: Operation Spy Games continues to prove itself as an incredibly potent program.
Translation: 事實又一次證明間諜遊戲行動的收效顯著得令人難以置信。

Text: We came this far, we will go just a bit further. Steal the breakthrough!
Translation: 我們已經走到這一步了，趁熱打鐵吧。竊取突破性技術！

Text: We should quit while we're ahead. Extract agent Sanders.
Translation: 我們應該見好就收。接桑德斯回來。

Text: terminate Spy Games program and bring Trish Sanders back
Translation: 終止間諜遊戲計劃並接特麗希·桑德斯回家

Text:
We have stolen a priceless technology and have extracted agent Sanders. She should be back home in no time.

Mission complete!
Translation:
我們卻去了無價的技術並成功疏散了桑德斯特工。她應該立刻回家。

任務完成！

Text: Operation Spy Games has accomplished all it could.
Translation: 間諜遊戲行動取得了圓滿成功。

Text: Agent Sanders has joined the colony
Translation: 桑德斯特工重回殖民地

Text: Agent Sanders has been in the field for too long.
Translation: 桑德斯執行任務時間過長。

Text: agent Sanders is denied entry in your colony and is sent back to Earth
Translation: 我們的殖民地拒絕她進入，她被送回了地球。

Text:
SpyTech, the name of the firm, offers to lease us cutting edge stealthy surveillance satellites for a single thorough scan of all other colonies. To be more precise - for as thorough a scan, as we pay for.

The satellites in question are designed solely for data theft, so this may be an opportunity to get our hands on any technological advancement our rivals have discovered.
Translation:
一家名為間諜黑科技的公司提出願意租給我們一枚最先進的隱祕監控衛星，以對其他所有殖民地進行一次徹底掃描。更確切的說，掃描的徹底程度與我們付的錢掛鉤。

這枚衛星專門用來竊取資料，因此我們或許可以抓住這次機會將對手取得的技術進步佔為己有。

Text: The rivalry between colonies on Mars has attracted the attention of a spy tech agency from Earth.
Translation: 火星上各殖民地之間的競爭引起了地球上一家間諜技術公司的注意。
我們不需要這種東西。拒絕。

Text: SpyTech's swoop of Mars has ended up yielding nothing of value.
Translation: 間諜黑科技對火星掃描了一番，最後並未發現什麼有價值的東西。

Text:
We contacted them but they said the so called "bronze package" has no guarantees attached to it.

Have we been played?
Translation:
我們聯絡了他們，但他們說所謂“青銅套餐”並不承諾一定會有所發現。

我們被他們耍了嗎？
間諜黑科技的服務果然很有用。

Text: We have obtained research previously unknown to us.
Translation: 我們獲得了之前不知道的研究。

Text: At first, I thought going for the "platinum package" of SpyTech's offer was... unreasonable, to say the least. I have to admit, Commander, that it was a wise choice!
Translation: 我一開始以為購買間諜黑科技的“白金套餐”……怎麼說呢，不怎麼合理吧。指揮官，現在我得承認，你還真買對了！
Old Text: At first I though going for the "platinum package" of SpyTech's offer was... unreasonable, to say the least. I have to admit Commander, that was a wise choice!
Old Translation: 我一開始以為購買間諜黑科技的“白金套餐”……怎麼說呢，不怎麼合理吧。指揮官，現在我得承認，你還真買對了！

Text: A breakthrough has directly fallen into our possession because of SpyTech.
Translation: 在間諜黑科技的幫助下，一項突破性技術直接落入了我們手中。

Text: Bring the matter to the authorities on Earth. SpyTech is dangerous for all of us.
Translation: 把這件事告知地球當局。間諜黑科技對我們所有人來說都是個威脅。

Text: Gain 20 Standing with all Rival Colonies
Translation: 在所有對手殖民地中的聲望上升20

Text:
The damage done to <DisplayName>'s colony is extensive and many of their colonists have died from the various shortages of life support resources caused by the cold.

Despite what our relationship with the rival in question might be, our colonists have begun signing en masse a petition demanding we send financial aid to help the colony get back on its feet.
Translation:
<DisplayName>的殖民地損失慘重，寒流引起的維生資源短缺已經導致他們的很多殖民地居民喪命。

儘管我們與上述殖民地關係不怎麼樣，但我們的殖民地居民開始全體情願對他們進行經濟資助以幫助他們恢復元氣。

Text: A prolonged Cold Wave has devastated one of our rivals.
Translation: 長時間的寒流擊垮了我們的一個對手。

Text: +<morale_small> Morale for all Colonists and +35 Standing with <DisplayName>.
Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣+<morale_small>，與<DisplayName>的聲望+35
Old Text: morale boost to all Colonists and increased standing with <DisplayName>.
Old Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣上升，與<DisplayName>的聲望提高。

Text: We shouldn't belittle ourselves with petty rivalries.
Translation: 競爭只是小事，若見死不救，未免顯得我們太小心眼。

Text: +<morale_large> Morale for all Colonists and +55 Standing with <DisplayName>.
Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣+<morale_large>，與<DisplayName>的聲望+55
Old Text: morale boost to all Colonists and increased standing with <DisplayName>.
Old Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣上升，與<DisplayName>的聲望提高。

Text: We have our own woes and I doubt they would do the same for us.
Translation: 我們有自己的難處。假如換成我們身處困境我看他們未必會伸出援手。

Text: all Colonists lose Morale for several Sols
Translation: 所有殖民地居民士氣下降，持續若干個太陽日。

Text:
But they seem to be getting along quite fine with each other. To add insult to injury, there seems to be a science conference planned with ours being the only colony to not get invited.

Every rival will boast with their most qualified experts at the conference. The security will be flawed, so this could be an excellent opportunity for us to kidnap said experts.
Translation:
但他們相處得似乎還挺融洽的。更令人不爽的是，他們似乎計劃進行科學研討會，而只有我們殖民地沒有受邀。

每個對手殖民地都會派出他們最優秀的專家出席會議。保全會有漏洞，這或許是我們綁架專家們的大好時機。

Text: We don't get along with all other colonies on Mars, that's no secret.
Translation: 眾所周知，我們與火星上其他殖民地關係並不好。

Text: A kidnapping, you say? Let's do this!
kidnap some brilliant scientists and damage relations with all other colonies
Translation: 綁架一些才華橫溢的科學家，與所有其他殖民地的關係惡化。

Text: A quick plan is mustered up, involving a shuttle, several well trained colonists and a quick trip across Mars to reach the conference.
Translation: 我們很快就制定好了計劃。需要用到一架穿梭機和若干位訓練有素的殖民地居民。他們將會飛到研討會所在地點。

Text:
A few chaotic hours later you receive word that the operation was a success and they are on their way back with a few brilliant minds to add to your colony.

The Scientists are not pleased with their new situation, but we are sure they will be integrated in our Colony eventually.

Working it out with your pissed off rivals, however, is a whole other question. Let's face it, being on good terms with all of them hasn't been on the table for a while now.

<effect>Obtained 5 Genius Scientists and severely damaged relations with all rivals.
Translation:
混亂的幾小時過後，你得到消息稱行動取得了成功，他們正帶著幾名傑出的人才返回我們的殖民地。

科學家對新環境並不滿意，但他們最終肯定能融入我們的殖民地。

不過如何面對憤怒的對手們完全是另外一碼事了。面對現實吧，我們與他們的關係向來就不怎麼樣。

<effect>獲得5位天才科學家，與所有對手的關係嚴重惡化。

Text: We will never stoop so low.
Translation: 我們絕不會耍如此卑劣的手段。

Text:
When we got near the person, we noticed severe burn-like marks on their skin. They also seem to be deaf and numb because of some mysterious ailment.

All in all, they seem to be in great pain and obviously abandoned by some other colony to die alone on Mars.
Translation:
我們靠近此人時，發現其面板上有類似嚴重燒傷的痕跡。此人似乎也聽不見聲音且全身麻木，或許是因為患上了某種不可思議的疾病。

總的來說，這個人似乎承受著極大的痛苦，且顯然是遭到了某個殖民地的拋棄，現只能在火星上自生自滅。

Text: An unidentified individual has been spotted wandering the wastes near a wrecked Shuttle, wearing a space suit of an unfamiliar design.
Translation: 有人發現一個身份不明的人正在一處穿梭機殘骸附近的荒原中游蕩，此人身上太空服的式樣我們都沒見過。
Old Text: An unidentified human has been spotted wandering the wastes around one of our Domes, wearing a space suit of an unfamiliar design.
Old Translation: 有人發現一個身份不明的人類正在我們一座穹頂附近的荒原中游蕩，此人身上太空服的式樣我們都沒見過。

Text: Unidentified ailment? We can't put the colony at risk, leave them to their fate.
Translation: 不明疾病？不能讓殖民地處於危險中，讓他自生自滅去吧。
Old Text: How low are people willing to go? This is a trap, let them wander.
Old Translation: 現在的人怎麼沉淪至此？這肯定是個陷阱，我們直接無視就好。

Text: Whoever ejected this person out to die is nothing like us. Bring them in for treatment.
Translation: 把這個人拋棄在荒原中自生自滅的肯定不是什麼好人，但我們不一樣。把那人接回來進行治療。

Text:
Scans and blood samples reveal changes to their insides and DNA, changes never even theorized as a possibility before.

A cutting edge pharmaceutical research facility on Earth has expressed willingness to take on the unknown condition and send experimental drug schematics to slow down the progression of the disease at <funding(bill)> initially.

It may be worth studying the disease and aiding the stranger as long as we can in case we end up having to deal with it on a larger scale.
Translation:
掃描和血樣分析顯示此人的內臟以及DNA已發生了理論上不可能的變化。

地球上一家頂尖的製藥研究設施表示願意研究這一不明病症，並將實驗性製藥原理圖傳送給我們，以暫緩病情發展。他們初步開價為<funding(bill)>。

盡力研究此疾病並幫助這個陌生人或許是值得的，不然萬一疾病大規模蔓延就傷腦筋了。

Text: We have accepted the mysterious person at an Infirmary.
Translation: 我們已將這個身份不明者收容進了醫務室。
Old Text: We have accepted the mysterious person at an infirmary.
Old Translation: 我們已將這個身份不明者收容進了醫務室。

Old Text: Ok, pay <funding(bill)>.
Old Translation: 好吧，支付<funding(bill)>。

Text: We cannot afford this – quite regretfully.

The first batch of the custom medications seems to have had quite the uplifting effect on them. Their condition was proven to be not contagious - they are now allowed to wander the Dome at will. 

Despite still being able to see with one eye, what language the patient speaks is currently unknown - thus barring all outlets for communication short of gesturing.

Still, our colonists seem to be reacting positively to this small solace afforded to the ailing stranger.

For further research into the patient's condition the pharmaceutical lab will require another transaction of <funding(bill)> to be approved.
Translation:
第一批定製的藥物似乎對此人起到了振奮精神的作用。事實證明這種病不會傳染。我們現在允許此人在穹頂內自由行動。

我們到目前為止還沒有弄明白病人說的是何種語言，不過我們也並非完全束手無策，因為還能用做手勢的方式與其進行溝通。

不過我們的殖民地居民似乎並未因此而反感這位身體有恙的陌生人。

為了進一步研究病人的病情，製藥實驗室要我們再撥給他們<funding(bill)>。

Text: Further research into the condition of the patient has been made.
Translation: 已對病人的病情進行了進一步研究。

Old Text: Ok, pay <funding(bill)>.
Old Translation: 好吧，支付<funding(bill)>。

Text: We cannot afford to pay for the treatment anymore. I am sorry.
Translation: 我們真的無力繼續支付治療費用了。抱歉。
Old Text: We cannot afford it any further. I am sorry.
Old Translation: 我們實在付不起了。抱歉。

Text:
So far the custom drugs seem to sustain the patient in a good enough condition for them to take short walks around the Dome and even indulge in brief, enjoyable activities.

Although unable to communicate with anyone of us, there seems to be a positive aura around the patient which fills our colonists with a certain determination to become better versions of themselves.

For further research into the patient's condition the pharmaceutical lab will require another transaction of <funding(bill)> to be approved.
Translation:
到目前為止，定製的藥物似乎將病人維持在一個較為良好的狀態，病人能在穹頂內短途散步，甚至能進行短時間的娛樂活動。

病人雖然無法與我們交流，但此人似乎時刻散發著正能量，不斷激勵著我們的殖民地居民下定決心成為更好的自己。

為了進一步研究病人的病情，製藥實驗室要我們再撥給他們<funding(bill)>。

Text: Further research has been made and a new drug to extend the life of the patient is available.
Translation: 已進行了進一步研究，一種用來延續病人生命的新藥可供使用。
Old Text: Further research has been made and a new drug to extend the live of the patient is available.
Old Translation: 已進行了進一步研究，一種用來延續病人生命的新藥可供使用。

Old Text: Ok, pay <funding(bill)>.
Old Translation: 好吧，支付<funding(bill)>。

Text: We cannot afford to pay for the treatment anymore. I am sorry.
Translation: 我們真的無力繼續支付治療費用了。抱歉。
Old Text: We cannot afford the treatment any further.
Old Translation: 我們真的無力繼續支付治療費用了。

Text:
Who abandoned them here? Where did they come from? How did they get afflicted with their condition?

Their health is deteriorating rapidly, yet they go around the Dome, giving a hand to random Colonists with mundane chores. We take it this is their way of giving thanks.

Sickness and disease have more or less become a thing of the past for humanity. This is why people are reacting so strongly to the woes of this stranger and are ever more inspired by the willfulness shown despite their grim situation.
Translation:
是誰把這個人拋棄在這裡的？這個人是從什麼地方來的？又是怎麼染上病的？

病人雖然身體狀況正在迅速惡化，但依然在穹頂內四處走動，並給路上遇到的殖民地居民提供一些力所能及的幫助。我們把這視為病人感謝我們的方式。

對人類而言，疾病或多或少已經成為了過去。因此人們才對這個陌生人的處境產生如此強烈的反應。病人雖然病入膏肓但依然堅持幫助他人，這種精神深深打動了其他人。

Text: Further research has been made and a new drug to extend the life of the patient is available.
Translation: 已進行了進一步研究，一種用來延續病人生命的新藥可供使用。
Old Text: Further research has been made and a new drug to extend the live of the patient is available.
Old Translation: 已進行了進一步研究，一種用來延續病人生命的新藥可供使用。

Text:
It is becoming quite obvious that we are fighting a futile battle. We are far from understanding this condition and although we may prolong the life of the patient a bit more, a deeper understanding of the disease is still far from our reach and will remain so.

The patient is still able to walk around the Dome but will soon be submitted to the Infirmary for one last treatment. 

Despite the grand sum of money being spent on the patient to no avail, our Colonists seem to celebrate the effort done to help ease a stranger's life.

Paying for further research will prolong the life of the patient a bit further but will have no value towards discovering a cure for the mystery sickness.
Translation:
我們已經清楚地意識到在這場與病魔的抗爭中，我們大勢已去。雖然我們能在一定程度上延續病人的生命，但我們對其所患疾病的瞭解還遠遠不夠。無論是現在還是將來，想要深入瞭解這種疾病已經不可能了。

病人依然能在穹頂內四處走動，但很快就要返回醫務室接受最後一次治療。

雖然我們為治療病人而花費的巨資打了水漂，但我們的殖民地居民似乎反而在慶祝，因為我們為挽救一個陌生人的生命付出了努力。

支付資金以繼續進行研究可以讓病人再多活一段時間，但無法治好這種不可思議的疾病。

Text: Further research has been made and a new drug to extend the life of the patient is available.
Translation: 已進行了進一步研究，一種用來延續病人生命的新藥可供使用。
Old Text: Further research has been made and a new drug to extend the live of the patient is available.
Old Translation: 已進行了進一步研究，一種用來延續病人生命的新藥可供使用。

Old Text: Ok, pay <funding(bill)>.
Old Translation: 好吧，支付<funding(bill)>。

Text: We cannot afford to pay for the treatment anymore. I am sorry.
Translation: 我們真的無力繼續支付治療費用了。抱歉。
Old Text: We can no longer afford this. I am very sorry.
Old Translation: 我們實在拿不出錢了。萬分抱歉。

Text:
It seems a bug has caused  the pods' navigational software to contact our colony instead of <DisplayName>'s.

We can blatantly steal their cargo, but we certainly won't be able to feign ignorance to the fact that the Supply Pods were theirs.
Translation:
似乎補給艙的導航軟體中存在的錯誤導致它聯絡了我們，而不是<DisplayName>的殖民地。

我們可以明目張膽地竊取他們的貨物，但我們肯定沒辦法假裝不知道補給艙其實是他們的。

Text: Several Supply Pods in orbit have signaled readiness to execute guided landing procedures. The Supply Pods are not our own though - they seem to belong to one of our rivals.
Translation: 軌道上的若干個補給艙發出訊號表示已經準備好執行引導著陸程式。不過這些補給艙並不屬於我們，似乎屬於我們的一名對手。
誰找到就歸誰！把貨物弄來！

Text: get two Supply Pods and lose standing with <DisplayName>
Translation: 獲得兩個補給艙，與<DisplayName>的聲望下降

Text: Contact the rival colony and give them control of the Supply Pods.
Translation: 聯絡對手殖民地並把補給艙的控制權交給他們。

Text: Take them and blame the others for stealing pods of ours. Make noise and minimize the damage.
Translation: 收下補給艙並責怪其他人偷我們的補給艙。搞出動靜並將損失最小化。

Text: get two Supply Pods and lose less standing with all other colonies
Translation: 獲得兩個補給艙，與其他所有殖民地的聲望小幅下降

Old Text: Ark Pod<PassengerPodPriceText>
Old Translation: 方舟艙<PassengerPodPriceText>

Text: Interact with Rival Colonies and Planetary Anomalies located far from our colony.
Translation: 與遠離殖民地的對手殖民地以及行星異象互動。

Text: You can't broadcast new distress calls<newline>until Sol <sol>
Translation: 到太陽日<sol>你才能再次傳送<newline>求救訊號

Old Translation: 以<resource(number2, res2)>提供<resource(number1, res1)>

Text: Convert this Landing Pad to a Trade Pad used to facilitate exports to other Colonies.
Translation: 將此著陸點變換為用來向其他殖民地出口資源的貿易著陸點。

Text: Cannot be converted while servicing landed or inbound Rockets
Translation: 在為已著陸或即將到達的火箭提供維護時無法變換

Text: Convert this Trade Pad to a regular Landing Pad, used to service Rockets.
Translation: 將此貿易著陸點變換為用來維護火箭的普通著陸點。

Text: Cannot be converted while servicing landed or inbound Rockets
Translation: 在為已著陸或即將到達的火箭提供維護時無法變換

Text: Select a resource that's offered for export from this building.
Translation: 選擇要從此建築出口的資源

Text: ChangeCtrl + on resource Select in all
Translation: 改變Ctrl + 點選資源 選擇所有

Text: Change on resource Select in all
Translation: 改變對資源按下 選擇所有

Text: Select a resource that is asked for import in this building.
Translation: 選擇要在此建築內進口的資源。

Text: ChangeCtrl + on resource Select in all
Translation: 改變Ctrl + 點選資源 選擇所有

Text: Change on resource Select in all
Translation: 改變對資源按下 選擇所有

Text: Determines the amount of tradable resource to load.
Translation: 決定要裝載的可交易資源數量。

The following stats are summary of the expected Game development progress for the current Sol. However, game development tends to be unpredictable, so take them with a grain of salt.

以下資料顯示目前太陽日的預計遊戲開發進度。不過，遊戲開發往往充滿變數，因此不要過分依賴這些資料。
