Text: Space Race is the first expansion of Surviving Mars, introducing new sponsors, new events, rival colonies, unique buildings, vehicles, and more.
Translation: 《火星求生》的首部資料片“太空競賽”為遊戲加入了新贊助者、新事件、對手殖民地、獨特建築、載具等等內容。

Text: Multiplier to increase the amount of points to finish a TV Show.
Translation: 增加完成一個電視節目的點數乘數。
新節目播出啦！獲得資金：<funding(points)>
Old Text: <title> has been broadcasted on Earth. Funding received: <funding(points)>
Old Translation: <title>已經在地球上播出了。獲得資金：<funding(points)>

Text: Max TV Show Development Collaboration Loss (%)
Translation: 電視節目最大合作開發損失（%）

Text: Progress points needed to broadcast a new TV show
Translation: 播出新電視節目需要的進展點數
每檔電視節目的進展點數

Text: Increases Birth Rate in the Dome.
Provides medic from Earth to reduce worker slot.
Translation: 從地球提供遠程醫療協助，以減少工人欄位。

Text: Improves Service Comfort. Colonists can visit for Relaxation.
Translation: 提高服務舒適度，殖民地居民們可以在這裡放鬆身心。

Text: +<upgrade2_add_value_1> Sanity and Health recovered when colonists visit.
Translation: 有殖民地居民就診時+<upgrade2_add_value_1>理智度與生命值恢復。

Text: A little chance to generate a Genius.
Translation: 有很小的機率產生天才。

Text: Cultivates desired Perks in children using modern remote learning techniques.
Translation: 使用新式遠端培訓技術，讓兒童學會所需要的特長。

Text: Provide a very comfortable living space exclusively for Seniors. Residents will recover additional Sanity when resting.
Translation: 僅為老年人提供的非常舒適的生活空間。居民在休息時會恢復額外的理智度。

Text: Provide a very comfortable living space for Colonists. Residents will recover additional Sanity when resting.
Translation: 可為殖民地居民提供非常舒適的生活空間，居民在休息時會恢復額外的理智度。
為孩子們提供生活空間。

Text: Visitors will recover Health and Sanity as long as they are not starving, dehydrated, freezing or suffocating. A Dome with a Medical Building has lower minimum Comfort requirement for births.
Translation: 訪客在未處於飢餓、脫水、受凍或呼吸困難的情況下，會恢復生命值與理智度。擁有醫療建築的穹頂，會降低居民生育時所需要的舒適度需求。

Text: Counters crime by Renegades. Reduces Sanity loss from disasters for all residents. All Officers in the Dome will try to prevent crime events.
Translation: 可以抑制叛徒犯罪情況。降低災害對所有居民的理智度減值。穹頂中的警官會試圖阻止犯罪行為。
Old Text: Counters crime created by Renegades and reduces Sanity loss from disasters for all residents in the Dome.
Old Translation: 可以有效打擊叛徒造成的犯罪行為，並減少所有穹頂居民在災害狀態時的理智度損耗。

Text: A vocation building dedicated to the creation of TV Reality Show for the Earth folks. Workers receive Comfort and Morale boost and count towards the Workshop milestone. Generates funding and Consumes Electronics.
Translation: 專為地球人創作電視真人秀的職業建築。工人的舒適度和士氣會得到提高，工作結果會計入工坊里程碑中。產生資金，消耗電子元件。

Text: In-Dome Buildings Pack adds a medical post.
Translation: 穹頂內建築擴充包增加一個醫療站

Text: A new radio station, dedicated to the Martian song competition!
Translation: 專門舉行火星歌唱比賽的新無線電臺！

Text: Nothing makes a rover ride better than some tunes. Listen to some ambient futuristic melodic soundscapes from the comfort of your own dome with Revelation Radio.
Translation: 在探測車的旅行途中來點音樂更能讓人心情舒暢。在屬於你的穹頂中鎖定啟示錄電臺來愜意地聆聽未來風格氛圍的音樂吧。
Old Text: Revelation Radio
Old Translation: 啟示錄電臺

Text:
The Stellaris dome set is a thematic set of visual skins for the Martian domes with a futuristic design and star-shaped elements. It is available for the following domes:
- Basic Dome: A small dome, suitable for the early days of the colony.
- Medium Dome: A medium-sized dome design.
- Oval Dome: An elongated dome design, which has space for two Spires.
- Mega Dome: The most advanced and spacious dome design.
Translation:
群星穹頂套組為火星穹頂的面板合輯，充滿了未來主義感的設計和星形元素。適用於以下穹頂：
- 基礎穹頂：適合殖民早期的小型穹頂。
- 中型穹頂：中等尺寸的穹頂結構建築。
- 橢圓穹頂：經過延展的穹頂設計，可以容納兩座尖塔。
- 超大型穹頂最先進、最寬敞的穹頂結構建築。

Text: Select breedCtrl + on breed Select in all Outside Ranches
Translation: 選擇育種對準育種按Ctrl+在所有外部牧場中選擇

Text: Select breed on breed Select in all Outside Ranches
Translation: 選擇育種對準育種在所有外部牧場中選擇

Text: Select breedCtrl + on breed Select in all Ranches
Translation: 選擇育種對準育種按Ctrl+在所有牧場中選擇

Text: Select breed on breed Select in all Ranches
Translation: 選擇育種對準育種在所有牧場中選擇

Text: Animals vary in growth time, Water and Oxygen consumption, and produce different amounts of Food.
Translation: 動物的生長時間、水和氧氣的消耗量各不相同，產出食物的量也不同。

Text: The ranch is not working. The animals are dying
The ranch is not working. New animals won't be bred
Translation: 牧場未運作。無法培育新動物
Old Text: The ranch is not working. New animals won't be bread
Old Translation: 牧場未運作。無法培育新動物

Text: Chickens grow fast and have a small Oxygen and Water consumption, providing a fast and reliable Food source.
Translation: 雞生長迅速，消耗的氧氣和水較少，是快速而可靠的食物來源。

Text: Cattle consume a huge amount of Oxygen and a lot of Water over a long time, but provide Food enough to sustain an average colony.
Translation: 牛消耗大量氧氣和水，生長時間也很長，但提供的食物足以養活一座普通殖民地裡的居民。

Text: Goats don't need much of a sustenance and provide a stable supply of Food over a relatively short time.
Translation: 山羊的飼養成本不算高，能在較短的時間內穩定地提供食物。

Text: Geese consume a lot of Water and need more time to fatten, though they have a very good Food output.
Translation: 鵝消耗大量水，育肥需要較長時間，不過食物產量非常可觀。

Text: Ostriches are a great alternative of cattle, as they need less sustenance and fatten faster.
Translation: 與養牛相比，養鴕鳥也是很不錯的選擇，因為它們飼養成本更低，育肥速度更快。

Text: Pigs consume a lot of Oxygen and a huge amount of Water, but provide a lot of Food over a short time.
Translation: 豬消耗大量氧氣和巨量水，不過能在短時間內提供大量食物。

Text: Rabbits provide much better Food gain than chickens, but need more sustenance and need twice more time to grow.
Translation: 兔子產出的食物比雞多，但飼養成本更高，且生長時間是雞的兩倍。

Text: Turkeys need a lot of sustenance and time, but provide the best Food output.
Translation: 火雞飼養成本高，生長時間長，但擁有最高的食物產量。

Text: Produces Food. Consumes Oxygen and Water depending on animal type.
Translation: 可以生產食物。根據動物類型消耗氧氣和水。

Text: Produces Food. Consumes Oxygen and Water depending on animal type.
Translation: 可以生產食物。根據動物類型消耗氧氣和水。

Text: <left_click> Select new breed<newline>Ctrl + <left_click> on breed Select in all Outside Ranches
Translation: <left_click>選擇新育種<newline>對準育種按Ctrl + <left_click>在所有外部牧場中選擇

Translation: <ButtonA>選擇新育種<newline>對準育種按<ButtonX>在所有牧場中選擇

Text: Project Laika brings ranches, livestock and humanity best friends on Mars.
Translation: 萊卡計劃把牧場、牲畜和人類最好的夥伴帶到了火星。

Old Text: Animals Pack
Old Translation: 動物群

Text: Jam to surf influenced electronic instruments, analog guitars and keyboards with the Mars Lifestyle Radio Pack.
Translation: 借助火星生活包的電子儀器、電吉他和鍵盤來徜徉音樂海洋。
Old Text: Mars Lifestyle Radio
Old Translation: 火星生活無線電臺

Text: Our scans have picked up a trace of something potentially revolutionary. We should investigate this as soon as possible.<newline><newline>Send an RC Explorer to analyze the Anomaly.
Translation: 我們的掃描可能有了革命性發現。我們應該盡快調查。<newline><newline>派遣遙控探索者分析異象。

Text: Our scientists believe that this Anomaly may lead to a Breakthrough.Send an Explorer to analyze the Anomaly.
Translation: 我們的科學家認為，這個異象可能會為我們帶來突破性技術。請指派一輛探索者對異象進行分析。

Text: Scans have detected some interesting readings that might help us discover new Technologies.Send an Explorer to analyze the Anomaly.
Translation: 透過掃描，我們發現了有趣的資料，這或許有助於我們發現新技術。請指派一輛探索者對異象進行分析。

Text: Sensors readings suggest that this Anomaly will help us with our current Research goals.Send an Explorer to analyze the Anomaly.
Translation: 感應器讀數表明，該異象有助於推進我們目前的研究目標。請指派一輛探索者對異象進行分析。

Text: We have detected alien artifacts at this location that will speed up our Research efforts.Send an Explorer to analyze the Anomaly.
Translation: 這裡的外星文物可以加快我們的研究速度。請指派一輛探索者對異象進行分析。

Text: Our scans have found some interesting readings in this Sector. Further analysis is needed.<newline><newline>Send an RC Explorer to analyze the Anomaly.
Translation: 經過掃描，我們在此區域內發現了一些有趣的資料。這些資料需要進一步分析。<newline><newline>請指派遙控探索者對異象進行分析。

Translation: 此建築已出現故障。無人機可以使用<resource(maintenance_resource_amount, maintenance_resource_type)>對其進行修理。

Text: This building is frozen. It can be repaired by Drones after the Cold Wave has passed.
Translation: 此建築已被凍結。寒流結束後可用無人機進行修理。

Text: This building is frozen. Use a Subsurface Heater to heat the surrounding cold area.
Translation: 此建築已被凍結。使用地下加熱器為周邊寒冷區域供熱。

Text: This building has been disabled by an Ion Storm.
Translation: 此建築由於離子風暴而無法運轉。

Text: Defrosting. This building will need repair after it is defrosted.
Translation: 正在結凍。此建築解凍後需要修理。

Text: This building has been turned off.
This building is disabled due to exceptional circumstances
Translation: 因為一些特殊情況，此大樓已停用

Translation: 因為一些特殊情況，此大樓已損壞。無人機可以使用<resource(maintenance_resource_amount, maintenance_resource_type)>對其進行修理。

Text: This building was damaged due to exceptional circumstances.
Translation: 此建築因異常環境而受損。

Text: This building requires maintenance due to exceptional circumstances. Required resources <resource(maintenance_resource_amount, maintenance_resource_type)>.
Translation: 因為一些特殊情況，此大樓需要維護。所需資源<resource(maintenance_resource_amount, maintenance_resource_type)>。

Text: This building requires maintenance due to exceptional circumstances.
Translation: 此建築因異常環境而需要維護。

Text: Building disabled by lightning strike. Will resume work in several hours.
Translation: 由於被閃電擊中而無法運作。會在幾個小時後自動恢復。

Text: There are no exploitable deposits in range
Translation: 範圍內沒有可挖掘的資源點

Must be connected to a Power producer

Translation: 您需要建造更多保安中心，打擊穹頂內的叛徒犯罪行為。

Text: We can't exploit this deposit with our current technology
Translation: 目前技術無法開發該資源點

Translation: 正在拆除之前等待儲存的資源被運出。

Text: This building is being converted to a Prefab.
Translation: 這棟建築正在轉為預製件。

Text: The total consumption of the Dome and all buildings inside is indicated in the infopanel. Individual consumption of the Dome is in parentheses. Red text indicates that the required resource is not provided.
Translation: 您可以在資訊面板中，查看穹頂及內部所有建築的總資源消耗量。括號內為穹頂單獨的消耗量。紅字代表缺乏所需的資源。

Text: Current consumption of this building is indicated in the infopanel. Red text indicates that the required resource is not provided.
Translation: 您可以在資訊面板中，查看此建築的單獨資源消耗量。紅字代表缺乏所需的資源。

Text: The Power consumption of this building is increased by due to low temperature.
Translation: 由於溫度過低，該建築的電力消耗增加。

Text: Orbital sensor have detected strange readings on these coordinates.
Translation: 軌道感應器在這些座標偵測到了怪異讀數。

Text: After analyzing complex data, our scientists have suggested an expedition to this area.
Translation: 我們的科學家們分析完複雜的資料後，建議派探險隊前往該區域。

Text: We have identified strange spectrographic readings on this location.
Translation: 我們在此地點發現了奇特的攝譜讀數。

Translation: 在此地點偵測到了不尋常的物理異象。

Translation: 位於地下深處的金屬資源點。可以讓殖民地居民操作金屬挖掘站進行挖掘。

Text: Excess power, water and oxygen can be sent through the elevator between the surface and underground.

Text: Scattered Polymers. Harvested by Drones or RC Transports.
Translation: 零散的聚合物，由無人機或遙控運輸車開採而得。

Text: A Regolith-rich terrain that can be processed into Concrete. Can be exploited by a Concrete Extractor.
Translation: 富含風化層的土壤，可以加工成為混凝土。可以透過混凝土挖掘站進行挖掘。

Translation: 建造區域超出了殖民地邊界。

Text: Must be placed under a functioning Dome.
Translation: 必須放置在執行的穹頂下。

Translation: 禁止在叛變穹頂內進行建造。

Cannot be placed at this location due to height constraints.

Text: Must be placed adjacent to the farm or its fields.
Translation: 必須放置在農場或田地附近。

Translation: 沙塵暴期間，火箭無法降落。

Translation: 通道的起止點必須都在穹頂中

Translation: 通道的起止點必須位於不同穹頂。

Translation: 選擇距離較近的兩個穹頂，將通道首尾兩端分別安置在兩個穹頂內的空格處，即可將兩個穹頂連接起來。

Text: Project area covers too many hexes, or has become too wide.

Translation: 工程區域超出了殖民地邊界

Translation: 地形改造工程。無人機會用多餘的土壤製造礦渣或用礦渣抬高地形。

Text: The construction site is being cleared.
The ramp must connect two terraces.
Translation: 坡面必須連接兩處階地

Text: Landscaping project. Drones will gradually change the underlying surface towards the desired texture.
Translation: 地形改造工程。無人機會把下方地形材質逐漸變成想要的樣子。

Text: Life support grid parameters. Water and Oxygen are consumed only when demanded.<newline>
Translation: 生命供給供應網參數。水和氧氣只有在需要時才會消耗。<newline>
充電時最大水資源消耗
放電時最大水資源產能

Text: Drone Hub overloaded. Not enough drones to handle all tasks - construct more drones.
Translation: 無人機中心任務過載。沒有足夠的無人機處理全部任務，請建造更多無人機。

Text:
Surviving Mars is a sci-fi city builder about colonizing Mars and surviving the process. Choose a sponsor for resources and financial support before landing on the surface. Build domes and infrastructure, research new possibilities and utilize drones to maintain your colonies functions. Cultivate your own food, mine minerals or just relax by the bar after a day’s work. Most important of all, keep your colonists alive.
 
There will be challenges to overcome. Are you ready? Mars is waiting for you.
Translation:
《火星求生》是科幻風格的城市建築遊戲。玩家需要在火星上建立殖民地，讓殖民地居民順利存活。在降落到火星之前，您需要選擇一位贊助者，以獲得資源與財政支援。您需要建造穹頂與基礎設施，研究新技術，使用無人機維持殖民地的正常執行。您還需要自行種植食物、開採礦物，或在一天的工作結束之後，去酒吧放鬆一下。最重要的是，要保證殖民地居民們安然無恙。

您需要克服一系列挑戰。您準備好了嗎？火星在等著您。

Text: Collected all remaining Surviving Mars trophies
Translation: 已搜集所有火星生存獎盃

Old Translation: 按住<blue><keyboard_key></blue>來轉動視角

Text: Use mouse to zoom in / out
Old Text: Use mouse <blue><mouse_scroll></blue> to zoom in / out
Old Translation: 使用滑鼠<blue><mouse_scroll></blue>來進行縮放

Text: Funding earned for each Tech researched
Translation: 從每項研究的技術中獲得的資金

Text: Funding earned for each Breakthrough Tech researched
Translation: 從每項突破性研究技術中獲得的資金

Text: Applicants earned for each Breakthrough Tech researched
Translation: 從每項突破性研究技術中獲得的應徵者

Text: Number of initially available Techs to research
Translation: 最初可供研究的技術數量
賦予殖民地居民的特性
每太陽日的額外研究點數
增加每個火箭可運載的最大居民數量

Text: Failed to load tracks for radio <radio>: <err>
Give command to move or interact with objects.
Translation: 下達移動或與物件互動的命令。

Text: Assign to target Hub, Commander, Rocket or Elevator.
Translation: 指派到目標中心、指揮車、火箭或電梯。

Text: Assign these Colonists to a residence, workplace or training building. The Colonists will not change assignment for the next 5 Sols. If the target building is in another Dome located far away, a shuttle may be needed to reach it.
Translation: 派這些殖民地居民前往住宅、崗位或訓練建築。在接下來的5個太陽日內，居民不會變更指派內容。如果目標位於較遠的遠處穹頂內，居民可能需要乘坐穿梭機前往目的地。

Old Text: <left_click> Cancel construction
Old Translation: <left_click> 取消建造

Old Text: <left_click> Salvage
Old Translation: <left_click>回收

Old Text: <left_click> Cancel Salvage
Old Translation: <left_click>取消回收

Old Text: Deactivate Ctrl + Deactivate all
Old Translation: 關閉 Ctrl+ 關閉全部

Old Text: Activate Ctrl + Activate all
Old Translation: 啟用 Ctrl+ 啟用全部

Text: "I am putting myself to the fullest possible use, which is all I think that any conscious entity can ever hope to do."<newline><right>- HAL 9000
Translation: “我希望能充分發揮自己的用處。我認為，這是每個有意識的實體都希望的事情。”<newline><right>  - 哈爾 9000

Text: "Science is no more than an investigation of a miracle we can never explain, and art is an interpretation of that miracle."<newline><right>- Ray Bradbury
Translation: “科學只不過是在調查我們永遠無法解釋的奇蹟，而藝術就是對這個奇蹟的詮釋。”<newline><right> - 雷·布萊伯利

Text: Black. Cube-shaped. Just standing there, challenging our preconceptions.
Translation: 黑色。立方體。它就立在那裡，挑戰著我們現有的見解。

Text: "Two possibilities exist: either we are alone in the Universe or we are not. Both are equally terrifying."<newline><right>- Arthur C. Clarke
Translation: “有兩種可能：我們可能是宇宙中唯一有智慧的生命體，也可能不是。無論哪一種，都非常可怕。”<newline><right> - 阿瑟· C ·克拉克

Text: A mysterious alien object which seems to excavate landmass from the Martian surface.
Translation: 神祕的外星物體，似乎可以用來挖掘火星表面的土壤。

Text: "Seize the time... Live now! Make now always the most precious time. Now will never come again."<newline><right>- Jean-Luc Picard
Translation: “抓緊時間……把握現在！珍惜眼下的一分一秒。逝去的時間永遠不再。”<newline><right> - 讓·呂克·皮卡德

Text: "The saddest aspect of life right now is that science fiction gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom."<newline><right>- Isaac Asimov
Translation: “現代生活中最悲哀的是，科幻小說吸收知識的速度，遠比人類社會吸收智慧的速度更快。”<newline><right> - 艾薩克·阿西莫夫

Text: "Never fire a laser at a mirror."<newline><right>- Larry Niven
Translation: “絕對不要對著鏡子發射鐳射。”<newline><right> - 拉里·尼文

Text: Too far from any Drone commander.
Translation: 距離無人機指揮中心過遠。

Text: No Accumulator with stored Power in range.
Translation: 範圍內沒有儲存電力的蓄電池。

Text: The necessary technology hasn't been researched.

"The worst pandemic in modern history was the Spanish flu of 1918, which killed tens of millions of people. Today, with how interconnected the world is, it would spread faster."<newline><right>- Bill Gates
Translation: “近代史上最嚴重的流行病是1918年的西班牙大流感，那場流感造成數千萬人死亡。如今世界的聯絡變得更加緊密。那場流感如果發生在現在，傳播速度會變得更快。”<newline><right> - 比爾·蓋茨

Text: Medicine preventing the Wildfire infection from destroying its host and from spreading to other humans.
Translation: 這種藥物可以防止野火感染病毒殺害宿主，防止病毒傳播到其他人類身上。

Text: Stores the cure for the Wildfire infection.
Translation: 用來儲存野火感染病的治療藥劑。

Text: "It isn't all over; everything has not been invented; the human adventure is just beginning."<newline><right>- Gene Roddenberry
Translation: “探索並沒有結束，並不是所有的東西都已經被發明出來了。人類的冒險才剛剛開始。”<newline><right>- 吉恩·羅登貝瑞

Text: "Mankind must put an end to war before war puts an end to mankind."<newline><right>- John F. Kennedy
Translation: “人類必須消滅戰爭，否則戰爭就會消滅人類。”<newline><right> - 約翰· F ·肯尼迪

Old Text: RC Rover
Old Translation: 羅韋爾

Old Text: Sanches
Old Translation: 桑切斯

Translation: 亞歷山大·瑟夫切夫斯基
康斯坦汀·康斯坦汀諾夫
亞沃爾·卡拉斯托夫斯基
尼古拉斯·克里斯蒂安森

Text: Reveals underground deposits in the scanned area.
Translation: 在掃描區域中發現地下資源點。
Old Translation: 可以顯示掃描區域內是否含有地底資源。

Text: Immediately scans a Sector for deposits and Anomalies.<DeepScanWarning><newline><newline>Available Orbital Probes<right><NumProbes>
Translation: 立刻掃描目標區域，獲得資源點與異象相關資訊。<DeepScanWarning><newline><newline>可用的軌道探測器<right><NumProbes>

Text: Deep scanning of the Sector is not possible with the current technology
Translation: 目前技術無法深層掃描該地區

Text: Immediately scans a Sector and the four adjacent Sectors for deposits and anomalies.<DeepScanWarning><newline><newline>Available Orbital Probes<right><NumProbes>
Translation: 立刻掃描一塊區域和與其鄰近的四塊區域，以發現資源點和異象。<DeepScanWarning><newline><newline>可用的軌道探測器<right><NumProbes>

Text: This Passage is fractured and is losing oxygen.<newline><left>Number of fractures<right><fractures><newline><left>Cost of repairs<right><polymers(number)>
Translation: 這條通道出現裂縫，氧氣正在洩漏。<newline><left>裂縫數量<right><fractures><newline><left>修理費用<right><polymers(number)>
警告：濾光器模組被棄用。

Text: There aren't any available Rockets to send on a Trade or Scientific Expedition. You will need a Rocket landed on Mars to perform this action.
Translation: 無可派遣的火箭供貿易或科學探險隊使用。需要一枚降落在火星上的火箭才能執行此操作。
Old Text: There aren't any available rockets to send on an Expedition.
Old Translation: 無可派遣的火箭供探險隊使用。

Text: Go to Resupply View to request a Rocket from Earth (you will still have to setup the Expedition later)
Translation: 前往重新補給查看並向地球申請一枚火箭（之後你仍需要設定探險隊）
Old Text: Buy Rocket
Old Translation: 購買火箭

Text: The Rocket assigned to this special project will be lost. Are you sure that you want to do this?
Translation: 將失去指派給此特殊工程的火箭。是否確定繼續執行？
正在從對手殖民地返回

Text: Are you sure you want to cancel this expedition?
Translation: 是否確定取消此次探險？

Text: The patron country or organization standing behind the Mars mission. Grants funding, research and other benefits to colony.
Translation: 贊助火星探索任務的機構，可能是國家或個人企業。他們可以為您提供資金支援、科學研究以及各種加成效果。

Text: The mission commander grants various benefits to the colony.
Translation: 負責任務的指揮官，可以讓您的殖民地獲得額外加成。

Text: This is an aesthetic choice that has no effect on gameplay.
Translation: 只影響外觀，對遊戲本身沒有影響。

Text: Select an active storyline for this playthrough.
Translation: 選擇此次遊戲的主要任務線。

Text: Chooses a random mystery, preferably one you have not played yet.
Translation: 選擇一個隨機的謎團，最好是你還沒有玩過的。

Text: Select game rules you want to activate for this playthrough.
Translation: 選擇在本輪遊戲中您想使用的遊戲規則

Old Text: Commanfer Profile:
Old Translation: 指揮官履歷：

Translation: 自動固定罕見殖民地居民

Text: A drone is on the way to repair this building.
Translation: 一架無人機正在趕來維護這座建築。

Text:
The condition of buildings deteriorates over time. Martian dust and disasters contribute to deterioration of outside buildings. Deteriorated buildings will need to be serviced by a Drone and supplied with their required maintenance resource or they will malfunction.<EasyMaintenanceText(true)><newline><newline>Current deterioration<right><percent(MaintenanceProgress)><newline><left>Last serviced<right><LastMaintenance>
<MaintenanceText>
Translation:
建築的整體狀況會隨著時間推移而不斷老化。火星上的塵土和自然災害會加速建築老化的過程。老化的建築需要無人機攜帶所需的資源進行維護，否則就會出現故障。<EasyMaintenanceText(true)><newline><newline>目前老化程度<right><percent(MaintenanceProgress)><newline><left>上次維護<right><LastMaintenance>
<MaintenanceText>

Text: <FieldDescription><newline><newline>To unlock, research more technologies in this field or use the Explorer rover to analyze anomalies.
Translation: <FieldDescription><newline><newline>想要解鎖技術，您可以進一步研究該領域的技術，或者使用探測車來分析異常情況。

Text: Queue for researchCtrl+ Queue on top
<left><ButtonA> Queue for research<right><RightTrigger><ButtonA> Queue on top
Aggregated information for all resources in the Colony.
Translation: 殖民地所有資源的匯總資訊。
上次出口<right>太陽日<day>，小時<hour><newline><left>出口稀有金屬<right><preciousmetals(amount)>

Text: Power, Water and Oxygen are distributed via Power and Life Support grids.<newline>
Translation: 電力、水和氧氣透過電力與生命維持網進行分配。<newline>

Text: Basic resource production, consumption and other stats from the last Sol. Resources in consumption buildings are not counted towards the total available amount. Resource maintenance is estimated per Sol.
Translation: 上一個太陽日基礎資源的生產、消耗與其他資料。消耗性建築消耗的資源不計入可用總量之內。資源維護為估值，單位為每太陽日。
Old Text: Basic resource production, consumption and other stats from the last Sol, unless otherwise stated. Resources in consumption buildings are not counted towards the total available amount. Resource maintenance is estimated per Sol.
Old Translation: 在不另作說明的情況下，指的都是上一個太陽日基礎資源的生產、消耗與其他資料。消耗性建築消耗的資源不計入可用總量之內。資源維護為估值，單位為每太陽日。

Text: Advanced resource production, consumption and other stats from the last Sol. Resources in consumption buildings are not counted towards the total available amount. Resource maintenance is estimated per Sol.
Translation: 上一個太陽日高階資源的生產、消耗與其他資料。消耗性建築消耗的資源不計入可用總量之內。資源維護為估值，單位為每太陽日。
Old Text: Advanced resource production, consumption and other stats from the last Sol, unless otherwise stated. Resources in consumption buildings are not counted towards the total available amount. Resource maintenance is estimated per Sol.
Old Translation: 在不另作說明的情況下，指的都是上一個太陽日高階資源的生產、消耗與其他資料。消耗性建築消耗的資源不計入可用總量之內。資源維護為估值，單位為每太陽日。

Text: Other resource production, consumption and stats from the last Sol. Resources in consumption buildings are not counted towards the total available amount.
Translation: 上個太陽日其他資源的產量、消耗量和統計資料。消耗性建築消耗的資源不計入可用總量之內。

Text: Perks are beneficial traits, representing various talents and abilities of your Colonists.
Translation: 特長為有益特性，代表了殖民地居民的各種天賦和能力。

Text: Flaws are Detrimental traits, representing various flaws and disabilities of your Colonists.
Translation: 缺點為有害特性，代表了殖民地居民的各種缺陷和短板。

Text: Rare traits denote exceptional citizens that have significant impact on your Colony.
Translation: 部分居民擁有稀有特性，稀有特性會對殖民地產生重大影響。

Old Text: Homeless colonists: <colonist(number)>
Old Translation: 無家可歸的居民：<colonist(number)>

Text: Inspect all homeless colonists in the Command Center.
Translation: 在指揮中心內檢查所有無家可歸的居民。
目前沒有無家可歸的居民。

Old Text: Unemployed colonists: <colonist(number)>
Old Translation: 失業的居民：<colonist(number)>

Text: Inspect all unemployed colonists in the Command Center.
Translation: 在指揮中心內檢查所有失業的居民。

Text: Inspect all colonists suffering from status effects in the Command Center.
Translation: 在指揮中心內檢查所有受狀態效果影響的居民。

Text: There are no colonists suffering from status effects.
Translation: 目前沒有受狀態效果影響的居民。

Text: A pile of processed resources, available for your Drones.
Translation: 一堆處理過的資源，可用於無人機。

Old Text: Low on resource:
Old Translation: 資源過低：

Old Text: Low on resources:
Old Translation: 資源過低：

Old Text: Resources are low
Old Translation: 資源短缺

Text: Stored resources expected to last less than 3 Sols.
Translation: 儲存的資源預計可以維持不到3個太陽日。

Text: Investigating the origin of the Black Cubes
Translation: 調查黑色立方體的起源

Text: Prefabricated parts needed for the construction of certain buildings on Mars.
Translation: 在地球預先建置好的裝置，免去在火星採集資源進行建造的麻煩。

Text: Remote Controlled vehicles that have been designed to perform various tasks.
Translation: 為執行各種任務而設計的遙控載具。

Text: Inhabitants of the Mars colony. Specialized in a variety of fields.
Translation: 火星殖民地的居民。專精的領域各異。

Text: Can call a Passenger Rocket only once.
Translation: 只能呼叫一次客運火箭。
Old Translation: 只能呼叫一次客運火箭。

Text: <SponsorDisplayName> has to make sure the Colony is sustainable before allowing more Colonists to come to Mars. Make sure the Founders are supplied with Water, Oxygen, and Food for 10 Sols after they arrive on Mars.
Translation: <SponsorDisplayName>需要考察殖民地是否擁有足夠的條件來接納更多的火星殖民者。請確保創始者在到達火星後的10個太陽日內，擁有足夠的水、氧氣和食物供應。

Text: The game can not be loaded because some required downloadable content is not installed.
Translation: 遊戲無法載入，因為一些必要的下載內容沒有安裝。

Text: This savegame is from an old version and may not function properly.
Translation: 這個存檔來自舊版本，可能無法正常使用。

<if(mods)>The following mods are missing or incompatible:

Text: This savegame was loaded in the past without required mods or with an incompatible game version. It may not function properly.
Translation: 目前存檔為之前載入，並未提供所需模組，或可能與目前遊戲版本不相容。目前遊戲可能無法正常執行。
處於工作年齡的殖民地居民
持續時間（僅用於士氣，永久 -1）
從可建造的檢查中排除類別
隨機位置標籤最遠距離

Text: Stored pos is of spot name?
Translation: 儲存的位置是地點名稱？
在暫存器儲存生成目標

Old Text: Check Terran Deposit

Text: g_RefugeeOutcome[id] will be either 'success' or 'timeout' after this.
Translation: g_RefugeeOutcome[id] 將為“成功”或是“超時”。

Text: Periodically validates the context of the OnScreenNotification (only used when start_minimized == true)
Translation: 定期檢查螢幕通知的情境（僅在start_minimized = true時使用）

Text: This is translatable text, ref as text_param1 in the body
Translation: 這是可譯文字，在文字主體中的引用為 text_param1

Text: This is translatable text, ref as text_param2 in the body
Translation: 這是可譯文字，在文字主體中的引用為 text_param2

Text: This is translatable text, ref as text_param3 in the body
Translation: 這是可譯文字，在文字主體中的引用為 text_param3

Text: This is a register name, ref as reg_param1 in the body
Translation: 這是暫存器名稱，在主體中的引用為reg_param1

Text: This is a register name, ref as reg_param2 in the body
Translation: 這是暫存器名稱，在主體中的引用為reg_param2

Text: This is a register name, ref as reg_param3 in the body
Translation: 這是暫存器名稱，在主體中的引用為reg_param3

Text: A trained scientist, eager to discover the mysteries of the Cosmos.
Translation: 訓練有素的科學家，渴望探索宇宙的奧祕。

Text: A trained engineer, building a better future for humanity.
Translation: 訓練有素的工程師，願意為人類創造更美好的未來。

Text: A trained security officer, protecting our Utopia.
Translation: 受過訓練的安全警察，可以保護我們的烏托邦。

Text: A trained geologist, securing vital resources for the Colony.
Translation: 訓練有素的地質學家，可為殖民地獲取重要的資源。

Text: A trained medic, facing new challenges on the red planet.
Translation: 訓練有素的醫務人員，隨時面對火星上的新挑戰。

Text: A trained botanist, dreaming of a green Mars.
Translation: 訓練有素的植物學家，渴望將火星變為綠意盎然的星球。
會隨著時間推移不斷損失生命值。

Text: This Colonist is a Renegade. Renegades will cause trouble, unless countered by Security Stations.
Translation: 這位殖民地居民是個叛徒。如果沒有受到保安中心限制，叛徒會惹出麻煩。
Old Text: This Colonist is a Renegate. Renegates will cause trouble, unless countered by Security Stations.
Old Translation: 這位殖民地居民是個叛徒。如果沒有受到保安中心限制，叛徒會惹出麻煩。

Text: This Colonist is infected and will lose Health over time.
Translation: 這位殖民地居民受到了感染，會不斷損失生命值。

Text: This Colonist is irradiated and will lose Health over time.
Translation: 這位殖民地居民受到了輻射，會不斷損失生命值。

Text: This Colonist is suffocating and needs Oxygen to survive.
Translation: 這位殖民地居民呼吸困難，需要氧氣才能生存。

Text: This Colonist is dehydrated and needs Water to survive.
Translation: 這位殖民地居民已經脫水，需要水資源才能生存。
Old Text: This Colonist is suffocating and needs Water to survive.
Old Translation: 這位殖民地居民呼吸困難，需要水資源才能生存。

Text: This Colonist is freezing. Restore Dome Power to resolve the issue.
Translation: 這位殖民地居民正在受凍，恢復穹頂電力即可解決這個問題。

Text: This Colonist is starving and needs Food to survive.
Translation: 這位殖民地居民正在挨餓，需要食物才能生存。
Old Text: This Colonist is suffocating and needs Food to survive.
Old Translation: 這位殖民地居民呼吸困難，需要食物才能生存。

Text: This Colonist is stressed out due to low Sanity and temporarily unable to work.
Translation: 這位殖民地居民理智度過低，處於焦慮不安狀態，暫時無法工作。

Text: This Colonist is Earthsick due to low comfort. Earthsick colonists can't work and will try to return to Earth.
Translation: 殖民地居民由於舒適度過低，患上了思鄉病。患思鄉病的居民無法工作，而且會嘗試返回地球。

Text: This Colonist is suffocating and would have needed Oxygen to survive if not for the Iron Colonists rule.
Translation: 如果不符合堅強殖民地居民規則，這位殖民地居民呼吸困難，需要氧氣才能生存。

Text: This Colonist is dehydrated and would have needed Water to survive if not for the Iron Colonists rule.
Translation: 如果不符合堅強殖民地居民規則，這位殖民地居民已經脫水，需要水資源才能生存。
Old Text: This Colonists is dehydrated and would have needed Water to survive if not for the Iron Colonists rule.
Old Translation: 如果不符合鐵殖民地居民規則，這位殖民地居民已經脫水，需要水資源才能生存。

Text: This Colonists is starving and would have needed Food to survive if not for the Iron Colonists rule.
Translation: 如果不符合堅強殖民地居民規則，這位殖民地居民正在挨餓，需要食物才能生存。

Text: Collecting minimum Water flow. Will start supplying the grid at
Translation: 正在搜集最低額度的水資源。將在開始供給供應網。

Text: Collecting minimum Oxygen flow. Will start supplying the grid at
Translation: 正在搜集最低額度的氧氣資源。將在開始供給供應網。

Text: Charging. Requires minimum to start supplying the grid
Translation: 正在充電。需要至少才可以開始供給供應網

This section of the grid has malfunctioned and it's now leaking. It can be repaired by Drones for <metals(number)>.

Larger networks will malfunction more often.

規模較大的區域網路更容易出現故障。

Text: Trying to modify a non-modifiable property.

Changing modifier outside of a running game.

Text: Colonists with ANY of the must include traits will prefer this , regardless of their undesired traits.Colonists with MORE of the desired traits will prefer this .Colonists with ANY of the undesired traits will leave, provided there is available living space elsewhere.Colonists can walk to closely positioned but will need Shuttles to reach distant .
Translation: 擁有更多所需特性的殖民地居民將會更樂於居住在這個穹頂內。只要附近擁有其它可居住的空間，擁有任何不需要特性的殖民地居民都將會離開這個穹頂。殖民地居民可以步行到較近的穹頂，但較遠的穹頂則需要穿梭機才能前往。
Old Text: Colonists with ANY of the must include traits will prefer this Dome, regardless of their undesired traits.Colonists with MORE of the desired traits will prefer this Dome.Colonists with ANY of the undesired traits will leave, provided there is available living space elsewhere.Colonists can walk to closely positioned Domes but will need Shuttles to reach distant Domes.

Text: Applicants with ANY of the must include traits will board the Rocket before those with desired traits, regardless of their undesired traits.Applicants with MORE of the desired traits will board the Rocket.Applicants with ANY of the undesired traits will be rejected.
Translation: 擁有更多所需特性的申請人將會登上火箭。擁有任何不需要特性的申請人將會被拒絕。
Old Text: Applicants with MORE of the desired traits will board the Rocket.Applicants with ANY of the undesired traits will be rejected.

Text: Colonists are divided into five Age Groups. Children and seniors cannot work.
Translation: 殖民地居民分為五個年齡組。兒童和老年人無法工作。

Text: Specialized Colonists perform better at certain workplaces.
Translation: 有專長的殖民地居民，在特定工作場所表現會更加出色。

Text: The sex of the Colonist. The birth rate in any Dome is determined by the number of Male/Female couples at high Comfort.
Translation: 殖民地居民的性別。穹頂的生育率取決於舒適度高的男性/女性夫妻數量。

Text: Beneficial traits, representing various talents and abilities of the Colonist.
Translation: 有益特性，代表了殖民地居民的各種天賦和能力。

Text: Detrimental traits, representing various flaws and disabilities of the Colonist.
Translation: 有害特性，代表了殖民地居民的各種缺陷和短板。

Text: Traits that don't fit into any of the other groups.
Translation: 無法融入其他任何群組的特性。

Old Translation: 群山環繞

Text: Metals and Rare metals. Metals are important for field buildings while Rare Metals are exported to Earth and used in the production of Electronics.
Translation: 金屬和稀有金屬。金屬是室外建築的重要材料，而稀有金屬則多被運輸至地球，用於製造電子元件。

Text: Polymers are used in the construction of many Colony buildings, especially in asteroid specific facilities.
Translation: 聚合物常用於建造殖民地建築，尤其是在小行星專用設施。

Text: Concrete is used in the construction of many Colony buildings, especially in the interior of the Domes.
Translation: 混凝土常用於建造殖民地建築，尤其用來建造穹頂內部建築。
Old Text: Concrete is used in the construction of many Colony buildings, especially in the interior of the Domes
Old Translation: 混凝土常用於建造殖民地建築，尤其用來建造穹頂內部建築。

Text: Most vital resource for sustaining humans on Mars. Water can be extracted from deposits using Water Extractors.
Translation: 水資源是火星居民維繫生命所需的重要資源。水資源可透過用水資源挖掘站從資源點獲取。
Old Text: Most vital resource for sustaining humans on Mars. Water can be extracted from deposits using prefab Moisture Vaporators transported from Earth
Old Translation: 水資源是火星居民維繫生命所需的重要資源。您可以從地球上購買水氣蒐集站預製件，在火星上建造蒐集站，獲得水資源。

Text: Rare Metals can be exported by refueled Rockets that return to Earth, increasing the Funding for the Colony. They are also used for creating Electronics.
Translation: 您可以將稀有金屬透過火箭出口至地球，增加殖民地的資金。稀有金屬同樣可以用來製造電子元件。
Old Text: Rare Metals can be exported by refueled Rockets that return to Earth, increasing the Funding for the Colony. They are also used for creating Electronics
Old Translation: 您可以將稀有金屬透過火箭出口至地球，增加殖民地的資金。稀有金屬同樣可以用來製造電子元件。

Text: Exotic Minerals can only be obtained from Asteroids. They are a valuable construction material for expanding into the underground, and can be exported to earth to increase the Funding for the Colony.
Translation: 奇異礦物只能從小行星上獲得。它們是寶貴的建築材料，用於地下發展，也可以出口到地球上，以增加殖民地的資金。

Text: Dust Devils contaminate buildings in their area with Martian Sand. Contaminated buildings require maintenance and may malfunction. Dust devils contaminate nearby buildings quickly, but disappear relatively fast.
Translation: 塵捲風會揚起火星上的塵土，使區域內的建築遭到汙染。被汙染的建築需要進行維護，而且可能會發生故障。塵捲風能快速汙染周圍的建築，但它消失得也比較快。

Text: Dust Storms contaminate all field buildings with dust and can last several Sols. Colonies in areas with intense Dust Storms will require shorter maintenance cycles. MOXIEs and Moisture Vaporators are not operational during Dust Storms.
Translation: 沙塵暴會讓所有的戶外建築被塵土汙染，並且可能會持續數個太陽日。位於強沙塵暴地區的殖民地通常需要更加頻繁的維護。在沙塵暴期間，氧氣生成裝置和水氣蒐集站無法運作。

Text: Meteors can destroy or damage structures, colonists and vehicles in their impact area. Some meteors are composed of useful resources like Metal or Polymers.
Translation: 隕石可能會破壞或殺傷衝擊區域的建築、載具和居民。部分隕石內包含有用的資源，如金屬與聚合物。

Text: Cold Waves last several Sols, increasing the power consumption of vehicles, Drones and many field buildings. Water Towers are frozen during Cold Waves.
Translation: 寒流會持續數個太陽日，而且會導致載具、無人機和許多戶外建築的電力消耗增加。在寒流期間，水塔會被凍結。

Translation: 可遠端遙控的戰鬥載具，已為殖民地收為己用。可以有效對抗隕石襲擊與Eso公司的其它載具。

Translation: 合適工人工作效率加成
殖民地居民每日生命值回覆
殖民地居民每日理智度回覆

Text: Represents physical injury, illness and exhaustion. Lowered by working on a heavy workload, having no functional home, shock when deprived from vital resources or when the Colonist is injured. Colonists can be healed in Medical Buildings in a powered Dome, but only if they are provided with Food, Water and Oxygen. Colonists can't work at low health unless they’re Fit.
Translation: 代表居民受傷、疾病和疲勞程度。當居民沒有合適的居住地點、缺乏生活所需物資、處於高負荷工作或受傷時，生命值都會降低。居民可以進入有能源供應的穹頂，前往醫療建築中進行治療，但前提是必須擁有足夠的食物、水和氧氣。只有擁有健壯特性的居民，才能在生命值較低時繼續工作。

Text: Represents mental condition. Lowered by working on a heavy workload, in outside buildings and during dark hours, witnessing the death of a Colonist living in the same Residence or various Martian disasters. Recovered when resting at home and by visiting certain Service Buildings.
Translation: 代表精神狀態。當殖民者在黑暗環境下工作、在戶外工作、工作負擔過重、目睹同住宅內其他居民的死亡或遭遇各種火星災害時，理智度都會降低。居民可以透過在家休息，或前往特定服務建築來恢復理智度。

Text: Residences and visited buildings improve Comfort up to their Service Comfort value, but Colonists will try to visit only buildings that correspond to their interests. Colonists are more inclined to have children at higher Comfort. Earthborn Colonists whose Comfort is depleted will quit their job and leave the Colony at first opportunity.
Translation: 住宅和建築都可以讓居民的舒適度提高至服務舒適度，不過，居民只會前往與個人興趣相關的建築。當居民的舒適度處於較高水準時，他們會更加想要繁衍後代。當來自於地球的居民舒適度耗盡時，他們會停止工作，而且一有機會就會離開殖民地。

Text: Represents overall happiness, optimism and loyalty. All other stats affect Morale. Influences the Colonist’s job performance. Colonists with low Morale may become Renegades.
Translation: 代表總體的愉悅、樂觀和忠誠程度。所有其它狀態都會影響士氣。士氣會影響居民的工作效率。當居民士氣過低時，他們可能會成為叛徒。

Text: Represents customer satisfaction and how much the Tourist enjoys their holiday, which determines the rewards when they go home. High Health, Sanity, Comfort and Morale improve Satisfaction. Certain residential and visited buildings also improve Satisfaction.
Translation: 代表了客戶滿意度和遊客享受假期的程度，這決定了遊客回家時的獎勵。高生命值、理智度、舒適度和士氣能提高滿意度。特定的居住和供遊覽的建築也可以提高滿意度。
Old Text: Represents customer satisfaction and how much the Tourists enjoy their holiday. This determines the rewards when Tourists go home. High Health, Sanity, Comfort and Morale improve Satisfaction. Certain residence and visited buildings also improve Satisfaction.
Old Translation: 代表了客戶滿意度和遊客享受假期的程度。這決定了遊客回家時的獎勵。高生命值、理智度、舒適度和士氣能提高滿意度。特定的住宅或遊覽過建築也可以提高滿意度。

Translation: 特性：愚蠢（可能導致裝置故障）

Text: Assign this Colonist to a residence, workplace or training building. The Colonist will not change assignment for the next 5 Sols. If the target building is in another Dome located far away, a shuttle may be needed to reach it.
Translation: 將這位居民指派至住宅，崗位或訓練建築中。在接下來的5個太陽日內，居民不會變更指派內容。如果目標位於較遠的遠處穹頂內，居民可能需要乘坐穿梭機前往目的地。

Text: Colonists are required to operate Dome buildings.<newline>
Translation: 穹頂建築需要殖民地居民才能正常運轉。<newline>

Text: Citizens with low morale may become Renegades. Their performance is decreased by 50 at all jobs and they can cause crime events when there are not enough Security Stations in the Dome.
Translation: 士氣較低的殖民地居民可能會變為叛徒。叛徒所有工作的工作效率降低50。如果穹頂內保安中心數量不足，還會導致犯罪事件。

Text: If Automated mode is activated the Rocket will repeatedly travel to the Rival Colony and back while exchanging the negotiated resources. It'll land on the same amount and will launch to the rival when the cargo hold is full and the rocket is refueld.
Translation: 若啟用自動模式，火箭會不斷在我方和對手殖民地之間往返，同時交易協商好的資源。

Text: The following payload is needed for the succesful completion of the mission. The Rocket won't launch itself until everything is loaded.
Translation: 成功完成任務需要以下貨物。火箭只有在所有貨物裝載完畢後才會發射。

Translation: 每遭受一次導彈襲擊，該載具的結構完整度就會下降。當完整度降為0時，載具將無法運轉。

Text: Colonist Sanity decreases when a Colonist from the same Residence dies from non-natural causes
Translation: 當同一住宅的其他居民非自然死亡時，理智度下降的數值

Text: This is the time it takes for Colonists outside of Domes to become dehydrated
Translation: 當殖民者在穹頂外的停留時間超過該時限後，就會處於脫水狀態。

Text: When working during dark hours Colonists will lose this much Sanity (per work shift)
Translation: 當殖民者在黑暗中工作時，理智度下降的數值（每次輪班）

Text: Workers in Workshop receive Comfort boost
Translation: 工坊內的工人舒適度上升

Text: Workers in Workshop receive Morale boost

Old Text: Workers in Workshop building receive additional comfort boost at the end of their workshift
Old Translation: 在工坊中工作的工人，在工作結束後，會額外恢復舒適度

Translation: 高負荷工作時，生命值下降的數值
高負荷工作生命值減益
高負荷工作時，理智度下降的數值
高負荷工作理智度減益

Text: Cooldown added to a category whenever a StoryBit from THAT category is activated
Translation: 當那個類別的StoryBit啟動時，往類別中新增的冷卻

Text: Each StoryBit category is assigned a random cooldown between MinCooldown and MaxCooldown when a StoryBit triggers
Translation: 每個StoryBits類別在StroyBit觸發時都會被分配到在MinCoolDown和MaxCoolDown之間的一個隨機冷卻

Text: Each StoryBit category is assigned a random cooldown between MinCooldown and MaxCooldown when a StoryBit triggers
Translation: 每個StoryBits類別在StroyBit觸發時都會被分配到在MinCoolDown和MaxCoolDown之間的一個隨機冷卻

Text: Time to wait for the player to click the StoryBit notification before the pop up is forced
Translation: 在彈出的StroyBit通知被強制之前等待玩家點選通知的時間

Text: Maximum Size of a Landscape Construction Site Bounding Box (hexes)
Translation: 地形改造施工點邊界框的最大尺寸（格）

Text: Maximum Count of Hexes In a Single Landscape Construction Site
Translation: 單個地形改造施工點的最大格數

Text: A constant soil damage expressed in percents of the current target soil quality
Translation: 用目前目標土壤品質百分比表示的土壤傷害常數
地形改造土壤傷害百分比

Text: WasteRock needed per cubic hex (10 m height)
Increases Comfort Threshold for Social Buildings when used by extroverts

外向居民舒適度提升門檻值

Text: Max base traits generated per Colonist
Translation: 每個殖民地居民可生成的基礎特性數量上限

Text: After being fired, Colonists will avoid that Workplace for this many days when searching for a Workplace
Translation: 被解僱後，殖民者在尋找工作時，不再前往該崗位的時間

Text: Colonists search this far (in hexes) outside their Dome when looking for a Workplace
Translation: 殖民者在尋找工作場所時，從所在穹頂出發的最大範圍（單位為格）

Text: This version of Surviving Mars doesn't yet support downloading mods. You can, however, try the modding tools to create and load your own mods.
Translation: 此版本的火星求生暫不支援模組下載功能。不過，您可以嘗試模組工具，建立或載入您自己的模組。

Text: Could not establish a connection with the Paradox server.
Translation: 無法與Paradox伺服器建立連線。
外部服務收到負面反饋。

Text: You haven't accepted the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
Translation: 您還未同意使用條款與隱私政策
Old Text: You haven't agreed to the Terms of Service.
Old Translation: 您尚未同意服務條款。

Text: Please enter your date of birth.
Password should be between 6 and 128 characters long.
Translation: 密碼長度需在6-128個字元之間。

Text: Password should contain both letters and numbers.
Translation: 密碼必須同時包含字母與數字。

Text: Password can not contain the username.
Translation: 密碼不得包含使用者名稱。

Text: Please supply a valid email address.
Translation: 請輸入有效的電子郵箱地址。

Text: This Paradox account is already linked to another Steam account.
Translation: 該Paradox帳號已與其它Steam帳號連結。

Text: This Steam account is already linked to another Paradox account.
Translation: 該Steam帳號已與其它Paradox帳號連結。

Text: Unable to get Steam authentication ticket. If Steam is running in Offline mode, go online.
Translation: 無法獲得Steam認證單據。如果Steam處於離線狀態，請先上線。

Text: Supplied field keys are not supported.
One or more required keys are missing from account details.
Translation: 帳號細節缺少一項或多項關鍵內容。

Text: Supplied country code is not valid - ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.
Translation: 提供的國家代碼無效 - ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 代碼。

Text: Supplied language code is not valid - ISO 639-1.
Translation: 提供的國家代碼無效 - ISO 639-1。

Text: Supplied script is not valid - ISO 15924.
Translation: 提供的指令碼無效 - ISO 15924。

Text: Please enter a valid date of birth.
You are not eligible to create an account.
Paradox Account is already connected to this Microsoft Account.
This Paradox Account is already connected to another Microsoft Account.
Translation: 該Paradox帳號已與其它Microsoft帳號連結。

Text: This Microsoft Account is already connected to another Paradox Account.
Translation: 該Microsoft帳號已與其它Paradox帳號連結。

Text: This account for PlayStation™Network is already connected to another Paradox Account.
Translation: 該PlayStation™Network帳號已與其它Paradox帳號連結。
Old Text: This Sony account is already connected to another Paradox Account.
Old Translation: 該Sony帳號已與其它Paradox帳號連結。

Text: This Paradox Account is already connected to another account for PlayStation™Network.
Translation: 該Paradox帳號已與其他PlayStation™Network帳號連結。
Old Text: This Paradox Account is already connected to another Sony account.
Old Translation: 該Paradox帳號已與其它Sony帳號連結。

Text: Sign in to PlayStation™Network to use network features.
Translation: 請登入PlayStation™ Network，使用網路功能。

Text: Can not connect this Paradox Account to your Microsoft Account.
Translation: 無法將此Paradox帳號連接到您的微軟賬號。

Text: Can not connect this Microsoft Account to your Paradox Account.
Translation: 無法將此微軟賬戶連接到您的Paradox帳號。

Text: The game did not receive permission to access your profile info.
Translation: 此遊戲沒有得到訪問您檔案訊息的權限。

Text: Can not fetch XSTS token. Your Microsoft account could not be authenticated.
Translation: 無法獲取XSTS token。您的微軟帳號無法驗證。

Text: There is no network connectivity. Please check your connection and try again.
Translation: 無網路連線。請檢查您的網路連線，重試一次。

Text: Downloadable Content has been unlocked, returning to Main Menu.
Translation: 可下載內容已被解鎖，即將返回主選單。

Text: You can not overwrite a savegame that is currently being uploaded.
Translation: 目前存檔正在上傳，您無法覆蓋該存檔。

Text: Required content not available: Paradox Mission Sponsor. Log into your Paradox account to unlock it
Translation: 需要的內容不可用：Paradox任務贊助者。登入Paradox帳號以解鎖。

Text: Controller for <user> has been disconnected. Reconnect the controller in order to continue.
Translation: <user>無線控制器已失去連線。請重新連接控制器以繼續遊戲。
